description: In the heart of the Old Town of Palma de Mallorca is this unique and spacious apartment in an old 18th century palace completely renovated with incredible French architectural influences. The distribution of the 207 m² living space is as follows: generous dining area, 1 spacious living room with garden views, fully equipped kitchen (Gaggenau equipment), 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (1 en suite) and an office area. From an aesthetic point of view, you feel like you are in a high-end apartment in Paris. The views are towards other beautiful properties and a totally peaceful garden. No cars to be heard, a true oasis in the old town. Other features and facilities of the apartment are: original untreated French-style elements, marble floors, hot/cold air conditioning, built-in wardrobes, elevator and very romantic common areas (garden). The building community has a person in charge of maintaining the property. In addition, the apartment has 2 parking spaces and 1 storage room. Contact us for more information or to arrange a visit. All the information in this exposé has been provided by the owner of the property, so no responsibility is assumed for the accuracy of this data. Ref. : KPP06739.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Jaume, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Apartment with terrace for sale in Santa Catalina This charming home is located on the first floor by stairs of a small building with only three units, with an unbeatable location in a corner of the popular neighbourhood of Santa Catalina, steps away from all kinds of services and countless options of international gastronomy. Just 300 metres from the property is the traditional market that gives its name to this area. Throughout the property, the typical Majorcan character can be appreciated thanks to the wooden beams and the three-and-a-half metre high ceilings which give an airy and even more spacious feeling. From the entrance hall, you enter the large living/dining room with an integrated open plan kitchen which has been renovated in 2021. To the right of this space is both a full bathroom and a single bedroom. At the end of the living room is the magnificent terrace of 18 sqm facing the heart of the block with a beautiful view. To the left of the entrance door, the master bedroom with an area of 25 sqm which could be divided into two bedrooms has a French balcony and an adjoining room currently used as a storage room, with facilities prepared to convert it into an en-suite bathroom. The property has planned improvements to the façade which have already been paid for by the current owner. Can you imagine living here? We look forward to your call!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Caro

description: Detached villa for sale in Sant Marçal This villa built in 2006 on an 800 sqm plot is located 10 minutes from Palma, in the well-known and quiet area of Sa Cabaneta. Its 414 sqm are perfectly divided into three levels with an optimal distribution. From the spacious hall on the ground floor you have access to the modernly decorated living and dining area, which in turn allows access to the porch and the 53 sqm pool. The kitchen is very spacious and bright and is distinguished by the partially glass ceiling that allows the massive entry of light. The ground floor has two large bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and two bathrooms, one of them adapted for people with special needs. The master bedroom is also on the ground floor, with access to a large dressing room. The living room, the kitchen and the master bedroom have access to the 45 sqm porch and the pool. Practically all the facilities for daily life are located on the ground floor, thus making the circuit as comfortable and simple as possible. On the upper floor there is another bedroom and a bathroom, as well as a leisure area or living room, offering the possibility of hosting family, children or guests with privacy. In the bedroom, the balcony stands out with wonderful views over the city of Palma. The basement of about 127 sqm includes the garage for three or four vehicles and a large storage room. The house, predominantly south facing, has gas central heating and also ducts. However, it is equipped with everything necessary to offer a lot of comfort and tranquility, and the area is ideal to avoid the hustle and bustle of the city, but at the same time being at a convenient distance that allows quick access to the center of Palma. In the surroundings there are supermarkets, shops, a sports club and an international school.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sa Cabaneta, Marratxi
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Escudella

description: Luxury apartment for sale on Palma's Paseo Marítimo Facing the marina, in a sought-after section of the port promenade bordering the Victoria Gran Meliá hotel, this magnificent apartment is located in one of Palma's most emblematic buildings: Edificio Mediterráneo. Its regal aesthetics, the direct access by lift to a prestigious restaurant on the fifth floor and the communal pool oppposite the yacht club make it unique and a status symbol. The splendid property is a delight with its open plan design offering sea views from all its rooms, with a total of 140 sqm distributed between the spacious living room, three double bedrooms (two of them en suite), two bathrooms and a guest toilet, as well as the elegant kitchen with island and Siemens appliances, integrated in the living area. The equipment includes underfloor heating and specially fitted and soundproofed windows and the sunny terrace of 25 sqm, ideal for enjoying the outdoors all year round. With this excellent location on Palma's promenade by the water, refurbished to the highest standards in a historic building facing the Mediterranean Sea.. . Can you imagine living here? We look forward to your call!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Terreno, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida de Gabriel Roca

description: Ladies and gentlemen, we have the pleasure to present to you this wonderful property located in the urbanisation of Cala Viñas within the municipality of Calvià on the southwest coast of Mallorca, 10 km south of Portals Nous and Bendinat, 18 km from the centre of Palma and 30 km from Sant Joan airport. The 409 m2 built property was completely renovated in 2017 and has a plot of approximately 1,382 m2 where the construction of a swimming pool is planned and approved.  The whole property is surrounded by centuries-old pine trees in a very quiet and safe area just a few minutes from the golf courses and the sea Originally this Majorcan-style house was completely renovated in 2017.  The floors are made of wood-like porcelain tiles and the whole property has been given a warm and cosy interior design playing with material and colours that the owners have created with style and elegance by combining stones and original African wood. All rooms are air-conditioned with heat and cold pumps and the exterior walls are clad and insulated with stone. The main entrance is approximately 200m2 with a large porch leading to a terrace with barbecue area that leads to the main floor. This entrance has a terrace of about 45 m2 and consists of the living room with a fireplace and a guest bathroom with a small office of about 5.70 m2. The large dining room has double access to the kitchen, which is fully equipped and connected to a laundry room of approximately 9.80 m2. All bedrooms are on the first and second floors with solid wood beamed ceilings.  The suite has a dressing room with fitted wardrobes and a full bathroom with exits to covered balconies with African cane ceilings that allow views of the entire property.  Several cars can be parked on the private property which has 2 entrances with two very ornate gates. There is a semi-basement storage room with a view of the garden, of approximately 38 m2  The entire house has aluminium exterior carpentry with double glazing and the interior is solid wood.  It is sold with and without furniture, which is not included in the sale price.  The surrounding buildings are only villas of people who like peace and privacy. Only a five-minute drive away are national and international schools, health centres, shopping areas and golf courses. The dream can become reality to live on the most beautiful island in the world. Agent King Mallorca Real Estate Dr. Matteo Belotti.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cala Vinyes, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Just over 300 m2 studio/loft New York style where it is already a fantastic living space combined with an artist and music studio. A different and inspiring creative environment with a ceiling height of just over 4 meters and a huge open area with endless possibilities! Today there is a fully equipped, modern open kitchen, an airy bedroom with curtains as walls and a separate, modern closed bathroom. The entire one long wall is from floor to ceiling a single section of glass and part of the opposite wall also has a large window area from floor to ceiling. All the walls are creme white, the ceiling is painted in two shades of black and the studio is flooded with natural light. The studio is on the first floor, but no one can look into this place. From the public stairwell, there is a separate entrance that leads into a private entrance hall and a wide, stylish staircase with floor-to-ceiling windows when you get up to the living floor. On the left is the studio described above and to the right there is a separate residence since just over 1 year. The separate floor of approx. 150 m2 has the same owner as the studio and is made in the same style.  In the photos it says separate apartment and those photos are after the photos from the studio. This home has a large airy living room with an open plan bedroom as part of the living room. The living room has floor-to-ceiling windows along one long side and by the "bedroom part" on the opposite side. In this flat you find a modern, practical, closed working kitchen, a smaller bedroom, a bathroom and a separate guest toilet as well as a spacious walk-in closet. The studio and the apartment are each on their own title deed. There is a possible of buying 1 or 2 parking spaces for €28,000/piece in the property's garage and/or to rent 1 space in the same garage. The location is directly above Can Barbara, the small bay that enters from the sea just before the Porto Pi shopping center which it takes about 7-8 minutes to walk to and where, in addition to the island's largest Carrefour grocery store, there is all imaginable shopping, restaurants, cafes, cinema etc.  To Santa Catalina with its wide range of restaurants and bars it is a 15 minute walk and to the cathedral and the luxurious shopping streets it is another 10 minute walk.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Terreno, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Lovely airy and spacious with large kitchen with separate dining area, cozy living room and between kitchen and living room a large office that provides opportunities for even more spacious room distribution. In addition, there are 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a large hall and the ceiling height is close to 3 meters throughout! However, not in the bathrooms. From the street you pass a private gate and end up in a private passage to the right of the property and from this there is another private gate to this residence only. From the gate there are a few steps up to the terrace which runs like an L along one short side of the garden and together with the terrace covered by the upper floor of the property which is a smaller, but still airy arcade. Once inside the property, you have the cozy living room to your right and the large rustic kitchen open to a separate lovely dining room to the left. The dining room is located in a large bay window. From the kitchen is also the entrance to the large (today) combined office and guest room. The private/bedroom area is reached via a hallway opposite the entrance door, ending on the left side with a bathroom followed by a bedroom. Straight ahead is another bedroom, in the corner to the right is the third bedroom followed by a bathroom and then the master bedroom which also has its own entrance to that bathroom and has a walk-in closet. In 2019, with completion in January 2020, a complete interior renovation was done. A completely new bathroom was made and the other bathroom was renovated, the ceiling was lowered in parts of the home and recessed spot lights were installed, all the walls were painted, new parquet was installed, the entire kitchen was replaced and all plumbing and electricity were replaced or upgraded. In addition, some walls were removed to provide a more open floor plan. The wall around the garden was also renovated. All rooms have large windows and radiators heated with city gas. The garden have approx 175 m2, faces south and has room to build a pool. The floor above is used as a holiday home and there the owner has received a license to build a pool on his side of the garden, which is at the back of the house. The work on building the neighbours pool has already begun. The property has surprisingly privat location. The location at the beginning of Son Armadams means that it is a 5 minute walk to the well-known Palma Sport & Tennis Club and to Santa Catalina with its wide range of restaurants and bars as well as to the Paseo Maritimo, the beautiful harbor promenade it is a 10-minute walk. Grocery stores, large and small, cafes, deli, haircuts for both humans and dogs, vet, 2 good hotels with nice bars and everything else you could possibly need for daily, comfortable living is within a 10 minute walk.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Armadams, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: EXCLUSIVELY only with us is this elegant floor on the third and fourth floor of a corner property with a central location in Santa Catalina. The entrance is on the upper floor, from the hall you enter into the bright and airy corner living room with dining area. This whole very social floor plan is open, which means that the kitchen, which is a stylish, minimalistic work kitchen with generous and well-thought-out on-site built storage, is integrated in the rest of the social space. The kitchen also has a breakfast area and a separate pantry / storage / laundry room. The entire floor is flooding with light, it's airy and with a sober elegance that is emphasized by the equally light marble floors that are throughout the entire home. The stairs down to the bedroom floor are of course also built in the same marble, which nicely connects the two floors. Directly down the stairs is the entrance to the 19 sqm large terrace and after this door is a separate bathroom. The lower floor has ample storage and 3 spacious bedrooms with fitted wardrobes. The corner bedroom is currently used as a living room / TV room. Another full bathroom is located between the bedrooms. The terrace of 19 sqm has during May 2022 received a new paving, it has been painted, received new lighting, etc., the entire surface finish has been updated. There is plenty of space here for drinks, barbecues and dinners in the balmy Mediterranean evening. The building has a lift and there is a parking space included in the garage. The property has a very central location next to Placa de Progress, which in the near future will be transformed into an even larger green area when the main street is redirected and a large garage will be built under the entire square. The conversion is very positive for this property which ends up further from traffic and gets more park in front. Around the corner is a large, well-stocked Eroski grocery store, there are two organic food stores in the block, a Spanish bakery diagonally across the street and the Swedish bakery Palma Bread is a 3 minute walk away. Within the neighborhood there is also a bus stop, post office, several banks, pharmacies and several local restaurants.  In addition, it´s 5 minutes walk to the market hall in Santa Catalina and the huge range of restaurants, bars and cafes that are around. Exclusive Palma Sport & Tennis Club is also a 5-minute walk away. There you can spend the whole day doing sports, sunbathing or just being social and enjoying good food and drinks in the restaurant in this oasis in the middle of the city. A 10-minute walk will take you to the seafront, Paseo Marítimo or to the shopping street Jaume III and the luxurious Paseo des Borne, where Palma's beautiful cathedral is also located.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Duplex

description: Unique property on a quiet street around the corner from Santa Catalina´'s lovely market hall. There are not many town houses in the central part of Santa Catalina like this. It is a large property with three floors with a living area of a total of 372 sqm distributed over 2 completely separate and 2012 completely renovated apartments on the first and second floor where each have 128 sqm living space + each have a covered balcony of about 10 sqm. The unrenovated ground floor of approx 120 sqm + a back yard of 40 sqm provides many possibilities. The ground floor is registered as a business premises. On the first floor there is a nicely renovated apartment with a nice hall way, 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, very airy social area with open kitchen with a large bar counter and spacious living room area that ends with two French balconies. Towards the covered balcony of 10 sqm is a generous dining area and out on the balcony there is another dining area. It´s high ceilings and white painted wooden beames in the ceilings and a rustic wooden kitchen. The style is modern charm with earthy warm colors. The apartment on the second floor also has a nice hall way, 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and airy social area where the kitchen is open and has a large bar counter, the living room is airy and finishes with French balconies. The dining area against the covered balcony of this floor is also large and the balcony of 10 sqm has space for outdoor dining too. This floor also has high ceilings and here the beams have their natural color and the style is classic chic meets Ibiza. From the living roomis the stair way to the private roof terrace of 30 sqm with views over the rooftops and towards the sea. Here the wind cools in the balmy Mediterranean nights and it is as made for long dinners. Both apartments have air conditioning units, double-glazed windows and everything is renovated in terms of craftsmanship and with high quality. As can be seen in the pictures, the home on the ground floor needs to be renovated, which provides opportunities to let the imagination flow freely. Behind the ground floor there is a larger backyard of approx 40 sqm which also contains opportunities for a garden, a smaller "plounge pool", outdoor kitchen, play area for children, etc. The property is sold as an investment opportunity with all 3 floors included.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house

description: Bconnected is proud to offer in EXCLUSIVE this luxury villa located in the sought after area of Old Bendinat, very close to several turquoise beaches and within walking distance to the village of Portals Nous, where you can find everything you need.  The entrance is covered by a tropical garden, allowing for a lot of privacy but at the same time, the nearest beach is literally a few steps away, making this villa a real hidden gem. The property is very well maintained and is a perfect family home for a well deserved holiday or year round living. Upon entering the house you will find a large parking area for several cars surrounded by the lush tropical garden and swimming pool.  One of the unique aspects of this property is that the communal areas are all on one level. The bedrooms are on the ground floor of the house where it is cooler in the summer months. The house has terraces and porches all around to enjoy a cup of coffee or a glass of wine outside with stunning sea views. On the upper floor there are 2 living rooms with open plan kitchen, an office, the master bedroom with dressing room and bathroom en suite and 1 guest toilet.  On the lower floor there are 4 bedrooms with 2 bathrooms (1 en suite) and access to the terrace from all rooms. The property is equipped with air conditioning and underfloor heating, maintaining a very pleasant temperature all year round. The special feature of this property are its tropical gardens where fresh mangoes, papayas, lychees, bananas and grapefruit trees grow, and the beautiful swimming pool in front of the porch surrounded by lawns. The property has a gate from the garden that leads to the nearest beach, approximately 60 metres away. There is also a complete guest flat with independent access.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Portals Nous - Bendinat, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: House

address: Sa Cabana - Can Carbonell - Ses Cases Noves
district: Sa Cabana - Can Carbonell - Ses Cases Noves
description: SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE IN SES CASES NOVES, MARRATXI Exclusive semi-detached house with private pool on a 182 m2 plot, garage and a well-kept garden. The detached house is located in a strategic location on the island, just a few minutes by car from Palma, with extensive bus and train schedules and excellent communications to the best beaches on the island. The site is characterized by being a quiet and residential area. It has all the services around it, several shopping centers, supermarkets, a health center, two international schools and the Puntiró and Son Gual golf courses are nearby. The property impresses with its modern style, both in appearance and in interior design. It has 190.55 m² of living space and is planned as a structure with two floors plus a basement (today used as a separate room and a cinema room). On the ground floor, there is a spacious living-dining room and an integrated designer kitchen, furnished and equipped with high-end appliances, a courtesy toilet, utility room and pantry. From the living room itself there is access to a rear porch with barbecue and Bioclimatic pergola, and to the front porch with the pool facing south and surrounded by a garden in perfect condition. The rooms are very bright with large windows and terraces. There is a barbecue area and a shaded summer dining area just off the kitchen. On the first floor are the three bedrooms, all with fitted wardrobes, bathroom and exterior. The master bedroom also has a large dressing room and shower and communicates with a terrace overlooking the garden. The basement is prepared for two cars, it was currently adapted and there is a bedroom with a wardrobe and exterior window, and a large cinema room, there is also a small storage room and storage cabinets. Home extras: Heat pump, air conditioning, camera surveillance, aluminum windows with double glazing, low-consumption led lighting, designer bathroom furniture, built-in shower system, pre-installation of fireplace. Do not miss the opportunity to see this exclusive home and request a visit now.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sa Cabana - Can Carbonell - Ses Cases Noves, Marratxi
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house

description: Spacious corner apartment with good room distribution in a quiet location in Palma's beautiful old town with cobbled streets and a blissful mix of shops, cafes and restaurants a block away. The property was built in 1930 and renovated in 2006 with quality and style. The street entrance is small, but elegant with light marble floors that continue up the stairwell. There are 3 homes in the property, one on each floor and this home is located on the 2nd floor. From the very high entrance door which is a renovated original door, you enter directly into the open and modern kitchen / living room with 3 large renovated windows that go from floor to ceiling and make the room bathe in light. The kitchen area runs along one and a half wall and is fully equipped with German quality appliances. There is plenty of space here for both dinners and hanging in the sofa. From the living room you come via a giant door and through a nice hallway to the master bedroom which is large, with a very large walk-in closet and of course the en-suite bathroom is also large. After the kitchen part comes a bedroom with space for a double bed, this room is today used as an office. Opposite the bedroom / office is a full-size bathroom. At the far end of the floor in this direction is the third bedroom which is also full size made for double bed and has an en-suite bathroom. All the windows in the apartment (except bathroom windows) goes from floor to ceiling and are renovated beautiful old windows with new double glazing. In addition, the property has very thick walls, exterior as well as interior walls, which insulates against both heat / cold and sound.  The whole apartment have built in air-conditioning for cooling/heat. Everything in the home is made by craftsmen and with high quality. The street outside is one-way and only residents in the area and transports are allowed to drive here and inside the home it is completely quiet. At the top of the property there is a shared roof terrace that can be used by all residents who with 3 homes, are not many, the risk / chance of meeting a neighbor there is negligible. From the roof terrace you look out over the beautiful rooftops of the old town! As you can see on the photos the whole building is well maintained. It is possible to rent a parking space in a garage about 4 minutes walk from the house. Within 5 minutes walk you reach everything you need and much more, around the corner is, for example a Swedish bakery, open every day of the week. Palma's largest market hall, Mercat de Olivar is 5 minutes away, around the corner is charming Placa Quadrado with eco cafes, at Placa Cort there are exclusive, stylish and generally good restaurants. In these neighborhoods you will find everything you want and what you did not know you wanted and lots of good restaurants for all budgets. In addition within a 10 minutes walk you are at the cathedral and the famous luxury shopping street Paseig del Borne, it's a great location!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sindicat, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Bright penthouse in well-kept property with elevator and garage. With lovely views of Palma's beautiful harbor and an extra living room on the terrace, this makes a perfect place in the sun! The home that has only had one owner and during all years only been used as a holiday home is located on floor 3 of 3 and there are 2 apartments on each floor. From the front door, you end up in a hallway with a living/dining room to the left and the closed kitchen opposite. Following on the left side is a bathroom followed by the master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and wardrobe wall. After the kitchen, there are two more bedrooms, one with space for a double bed and the other one slightly smaller.   Adjacent to the kitchen is a laundry room from which the stairs to the roof terrace of 97 sqm go. Once been up on the terrace, you do not like to go down again. The view is fantastic and here is a conservatory which is currently fully equipped with an extra TV and dining room. With that view, however, you do not need a TV. The terrace is spacious with space for several sunbeds, there is a jacuzzi and space for a lounge area. No matter what time of year it is, you will still have sun on the terrace from the time it goes up until it goes down. The home has built-in air conditioning for cooling/heating. In front of the property is a square, which means that the next property is far away, the home is completely private and there is no higher building that can obscure the sun. A good garage space that is reached by an elevator is included as well as 2 storage rooms in the basement. The property is well maintained and the home can be even better with an update. The street is quiet and it is very close down to Paseo Maritimo also both a park and playground are around the corner. A small grocery store is across the street and there are a number of other grocery stores nearby. You will also find several nice local bars and restaurants in the area and there is good bus communication to Placa España / central Palma via Santa Catalina in one direction and out to the beaches of Cala Major as well to Illetas in the other direction. The Bellver park where you can walk for hours on beautiful nature roads is a 5 -10 minutes walk away.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Terreno, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Spacious and bright renovated apartment for sale in Son Armadams, located on the third floor of a building with an elevator. With a constructed area of 113 m² and a useful area of 108 m², this apartment has 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms, offering space and comfort for the whole family. The living-dining room is an open and airy space that receives a large amount of natural light thanks to its south orientation and its direct access to a balcony that offers pleasant exterior views. In addition, the apartment has a practical kitchen equipped with high-quality appliances and furniture. This apartment also has a storage room, perfect for storing personal belongings and keeping the house always tidy. In addition, it has central heating and air conditioning, so you can enjoy maximum comfort at any time of the year. The building is located in a quiet and well-connected area of the city, a few minutes from shops, restaurants and all the services you may need. If you are looking for a cozy, modern and well-located apartment, this is your ideal home! Do not miss the opportunity to visit it and fall in love with it.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Espanyolet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Welcome to an airy, spacious penthouse, divided into three bedrooms, an office/library, a hallway, and a huge social room for relaxation, dinner parties, and cooking. The entire home has a modern, stripped-down style, with semi-gloss epoxy floors and everything else in white to make it as spacious and bright as possible. The apartment has 4 terraces in different latitudes, which gives the attic both morning sun and evening sun with views of the mountains on one side and the sea on the other. Enter the hall of the home which is the home's hub and leads to all bedrooms. Directly to the right is a bedroom that is used as a library/office, on the left side, a beautiful bathroom and then a bedroom with good storage and a terrace of 25 sqm. Straight ahead is the master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, a walking closet, and a fantastic terrace of 40 sqm with sea views. There is also good storage on the terrace. To the left is the fourth bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and built-in storage. The most beautiful room in the home is the generously sized open living room/kitchen with fantastic sea views, along the entire seaside of this room, there are large glass sections and a narrower terrace. In this lovely area for socializing, there is plenty of space for both lounge furniture and dining tables. There is also a wine room that can be converted into a guest toilet. There is a possibility of purchasing a garage space in a nearby property. The apartment is located in the upper part of Santa Catalina´, here is everything you need within 100 meters radius, a grocery store, restaurants, cafe, bakeries, barbers, and in a three-minute walk you are at Palma Sport & Tennis Club or Santa Catalina bar and restaurant dens part. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a fantastic penthouse with views in all directions! Floor plan is available.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Do you need to relax and enjoy the peace and quiet? Stop looking! We invite you to visit our spectacular penthouse located in the area of Son Gual. This impressive penthouse is distributed in a spacious living-dining room with fireplace, kitchen with dining area, four bedrooms and three bathrooms, one of them en suite. It also has a 28 m2 terrace with direct access from the dining room and the main bedroom, and a 55 m2 solarium with 360 degree views of the whole island. The penthouse also has a lift, garage and storage room for your convenience. In addition, you will be able to enjoy all the amenities offered by the residential complex, including a swimming pool, children's playground, sports area and landscaped gardens. Located just 10 minutes from Palma, this penthouse is the perfect combination of tranquillity and accessibility.    We look forward to showing you your new home! "This property has been certified by ABSI (Balearic Association of Real Estate Services), which means that the agency has supervised the necessary documentation for the sale and that the property is part of the ABSI multi-exclusive properties. ".
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Gual, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de Castellitx

address: Calle de les Cases de Son Ametler
description: Building promotion EL VIVERO, a project designed with you and all your needs in mind!  Here, we are offering this átic on the fifth-floor flat of 71 m2 with a terrace of 16 m2 in the same floor and a solarium terrace of 55 m2 to enjoy summer days and evenings with your family and friends.  Living and dining room with open kitchen, 2 double bedrooms, and two bathrooms (one of them en-suite).  Flats designed down to every detail, modern and minimalist style to enjoy every room.  Located in El Vivero. This traditional and well-regarded neighbourhood of Palma offers a great social life, full of squares, Parks, businesses, markets, and schools. A quiet, but lively district that is chosen by many families to settle down and grow.    The building consists of 5 floors and only 2 flats of 2 or 3 bedrooms per floor. 10 dwellings in total, all of them with terraces.    • Air-conditioning, hot/cold, and hot water for sanitary use.  • Double-glazed Climalit-type windows with thermal and acoustic isolation.  • Great effort has been put into combining aesthetics and functionality in the kitchens, equipped with custom-made furniture, oven, kitchen counter and extractor hood.  • Parquet and porcelain floors.    Handover in beginning 2023    Would you like to know more? Do not hesitate to contact us. We will give you all the details.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Vivero, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de les Cases de Son Ametler

description: This impressive three-story property, located just a few minutes from the city center, has been completely renovated with excellent finishes and equipped with solar panels. It is ready to be occupied and enjoyed. Son Fortesa is known for its quiet and familiar atmosphere, with tree-lined streets and a wide variety of local shops and services. In addition, it has a children's playground and an outdoor sports area for residents. The house has five double bedrooms, three of which have en-suite bathrooms and the master bedroom has a dressing room and private Jacuzzi. One of the three terraces has a retractable roof, which allows you to enjoy this area in all seasons. In addition, it has a pool, barbecue, kitchen and independent bathroom that serve this area. Don't miss the opportunity to see this unique property in Son Forteza! You will be surprised! “This property has been certified by ABSI (Balearic Association of Real Estate Services), which means that the commercializing agency has supervised the necessary documentation for its sale and that the property is part of ABSI’s pool of multiexclusive properties. ”.

description: In one of the best areas of the beach of Palma, we find this fabulous, newly built duplex flat with spectacular views of the sea thanks to its privileged location at beachfront. The property has a constructed surface of 203 m2, with terraces, stairs, and private lift. The first floor of this three-floor flat consists of an open space highlighting the view of the Mediterranean Sea with a modern, American-style kitchen already equipped with high-end appliances. On this first floor, we also find an exterior terrace, a full bathroom, and a laundry room. On the middle floor we find two spacious bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, two modern bathrooms, and a master bedroom with entrance area, fitted wardrobe and direct view of the Mediterranean Sea, as well as access to a terrace of 22.50 m2. On the upper floor, we have a large terrace with a brick-built grill and privileged views of the surroundings.  The flat stands out for its brightness and warmth thanks to the large windows flooding the space with sunlight. All rooms have split air-conditioning. The proximity to the emblematic city centre of Palma and the airport make it possible for the owners of the spectacular triplex flat to enjoy all the advantages and comforts of living in Mallorca. “This property has been certified by ABSI (Balearic Association of Real Estate Services), which means that the commercializing agency has supervised the necessary documentation for its sale and that the property is part of ABSI’s pool of multiexclusive properties. ”.

description: This bright, renovated apartment in Palma de Mallorca is located at 2. floor of a well-kept building with elevator and offers an excellent location, just a few steps walk from the well-known Paseo Marítimo and the port. From the large covered terrace you have partial views of the sea and the port. The attractive apartment has a constructed area of approx. 80 m2 that are distributed as follows: a spacious living room, an equipped kitchen, 1 nice bedroom, 1 bathroom, as well as a laundry room. The equipment features of this beautiful apartment in Palma include: air conditioning, central heating, Sat TV and fitted wardrobes. The situation is excellent: the Paseo Marítimo is perfect for a relaxing walk or cycling and offers a wide range of excellent international restaurants, where you can enjoy delicious meals on the seafront overlooking the port. The international airport is only about 10 minutes away by car.

description: Apartment for sale in Cas Catalá/Bendinat  This beautifully refurbished 100 sqm, two bedroom apartment is distributed as follows: Through the main entrance, the hall with built-in wardrobe offers a warm welcome, and opens onto the good sized living-dining room, tastefully decorated in warm colours with fireplace and as an anteroom, and exit to the sunny terrace of about 25 sqm with unobstructed views to the sea, ideal to relax and disconnect; the very well equipped kitchen with cheerful colours has direct exit to the laundry room; the interior area with the cosy complete bathroom and the two comfortable large sized bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, one of them with dressing room. The property is equipped with air conditioning splits and heating by radiators in all the rooms, as well as having a large covered parking space and storage room included in the price. In a very quiet area, close to international schools, just eight kilometres away from Palma city and a few steps away from the beach, this property offers all kinds of services and comforts within easy reach. Can you imagine living here? We look forward to your call!

description: This property is located in the heart of Old Town Palma and boasts stunning views of the Cathedral. It is situated on the 4th floor and is accessible by an elevator. The living and dining area is open and spacious, perfect for entertaining guests. The kitchen is well equipped with modern appliances. There are three spacious bedrooms, each with their own en-suite bathroom, and fitted wardrobes. The master bedroom has a free-standing bathtub and a walk-in wardrobe. Additionally, is also a guest toilet. The outdoor space is truly impressive, with large terraces of 230 m² featuring outdoor seating and lounge areas with pergolas. There is an outdoor kitchen and outdoor shower, as well as outdoor storage space and a water feature. The property is built with extremely high-quality materials and is sold fully furnished, including all furniture and fixtures except for the artwork. One car parking space and one storage room are included in the price. Overall, this property is perfect for those looking for luxury living in the heart of Palma, with stunning views and impressive outdoor space.

description: Flat for sale with lift in Sa Calatrava This is a first floor flat in a beautiful property with lift built in 2001 in a very quiet square between Sant Francesc church and Avenidas, a few minutes walking distance to shopping centres, small shops and the new leisure area and restaurants, as well as the seafront promenade. The property has 73qm. From the entrance hall, on the right hand side, there is access to the bright living/dining room with a large floor to ceiling window leading out onto a lovely balcony with unobstructed views of the square and the beautiful bell tower of the church of Sant Francesc. It has a spacious kitchen equipped with electrical appliances and a laundry room with views to the picturesque inner courtyard. The flat has three totally exterior bedrooms, all of them with built-in wardrobes and a complete bathroom with shower. The equipment includes security door, wooden interior and exterior carpentry -the exterior with double glazing hydraulic tiled floors, air conditioning, natural gas and optional parking 30.000€ which can be accessed from the same property. All these features and its location make this property a unique opportunity to live in the heart of the old town in a quiet location and at the same time have all the comforts and services.   Can you imagine living here, we are waiting for your call!

description: This penthouse apartment is located in Foners, minutes walk from the beach and 10 minutes walk from Palma Old Town, offering sea views. The fully renovated apartment which can be accessed via elevator is located on the 7th floor. The 190m² property offers a bright open plan living area with a dining space, a well equipped fitted kitchen with Bosch appliances, 3 bedrooms - 2 of them with fitted wardrobes and 2 bathrooms (1 en-suite). From the living area and the main bedroom there is access to a large 90m² terrace with views of the cathedral, the harbour, the mountains and the sea from all sides! Additionally, there is a smaller second terrace. There is an option to purchase an additional parking space for € 50,000. Additional features include: air conditioning in all rooms, underfloor heating in both bathrooms and the kitchen, chimney in the living room and the terrace, storeroom, LED spotlights, garage.

It features 3 double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, a spacious living-dining room, and an independent kitchen. You can enjoy two terraces, each with views of different streets, from the communal roof terrace you will be able to see the impressive Cathedral of Palma.

description: Duplex penthouse for sale with views in Bonanova In the upper part of Bonanova, this beautiful duplex penthouse with access to the spectacular chill-out area and magnificent views of the Bellver Castle is located in a modern residential building of high quality with a lift, gardens and two large communal swimming pools. On the first floor, the 118 sqm duplex-penthouse has a spacious and bright living-dining room with access to a terrace with magnificent views to the castle and the Bellver forest, next to the independent and fully equipped kitchen with high-end appliances and separate laundry room; in the night area there are two exterior bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, one of them with bathroom en suite and the other one with access to the terrace from where you can only hear the birds of the pine trees of the Bellver forest, plus a second bathroom with bathtub. From the terrace there is access to the upper floor with the solarium terrace of about 80 sqm, swimming pool, chill-out area, barbecue and sauna with spectacular views to the mountains and the emblematic Bellver castle, where to enjoy the fresh air in the warmer months. The equipment includes marble and parquet floors, interior carpentry in solid oak wood and exterior carpentry in white Climalit aluminium with double glazing and roller shutters, reversible air conditioning and natural gas heating. Don't miss the opportunity to live in a residential area with these natural surroundings and landscaped areas just 10 minutes from the centre of Palma. Can you imagine living here? We look forward to your call!

description: Detached villa for sale in Son Quint This splendid villa is located in a privileged enclave, in the upper area of Son Quint, next to the golf course of the same name and bordering the SON VIDA residential estate. It is a very peaceful area, surrounded by the golf course, abundant autochthonous vegetation and unobstructed views of the bay of Palma. Its proximity to Palma and even closer to Son Rapinya, with all services within easy reach, including the best schools, doctors, shops etc. , make the area an ideal place to live all year round. This complete home has a tennis court, a space for a gym, manicured gardens with some fruit trees and a generous swimming pool. The plot is totally enclosed, the entrance gate is automated and has an entry phone system. The equipment includes wooden shutters on the windows, pine wood in the interior, marble floors and high ceilings throughout the house. The property is distributed in basement, ground floor and ground floor. Accessed through the main door on the ground floor there is a spacious entrance hall and a corridor leading to the living-dining room with fireplace and large windows overlooking the garden and the swimming pool, the independent kitchen which can be easily extended, a bedroom and a guest toilet. The terrace goes all the way around the house. A wide internal staircase leads to the upper floor which includes a magnificent bedroom with dressing room and bathroom with bathtub, three more double bedrooms, all with fitted wardrobes, a bathroom with shower and another with bathtub, plus another room where the kitchen was originally located with a laundry room. Again on this floor, the terrace which completely surrounds it, so provides access from all rooms. The basement can be accessed both from the outside and from the inside of the house. It has a huge multipurpose room, pantry, laundry room and space for several cars, and another garage with capacity for more than 6 cars. The house has many possibilities, both for living all year round and for holidays or as an investment to rent it out later, as it is located in a high value and highly demanded area. What more could you ask for? Can you imagine living here? We look forward to your call!

description: Stately home for sale with parking and views of the Almudaina Located in the best area of the old town of Palma, at the beginning of the Passeig des Born, one minute away from the port promenade, in front of the most emblematic buildings of the city such as the Almudaina, the cathedral and the March palace, with all the comforts that living in the historic centre of Palma has to offer, surrounded by all kinds of luxury shops, restaurants and bars, very well communicated with all kinds of public transports, this stately residence is situated on the first floor of a building with lift and only three units, facing two streets and completely renovated in 2001. The entrance hall includes a practical courtesy cloackroom; a sliding door gives access to the large and bright living room with two large windows and a balcony with views onto the street and the Almudaina, a large bedroom suite with two entrances, a hydromassage bathtub and shower, and a dressing room which also communicates through a sliding door with the living room; a kitchen with an office, a laundry area and an exterior double bedroom with a bathroom. The night area is made up of two exterior double bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms overlooking the rear street, all of them with built-in wardrobes. The equipment includes ducted air conditioning and gas heating by radiators, thermostat in each bedroom, hallway with wardrobes, oak parquet floors, a parking space in the same building and a storeroom. All in all, it is the ideal property for those who want a traditional home in the coolest and most famous area of the city. Can you imagine living here? We look forward to your call!

description: This designer villa in the process of being completely refurbished is an excellent opportunity for those looking for a modern and well located property in Peguera. With a surface area of approximately 150m2, the villa offers ample indoor and outdoor spaces to enjoy the Mediterranean climate. The layout of the villa is designed to maximise comfort and functionality. It has two bedrooms, one of them en suite and with dressing room, two bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen and a spacious living-dining room. The villa also has a large solarium terrace with a swimming pool, ideal for relaxing and enjoying the sun. In addition, the property has garden areas with fruit trees and plants that give it a touch of freshness and colour. The floors, air conditioning and heating are completely new, which guarantees a high level of comfort in all seasons of the year. The villa also has an outdoor parking and a storage room, which allows a safe storage of personal belongings and vehicles. The location of the villa is very quiet, with few neighbours around, which guarantees privacy and a relaxed atmosphere. In addition, the property has all services, transport and shops at its disposal, making it very convenient for those looking for comfortable and practical living in a coastal area.

The villa consists of a 406 m2 constructed area set on a large 1004 m2 plot. There is a large open-plan kitchen, spacious living/dining area, a total of 5 bedrooms (3 of which would have en-suite bathrooms), a large terrace and a cellar. The house also has a guest apartment with a bathroom. Additional features: swimming pool, sea view, garden, terrace, guest toilet, mountain view, double garage. Bendinat is a residential area of high prestige. It is located on the sought-after southwest coast of Mallorca, less than 12 km from the capital city Palma and its international airport. The village of Portals Nous, for everyday shopping and all amenities, is nearby as well as the famous Port of Puerto Portals. There are several international schools in the area as well as the popular Royal Bendinat Golf facility.

The 963 m2 modern style house is set on a 3327 m2 plot and is distributed over 3 levels. The ground-floor has a hall with a cloakroom, a guest toilet, the all equipped kitchen area with adjacent laundry room and pantry, storage room, wine cellar, and the spacious living/dining area opening onto the sunny porch and 72 m2 infinity pool. The house is accessed through the first floor, which has a vestibule where the staircase and lift are found. This level has the 5 bedrooms (3 regular double en-suites and 2 master suites) and a service lift, located at the end of the corridor. The basement has the lobby, a toilet, a gym, spa area, yoga room, storage room, technical room, multi-purpose room, and parking area. Other Features: Carport for 2 + 3 cars.

description: This one-of-a-kind penthouse, with one of the largest roof terraces in Illetas, is located on the 11th and 12th floor in a community with elevator and pool. The location of this property is very quiet and with absolute privacy. The 360° views gives you sea, city and mountain view that will take your breath away every time! This beautiful home was totally renovated during 2020 with only high quality materials and contemporary solutions which together with the tasteful choices of colors and materials creates a luxurious feel. The living area of 110 m2 is distributed over 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (one en-suite), hallway with custom built storage and a large open living room and kitchen with absolutely amazing views. All rooms have A/C and underfloor heating (by water), controlled by the Airzone app. The kitchen is equipped with Gaggenau and Miele and the bathrooms have natural stone, custom made wash basins in stone from Estile I Formes and taps and faucets from Iconico. Washing machine and dryer from Miele. All wardrobes, bathroom furniture and the two kitchens are from Estile I Formes. Other features are Sonos sound system, extra isolated walls, new windows with UV-protection, front door with smart lock, controlled from your smart phone, etc. The roof terrace is accessed from the internal staircase and offers breath-taking panoramic views and sunshine from morning until sunset. Furthermore it is equipped with pool, outdoor shower, electrical awnings and an outdoor kitchen in special wood and doors/bench top in stone and with dishwasher, bbq and fridge/ freezer. This a unique opportunity to acquire a spectacular penthouse with the all amenities, first class views and with some of the best beaches on the island just around the corner!

description: This stunning single-family home boasts panoramic views of the Bay of Palma. Located on a 2000 sqm plot, the property has a built area of 389 sqm, of which 309 sqm are living space. The property is distributed over a basement and two floors, in addition to terraces, porches, and a 60 sqm swimming pool with a solarium terrace and garden. In the basement, there is a garage for three vehicles, a storage room, a cellar, a kitchen, a machine room, and a staircase access hall. On the ground floor, there is an entrance hall, a spacious living-dining room with two fireplaces and access to a glazed terrace, two double bedrooms, and a bathroom. Outside, there is another porch, a swimming pool with terrace and garden, a laundry room, an oven, and a barbecue area. On the upper floor, there is a distributor, three double bedrooms, two bathrooms (one of them en-suite), and three terraces with access from each of the bedrooms. The property has excellent orientation and is built with high-quality materials. It has solar panels, propane heating, and ducted air conditioning. Located in the quiet urbanization of Son Caulelles, the property borders a protected natural area, which adds to its appeal. In addition, it is close to all kinds of services and amenities, less than 20 minutes from the center of Palma, 15 minutes from the airport, and 10 minutes from the Puntiró golf course. Contact us to schedule a visit and fall in love with this spectacular property!

The two-story property has 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, and ample storage space with 364 square meters of built area and a 45-meter pool. It is a perfect place to enjoy at any time of year, with access to water activities on the beach, the exclusive yacht area of Port Adriano and the Santa Ponça golf course, and just a few minutes away from the tennis courts where the only ATP tournament in Mallorca is held.

The master bedroom, which has an en suite bathroom and access to a private terrace, will allow you to enjoy an optimal rest. In addition, its large dimensions will allow you to organize all your belongings without worrying about space. In fact, you will have a large dressing room in the same room so you can have all your clothes well organized. The large outdoor space, which has garden areas, terraces with porch and a pool with chill out area, will encourage you to disconnect from household chores and enjoy nature. description: Spacious and bright apartment for sale in Plaça del Mercat  Located in the emblematic Plaza del Mercat and a step away from the elegant Paseo del Born. Ideal for strolling through the old part of Palma with the most important historical monuments such as the Cathedral, La Almudaina, surrounded by stores and stores, very close to the Paseo Marítimo, the port (Moll Vell) and to enjoy all the gastronomic and recreational offerings offered by the city center. This quiet apartment of 90 m² is on the second floor of a building with easy access, NO ELEVATOR, corner with 6 windows to the street, all exterior; Originally it was a house, now it has been used as an office. It is necessary to make the kitchen  Possibility to create a nice and elegant apartment as the ceilings are high and coffered, parquet floors and double glazing on the balconies. From the entrance you enter the spacious living room with two windows to the main street, communicates with a space that could be a bedroom or a kitchen, and to the left of the hall are two outdoor spaces with a bathroom, overlooking a quiet pedestrian street. It has split air conditioning in the living room.    The apartment needs renovation. Very quiet community of only 6 neighbors. Outside there is a spacious terrace perfect for relaxing, the new large saltwater swimming pool, a garden area and access down to the sea. description: This beautiful, bright apartment in Santa Catalina is located in the center of the city, in the picturesque district of the capital of the island - Palma de Mallorca.The completely renovated apartment has a constructed area of approx.85 m2 that are distributed as follows: a spacious living/dining room, a furnished and equipped kitchen, 2 beautiful bedrooms, as well as a bathroom with a shower.The living room has access to an interior patio.The equipment features of this bright apartment in Palma include: air conditioning, double-glazed windows and parquet floors.Santa Catalina is a beautiful neighborhood known for its international bars and restaurants, as well as the traditional market full of delicious local products.The apartment has a very good location, with good access to various shops, supermarkets and all the services one needs in daily life.It is just a few steps from the Paseo Marítimo, where you can walk, play sports and enjoy delicious meals in the restaurants located on the seafront.The international airport is only 10 minutes away by car.

description: Impressive townhouse for sale with sea views in El Terreno Newly built home for sale with private roof terrace in Palma Fabulous location in El Terreno and a thousand amenities This exceptional, recently completed semi-detached house in El Terreno, close to the "paseo marítimo" and various schools, offers easy access to the centre of Palma. Provided with private pool, garden, roof terrace and garage, the 188 sqm living area on three floors features a roof terrace with views over the port. The ground floor includes the garage with glass wall and access to the living area, a multipurpose room, utility room, cloackroom and access to the garden with the lovely pool area. Via the staircase or the lift, the first floor houses the large kitchen open to the dining room and the living room of about 50 sqm with gas fireplace; the large kitchen island, the wine fridge and Küpperbusch appliances will make the whole family enjoy the culinary space. Sliding glass doors lead to the 11 sqm covered terrace with views of the harbour and the sea. Indoors, there is also a cloackroom. The three bedrooms are located on the first floor; the master bedroom has a large en-suite bathroom and the other two doubles bedrooms share a large bathroom. The sunny roof terrace of some 30 sqm crowns the property with magnificent views to the sea and the surrounding area of El Terreno. There is also a small room and a storage room on this floor. The well-thought-out interior design concept has resulted in an airy and flowing space equipped with natural materials such as oak flooring on the upper floors and stone flooring on the ground floor, among other high quality fittings such as underfloor heating, air conditioning, double glazed windows, lift, garage and salt water swimming pool. Ready to move in, the so called townhouse will make the residential dream of the most discerning clients come true. Can you imagine living here? We look forward to your call!

description: For sale villa with 4 houses in first line of sea in Portitxol. You have before you a great opportunity to invest in a large house with 4 apartments. You can demolish the entire property to make a single house on the seafront or decide whether to reform the four apartments. In any case, its general characteristics are as follows: • First of Portitxol, Palma • 264 m2 divided into 4 apartments • 9 double bedrooms  • 5 bathrooms and 1 toilet • Terrace 35 m2 • Distance to the beach: 20 m • Condition: two of the properties are renovated and the other two are original. This large and imposing house located on the seafront in Portitxol, represents a unique investment opportunity. Its 264 m2 have been divided into 4 independent houses. Two of them are renovated, and the other 2 are in their original state. Therefore, it would be necessary to invest and decide whether to build a single house or keep the current distribution. The current regulations would allow in case of demolition to carry out a project of 2 heights of 125 square meters each plus solarium terrace, we have all the documentation, urban development certificates and an architect's report. The opportunity to live in an area that is booming, in front of the sea is a privilege. In addition, you will have multiple restaurants and other services a few meters from your home. Undoubtedly, one of the most demanded areas of Palma.  Can you imagine being able to start your days with a walk along the beach? Now it will be within your reach, and thanks to the good climate of Mallorca, you will enjoy these walks whenever you want, appreciating the different landscapes that the island offers in the different seasons. If you want to take advantage of this opportunity and invest in this unique seafront property in Portitxol, please contact us.

description: Renovated villa with pool in Badia Blava, Llucmajor. This villa with garden and pool located in Badia Blava, represents an incredible opportunity to live in a home nestled in the Mallorcan nature. The main features of this property are as follows: • Badia Blava, Llucmajor • 230 m2 living space • Plot 1.250 m2 • 5 double bedrooms • 3 bathrooms and 1 toilet • Parking (2) • Swimming pool • Distance to the beach: 200 m • Condition: renovated • Extras: air conditioning, fireplace, fitted closets, video intercom, double glazed windows outside  Located in the well-known village of Llucmajor and with very good connection to the freeway, this villa will contribute to your daily well-being. With a total of 230 m2 of usable interior, this villa consists of two floors.  When you enter through the door of your new home, a living-dining room will be the first thing you see. In fact, this house has a total of 3 living rooms. Each one is designed for certain moments, the first one you will see, is the main one and has a fireplace and direct access to a garden area. The rest of the living rooms, a little smaller, can be used as a cinema room, reading room or games room with your guests, for example. As you advance the images and especially when you see it in person, you will feel this great luminosity that is possible thanks to the multiple windows and open spaces of the house. The kitchen, fully equipped and with plenty of storage space has an auxiliary laundry room. And also an enclosed porch attached, thanks to its large windows you can enjoy panoramic views of the pond and part of the garden. On this first floor, you will also find the master bedroom with en suite bathroom, and 3 more bedrooms, also with bathroom with shower. Undoubtedly, one of the most beautiful details of this ground floor is its idyllic Andalusian style patio which can be accessed from all rooms.  Through a spiral staircase you will access the upper floor. This is where the last room is located, which is currently used as an office. Depending on your needs you can adapt this space again. This room has direct access to the roof terrace, which enjoys sea views. The detail of this floor you will find in its watchtower. A place from which you will access by external stairs and you can have a wide panoramic view of the rest of the city. Thanks to its different terraces, garden areas and swimming pool, this house represents an ideal opportunity to live in a quiet house with all possible details. A home that you can enjoy all year round thanks to the extraordinary climate of Mallorca.  If you want this renovated villa with pool in Badia Blava to become your new home, call 971888018 or fill out the contact form.

The spacious and airy living room seamlessly flows into a modern kitchen, creating a perfect space for entertaining and enjoying the company of friends and family. The high-quality finishes and attention to detail are evident throughout, from the sleek kitchen to the beautiful herringbone floors. With 78 m2 of thoughtfully designed interior space, this 2-bedroom (one double and one single) and 1-bathroom penthouse provides the perfect blend of comfort and style. The exposed ceiling beams add character and warmth to the space, while the large windows flood the living area with natural light, creating a welcoming and inviting ambiance. Located in the heart of Plaza Cort, this penthouse is perfectly situated near Palma's historical landmarks, boutique shops, and renowned dining establishments.
