suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de l'Olivera

description: Family house for sale to renovate in Andratx  Located in the upper part of the village, in an idyllic enclave worthy of a postcard of a typical village of the Majorcan mountain range, this property is distributed in five bedrooms and two bathrooms. Its rooms are very spacious and luminous, highlighting the incredible views from its upper terrace both to the village and to the mountain where you can admire the charm of this traditional village and the tranquillity of being in the middle of nature. The property is in a state to be completely reformed and is ideal to create the perfect home to the taste of its next owner as well as being a great investment opportunity. It is located in a very central street but at the same time very quiet, as it is only accessible on foot to the front door. Surrounded by all amenities within walking distance and only a ten minute drive to Puerto de Andratx, this property is ideal for lovers of tranquillity where you can enjoy the warm charm of life in the mountains. Can you imagine living here? We look forward to your call!  .
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Andratx Pueblo, Andratx
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle del Nord

address: Calle de Josep Maria Palau I Camps
description: Modern apartment in Portixol near the beach Charming flat in the best area of Portixol: beach, marina, restaurants and cafés, supermarket, sport centre and bus stop only a few metres away, the possibility to reach the centre of Palma on foot in 20 minutes. This modern flat with two bedrooms and 71 sqm, bright and comfortable, has an ideal distribution. The living-dining room is open plan and the kitchen is fully equipped with high quality appliances. In the sleeping area there is a large double bedroom and a good sized single bedroom. The bathroom has a double wash basin and shower. In the entrance hallway we have fitted wardrobes, the washing machine cupboard and a large pantry. The property has underfloor heating and air conditioning in all rooms. The building built in 2018 has a lift and has functional and decorative design elements such as the minimalist glass and wood entrance and the large metal shutters. A spacious garage space and a storage room are included in the sale price. Can you imagine living just a few steps away from the sea, in the sought after Portixol, in a newly built flat? Excellent investment opportunity!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Portixol-Molinar, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Josep Maria Palau i Camps

description: Family residence with swimming pool for sale in Costa d'en Blanes   This impressive property of 469 sqm built on a plot of 1.000 sqm located at the top of Costa d'en Blanes is built on two floors and has placid TERRACES of approx. 110 m² that surround the whole house, offering spectacular views from every corner of the property. The property is surrounded by a large terrace with spectacular views from every corner of the property, inviting you to enjoy life, enjoy dreamlike sunsets and lose yourself in the turquoise colours of the MEDITERRANEAN SEA that bathes the coast of this acclaimed town and the mountains of the Serra de Tramontana, a World Heritage Site (UNESCO, 2011). Climbing up a handcrafted stone staircase you reach the entrance to the main floor where the high-ceilinged foyer welcomes you. Continuing along the staircase you reach the living-dining room crowned by a large FIREPLACE and with access to one of the enclosed terraces, the same one that frames the views, which are simply unbeatable. Inside, and in this order, there is a gallery with an INTERNAL BARBECUE, the kitchen, a well-equipped hallway with wall-to-wall fitted wardrobes and the two double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and direct access to the terrace. Going outside and up the stairs to the upper deck there is a tower that offers a retreat and a place to escape from the daily grind. Retracing our steps, on a lower floor and with independent entrance there are two flats, each with its own kitchen, three double bedrooms and three bathrooms, living room and dining room with direct access to the POOL, well accompanied by an OUTDOOR BARBECUE area and surrounded by GARDENS with different flowers, palm trees, centenary pines and aromatic plants that perfume the summer air. The property is equipped with air conditioning splits in all the rooms, as well as heating by gasoil radiators. There is also a parking area of approx. 40 sqm, which can be accessed from the other street surrounding the property. Can you imagine living here, we are waiting for your call!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Costa d'En Blanes, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de Sant Rafel

description: House for sale with pool in Son Dureta are In the exclusive area around Son Dureta, just ten minutes from the centre, this stupendous villa of 585 sqm on three floors with garden and swimming pool is surrounded by a large green area that practically merges with the forest of the Bellver Castle. The ground floor houses the entrance hall, guest toilet, independent kitchen of 40 sqm with island, dining room and separate ironing room, as well as the very spacious living room with wood-burning fireplace that opens onto the main terrace and the swimming pool. On the first floor there are four large bedrooms, one of which is en suite with dressing room and bathroom with shower, and two other bathrooms with shower and bathtub. Two of the bedrooms and the terrace on this floor have views of both the Bellver castle and the cathedral.   On the lower floor there is a garage for four large cars, a toilet with two shower trays and a space ideal as a service area, office or gymnasium. The property enjoys a very special natural light in all its corners; with marble floors, ample spaces and everything in perfect condition, it is essential that you request a visit to verify the excellence of this offer. Can you imagine living here, we are waiting for your call!  .
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Dureta, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de les Filipines

description: Villa with garden and swimming pool for sale in Santa Ponsa  This beautiful villa in the exclusive residential area of Santa Ponça only a few metres from the sea and the yacht club of 272 sqm built on one floor on a plot of 1.224 sqm has a fantastic swimming pool with terrace, shower and solarium, as well as a fully equipped barbecue area with electrical appliances, wood oven, barbecue and toilet with shower. The beautiful garden is very well kept, with a great variety of trees, plants, flowers, a nice water fountain and a private orchard with lemon tree, apricot tree and grapevine. The property as a whole is very bright and consists of four bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, two of which have en suite bathrooms and access to the terrace. Entering the house there is a spacious entrance hall, dining room and living room with fireplace and large windows with views and access to the terrace with porch and the spectacular garden, the independent kitchen with pantry and large windows overlooking the garden and laundry room with access to a large and sunny back terrace. There are a total of three bathrooms all with bathtub, plus a toilet with shower in the porch. The interior of the house is in perfect condition and the carpentry is impeccable. The pool, garden and barbecue area is ideal to enjoy with friends and family all year round. The equipment includes reversible air conditioning and oil heating with radiators. The access to the covered parking is very wide and from there you can access to a large storage room and directly to the property, which has all the documentation and registers, certificate of habitability and energy efficiency certificate. Can you imagine living here? We look forward to your call!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Gran Via del Port

description: Villa for sale, with pool, in idyllic place, close to college area In a quiet area, very close to private hospitals, supermarkets and schools and with very good access to the road network, this villa on a 2,500 sqm plot is characterized by its SPACIOUS AND BRIGHT SPACES that offer splendid distribution possibilities in its approx. 140 sqm living area, perfectly distributed on one floor. It consists of a spacious living room with a fireplace and access to the 50 sqm pool, a large independent kitchen with access to the patio, four bedrooms (three doubles and one single) and two bathrooms, one of them with a bathtub. This distribution is especially useful for those who like to enjoy daily life on one floor, without the restrictions that the size of the rooms may imply. The space in the attic adds living area, with electrical and heating installation, which could be ideally used for the youngest members of the family, for guests or as an office or study. Entering the grounds, there are three covered parking spaces and a garage for two cars, as well as an annex with barbecue, dining room and toilet. Next to the main house there is an orchard with fruit trees plus a tool and woodshed. The equipment includes a well and a water tank, lowering the costs of watering and filling the pool; the heating is with propane gas radiators and there is also air conditioning in the living room; The distributor and the carpentry is made of wood and the floors are made in marble and natural parquet. The residence outstands by its location in an idyllic, quiet and intimate place while being well connected to all the services and infrastructures of the city. Woul you like to pay a visit?
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Establiments - Son Sardina, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Camino del Redol

district: Es Forti - Son Cotoner - Son Dameto
description: Furnished penthouse for sale in Palma centre Nice penthouse with a spacious terrace in a building constructed in 2020 only a few minutes away from Paseo Mallorca.     The property is located in the neighbourhood of Es Camp d'en Serralta, 5 minutes walking distance to Paseo Mallorca and Santa Catalina, in a newly built building (2020).    It is distributed in two floors connected by an interior staircase (both floors have their independent entrance with their respective lift stop). On the upper floor we have an enclosed area of approx. 47sqm, consisting of living-dining room with open plan, fully fitted kitchen and an uncovered terrace of 29 sqm with a large electric awning.    The lower floor has a size of approx. 78sqm and has three bedrooms and two bathrooms, one of them en suite.    The property is sold furnished and a parking space is included in the price, which is only a few metres away from the building.   Don't miss this opportunity to live in a penthouse with style and character!   Can you imagine living here?
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Camp d'En Serralta , Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Lope de Vega

description: House for sale with gardens and pool in Cas Català  Distributed over three floors and with a constructed area of 195 sqm, this property offers a communal swimming pool and beautiful gardens in a very quiet area and within walking distance to all amenities. Through the main door and to the left is the fully fitted kitchen with pantry, followed by the laundry room; to the right is the dining room and, down the stairs, the living room from which there is access to a glazed terrace and outdoor patio, the ideal setting for peaceful dinners and family gatherings. Up one level is a double bedroom with good sized en-suite bathroom and balcony with views. On the next floor there are two further bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and a small separate dressing room. Finally, on the top floor is the loft with toilet and incredible sea views, which can easily become the best bedroom in the house as it has direct access to the terrace of about 12 sqm where the stars make a special frame at the time of rest. The equipment includes air conditioning and natural gas radiators, as well as double glazed windows for greater insulation, plus an exclusive garden area on the way to the communal area with a well-kept swimming pool and well-tended green areas. Cas Català enjoys an excellent location between international schools and the centre of Palma just 10 minutes away, it is surrounded by services at street level and beautiful Mediterranean coves, making this an ideal location to enjoy all year round. Can you imagine living here? We look forward to your call!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cas Catala, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Semi-detached house in Calle Bell Puig

description: Flat for sale with large terrace in Avenidas High quality modern construction in the heart of Palma de Mallorca in Las Avenidas, next to El Corte Inglés. This is a spacious and modern flat of 217sqm which has undergone a complete refurbishment and transformation. It has a large private terrace and a small balcony, is brand new and has high quality finishes.   The property located on a seventh floor has three bedrooms, which can be two bedrooms and an office, three complete bathrooms with Binisalem stone, two of them en suite. Furthermore, there are built-in wardrobes with sensory LED lighting throughout the flat, including in the entrance hall, open plan kitchen with island and laundry room. Parking available to buy or rent separately. Airport 10 minutes by car and 10 minutes by bus. Cathedral 15 minutes walking distance. Playa de Palma at 15 minutes walking distance. Can you imagine living here, we are waiting for your call!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Marqués de la Fontsanta, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida d'Alexandre Rosselló

description: Apartment with potential for refurbishment for sale in Santa Catalina  This convenient apartment is located on the first floor of a well maintained corner building in a great location. In four minutes walking distance you can enjoy a stroll along the seafront promenade and in only two minutes you reach the charming old town of Palma. The property, which has a lift and access adapted for people with reduced mobility, has four floors with four flats each, except for the top floor, which has only three. As soon as one enters the property, the entrance hall leads to the kitchen and a bright living/dining room with a corner entrance. From the living room there is access to a terrace of about 3 sqm where there is room for a small table and a chair. At the back of the kitchen there is another semi-enclosed outdoor space of approx. 6 sqm. To the left of the hall there is a single bedroom and a complete bathroom with a small bathtub and, to the right, the night area which has two double bedrooms, both with built-in wardrobes, sharing a bathroom with a bathtub. The equipment includes air conditioning and heating by means of recently installed splits, and the kitchen works with gas. The flat is ready to move into, although it could do with some updating. The facade of the property will be painted soon: this has already been paid for by the community. Can you imagine living here? We look forward to your call!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Caro

description: Duplex penthouse for sale with parking in a traditional old town building with lift  In the heart of the old town, between Sant Nicolau Street, Paseo del Borne and Las Ramblas, a few meters from Jaime III Avenue and neighbouring many of the most emblematic and relevant historical buildings of the city (Casal Solleric, Teatre Principal, Gran Hotel, etc. ), this duplex penthouse also enjoys proximity to the main luxury shopping streets and with a wide range of leisure and gastronomy in Palma. On the third floor of the typically Majorcan building with a lift and a large wooden portal, patio and staircase, the bright duplex-penthouse boasts high ceilings and exposed beams throughout its 226 sqm divided into two floors. The lower floor has, in its nearly 126 sqm, a large dining room and typical kitchen that preserves all the original details, a charming attic-style room and two bedrooms with a full bathroom and a sitting room; All rooms have large windows and a balcony, receiving lots of natural light. The upper floor of approx. 57 sqm, includes a large living room with fireplace and access to a 43 sqm terrace with barbecue and spectacular views of the church of Sant Nicolau and the old town, as well as a further bedroom with a spacious en-suite bathroom with shower. In addition to the high ceilings and exposed beams, the equipment includes parquet floors, interior carpentry with large noble wood portals and city gas heating, together with parking of approx. 25 sqm each and a large storage room of 10 sqm in the common areas. The building has been rehabilitated preserving the charm of the typical constructions of the historic center of the city which, added to its central location, making this property a unique opportunity to live in a privileged environment in the picturesque old town of Palma. Can you imagine living here? We look forward to your call!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Nicolau, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de Can Danús

district: Son Oliva - Plaza Toros - Camp Redó
description: Aparment for sale with swimming pool in Pere Garau (Palma de Mallorca) Townhouse of 390 sqm constructed, 200 sqm usable for sale in L'Olivera- Amanecer area. The property is located on the first floor with independent access. From the street it is distributed in four large bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and two bathrooms. The living-dining room with chimney leads to a big terrace to the street. Large eat-in kitchen with access to a large terrace. On the second floor there is a large solarium and barbecue with unobstructed views, you can see all the Tramuntana mountains, possibility to close it all and build another floor or another floor. On the ground floor there is a commercial premise (at the moment there is a bar in operation), it is sold with or without tenant. On the same floor there is an indoor swimming pool and a space to make a spa or gym area.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: L'Olivera - Amanecer, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle dels Donants de Sang

description: Flat for sale to refurbish in the old quarter This magnificent 250sqm flat is located in the very centre of Palma, just a stone's throw away from the Rambla, one of the most emblematic places of the city. It is on the first floor of a very well maintained stately style building with only one flat per floor and a separate staircase with very easy access. It is a blank canvas to merge the charm of the typical island construction with the functionality of a modern update. Large spaces and two large living rooms with balconies overlooking the street that exude charm and natural light are followed by eight multi-purpose rooms, a kitchen, a pantry, a bathroom, a storage room on the ground floor of the building for private use and a staircase with direct access to the inner courtyard: an oasis in the middle of the city. It is possible to convert the property into a spacious and bright flat with high ceilings and preserving all its old character with large windows, beautiful hydraulic tiles or into two flats with two bedrooms and two bathrooms each. The characteristic building in which the property is located is located in the very centre of Palma and has a magnificent offer of restaurants, small shops and cafés with cosy terraces that invite the stroller to take a break while admiring the historical monuments around it, such as the church of San Miguel, amongst many others. Highly valued and sought after due to its privileged location, the purchase of the property is an ideal opportunity for both investors and residents looking for day-to-day comfort. If what you are looking for is a unique and peculiar property, with many possibilities of personalisation to your taste, spacious, luminous, with special and characteristic details of Mallorcan mansions in a privileged enclave with all the services and tranquillity at night, that exudes personality, comfort and tranquillity, this is your opportunity. Can you imagine living here? Can you imagine living here, we are waiting for your call!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Missio - Mercat, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle dels Horts

description: Refurbished penthouse with sea views for sale in Cas Català Fantastic recently refurbished penthouse in Cas Català! From the main door to the right, two complete bathrooms; a corridor leads to the master bedroom with built-in wardrobes and sea views; the second bedroom with views to the communal area follows on the left handside. Next, the open plan kitchen is fully equipped, and the living-dining room is completed with a fireplace, preamble ofthe jewel of the house which is the glazed terrace to enjoy breathtaking views of the sea. With parking included and a communal swimming pool, the property has services such as restaurants, pharmacies and international schools in the surroundings, without renouncing the characteristic tranquillity of the area, with green spaces to disconnect from the daily din at any time of the year. Can you imagine living here? We look forward to your call.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cas Catala, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle Bell Puig

description: Apartment for sale in stately building in Jaime III It is located in the very centre of the city of Palma, in the upper part of the Avenida de Jaime III and close to the Paseo del Borne, Paseo Marítimo, La Catedral, La Almudaina, Es Baluard and other emblematic monuments. This magnificent property is located in a stately building of the famous architect Gabriel Alomar, on a 3rd floor with lift, with its 85 sqm, this beautiful and luminous design apartment completely refurbished with taste and quality elements consists of entrance hall giving access to the living-dining room with exit to a quiet and enjoyable terrace facing the midday sun. The kitchen is panelled and integrated to the living-dining room giving a lot of amplitude to this pleasant space, the night area with two double bedrooms and a bathroom, and a third single bedroom or service room with access to the laundry room. The equipment includes parquet floors, white lacquered interior carpentry, aluminium exterior carpentry with double glazing, underfloor heating, reversible air conditioning by heat pump and top of the range Siemens electrical appliances.   Ideal as a pied à terre to live in one of the most iconic streets in the city centre.   Can you imagine living here?
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Jaume, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida de Jaume Iii

description: Apartment for sale with views to the port of Palma With frontal views to the harbour from the living room and the kitchen, the property is in a very well-kept condition, but requires some updating. Originally two independent units, after its unification it offers a large space of 157 sqm with four bedrooms and two bathrooms: the last bedroom is a triple room with bathroom en suite. All bathrooms have been refurbished, as has the kitchen -although offered without appliances- which also has access to the terrace; so does the spacious living/dining room. The equipment includes marble and parquet floors, white lacquered doors, reversible air-conditioning, PVC windows and built-in wardrobes in all bedrooms. Can you imagine living here? We look forward to your call!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Paseo Marítimo, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Llinàs

description: Loft for sale in Palma This is a 307sqm loft located in an exclusive area in Palma due to its proximity to the centre, good connection to public transport and large shopping centre, close to the Bellver forest where one can go for long walks with pets, sports or just a stroll through the beautiful city. It is an urban loft, with a part of the facade completely glazed and that makes it so warm and bright. The finishes are made with high quality materials and very tasteful. The kitchen is fully equipped and there are two bathrooms. There is the option to buy or rent a parking space in the same building. Can you imagine living here?
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Terreno, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Studio apartment in Avenida de Joan Miró

description: Villa by the sea for sale in Son Verí Nou Nice villa with all kinds of amenities just a few minutes from the sea and with views of the whole bay of Palma. Very sunny, with a swimming pool and a garden with trees, the south-facing villa on three floors has three entrances: two independent ones and the access to the urbanization, which boasts beautiful gardens and several swimming pools. In approx. 500 m² living area, the villa has a living room with access to the pool and the garden with trees, a kitchen equipped with new appliances and a large pantry, a double bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, fitted wardrobes and a toilet on the ground floor. On the first floor, there are five bedrooms with their en-suite bathrooms –the main one features two dressing rooms–, a living room and a library with a beautiful ceiling with wooden beams and wonderful views. The upper floor allocates the solarium with spectacular panoramic views. On the lower floor there are two more bedrooms with two bathrooms, a storage room and a garage for four cars. The equipment features armored doors in each of the rooms, electric shutters, individual & reversible air conditioning, gas-electric boiler, stoneware floors and Climalit windows. The property is a few steps away from the sea and the beautiful sandy beaches of Son Verí Nou, 8 minutes from the airport and 20 minutes to Palma.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Verí, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Rambla

address: Calle del Marquès de la Sènia
description: Spacious apartment for sale with terraces and sea views in Son Armadams On the sixth floor of an impeccable stately building with two lifts, this spacious and bright domicile, thanks to its privileged location, is only two-minutes walking distance from the promenade, the Palma Tennis Club, and the excellent international gastronomic and leisure offer of the popular neighbourhood of Santa Catalina. Son Armadams also offers all kinds of shops and services within easy reach. This magnificent property has 202 sqm living space plus 40 sqm of terraces. To make life easier, it has a parking space in the garage in the same building. From the entrance to the apartment, on the right hand side, there is an imposing living room of 55 sqm with access to one of the terraces. Next to this space, a room which is currently used as a study, also has direct access to the terrace. To the left of the entrance, there is a fully equipped kitchen with an adjoining pantry, a laundry room and a cloackroom. The heart of the property is a hallway with two double bedrooms to the right –both with partial sea views to the sea– which share a full bathroom located directly opposite. At the back and to the right is a secondary living room, and to the left, the master bedroom with en-suite bathroom. Both spaces have south-facing terraces with sea views. Air and natural light in all spaces, parking and a strategic location! Can you imagine living here, we are waiting for your call!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Paseo Marítimo, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle del Marquès de la Sènia

description: Apartment in a prestigious area of the old town of Palma     In the best area of the old town of Palma, at the beginning of the Passeig des Born, one minute walk to the "paseo marítimo" and opposite of the most emblematic buildings of the city such as the Almudaina, the cathedral and the Palau March, with all the comforts that living in the historic centre of Palma has to offer, surrounded by all kinds of commerce and services, luxury shops, restaurants and bars, and very well connected to all types of public transport, the property is located on the third floor of a building without lift and currently under construction, as the façade has been refurbished and structural work has been carried out on the whole building, which has only four units.   The apaprtment in particular, which faces two streets, could do with an update to make the most of its 100 sqm. The entrance hall clearly divides day & night quarters, to the left of the entrance hall leading to the separate kitchen and the living/dining room with two large windows and access to a small balcony with views of the Almudaina. A corridor leads to the sleeping quarters consisting of a single bedroom, a small interior patio currently used as a storeroom or laundry room, two double bedrooms facing the street, all with built-in wardrobes, and a bathroom with bathtub. The fittings include parquet floors and high ceilings with exposed beams.   Ideal for those who wish to enjoy the city where the history and the contemporary Palma vibrate at the same time in a location as distinguished as it is privileged.   Can you imagine living here? We look forward to your call!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Llotja, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida d'Antoni Maura

description: Ground floor flat for sale in first line in Santa Ponsa We are located in the area of the small beach of Santa Ponsa and in one of the buildings from the 70's in first line.   On the ground floor there is a property of about 140 sqm with a garden of 60 sqm and a community pool and of course with a very good position overlooking the sea with a lot of light and with a special magic.   This property consists of living-dining room, kitchen, three bedrooms and two bathrooms, all renovated this year. The refurbishment has been done with the highest qualities and changing all the installations and taking care of the details and trying to create a very interesting product for the property, for this reason very natural materials have been used such as oak wood with which the walls and doors have been covered in such a way that the doors are hidden. The bedheads have also been made with a very similar criterion.    Materials such as bush-hammered Binissalem stone for the floors and bathroom walls, wood and black Climalit aluminium windows and doors with special bearings have been used.   The Italian design kitchen, with bush-hammered Binissalem worktop, the utility room with the same furniture as the kitchen and the lighting by Santa&cole.   Furnishing in line with Italian design.   In short, a very careful concept of interior design.     A property ready to enjoy and live in. Can you imagine living here?  .
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Via de la Creu

description: Building for sale in the centre of Palma In one of the streets with the best access to commercial areas close to San Miguel and Plaza de España, we find a rationalist building with a ground floor and two storeys. On the ground floor there is a room which is currently used as an art gallery and which has many possibilities for the future as it has arches and mezzanines which make it attractive, as well as three rooms, a toilet and a laundry room. This local has a lot of possibilities as it can be used for many activities.   On the other hand, we find the main entrance by accessing the building through a wrought iron and glass door which has a hall with marble paving and is distributed as follows:   First floor: A large hall with staircase, living room with fireplace, dining room, double bedroom with en-suite bathroom and living room. Kitchen, toilet and large patios.   First floor: Hall with fireplace, four bedrooms with bathrooms en suite, plus an upper roof terrace.   The interior of the house has 40 x 40 floors of hydraulic veined in green and amber tones in the form of a checkerboard. All the carpentry is modernist.   The house is very exterior so it is flooded with light.   Possibility to go up one more floor and also to build a swimming pool. It is a house which could have a lot of charm!   Possibility of parking for several cars.  .
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Missio - Mercat, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: House in Calle de Cecili Metel

description: This unique and beautiful apartment on the 6th floor with three terraces (total of 19,5 m2) is located in the quiet, residential part of Son Armadams, overlooking Palma Sport & Tennis Club as well as the Palma bay. Within a short stroll you reach the sea front promenade, the food market in Santa Catalina, many restaurants, bars and bakeries. The apartment was totally renovated 2016/2017 in modern & high standard including underfloor heating in all rooms. The living area of approx. 156 m2 has 3 bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms, an open plan kitchen and living room and a guest toilet. Two of the bedrooms, the kitchen and living room have access to a terrace and one of the bedrooms have views over the sea and the tennis Club. Parking for two cars in garage reachable by elevator included.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Armadams, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Bernareggi

description: This soulful and bright penthouse in classic style is located on a quiet street in Son Armadans, a few minutes walk to Paseo Maritimo, Santa Catalina and the Palma Sports & Tennis Club. The apartment has a living area of 79 m2 and offers 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (1 en-suite) and has been carefully modernized and updated over time with new sanded and oiled oak parquet floors, new electricity connections and functions as a modern kitchen, air conditioning w/c, as well as central heating. The terrace of 19,5 m2, with partial views over the Cathedral and Palma harbour, offers space for both relaxing and dining.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Armadams, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle Magalhaes

description: Ladies and gentlemen we have the pleasure to present to you a detached villa with private garden 4 bedrooms 2 bathrooms large living room and open kitchen, in El Toro Calvià and extension project filed and approved to raise the house another floor, make the swimming pool with parking spaces Now the villa has a large front garden that runs all around the house and offers a lot of privacy even in the back part of the house, with trees to enjoy a pleasant and fantastic shade in summer. All the window views offer privacy with silence and tranquillity is at home here and throughout the neighbourhood. Upon entering, one immediately appreciates the windows and doors that provide plenty of light throughout the property. One enters directly into a large room that includes the living room with sofa and fireplace and a large room with dining table that opens up to the open but separate kitchen with good space and a peninsula. This large room connects with a second TV room with a slightly higher opening, giving movement and making this house unique. The two rooms are open but also connected by a fantastic cushion for sitting on the step, to have a spot to share with friends. One bathroom is complete while the other has a shower, both with a window and plenty of light. The parquet corridor that connects the living area with the rooms has natural lighting with a glass opening on the roof as well, which makes this single villa very bright for all the rooms as well. The entire villa has parquet flooring, the house has an  A/C system with A+ energy consumption. If you are looking for tranquillity, privacy, a garden of your own close to the beach with the harbour just a few steps away, this house is here waiting for you. The dream can become reality to live on the most beautiful island in the world Leave your whatsapp contact to be contacted as soon as possible and don't miss this property Agent Dr. Matteo Belotti King Mallorca Real Estate.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Toro, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: This completely renovated luxury apartment was finished in 2020. Only high-quality materials were used, such as a dark herringbone parquet floor, underfloor heating, lighting from top brands such as Tobias Grau, FLOS, Ingo Maurer and an exclusive range of switches from Berker. The living room is spacious and flooded with light. Here are the dining and living areas, as well as a fireplace corner. From here you can access one of the terraces with unbeatable views of the Bay of Palma, the Bellver Castle and the Cathedral. It is the perfect place to enjoy the wonderful views of Palma and the port during a dinner with friends. The luxury kitchen is equipped with brand name appliances, a SMEG gas cooktop and granite worktops. The spacious bathrooms are of high quality and elegantly designed, for example with Axor taps in brushed nickel. The bedrooms have access to the second terrace, which also has sea views. All built-in wardrobes are made to measure and offer enough space for your wardrobe. The apartment includes an additional storage room and 2 parking spaces in the underground garage, which is accessed by elevator. The large community garden and the saltwater pool with views of the Bellver Castle and its park will enchant you. Ask us for more information (we have plans) or make an appointment to see it. We do not assume any responsibility for the information mentioned in this exhibition. Kensington reference: KPP06867.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Bonanova - Porto Pi, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Apartment with terrace for sale in Son Armadans area Second hand flat with large terrace for sale in Son Armadans area, very close to the promenade, steps away from the tennis club and only five minutes away from the ring road.   Very functional distribution, large living/dining room with access to a terrace of about 9 sqm facing Andrea Doria, four double bedrooms of about 12 sqm each one, large kitchen/dining room with laundry room with exterior window. Two bathrooms and parking in the building.   Can you imagine living here? , we are waiting for your call!    .
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Armadams, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle d'Andrea Doria

description: King Mallorca Real Estate presents you a beautiful flat completely renovated in 2022 with excellent quality, located on the fifth floor with lift in a quiet building in the sought after area of Son Armadans and Santa Catalina, a strategic location within walking distance of the Paseo Maritimo. This flat receives a lot of light and allows you to live surrounded by tranquillity at night and silence during the day.  Upon entering, one immediately notices the elegant and refined ambience that the owner has created with style and harmony in all the rooms. The flat offers privacy and silence in comfortable, separate, soundproofed and very large rooms. The flat welcomes us with a comfortable entrance hall that leads to a large living room with a balcony with an unobstructed view of the city and, on the other side, to two double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a full bathroom. On the other side of the entrance, through an elegant corridor, we find another complete bathroom and two rooms that can be two bedrooms or comfortable studies. At the end of the corridor we come to a large and spacious fully furnished and equipped modern kitchen.  The flat has excellent qualities, a beautiful parquet floor, PVC double-glazed windows, a kitchen with high quality white lacquered furniture and built-in appliances, integrated air conditioning throughout the flat (h/c) and electric heaters. Each floor of the building has only two flats and the community is very quiet. The property is in excellent condition inside and out. All electrical and plumbing installations are practically new. The condominium expenses are 100 euro per month, including water supply, and the IBI is about 350 euro per year. If you are looking for tranquillity with comfort and quality in the city of Palma, this flat is for you! Don't forget to indicate your whatsapp contact for easy contact. Agent KING MALLORCA Real Estate Dr. Matteo Belotti.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This beautiful first line apartment situated overlooking the main beach in Illetas enjoys an incredible terrace with spectacular sea view. Upon entering the apartment, you are greeted by the amazing sea view and a spacious open layout of the kitchen and living room. Sliding doors open to the south facing terrace where you can enjoy the sun all year round. The apartment consists of a living area of 77 m2 distributed over 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms with underfloor heating (1 en-suite), fully-equipped open plan kitchen and living room with access to the terrace of approx. 15m2. There is direct access from the community to the beach, perfect for daily swimming and/or enjoying a morning coffee. The location is ideal with restaurants within short walking distance and is a short drive to Palma city centre. Features of the property include ducted h/c air conditioning, excellent wardrobes for storage, sun blinds for the terrace and a private parking space.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Illetes, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Paseo Illetes

description: Bright and airy apartment on the top floor which is level 3 in a property built year 2000. Here there is a balcony of 1,5 m2 facing east with space for two people to enjoy the morning coffee in the sun. Furthermore, there is a balcony of 4,5 m2 facing west where the afternoon and evening sun can be enjoyed with an open view towards the Tennis Club. The stairwell is bright and modern with both the width and height of the steps very normal and there are two apartments on each floor. You enter the home via a small hallway. From here you have the work kitchen to the right with access to the balcony with evening sun.  This balcony is currently used as a laundry room, but can easily be converted into a regular open balcony. To the left of the hallway is the airy living room with dining area. This room has access to the smaller balcony with morning sun. Straight ahead from the hallway is the guest toilet and bathroom, one after the other to the right, followed by a bedroom with spacious wardrobes and room for a double bed. Opposite are the other two bedrooms, one of which has room for a double bed and the other is slightly smaller and currently used as a guest room/office. The bedroom section has air conditioning. It is possible to buy a storage room in the neighboring property where there is space to park bicycles, golf bags, electric scooters etc. The entire home is in good condition and you can move in immediately.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: This one-of-a-kind penthouse duplex with private roof terrace, sea and panoramic views and pool is located in Cas Catala. A short walk to the Buganvilla beach, Cala Nova marina, beach clubs and restaurants and only 10 min by car to the city center. The spacious and bright living area of 171 m2 is divided in 2 levels and the lower level has 3 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, all with built in wardrobes and sea view. On the upper floor is the commodious living room with and a modern custom -made kitchen with modern appliances. A guest toilet and an airy laundry room that easily can be transformed into a fourth bedroom, office or gym. From the living room you can take the internal staircase or the elevator to the 64 m2 roof terrace. From here you can enjoy the unobstructed view overlooking the Palma Bay. Lounge and dining area as well as the outdoor kitchen is equipped with fridge and a bbq and from the 13m2 pool you can enjoy the stunning sea view. Furthermore there is underfloor heating, integrated air conditioning, garage with space for one car, out door guest parking space and a storage room. The elevator connect all levels from the garage.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cas Catala, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Duplex in Calle s´olivera

description: This beautiful, newly renovated duplex apartment with two terraces, private garden and patio is located in popular residential area Cas Catala within a short stroll from the beach and sea. The bright living area of 111 m2 has a total of 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. Before entering this lovely property there is a private patio/terrace of 22 m2, on the front side of the house. The first floor holds the entrance, 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, open plan modern kitchen and living room with access to a terrace of 19 m2 with partial sea view. The lower level has 2 bedrooms, both with en-suite bathrooms. One of the bedrooms has access to a terrace and the two terraces are connected by an exterior staircase. The lush garden of 34 m2 has access from the lower terrace and from here there is a small path which leads to the communal pool area. One parking space for a small car in garage is included. There is a storage space on the terrace on the lower level.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cas Catala, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Duplex in Calle falcó

description: This one-of-a-kind penthouse duplex with private roof terrace, sea and panoramic views and pool is located in Cas Catala. A short walk to the Buganvilla beach, Cala Nova marina, beach clubs and restaurants and only 10 min by car to the city center. The spacious and bright living area of 171 m2 is divided in 2 levels and the lower level has 3 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, all with built in wardrobes and sea view. On the upper floor is the commodious living room with and a modern custom -made kitchen with modern appliances. A guest toilet and an airy laundry room that easily can be transformed into a fourth bedroom, office or gym. From the living room you can take the internal staircase or the elevator to the 64 m2 roof terrace. From here you can enjoy the unobstructed view overlooking the Palma Bay. Lounge and dining area as well as the outdoor kitchen is equipped with fridge and a bbq and from the 13m2 pool you can enjoy the stunning sea view. Furthermore there is underfloor heating, integrated air conditioning, garage with space for one car, out door guest parking space and a storage room. The elevator connect all levels from the garage.

description: A combination of modern elements in connection with timeless elegance connects this south facing newly built villa on the Costa den Blanes. You can reach this property in a quiet residential area either through the underground car park or through an impressive external access. Already from the pool level you have a fantastic panoramic sea view up to the harbour of Portals Nous. The very luxurious living concept offers on the ground floor with an imposing entrance area a very generous living and dining level with open kitchen and direct access to the partly covered as well as open terraces with sea view. There is also a fully equipped outdoor kitchen with a cosy lounge area where you can spoil yourself and your guests. Altogether this light-flooded villa has 4 bedrooms with 3 bathrooms en suite, a guest toilet, a generous cellar area with garage for 2 cars and sufficient storage rooms, fitness area as well as direct elevator to the upper levels. Due to the proximity to the yacht harbour Portals and Palma, this stylish villa in exclusive location offers itself as a primary residence as well as an ideal holiday property. Completion in 2022.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Costa d'En Blanes, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Exquisite penthouse with sea views in school area, Palma. This elegant and bright penthouse is located in Sa Teulera, next to the San Cayetano school and the French Lyceum in Palma. You will be lucky to live in a quiet area, without noise and also a few minutes from any service and leisure area. Its general characteristics are as follows: • Sa Teulera, Palma • 135 m2 usable • 3 double bedrooms  • 2 bathrooms  • Terrace 5 m2 • 4th floor with elevator • Communal swimming pool (3) • Covered parking place (1) and storage room included in the price • Monthly community fee: 180€. • Extras: air conditioning, fitted closets, barbecue, fireplace, furnished, marble floor, double glazing windows   This bright penthouse with elevator, is located in a quiet and privileged residential area of the capital. With unobstructed views of the sea and the Bellver Castle, this fantastic penthouse has 147 m2 built with a total of 135 m2 useful.   As you enter your new home you will see a spacious and bright living-dining room, with a brand new fireplace and direct access to the terrace. An outdoor space where you can enjoy dream views of the sea. The kitchen, independent and fully furnished and equipped with first class appliances, also has access to the terrace. This exit facilitates its ventilation and favors the natural lighting of the room.   Of its 3 double bedrooms, the master bedroom has an en suite bathroom with bathtub and exterior window, a dressing room and ample space to set up an office or a small gym. It also has access to a private balcony overlooking the sea. The second bathroom, which is renovated and has a new shower, is located between the living room and the bedrooms.   You will appreciate in the pictures the great natural light of this penthouse, this is because most of the rooms are exterior and enjoy views of the quiet urbanization, sea and mountain. In addition, thanks to its double glazed windows you will not hear the few noises that may be present.   Undoubtedly, this exclusive residential community will offer you a privileged location and beautiful common areas. Garden areas, two playgrounds, three communal swimming pools and immediate proximity to beaches, services and leisure areas.   If you want to know more information about this elegant and bright penthouse, do not hesitate to contact us.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Teulera, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: This ground-floor apartment is located in Cas Catala, a highly sought-after neighbourhood of Palma, offering stunning sea views. The renovated property offers a bright open plan living/dining area, a large well equipped fitted kitchen with plenty of cupboard space, 3 spacious bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 2 bathrooms, one of them en-suite. From the living area and one of the bedrooms you will find access to a spacious terrace with a private garden and steps down to the swimming pool where you can enjoy spectacular sea views. Additionally, from the kitchen and the other two bedrooms there is access to a large patio area at the back of the property. Additional features: parquet floors, heating and air conditioning in each room, parking garage space in the same building and a separate storage room.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cas Catala, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle des Barranc

description: Located in the Son Espanyolet neighborhood, a neighborhood with a lot of charm, proximity to the city and tranquility, we present this fantastic renovated and furnished apartment in the center of Palma. The modern property, located on the 1st floor of a well-kept building without elevator, has a constructed area of approx. 65 m2 that is divided into a spacious and bright living-/dining room, a modern and open kitchen, utility room, 2 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a bathroom with an easily accessible shower. Other features: Parquet flooring, air conditioning by hot/cold air pump and climalit windows. It is a quiet community, with only 2 apartments per floor and 4 floors in total. Son Espanyolet is a sought after area of Palma with low buildings with patios and gardens. Santa Catalina, the center of Palma and the Paseo Marítimo are just a few minutes' walk away. It is a quiet area that is also convenient for families, since there are several schools nearby.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de la Llibertat

description: Charming bright apartment in Cas Catalá with panoramic views to the forest and partially to the sea, with 2 communal pools and 2 parking spaces. Located in the upper area of Cas Catalá, surrounded by greenery, this apartment forms a peaceful and relaxing luxury home. With a Swedish style interior design, very careful in the details, equipped with top of the line equipment and an incredible southeast orientation. The area of Cas Catalá enjoys the advantage of its short distance to Palma (less than 10 minutes by car) but at the same time a few steps away from beautiful coves and beaches. The building is part of a well-kept community with common areas, including terraces, gardens, 2 swimming pools and paths around the woods.  The modern apartment of 190 sqm living space accessible by elevator offers a spacious entrance hall leading to an open plan living/dining room, a fully equipped kitchen with appliances, a large pantry, utility room and exit to an internal uncovered terrace.  A hallway leads to the guest bathroom and 3 double bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms. In addition the master bedroom has access to a private terrace to enjoy the views and the other two bedrooms have windows to a inner courtyard. In total there are 3 terraces and 1 inner courtyard, which generates an excellent entrance of light and air circulation throughout the apartment. The apartment has been equipped with high quality materials, including fittings, built-in furniture, solar panels, underfloor heating throughout the house and air conditioning. The property comes with 2 large parking spaces and storage room included in the price.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cas Catala, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Luxury duplex apartment located in an extensively refurbished palace in a quiet area of the Old Town of Palma de Mallorca. The living area of approx. 392 m² distributes as follows: on the upper level, generous living/dining area with open kitchen and access to a porch/terrace of approx. 10 m², 1 guest WC, 1 laundry room; on the lower level 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms (2 en suite), and a living area that could be turned into a fourth bedroom. The ground floor provides access to a private garden of 87 m² with a private pool (approx. 6x3 m). Equipment: furniture, built-in kitchen with electrical appliances (Miele), stone floors, fireplace, built-in wardrobes, underfloor heating, air conditioning (hot/cold), double glazing, 2 parking spaces, lift.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Llotja, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Duplex

description: This beautiful 3-storey townhouse in Sol de Mallorca with a private roof terrace and a living space of approx. 118 m2 is located in a very quiet area, very close to some virgin bays with crystal clear waters and the well-known golf course T-Golf & Country Club Poniente. The bright main floor offers a pleasant living-dining room with an open kitchen and a cozy fireplace, as well as a utility room. From this floor, equipped with underfloor heating, there is access to the first large terrace. The 3 large bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, one of them en suite, are located on the lower floor. The 3rd floor houses another room, ideal as an office, from which you can access the large roof terrace, where you can enjoy meals and cocktails under the stars. Other features: Private garage for parking and storage, double glazed windows, tiled floors and underfloor heating on the main level. The well-maintained complex offers a refreshing community pool for those hot summer days on the island. Sol de Mallorca is located in the southwest of the island, about 20 minutes by car from the center of Palma. The beautiful beaches of Portals Vells and Playa del Mago, as well as the Poniente Golf Club are only a few minutes away by car. The center of Palma is 21 km away and the international airport around 32 km.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sol de Mallorca, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house in Avenida Mallorca

description: Fully renovated very charming house with private location with complete privacy. Unique house made for social life regardless of dinner out in the garden by the pool, on the longitudinal terrace, on the roof terrace or inside the property. Two of many nice details is the ceiling height which at the highest place in the kitchen / living room is close to 5 meters and that here is least 4 places to have dinner / coffee. All windows are made to measure and have been installed during the renovation which was ready in January 2023.  There is built-in lighting around the garden, in the pool and even on the outside of the house. This is a house with character and personality! You enter via a door in the wall that surrounds the house and enter the garden with a pool of 4 x 3 meters and about 1.5 m deep with a seat ledge.  There is also an outdoor shower and a number of palm trees. A wide staircase leads up to the house and ends with an oblong terrace where you can enjoy your breakfast.  At the far end of the terrace, is a modern staircase up to the roof terrace and under the staircase is a practical "laundry room". Inside the main part of the house, on the left is a very airy, open kitchen with classic Carrera marble top. There is also a dining area facing the terrace.  Straight ahead from the entrance is the living room and the ceiling height is amazing!  To the right from the living room is the master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and exit to the terrace towards the garden.  In the entrance to the house there is also a bathroom directly to the right, very practical. From the kitchen 2 steps down, indoors you have a smaller room used as an office and is a walk-through room to the second bedroom. Both of these rooms in the annex have access to the garden. All rooms have an AC unit for cooling/heating. The roof terrace is prepared with water and electricity so an outdoor kitchen can easily beinstalled.  There is the possibility to remove one wall and make the dining area larger as well as to make another bedroom where the current entrance to the garden is. A floor plan is available on request. There is free parking opportunity both on the street outside the property in addition to the also free parking by the park on the other side of the street. The area is a quiet residential neighborhood with a mix of town houses, individual villas and a few smaller apartment buildings. A few blocks away there is a convenience store that is open every day of the week, in the park opposite the property there is a large playground and very good walking area for dogs. A café/bar with permission to broadcast UEFA matches is located a few minutes down the street and it is about 8 minutes walk to trendy and restaurant-dense Santa Catalina and Palma Sport & Tennis Club which is an oasis where you can spend the whole day.  Within 5-10 min walk you reach a number of restaurants, cafes, bars, banks, dog shop, shared office, hairdressers, pharmacies, fruit shops, grocery stores, veterinarian, seamstress, dry cleaning, bakeries, gas station etc etc.  It is also about 5 min walk to one of Palma's largest private hospitals, Clinica Juaneda and it takes less than 5 min to drive up to the highway.  It is 15 min walk down to Palma's beautiful harbor walk and from the airport you reach this property in 15 minutes.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Espanyolet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house

description: In the new rapidly growing area of Son Gual with moslyt luxury villas and many upcoming projects in the same style and quality level, this modern designed villa with rustic elements will be built. License is complete and the excavation work started in August 2022.  The location is quiet and green next to Son Gual golf course and with views of both Palma Bay and the Tramuntana Mountains. The villa will be in two levels where the downstairs is dominated by a large open social area with open kitchen and living room with glass walls both towards the pool side / front side and towards the back side. The living room will have a modern fireplace to increase the coziness factor and give additional warmth during the cooler months.  On each side of the kitchen / living room is a bedroom both with en-suite bathrooms. From the living room there is an elegant, straight staircase to the upper floor which has two bedrooms, both with en-suite bathrooms and both with access to a private terrace. The project is licensed for an infinity pool facing Palma Bay and between the pool and the villa is a terrace and lounge area. The entire villa will maintain a high quality level and will, among other things, have underfloor heating throughout and the property will also be insulated. There will be space to park two cars on your own land. Son Gual is located about 15 km from the airport and 18 km from Palma with good highway. 15 minutes after you leave the airport, you can drive up to your own villa entrance. Son Gual Golf which have both a shop and a nice restaurant is located next to the residential area.  It is also close to the beaches of Playa de Palma, Puig de Ros, Can Pastilla, Ciudad Jardin and more. The residential area is so new and still under construction that many streets have not yet been named, but municipal water and sewerage, street lighting and more and more luxury villas are coming at a rapid pace. The location with the proximity to everything mentioned, the view, the high level of what is being built and that the surroundings being very green, quiet and private is unbeatable!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Gual, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Penthouse with spectacular sea views, Approx. 135,20m2, open plan living-dining room, fully fitted kitchen with island, utility room, pantry, 4 double bedrooms, wardrobes, 2 bathrooms (1 en suite), double glazing, marble and stoneware floors, air conditioning, heating, 1 garage space, 15 m2 terrace, sea- and mountain views. Refurbished in 2022.

description: This beautifully renovated apartment is located in Santa Catalina, one of the most sought after areas in Mallorca.   The property has been completely renovated, fitted with high quality materials throughout. The apartment is on the 7th floor which can be accessed by elevator and has a living space of 115m2, made up of a bright open plan living dining area, a well equipped Mobalco fitted kitchen with a breakfast bar, 2 double bedrooms, 1 smaller bedroom or office, 2 bathrooms and a guest toilet. From the living area there is access to a 12m2 terrace with stunning panoramic views over city and Palma Bay. The property offers a parking space on a nearby street. Further features: modern and latest technology, designer furniture, air conditioning h/c, double glazed windows, various built-in wardrobes, wooden floors.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de la Fàbrica

description: This beautiful apartment in the heart of the historic center of Palma was completely renovated in 2022, respecting its old features. The beautiful apartment is located on the third floor of an old building without elevator and offers a constructed area of approx. 100 m2 distributed as follows: a sunny living-dining room, an attractive fully equipped kitchen, 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, 2 bathrooms and a utility room with a dryer and washing machine. In addition, there is a bright communal roof terrace with its own storage room of approx. 20 m2. Among the characteristics of this excellent apartment we have: parquet floors, double glazed windows, aluminum Majorcan shutters, central gas and hot/cold air conditioning. The picturesque historic center of Palma, also known as the old town, has outstanding tourist attractions such as the majestic La Seu cathedral, the Almudaina Royal Palace and the "Es Baluard" Museum of Contemporary Art.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Nicolau, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Costa d'en Brossa

description: Brand New. Flat in Paseo Marítimo with sea views, Apprx. 150,35m2, spacious living-dining room, fitted kitchen with dining area, 2 double bedrooms, wardrobes, 2 bathrooms, 1 en suite, wooden floors, double glazing, central heating, air conditioning, terrace approx. 40,27m2, sea and harbour views.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Paseo Marítimo, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This beautiful, recently renovated apartment in Palma is located in the increasingly popular neighborhood of El Terreno and therefore very close to Parque Belvedere. The bright property is located on the 3rd floor of a well-kept residential building with a refreshing community pool, and with an elevator. In addition, it has been completely renovated to the highest standard. The cozy constructed area of approx. 50 m2 offers an attractive living-dining room with access to a nice balcony where you can spend pleasant hours, a modern kitchen, a double bedroom with a built-in wardrobe and a bathroom with an easily accessible shower. It is a quiet property, with all the necessary services in the immediate vicinity and just a few minutes drive from the center of Palma, the Paseo Marítimo and various beaches and coves. Extras: double glazed windows, hot/cold air conditioning and stone floors. El Terreno is one of the most up-and-coming neighborhoods in Palma and is within walking distance of the bustling center of the island's capital. Palma offers a huge cultural offer, an excellent gastronomic variety and numerous shops and boutiques.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Terreno, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle del Polvorí

description: Flat with spectacular views in first line with direct access to the sea, Approx. 138m2, distributed in spacious living-dining room with access to the terrace, independent kitchen, laundry room, 5 bedrooms (4 doubles), 3 bathrooms, 2 en suite, fitted wardrobes, marble floors, heating, covered parking space, 2 swimming pools and direct access to the sea.
