suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Detached house on a plot of 1.054 m2 approx. , 250 m2 approx. , Large living room with fireplace, large kitchen furnished / equipped with officce, 4 double bedrooms, 4 bathrooms (1 en suite), underfloor heating, hot / cold aa, 250 m2 terrace, 700 m2 garden, pool heated, storage room, garage, elevator, unobstructed views..
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sa Torre, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: This luxurious newly built villa in Palmanova with magnificent sea views from all floors, elevator and a unique interior design, is situated on an elevated plot of approx.1,227 m2 surrounded by several golf courses, beautiful beaches and renowned marinas.The impressive 3-storey property, with all levels connected by an elevator, features high-quality construction materials and state-of-the-art technology.The large constructed area of approx.600 m2, of which approx.368 m2 are distributed in sunny terraces and an impressive saltwater pool, it houses on the upper floor a spectacular living/dining room with access to a dream covered terrace and the luxury open kitchen.The 4 bright double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and stunning en-suite bathrooms are located on the lower floor, as well as another shaded terrace accessible from all bedrooms.The stupendous pool level offers a refreshing pool with idyllic sea views and a pleasant sunbathing area, as well as utility rooms and a 5th bedroom, currently used as a gym.Extras: dressing room, elevator, underfloor heating, stone floors, triple glazed windows, central air conditioning, garage for 3 cars, automatic irrigation system and much more.Palmanova is an attractive tourist complex with three wonderful sandy beaches, a small marina and restaurants.The capital of the island is only 14 km away and the international airport 26 km.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Palmanova, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Àligues

description: Townhouse for sale in Son Anglada Charming village house from 1930 in Son Anglada.    This house has two floors with independent entrances. On the ground floor there are three bedrooms, living room, kitchen and bathroom, all exterior.   On the upper floor, which has beautiful beamed ceilings, there is another kitchen, three bedrooms, a bathroom, and a large terrace with views to the mountains and the pool in the garden.   In the garden there is a guest house with kitchen and fireplace, bedroom and bathroom.  .
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Bons Aires, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This elegant, renovated apartment is located in a beautiful complex that offers beautiful garden areas and a large community pool, just a few steps from the Port Adriano marina, in the southwest of the beautiful island of Mallorca.The bright apartment is located at 1.first floor and has a constructed area of about 130 m2 that is distributed as follows: elegant living/dining room with fireplace and access to the terrace with views of the pool, a fitted and equipped kitchen, 3 large bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, 2 bathrooms and a storage room.The well-kept complex offers the owners a large community pool, where you can enjoy the hot summer days in Mallorca.The equipment features of this attractive apartment in Santa Ponsa include: air conditioning, a fireplace, double-glazed windows and marble floors.An underground parking space is available.This is an excellent location, in an exclusive residence, just a few steps from the elegant Port Adriano marina, with its exclusive boutiques, bars and restaurants, and a beautiful beach with turquoise waters.In a few minutes by car you can also reach several golf courses and beautiful coves.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Chopin

description: This excellent traditional villa in the Son Quint area is located on a large plot of about 2,375 m2 in the beautiful and privileged Pinar Park urbanization, an exclusive neighborhood of Son Vida. The fabulous property, with beautiful gardens, its own tennis court and a wonderful pool surrounded by natural grass, offers maximum privacy and absolute tranquility. The classic 3-storey villa has a living space of approx. 500 m2 that promises spacious, bright spaces and an ideal distribution. The house consists of a magnificent entrance hall, 3 living rooms, one of them with a fireplace, 2 wonderful kitchens, utility room, 2 dining rooms, 6 elegant bedrooms, 6 bathrooms, 2 toilets, a gym and a large workshop of about 200 m2. The impressive Master-Suite impresses with its spaciousness and a wonderful fireplace that brings a very special atmosphere to this room. The large terraces of this fantastic property surround each floor offering excellent views over Son Vida, the mountain peaks, the bay of Palma and even partial sea views. Other features: Gas central heating, marble floors, electric gate, several storage rooms and a large garage for 4 cars. In addition, there is its own legalized well and there is the possibility of enlarging the current construction. It is an unbeatable location, surrounded by lots of nature and the best golf courses on the island. Son Vida, just 5 km from the center of Palma, is one of the most exclusive residential areas of Mallorca.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Vida, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Pinar-Park-D

description: This excellent apartment in Can Pastilla is located on the seafront, thus offering wonderful views of the open sea from each of the rooms.The light-flooded property, facing south-east and located on the 5th floor of a well-kept building with elevator, was partly renovated and furnished and has a living space of approx.90 m2.The spacious distribution has a bright living-/dining room with access to a spectacular 20 m2 terrace with unbeatable views of the Mediterranean Sea, a beautiful independent and fully equipped kitchen, 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 2 bathrooms, one with a shower. and the other with a bathtub.In addition, one of the rooms offers access to a cozy balcony with frontal views of the sea.Other features: Double glazed windows, air conditioning and stoneware floors.This beautiful apartment is ideal as a holiday apartment or to live in throughout the year.Here you can fully enjoy the Mediterranean atmosphere.Can Pastilla offers an exceptional location with good infrastructure, great international restaurants on the beachfront and perfect proximity to the airport.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Can Pastilla, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle dels Pins

description: Flat for sale in Palma De Mallorca, with 125 m², 4 rooms and 2 bathrooms and Storage room.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cort, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle dels Set Cantons

description: Apartment for sale in Santa Catalina with views to the sea and the cathedral On the 4th floor of a finca with LIFT located in one of the most sought-after areas of Palma, this practical two-bedroom apartment is just 2 minutes away from enjoying a stroll along the seafront promenade and within easy access to all kinds of shops as well as the countless international gastronomic options offered by the popular SANTA CATALINA quarter. Throughout the living/dining room and the fully equipped open plan kitchen there are breathtaking views of the sea and the cathedral. From this space there is access to the bedrooms, the full bathroom and the balcony. There is also a terrace with space for a small table with three chairs which is accessed from one of the bedrooms. Both bedrooms have fitted wardrobes and air conditioning; one is a double bedroom and the other is currently used as an office and is equipped with a sofa bed for guests. The property was refurbished in 2018 with details such as bespoke blinds with opaque function on all windows. The sale price includes the following furniture: Gervasoni sofa and armchair plus table in the living room, double bed and sofa bed in the bedrooms, dining table with four chairs, outdoor table and four chairs on the terrace, coffee table and chairs on the small balcony. Can you imagine living here? We look forward to ypr call!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle del Vicari Antoni Marimon

description: This duplex penthouse is located in a privileged area between the upper part of Porto Pi and La Bonanova, residential and easily accessible. The house is located on a 4th and 5th floor, of a farm made up of 12 neighbors and has 357m2 built. On the lower floor we can find the entrance hall, individual kitchen equipped with access to a 25m2 terrace, utility room, two double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes (one of them with a terrace and sea views), and a spacious living-dining room with access to Front terrace facing the sea, with spectacular views of the entire bay of Palma. An imposing marble staircase with custom-made wrought iron railings leads us to the upper floor, which is distributed in a living room-library and a 50m2 office with the possibility of making one or two bedrooms and the master suite that has a bathroom. with jacuzzi and dressing room. In addition, the price includes 3 parking spaces. The farm has an elevator and community pool. Do not hesitate to contact us for a visit. Ref: EH0862.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Bonanova - Porto Pi, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: This beautiful semi-detached house in Son Veri Nou is located just a few steps from the sea and has wonderful unobstructed views of the sea and the mountains. The sunny south-facing property has a constructed area of approx. 500 m2, distributed over 3 floors as follows: 2 living rooms, one with access to the garden and the other with stunning sea views, a furnished and equipped kitchen, 8 spacious bedrooms and 7 bathrooms. In addition, the house also has a dressing room, a storage room, a laundry room, as well as a toilet. In the outdoor area there is a beautiful private pool, where you can enjoy sunny days in Mallorca. The well-kept community also offers a community pool and garden. At your disposal you have a spacious underground garage, as well as a community garage. This attractive semi-detached house in Son Veri Nou is equipped with air conditioning, heating, double-glazed windows and stoneware floors. The property is located a few steps from the sea and close to the beautiful sandy beach.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Verí, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: Semi-detached house in Rambla

description: This wonderful, partially renovated apartment in Palma de Mallorca offers beautiful views of the surroundings and the Bellver Castle and is located in a well-kept building with elevator, a few steps from the port and the Paseo Marítimo, in the El Terreno neighborhood.The bright property has a constructed area of approx.51 m2 that are distributed as follows: a living room with access to a balcony with beautiful views, an American kitchen, 2 bedrooms, one single and one double, as well as a completely renovated bathroom with shower.This beautiful apartment in Palma is equipped with air conditioning, double-glazed windows and stoneware floors.It is a very attractive situation, a few steps from the sea, the Club de Mar and the Paseo Marítimo, where you can walk, play sports and enjoy delicious meals in the excellent restaurants located on the seafront.The international airport is approx.10 minutes by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Terreno, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida de Joan Miró

description: This fabulous villa in Costa d´en Blanes offers distant partial sea views and is located in a privileged green residential area, just a few minutes drive from the beach and the famous marina Puerto Portals, in the southwest of the enchanting island Mallorca. The bright property has a constructed area of approx. 320 m2 distributed as follows: the ground floor offers a living room, a dining room, a fully equipped kitchen, an office and a bathroom. In addition, on this floor there is also a separate guest apartment with a double bedroom and another bedroom. The first floor consists of 3 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and en-suite bathrooms, as well as a generous terrace with beautiful views of the green surroundings. The charming outdoor area with an outdoor kitchen and a wonderful pool invite you to relax and enjoy the days and nights on the wonderful island Mallorca. The equipment features of this beautiful villa in Costa d´en Blanes include: air conditioning, electric heating, double glazed windows and stoneware floors. It is a very attractive location, just 5 minutes by car from the noble Bendinat golf course and the well-known Puerto Portals marina with its exclusive restaurants and beautiful beaches with crystal clear waters.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Costa d'En Blanes, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de G.M. Jovellanos

description: Located in one of the most popular locations on the island, with the sea a stone's throw away, shops and transport at the foot of the hill and the motorway just a few minutes away by car, we present this fantastic newly renovated apartment in Cas Catalá. The bright apartment, with impressive views of the sea, is located on the 2nd floor of a well-kept building, without elevator, but with a wonderful community pool to cool off on the hottest days. Its spacious living space of approx. 72 m2 is divided into a large living-/dining room with magnificent floor-to-ceiling windows and access to an impressive conservatory of approx. 19 m2 with wonderful views of the sea and ideal to enjoy a pleasant breakfast or a relaxing glass of wine in good company during all seasons of the year, as well as a modern open kitchen with a breakfast bar, 2 bedrooms (both with large built-in wardrobes) and 2 bathrooms with shower. The elegant apartment was recently renovated with quality materials and finishes and has extras such as double-glazed windows to guarantee pleasant thermal comfort, wood-style laminate parquet flooring, robust and easy to clean, and an efficient bioethanol fireplace in the living room. A private parking space completes this great real estate offer. Cas Català is, along with nearby Illetas, a territory that has managed to preserve the charm of a beautiful residential area while offering everything you need at hand. It is a perfect area to live throughout the year or spend a quiet vacation.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cas Catala, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Bell Puig

description: This charming duplex apartment in Bendinat was completely renovated, offers beautiful views of the green surroundings and is located just a few steps from the golf course, in the southwest of the beautiful island Mallorca. The attractive apartment has a constructed area of approx. 250 m2 distributed over 2 floors as follows: The first floor consists of a spacious living room with access to the terrace, a kitchen and 3 bedrooms, 2 of them with en-suite bathrooms. The ground floor offers a large living room, a bedroom, a bathroom and a cellar. On this floor there is a wonderful terrace with a private pool and access to the garden shared only with the neighbor next door. The charming complex offers owners 3 magnificent community pools to fully enjoy the hot summer days on the island. The equipment features of this duplex apartment in Bendinat include: air conditioning, electric heating, double glazed windows and wooden and ceramic floors. It is a very attractive location, just a few steps from the golf course and a few minutes drive from a wide variety of wonderful beaches and coves with turquoise waters. There is also good access to supermarkets, restaurants and everything one needs in daily life. The price does not include the garage that must also be purchased for 50,000 Eur.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cas Catala, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Menorca

description: This bright and modern south facing villa is located on the Tolleric coast on the seafront and offers fantastic unobstructed views. The bungalow-style property offers us after passing the entrance hall, a large living-dining room area, a kitchen equipped with high-end appliances, three bedrooms, two of them en suite, and the possibility of converting the existing office into a room bedroom. The outdoor area includes a beautiful garden, a solarium and a salt water pool. Other features of this villa are: air conditioning, underfloor heating, 3 car garage, parking spaces, fireplace, electric shutters, laundry room, etc.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Badia Blava-Badia Gran-Tolleric, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle del Cap Roig

description: This wonderful, renovated ground floor apartment in Portals Nous is located just a few steps from the luxurious port and the beach with crystal clear waters, in the southwest of the beautiful island Mallorca. The attractive apartment has a constructed area of approx. 104 m2 that are distributed as follows: an elegant living room with access to the terrace, a furnished and equipped American kitchen, 3 large bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, as well as 2 bathrooms. The magnificent community offers owners a beautiful community pool and garden with Mediterranean plants to fully enjoy the magical atmosphere on the island. This attractive ground floor apartment in Portals Nous is equipped with air conditioning, electric heating, double glazed windows, ceramic floors and Sat TV. It is a very attractive situation, in a privileged residential area, just a few steps from the luxurious Puerto Portals with its exclusive boutiques and restaurants, as well as several wonderful beaches with turquoise waters. The next golf course is only 5 minutes away by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Portals Nous - Bendinat, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Benito Jerónimo Feijóo

description: This elegant apartment in Portals Nous has recently been completely and luxuriously renovated. It is located a few minutes walk from the marina of Puerto Portals and its sandy beaches. The beautiful south-west facing apartment, with views of the sea and the pool area, is located on the 3rd floor of a well-maintained residential building and offers a generous constructed area of approximately 104 m2, which is divided as follows: 1 bright living/dining room with open plan and fully equipped kitchen with access to the sunny terrace, 1 bedroom with bathroom en suite, 1 additional bedroom and 1 bathroom. This high-quality apartment in Portals Nous is equipped with noble marble floors, air conditioning and double-glazed aluminum windows. The glamorous private marina of Puerto Portals offers a wide range of luxury boutiques and excellent restaurants. Portals Nous is one of the most demanded and preferred residential areas in the southwest of Mallorca. It is located a few minutes from several beautiful beaches with crystalline waters, as well as the Bendinat golf course and the exclusive marina of Puerto Portals with its luxurious boutiques and excellent restaurants. The beautiful capital Palma can be reached in about 10 minutes by car. The airport can be reached in about 15 minutes by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Portals Nous - Bendinat, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Torrent

description: This fabulous penthouse in Cala Major offers spectacular 360 degree views over the entire bay of Palma to the Tramuntana mountains, and is located on the 11th floor of a central residential complex. The constructed area of this modern furnished apartment is approx. 112 m2, it has 2 terraces and is distributed as follows: 1 spacious and bright living/dining room with access to the sunny terraces and impressive sea views, a modern American kitchen, 3 large bedrooms, as well as 2 bathrooms. The master bedroom with sea views and en-suite bathroom has direct access to one of the terraces. Other features include: double glazed windows, high quality concrete floors, fully equipped kitchen, hot/cold air conditioning, satellite TV connection and a separate laundry room. The flat is sold furnished. Cala Major is a very popular area on the outskirts of the capital Palma, with a variety of beautiful sandy beaches and coves, as well as international schools, restaurants and bars. The center of Palma is just a few minutes away by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cala Major, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de Saridakis

description: This renovated apartment in Portals Nous, recently renovated with great taste and with wonderful views of the port and the communal pool, is located in the luxurious marina of Puerto Portals. The apartment is part of an exclusive community with elevator and parking (waiting list), offering a large constructed area of about 83 m2 divided into a bright open-plan living room with direct access to the terrace overlooking the community garden and pool, a good size modern fully equipped kitchen, 2 bedrooms and 2 wonderful bathrooms, one with a bath and the other with an easily accessible shower. From the fantastic terrace you can enjoy the pleasant Mediterranean climate and feel the noble atmosphere of Puerto Portals. To guarantee maximum comfort, this exceptional community has direct access to the port with its wide variety of magnificent international restaurants and luxury boutiques. Puerto Portals is today one of the most exclusive marinas in the Mediterranean, known for its high-quality gourmet restaurants, fashion designer shops and many social activities such as charity auctions, the Farmer's Market and the Christmas Fair. The center of Palma de Mallorca can be reached in 10 minutes by car and there are many prestigious international schools nearby, such as Agora, King Richard and the Baleares International College.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Portals Nous - Bendinat, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Benito Jerónimo Feijóo

description: This wonderful penthouse in Sa Torre has a large private roof terrace with beautiful views over the surroundings towards the mountains and is located in a well-kept community with a communal pool, close to the sea, in the south of the beautiful island Mallorca.The apartment has a constructed area of approx.190 m2 distributed as follows: a nice living/dining room with access to the balcony, a furnished and equipped kitchen, 3 bright bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (one of them en suite) and a roof terrace of approx.80 m2.The beautiful community offers owners a fantastic community pool and garden to enjoy the wonderful Mediterranean atmosphere on the island.This attractive penthouse in Sa Torre is equipped with hot/cold air conditioning, gas central heating, pre-installation for a fireplace, double-glazed windows and tiled floors.At your disposal you have a space in the underground garage.The apartment is located just a few steps from the sea and a few minutes drive from the next beautiful beach with turquoise water.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sa Torre, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de Santa Margalida

description: This bright and modern newly renovated apartment is located in Playa de Palma in a very pleasant stretch with many commercial services and only 150 meters from the beach. The living space of about 70m2 is distributed in an entrance area, a spacious living-dining room, a new fitted and equipped kitchen, 2 bedrooms, a bathroom with shower and 2 balconies. Also included are a pantry and laundry room, as well as furniture and televisions. The property is equipped with hot/cold air conditioning, has double glazed PVC windows and light wood look tiled floors. The building has an elevator. This privileged area is characterized by excellent communication with Palma and its airport and offers a high standard of living all year round. Palma Aquarium is nearby. The long sandy beach with its promenade invites you to sunbathe and relax.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Les Maravelles, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Marbella

description: This beautiful independent villa in Cala Estancia with a private pool and partial and unobstructed views of the sea is located just 5 minutes by car from the fantastic Can Pastilla beach.The cozy 2-storey property has a living area of approximately 298 m2, which is divided as follows: On the ground floor there is the entrance hall, the living-dining room on 2 levels with access to a beautiful glazed terrace with a fireplace , the independent kitchen and a bedroom with balcony and bathroom en suite.On the 1st floor, 3 bedrooms await you, one of them with an en-suite bathroom, a dressing room and a large terrace with partial sea views, as well as another bathroom.The fabulous outdoor area has a garden with palm trees, a refreshing pool of about 32 m2, barbecue and sauna.In addition, the house has a large basement of about 125 m2, which can be used as a storage room, garage or pantry.Other features: double glazed windows, parquet and tiled floors, oil central heating, air conditioning, parking and automatic irrigation system.It is the last chalet on this street and is located directly opposite the Es Carnatge nature reserve, so the views cannot be obstructed.Cala Estancia has an ideal location just a few minutes from both the airport and the center of Palma.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Can Pastilla, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle del Dentol

description: Located in a beautiful town that belongs to the municipality of Marratxí, we present this fantastic modern villa in Portol, a few minutes from Palma. The beautiful single-storey property offers a spacious, Mediterranean style and a constructed area of approx. 191 m2 that is divided as follows: A wonderful living-/ dining room with views of the pool and the garden, a fully equipped open kitchen with an island, 3 bright bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (one of them en suite) and a guest toilet. The exterior of this spectacular property has a wonderful garden with artificial grass and a refreshing swimming pool to enjoy the pleasant Mediterranean climate. The magnificent cozy terraces invite you to spend unforgettable moments with friends and family. Extras: Dressing room, central air conditioning, underfloor heating, double glazed windows and parking for 2 cars. The small community has a playground. Pórtol is a quiet and cozy place a few minutes from Palma that is also famous for its traditional pottery, especially Siurells.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Pòrtol, Marratxi
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Cas Canonge

address: Camino de Gènova a Sant Agustí
description: This Mediterranean villa in Genoa requires renovation, has marvelous views of the sea and is located in a quiet neighborhood of the capital of the island - Palma de Mallorca.The attractive property has a constructed area of approx.243 m2 that are distributed as follows: a spacious living room with a fireplace and access to the terrace with beautiful views of the sea, a fitted kitchen, a dining room, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, an office and a toilet.The beautiful outdoor area with a magnificent pool with a barbecue and Mediterranean plants invites you to enjoy the hot summer days on the island.The equipment features of this beautiful villa in Genoa include: hot/cold air conditioning, Sat TV, marble floors and a lift that connects all floors of the house.At your disposal you have a large garage with space for 2 cars.The property has a lot of potential and has an unbeatable and quiet location, where it is not possible to build in the surroundings.The next beautiful beach with crystal clear water, as well as the center of Palma are only a few minutes away by car.To the international airport it will take approx.10 minutes by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Agustí, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Camino de Gènova a Sant Agustí

description: This Mediterranean villa with pool in Santa Ponsa, nestled in a beautiful, leafy and quiet residential area, is just a few steps from the marina. Upon entering the house, the large entrance hall draws attention. The constructed area of about 265 m2 is distributed over 3 floors as follows: a bright living-dining room with a fireplace, a separate kitchen, 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms (1 en suite), a utility room and a storage room. All rooms have a private terrace. The large outdoor area with a beautiful pool, barbecue area and Mediterranean plants, invites you to fully enjoy the magical days and nights on the beautiful island of Mallorca. This charming villa in Santa Ponsa is equipped with gas central heating, air conditioning, fireplace, double glazed windows with shutters, thermoclay walls, alarm system, tiled floors and an automatic irrigation system. A garage with 2 parking spaces and 2 exterior parking spaces provide ample parking. This is a very attractive location, close to several beaches and bathing coves, the Santa Ponsa golf course, and about 10 minutes by car from the luxurious Port Adriano with its excellent bars and restaurants. The city of Palma and the airport can be reached in less than 30 minutes by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Avenida del Rei Jaume i

description: This villa to reform with sea and mountain views in Santa Ponsa is located in one of the most attractive urbanizations in the area. The property with a constructed area of approx. 300 m2 is situated on a plot of approx. 1670 m2. In the basement there is a living room, an open kitchen and 3 bedrooms (all with bathroom en suite). From here there is direct access to the garden. On the upper floor is the entrance with impressive views, as well as a kitchen with dining area and 2 more bedrooms (also each with bathroom en suite) and a covered balcony of approximately 25 m2. There is the possibility of building a pool of 42 m2. A green area, undeveloped for several decades, promises a lot of privacy. A small beach for a refreshing swim on summer days is just a few minutes' walk away. From Santa Ponsa you can reach the capital of Mallorca, Palma, in just 20 minutes. The town has a very good infrastructure. Here are three of the most renowned golf courses on the island, as well as the well-known ATP tennis club.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Balneari /s. Ponsa

description: This spectacular penthouse in Palma de Mallorca was completely renovated, has beautiful unobstructed views of the sea and is located on 7. floor of a well-kept building with an elevator, in a picturesque neighborhood of Santa Catalina. The modern property has a constructed area of approx. 200 m2 that are distributed as follows: a spacious living/dining room with access to a beautiful terrace with sea views, a furnished and equipped American kitchen, 4 beautiful bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a dressing room, a utility room, as well as a storage room. In addition, the apartment has access to the communal terrace with incredible views. The equipment features of this beautiful penthouse in Palma include: hot/cold air conditioning, Climalit double glazed windows and white cement floor. It is a very attractive location in the Santa Catalina neighborhood known for a wide variety of international bars and restaurants, as well as a market full of delicious traditional products. The promenade, where you can take beautiful walks and play sports on the seafront, is just a few steps away.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de la Fàbrica

description: This unique apartment in Palma, a former law firm, is located on the 2nd floor of a fantastic emblematic building without elevator in the fabulous old town, close to El Corte Inglés and Plaza España.The apartment is registered as a home and has a large constructed area of approx.221 (about 192 useful m2) divided into a large living room with an old fireplace, a small kitchen with an impressive wood-burning stove, 6 bright bedrooms and 2 toilets (there are no full bathrooms).The fantastic house preserves the original wooden doors, as well as wonderful original hydraulic tiles.In addition, there are 2 balconies to enjoy the atmosphere of the city and 4 French balconies.Other features: Storage room, wooden climalit windows and centralized hot/cold air conditioning.It is in a very good location, in the heart of the historic center of Palma, offering traditional bars and excellent restaurants.To the international airport it will take only 10 minutes by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Missio - Mercat, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle del Sindicat

description: This elegant apartment in Santa Catalina has recently been completely renovated. It is a few minutes walk from the center and the Paseo Marítimo. The beautiful property, facing south and overlooking the famous market, is located on the 1st floor of a well-maintained residential building and offers a generous constructed area of approximately 83 m2, divided as follows: A bright living/dining room with an open kitchen and fully equipped, access to the 2 balconies and 2 bedrooms with bathroom en suite. One bedroom has access to another balcony. This high-quality apartment in Santa Catalina is equipped with air conditioning, double-glazed aluminum windows, exterior aluminum shutters, fitted wardrobes in the bedrooms and parquet floors. Santa Catalina is one of the most attractive neighborhoods in the city. Located near the sea and with a village atmosphere, the fishermen once housed the beautiful and historic houses. Sailors and millers also lived in this area, and the 18th century mills still stand. The heart of the neighborhood is the covered market and the many restaurants, cafes and bars that make Santa Catalina a popular and culinary meeting place. It takes about 15 minutes by car to get to the international airport.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Plaza de la Navegació

description: Semi-detached house for sale with views and private garden in SES ROTES VELLES, Santa Ponsa Terraced house for sale with private parking, in a very quiet community in SES ROTES VELLES-Santa Ponsa (Calviá) We present this good purchase opportunity: It is a semi-detached house for sale, with a private terrace and parking, with beautiful views of the countryside and the mountains. The property is distributed with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a private garden and terraces. MAIN FLOOR: Access by small stairs, kitchen, 1 toilet, living room with large windows and access to a balcony and utility room, making a useful area of 35 sqm. In addition 16 sqm of beautiful porch. UPPER FLOOR: 3 bedrooms and 1 full bathroom, making a useful area of 46 sqm. PARKING: Private and covered of 26 sqm. PRIVATE GARDEN: It has 2 gardens, one in front of 20 sqm and another in the back of 35 sqm. Very spacious and very bright, with easy access by stairs from the street, or directly by car to the entrance door. Tiled floors and hot and cold air conditioning.   Without a doubt, a property of good dimensions, great location, close to everything you need, and at a very good price. Contact us, we want to sell this beautiful property. Can you imagine living here? SANTA PONSA: Prospective owners who are considering the option of living in Santa Ponça will know that the area offers a wide variety of offers and according to residents, it also has the best climate in Mallorca! The coastline that borders the impressive cliffs between Santa Ponça and Port Adriano is lined with modern villas. This has been the place of choice for the rich and famous since 1928 and later during the 1970s the area became popular with sun and beach lovers. It currently has a population of more than 10,000 inhabitants and its surroundings are home to a wide range of services that are open throughout the year. Enjoy Santa Ponça with your family. Beach, surroundings and all services in one of the most representative tourist areas of Mallorca. Welcome to Santa Ponça! Located just 15 minutes from Palma, Santa Ponça has a beautiful family beach that is more than half a kilometer long, as well as small coves nearby. Around its beaches and coves there is a wide range of infrastructure and tourist services specially adapted to spend pleasant holidays with family and/or friends. Multiple accommodation options, restaurants, sports facilities, entertainment venues, shops, professional tennis courts, picturesque beaches, a historic marina and one of the most modern ports in the Mediterranean. In addition, enjoying Santa Ponça with the family is especially attractive at the beginning of September, on the occasion of the celebration of the FESTES DEL REI EN JAUME. This festive event that commemorates the conquest of Mallorca by the troops of Jaume I, is made up of a set of festive, cultural, musical acts, aimed at all ages. The colorful parades of Saracens and Christians, the traditional Nit de Foc or the medieval market installed on the beach promenade stand out. Santa Ponça also has a welcoming marina for sailing lovers, as well as two magnificent golf courses. The prized marine reserves of El Toro and Illes Malgrats invite exploration by diving and diving enthusiasts. At a sporting level, the town's magnificent municipal facilities have gained special relevance in recent years due to their intense activity, as well as for hosting international sporting events. Santa Ponça with the family, the best option in Mallorca.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Costa de la Calma, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house in Calle de Nunyo Sanç

description: This elegant apartment in Portals Nous has been recently renovated with direct access to the Port and the beautiful beach area. This beautiful south-west facing apartment with views of the sea and the harbor is located on the 2nd floor of a well-maintained apartment building and offers a spacious constructed area of approx. 119 m2, which is divided as follows: 1 bright living/dining room with fully equipped open kitchen and access to a large sunny terrace, 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (including 1 en-suite). This high-quality apartment in Portals Nous is equipped with elegant tiled floors, air conditioning and double-glazed windows. In addition, there is 1 parking space available. The glamorous private marina of Puerto Portals offers a wide range of boutiques and restaurants. Portals Nous is one of the most sought after and preferred residential locations in the southwest of Mallorca. It is just a few minutes from several beautiful beaches with crystalline waters, the Bendinat golf course and the exclusive marina of Puerto Portals, with its luxury boutiques and excellent restaurants. The beautiful capital Palma is only 10 minutes away by car and the airport about 15 minutes.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Portals Nous - Bendinat, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Torrent

description: This beautiful apartment in Santa Catalina, the most emblematic district of Palma, is located on the 5th floor of a well-kept building with a lift and a communal roof terrace of approx. 200 m2 with views of the Cathedral. The sunny property, with southeast orientation and in need of complete reform, stands out for its excellent location, close to the center and all the facilities in the area and its large constructed area of approx. 106 m2. The authentic apartment offers a large living-/dining room with a balcony of about 6 m2, a separate kitchen with utility room, 4 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a bathroom. There is the possibility of changing the distribution according to your needs. Other features: Terrazzo floors, roller shutters and gas central heating. The Santa Catalina neighborhood is one of the most charming and lively corners of Mallorca. Its streets spread between the busy Paseo Marítimo and the interesting Es Baluard museum offer the most cosmopolitan experience of the capital.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de la Fàbrica

description: This magnificent apartment in Palmanova is located on the seafront, offering impressive panoramic and unobstructed views of the Mediterranean Sea.The sunny property, located on the 3rd floor with elevator and facing southeast, is completely renovated with top quality materials and fully furnished.The bright apartment offers a living space of approx.64 m2 divided into a beautiful open living-/dining room with access to a fantastic balcony of about 12 m2 with dream views of the sea, a beautiful fully equipped and very modern integrated kitchen, 2 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a bathroom with a walk-in shower. easy access.Other features: Stoneware floors, double glazed windows, hot/cold air conditioning through ducts and satellite TV Sat.It is a very special home at the foot of the beach and surrounded by a wide variety of excellent international restaurants.Palmanova is a perfect beach area for families in the southwest of the island.Located in the municipality of Calvià and it is a seaside resort that has a wide bay and three beautiful beaches: Son Maties, Na Nadala and Es Carregador, as well as the small marina of Son Caliu.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Palmanova, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Duc Estremera

description: This beautiful apartment in Palma is located in the heart of the beautiful old town. The renovated flat is located in the well-known neighborhood of La Lonja, an ideal location to be in the heart of the city, with the dreamy little cafes and authentic restaurants, the popular sights, as well as the best shopping streets just a few steps away. minutes walk. This wonderful apartment, with the charm of an old Majorcan apartment, offers a constructed area of approximately 50 m2, divided as follows: A fully equipped open kitchen with a cooking island connected to the living room, 1 comfortable bedroom with en-suite bathroom, two French balconies overlooking the quiet courtyard. The magnificent views from the communal rooftop terrace are unbeatable and will make any city lover's heart beat faster. Amenities include laminate flooring, fan, and double glazed windows. The international airport of Palma de Mallorca, as well as the well-known golf courses such as Son Vida, Son Mu nntaner and Son Quint can be reached in about 15 minutes by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Llotja, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle dels Apuntadors

description: In a very nice and well-kept residential complex, with a community pool and garden, we present this bright penthouse in Maioris Decima. It is located a few meters from the sea, in a very attractive urbanization. The beautiful and spacious property is in a very good condition and has a constructed area of approximately 146 m2 which is divided as follows: a living-dining room with access to the large terrace of about 20 m2, a modern and fully equipped kitchen with laundry room, 1 bedroom with built-in wardrobe and bathroom en suite, another 2 bedrooms and a bathroom with shower. This beautiful penthouse is equipped with tiled floors, double glazed windows and shutters. There is a pre-installation for air conditioning. It has two outdoor parking spaces, one of them covered, and there is the possibility of installing a charging station for electric vehicles. In addition, there is a storage room in the basement of the community, ideal for storing bicycles or other bulky items. This beautiful penthouse in Maioris Decima is in a very well connected area, with supermarkets, restaurants, cafes, a tennis club and the famous Maioris golf course. The nearest beach is 5 minutes away and Palma airport about 15 minutes by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Maioris-Puig de Ros, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle Estels Xapats

address: Camino de Gènova a Sant Agustí
description: This Mediterranean villa in Genoa requires renovation, has marvelous views of the sea and is located in a quiet neighborhood of the capital of the island - Palma de Mallorca.The attractive property has a constructed area of approx.243 m2 that are distributed as follows: a spacious living room with a fireplace and access to the terrace with beautiful views of the sea, a fitted kitchen, a dining room, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, an office and a toilet.The beautiful outdoor area with a magnificent pool with a barbecue and Mediterranean plants invites you to enjoy the hot summer days on the island.The equipment features of this beautiful villa in Genoa include: hot/cold air conditioning, Sat TV, marble floors and a lift that connects all floors of the house.At your disposal you have a large garage with space for 2 cars.The property has a lot of potential and has an unbeatable and quiet location, where it is not possible to build in the surroundings.The next beautiful beach with crystal clear water, as well as the center of Palma are only a few minutes away by car.To the international airport it will take approx.10 minutes by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Agustí, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Camino de Gènova a Sant Agustí

description: This wonderful, partially renovated apartment in Palma de Mallorca offers beautiful views of the surroundings and the Bellver Castle and is located in a well-kept building with elevator, a few steps from the port and the Paseo Marítimo, in the El Terreno neighborhood.The bright property has a constructed area of approx.51 m2 that are distributed as follows: a living room with access to a balcony with beautiful views, an American kitchen, 2 bedrooms, one single and one double, as well as a completely renovated bathroom with shower.This beautiful apartment in Palma is equipped with air conditioning, double-glazed windows and stoneware floors.It is a very attractive situation, a few steps from the sea, the Club de Mar and the Paseo Marítimo, where you can walk, play sports and enjoy delicious meals in the excellent restaurants located on the seafront.The international airport is approx.10 minutes by car.

This beautiful south-west facing apartment with views of the sea and the harbor is located on the 2nd floor of a well-maintained apartment building and offers a spacious constructed area of approx. 119 m2, which is divided as follows: 1 bright living/dining room with fully equipped open kitchen and access to a large sunny terrace, 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (including 1 en-suite). This high-quality apartment in Portals Nous is equipped with elegant tiled floors, air conditioning and double-glazed windows. In addition, there is 1 parking space available. The glamorous private marina of Puerto Portals offers a wide range of boutiques and restaurants. Portals Nous is one of the most sought after and preferred residential locations in the southwest of Mallorca. It is just a few minutes from several beautiful beaches with crystalline waters, the Bendinat golf course and the exclusive marina of Puerto Portals, with its luxury boutiques and excellent restaurants. The beautiful capital Palma is only 10 minutes away by car and the airport about 15 minutes.

description: This beautiful independent villa in Cala Estancia with a private pool and partial and unobstructed views of the sea is located just 5 minutes by car from the fantastic Can Pastilla beach.The cozy 2-storey property has a living area of approximately 298 m2, which is divided as follows: On the ground floor there is the entrance hall, the living-dining room on 2 levels with access to a beautiful glazed terrace with a fireplace , the independent kitchen and a bedroom with balcony and bathroom en suite.On the 1st floor, 3 bedrooms await you, one of them with an en-suite bathroom, a dressing room and a large terrace with partial sea views, as well as another bathroom.The fabulous outdoor area has a garden with palm trees, a refreshing pool of about 32 m2, barbecue and sauna.In addition, the house has a large basement of about 125 m2, which can be used as a storage room, garage or pantry.Other features: double glazed windows, parquet and tiled floors, oil central heating, air conditioning, parking and automatic irrigation system.It is the last chalet on this street and is located directly opposite the Es Carnatge nature reserve, so the views cannot be obstructed.Cala Estancia has an ideal location just a few minutes from both the airport and the center of Palma.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Can Pastilla, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle del Dentol

description: We would like to introduce this charming ground floor apartment located in Palma’s much sought-after and tranquil neighbourhood of Son Armadams. The interior living area consist of 106m2, including a spacious open-plan lounge-dining room and bright modern kitchen. A beautifully open outdoor patio of approx. 35m2 also gets plenty of sunlight throughout the day. The apartment has two modern bathrooms and four bedrooms, one of which is presently used as an office. This property is very family-friendly with numerous schools close by and Bellver forest a short walk away. It’s also within easy walking distance of supermarkets, shops and buzzing Santa Catalina dining and nightlife district.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Dureta, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida Picasso

description: Ground floor with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Housing distributed in a spacious 25 m2 living room, with a large window that precedes a large 33 m2 terrace on the ground floor, which connects with a garden for private use of approximately 18 m2 and that gives direct access to the 2,800 m2 community garden and to the 3 swimming pools of the complex. The house has 3 double bedrooms, the main one with an en-suite bathroom, very bright, with built-in wardrobes and all of them equipped with a heat pump and air conditioning. The house has a kitchen furnished with utility room that gives access to another garden for private use of approximately 30 m2, which has an exit door to the street and where a wooden shed is installed that serves as a storage room and is ideal for storing bicycles, garden tools, etc. The 2 bathrooms in the house are complete. The floors are marble. All enclosures are aluminum with double glazing. The air conditioning is through ducts. The price also includes a parking space within the residential area. The Maioris Décima shopping center, just minutes from the house, has all the services. It is a privileged environment, very well connected, close to Palma, the airport and one of the best golf courses on the island. This urbanization is part of the Llucmajor marina, an area of special natural importance with a high degree of biodiversity.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Maioris-Puig de Ros, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Beautiful villa in Puntiró in a very quiet residential area surrounded by nature, 15 minutes from Palma, and 20 minutes from the airport, and 20 minutes from Palma beach, we also have a golf course 10 minutes away, this villa has about 760 m2 built, on a plot of 8426 m2, there are two houses with the same distribution, but with independent entrances, ideal for a large family that wants to live together but maintaining their privacy. The distribution of the houses are identical: ground floor; terrace, hall, living room, dining room, equipped kitchen, a room with bathroom en suite, all spaces are very spacious and bright, ceramic floors, high ceilings, aluminum windows, double glazed windows; On the first floor we have: 3 bedrooms, two bathrooms, one en suite and in the main room we have a terrace with impressive views of the garden and pool, tile floors, high ceilings, spacious and bright rooms, all the materials are of the highest quality. In the sum of the houses we have 8 bedrooms and 6 bathrooms, 2 terraces, one at the entrance and another on the first floor. In the basement we have an impressive garage for several cars and a gym. Outside we have a beautiful pool and garden, there is electricity, community well water, there are 2 cisterns of 21,000 l. This property is ideal for a large family or to invest, since there are 2 houses in one. Do not hesitate to call us for a visit.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Puntiró, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Located in the sought-after and sought after neighborhood of Santa Catalina in a quiet and residential section of Calle Cotoner, this ground floor can become your forever home. A house where you will make new memories with your family, you will rest and you will feel comfortable from the first day. The general characteristics of this ground floor are the following: • Location: The most sought-after and demanded area of the Santa Catalina-Palma neighbourhood. • 82 m2 useful and 88 m2 built • 2 double rooms • 1 fully renovated bathroom with shower. • 116m2 of graphic plot area • 31 m2 of own terrace • Reformed • Hot/cold air conditioning • Parquet floors • Built-in wardrobes • Terrace This functional and modern ground floor located in Santa Catalina a few meters from the famous market consists of 82 m2 useful interior. When you enter the house for the first time, you will find a cozy entrance hall that will make it easier for you to leave your belongings to move more easily. As you continue, you will reach the bright, elegant and modern living-dining room with direct access to the Terrace. The quintessential place in the house where you will surely spend incredible moments with your family and friends. But, in addition, it will also be a place where you can relax and be calm. Its open and modern kitchen, with quality and good taste, you will find it fully equipped. Designed to cover a large storage capacity, from now on you will never have any space problems again. The house has wide and high ceilings and also good natural light. Thanks to its outdoor space you will enjoy a beautiful terrace and you will have a place to disconnect from household chores and enjoy the tranquility of the moment. It will also allow you to do multiple outdoor activities almost all year round thanks to the good climate of Mallorca. If you want to know more information about this ground floor located in Santa Catalina, Palma, call and ask us or fill out the contact form.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Stately and ancestral Mallorcan-style house from the 18th century, FOR SALE. Its noble and luminous distribution in several rooms with fireplace and Majorcan-style decoration, (one of them exterior "suitable for special events" exceeds 500 m2 of surface), library, chapel, dining room, 15 bedrooms, 10 bathrooms, kitchens, gardens, pond, swimming pool, ample space adapted for parking, all on a plot of about 125,000 m2 make it an exclusive mansion for personal use, as well as for a possible Headquarters of a Foundation and other uses contemplated in the Urban Regulations. We highlight the heraldic shield of the Feliu de Cabrera lords on the main façade that confirms the ancestry of such a stately property. Other added values are its annexed buildings: stables for a 12-horse stud, as well as for cattle and sheep, a tool shed, etc. etc. Farm of great agricultural value since ancient times because its lands are irrigated with water from the Serra de Tramuntana. Appropriate for the planting of about 2000 olive trees if it were in the interest of the buyer. The farm is fenced with a dry stone wall and wire fence, it has 2 water wells that provide domestic needs, livestock and irrigation. It has eight hours of water a week from the ditch in Baster. The Baster ditch, as well as the remains of the Font de la Vila or “Ayn al-amir”, (the fountain of the Emir) are the remains of one of the largest hydraulic works of the 10th century that still remain in the streets of Palma and that they gave drink to the people of Palma from eleven centuries ago.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Secar de la Real, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: House in Diseminado 4112- Secar de la Real

description: Opportunity to enjoy this magnificent new development in the centre of the picturesque, welcoming and peaceful village of Calvià. It is a private complex made up of eight modern semi-detached houses with high quality materials used to build this idyllic residential complex, from which you can easily access the beaches of Santa Ponsa, Palmanova, as well as all the tourist and gastronomic activity of the southwest of the island, The well-known port of Andratx is only five kilometres away, so it is a great idea if you wish to have a second home on the island or simply want to live in a modern environment, but with a rustic touch that allows you to combine daily activities with a natural and relaxed environment. The complex will have a private swimming pool that will give you the possibility to enjoy the sunny summer days just a few metres away from your home. The villas are between 120 m² and 136 m² depending on your choice of purchase. They all have the following layout. From the main entrance we access a hall that leads us to the first floor, where we find a large bedroom with fitted wardrobes, a bathroom, the spacious living room with integrated modern kitchen and the terrace area with a small garden with a Japandi style. To access the first floor we find the main staircase which is very comfortable and spacious, which leads us to a new distribution hall from which we can access the master bedroom en suite with a modern and functional bathroom that has divided into two separate rooms providing privacy to this space. On this floor there is a second bedroom and a bathroom, also from the main hall that distributes the spaces we can access a large solarium type terrace, from where we can have a panoramic view of the mountain and the entire sector of common areas of the community. All the rooms have built-in wardrobes, as well as the excellent use of the communal areas, which have also been used for storage and a small attic built in the area below the staircase. From the first floor terrace we can access the parking area through a nice staircase. We invite you to visit this complex because it is an opportunity that you should not miss.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Calvià pueblo, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house

description: Beautiful penthouse apartment with panoramic sea views and terrace for sale in Bonanova. The property offers a 110 m2 living area distributed over an open plan living/dining area, a modern fitted kitchen, 2 double bedrooms, 1 spacious bathroom and a 10 m2 terrace overlooking the harbour. The apartment also leads up to a 55 m2 private roof terrace with 180º sea views. Additional features:  Built-in wardrobes in the bedrooms, fireplace, underfloor heating. Year of construction/renovation: 1960/2000. The building has only 7 units and with low service charges (60 euros/month). There is possibility to rent a parking space close by. Please don’t hesitate to contact us for a viewing of this beautiful property.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Bonanova - Porto Pi, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Ladies and gentlemen we present a private villa with pool 4 bedrooms 2 bathrooms and large garage in El Toro. This wonderful villa has in large outdoor space in front of the house with private pool. You enter from a large porch from where you can dine with privacy by the pool. The living room is brightly lit and very large connected to a dining room and the completely reformed new kitchen. On the second floor we find four comfortable bedrooms and two full bathrooms. The whole property has double-glazed windows. The rooms are very large with built-in closets. A large garage with covered driveway allowing parking for up to 5 cars completes this beautiful property. El toro has a marina, called Port Adriano, and three small beaches. It borders the Sta Ponsa II golf course to the north, the Nueva Santa Ponsa urbanization to the west, and the Son Ferrer urbanization to the east. It is part of the Paseo Calviá, known as the municipality's green lung. Come and discover this wonderful property on the most beautiful island in the world. Leave your whatsapp contact to be contacted directly. Agent  Dr Matteo Belotti King Mallorca Real Estate.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Toro, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Project for a spacious and modern villa in the quiet and popular residential area of Cala Vinyas and only a few minutes drive from various marinas, beaches, shopping and golf courses. On a plot of approx. 1,375 m² a villa of approx. 475 m² with 5 bedrooms and 5 bathrooms is being built here. A spacious pool with terraces and a garage for 2 cars is also provided. In this project, the buyer at this time can still directly influence the equipment according to his individual wishes and needs.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cala Vinyes, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: This modern style apartment with a sea view terrace is located in a first line community with a luxury feeling and direct access to the sea in San Agustin. It has a living area of 130 m2 with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (one en-suite), a large open living room and kitchen and a laundry room. The living room and the master bedroom have access to the 26 m2 south-west facing terrace with amazing views of the beautiful garden, pool area, sea and Cala Nova marina. The whole apartment is equipped with air conditioning and underfloor heating. Also included are 1 parking space, storage room, concierge, indoor- and outdoor community pools, gym and full access to the exotic and well kept garden.

description: Terraced house with sea views, Approx. 185m2, living-dining room with direct access to the terrace, fully fitted kitchen with dining area, 4 bedrooms, dressing rooms, 4 bathrooms en suite, toilet, laundry room, parquet floors, double glazing, air conditioning hot/cold, 2 parking spaces, community swimming pool. Furnished.

description: This ground floor apartment, in need of a renovation, with a large terrace is located in upcoming district El Terreno in Palma. Close to the sea front promenade, harbor and the Bellver Park with its particular round castle and green area. The constructed area of 105 m2 has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a separate kitchen with adjacent laundry area and a living/dining room with chimney and access to the 20 m2 terrace. This apartment has great potential with an update to turn in to a modern and delightful home. The community has a lovely roof terrace with sun beds, a dining table and views over the roof tops, Tramuntana mountains and glimpse of sea view. Included are a storage room of 12 m2 and one parking space in garage.
