neighborhood: Son Roca - Son Ximelis - Son Anglada
description: This beautiful 3-storey Mansion located very close to Palma on a large plot with well-kept gardens and swimming pool. Built in 1900 but completely refurbished in 2017, a fresh update and modern luxury. Its terraces offer a fantastic view over the garden, the city of Palma and the bay. This villa located on a plot of almost 9,000 m2 is a true oasis of calm and is surrounded by a garden with grass and Mediterranean nature. It has an elevator that connects the 3 levels of the villa and can also be reached by a staircase to two rooftop solariums. The façade is cobbled with local stones and beautiful Spanish shutters cover the large glass windows.In addition, it has a huge 200-square-meter garage and an outdoor Jacuzzi. The access to the main villa is really charming since you will find a large hundred-year-old olive tree guarding the porch that covers the main door. The villa has 6 large bedrooms, 5 bathrooms and a guest toilet, 2 living rooms, a dining room with direct access to the kitchen, a large laundry room and another living room on the upper floor, with a large panoramic window, which offers a fantastic view over the garden, the city of Palma and the bay. All bedrooms have a dressing room, two of them have a shared dressing room and a bathroom with separate doors.4 bedrooms are on the first floor and the other 2 double bedrooms are on the second floor.All floors of the villa have underfloor heating and air conditioning throughout. It also has a guest house separated from the main house, in the garden and consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room and separate kitchen and a bathroom, as well as a study directly connected to another bedroom and bathroom. This building can be rented or used for staff. For more information and to visit us, contact us at.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Roca - Son Ximelis - Son Anglada, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Estate in Camino de Jesús

description: This ground floor apartment with terrace is located in a beautiful and very well-kept gated community in Bendinat, a short stroll from the beautiful sandy beaches in Illetas and the Royal Bendinat Golf course, restaurants and only a short drive from Palma city centre. The living area of 108 m2 has 2 bedrooms, one with access to the terrace, 2 bathrooms (1 en-suite), kitchen and a spacious living room with dining area and access to the 20 m2 terrace with further direct access to the beautiful Mediterranean communal garden and pool area. One storage room and parking space in garage are included.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Illetes, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de l'Arquitecte Francesc Cases

description: This spectacular and unique penthouse with a very spacious terrace with outstanding panoramic sea view is located near the sandy beaches in Illetas. The recently completely renovated living area of 175 m2 has 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms en-suite, 1 guest toilet, the master bedroom has a private terrace and one of the en-suite bathrooms. There is an elegant open plan kitchen, a stylish and spacious dining and living room with access to the amazing 309 m2 terrace with the fantastic panoramic sea view. This beautiful outside space offers a dining area, lounge area, outdoor kitchen, infinity plunge pool and outdoor shower. There are 2 garage parking spaces and 2 storage rooms included and the community has a well maintained garden and pool area.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Illetes, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Paseo illetas

description: Welcome to this stunning real estate expose of a beautiful end house located in a gated community in St. Ponsa, Southwest Mallorca. This magnificent property offers breathtaking sea views and is surrounded by a big community garden, making it an ideal place for those who want to relax and enjoy the natural beauty of the island. The highlight of this property is the lagoon pool, which is 50 meters long and perfect for swimming and cooling off on a hot summer day. The pool is surrounded by lush greenery and palm trees, creating a serene and tropical atmosphere that will leave you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. The house itself boasts a spacious living area of 225 sqm spread across 3 floors, with a big living space on the ground floor that seamlessly integrates with the kitchen. The living room opens onto a beautiful outside terrace, which is perfect for enjoying meals with friends and family or just relaxing in the sun. The property also features a large basement/garage of 85 sqm, which provides ample space for storage and parking. There are 4 bedrooms and three bathrooms in total, making it perfect for families or those who want to entertain guests. The bedrooms are spacious and comfortable, with plenty of natural light streaming in through the windows. One of the biggest selling points of this property is its location - it is situated in the first line to the sea, right next to Port Adriano, which is a popular marina and a hub for water sports enthusiasts. The property can be renovated and upgraded to suit your specific taste and needs, making it a great investment opportunity for those looking to purchase a property in this highly sought-after area. In summary, this stunning end house in a gated community in St. Ponsa, Southwest Mallorca offers sea views, a big community garden, a lagoon pool, a spacious living area, a basement/garage, and is located in the first line to the sea, making it the perfect investment opportunity for those looking to purchase a property in this highly sought-after area.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: House

description: Who does not dream of this! To own a dream property just a few steps from the sandy beach and some of the hottest bars and restaurants in the southwest of Mallorca. This high quality and completely refurbished flat has just been completed in 2022 and leaves nothing to be desired. Three-pane sliding windows can be slid into any position via a flush-floor track, creating a seamless transition between the living space and terrace. The high-quality Santos kitchen with extra-thin fronts, handleless doors, Neff and Miele electrical appliances, dishwasher with sensoropen, fridge-freezer, handleless elements with push-to-open and pushclos as well as fully integrated wine cooler with touch control are a real highlight and ideally integrated into the living concept. Mallorcan stone flooring in the flat and balcony as well as ceiling-high doors and customised joinery reflect the high quality standards. The residence is in remodelling mode until the end of the year and will appear in new splendour upon final completion. The purchase price includes the entire and very high quality furniture.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Portals Nous - Bendinat, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

address: subdistrict Son Roca - Son Ximelis - Son Anglada
neighborhood: Son Roca - Son Ximelis - Son Anglada
description: Discover the opportunity to acquire a detached villa in the wonderful residential area of Son Puig, in Mallorca. Located next to Son Vida and the three most popular golf courses on the island (Son Muntaner, Son Quint, and Son Vida), this property offers tranquility, convenience, and easy access to all services within walking distance. In addition, the Green Valley International School is just a few minutes' walk away, ideal for families with school-age children. Built in 2007, this spacious 440m2 home is located on a 578 m2 plot, spread over two floors plus a large basement. On the ground floor, you will find a cozy living-dining room that gives access to a porch perfect for enjoying your moments of rest, a fully equipped kitchen, a double bedroom, and a bathroom. On the top floor is the main bedroom with a dressing room and en suite bathroom, two double bedrooms, and a shared bathroom. All bedrooms share and have access to a large terrace. In the basement, the property has a garage, a storage room, and a laundry room, offering everything you need for your comfort. Enjoy gas heating, air conditioning, fitted wardrobes, and double-glazed windows, ensuring a comfortable and cozy environment at any time of the year. This property is the perfect opportunity to find a new home for you and your family. Do not hesitate to ask us for more information, and we will arrange a visit to show you all the possibilities it offers. Don't miss this unique opportunity in the Son Puig area!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Roca - Son Ximelis - Son Anglada, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: This elegant 3-bedroom, south-facing apartment offers spectacular views of the Bay of Palma. The home is completely renovated including walls, electricity, plumbing, built-in air conditioning, underfloor heating, sound system, wooden floors, ceiling, windows, doors, ventilation, bathrooms, laundry room, absolutely everything. The kitchen from Nolte is site-built with German appliances of high quality and has an open floor plan with an open work kitchen ending with a bar counter facing the living room and dining area. All with direct access to the spacious terrace with a fantastic view of the green surroundings and the sea. It is a spacious floor with hallway, master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and plenty of wardrobes and 2 further bedrooms sharing a bathroom. The house is sold fully furnished. The building is located in a prestigious area, is well maintained and has a communal pool and covered parking spaces where one is included in the price of this property. Ready for moving in April / May 2023. Cas Català is a popular residential area just a few minutes by car from Palma. Here is a year-round infrastructure with cafes, restaurants, beaches, international schools, medical center, grocery stores, bakeries, a harbor with many activity opportunities such as sailing school, Stand Up Paddling, kayak rental, etc. Bendinat's royal golf course and the famous luxury marina of Puerto Portals are also nearby.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cas Catala, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: In the picturesque and increasingly privileged town of Calvia is this wonderful family town house built in 2008 located in an environment that stands out for its tranquility and pleasant unobstructed views. The lower floor welcomes us with a spacious hall, with access to a spacious and cozy living room with fireplace.It also has a double room and a complete bathroom.Again from the hall we have access to a large open kitchen with a pantry, fully equipped with access to the laundry room and the outside porch of the house. Very cozy house of 161 m² built, all the rooms are exterior, in addition to 2 terraces on the upper floor with views of the town of Calvia and the "Serra de Tramuntana" The upper floor, dedicated to the rest area, is distributed in two double bedrooms and a complete bathroom with shower and bathtub.The larger master bedroom has a dressing room and access to an outdoor terrace from which to contemplate the beautiful and well-maintained garden and at the same time magnificent unobstructed views.Also on the same floor, in the hallway, there are spacious and useful built-in wooden wardrobes. It is also worth noting the wonderful state of the outdoor area.The house has two entrances; the main door and an electric barrier for vehicle access, there is outdoor parking for 2 or 3 cars. The exterior of the house stands out for its partial lining in Mallorcan stone combined with a beautiful satin finish, high-quality flooring. The house welcomes us with a fantastic, well-kept Mediterranean garden area. The main part of the garden with sprinkler irrigation system, located in the rear area, has a clear 3.5m x 7m pool, accompanied by the porch area with exposed beam. The property was conscientiously built with very good qualities and detail, on a plot of approximately 400 m2. The house has an air conditioning system (hot and cold) through a duct.The interior carpentry is white lacquered, the climalit windows have a thermal bridge, exterior carpentry with white Majorcan blinds in PVC. The house is located just 5 minutes walk from the town center, where all the necessary services are available for day to day, such as; Pharmacy, small supermarkets, bank, restaurants and bars, hardware store, medical center, Town Hall, theater, Casa Monday ecological market, parks, schools, green areas, etc... Highlighting, in turn, the great variety of hiking and cycling routes and the most beautiful sunsets on the island. In short, a magnificent family home with high-quality finishes and in very good condition, in the increasingly popular town of Calvia.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Calvià pueblo, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Spectacular villa in the highest part of Puntiró. It is located in a very quiet area near the Puntiró golf course. This spectacular villa has impressive views of the bay of Palma and the tramontana. It is made with very good taste, in the Mediterranean style, with a natural stone façade, with top quality materials, and has been thought of in all the details for the most absolute convenience and comfort. This exclusive property has a plot of 7286 m2, with a construction of 679 m2. The house consists of a basement, a ground floor and a first floor. In the basement we have: a very spacious garage for 2 large cars and a space for motorcycles and bicycles. We have 2 very spacious spaces, one of which could be converted into a guest apartment with 2 bedrooms, a bathroom and a living room, and the other could be converted into a gym, a workshop, a wine cellar or whatever you want. On the ground floor we have: hall, toilet, a large living room with fireplace, large doors and windows with access to the terrace, a large fully equipped kitchen-dining room with fireplace. All spaces are very bright and welcoming. We also have 2 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, a dressing room and a large mezzanine with a very cozy room where it invites us to rest. On the first floor we have: a very spacious and bright master bedroom with large windows with access to the terrace, where we can enjoy the impressive views, dressing room and bathroom. Outside the house we have a pool with a terrace of natural stone floors, where we can enjoy views of the sea and mountains and a beautiful garden. We also have a barbecue area with summer kitchen and toilet. The farm is surrounded by trees and Mediterranean vegetation with colorful flowers. Materials and qualities: This property is distinguished by the quality of its construction materials, from the reinforced concrete of its walls, to the materials inside. Interior doors and beams are made of noble wood, all wooden beams are treated, interior paint of the best quality, manual clay floors, aluminum windows with double glazing and security, all also with security locks, underfloor heating in The whole house has Lan cable, fiber optics, electricity from Endesa and solar panels, running water from the street and 2 rainwater collection cisterns. The farm is completely closed with a stone wall and a grid. This property can be the house of your dreams, where you can enjoy its beauty and comfort. Do not hesitate to call us for a visit.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Puntiró, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Magnificent classic villa in a quiet residential area with views both towards Palma's cathedral and Bellverslottet. The property was built in 2000 and has only had one owner, it is a practical home filled with natural light and built to a high standard. The location is secluded, with complete privacy and there is also no traffic on the street as the villa is on a cul-de-sac. There are two entrance gates from the street. A large gate with electronic opening where you drive the car into the garage and a smaller gate in front of the passage to the main entrance. On the entrance floor, there is first the hall and a guest toilet.  From the hall there are double doors into the dining room and the living room, both of which have large windows with a panoramic view of Palma and the private pool.  Sliding doors out to the large terrace of approx. 50 square meters provide the opportunity to extend the living room and integrate outside with inside. In the living room there is a stove that provides good heat in winter and has a high cozy factor. Outside the living room facing Palma city is a smaller terrace of approx. 9 sqm. After the dining area is the kitchen with a separate "everyday" dining area. Here are large windows overlooking the terraces and Palma including the cathedral. Via sliding doors you get out onto the terrace also from the kitchen. The gas stove in the kitchen is from Smeg. The kitchen is spacious with room for many. Behind the kitchen is a laundry room. On the second floor are the four bedrooms, all of which have room for double beds. Master bedroom has sliding doors to the terrace of approx. 22 sqm. The view here is towards the Bellver castle.  There are also three bathrooms on this floor. From the basement via the entrance floor, a beautiful beige 1.40 m wide marble staircase leads and up to the bedroom section on the first floor. The stair handrail is made of stainless steel, which gives a modern and elegant touch to the classic marble. The entire house has beige marble floors that add to the light feel and classic style. The walls are painted in a sober light tone. Internal doors are made of solid oak and every room throughout the house has individual gas heating with elements. The house has an alarm system from Securitas. Under the terrace on the first floor is a cistern that holds 45,000 liters of water. It is possible to connect the cistern to the roof to collect rainwater. This water is used to water plants and fill up the pool and in the event of a power outage there is always extra water. The garage has parking space for up to 3 cars. In the basement there is a bathroom with two separate showers and a toilet, which means that you can easily make a gym here. The room is full of light and also has a door that leads directly to the garden where the pool is located. There is another spacious room at the back of the garage, currently used as storage and showroom. This room can be converted into, for example, a private cinema/teenage room. The house is perfect for a family that wants to live close to central Palma in a quiet location. Walking distance: La Caixa Bank approx. 3 min Mercadona large, well-stocked grocery store approx. 5 min Clinica Juaneda, hospital about 7 min San Cayetano, Palma's largest school approx. 3 min Escuela del Sagrado Corazon smaller school about 5 min Swedish School approx. 20 min Lycée Français de Palma, school approx. 10 min Distance by car: Son Moix football arena and sports facility approx. 7 min Juaneda Miramar Hospital approx. 7 min Palma center approx. 10 min.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Dureta, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: This wonderful townhouse which measures 100 m² with three bedrooms, two bathrooms plus two terraces was renovated with light and refreshing colours in 2021. You will find the living room and open plan kitchen with one bathroom and terraces on the same level. The morning coffee is best enjoyed on the terrace in the front and after a day on the beach relax in the shaded and cozy back terrace. The bedrooms are situated on the upper floor and share a large bathroom. The master bedroom has a french balcony with fabulous views over the sea. You can look out over the Bay of Palma from the community´s relaxing pool area. One parking space is included in the price. Illetas Beach and Puro Beach Club are both within walking distance. A selection of nice restaurants can also be found nearby. The bus to Palma leaves regularly just outside the door. Please contact us for more information and viewings.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Illetes, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house

description: PENTHOUSE WITH SPECTACULAR TERRACE AND VIEWS Impressive penthouse with stunning views of the city, sea, and mountains. It is located in one of the best and most demanded areas of Palma: Son Españolet. Just a few minutes from the famous area of Santa Catalina, the center of Palma, and the school area. With excellent access to the freeway. From its terraces, you can enjoy the Mediterranean climate and the views they offer of the sea, Bellver Castle, Na Burguesa, the Cathedral, and part of the city. With a total of 156 m2 corresponding to the house, and almost 86 m2 to terrace. Its distribution is as follows: -Spacious and bright living room with double height, overlooking the Bellver Castle. It has access to a terrace on the ground floor and the upper terrace of almost 87 m2. -Large kitchen, furnished and equipped, with office area and access to the laundry room. -It has 3 double rooms with the possibility of 4 since a multifunctional diaphanous area could be easily adapted to change. All rooms are equipped with built-in closets. The main bedroom has a dressing area and en suite bathroom (with bathtub and shower). -Another bathroom serves the rest of the bedrooms. Upper terrace: Of large dimensions and spectacular panoramic views of the sea, the mountains, and part of the city, it includes a dining area with barbecue and a fully equipped kitchen, as well as a "Chill Out" area. It is an ideal place to enjoy meetings with friends and family. Parking space and storage room with direct access from the elevator. Marble floors. Interior oak carpentry and exterior aluminum with double glazing. Air conditioning hot/cold pump. Heating radiators city gas. Skylights with an electric opening in bathrooms provide natural light.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Espanyolet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: This beautiful apartment in Palma de Mallorca has a perfect location, in the center of the island's capital, with good access to several international shops and restaurants, as well as public transport.The attractive apartment has a constructed area of approx.82 m2 that are distributed as follows: a bright living room with access to the balcony, a furnished and equipped kitchen, 2 beautiful bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, 1 bathroom, as well as a utility room.The equipment features of this attractive apartment in Palma include: air conditioning, electric heating, wooden windows and parquet flooring.It is in a perfect situation, in the heart of Palma, in the famous Santa Catalina neighbourhood, known for its international bars and restaurants, as well as a traditional market full of delicious local products.The apartment is a few minutes walk from the famous streets such as Jaime III and Paseo Mallorca or the Paseo Marítimo, where you can play sports, take a walk and enjoy delicious meals in the excellent restaurants located on the seafront.The international airport is only 10 minutes away by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Despuig

description: Located on the 2nd floor of a small family building, we present this wonderful penthouse in Coll d'en Rabassa. The sunny south-east facing property offers a living space of approx. 120 m2 and a spectacular roof terrace of approx. 87 m2 with fantastic sea views. The attractive home is divided into a bright living/dining room, a beautiful open kitchen, 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, one of which is en-suite. The impressive roof terrace invites you to enjoy and spend pleasant moments with friends and family. Other features: Jatoba wood flooring, air conditioning with heat pump, aluminum Majorcan shutters and Siroca wood doors. All furniture is included in the sale price. In addition, there is the possibility of renting or buying a parking space. It is a perfect apartment for lovers of the sun, the beach and the wonderful Mediterranean atmosphere. The center of the capital Palma de Mallorca and the international airport are only a few minutes away by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Coll d'En Rabassa, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle del Cardenal Rossell

description: GROUND FLOOR WITH GARDEN AND TERRACES A FEW MINUTES FROM THE BEACH *VIRTUAL PICTURES SHOWING HOW IT WOULD LOOK WITH A LITTLE RENOVATION  In the Sometimes area, just a few minutes walking from the beach, we find this bright first floor with a separate entrance, a large private garden, and several porches. Although it is an original building, it is in perfect preservation. It is a chalet-type building with only 4 houses. No community fees. The house is about 120 m2 plus another 162 m2 of garden and private porches; it has the following distribution: -Spacious and bright living room with direct access to the outside. -Independent kitchen, furnished, and access to the laundry room. -3 double bedrooms, with built-in closet. -2 bathrooms with shower In the garden itself, there is space to leave a car or use it as a terrace. Stoneware floors. Interior carpentry of North and exterior carpentry of wood with double glazing. Majorcan shutters. Air conditioning is hot/cold in the living room and two bedrooms.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Les Maravelles, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Only 1 km from the prestigious port of Port Adriano, we present this wonderful apartment in El Toro, an attractive family town in the southwest of Mallorca. The bright apartment is located on the 1st floor of a completely renovated small building and consists of a constructed area of approx. 120 m2 that is divided as follows: A spacious living-/dining room with fireplace and access to an impressive semi-covered terrace of approx. 15 m2, a nice kitchen with utility room, 2 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes (one of them with access to the same terrace) and a bathroom. It is a very bright house a short distance from the beach and surrounded by all the necessary services such as a pharmacy, hairdresser's and parks. Other features: Air conditioning, parquet flooring, 2 private covered parking spaces and community storage room. This fantastic apartment in El Toro is being sold fully furnished. El Toro is a prized residential area close to the beautiful port of Port Adriano. Port Adriano offers a wide variety of excellent restaurants and shops. The center of Palma is 23 km away and the "Son Sant Joan" airport is 33 km away.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Toro, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Plaza Migdia

description: This wonderful renovated penthouse in Palma is located on the 3rd floor of one of the most emblematic palaces in the historic old town of Palma. The luxurious property stands out for its warm and welcoming atmosphere and its magnificent unique location. The generous constructed area of approx. 215 m2 is divided as follows: A beautiful 2-storey living-/dining room, a fully furnished and equipped modern kitchen, 3 double bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (one of them en suite). Additionally, the master bedroom offers an impressive dressing area. Other features: wooden floors, Majorcan shutters, radiator heating and pre-installation for air conditioning. The building has an elevator, doorman and community gardens. At your disposal there are 2 parking spaces in the same building and a storage room. The picturesque historic center of Palma, also called the "old town", is where the essential tourist attractions to visit are located, such as the majestic cathedral "La Seu", the Royal Palace of the Almudaina and the Museum of Contemporary Art of Es Baluard.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Jaume, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de Sant Jaume

description: This beautiful penthouse in El Terreno is located in a quiet street near the port, the Paseo Marítimo and the fashionable Santa Catalina neighborhood. A total of 8 new and exclusive Scandinavian designed flats are being built here. The completion of the work is scheduled for the end of spring 2023. Clear lines, structures and bright rooms will create a pleasant atmosphere and a high level of living comfort. All homes will have high quality parquet, tiles, built-in air conditioning, heating and underfloor heating in the bathrooms. The penthouse has a living area of approximately 86 m2, which is divided as follows: an open living/dining room, an American kitchen, 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The highlight is the huge roof terrace of approximately 69 m2 with a beautiful view of the sea and the port. All residential units have an underground parking space and a practical storage room. El Terreno is one of the most attractive neighborhoods in Palma and is within walking distance of the bustling center of the island's capital. Palma offers a huge cultural offer, an excellent gastronomic variety and numerous shops and boutiques. This penthouse in Palma-El Terreno is an oasis in the middle of one of the most popular and vibrant cities in Europe, with a cosmopolitan touch and a direct location on the Mediterranean Sea.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Terreno, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de Georges Bernanos

address: Carretera el T Carretera Magaluf-S. Ponsa
description: This recently renovated apartment in El Toro offers a fabulous view of the Mediterranean Sea and the port of Port Adriano due to its indescribable location on the seafront. The modern property has a bright living space of approx. 65 m2 divided into a spacious living/dining room with pre-installation for a kitchen, 2 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 2 bathrooms. The direct proximity to the luxurious marina of Port Adriano, as well as to the countless golf courses in the southwest of Mallorca, make this sunny apartment an ideal vacation property. Other features are: Air conditioning, underfloor heating, double glazed windows, storage room and a community parking space. El Toro is a small town in the southwest of Mallorca. Port Adriano is one of Mallorca's newest marinas and offers a wide range of international restaurants and shopping facilities.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Toro, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Carretera el t Carretera Magaluf-S. Ponsa

description: Just 5 minutes from the beach we present this fantastic new build apartment in Arenal. The bright property is located on the 2nd floor of a small building with an elevator and will be delivered fully furnished. The cozy constructed area of approx. 67 m2 is divided into a nice living-/ dining room with access to a terrace of approx. 30 m2 with unobstructed views, a beautiful modern and open kitchen, 2 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, one of them with an en-suite bathroom and terrace, and another complete bathroom. Extras: Air conditioning hot/cold, large sliding windows with double glazing and utility room with washing machine included. The apartment is of high quality and tastefully furnished. In the Arenal area you can enjoy beautiful beaches, the marina, several international restaurants and cafes. Here you can also find various shopping opportunities and public transport with excellent connections.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: S'Arenal, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida Europa

description: This fantastic apartment in Portals Nous with pool and garden views offers a unique opportunity to enjoy the luxurious lifestyle of Puerto Portals. The property is located in a private community, which has a wonderful well-kept garden and a refreshing communal pool. The attractive property has a constructed area of approx. 121 m2 that is divided into a spacious living-/ dining room with access to a spectacular terrace with views of the exclusive port of Puerto Portals, a kitchen, 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The community gives direct access to the port with a wide variety of international restaurants, bars and high-end boutiques. The apartment is equipped with a sound system, air conditioning h/c, electric heating, fitted wardrobes and double glazed windows. Puerto Portals is widely known as the most glamorous marina on the island, located in the southwest of the island just 10 minutes drive from the center of Palma.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Portals Nous - Bendinat, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Benito Jerónimo Feijóo

description: VILLA WITH POOL IN CENTRAL LOCATION OF PORTALS NOUS This is a light and spacious detached family villa in an ideal location in the centre of Portals Nous village. The house is constructed on a large plot of approx. 1.420 m², with constructed area of 291 m², is distributed over two floors as follows: entrance hall, large open-plan living and dining room with direct access to the terrace, fully fitted kitchen, four double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and two bathrooms. There is a separate guest apartment underneath with kitchen, bedroom and bathroom. Additional extra features include double glazing throughout, gas oil central heating, air conditioning in the bedrooms and a piped music system in all rooms.   The property offers plenty of outside space where family and friends can relax and enjoy the warm Mediterranean climate and year-round sunshine. It is surrounded by several open and covered terraces with BBQ and outdoor dining areas, a delightful garden and a large swimming pool. The villa also benefits from a garage. There is ample storage space.  The property has been well maintained by its current owners and is in excellent condition and offers much potential either as a holiday home or permanent residence. The villa is conveniently situated within walking distance of Portals Nous centre with its wide range of amenities and services. The local area is home to several excellent international schools, the prestigious Bendinat Golf Club and the exclusive marina of Puerto Portals. Various sandy beaches are within close proximity. The area is well connected by motorway and the city of Palma and international airport are just a short drive away.  .
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Portals Nous - Bendinat, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: LUXURY VILLA IN BENDINAT Luxury villa in Bendinat with views over the golf course and partial sea views. The living area is distributed into the main house and the guest house. Main house Ground floor: living/dining room with fireplace, fully equipped open kitchen, one bedroom en suite, office/library, laundry room, guest toilet, terrace, patio, wine cellar. First floor: Master bedroom with walk in wardrobe, own terrace and bathroom en suite, 3rd bedroom with bathroom en suite. Basement: garage and storage. Guest house: bedroom, kitchenette, bathroom The house is equipped with central heating system through the house and underfloor heating in the main bedroom and bathroom, air conditioning, parquet and stone floors, lift (connecting 3 floors). It has various terraces, garden, pool, garage in the basement and a separate garage outside. BENDINAT: The popular residential area of Bendinat enjoys a prime coastal location. Minutes away from the popular Puerto Portals marina and the village of Portals Nous. There are many international schools located in this area and there are an abundance of shops, restaurants and all medical facilities. The prestigious Golf de Bendinat club is located in this area. The closest beaches are those of Illetas, Bendinat and Portals and the motorway is within easy access to Palma City. The Airport is between 10 - 15 minutes car journey.  .
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Portals Nous - Bendinat, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Architect-designed apartment that is a positive surprise after walking up 3 flights of stairs in a dark stairwell. Here is light and airy, well thought out and practical with clean lines. An elegant residence within walking distance to everything Palma has to offer! From the beautiful, renovated original front door, you have a smaller hall with the open working kitchen opposite and the spacious living room with dining area to the right. The room ends with a bay window. To the left of the entrance is a hall which today is used as a library, next to it is the master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and a full wardrobe wall. At the end of the library is another spacious bedroom, now used as an office and music room. The entire wall facing the longitudinal balcony is a sliding glass wall, the room is flooded with light. The balcony outside is about 4 square meters and the sun shines here between 10-13 in winter time and then again about an 1 hour later in the afternoon for approx 1 more hour. In summer, when the sun is high, it is sunny here most of the day. Next to the office room is the second bathroom and a large wardrobe/storage room. The height of the ceilings in the house varies depending on the electrical installations and recessed lighting and is 3 meters at the highest points. In connection with the total renovation that was carried out in 2018, all electricity and plumbing were replaced, air conditioning was installed and so was central. The entire home has radiators in addition to the fact that the air conditioning can be used for both cooling and heating.  All windows are double-glazed, it's quiet and nice here and when you get out into the street you live in a very local neighborhood with an Eroski Supermarket, bakery, china shop (they have everything and more), pet shops, cafes, interior design shop etc and one block away is the well-known Palma Sport & Tennis Club. Diagonally across the street is trendy Santa Catalina with its wast selection of restaurants and bars and approx. 250 m straight down is Palma's beautiful harbor promenade. You live in the middle of everything and yet local and peaceful! It is also a quiet community of 6 apartments, 2 on each floor.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Armadams, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This old town apartment is located in the heart of the old town just steps from the famous street de San Jaime The property is located on the first floor, accessed through a beautiful Mallorcan courtyard. The apartment still has the original Mallorcan doors, large windows and exposed beams. The living area of 135 m2 is divided into 4 bedrooms (3 double and 1 single) 1 bathroom, a large living room with lots of light and access to a small balcony, kitchen, laundry room and 2 storage rooms. In addition, the building has a roof terrace for the community with magnificent views of the old town.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Jaume, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Amelia Inmobiliaria offers EXCLUSIVELY: Great penthouse to REFORM in Marqués de la Fontsanta, Palma de Mallorca, Illes Balears!  It is a 4th without elevator in one of the best areas of Palma.  The apartment consists of 103m2 divided into a hall, large living room- dining room, 3 double bedrooms, two of them with fitted wardrobes, and one single, 2 full bathrooms and a closed kitchen. Thanks to its windows and its orientation, the apartment enjoys a lot of light throughout the day. In addition, we have access to two balconies. One on the main facade of the property and another on the back. Excellent opportunity both for investors and for those who want to live in one of the most sought-after areas of the island. Are you going to miss it? At Amelia Inmobiliaria, we seek to digitize the real estate market and we believe in the importance of personalized treatment, generating a unique and transformative experience for each client. Feel free to contact us for more information.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Marqués de la Fontsanta, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: This light-flooded newly built villa offers plenty of space for family and friends, only a few minutes by car from the beaches of Costa Calma and Santa Ponsa. The open and fully equipped kitchen with cooking island is ideally integrated into the open living concept and has access to the terrace and also to the garden with pool and outdoor area. The large window fronts let a lot of light into the individual rooms and offer a beautiful view of the surrounding landscape. All 4 bedrooms have their own en suite bathroom. The bedrooms can be shaded with large blinds, providing additional privacy. In front of the bedrooms there is a specially designed garden with fruit trees and Mallorcan plants, reflecting the Mediterranean quality of life. In the basement there is a large carport and storage rooms, a direct access connects this area with the living level. The modern bungalow-style villa is situated in a very private location due to its special architecture and is ideally suited as a holiday property as well as a primary residence.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Costa de la Calma, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house

description: This luxorious and unique penthouse, located in the trendy neighbourhood of Santa Catalina, has spectacular 360° views of the city and the Bay of Palma.  This luminous 210 m2 penthouse has four large bedrooms, two with bathrooms en-suite and a third bathroom is available with access from the hallway. The open plan living room and kitchen with access to one of the terraces has panoramic views of the city.  Furthermore the penthouse has the following features: Four terraces in a total of about 120 m2, a wine cellar, a walk-in closet and plenty of storage/fitted wardrobes, hot/cold air conditioning and double-glazed windows.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: This flat of 125 m² is located on the first floor of a quiet building, well located in the center of Palma de Mallorca. It has  views to the main street and good floorplan, Upon entering the apartment we find a large living-dining room with exit to the balcony. A corridor leads into three bedrooms. Two of which are double and one single. The kitchen is separate and fully furnished. The bathroom has a shower and there is also the possibility of making a second bathroom. Other characteristics to highlight of the property: it has hydraulic tiled floor, it conserves the carpentry of old north, it has double glazed windows, heating/citygas and a communal terrace. It has a favourable report corresponding to the Building Evaluation Inspection required by the Palma Town Hall. Furthermore, it is located in the centre of Palma having everything close by, be it leisure, restaurants, public transport, clothes shops and many other ameneties.  You can't miss this great opportunity!

description: REDUCED PRICE! This beautiful and bright hillside property is spread over 4 levels and is located in the sought after area El Terreno. The ground floor, consisting of a spacious living/dining area, a fully equiped kitchen with laundry, a guest toilet and a terrace with access to the private pool and garage, is the heart of the house. The lower floor consisting of a large living space with bathroom, sauna and storage room has its own access to the pool and garage.  Its separate entrance makes it possible to be used as a private guest area.  The first floor consists of a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and a terrace with sea views, as well as three additional bedrooms, two of which with terrace and a shared bathroom. The upper floor consists of a large roof terrace with sea views, ideal for sunbathing.  Further benefits of this attractive property are garage with space for two cars, marble flouring, air condition units in the bedrooms, central heating and built-in closets.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Terreno, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house

description: The home is located on the 4th floor where you can enjoy the sun from morning to early evening from your balcony while looking out to sea, it's a perfect holiday home! From the front door you enter a hallway with a larger wardrobe to the left and the bathroom with shower and washing machine to the right. Thereafter is the room which has a practical kitchenette on the right with a stove, fan, microwave and fridge with freezer compartment. Furthermore in the kitchen area there is a double upper cupboard and a bar counter with storage. The remaining part of the room is furnished with a dining table and 4 chairs, 3-seater sofa, coffee table, TV and a double bed with two bedside tables and a nice curtain that goes all the way down to the floor and also serves as sun protection. Everything listed is included in the purchase. The studio is bright, very functional, it has AC for cooling/heating and is easy to maintain. Bring your suitcases, move in and enjoy having your own place in the sun! The community has an elevator and in the garden there is a large L-shaped pool with sun beds around. A parking space is also included. About 20 meters from the gate to the community is a British supermarket, around the corner is a restaurant in one direction and a café/local bar in the other direction. In 10 minutes' walk you arrive to Portal's famous harbor where you can stroll around and look at luxury yachts, luxury cars, luxury shopping or enjoy a glass of wine and a meal at one of the restaurants along the harbour. At either end of the harbor there is a beach, on of them ends with trendy Roxy Beach Club which is almost always full of happy holidaymakers. Between the residence and the harbour, directly above the harbour, there is a string of restaurants and some shops. There is both an Agromart-eco grocery store and a well-stocked supermarket which also has a good selection of quality wines. In December, the harbor has the most up market Christmas market, well worth not just one but several visits. It's a 10 minutes drive to Palma and to the airport it's a 25 minutes drive. This home is a good investment regardless of whether you intend to use it yourself or rent it out, the later is perfectly legal provided that the rental period is at least 1 month.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Portals Nous - Bendinat, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Studio apartment

description: This spacious family house is located in El Toro, a quiet exclusive area in the south-west of Mallorca. This 180m2 property is set on a 500m2 plot. The ground floor offers a bright open plan living/dining area, a large fitted kitchen with a breakfast island, utility room, 1 double bedroom and 1 bathroom. From the living area there is access to a covered terrace with lounge and dining space, a large swimming pool, a garden and plenty of room for parking. The upper floor offers 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The master bedroom has an en suite bathroom, a dressing room and access to a terrace. The other bathroom is separate the the second bedroom. From this level there is access to a spacious roof terrace with mountain views. Additionally there is a basement with rooms for multi-purpose use and plenty of storage. The house has been fitted with a new front door and new windows and there is also hot/cold air conditioning throughout.

description: Welcome to this stunning newly renovated modern villa, where luxury and technology seamlessly blend to provide you with the ultimate living experience. This villa boasts a state-of-the-art home control system, allowing you to control the air conditioning, underfloor heating, and lighting with ease. The tasteful and warm yet modern design is evident throughout the property, with no detail overlooked. The first floor features an open plan kitchen, dining, and living area, perfect for entertaining guests. The bright and airy space is illuminated by natural light that floods in from the terrace on the same level, offering partial sea views and creating a warm and inviting ambiance. The bottom floor is home to three large double bedrooms, each exquisitely decorated and designed to provide maximum comfort and relaxation. Two of the bedrooms come with en suite bathrooms, while the master bedroom boasts an impressive walk-in wardrobe. The master bedroom also provides direct access to the lovely pool and outdoor area, where you can bask in the sun and enjoy the refreshing water. With the home control system, you can adjust the air conditioning to your desired temperature, ensuring that you always feel comfortable in every room. The underfloor heating system provides warmth throughout the villa, making it cozy and inviting even on cooler days. The lighting system can be easily controlled to create the perfect ambiance for any occasion. Overall, this villa is the epitome of modern luxury and sophistication. Its impeccable design, coupled with its advanced home control system and prime location, makes it an ideal retreat for those seeking comfort, relaxation, and style.

description: Contact us for a virtual tour. This three-storey penthouse is located in the heart of the old town of Palma, Mallorca. The living area of approx. 140 m² is distributed over three floors in an old historical building with only 4 residential units, close to the Plaza Mayor. On the 4th floor the reception area with charming balcony opens onto a bright and spacious living-dining room with open kitchen, separate guest toilet, dressing room, a double bedroom with a modern en-suite bathroom and a large bedroom currently used as a living room. fitness. On the 5th floor there is a double bedroom with a modern en-suite bathroom and access to the large and sunny roof terrace. On the top floor is the impressive study/office, also here is a terrace with spectacular far-reaching views over the entire old town of Palma to the sea, framed on the sides by the foothills of the Tramuntana. Other features: modern ISO wooden windows, partly from floor to ceiling, air conditioning, old doors made of solid North Pine wood, old terracotta floors, exposed wooden beams, cable and SAT antenna in all rooms. Contact us for more information or for a visit. All information without guarantee. Kensington reference: KPP06817.

description: This Mallorquín stone house situated in the picturesque village of Es Capdella in south-west Mallorca. The house has a 296 m2 constructed area and sits on a huge 1044 m2 plot with a completely fenced landscaped garden. The property offers spectacular views over its natural surrounding and to the Galatzo, one of the highest mountains of Mallorca. The property has a bright open living room with a fireplace, a large well equipped kitchen with a separate dining area, 4 spacious bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. Two of the bedrooms have en suite bathrooms and the other 2 bedrooms share a bathroom. There is an office space on the ground floor which could be changed into a 5th bedroom. There is air conditioning in all 4 of the bedrooms but not the living space. There is existing pipework, so it would be easy to add air conditioning to the kitchen and living area. Apart from the large swimming pool with unobstructed view of the mountains, the outdoor area offers a landscaped garden with delicious lemon trees, a covered terrace with various sunny and shady areas, perfect for lounging and dining. The swimming pool has a heating system and a cooling mechanism and also has a solid roller shutter cover for the winter. There is a spacious driveway and a sheltered area for parking.

description: Beautiful stonewall semi-detached house for sale in the quiet and stunning area of Puigpunyent, in center-west Mallorca. The living room has a fireplace and opens out to a large covered terrace, itself leading to another open chill-out terrace and the lovely garden. This is the perfect opportunity for a family looking for either a permanent or second home away from the hassle of the cities while, as the same time, being within a reasonable distance of all the facilities the island has to offer.

description: Located in Esporles with a central location but at the same time very quiet, this beautiful house with patio and corral designed on one floor, can become your forever home. A house where you will make new memories with your family, you will rest and you will feel comfortable from the first day. The general characteristics of this house are the following: • Location: Esporles • 100 useful m2 • 2 double rooms • 1 complete bathroom with bathtub • 222 m2 plot • 100 m2 Corral with patio, terrace and garden • Extras: Rainwater tank, AA/CC hot-cold in the living room, beautiful newly renovated, in addition: new ceilings, electricity and plumbing. • IMPORTANT: It allows building one more floor in height This functional house on the ground floor located in Esporles consists of 100 m2 of interior space. When you enter the house for the first time, you will find a cozy and spacious hall that will make it easier for you to leave your belongings to move more easily. As you continue, you will reach the bright and spacious living-dining room with direct access to the garden. The quintessential place in the house where you will surely spend incredible moments with your family and friends. But in addition, it will also be a place where you can relax and be calm. You will find its independent kitchen fully equipped. Designed to cover a large storage capacity, from now on you will never have any space problems again. Of the 2 bedrooms all are doubles. The main room, which enjoys dreamy natural lighting. In addition, depending on what your needs are, you can adapt one of the bedrooms and transform it into an office or dressing room, for example. Thanks to its outdoor space you will enjoy a beautiful and leafy garden, you will have a place to disconnect from household chores and enjoy the tranquility of the moment. It will also allow you to do multiple outdoor activities almost all year round thanks to the good climate of Mallorca. As an added fact, we tell you that you are allowed to build one more floor in height, being able to expand the house and build more rooms. It also has a beautiful Rainwater Cistern, AA/CC hot-cold in the living room. The house has been completely renovated, including a new roof, completely changed the beams, tiles and insulation, as well as new electricity and plumbing. If you want to know more information about this ground floor located in Esporles, call and ask us or fill out the contact form.

description: Beautiful brand new duplex of new construction in the heart of the old town, on the rooftop it has a community pool with solarium. The duplex is located on the third floor of a 4-storey building and has a total built area of 191.68 m2 square meters with a terrace of 46.95 square meters. It consists of a spacious living-dining room with an open kitchen of 62 square meters. From the house you can enjoy the beautiful views of the charm of the old town. The characteristic wooden beams on the ceiling give the house a particular charm. On the access floor to the house there is a living room with an integrated kitchen and two bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, with 2 bathrooms, one of them en suite. Both bedrooms have exposed wooden beams on their ceilings and both have a modern fitted wardrobe. On the upper floor, which is accessed by a non-spiral staircase, there is a third room, which can be used as a single bedroom or an office, a bathroom with a shower and a utility room. The plus of this house is the terrace of 46.95 square meters, with access to the community pool. From the pool and solarium on the top floor you can appreciate the wonderful views of the historic center of the city and all its charm. The building has an elevator. There is also the convenience of being able to park bicycles in the basement of the farm. description: First floor duplex in the historic center of Palma.   The wonderful duplex, located on the second floor, of 228 m2, is located in one of the most exclusive and sought after areas of Palma. It can become your new quiet and cozy home in the Paseo del Borne, at the height of the Plaza de la Reina. The main features are as follows:    • Located between La Lonja and Paseo del Borne  • First floor  • 228 m2 usable area  • 3 double bedrooms and 3 bathrooms  • Balcony  • Extras: in good condition, marble floor, fitted closets, air conditioning, heating and video intercom   Close to all services and the most popular areas of the island, this spectacular duplex will allow you to live in the center of a big city like Palma. Thanks to its large dimensions, you will have different spaces where you can enjoy your privacy without worrying about external noises. The property is located in a beautiful building, of Majorcan character, with its impressive entrance hall and few neighbors.    Its living room, very spacious and with a natural light that penetrates the space through the large windows and makes its way through the rest of the rooms, will make it easy for you to spend evenings with your friends or enjoy the tranquility of your home and be able to disconnect. Its high ceilings with wooden beams and the open space give a special touch to the house.     In the fully equipped and well-maintained kitchen, you will prepare your star dishes. Whether you are at home reading or practicing any activity or if you are a host. And having a TV in the kitchen, in addition to the incredible qualities and amplitude, this place will become one of your favorite rooms.    It has 3 double bedrooms, two of them with en suite bathroom. An indispensable factor that allows you to have all the necessary privacy in your bedroom. A very important thing to consider is the large dressing room with fitted closets that you will have at your disposal to store all the clothes you have, as the house has plenty of storage spaces.   The two heights of the duplex will allow you to always have the upper area as a more intimate and private place when you have visitors, apart from the fact that it has 3 bathrooms, so you can have a part of the house for guests.  Precisely on the second floor there is an open space that you can use to put a desk and work from home whenever you want. A bright space that will always have an ideal ventilation, the ideal place to concentrate.   If you want this duplex with an unbeatable location in the center of Palma to be your future home, call 971888018 or fill out the contact form.

description: At heart, the house was completed in 1998 and was in excellent condition. Unfortunately, it no longer responded to current needs and the technical requirements that are imposed on today's life. Therefore, this property was renovated from the beginning and a villa that is not often found in Mallorca in its type and layout was developed. A very attractively designed driveway through a Mediterranean garden leads to the entrance area of the villa. Its entrance is on the ground floor, the generous entrance portal invites you into an open, light-flooded hall and thus puts the Mallorcan Mediterranean lifestyle in the spotlight. Immediately to the left is an impressive glass-enclosed wine cellar; It is already well stocked for the buyer with about 200 bottles of Mallorcan wine! On this level there are three bedrooms with their en-suite bathrooms, a glazed wellness area, a guest toilet and access to the double garage. An open staircase leads to the roof terrace. On the upper floor of the villa is the main living level of approximately 240 m². The architecture of this level is open and very bright, and consists of a large living room with a seating and dining area, as well as a luxury open kitchen from the Leicht company valued at 50,000 euros. In addition, on the upper floor there is a library, an additional storage room and a guest toilet. The spacious master bedroom with an open en-suite bathroom and a large walk-in closet complete this living level. The particularity of the complete renovation is also expressed in the conversion of the previous hipped roof into a large terrace. Since 2021, the municipality of Calvià no longer allows this type of use of the roof space in new constructions; one more reason to qualify this house as something special. On approx. 200 m² usable roof space you can enjoy your stay in Mallorca in an excellent way, a beautiful sea view rounds off this retreat. On this roof terrace there is a summer kitchen, which perfectly completes the Mediterranean lifestyle both during the day and at night. In addition, there is a pre-installation for the connection of a jacuzzi. The garden area conveys an atmosphere of tranquility. The 4 x 10 m self-cleaning saltwater pool is immersed in a Mediterranean plant world.

description: Finca with house built in the mountain stone and mill from 1800, with spectacular views! Property with a lot of potential. Property located in an urban and rustic area consisting of 3.954 sqm land with a two floor house built in the stone (of the mountain) and an old Mill in the upper part of the land with magnificent 360º views. All with spectacular views of the fields and the town of Santa Eugenia, located in the center of Mallorca The house (enlarged) is from 1950 and partially renovated in 1975. It is located on urban land and consists of: GROUND FLOOR: Living room with fireplace Large storage room Dining room with fireplace Kitchen room Bathroom Room that can be converted into a bedroom Heating using 2 Jotul cast iron stoves that heat most of the two floors FIRST FLOOR: Three double bedrooms, all with beautiful views. One of them has built-in cabinets Large room / distributor where a bedroom could be made or one of the existing ones could be expanded EXTERIOR SPACE: Barbecue area Terrace, gardens Storage room 2 water cisterns (deposits) Mill from the year 1800. The mill area has impressive views of the Serra de Tramuntana, the Cura mountain and the entire Pla de Mallorca The house has access from the Plaza de Santa Eugenia and has urban services at the entrance of the plot Land with slope and terraces, with a lot of charm. Electricity is from the public grid Currently the water is stored in a cistern but it can be connected to the public network that is a short distance from the house. Santa Eugenia is a beautiful charming town with good access from various roads. If you want more information or visit the property, do not hesitate to contact us. HOMEING MALLORCA REAL ESTATE.

description: A truly unique opportunity to live in a home like no other. Situated on the first floor of a beautifully maintained building, this compact apartment has outstanding sea views from three floors and a generous roof terrace.    An archetypal pied-a-terre, this home is brimming with style and panache and for the forward-thinking buyer the possibility to acquire the apartment next door would significantly add to living space when it becomes available to buy in September.   Enter via the modern kitchen and sitting room with balcony a contemporary styled staircase leads up to the office with sizeable roof terrace. The third floor is currently arranged as a bedroom, with a balcony looking out to sea.   Steps from the front of the building lead down to the community pool which is bathed in sunshine with further steps down to street level and the array of local shops.   Nothing about living here would ever be ordinary, and so the apartment is calling for its next extraordinary resident. Is that you?   (This property would be great to acquire in combination with our "Sea View Apartment for Sale in San Agustin". Please check our ref. Nº 30736).

description: Unique 3-storey property on a quiet street around the corner from Santa Catalina's rennown market hall. Completely renovated in a modern style with preserved original details and the entire floor is light and airy. The apartment is located on the first floor, which is a high level up and the stairs have normal modern width and are not steep. The whole home have high ceilings and beautiful white painted beams throughout. You enter into a nice hall with a large bathroom to the left. To the right is an equally spacious bedroom with room for a double bed. Directly in from the hall is a very large social area consisting of a living room and dining area on either side of the well-equipped open kitchen in a rustic style with a bar counter and space for guests to sit. Inside the dining area to the left of the kitchen is the master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and exit to the spacious covered balcony of 10 sqm. The balcony of 10 m2 is large enough to also have meals here and there is a glass wall between it and the dining area, which means that these two surfaces can be used together and outside and inside are integrated. At the opposite end of this large room, off the living area, there are two French balconies that let's in a lot of light and air. The home has air conditioning units in all rooms, the windows are double glazed and have shutters. The entire floor has been renovated with craftsmanship and high quality. This property is located in the heart of Santa Catalina with its lively bars and restaurants and yet you can enjoy the peace and quiet inside your own home, but also out on the balcony it is quiet and secluded.

description: This bright home are looking out on the Tennis Club and have all the necessary services outside the street entrance. It also have a spacious terrace located along with the living room. The property has a lift and there is a bicycle room on the entrance floor, in addition there is also a storage room of 7 square meters included in the purchase price. The home is located on the second floor and there is only 1 more neighbour on the floor. When you enter into the home you arrive to a hall with a large wardrobe on the right. To the left is then first the work kitchen with a practical laundry and utility room outside the short end of the kitchen. Thereafter is the smaller bedroom, the bathroom and towards the living room, the master bedroom. Directly from the hall via nice original doors with glass, is the spacious living room, which today also houses an office area and a dining room area. It's LG air-conditioning for cooling/heating in both bedrooms and in the living room and all 3 of them were installed 2017. Along with the living room is the terrace of about 15 square meters (2.25 x 6,65) with east/south orientation. All kitchen appliances are included, the washing machine and dish washer are only a year old. The apartment is covering the full floor from one side of the building to the opposite side. This gives that you can have cross-drafts during the hottest summer months and that here is good natural light. The last renovation was made approximately 6 years ago.

description: A Spacious Modern bright well designed Villa renovated in 2017 with attention to detail and with no expense spared. Situated in a peaceful residential area above Port Adriano! Tasteful, luxury decor enhances the feeling of light and space. A short drive away are numerous golf courses, yacht marinas and quaint bays. The open plan layout is enhanced by numerous windows which allow for light flooded rooms and the use of contemporary design elements create an edgy, modern yet warm and comfortable ambience. The Plot size of the property is 500 sqm and the built size is 193 sqm The ground floor comprises a living/dining room leading to an American kitchen, a bedroom, a bathroom and a utility room. The top floor comprises the master bedroom en suite bathroom with access to a terrace that enjoys beautiful panoramic views, plus a further two bedrooms and family shower room. In the basement is a garage as well as a laundry, and a machine room. The southeast facing ground floor also offers access to a spacious covered terrace from where a few steps lead down to the pool area surrounded by lawns. El Toro: The small village of El Toro is located on the southwestern tip of Mallorca, on the western edge of the small peninsula. It is best reached from Palma (20km), the airport is about 35km away. Although El Toro has a supermarket as well as a few small shops, individual holidaymakers can choose the nearby town of Santa Ponsa for special things without being permanently exposed to the hustle and bustle. As well as the luxury yacht harbour Port Adriano is located directly at El Toro beach. Air Conditioning, Cable/Satellite TV, Close to beach, Close to golf course, Panoramic View, Swimming pool, Underfloor Heating. Sps-1348.

description: House with Majorcan character in the center of Alaró, in the Sierra de Tramuntana. With a constructed area of 210m2 and dating from the year 1900. Distribution on the ground floor: spacious hall with a Majorcan wooden door and a wooden and glass batiport, providing light to the room; a staircase with a wrought iron railing gives access to the first floor; It has a toilet that is accessed from the living-dining room with a wood-burning stove and a large window in wood and glass with access to the beautiful and private outdoor patio of the house with a raised pool and an area covered with a pergola; The kitchen is fully furnished and equipped, it also has access to the charming patio, the laundry room and a private open garage with capacity for one vehicle. Distribution on the first floor: three double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, a large bathroom with a bathtub, a small hall with access stairs to the second floor that has a large study or can also be used as a bedroom or main room or library with access to a terrace. with unobstructed views of the Sierra de Tramuntana. The state of conservation and decoration is impeccable and very comfortable, equipped with air conditioning throughout the house, Majorcan façade lined with stone. Located in the very center of Alaró, with all services at street level (shops, pharmacy, cafeterias, restaurants, etc. ), as well as access to routes to enjoy bike rides or on foot, excursions to the Castle of Alaró. A town with easy access and connected by direct train to Palma and Inca, with a weekly market of local, ecological and handicraft products, a municipal swimming pool and an outdoor sports area.

The property has been completely refurbished resulting in a spacious, comfortable and bright property with open and functional ambiences in a peaceful and natural sea setting only 10 min. from Palma. The villa stands on a plot of 825m2 surrounded by a garden, terraces, large swimming pool and barbecue area, all with great sea views where you can enjoy gatherings with friends and family. The house occupies within this plot 250 m2 distributed in 2 levels with 4 bedrooms and 5 bathrooms, where the predominance of white and light tones enhance the modern spirit of the house. On the entrance level there is a spacious living and dining room with large windows that open up to the magnificent views of the sea and allow natural light to enter, followed by the open plan kitchen, fully equipped, practical and with a modern aesthetic, also equipped with a large storage capacity. On this level there is also a bedroom with en-suite bathroom, laundry area, storage room and a guest toilet.  On the upper floor is the sleeping area with 3 further bedrooms with en suite bathrooms, one of which has a private dressing area. Two of the bedrooms have access to a large terrace with splendid views of the sea and the surrounding countryside. The magnificent property includes a convenient garage. FEATURES: -Air conditioning hot/cold, underfloor heating, alarm system. -Open plan fitted kitchen. -Terraces, garden, swimming pool, barbecue, private garage. -Elevator LOCATION: -Sea views, close to restaurants, close to shops, 5 min. from Puerto Portals, 10 min. from Palma.

It's a 5 minutes walk down to Santa Catalina and within about 8 minutes' walk you are on the luxurious shopping street Jaume III followed by Passage des Borne where the famous sandstone cathedral is also located. You enter the home into a hallway followed by a spacious living room, then is an adjacent fully equipped separate, spacious and modern kitchen that can be made open to the living room. After the kitchen is two normal-sized bedrooms, a smaller guest room/children's room/office and a bathroom. The total living area is approximately 82 m2. The living room is large and bright with lots of natural light thanks to a large window section and the exit to a smaller balcony facing the street. The two larger bedrooms both have access to a cozy terrace facing an open, quiet backyard with lots of greenery.  There is also a storage room on the terrace. The home is perfectly suitable both as a holiday home and a permanent living. Both the residence and the address are quiet and close to everything, two blocks further down the street there is a large Mercadona supermarket/grocery store and in the area there is a bakery, butcher, pet store, fruit shop, pharmacy, cafes, restaurants and anything else you might need. It's got closure to all everyday facilities you need.  ____  We are Demiaz, with the vision of bringing new light to the real estate industry in Mallorca through the combined eyes of a real estate agent and an interior designer. On a mission to relabel what a real estate agency has to offer by adding an interior design approach that will allow you to visualize and understand the big picture of how your next property will take shape. description: Nice apartment located in the elegant neighborhood of Jaime III just a few steps from Paseo Mallorca. It has a constructed area of 110 m2 distributed in 2 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, one of them en suite, a functional hallway, a fully equipped kitchen with a small southeast-facing terrace and a large living-dining room with direct access to a pleasant west-facing terrace. This charming apartment receives light all day thanks to its distribution and orientation. Additional features include double glazed windows, gas central heating, air conditioning, wooden floors, a charming fireplace and pleasant city views. The building, which will have an elevator next year, offers a communal roof terrace with private storage rooms, one of which belongs to the apartment. El Corte Inglés - the main Spanish department store, is just a 1-minute walk away. You can enjoy the proximity of Paseo del Borne with its fashion shops, as well as a variety of restaurants in La Lonja.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Jaume, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: This large penthouse is located on the beautiful Paseo Marítimo with 180-degree sea views from the spacious roof terrace. The entire property is completely renovated and has high-quality materials, such as the wooden floor, the solid wood doors and the fitted carpentry. There is a spacious living room with a sitting area and a dining room from where you can enjoy a sea view. Connected to this space you have a balcony where you can also have a dining table. Separately, you have a fully equipped renovated kitchen and a convenient utility room. The private roof terrace of 100m2 is accessed from a communal staircase or elevator. From here you can enjoy the sun throughout the day and the views of Palma and the cathedral and the leafy park of Bellver. This is a wonderful space where you can dine, lounge, enjoy a drink, or take a dip in the tub. There is also a covered roof perfect for lunches during the summer. There is also an outdoor kitchen, outdoor bar, fridge, and storage room here. All the bedrooms are double, with fitted wardrobes, and impressive sea views from two of them, and the master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. Other characteristics are that the complex has a community pool, parking included in the price, and a storage room. There is the possibility of buying the property with all the furniture. The Paseo Marítimo which is a promenade is one of the best places to walk and relax in Palma, overlooking the waters of the sea and the port. It is a wonderful part of Palma with its closure to the sea and the forest behind. It has closure for all the daily facilities you need. We are Demiaz, with the vision of bringing new light to the real estate industry in Mallorca through the combined eyes of a real estate agent and an interior designer. On a mission to relabel what a real estate agency has to offer by adding an interior design approach that will allow you to visualize and understand the big picture of how your next property will take shape. It is of great importance to us to connect you to the right place and with our personalized "Property Search" service, we will find you the right property with your lifestyle, ideas, and wishes in mind. We will help you from the first interest to complete the procedures and make this personal investment as simple and safe as possible. Get connected and find out more about what we do on our website demiaz. com.

description: This beautiful town house is located in the center of the town of Santa María, close to schools and with good connections to public transport. Its location is ideal, since it is surrounded by all the necessities without having to give up tranquility and nature. The large plot of 1222 m2, absolutely unique in this location, is the jewel in the crown of this property. Due to the nature of the plot, it is possible to extend the guest house and create a complete second family home of up to 3 floors. The main house, with a living space of approx. 110 m2 offers 2 spacious floors and divided as follows: Through the main entrance you enter the open plan living / dining room and a marvelous new independent kitchen. One floor up there are 3 bedrooms, one with an en-suite bathroom, and an additional bathroom. In addition, there is a fabulous guest house of about 21 m2 with a bedroom and a full bathroom. All the bathrooms, as well as the kitchen and the windows, have been recently renovated. Other features: Utility room, pre installation of air conditioning in the main house, double glazed windows and tiled floor. Santa María del Camí is a dynamic market town in the central area of Mallorca, located around the old road from Palma to Inca.

description: This bright apartment in Palma de Mallorca is located in a well-kept building with elevator, in a sought-after neighborhood, close to famous streets such as Paseo Mallorca or Jaime III, with good access to various shops, international restaurants, as well as the famous old town. The apartment requires renovation and has a constructed area of approx. 89 m2 that are distributed as follows: a spacious living room with access to the balcony, a furnished and equipped kitchen, 2 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, 1 bathroom, as well as a utility room. This bright apartment in Palma is equipped with double-glazed windows and tiled floors. There is a possibility to rent a parking space. The apartment is located in a very attractive residential area, close to shops, supermarkets, pharmacies, public transport and all the services one needs in daily life. The famous Paseo Marítimo, where you can take a nice walk, play sports or enjoy delicious meals in the excellent restaurants located on the seafront, is a few minutes walk away. The international airport is only about 15 minutes away by car.
