description: This unique opportunity to acquire an existing finca of a 433.4 m2 constructed area within a 247.479 m2 plot of land is situated just before the village of Puigpunyent, only a 15 minute drive to Palma. The property is being sold with a project licence presented in the town hall for the new home buyer looking for a mountain environment with panoramic views and privacy. The house consists of a ground floor of a 164.5 m2 constructed area with a covered porche of 91 m2. The upper floor with a horse shoe shape patio has a 268.9 m2 constructed area and an outdoor terrace of 91 m2 with stunning views towards the green forrest and mountains. There is an existing 25 m2 swimming pool. Surrounded by the stunning mountain landscape, the house has the possibility to have 3-5 bedrooms and 5 bathrooms. The center of the property will be focused on the main living area that has 4 meter height ceilings with views towards the mountains and lots of natural light. Materials and finishes to be decided by the new home owner. There is an existing water well. The plot is open to the new home owner to landscape as they desire, with the possibility of fruit trees, a palm tree drive way and vineyard.

description: The 145m2 second floor apartment, accessed by elevator, is distributed over 2 levels. The entrance level offers an open-plan living/dining area, a separate fully-equipped kitchen, a laundry room, 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The master bedroom has the en-suite bathroom and a dressing area with fitted wardrobes. From the living area there is a small terrace with seating area and sea views. On the upper level of the property you will find a large 145m2 private roof terrace which is perfect for both relaxing in the sun or al fresco dining, accessed via a spiral staircase from the small terrace. It offers an outdoor kitchen with fridges and a pergola, a BBQ area, cinema, an outdoor shower and not forgetting the spectacular 360° views. The community is very well maintained with communal gardens and a large swimming pool. The property comes with an allocated parking space in the underground carpark and also a separate storage room.   Additional features:  fitted wardrobes, custom furniture, elevator, parking, central heating - city gas, air conditioning in the living area and main bedroom.

We present this flat of 98 m² on Plaza de los Patines, less than 10 minutes on foot from the Plaza España, in the Bons Aires district. It is located on the corner of the third floor of a building with a lift. The property comprises 4 bedrooms (2 of them double), 2 bathrooms, a very bright living and dining room and an independent kitchen. Everything you need to live comfortably! Moreover, the flat needs some refurbishment, so you can customize it to your taste and turn it into your dream home. To give you an idea of how the renovated apartment could look, we have created a small redesign project and provided some indicative renders. Furthermore, this area is close to emblematic neighbourhoods like Jaime III, San Jaime, La Misión, Camp d'en Serralta, Es Fortí, Bons Aires and Archiduque, and offers all kinds of services: institutions, pharmacies, restaurants, cafés, good transport connections and green spaces. Don’t wait any longer and schedule a visit! Do not miss out on the opportunity of living in the centre and having a home at your taste! “This property has been certified by ABSI (Balearic Association of Real Estate Services), which means that the commercializing agency has supervised the necessary documentation for its sale and that the property is part of ABSI’s pool of multiexclusive properties. ” *The renders are for reference only. description: We are offering this spectacular home built in 2018 in the exclusive rural residential complex of S' Aranjassa. The property of 7,500 square metres has a constructed surface of 380 square metres, 35 of which are a separate building, close to the pool, that could be turned into a guest house. The main house has a ground floor with 4 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, a large kitchen with dining room and fireplace, and a living room with large windows towards the pool area which shares the same double-sided fireplace with the kitchen. The house has heated floors in all rooms. In the upper part, we find a room of approximately 30 square metres that could be used as a lounge or study, a playroom or a relaxing area with large windows to look at the Bay of Palma and the best sunsets of Mallorca. The property has its own swimming pool, laundry room, garage and water softener system. The residential complex has private security. The house has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen, living room, two patios, a front one of approximately 20 m2 and another interior of 12 m2. The house has a Vacation Rental License for 4 people. The town of Andraxt is one of the oldest towns in Mallorca, with a great history, located at the foot of the Serra Tramuntana, surrounded by great natural beauty in a unique enclave that combines the tranquility of the town with the mountains and the sea. A few minutes by car from the house is Puerto de Andratx, a marina with a wide gastronomic offer of local and international cuisine, fashion shops, decoration, art galleries and entertainment venues.

description: Wir sprechen Deutsch / We speak English FOR SALE MANSION WITH SEA VIEWS ON THE LAND Without a doubt, we are facing one of the best villas located in the city of Palma de Mallorca.Beautiful Mansion with a marked architectural character of its own.Singular building where there are, both by location and by construction. As mentioned in the urban qualification certificate, there is an expectant urban benefit given that the land on which the house is located, of about 2,370 m2 including the house, would make it possible to take advantage of the garden land to make new constructions, for which there is and a draft that can be considered. As the location plans reveal, it is located at the foot of the Bellver castle.With unbeatable views and perfect orientations, both in the sun and well sheltered from the winds, difficult to improve. Located in one of the most peculiar neighborhoods of the city, being able to preserve intimacy and privacy given the characteristics of the estate, makes the villa in the center of the city being an isolated paradise with all the comforts. From the point of view of the construction, it is made up of an old building with the prodigal distributions and peculiarities of the time (1873).Despite its age, this does not detract from its quality and robustness, since the farm has been completely renovated and restored with the highest quality materials that we would dare to describe as "great luxury". Due to the characteristics of the building, we are certainly dealing with a very versatile building, since it can be used as a residence, either main or summer, which is the use for which it had been thought.Given the generous dimensions of the entire house, it can be used as a restaurant, small hotel, meeting place, board of directors, courses for companies and even a private school.

This stunning and newly renovated property enjoys a unique location with private mooring right at its front door. The sea can be accessed through a garage where all the sea sport equipments can conveniently be stored. The house offers a spacious living area with a fully fitted designer kitchen and opening onto the main large terrace, 5 bedrooms, all en suite, the master suite having its private dressing, a guest toilet, and a fully equipped guest apartment with independent entrance. Although great sea views can be appreciated from most rooms, one will not want to miss the undisturbed panoramic sea views to be captured from the roof terrace while relaxing by the large Infinity pool. The villa is distributed over 3 levels accessed by stairs or elevator. The adjacent guest apartment could alternatively by used as a game or gym area. This property comes with an adjacent 350 m2 plot with independent access where another house or a garage could be built. Other Features: Reversible air conditioning, underfloor heating, alarm system.

description: Would you like a home where tranquillity and nature reign? This charming property is what you are looking for.   Located on the outskirts of Santa María del Camí, it stands out for its proximity to the village and all its services, but you can also enjoy the tranquillity of the area. The property has a swimming pool and a very well maintained outdoor area.  The finca is situated only one kilometre away from the village and has a good connection to the motorway that connects Palma with Inca.  The house offers multiple options thanks to its more than 200m2, with two porch areas and its outdoor area, where we find the garden and the swimming pool.   The house is divided into two floors, on the ground floor we can find several entrances to the interior, distributed in a spacious living room, two living rooms with fireplace, a kitchen and a bathroom. The upper floor is divided into two wings, where in one wing there is a bathroom with three bedrooms and in the other wing there is a spacious office, another bedroom and a complete bathroom. The property would need some updating to enjoy it to the fullest. description: This charming Mediterranean farm is located on the outskirts of the iconic town of Santa Eugenia, 15 minutes from Palma. With a built area of 350 square meters and a plot of approximately 39,000 square meters, it offers stunning mountain views. The entrance road is lined with fruit trees and olive trees and the house is covered in stone, a characteristic of the island's buildings. The entrance door is armored and the double glazed windows and perfectly insulated walls protect against temperature changes in summer and winter. On the ground floor there is a large 50 square meter living-dining room, a fully equipped and furnished kitchen, a bathroom and a double bedroom. From the entrance hall you can access the living room and the spacious independent kitchen with fireplace. A semi-open staircase leads to the upper floor, which has 5 large bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The house has several open and covered terraces connected to a 12 meter pool surrounded by plants and fruit trees. In addition, there is a construction shelter with a fully equipped barbecue next to the house. ** The property has a holiday rental license for 9 people.

description: Majorcan house in Alaró.    This beautiful and typical Majorcan house can be your new home, located in the well known village of Alaró, it will bring you a very pleasant tranquility and comfort in your day to day life. With a direct communication with Palma, you can be in the center in less than half an hour by car. The main characteristics of this Majorcan house are the following:    • Alaró  • 180 m2  • 4 double bedrooms and 1 single bedroom  • 2 complete bathrooms   • Terrace of 64 m2  • Extras: built-in closets, storage room, barbecue, option to leave the furniture, equipped kitchen.  • Materials: interior and exterior wood carpentry, stoneware and parquet floors, stone facade.    With more than 100 years of history, the typology of this Majorcan house corresponds to the Tramuntana model. As it characterizes the mountain areas, the stones of these properties are larger, as we can see in its facade.    The 180 m2 of useful interior space have been distributed in two heights. This will allow you to differentiate the space for visitors, reserving the privacy of the bedrooms on the upper floor. Upon entering your future home, a spacious hallway and a reception room for visitors will allow you to begin to appreciate the details of this house.    Details characteristic of a Mallorcan house with 100 years of history. Its high ceilings seconded by beautiful and imposing beams give the whole home an obvious amplitude. Behind this living room, you will find a spacious living room with a stone wall in front and next to it, the kitchen-dining room with a nice fireplace.    The stairs lead you to the upper floor, where the 3 double bedrooms and the single bedroom are located. This last room has direct access to a large terrace. The bathroom, which is also located on this floor, has a shower adapted for people with reduced mobility.    The exterior will be possibly one of the corners where you will like to enjoy many moments with your friends and family. In its garden you will find fruit trees, ideal for breakfast every day fresh products. You will also have a barbecue and an auxiliary kitchen at the end of the garden. A great space to combine the barbecue with the accompaniment, which you can do comfortably in this outdoor kitchen.    In addition, you will be pleased to know that the current owner has already started with the paperwork to get the authorization to allow the new owner to build a swimming pool, if you wish. This way, you will be able to enjoy even more of this great outdoor space.    If you want to know more information about this Mallorcan house located in Alaró, call or fill in the form and we will contact you.

In the garden you will find a beautiful pool, iron fencing around the entire plot and artificial grass. The large outdoor space, which has garden areas, terraces and a swimming pool with a chill out area, will encourage you to disconnect from household chores and enjoy nature. In addition to the elegance and freshness that this area with trees and unobstructed views brings to the house. If you want to know more information about this luxurious villa, call and ask us or fill out the contact form.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Maioris-Puig de Ros, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: Semi-detached house in Calle del Ropit

description: This cozy apartment is located in Nou Levant, a 10-minute walk from the closest beach and close to multiple services and areas of interest. In addition to enjoying an excellent location, this house will provide you with a home where you can be calm and comfortable. The main characteristics of this apartment are the following: • New Levant • 104 useful m2 • 2 double rooms and 2 singles • 2 bathrooms • 7m2 terrace • Parking spaces (1) • Laundry • Extras: the building begins some improvement works in May, on request we can send a photo of how it will look. This apartment located in Nou levant has 104 useful m2 and 2 double bedrooms and 2 singles. When you enter the doors of your new home, a pleasant hall will allow you to leave your belongings such as keys or a bag, for example. So you can always have your keys and wallet in a fixed and safe place. As you progress inside, you will reach its spacious and warm 24 m2 living room. A space designed so that you can rest and enjoy moments of tranquility and good company. The kitchen is spacious, 10m2. As you can see, it is very practical and has a large storage capacity, you can have all the utensils and food well organized and tidy. The terrace means for you to have an outdoor space where you can disconnect from domestic activities and leave the worries of the day behind. In addition to having a clear view. You will have 4 bedrooms, two of them are doubles and two are singles, in addition, they all have built-in wardrobes. This will make it easier for you to organize your belongings. Although depending on what your needs are, you may be interested in adapting one of these rooms as a dressing room. The spacious main room, which enjoys dreamy natural lighting, has an en-suite bathroom with a bathtub. The other available bathroom is located next to the bedrooms and the living room. If you want to know more information about this apartment with a terrace and parking located in Nou Levant, contact us.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Nou Llevant, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Ciutat de Querétaro

description: This corner townhouse is located in a quiet side street in Son Armadams, only a short distance from the famous Paseo Marítimo and the nightlife district of Santa Catalina. Various infrastructural facilities are in the immediate vicinity.  The community consists of only 4 other units. The house delights with an open, urban and modern style. The living area has a stylish fireplace, large windows provide great lighting, smooth finished walls and exposed concrete ceilings round off the extravagant and for Palma unique design. On the first floor is the master bedroom with a spacious bathroom, dressing room and a balcony. On the second floor, there are 2 more bedrooms and an open space, which, due to its orientation towards the terrace and pool as well as the large window front, is excellently suited as an office but also as a further living area or as a playroom for children. The spacious south-facing terrace invites you to sunbathe and relax. From here you can reach the communal pool in just a few steps.  The house also has a cellar, a garage for two cars where the entrance to the basement of the house is located. There you will find a utility room, a pantry and a spacious storage room which could also be converted into a small guest room. The house is sold unfurnished. The furniture in the photos is not included in the sale.  Additional features: Air conditioning, community pool, balcony, terrace, garage, parking space, utility room, storage room, guest toilet.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Armadams, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house

description: Ladies and Gentlemen, we present a beautiful flat of 120 m2, 4 bedrooms, 2 complete bathrooms, balcony with sea views to the left, communal terrace on the top floor with spectacular views and communal parking. Refurbished including all plumbing and electrical installations. Upon entering, one immediately appreciates the style and care for materials that the owner has created, with a play of colour and modern lines linking the living room with the open and technological kitchen, with osmosis system for drinking water. The entrance allows the light to illuminate the living area very well, separating the kitchen, dining room and living room into a single room. The style continues when from the living room, opening the French window, you access the 15 m2 balcony with a wonderful sea view on the left side, where there is a small table and chairs. From the balcony you can also appreciate the class and style of the central area of the flat, with a full kitchen in the background which is a real modern piece of furniture. The open plan kitchen was a wish of the owner, with appliances hidden away to maintain an essential ergonomic and contemporary style.  The master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom with a double black washbasin and ensures privacy from the rest of the house. Another bathroom and 3 bedrooms complete this flat, which is very quiet throughout. The owners wanted the design of the bathrooms to be in keeping with the whole style of the house to maintain harmony between materials and colours. The floors are parquet, the doors are white wood and the central air conditioning provides an ideal temperature that can be regulated all year round. This flat is located in front of quay 6 of the Club de Mar, within walking distance to the best clubs and restaurants of Palma and only 1 km from the shopping centre Porto Pi.  The pedestrian promenade offers unforgettable strolls between palm trees sun sea and dreamlike boats. The building has a communal parking area and a large roof terrace to admire the views or to do the laundry on hot summer days. The whole building has a water softener for the fresh water.  The neighbours are quiet and the population is made up of international professionals and artists. The monthly community fees are 125 euros per month, including water consumption. If you are looking for a modern flat next to the sea, in the heart of Palma de Mallorca's life, with all the comforts and which allows you to never take the car, don't miss it. The dream of living on the most beautiful island in the world can come true. Agent  Dr Matteo Belotti Rey Mallorca Real Estate.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Terreno, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This property is located in a quiet residential area of Santa Catalina, one of the most sought after areas in Mallorca.   This beautifully renovated ground floor apartment has a living space of 100m2 made up of a bright open plan living dining area, a well equipped fitted kitchen, 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, one being en suite. Additionally the apartment has a large 100m2 terrace paved with local Binissalem natural stone, offering a large outdoor space with the perfect mix if sun and shade. There is a partially covered dining and BBQ area, a cosy sunken seating corner and sunny chill area with a swimming pool. The property has been fitted with high quality materials throughout.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Espanyolet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Duplex penthouse with private terrace located in an Old Palace dating back from 1850 with original Mallorquin features.  The property is located on the third floor. The main floor has 125 m2 with more than 3m heigh ceilings with exposed wooden beams. The main entrance has the dining area with windows to the interior patio. There are 2 double bedrooms with French window doors and one with a balcony, a cozy living room, a bedroom with en-suite bathroom, an independent kitchen that leads towards the pantry, utility room and a loft style double bedroom. All rooms have exterior windows, except the bathroom. The upper floor leads to 56 m2 of a living room with a fireplace, an office/bedroom and bathroom en-suite. There are exposed beams with sloping ceilings like a loft and mares stone on the wall. Here you have access to the 43 m2 private terrace which is shaped like an "L". Privacy and tranquility are what this terrace features.  Additionally the building installed a lift to the top floor, there is a garage of 24 m2 and an additional storage room in the interior patio. This mallorquín style property features in a quiet street yet close to El Borne and Plaza del Mercat is very hard to find in Palma city. There is potential to renovate or keep it as it is with its original character.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Nicolau, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Duplex

description: If you are looking for tranquility in the center of this wonderful city, there you have it! After having spent several hours with the owner and letting us know all the details and anecdotes about her experiences in this apartment.. . We present this beautiful Penthouse located in one of the main streets of the city, a few meters from the avenues and the nerve center of Palma city, close to the best shops, restaurants, shopping centers, business areas, etc. Located on the top floor of a building with an elevator, with unobstructed views and lots of natural light, it is distributed in an entrance hall, 4 double bedrooms, some with built-in wardrobes, a large bathroom with a shower and two sinks, a toilet, a fitted kitchen and equipped, utility room, large dining room, with covered glazed terrace and with the possibility of being converted into an open space. It also has a storage room for storage. Although the apartment is ready to move into, we have developed some reform and improvement options with our team of specialists so that you do not have to worry about any detail. We invite you to request a visit and we can tell you all the details of this fantastic penthouse. The newspaper The Times considers that Palma de Mallorca is "the best place to live in the world" because "it has everything" and "in an accessible way".

description: This modern and bright first floor apartment is located on Aragón Street, 340, close to all services and areas of interest. In addition to an excellent location, this home will provide you with a peaceful and comfortable living space. The main features of this apartment are: • Aragón Street • 101 m2 built • 3 double bedrooms • 2 bathrooms, 1 of them en suite • Balcony • Terrace • Extras: Elevator, laundry room, built-in wardrobes, heating and air conditioning via electric ducts, communal storage room, Climalit and aluminum exterior carpentry, parquet floors and tiled bathrooms.. . It has 101 m2 and 3 double bedrooms. When you enter your new home, a pleasant entrance hall will allow you to leave your belongings such as keys or purse, for example. As you move inside this apartment, you will reach its cozy living room. A space designed for you to rest and enjoy moments of tranquility and good company. The kitchen, one of the most special rooms if you like to cook, will allow you to enjoy this space even more. With a large storage capacity, you can have everything well organized and, it also has access to a spacious laundry room where you can hang clothes if you don't want to go up to the communal terrace. You will have 3 bedrooms with integrated built-in wardrobes. This will facilitate the organization of your belongings. However, depending on your needs, you may be interested in adapting one of these rooms as a dressing room. The spacious main bedroom, which enjoys great natural lighting, has an en-suite bathroom with bathtub. The other available bathroom is located in the hallway, next to the other 2 bedrooms.

description: This duplex apartment is located in one of the oldest parts of Palma. This apartment has a boutique hotel feel. It is restored and renovated into a beautiful modern home, whilst keeping the traditional architectural Mallorquin stone walls and wooden beams, a mixture between the modern design and original old. The apartments entrance is located on the ground floor. On this floor you will find a spacious living room with ceilings of 5 meters, a dining area, bathroom and kitchen with direct access to the patio. This unique patio bring so much light to the apartment, with a lounge area and sun deck. A lovely wooden staircase leads you up to the first floor, which brings you into the library. Connected to this is 2 bedrooms and another bathroom. The small property hosts only 3 other units/ apartments.

description: Luxury apartment with garage for sale in the desired area of Palma Old Town (Casco Antiguo). This unique property is located in the heart of the historic center of the island's capital Palma. This is a magnificent renovation by a renowned architect of an emblematic Majorcan historic building with its typical interior patio. The property offers a very traditional aesthetic while being fitted with the most modern equipments and elements. The building is composed of 6 apartments with slightly varying characteristics. Please click the following references 6638,  6639, 6640, 6641 for details of apartments still available. This present apartment has a 226,17 m2 built area including an entrance hall, a spacious living room with fireplace, a dining room, an all equipped kitchen, 3 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms, a dressing room and a guest toilet. Most rooms have built-in wardrobes and cabinets. This apartment is sold with a 33,90 m2 underground parking spot. Other Features: Natural and high quality materials throughout such as Iroko wood, Santanyi and Binissalem stone for flooring and elements, Pino Norte and Iroko woods for doors, ceilings with exposed wooden beams, natural limestone 60×30 tiling, Climalit 6/8/6 double glazed windows, reversible air conditioning and central heating heat pump ducts with thermostat in each unit. Community enjoying a 54.46 m2 patio and equipped with a panoramic lift.

description: This apartment is located front line with direct sea access in San Agustin. The property offers a 115m2 living area made up of spacious living/dining area, fully fitted kitchen, 3 bedrooms all with fitted wardrobes, 2 bathrooms (1 en suite) and a laundry room. The living area leads out onto the 26m2 terrace which has spectacular sea views. There is reversible air conditioning throughout the apartment, underfloor heating, a water filter and is fitted with ‘Gaggenau’ appliances. Within the complex there is access to a community outdoor and indoor pool, sauna, Turkish bath, gardens and a gym. The building has a concierge and security and the property includes a storage room and a parking space.

description: This sea view modern villa is located in Costa d’en Blanes, only a few minutes from the marina Puerto Portals. The recently renovated property is a built on a large 1810m2 plot and offers a constructed area of 560m2. This villa is divided across 3 levels with 5 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms as well as a living room and lounge, and a modern kitchen with dining area. Through the large window fronts you have a great sea view from almost every room. Outside there are several sunny terraces divided into different levels surrounded by mediterranean gardens. The saltwater pool is surrounded by a spacious partially decked terrace and an outdoor kitchen and bar area – perfect for a nice BBQ! There is also a second bar area on the lower terrace. Additionally, up a spiral staircase leads up to the roof terrace, which offers fabulous views over the bay of Palma. Due to the good orientation of the property you can enjoy the sun of Mallorca all day long! Other features include: blinds, double glazed windows, osmosis system, central music system, satellite TV, TV room, parking garage for 2 cars.

The upper level has a spacious open living area with big windows letting in lots of natural light, a fitted kitchen, also a small terrace on this level. Additionally, there is a large roof top terrace with stunning views of the harbour and Palma Bay. The community offers well kept gardens and a communal pool, with direct access to the Paseo Maritimo. The property comes with 3 parking spaces included in the price.

description: A truly unique opportunity to live in an apartment that is second to none. This tastefully refurbished apartment is on the first floor of a beautifully maintained building and offers stunning sea views from two spacious terraces spread over two floors. On the entry level is the pretty, functional kitchen with a nice French balcony, perfect for morning coffee. Furthermore we have 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (one en suite), a bright living room with exit to the sun terrace with fantastic sea views. From this level, a staircase goes up to the second floor to the gallery, in which there is a sofa bed with an office and invites you to the large sun terrace. Stairs at the front of the building lead down to the communal pool which is bathed in sun and another set of stairs lead down to the street and the many shops. Nothing alive here would ever be ordinary, and so the apartment calls for its next extraordinary resident. Is that you?

description: Renovated Sea View Villa in Cas Catala. Modernly renovated villa newly renovated (2019) with good views of the sea from almost all rooms in the residential area Cas Catala. Entering on the ground floor level, the villa offers a spacious living room with dining area, a modern fully equipped kitchen, a guest bedroom with large bathroom en suite and walk-in dressing room, a utility room, a storage room, a technical room. From the entrance floor, you can access a covered cosy terrace, the garden and the swimming pool. On the first floor is the master bedroom with bathroom en suite and walk-in closet, access to the upper terrace, another bedroom with additional office/living room and a separate bathroom. About Cas Catala: Cas Catala is a highly sought-after neighbourhood of Palma with all amenities at walking distance. Supermarkets, direct bus lines to Palma, gym, town hall, doctors / dentists clinics and Pac, veterinarians, pharmacies, international schools, restaurants, cafés are all there! Let’s not forget the beaches, of which 4 are within walking distance, nor the golf courses, also within the vicinity.

description: Stunning villa with panoramic sea views for sale in Costa d'en Blanes, exclusive area on the southwest coast of the island of Mallorca. This 250 m2 recently renovated property is distributed over 2 levels. The ground-floor has the vast, mainly open, living area, the spacious kitchen, an en-suite bedroom, a utility room/storage room and a guest toilet. The upper floor has the 4 other bedrooms, 2 of them en-suite and one of them with dressing, 2 bathrooms and an office. The villa is set on a 825 m2 plot which also include a garden and a large pool with solarium from where to enjoy unforgettable BBQ parties and summer dinners with friends and family. Additional Features: In the very sought-after area of Costa d'en Blanes -12 km from Palma center fully renovated and equipped with the most modern technology -including a lift- and with amazing views from throughout the house.

description: Large Mahres stone finca for sale on the outskirts of the prestigious town of Calvia. Set on a plot of 40.035 m2, 896 m2 built with separate guest house, lush gardens surrounded by nature with olive and juniper trees, panoramic mountain views and a large entertainment area. Discover this private character property that combines charm and authenticity with modern comfort and has been completely renovated in 2016. Built on three levels, the main ground floor comprises entrance hall and stairwell leading to the spacious main living room with stone fireplace, access to the covered terrace, a super fully equipped kitchen with island, outdoor and indoor dining area. Three large en-suite bedrooms with fitted wardrobes. There is an office room and the whole floor leads to the terraces with covered porches with sitting areas.  The entire upper floor is dedicated to the impressive master bedroom with en suite bathroom, dressing room, sitting room and access to the terrace with views of the surrounding area. On the lower floor, you will find three spacious en-suite bedrooms, fully equipped gymnasium with shower room, a wine room with humidity and temperature regulated. A large living room with fully equipped modern kitchen leading to the salt water infinity pool overlooking the surrounding Tuscan style landscape and a large terrace with a refined bar and lounge area. There is a two car garage, laundry room and technical room on this floor. Outdoor carports can also be found outside. In addition, you will find a guest house with kitchen, living room, two bedrooms and two bathrooms. It features handcrafted stonework, solid wooden floors with underfloor heating, detailed carpentry, integrated air conditioning hot/cold, exposed wooden beams, gagennau kitchen appliances, alarm system, possibility to build a tennis court and horse stables.

description: Beautiful family finca in Nova Santa Ponsa with a tourist licence, a very peaceful and private property set on a large plot with well kept landscaping as well as a large pool. This property is set on a great plot of 2,661m2 with beautiful stoned walls and hand made wood shutters all over, with 3 large bedrooms all with en-suite and walk in wardrobes, 2 of which are underground rooms, leading on to their own pebbled terrace space on the ground floor, alongs with a further guest bathroom, office, dinning room and a large living room with a fireplace leading onto the first of the two terraces which are great for entertaining or relaxing, with the other terrace with a outdoor kitchen leading off from the large beautiful fully fitted kitchen. On the second floor you will find two further bedrooms sharing a large terrace, one of which is a large double bedroom guest room with an en-suite, with the other being the master suite, with a walk in wardrobe, private living area and an en-suite. The finca also has a utility room, two car garage, drive way, pool shower room & solar panels(with potential for more).

The main front door also leads to a lower ground level with one more room. The house enjoys a large patio with dining and lounge area with kitchen. description: This spacious family home is located in Santa Ponsa, a highly sought-after neighbourhood in the southwest of Mallorca, offering stunning mountain views. The property is distributed over 2 levels plus the basement. The ground floor offers an open living-dining room, a fitted kitchen with a breakfast island and a large outdoor covered terrace overlooking the pool area. On the first floor you will find 4 of the bedrooms and various terraces, some with mountain views. In the basement there are 3 more bedrooms, a gym area, office space and its own kitchen and living area which could be used a separate guest apartment. The outdoor space offers a large swimming pool, plenty of space for lounging and dining, a BBQ area, a fish pond, a garage and outdoor space with parking for 6 cars. description: Beautiful stone-clad facade finca-type property for sale in Calvia, a very sought after area in southwest Mallorca, first occupied in 2003. The south-facing finca is found in a private location just outside the village of Calvia, just 10 minutes from the coast and is distributed over 2 floors. The ground-floor has an entrance hall, a very spacious open dining area, a living room with a fireplace and a large fully equipped kitchen. There is also a utility room, a guest toilet, a cloakroom and an office. The upper floor has 3 bedrooms, 2 double bedrooms with 1 shared bathroom and the master suite with a dressing area, en-suite bathroom and access to a covered terrace with stunning views. The property has an all-purpose basement of about 30 m2. There is an independent guest house with a bedroom and bathroom en-suite and its own private terrace. The perfectly maintained large outdoor area, rich in all sorts of Mediterranean trees and plants, also has a beautiful 17 m x 4.5 m swimming pool which can be heated, with a pool house, BBQ area and sauna. For the horse lovers, there is also a paddock, a stable with a tack room, a large storage shed for feed and a 21 m x 60 m dressage arena with irrigation system, as well as its own approved well.   Additional Features: large osmosis system, 50 m3 water cistern, pantry, carport for 2 cars with charging station for an electric car, pre-installation for air conditioning and solar panels, video intercom, fibre-optic internet, double glazed windows, electric gate, fitted wardrobes, thermal Insulation.

description: This beautiful finca is located in Santa María, a traditional and authentic center part of Mallorca, right in the heart of the island's stunning countryside, surrounded by nature and tranquillity so you can enjoy absolute privacy. The house was built in 2018, set on large flat plot of land of 22,618 m2 enjoying views of the mountains, a driveway lined with trees leads up to the stunning 515 m2 property which is distributed across one level and includes a guest apartment. The house offers a spacious entrance into an open plan living/dining area with a fireplace, a well equipped fitted kitchen, laundry room, 4 bedrooms all with en-suite bathrooms, a wellness room with a gym and sauna and a separate guest area with its own living area, bedroom and bathroom. Accessed through large patio doors, out to the exterior part of the property there are 2 covered terrace areas, one with summer kitchen and bathroom, the other as a lounge area, spacious lawns and a large 100 m2 swimming pool surrounded by plenty of sunbed space. From the summer kitchen there is a basement with a large room as well as the pool equipment. The property also includes a beach volleyball area, a basketball court and a double garage. Additional features include: high quality wooden floors, hot water underfloor heating throughout, Domotic system, KNX system, Video door intercom system by BTICINO, automatic gate, Daikin system, Led lamps, (Duravit, Berker, Starck, Dornbracht, Iroko & Zarzi products).

Annexed flat with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, possibility of a second annexed flat, swimming pool, large garden, terrace, large porch, parking for 10 cars, sea and mountain views. Very private.

description: Would you like to live in the centre of Palma, just minutes from famous buildings, squares,  and landmarks?  This is a great opportunity: an apartment located right in the centre between Vía Sindicato  and Plaça de la Mercè. The property is in good condition and located on the mezzanine floor.  It consists of an open-plan living room and equipped kitchen, two bedrooms with fitted  wardrobes, and one bathroom.  The apartment is nice and bright thanks to large windows providing plenty of natural daylight  in both the living room and parts of the kitchen.  Would you like to visit, and see the great potential on offer? Just give us a call, you won’t  regret it!

description: This recently renovated penthouse apartment is located in El Terreno, a popular area in Palma, and being close to Paseo Maritimo is a great advantage. The fact that the apartment is located on the 6th floor and can be accessed by an elevator is a plus. The modern style and high-quality materials used in the renovation also indicate that the apartment is likely to be very comfortable and stylish. With a living space of 100 m2, the open plan living, dining, and kitchen area is likely to be very spacious and perfect for entertaining guests and also has access to a 8 m2 terrace. The large sliding windows from the kitchen provide a lot of natural light and views of the port, which is a definite advantage. Having 2 spacious bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, 1 en-suite plus a guest toilet is ideal for families or couples who want a little extra space. Additionally, the communal roof terrace of approximately 80 m2 is an excellent feature that can be used for socialising or just relaxing. There is also the possibility to rent a parking space nearby.

description: This beautiful duplex is located in a historic and prestigious building in the fantastic old town of Palma, a stone's throw from the cathedral and the well-known Paseo del Born. The high ceilings give this bright duplex apartment a pleasant feeling of spaciousness. It has a living area of approx. 210 m2, which is divided into a spacious living/dining room with an open gallery, 3 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, 3 bathrooms (2 of them en-suite), an open and fully equipped kitchen with cooking island and adjoining utility room. The spacious gallery is ideal as an office. The master bedroom with bathroom en suite also has a dressing room. In the beautiful private patio you can fully enjoy the Mediterranean atmosphere. This duplex in Palma is equipped with marble floors, air conditioning and heating. It is very well located in the historic center of Palma. Here you will find the most important monuments of the island's capital, such as its majestic cathedral "La Seu", the Royal Palace of La Almudaina and the contemporary art museum "Es Baluard", among others. The old town of Palma offers a variety of charming cafes, bars and restaurants. Here you can fully enjoy the unique atmosphere of this magical old town on the shores of the Mediterranean.

Its privileged location makes it perfect for those who seek to live close to everything they need: schools, parks, shopping centers, and with easy access to the highway. The property has a B2a rating and allows the construction of a ground floor and a first floor, each of approximately 75 m2, as well as a beautiful patio of 50 m2. The ground floor, which used to be a forge, has a closed area of 64.28 m2 and a terrace patio of 60 m2. If you are interested in this opportunity, do not hesitate to contact us. We will be happy to provide you with more information and to arrange a visit. "This property has been certified by ABSI (Balearic Association of Real Estate Services), which means that the agency has supervised the necessary documentation for the sale and that the property is part of the ABSI multi-exclusive properties. description: Fantastic 320 m2 Mediterranean villa in Puntiro with sea views. The property is built on a 8,864 m2 plot surrounded by greenery that gives it great privacy. The house is distributed in 2 levels with a large central patio that provides great light to all rooms throughout the day. It has a total of 5 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, 2 of them with en suite bathrooms, a large living room with access to the porch by the pool, large fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar and office area with access to the pantry and outdoor terraces. In the outdoor area we find beautiful gardens that surround the house, it has a 22 m2 porch in front of the 40 m2 pool area, annexed to the house we find the barbecue area and a small storage room. From the entire plot we can enjoy the views of the beach and the bay of Palma. The plot has 2 entrances, one driven and the other pedestrian through another street in the urbanization, it has an outdoor parking area for 4 vehicles. It has centralized heating by oil boiler in all rooms, all interior carpentry are north with double glazing, the shutters are made of aluminum, fully renovated kitchen, construction made with quality materials, 30 m2 cistern. AG Asociados: the best team for the best real estate management. Welcome home!

description: Mallorcan house with two floors in Biniali. If you are looking for the quiet village life, this house with Mallorcan character located in Biniali is what you are looking for. Located in the noble area of Biniali and close to the church, the general features of this property are as follows: • Biniali • 152 m2 living space • 3 double bedrooms and 1 single bedroom • 2 bathrooms • Inner courtyard • Extras: air conditioning, exterior and interior carpentry climalit, fireplace, equipped kitchen   This house renovated in 2014 located in Biniali, will allow you to live in a very nice, quiet village and just 30 minutes from the center of Palma. With a total of 152 m2 useful, its rooms have been distributed on two floors.   On the first floor, you will find a spacious and bright living room that will help you to disconnect and live new moments with your friends or family. As you can see in the pictures, the house is delivered unfurnished. An advantage since you can decorate your new home to your complete taste. Even if you wish, you could change the floor for a material that suits your tastes, for example.   The kitchen, which is unequipped, has been distributed in an L-shape leaving a large space to add a table or any furniture you need. Its high luminosity is due, in addition to the multiple windows and orientation, to its direct exit to the patio.   A very large outdoor space where you can do outdoor activities. Can you imagine having a small garden at home? To be able to cook with your own fresh products will be a pleasure that once you get to know it, it will seem unthinkable not to have it. In this patio you will have enough space to have your own vegetable garden, a fruit tree, your corner where you can exercise and a long etcetera.   On this first floor you will find 3 bedrooms. Two of them double and one single. You will have two bathrooms on this floor, a convenience when receiving visitors as you know you will always have one available.   It is in the kitchen where you will find a beautiful and traditional staircase that will lead you to the upper floor. There you will find an intimate and ideal space to have the master bedroom and a dressing room.   If you want to convert this great Mallorcan house into your future home, call or fill out the contact form.

description: Looking for a house in Son Espanyolet with views to the Bellver Castle and the Tramuntana mountains? In the upper part of the neighbourhood, with corner façade to 2 streets, we find this historical building of 2 floors, with good views from the first floor and from the roof of the building.  It has 310 m2 of constructed surface in 2 floors totally built, that is to say, the plot is 155 m2.  For this house has been made a reform project for a luxurious house of 200 m2 built, a patio of 55 m2 in the ground floor with swimming pool that can be covered to enjoy this space all the year round and a magnificent chillout area in the roof of 50 m2. Total of 305 m2 of usable space.  At the moment the ground floor is dedicated to a shop with high ceilings with wooden beams and on the first floor there are two flats. However, the possibilities are wide: the B2a regulations allow the location of up to 3 dwellings. For this reason this property can be adapted to your needs, a large house with patio and swimming pool, 2 semi-detached houses each one with its own roof terrace or 3 flats. Please contact us for more information. Does it fit your search?  Seize the opportunity! AG asociados Welcome Home.

description: For sale 4 bedroom apartment with large terrace in Josep Darder, Palma. Located in the commercial area of Pedro Garau and 10 minutes from the old town of Palma, this 4 bedroom apartment with terrace is quite possibly the home you are looking for. Its general characteristics are as follows: • Josep Darder, Palma • 135 m2 usable • 2 double and 2 single bedrooms • 2 bathrooms  • Terrace 140 m2 • Elevator • Parking included • Extras: fitted closets, central heating with city gas radiator, barbecue, balcony of 7m2 This spacious and functional apartment is located opposite the Boulevard Médico José Darder and is also close to multiple services and leisure areas. The old town of Palma is just a few minutes from home, as well as the most central beaches of the city. It represents an ideal home for families due to its functionality, spaciousness and also for its proximity to shopping areas, schools and supermarkets. With a living area of 140 m2 of interior, we find this functional and very well preserved apartment. Upon entering the apartment, you will find a hall that communicates with a double entrance to the living-dining room. With 40m2 of amplitude you can see from this room the Boulevard de Maestro José Darder and access from the dining room to a balcony of 7 m2. The hallway distributor communicates with the bedrooms, which are all exterior and have direct access to the balcony and views to the terrace, which is located on the same surface. Two bedrooms are doubles and the other two are singles, all of them have built-in closets. You will have at your disposal two complete bathrooms that are located between the bedrooms. At the end of the same corridor, you will find the kitchen-dining room of 30 m2 equipped with all appliances and a vertical oven. The kitchen also has direct access to the terrace, which will allow you better ventilation and greater communication with this outdoor space. A terrace of 140 m2, with an area covered by awnings and another completely open. You can see in the pictures an area with artificial grass floor where there is an area designed as a chill out. With such a large terrace, you will have an ideal space to disconnect from your domestic activities, exercise outdoors or enjoy evenings with your friends and family, for example. This modern apartment with all the carpentry lacquered in white is, as you have been able to see, in perfect condition. In addition, you will not have to worry about parking thanks to the parking with room for a large vehicle that you will have at your disposal. Undoubtedly, an ideal apartment for families, not only for its large size and outdoor spaces, but also for its excellent location just minutes from any shopping area and services. If you want to know more information about this functional apartment with terrace located in Josep Darder street, call 971888018 and ask us or fill out the contact form.

description: Apartment with parking included in Santa Catalina, Palma. With an extraordinary location in the heart of Santa Catalina, in the center of Palma, this large apartment includes in its price a parking space. With multiple services and leisure areas around it, the main features of this property are as follows: • Santa Catalina, Palma • 137 m2 living space • 4 double bedrooms • 2 bathrooms and 1 toilet • Double elevator • 3 balconies (2m2) • Terrace of 10m2 • Parking 11 m2 • Condition: original • Extras: fitted closets, air conditioning, double glazed windows, fully equipped kitchen This cozy apartment located in the center of Palma, is the ideal home for you to enjoy the proximity to all services and leisure areas. You can go walking, by bike or by public transport to anywhere in Palma. In addition, it has a terrace of 10 m2 ideal for you to enjoy during most of the year. With 137 m2 of interior very well distributed, when you arrive home the first thing you will see is a large hall. You can leave your keys and coat in this area whenever you want. You will notice in the images that highlights its large kitchen. An independent space of approximately 30 m2 with a large pantry so you do not have any problem when storing food.  Its bright living-dining room enjoys a great natural light during most of the day. You will have direct access to the main terrace, which has a table with chairs for you to enjoy your morning coffee with a light breeze. The four double bedrooms have fitted closets and have their own 2m2 balcony. Ideal for better ventilation of the room, to have a greater luminosity and to put a small chair if you wish. With 2 full bathrooms and 1 toilet, surely neither you nor your guests will have any problem waiting to go to the bathroom. In addition, you can even reserve one of the bathrooms as the main bathroom for your exclusive use. This apartment represents an incredible investment opportunity, because although it is already in good condition, with a partial renovation it would increase its potential even more.  If you want to know more details of this apartment located in Santa Catalina, do not hesitate to contact us.

On the ground floor we find the spacious living room with access to the front and rear garden, and with a wood-burning fireplace. The kitchen with ceramic hob has access to the garden with a built-in barbecue and a small pool. At the entrance we also have a small guest toilet. On the first floor we find three bedrooms, one of them with an en-suite bathroom with a very bright south-facing window. The two spacious bedrooms have fitted wardrobes and a full bathroom. On the second floor we find two double rooms with an en-suite bathroom in each of them. And a skylight in the center of the plant that lets in sunlight. At the bottom there is a storage basement of about 12m2 and access to the garage with capacity for two cars. It is located in a very nice and well-kept gated community with a road of trees around it. The community pool is modernized with saline chlorination. Do not miss the opportunity to live in one of the best areas of Palma, call us and make a visit.

description: High comfort ground floor in energy efficiency and ecological architecture design, located in El Molinar, a few meters from the Paseo del Portixol. The sustainable architecture building through laminated wood construction "CLT" (Cross Laminated Timber) gives exclusive comfort that is perceived in the warmth of its wide distribution spaces and that help to reduce the carbon footprint of the building and guarantees minimum energy consumption for heating the home. Top quality materials with triple glazing, AA. DC. through aerothermal energy, insulation of false ceilings in sound rooms, "Cortizo" brand glass railings, electric shutters. The set gives it an A energy rating. The ground floor of 97 m2 is distributed in a large kitchen with an open concept to the dining room and living room of more than 40 m2, two double bedrooms with two full bathrooms (one en suite) with a raised In Wash toilet (Japanese toilet style) and utility room. with engine room. The self-supporting structure of the building is made up of 100 and 120 mm CLT panels, leaving it visible in bedrooms and main rooms due to its pleasant touch and warmth that only wood can give. The floors are also made up of 150 mm laminated panels. Beauty, warmth and an excellent location in one of the most privileged areas of the city of Palma, with easy access to an extensive restaurant service, maritime port area, promenades and beaches. Also sold in the same building: FIRST FLOOR: 124m² built apartment distributed in a spacious living-dining room with an integrated open-concept kitchen of approximately 40m², three bedrooms, two bathrooms (one en suite), utility room with machine room and 5m² terrace facing south and sea views. Price €750,000 SECOND FLOOR: 124m² built apartment with sea views distributed in a spacious living-dining room with an open concept kitchen of approximately 40m², three bedrooms, two bathrooms (one en suite), laundry room with machine room and 5m² terrace facing south and sea views, with access to another 45m² terrace for private use with unobstructed 180 degree views of the sea and the bay of Palma. Price €2,000, 000 PENTHOUSE: 53m² built, distributed in a spacious living-dining room with an integrated open-concept kitchen, a bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and a 38m² terrace on the same level with 180-degree views of the sea and the bay of Palma. Price €1,000, 000 ALL apartments have a parking space included in the price.

description: For sale fantastic independent house in the municipality of Marratxí in the exclusive area of Son Ametler.( THE ACADEMY-INTERNATIONAL SCHOOL ) The property has 303m2 built on a 1000m2 plot that is distributed as follows: Front with a large and glamorous natural grass garden with a fountain in the central area where you can organize fantastic evenings with friends and family, surrounded by large cupressus cypress trees, which provide fabulous privacy. Leaving aside the garden, at the main entrance is the access for vehicles, where you can park several cars (24m2 garage). We can also enjoy its fantastic 30m2 porch next to the entrance of the house, a quiet and cool place where tranquility and privacy accompanies you at all times. Rear divided into three comfortable rooms, one of them dedicated exclusively to the pool, 46m2, with mixed soil, natural grass and Majorcan seas, has its own shower, with direct entrance from the garage, storage room and kitchen.In the second we can find a large and sunny barbecue area, surrounded by native flowers and plants, with a beautiful magnolia and lemon tree.Among both, it is worth highlighting its fabulous 10m2 rear porch, full of tranquility and privacy.And finally, we can find a free area of approximately 120m2, where the machine room (treatment plant) is located, a fantastic place where you can grow your own vegetables. The interior of the house is made up of 4 double rooms, divided equally into the first and second floors, the main room on the first floor is facing north and views of the pool, the second room on this same floor is Located between the latter and the bathroom, overlooking the main garden and south-east facing, the toilet has a bathtub, heated towel rail and north facing. On the same floor, with its 160m2, you will enjoy a huge living room with a fireplace, which can be accessed from the main porch itself and where we will find the stairs to access its upper floor and the kitchen, the latter divided into two parts, with views to its back garden and pool, where you can enjoy its space created for the comfort of diners due to its proximity. The second floor with 97m2, consists of a large study room, a wonderful terrace overlooking the entrance and main garden, two double bedrooms plus their corresponding bathroom, the latter with an en-suite entrance to its main room, it has a his own dressing room. Fantastic distribution and use of space and light. We must highlight the top quality materials, north carpentry, insulation... It has air conditioning distributed by rooms, underfloor heating (gas-oil) and electric stove. HOUSING WITH END OF WORK AND URBAN LAND. In its surroundings we will find multiple services such as schools, buses, supermarkets, green areas and a fantastic proximity to the accesses of the Ma-13 variant.All surrounded by peace, tranquility and nature, do not miss this wonderful opportunity, come see your future home, the one you have been dreaming of having for so long!

This semi-detached house, located in Arabella, in one of the most peaceful and desirable areas of the city, is the perfect place to enjoy family life. The exterior carpentry in white aluminium with double glazing and the interior doors lacquered in white provide a modern and elegant aesthetic. In addition, the villa has a garage space in the basement and a large multipurpose area, with an additional bedroom and a suite bathroom. This property is in an unbeatable location, close to the best schools in the city, the most exclusive golf courses and all the necessary services just a few minutes away. description: Semi-detached house for sale in Son Armadams   If you want a piece of history to be part of your home, this exclusive property is perfect to make your dream come true. Famous among those who love history, the Tower of Son Armadams is the core of what once was a great "possessió" or traditional Majorcan house dating from the 12th century and forming part of Spain's Historical Heritage. As a gift from King Jaime I to the Armadams family, it is the monument that later gave its name to the well-known neighborhood of Son Armadams, one of the best valued areas of Palma, being located just 2 minutes from the famous neighborhood of Santa Catalina and its market, but enjoying at the same time a lot of peace and privacy due to its prestigious location. The house retains the charm of the time it was built, with the original stone flooring and wooden beams dating back to the 1400s. There are three ways to access the property: community, private and service. The hall behind the main entrance is very spacious and has a special charm, since it maintains the original stone floors. On one side there is a bright living room with a fireplace, a bathroom, a kitchen with a pantry and a dining room; on the other side is what was the old chapel. The tower is accessed from two sides: here are the four bedrooms with their own bathroom, equipped with air conditioning and heating. On the lower floor there is another bedroom with its own bathroom, natural light and fitted wardrobes, a wine cellar and access to the underground garage with two parking spaces. The property enjoys the use of a communal swimming pool, to which only the other two neighboring apartments have access, and a 130 m² terrace.

description: A unique property is offered in one of the most sought-after and high-demand areas of the city, this is the opportunity you have been waiting for. This building for sale is one of the few remaining in the area and offers possibilities for unique architectural renovations. The property has a perfect distribution to make the most of the 280 m2 of available space. The farm is made up of two dwellings, that is, two registry units with separate cadastral references, both registered as dwellings. The house on the ground floor was renovated in 2010 and has a mezzanine of about 40 m2, its constructed area is 110 m2. Then we have the house on the first floor, with independent access, which is the one that can be seen in the photos that is not habitable and has to be completely rehabilitated. The complete set is sold. The building has a major work reform license with fees already paid in December 2022, this is very important since the process is already underway and the time it takes to deliver the license will be less. You will not find another building in the area that offers the possibilities and exclusivity that this one. With an unbeatable location in the old town of Palma de Mallorca, you will be able to enjoy all the charm of the city and its innumerable attractions. It is an ideal opportunity to have a complete farm to reform to suit the buyer. If desired, the two houses can be kept and two separate registration units can be created. We have a certificate of non-existence of urban infringement. Do not think twice and take advantage of this unique opportunity to invest in an exclusive property in the old town of Palma de Mallorca. Contact us for more information and to schedule a visit!

description: This magnificent villa in El Terreno boasts a rich history as the former residence of the renowned artist Santiago Rusiñol. The stunning facade, adorned with stucco and protected statues, has been meticulously restored and seamlessly integrated into the villa's exquisite design. The property offers a total of 318 square meters of living space and an additional 52 square meters of terrace. It includes four bedrooms and five bathrooms, a swimming pool, and parking. Upon entering the property, you will be greeted by a spacious garden with a private pool and sun terrace that leads into the house. The first floor features an open and light-filled living area with a beautiful outdoor patio complete with a waterfall, Mediterranean planting, and rock wall, perfect for entertaining guests or enjoying a relaxing evening. You'll also find a versatile room on this level that can be used as a bedroom, office, or similar. Upstairs, the villa offers a spacious master bedroom and two additional bedrooms, each with built-in wardrobes and en-suite bathrooms. From here, you can access the outdoor terrace and the unique and spacious roof terraces with its charming tower. The basement of the villa includes two additional rooms that could be used as a gym or spa area, a pool bathroom, and a historical cistern that was discovered during construction and converted into a wine cellar. This property is conveniently located just a short distance from Palma's historic old town and nearby beaches, making it a hidden gem in the thriving area of El Terreno. Completion of renovations is expected by mid-2023.

description: This wonderful apartment is located in the most sought-after exclusive communities in Illetes, The Anchorage, from where you have direct sea access and other desirable amenities. From the lovely terrace and from the master bedroom you can enjoy views of the sea.   The apartment has an open fully equipped kitchen, an open living area, and a dining area with large windows providing a lot of light. The 14m2 terrace links perfectly with the living area from where you can enjoy lovely views of the sea.   There are two double bedrooms and the master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and sea views. The apartment is in great shape and is ready to move into. There is also a garage included in the price and an 8m2 storage room can be purchased on the side. The furnishings are negotiable.   The Anchorage, or as it’s described “a little paradise”, is an exclusive community located just by the sea and is an idyllic and tranquil spot only 10 minutes from Palma.   Here you can enjoy their luxurious facilities that include a beach, tennis court with sea views, and five swimming pools, set in picturesque tropical gardens, all expertly and lovingly maintained. There is also a gym, spa, bar, and a lovely restaurant within the community.   The Anchorage is home to a cosmopolitan community, which prides itself on maintaining the highest standards and is always seeking ways to improve. That’s why we come back time and time again.

With this townhouse you have the opportunity to build another two additional floors on top of the existing property making this not only an enjoyable home for you, but also a lucrative investment.  The townhouse is distributed with a hallway with high ceilings, open lounge area, open fully equipped kitchen that connects to the dining area. The fully opened floor to ceiling windows provide a lot of light and creates the perfect outside in experience.  The garden is approximately 60m2 and here you have an outdoor kitchen, a shade for sunny days, an outdoor shower and a feature plant. The property comes fully furnished with contemporary furniture.  Son Espanyolet is perfect if you are searching for peace and quiet but still want to be close to everything Palma has to offer. With many schools close by it is a popular choice for families. Living in Son Espanyolet means you are close to the amazing food court in Santa Catalina, as well as Palma Sport & Tennis Club and the popular street full of restaurants, Carrer de la Fabrica.

description: We present this wonderful rustic finca on one floor located in s'Esgleieta, just 20 minutes from Palma. With a lot of Mallorcan charm and a perfect orientation, this beautiful house is located on a plot of approx. 1,652 m2 and has a living space of approx. 194 m2 distributed in a spacious living-dining room, a spacious living-dining room and fireplace, an open kitchen fully furnished and equipped with a dining area, fireplace and direct access to the terrace, 3 bedrooms in total (1 master with an en-suite bathroom and 2 bedrooms more with fitted wardrobes and a bathroom), office and a laundry room. The house has privileged panoramic views of the Sierra de Tramuntana mountains and surroundings, a place full of charm, with beautiful homes that make this municipality a magical and unique place. In addition, you can enjoy quality time in its large garden and several terraces. And if you want, there is the possibility of building a pool. It has oil central heating, exterior aluminum shutters, a water tank and a solar system, all kinds of amenities at your disposal. If you are a demanding client, this is your future home. Get in touch with us, we will be happy to help you. Our objective is yours, to sell at the best price in the shortest possible time.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Valldemossa
suggestedTexts.title: Country home in Calle Ramon Gual des Mur

description: Can Carrero is a beautifully restored 19th-century Mallorcan house, originally two separate homes now converted into one. The house underwent full reconstruction in 2020 and boasts a constructed area of 272 m2 with terraces front (70 m2) and back (40 m2). The property is connected to mains electricity and water is provided at no cost from a neighbour. Situated on a 5000 m2 plot, surrounded by protected land with no possibility of new construction in the valley, it provides stunning mountain views in Andratx. The house features natural stone flooring on the ground floor and natural wood flooring in the rooms and hallways, along with underfloor heating and an aerothermal Daikin heat pump system for AC in all rooms. There are three bedrooms, each with an en-suite bathroom, a custom-made kitchen from the brand DICA and a living room with exposed wooden beams and high ceiling height, letting in ample natural light. The landscaped garden boasts 18 fruit trees and 20 olive trees, an irrigation system, exterior lighting and a parking area for 5-6 vehicles. There will also be a 7 m2 spa pool heated with bubbles, a barbecue station with an elevating grill and an exterior pergola with an iron structure. This is a truly unique and charming home, perfect for those seeking a peaceful and picturesque environment.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Andratx Pueblo, Andratx
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de Sa Font

description: This attractive villa in San Agustin requires reform, has a lot of potential, offers beautiful views of the sea and is located in a cul-de-sac, in a very quiet residential area, not far from the beach, in a neighborhood of the capital of the island - Palma de Mallorca.The Mediterranean property has a constructed area of approx.339 m2 distributed as follows: The main floor offers a living/dining room with fireplace, a kitchen, 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, an office and a large terrace with sea views.From the terrace, the external staircase leads to the upper floor, where there is a studio with a bedroom and a bathroom.From here you have beautiful unobstructed views towards the mountains.On the upper floor there is a large apartment with a separate entrance, with 2 bedrooms, bathroom, kitchen and living/dining room.From here you can access the large garden, which leaves a lot of space for design.This attractive villa in San Agustín is equipped with air conditioning, gas central heating and wooden windows.It is an excellent and quiet location, just 1 km from a beautiful little beach, as well as several beautiful coves with turquoise waters.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Agustí, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de Mònaco

description: Located in the heart of the town, we present this beautiful town house in Andratx.The authentic 3-storey property captivates with its unbeatable location and lots of potential.On the ground floor there are 2 commercial premises of approx.60 m2, ready to be exploited.The bright upper floors house the spacious apartment.This is divided into a large living-/dining room with access to a wonderful sunny terrace with views of the mountains and a toilet on the 1st floor and 4 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 2 bathrooms, one of them en suite, on the 2nd floor. .All spaces are open and generously designed.The property could use an update and is currently equipped with air conditioning in 2 rooms, fireplace, tiled floor and storage room.Andratx is a beautiful municipality located in the southwestern part of the island, nestled in one of the valleys of the Sierra de Tramontana and considered one of the oldest towns on the island.The nearest international airport is in Palma de Mallorca, 25 km away.A few minutes by car you will reach Puerto Andratx, a famous and exclusive marina with a wide variety of exclusive restaurants and boutiques.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Andratx Pueblo, Andratx
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house in Calle de sa Constitució

neighborhood: Son Roca - Son Ximelis - Son Anglada
description: This beautiful ground floor in Palma de Mallorca has a beautiful private garden and is located in a privileged residential area, close to golf courses, in the quiet La Vileta neighborhood.The attractive apartment has a constructed area of approx.51 m2 distributed as follows: an elegant living/dining room with access to the garden, a modern American kitchen with Bosch appliances, a spacious bedroom, a bathroom, as well as a utility room.The well-kept community offers owners a fantastic community pool and garden areas, to fully enjoy the wonderful Mediterranean atmosphere on the beautiful island of Mallorca.The equipment features of this attractive ground floor apartment in Palma include: air conditioning, double glazed windows, built-in wardrobe and tiled floors.At your disposal you have a space in the underground garage.It is a very attractive location close to golf courses and only a few minutes' drive from a variety of wonderful coves and beaches with crystal clear waters.The international airport is only 15 minutes away by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Roca - Son Ximelis - Son Anglada, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Son Puig

description: In Santa Catalina, this apartment of approximately 90 square meters with many possibilities for reform. You can make 1, 2 or 3 rooms, according to the requirements of the new owner. A few meters from the Santa Catalina market, two steps from the Paseo Marítimo and facing west. This apartment is located on the third floor and has a small terrace on the 8 de marzo square that gives a lot of light to the two rooms, kitchen, 2 bedrooms, a bathroom and a toilet. You can see the floor plan, and some possible reform projects. The building is currently undergoing rehabilitation, with an amount already paid. Community fees: 80€/month IBI Property Tax: 70€/quarter Contact us and we will be happy to schedule a visit.
