suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Sant Magí, 22

description: Penthouse with terrace in Son Ferriol. A few minutes from beaches, services, and the center of Palma, this amazing penthouse with 2 bedrooms, can become your new home. A very bright and cozy house that consists of the following main features:  • Son Ferriol • 76 m2 usable • 1 double bedroom and 1 single bedroom • 1 bathroom • Large terrace • Parking space (1) with 2 storerooms This bright penthouse without elevator, is located in a very quiet residential area that will help you to disconnect and rest when you get home. With a total of 76 m2 of interior, its rooms have been divided as follows. When you enter your new home, you will see its functional and warm living-dining room. And from this room you will have direct access to a balcony, from where you can enjoy beautiful unobstructed views. The eat-in kitchen, fully furnished and equipped with first class appliances, has total visibility to the living room, which favors the natural lighting of the room. If you enjoy cooking, this room will be one of your favorites. Of the total number of bedrooms, one of them is double and the other is single. Of course, both have a great luminosity that favors the warmth throughout the home and fitted closets. Being an attic, one of the rooms that stands out is undoubtedly its upper terrace. A very large space that you can decorate according to your tastes and needs to make the most of it. It will allow you to do outdoor activities, enjoy a sunset accompanied or relax while reading. Undoubtedly, the ideal home that will bring you a greater well-being and quality of life in your day to day. In addition, you will be just minutes from the main service and leisure areas, but without living in the center of the city. If you want to know more information about this penthouse located in Son Ferriol, do not hesitate to contact us.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Ferriol, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This exceptional house in Esporlas with stunning views of the Sierra de Tramuntana, is the ideal place to connect with nature. The villa has a constructed area of approx. 150 m2, divided into 2 floors as follows: at the entrance there is a large garden and a swimming pool that is currently covered and can be discovered with a small reform. The upper floor offers 2 bedrooms, one with an en-suite bathroom and a separate bathroom with sauna and bathtub. All the rooms are accessible from the outside and the living/dining room is connected to a large kitchen with an outside area and a fantastic L-shaped balcony with incredible panoramic views of the town of Esporles and the mountains. From the balcony you can access 2 terraces at the back of the house and the covered pool, while stairs lead up to the roof terrace with more spectacular views. On the ground floor there is a single apartment, ideal to be used as a guest flat, also with magnificent views and beautiful surroundings. Other features: air conditioning and underfloor heating, double glazed windows, fireplace. The house has a modern look and was built with high quality materials. In addition, all furniture is included in the sale price. A perfect villa for those who would love to live in absolute tranquility and in the middle of nature.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Esporles
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Urbanització es Verger

description: This beautiful villa in Costa de la Calma is characterized by a large distribution of space, high ceilings and is located in a quiet residential area, close to the beach, in the southwest of the island Mallorca. The attractive property has a living space of approx. 315 m2 distributed over 2 floors as follows: the ground floor has a large living room, an American kitchen with an island, a bedroom, a bathroom and a guest toilet. The first floor consists of 4 bedrooms, one of them with a large dressing room, as well as 2 en-suite bathrooms. Each bedroom has access to the balcony. In the beautiful outdoor area there is a fantastic pool to fully enjoy the hot summer days. The equipment features of this modern villa in Costa de la Calma include: air conditioning, underfloor heating and double glazed windows. At your disposal you have a garage with space for 4 cars. The villa has a very attractive location, just a few minutes drive from the beach and several beautiful coves with crystal clear waters. There is a possibility to get the vacation license. Enjoy the magical Mediterranean atmosphere on the beautiful island Mallorca!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Costa de la Calma, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle del Pinar

address: Calle de Joan Mascaró i Fornés
description: Located in the district of Es Secar de la Real and overlooking the football stadium ''Estadi Mallorca Son Moix'', we present this fantastic penthouse in Palma. The bright property, located on the 5th floor of a large building with elevator and communal garage, stands out for its grandiose roof terrace of approx. 188 m2 with views of the mountains and the landscape, an ideal place to enjoy the sun and pleasant gatherings with friends and family. The beautiful apartment has a living space of approx. 81 m2 that is divided into a beautiful living-/dining room with access to the fabulous terrace, a magnificent independent and fully equipped kitchen, 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 2 bathrooms, one of them en suite. All bedrooms have large windows towards the terrace and unobstructed views. It is a very well located apartment, fully furnished and perfectly maintained. Other features: Dressing room, hot/cold air conditioning, central heating by radiators, climalit windows and a parking space in the community garage included in the price. On floor 0 of the building there is a very spacious community area, ideal for spending time with the neighbors. The area of Es Secar de la Real is a quiet residential area, close to several parks and the mountains, surrounded by nature, and at the same time close to the center of Palma.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Secar de la Real, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de Joan Mascaró i Fornés

description: This magnificent house is a true gem located in the exclusive Cala Gamba area with a stunning seafront view. With approximately 330m2 of constructed area, it features 6 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, a spacious open-plan living room with breathtaking sea views, a large kitchen with dining area, pantry, and laundry, 3 bathrooms, and a guest toilet. The house opens up to the outside with several terraces, a private patio, covered porch, and a roof terrace with magnificent views. The basement can be used as a wine cellar or storage room and it also comes with a covered garage and additional outdoor parking spaces. Other features include: central gas heating, air conditioning (hot/cold), and double glazing. Located near the center of Palma and the airport, Cala Gamba is a charming promenade that makes this area one of the most sought-after on the island.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Coll d'En Rabassa, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Paseo Cala Gamba

description: Only 10 minutes by car from Valldemossa and the center of Palma, we present this beautiful villa on one level in S'Esgleieta. This fantastic family home, east facing and with Majorcan charm, is located in the Son Maixella urbanization, a quiet and highly sought after urbanization in Valldemossa, surrounded by beautiful nature. From here you have a fantastic panoramic view of the Sierra de Tramuntana mountains and the surrounding almond groves. The chalet is located on a plot of approx. 1,652 m2 and has a living space of approx. 194 m2, distributed on one floor as follows: An entrance hall, a spacious living-/dining room and fireplace, an open kitchen with dining area, fireplace and access to the terrace, a master bedroom with fitted wardrobes and a bathroom in suite, 2 more bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a bathroom, office and a laundry room. The magnificent exterior impresses with a barbecue area with a toilet and a garage for 2 vehicles. Other features: Oil central heating, exterior aluminum blinds, water tank and a solar system. The property stands out for its large garden and several terraces. In addition, there is the possibility of building a pool.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Valldemossa
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Vell

description: Located only 50 meters from the sea, we present this beautiful 3-storey building in Son Verí.The attractive property, with sea views from the sunny communal roof terrace, is situated on a landscaped plot of approx.1,145 m2, with the possibility of building a refreshing community pool and offers 10 individual apartments of approx.50 m2 each (4 studios and 6 one-bedroom apartments).The building consists of 3 spacious floors that are divided as follows: 5 apartments with a terrace on the ground floor, 3 apartments with a terrace on the 1st floor and 2 apartments with a terrace on the 2nd floor.In addition, there is a fantastic community roof terrace with sea views, the ideal place to meet the neighbors, have barbecues and spend time in good company.It is an excellent investment property.Other features: Climalit windows and air conditioning in some apartments.It is a very attractive situation, in the south of the island of Mallorca, a few steps from the sea and surrounded by all the necessary services such as supermarkets, bars, pharmacies and restaurants.The Maioris golf course is only 5, the international airport about 10 minutes by car.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de Fra Juníper Serra

address: Calle de Francesc Vidal i Sureda
description: This property is located in Bonanova, a sought-after district of Palma, with stunning views of the Bellver Castle and the Sierra de Traumuntana. The recently finished villa has been built on a large 2,290m2 flat plot with a constructed area of 551m2. The villa is distributed over 2 levels with the ground floor offering a large entrance area, leading into a bright open lounge, a fully equipped kitchen and dining area, an office, 3 bedrooms all with en-suite bathrooms, a garage with space for 3 cars and guest toilet. From the living area there is access to a covered terrace with an outdoor kitchen space, dining area and BBQ, as well as a chill out area and steps down the large salt water swimming pool surrounded by a decked area with sunbeds. Additionally, there is a mediterranean garden and another covered relaxation area. The first floor is where you will find the spacious master bedroom with a large en-suite bathroom, a walk-in-wardrobe and its own private terrace. Further features: Poliform wardrobes, underfloor heating throughout the villa and air conditioning hot/cold. The property also comes fully furnished by Terazza Balear.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Bonanova - Porto Pi, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de Francesc Vidal i Sureda

description: This attractive villa in San Agustin requires reform, has a lot of potential, offers beautiful views of the sea and is located in a cul-de-sac, in a very quiet residential area, not far from the beach, in a neighborhood of the capital of the island - Palma de Mallorca.The Mediterranean property has a constructed area of approx.339 m2 distributed as follows: The main floor offers a living/dining room with fireplace, a kitchen, 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, an office and a large terrace with sea views.From the terrace, the external staircase leads to the upper floor, where there is a studio with a bedroom and a bathroom.From here you have beautiful unobstructed views towards the mountains.On the upper floor there is a large apartment with a separate entrance, with 2 bedrooms, bathroom, kitchen and living/dining room.From here you can access the large garden, which leaves a lot of space for design.This attractive villa in San Agustín is equipped with air conditioning, gas central heating and wooden windows.It is an excellent and quiet location, just 1 km from a beautiful little beach, as well as several beautiful coves with turquoise waters.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de Mònaco

description: This beautiful country house in located in Es Pilarí, surrounded by nature and tranquillity, so you can enjoy absolute privacy, but also just 10 minutes from the center of Palma and 5 minutes from the beach. The large property offers a plot of approximately 9500m2 with a built-up area of approximately 480m2 and is distributed across 2 levels with a separate guest house. The property was built around 1850, but has been restored with high-quality natural stone and the old windmill tower has been converted into a wine cellar.  The main house offers a spacious living room with an open fireplace, a fully equipped kitchen, a heated conservatory that is currently used as a TV room, 4 spacious bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. From the living area there is direct access to a large terrace with an outdoor kitchen and 70m2 swimming pool. The 50m2 guest house has a living area, another bedroom and a bathroom. The finca has gas central heating and new Mitsubishi air conditioners hot/cold in all rooms and has a large garage with space for 2 vehicles plus a workshop. There is also the option to purchase an additional 30,000m2 of land next to the house for animals. Additional features: The property has a brand new photovoltaic system of the latest generation and a battery storage of 15KW, which supplies the entire property. In addition, Endesa has a 11.5 KW power connection. The large property is divided into different sub-areas, which can be used e. g. for keeping horses, riding arena, tennis courts, etc. Agricultural machines (John Deere tractor, plough, lawn tractor can be taken over). There is also a large, natural koi pond in the lower part of the property.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: S'Aranjassa - Es Pil.larí, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Estate in Camino de Muntanya

description: Are you looking for your home 5 minutes from Palma, but in a quiet area away from noise? With everything you need at your fingertips. Pórtol is a town in Marrachí, located in the southwestern part of Mallorca. This beautiful first floor is completely ready to move into. It is a 77 m2 house distributed in a hall, living-dining room with access to a balcony and unobstructed views, fully furnished and equipped kitchen, 2 double bedrooms (one of them currently with use of a dressing room), 1 bathroom and 1 toilet. In addition, it has a PARKING SPACE in a 2-storey farm, very familiar and cozy. Get in touch with us, we will be happy to help you. Our objective is yours, to sell at the best price in the shortest possible time.

description: Ground-floor Apartment for Sale in Palma/Son Espanyolet. Palma, beautifully refurbished ground-floor apartment in Son Espanyolet/Santa Catalina. The property has a living area of 80 m2 with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathrooms & 1 guest bathroom, an open living/kitchen area and a patio of 60 m2. Renovated to a high standard, with beautiful features and character. Underfloor heating, air conditioning, double glazed windows, terrace with BBQ area. The property comes fully furnished.

description: This luxury apartment is located in a sea front residential complex on Paseo Maritimo,  a desired area of Palma, right on the promenade. This apartment is on the 4th floor, which can be accessed by elevator. The property offers a constructed area of 320m2 distributed into a spacious living room with a dining area, a separate well equipped kitchen with a pantry and laundry room, an office, 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. Two of the bathrooms are en-suite and the other is separate. All rooms have access to one of the two terraces, the large terrace has spectacular views over the Paseo Marítimo. Additionally, 2 spacious car parking spaces and a storage room comes included in the price. The community offers a communal area with a gym, sauna and large swimming pool. The facade of the building was completely renovated in 2022. Other Features: double glazed windows, electric blinds, parquet floors, fitted wardrobes, marble floors, centralised hot and cold air conditioning throughout, as well as gas radiators.

description: BRAND NEW REFORM WITH SPECTACULAR 570 M2 TERRACE! 80 m2 apartment + 570 m2 terrace located on the first line of the sea in Playa de Palma (Arenal), Mallorca. The distribution is made up of a living room, an equipped kitchen with a dining area, 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (the main one en suite) and a utility room. Air conditioning with heat pump throughout the house. Parking space included in the sale price. Southwest orientation. Direct views of the sea and the beach. On sale furnished and equipped.

description: CLEAR VIEWS AND LOTS OF LIGHT! 140 m2 apartment located in the Tennis Mallorca area next to the Paseo Maritimo in Palma. Large living-dining room of approx. 45 m2, 4 bedrooms (3 doubles + 1 single), 2 en-suite bathrooms, courtesy toilet and furnished and equipped kitchen. City gas central heating and air conditioning. Parking space and storage room included in the sale price. Recently renovated plumbing and electrical installation.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Armadams, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in can baro

description: This ground floor apartment with stunning sea views is located in the sought-after residential area Cas Catala, only two minutes from the turquoise sea and sandy beach.  The apartment offers a very spacious terrace with sun throughout the entire day, something that is difficult to find in the surrounding areas from where you can enjoy sea views. There is a covered part of the terrace and a pergola to be finalised, perfect for hot days and privacy.  The inside area is spacious as well, with an open living area with a functioning fireplace, and a dining area provided with light from large glazed sliding doors. There is a fully equipped kitchen with an adjacent utility area with washing and drying machines. You have the opportunity to extend both the living area and kitchen further more out to the terrace with glazed panels. As well as remove the wall in between the living area and kitchen for open planning.  All the bedrooms are double and perfectly planned next to one another and with the bathrooms in between. Here you have the opportunity to connect the two bedrooms to the terrace with a sea view through two doors.  This apartment has got great potential and with a fair amount of updates, it will become a great investment as well.  Extra features are AC hot/cold, fans, a storage room, and double underground parking spaces included in the price. Cas Catala is a sought-after residential area just a few minutes from the beach, close to great restaurants, and the Bendinat golf course. All conveniences you need are close by such as supermarkets, pharmacies, and everyday shops.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cas Catala, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle d'olivera

description: This beautiful townhouse in Sol de Mallorca has just undergone a complete renovation and is now ready for sale. With a total area of 116 m2, plus a loft of 20 m2, this townhouse is spacious and full of natural light. The property features 3/4 bedrooms, allowing for flexible use of space to accommodate your lifestyle needs. There are 2 modern bathrooms, also newly renovated and finished to a high standard. The living area is bright and airy with large windows that provide plenty of natural light. The townhouse has 3 terraces, perfect for enjoying the beautiful weather and taking in the stunning surroundings. The terraces are also ideal for entertaining and al fresco dining with friends and family. This townhouse is located within a community that offers a swimming pool and garden, perfect for relaxing in the sun and enjoying the warm Mediterranean climate. The community is well-maintained and offers a peaceful and serene atmosphere. The property is sold with a garage space and an outside parking. Other Features: Reversible air conditioning in every room, underfloor heating downstairs.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sol de Mallorca, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: House

description: Flat for sale in El Toro (Puerto Adriano). One of the most modern ports in the Mediterranean and an exceptional base for small, medium and large yachts. Design, nautical services, a great gastronomic offer and fashionable shops, this is where our flat is located. The harbour beach is only a few metres away. Magnificent infrastructure and communication with all kinds of facilities and shops. It has 80m2 of surface: a living-dining room, kitchen, bathroom and two double bedrooms. Small terrace facing the harbour. One parking space.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Toro, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Gran Via, 16

description: This spectacular complex in one of the most demanded areas of Mallorca, for being a few meters from the sea and 10 minutes from the city center. The complex has: Two semi-detached villas with indefinite vacation rental license for 9 places (capacity for 11/12 pax) plus two semi-basements converted into homes of approximately 100 m2 each, it has a living room with integrated kitchen, two bedrooms, a bathroom, dressing room and with their corresponding English patios. These villas are located in the famous residential area of Can Pastilla - Cala Estancia, they were built in 2008 and are located on a plot of approx 1,200 square meters. On the ground floor there is the hall, the kitchen, a very spacious dining room, 1 bedroom with a built-in wardrobe, 1 bathroom and the utility room. The first floor has 3 bedrooms all with fitted wardrobes and the master bedroom with dressing room and bathroom en suite and another additional bathroom. There is a closed room that could be used as a second living room and a large sunny terrace on the top floor. All rooms offer direct access to terraces that surround the entire building with unobstructed views of the sea and mountains. From the dining room you reach another large terrace with a private pool (each villa) that is located in the garden with lawn, palm trees, platform, barbecue, etc. Large porch near the pool with access from the dining room, utility room and kitchen. In the semi-basement floor, in addition to the houses, there is 1 large room currently used as a warehouse with direct access from the villa. The house has a constructed area of 410 square meters, including the semi-basement. The additional space of terraces and patio is about 400 square meters each villa. The villas have integrated heating, air conditioning and pre-installation for a fireplace in the dining rooms. The villas are modern in design, very bright and cozy and correspond exactly to the expectations of modern life. Around them they have a large garden with palm trees, lawn, planters and pebbled areas.

description: APARTMENT WITH PASSIVE CONSTRUCTION STANDARD 200 METRES FROM THE PORTIXOL PROMENADE! The apartment has 117 interior metres plus a terrace of 5 metres with south orientation.  The layout of the apartment consists of a spacious living-dining room with an integrated kitchen of more than 40 metres, and with floor to ceiling windows that provide a lot of light to the property, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, one of them en suite and a separate laundry room. The apartment has been built under the passive construction standards, which gives it an A energy rating and maximum comfort to the houses. The property features are: laminated wood construction, triple glazing, AC through aerothermics, insulation of false ceilings in soundproofed rooms, glass railings cortizo brand. Portixol is one of the most exclusive and sought after areas of Mallorca, due to its promenade, ideal for sports or walking, a multitude of international restaurants and cafés, beaches and its proximity to the centre of Palma and the airport. Contact us to visit this exclusive property and we will send you the virtual tour!

It is also situated 10 minutes walking distance from the famous Santa Catalina neighboorhod which is famous for its lively atmosphere, and 15 minutes from Palma's promenade, ideal for strolling or practising sports all year round due to the mild climate that Majorca offers. description: This beautifully restored 15th-century property is located on a quiet street just by Palma’s historically first plaza where orange trees grows. The property has been entirety renovated with the highest standards and qualities along with a restoration of original architectural features.  The property is divided into five floors and you can reach all of them with a private lift. Natural daylight comes through the large lightwell with a green plant wall and reaches ground level to the fourth floor.  In the basement you have a climatized pool, a sauna, a steam room, a gym and separate laundry room.  From the ground floor you’ll enter from an elegant hallway that leads you the main staircase reaching you to all floors. Here you also have a two car garage with car turntable for easy access and extra space for smaller vehicles.  The first and second floor are the floors for all the five bedrooms with large en-suite bathrooms and high-end walking closets and fitted wardrobes.  Third floor is for ideal for social gatherings with a large entirely open living room with a bathroom.  On the fourth floor you have an open fully equipped designer’s kitchen with wine fridges and an open dining area just in front of the lightwell. Here you also have a bathroom. The magnificent spacious rooftop offers an outdoor kitchen with an island for seating, jacuzzi (at owners request) and space for lounging and sunbeds.  Extra features include, underfloor heating (in all primary living areas), SONOS sound system or similar, House Domotic system, OTIS dumb waiter servicing floors four, five and terrace, osmosis drinking water and much more. Contact us anytime for more information or to book an appointment.

description: Located in Bahía de Palma, Cala Vinyes, on a 1300 m2 plot of land, this stunning house is distributed over 2 floors. The total living area is of 320 m2 plus 80 m2 of covered porches and 180 m2 of uncovered paved terraces. It is equipped with a 66 m2 double garage, a 40 m2 Infinity swimming pool and a beautiful landscaped garden. The house, of pure and very elegant modern design, is planned for natural ventilation and light. Only the best materials and fittings have been used throughout. The 3 bedrooms are en-suite, with dressing rooms, with the master suite being also equipped with walk-in wardrobes and there is a fourth guest bathroom. The living/dining areas with fireplace are open plan, with the fully equipped kitchen being semi-open to the dining area. All rooms have access to the several terraces and the stunning sea views are to be enjoyed from most rooms. The apartment is part of a desired community with few neighbours that offers a swimming pool and an underground private parking space.

description: This design apartment with sea views and a roof terrace is being built in LA BONANOVA, Palma de Mallorca. It is a prestigious neighborhood located above the Paseo Marítimo with good access to the center and international schools. The property has a very quiet location and southwest orientation. The building with 4 luxurious apartments is built by a developer with decades of experience and special attention to design and excellent finishes. This reference presents the apartment on the 2nd floor with VIEWS TO THE SEA and the coast. It has a large TERRACE IN FRONT OF THE LIVING ROOM (19m²) with space for a large dining table and sun loungers. It has another TERRACE ON THE ROOF (49m²) with a PRIVATE POOL (3.5 x 2 m). Included in the price: 2 PARKING SPACES, 1 storage room. Distribution of the house (118m² + terraces): living room with open kitchen, toilet, 3 double bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (1 en suite), utility room. The stunning sea views can be admired from most of the rooms of the house and from the several terraces and balconies. The outdoor area has a lovely and well-maintained garden, a pool with covered and open terrace area and a double carport. The house is in perfect condition and ready to move into. description: This unique frontline villa is located in El Toro, a quiet exclusive area in the south-west of Mallorca, with breathtaking sea views. This 350m2 property is set on a 792m2 plot. The house offers a bright open plan living area, a fitted kitchen with a breakfast bar, 4 bedrooms, 4 en-suite bathrooms and a gym area, all fitted with top quality materials. All of the rooms in the house have spectacular sea views by day and stunning sunsets by night. Additionally, there is a separate guest apartment with separate entrance. The external part of the property offers a partially covered terrace with lounge and dining space, a large infinity swimming pool, a garden and a garage which has direct access to the living area. Further features: air conditioning h/c, underfloor heating, central music system, central power supply, central water supply, parking, double glazed windows.

The apartment offers a large open plan living/dining area, a separate fully equipped kitchen, 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. From the living area and 1 of the bedrooms there is access to the covered terrace offering sea views. The building has underground parking where you have 2 parking spaces and 2 storage rooms included. This property is a great investment opportunity as it offers unique renovation potential.

The total living area is of 320 m2 plus 80 m2 of covered porches and 180 m2 of uncovered paved terraces. It is equipped with a 66 m2 double garage, a 40 m2 Infinity swimming pool and a beautiful landscaped garden. The house, of pure and very elegant modern design, is planned for natural ventilation and light. Only the best materials and fittings have been used throughout. The 3 bedrooms are en-suite, with dressing rooms, with the master suite being also equipped with walk-in wardrobes and there is a fourth guest bathroom. The living/dining areas with fireplace are open plan, with the fully equipped kitchen being semi-open to the dining area. description: Renovated Villa With Sea Access for Sale in Cala Vinyes. This recently renovated property really is a must see. Set in the quiet area of Cala Vinyes, it offers bright open plan modern living as well as the much sought after direct sea access through the beautiful gardens. The property itself is set over 3 levels. The main house on the 2nd and 3rd levels offers 5 double bedrooms, 3 of which are ensuite, all with access to balconies, modern open plan living/dining area with a beautiful modern fitted kitchen. There is also a bar area which always comes in handy as all of these rooms open out to the beautiful pool and outside area. On the ground floor, you have an area which has been dedicated to guests which has a further 2 ensuite bedrooms as well as a living and kitchen area. Additional Features: The main house has underfloor heating throughout, a feature fire place and air-con. There is a state of the art sound system throughout which can be controlled in all rooms separately. The guest space has gas/oil central heating which can come in useful in the winter months. The house is also fitted with security alarms throughout. Outside of the property you have a lot of space either to enjoy the stunning pool, take a stroll down to the sea, relax and soak up the sun or for entertaining guests as well as a brand new separate sauna room. This property has space for around 5 cars to be parked off road.

description: Apartment near Plaza Mayor that went through a full renovation in 2016. The spacious property with 196 m2 constructed area enjoys an open plan kitchen, living room, dinning room, 3 double bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and 8 French balconies. Additionally, there is a parking included in Plaza Mayor. Community built in 1930 and the apartment is located on the second floor with lots of natural light and french window doors. There is a community terrace and you have everything at walking distance in Palma Old Town. Ideal pier-de-tierre property for those looking to have a apartment in the city all year round living.

description: New luxury sea view villa for sale in Bendinat, desired area on the south-west coast of Mallorca.  This unique contemporary villa about to be finished answers all the most demanding quality standards. It is distributed over 3 levels reached either by a staircase or a 2.30 m glass elevator. The ground-floor has the vast entrance hall leading to the light-flooded high-ceiling living area on an open plan with the fitted kitchen equipped with top-modern Gaggnau appliances. This level also has a double bedroom or office with en-suite bathroom and a minimalist garden with guest wc. The upper level comprises the large master suite with a 1.90 m bath tub and a coffee bar area. The same level has 3 additional double en-suite bedrooms and leads to the roof terrace with plunge pool and summer kitchen. The lower level includes a spa with jacuzzi and haman, a gym, a home cinema with kitchenette, a wine cellar and a garage for 6 or 7 cars. The no less stunning outdoor includes a welcoming terrace area including an Infinity swimming pool and a landscaped Mediterranean garden. This amazing property for sale in Bendinat is set on an elevated position and enjoys undisturbed panoramic views over the sea, the Royal Bendinat golf course and the Bendinat castle. Advanced photovoltaic solar energy system that can support the entire property, reversible air conditioning, underfloor heating, stone and wooden floors, floor-to-ceiling windows, shutters….

description: Spectacular home in Avenidas and 100m from El Corte Inglés. Were you looking for a completely renovated home with an unbeatable location? Well, you have already found it, and when you enter it, it is possible, very possible, that you no longer want to leave. You would be excited to live in the center of Palma, just a 10-minute walk from the town hall, a very short distance from the sea, so close to Plaza España, and surrounded by all kinds of shops, because this is your home. It is sold completely renovated, brand new, current, modern, with all kinds of luxury details that will make life easy, with light, lots of light, with meters, and also well distributed because its feeling of spaciousness is obvious. The house has 120 useful m2 distributed in 3 double bedrooms, two complete bathrooms with all the brand new and innovative design facilities and a large living room with an open kitchen and island that will make both your days of family peace and your days of host with guests, are almost certainly unforgettable. Do not miss this opportunity and ask us for a visit!

description: New luxury duplex penthouse apartment in a one of the oldest buildings of the island's capital, Palma de Majorca. The building itself is set in the historic and most beautiful part of the city and is being converted to a beautifully renovated living complex of 12 highly personalised apartments and an amazing open patio with a pool and lounge area at the heart of it all. This penthouse, with its 164 m2 living area, has being conceived in respect of the ancient style: Generous ceiling heights with restored wooden beams, custom made tiled floor, chevron patterned oak floors, black gun metal finish to warm stone, warm colours.. . Living room and kitchen merge into a modern social space with large windows overlooking the garden, the pool or the street. The kitchen is ultra-modern and fitted with premium appliances.  The 40 m2 terrace offers unbelievable outdoor living and a fantastic roof top experience with wide views over the city. Other Features: The heart of the property is a lush pool patio, attracting desired sunlight along with equally appreciated shade. 3 bedrooms, 2 being en-suite, guest toilet, 8 m2 vestibule, 2 m2 storage room. Only 2 apartments of this complex are still for sale please check our Ref. 30389 for the 2nd property that remains available.

description: Singular penthouse for sale in the heart of the city of Palma with a lot of character and a spectacular terrace of about 50m2. This penthouse located in an emblematic property with a stately entrance, and lift, offers a spacious living room as well as 2 bedrooms with bathroom in the same area, as well as a third room or office, the third toilet and large kitchen with dining area and utility room, as well as a separate dining room with exposed beams and a spectacular 50m2 terrace with views over the rooftops of the city of Palma. It offers 2 parking spaces a few meters away. Locality and places of interest Since the middle of the last century, Palma de Majorca, has become a locality that has intelligently known how to conserve its rich cultural and architectural heritage, without forgetting to offer the best services possible to tourists and residents. The city is well-known for its varied offer of art galleries and museums as well as for its excellent shopping in one of the countless fashionable designer boutiques. Characteristics.

suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Anyone dreams of living by the sea, enjoying dreamlike sunsets like a child, and feeling nature as the best possible show. All this is experienced in this penthouse located on the seafront, with breathtaking views and the Mediterranean light flooding in. A real privilege in Cala Vinyas, Calviá, one of the most sought-after areas of Mallorca. The penthouse has a built area of 135m2, with a large living-dining room and access to a beautiful terrace with frontal sea views, perfect to enjoy and share with family, friends or simply to contemplate the sea in all its grandeur. The property is distributed in a day area, with entrance hall, kitchen with utility room and a large living room with fireplace with direct access to the terrace. The rest area is composed of 3 double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and 2 complete refurbished bathrooms, one of them en suite. A perfect distribution. The communal area has a wonderful swimming pool with children's area, solarium and direct access to a small cove surrounded by pine trees and a garage in the same building. It is a proposal that the architects of the ECM studio provide as an orientation to the clients interested in a possible refurbishment, enlarging spaces and optimising the property in its current state. Cala Vinyas, located in the municipality of Calvia, has all the services: international schools, sports and health centres, supermarkets, leisure area with bars and restaurants and only 30 minutes from Palma airport. A unique property, a property that invites you to dream. We invite you to discover it.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cala Vinyes, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle Pinzons

neighborhood: Son Roca - Son Ximelis - Son Anglada
description: Large house with unobstructed views of the Bay of Palma consisting of 660m2 buildings. The main house is 340m2 built. The second home is 150m2. Both habitable dwellings. Pool in the upper area with stunning views of Palma and the Bay. The entire estate is adorned with details by the renowned sculptor Tomás Vila, whose works are exhibited in various squares and buildings in Palma, such as the Plaza del Olivar, the Plaza de la Reina or the Plaza de la Virgen de la Salud. The construction dates from 1925. The farm of 9.800m2 is distributed in terraces, which have fruit trees, orchards, garages, rooms.. . Advisable to visit.

description: Beautiful penthouse with lots of light in the city center in the area of the hotel Saratoga.  The flat has a constructed area of 130 m2 including a balcony and a large terrace with a laundry room. It offers a lot of possibilities for refurbishment as it has no master walls. Fifth floor with a lift. The flat is very well kept with new double glazed exterior windows and at the present consists of 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom (2nd bathroom converted into an office) spacious living-dining room with chimney. The community has a communal roof terrace with beautiful views of the sea, the cathedral, and the old town.  The property is excellently located in a quiet street only a few steps away from the Corte Ingles, Paseo Mallorca, La Lonja, and Paseo Maritimo. We offer an optional parking space.

description: Contact us for a virtual tour! This villa with pool is located in ESPORLES, Mallorca.Esporles is a prosperous town very close to Palma with a lively square.You can walk to the square, Palma is 12km away and the beach of Port des Canonge is 10km away. The house is IDEAL FOR FAMILIES AND CHILDREN.It is located on a large plot (8,757m²) flat and fenced with views of green areas and the mountains.In the well-kept garden there is a LONG SWIMMING POOL (13x4m).The property, built in 2004 and RENOVATED IN 2022/23, was designed as a DOUBLE HOUSE.IT IS SUITABLE FOR SEVERAL GENERATIONS OR 2 FAMILIES.Each house has its own porch (80m² in total) at opposite ends of the building. House distribution 1): on the ground floor living-dining room, kitchen, toilet, 1 bedroom with dressing room and bathroom en suite; on the first floor 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom.House 2): living room with open kitchen, toilet, 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms (2 en suite), gym.In addition, utility room and technical room.Total area: approx.380m² + terraces.Characteristics: tiles, fireplaces, fitted wardrobes, double glazing, heating, a.to.hot / cold, garden shed, well, habitability certificate. Contact us for more information or for a visit.We will not assume any responsibility for the information provided.Kensington reference: KPP06844.

suggestedTexts.title: House

description: Set on a south east plot with a constructed area of 1237m2. and a living area of approximately 300m2. On first entering the property, to the left there is a large open plan kitchen with dining area with concertina windows with good sea view. A door leads down to a good sized swimming pool, BBQ area and covered terrace and front garden with mature fruit trees. Also on the ground floor there is a comfortable living area living area with a fireplace and sliding doors out to the pool area.  On the next level there are also 3 double bedrooms with 2 bathrooms. There is also the possibility of a guest apartment - 3 separate rooms.   And coming up to the 1st floor up the stairs we have a door leading to a huge roof terrace with spectacular views to the ocean where you can watch the sun rising and the stars at night. Then the master bedroom has a balcony which has views to the sea. There is a fully fitted bathroom with a shower/bath cabin and walk-in wardrobe. There is also access to another balcony at the back of the property. 299m2 living 1,237m2 plot  4 bedrooms  3 bathrooms 1 guest toilet 1 toilet  1 separate Apt  Parking 4 cars of road Access to the sea is over the road and is within a 10 minute walk to Portals Vells and 3 beaches. The property is also close to several International schools and only 15 minute drive to Palma de Mallorca.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Sol de Mallorca

description: This villa with a large pool and views of the bay of Palma is located in Puntiró. The spacious property is distributed over three floors.On the ground floor there is a magnificent entrance hall, a spacious living/dining room with high ceilings, large fireplace, elegant skylight and its own Moorish water feature, a fully fitted kitchen with dining area and pantry and a guest toilet.In addition, there are 5 bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms and independent access to the garden.The upper floor has a bright living room and a large south-west facing terrace with views of the bay of Palma.The basement has a large garage for 5 cars, a gym, a cellar and an office. Other features: Air conditioning, oil central heating, double glazed wooden windows, exposed beams, alarm system, beautiful garden with palm and fruit trees, a large barbecue area, and a magnificent swimming pool with Jacuzzi and waterfall feature.Contact us for more information or for a visit.We assume no responsibility for the information provided here Kensington Reference: KPP06818.

description: SAN AGUSTIN This spacious penthouse is located alone on the tenth floor, with amazing sea view, in a residential building with elevator in San Agustin. Being the only apartment on this floor means you have an absolutely breathtaking 360 degrees panoramic view of the Palma bay and all the way to Cabrera, the Tramuntana mountains, the Bellver castle and the Royal Palace Marivent. This stunning penthouse which was totally reformed to highest standards in 2018 has 4 terraces and a living area of 250 m2 with 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms en-suite, guest toilet, and a large living room with open kitchen. Storage room and 4 parking spaces in garage is included and the community has a swimming pool.

Located in the centre of Palma, its proximity to the maritime area will allow you to enjoy the best marine gastronomy on the island. description: Renovated villa in school area, Palma.    This house of 270m2 located in a residential area in the school area, can become the home you are looking for you and your family. The main features of this 3-storey villa are as follows:    • Son Espanyolet, Palma  • 270 m2 living space  • 4 double bedrooms and 4 bathrooms  • Communal swimming pool  • Terrace with garden: 33m2  • Parking with storage room  • Condition: ready to move in, delivered furnished and equipped  • Extras: air conditioning, fitted closets, heating, marble floor    With excellent lighting and unobstructed views, this villa is the ideal place to form your new home with your family. The tranquility of the area is one of its strengths. Being a high standing area, all your neighbors are looking for the same as you: comfort, tranquility and proximity to downtown areas.    Its 270 square meters have been distributed over 4 floors. The subway floor has a large garage where you can park two cars without space problems. In fact, you will have plenty of room to store bicycles or scooters. In this same space, there is an equipped office annex and a checkroom.    On the second floor we find the main rooms of any home. The living room of this apartment, very spacious and bright, will allow you to meet with your friends or family and enjoy the garden terrace whenever you want. Without problems of space or noise, because the children will be able to entertain themselves in their playroom or in the common areas of the community.    The kitchen is independent and has direct access to the terrace, an aspect that will facilitate the moments of ventilation and rest, since you can sit outside to read while the meal is finished. In addition, thanks to its spaciousness and its recently inaugurated appliances, you will enjoy being able to use the kitchen for the first time and prepare your best dishes without worrying about the space.    The upper floor, which is reached by a beautiful marble staircase, leads to the 3 double bedrooms on this floor. One of them separated from the rest and with bathroom en suite. All very bright, spacious and with fitted closets so you can store your clothes.    Finally, the top floor can always ensure you have a space of intimacy and privacy even if you have guests at home. It has a large and bright living room with access to the terrace. This living room could be perfectly converted into a bedroom, as there is also a bathroom on this floor. It would be the perfect opportunity to have a space away from any noise, where you will have a terrace-solarium and another terrace a little smaller to disconnect.    With a tasteful decoration and high quality materials, this villa with a total of 4 floors, is the perfect opportunity to create your new home with your family. description: Detached villa with swimming pool in Torrenova, Calvià. This detached villa located in the upscale residential area of Torrenova, is the home where you will improve your quality of life from day one. With a plot of 1.050m2, this property will allow you to have great privacy and be in greater contact with nature.  • Torrenova, Calvià • 323 m2 living space • 4 double bedrooms  • 3 bathrooms • 1.050 m2 plot • Salt water swimming pool 10x5 m2 • Parking (3) • Extras: jacuzzi, 3 water tanks, 2 water pumps, solar panels, air conditioning, fitted closets, etc. This modern detached villa is located in Torrenova close to the most beautiful beaches in the area. It consists of 323 m2 of useful interior that have been divided into two floors. Both its exterior and interior have a unique character and essence. From its exterior stands out its yellow color and the contrast it makes with the large saltwater pool. The house is very spacious and follows a diaphanous distribution, with large windows that create a bright and sunny space at all times. As you advance in your home, you will reach its bright and elegant living-dining room with direct access to the garden. A space where you can meet with your friends and family, but also allow you to have your moments of relaxation.  Open to the living room, you will find the open kitchen fully equipped with top quality appliances. A very bright room with large storage capacity that will make you forget the problems of space. With direct access to the garden, it will facilitate ventilation and communication with the rest of the rooms.  The master bedroom, which has an en suite bathroom with jacuzzi, is located on this first floor. Its large bathroom will captivate you. Thanks to its impressive dressing room you will have no problem to organize all your clothes.  The rest of the bedrooms are located on the upper floor. All have unobstructed views and built-in closets. One of these rooms is currently used as an office. Its exterior represents a unique space, ideal for relaxing and spending time with friends or family. Thanks to multiple accesses from inside the house, you will access the large terrace located in front of the saltwater pool.  Surrounded by a beautiful and elegant garden full of flowers and native fruit trees, this villa represents the ideal home for your personal well-being. A property that will provide you with a privileged location, close to multiple beaches, services and leisure areas. But it will also ensure you enjoy great privacy and intimacy within your home. description: Rustic finca with certificate of habitability in Buñola.    Living in a rustic property is synonymous with wellbeing, due to the tranquillity and peace that this type of property transmits. Life in the country is more natural in all aspects, due to the fact that you will live in an environment with much less environmental, light and noise pollution. The characteristics of this property are as follows:    • Buñola area   • 260 m2 living space // 334 m2 constructed // 5043 m2 plot of land  • Rooms in the main house: 2 double bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms.  • Bedrooms in the guest house: 2 bedrooms   • 1 bathroom  • Parking space  • Swimming pool  • Office  • Utility room  • Large fish pond  • Room used as storage room  • Outside storerooms  • Stable  • Certificate of habitability     This rustic finca will provide you with all the benefits of properties of this style and even more. Getting rooms with a great comfort and well-being.    The whole house is decorated in a renovated rustic style that will make anyone who visits the property fall in love with it.    At the front of the property, you will discover a large terrace surrounded by lawn, swimming pool and large gardens that will allow you to enjoy the outdoors. An ideal place for children to play, a very important aspect for their intellectual, emotional and social development.    You will also find the dream of every lover of family or friends gatherings. There is an area that includes a barbecue and everything you need to organise long meetings with greater privacy and without disturbing any neighbours. What's more, you can enjoy a rest area with a large fish pond where you can relax and unwind in the open air.    If you like animals, this estate has a stable for up to three horses and a chicken coop. description: Villa with pool, tourist license and sea views in Nova Santa Ponsa. This villa for sale in Nova Santa Ponsa has a tourist license for 8 people and all the details to spend a few quiet days enjoying the villa. In addition, it is located a few minutes from the beach and multiple leisure areas. Its main characteristics are the following: • Nova Santa Ponça, Calvià • 363 m2 usable area • 4 double bedrooms  • 4 bathrooms and 1 toilet • Plot 1.279 m2 • Swimming pool • Closed parking (2) + open parking inside the property (4) • Tourist license for 8 people • Extras: solar panels (220v), jacuzzi, fireplace, barbecue, air conditioning, automatic irrigation Located in the quiet and residential area of Nova Santa Ponça, near the golf course and a few minutes from the marina, this villa with tourist license is an opportunity you can not miss. The municipality of Santa Ponça is one of the most demanded of all Mallorca as a holiday residence thanks to its multiple gastronomic offers, leisure and of course, its spectacular beaches of crystal clear waters.  With 363 m2 distributed in 2 levels, this villa was built in 2011 using top quality materials. The entire villa has a surveillance system that will allow you to have everything under control from anywhere in the house. The kitchen, fully equipped and with plenty of storage space, has a large space for you to cook comfortably. Its central island will allow you to organize all the food before cooking or having breakfast in the mornings. On this floor we also find one of the bedrooms and one of the toilets. Thanks to this toilet, guests will not have to go up to the second floor to go to the bathroom. This way, you will be able to preserve your privacy and the guests will have an easy access. The second floor is accessed by a spiral staircase with safety railing. Here you will find the remaining 3 double bedrooms, all with en suite bathrooms. In addition to a solarium with jacuzzi, ideal for relaxing and spending some time disconnecting. From all this second floor you will enjoy dream views of the sea. In a privileged location, this villa with swimming pool will allow you to fully enjoy your days in Mallorca. Its spectacular interior gives way to its large garden areas from where you can do physical activity, chat with your friends while you cool off in the pool, disconnect by reading a book and many other things. The large and imposing wooden beams that support its high ceilings with the contrast of the white walls, are some details that make this penthouse maintain the Mallorcan character. With multiple open spaces, the living room will be a room where you can spend a lot of time relaxing. Thanks to the multiple windows located throughout the living room, this room enjoys a natural lighting that will undoubtedly help your daily well-being. In this same space, a table and a chair will always be ready for you to work from home if necessary. As you move through the different rooms of your home, you will love its beautiful and discreet decoration. All in tune with the wood, the stone walls and the neutral and white colors. The only room where we see a new color is in the kitchen, where a discreet orange color covers one of the walls. With sliding doors, the kitchen is another large and bright space where you will undoubtedly enjoy being able to innovate recipes. In addition to being a large and comfortable space, you will see that you will have plenty of storage space.  All the bedrooms, which are doubles, have a unique charm thanks to their decoration and the beautiful views of the Ramblas they offer. Two of these rooms have an open bathroom en suite. Decorated with superb taste and excellence, any detail you stop to look at will please you. After getting to know the interior spaces, after walking along a pleasant corridor you will reach the 50 m2 terrace. Although in addition to this area, you will also have a space covered by a glass window, where you can read in shelter even on a rainy day. Can you imagine being able to read during a storm and appreciate this phenomenon without getting wet? It is just one of the many advantages you will have living here. Thanks to the good weather in Mallorca you will be able to organize countless meetings with your friends and family and enjoy evenings in the sun in good company. And always bearing in mind that you will be able to end the meeting with a stroll through the center of Palma, a capital that receives millions of visitors every year. description: Renovated villa in school area, Palma.    This house of 270m2 located in a residential area in the school area, can become the home you are looking for you and your family. A house that will allow your children to be close to their school and the center of Palma. The main features of this 3-storey villa are as follows:    • Son Espanyolet, Palma  • 270 m2 living space  • 4 double bedrooms and 4 bathrooms  • Communal swimming pool  • Terrace with garden: 33m2  • Parking with storage room  • Condition: ready to move in, delivered furnished and equipped  • Extras: air conditioning, fitted closets, heating, marble floor    With excellent lighting and unobstructed views, this villa is the ideal place to form your new home with your family. The tranquility of the area is one of its strengths. Being a high standing area, all your neighbors are looking for the same as you: comfort, tranquility and proximity to downtown areas.    Its 270 square meters have been distributed over 4 floors. The subway floor has a large garage where you can park two cars without space problems. In fact, you will have plenty of room to store bicycles or scooters. In this same space, there is an equipped office annex and a checkroom.    On the second floor we find the main rooms of any home. The living room of this apartment, very spacious and bright, will allow you to meet with your friends or family and enjoy the garden terrace whenever you want. Without problems of space or noise, because the children will be able to entertain themselves in their playroom or in the common areas of the community.    The kitchen is independent and has direct access to the terrace, an aspect that will facilitate the moments of ventilation and rest, since you can sit outside to read while the meal is finished. In addition, thanks to its spaciousness and its recently inaugurated appliances, you will enjoy being able to use the kitchen for the first time and prepare your best dishes without worrying about the space.    The upper floor, which is reached by a beautiful marble staircase, leads to the 3 double bedrooms on this floor. One of them separated from the rest and with bathroom en suite. All very bright, spacious and with fitted closets so you can store your clothes.    Finally, the top floor can always ensure you have a space of intimacy and privacy even if you have guests at home. It has a large and bright living room with access to the terrace. This living room could be perfectly converted into a bedroom, as there is also a bathroom on this floor. It would be the perfect opportunity to have a space away from any noise, where you will have a terrace-solarium and another terrace a little smaller to disconnect.    With a tasteful decoration and high quality materials, this villa with a total of 4 floors, is the perfect opportunity to create your new home with your family. A home close to the best schools in Palma: Montesión, San Cayetano or Madre Alberta.

description: Villa with pool, tourist license and sea views in Nova Santa Ponsa. This villa for sale in Nova Santa Ponsa has a tourist license for 8 people and all the details to spend a few quiet days enjoying the villa. In addition, it is located a few minutes from the beach and multiple leisure areas. Its main characteristics are the following: • Nova Santa Ponça, Calvià • 363 m2 usable area • 4 double bedrooms  • 4 bathrooms and 1 toilet • Plot 1.279 m2 • Swimming pool • Closed parking (2) + open parking inside the property (4) • Tourist license for 8 people • Extras: solar panels (220v), jacuzzi, fireplace, barbecue, air conditioning, automatic irrigation Located in the quiet and residential area of Nova Santa Ponça, near the golf course and a few minutes from the marina, this villa with tourist license is an opportunity you can not miss. The municipality of Santa Ponça is one of the most demanded of all Mallorca as a holiday residence thanks to its multiple gastronomic offers, leisure and of course, its spectacular beaches of crystal clear waters.  With 363 m2 distributed in 2 levels, this villa was built in 2011 using top quality materials. The entire villa has a surveillance system that will allow you to have everything under control from anywhere in the house. On the first floor, you will find the spacious and bright living-dining room with fireplace and access to one of its terraces. The kitchen, fully equipped and with plenty of storage space, has a large space for you to cook comfortably. Its central island will allow you to organize all the food before cooking or having breakfast in the mornings. On this floor we also find one of the bedrooms and one of the toilets. Thanks to this toilet, guests will not have to go up to the second floor to go to the bathroom. This way, you will be able to preserve your privacy and the guests will have an easy access. The second floor is accessed by a spiral staircase with safety railing. Here you will find the remaining 3 double bedrooms, all with en suite bathrooms. In addition to a solarium with jacuzzi, ideal for relaxing and spending some time disconnecting. From all this second floor you will enjoy dream views of the sea. In a privileged location, this villa with swimming pool will allow you to fully enjoy your days in Mallorca. Its spectacular interior gives way to its large garden areas from where you can do physical activity, chat with your friends while you cool off in the pool, disconnect by reading a book and many other things. description: Rustic finca with certificate of habitability in Buñola.    Living in a rustic property is synonymous with wellbeing, due to the tranquillity and peace that this type of property transmits. Life in the country is more natural in all aspects, due to the fact that you will live in an environment with much less environmental, light and noise pollution. The characteristics of this property are as follows:    • Buñola area   • 260 m2 living space // 334 m2 constructed // 5043 m2 plot of land  • Rooms in the main house: 2 double bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms.  • Bedrooms in the guest house: 2 bedrooms   • 1 bathroom  • Parking space  • Swimming pool  • Office  • Utility room  • Large fish pond  • Room used as storage room  • Outside storerooms  • Stable  • Certificate of habitability     This rustic finca will provide you with all the benefits of properties of this style and even more. The main house is divided by a spacious living-dining room with fireplace that will bring warmth to your home and will invite you to sit near it with your family.    Its two double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes will help you to keep all the family's things organised. Inside you will have enough space to store all the clothes you have without any kind of problem.    The second house has two more bedrooms with double glazed windows. Getting rooms with a great comfort and well-being.    The whole house is decorated in a renovated rustic style that will make anyone who visits the property fall in love with it.    At the front of the property, you will discover a large terrace surrounded by lawn, swimming pool and large gardens that will allow you to enjoy the outdoors. The house has the following characteristics:    - Establiments area  - 257 m2   - 1.116 m2 of plot  - 4 bedrooms (Ground floor: 1 and second floor: 3)  - 1 bathroom and 1 toilet  - Land with olive trees and trees   - Terrace with well   - Garage with storage room    It consists of 257 m2 built on two floors, being able to adapt the spaces to your needs. As, for example, bet on a larger kitchen, the creation of a work studio or divide the bedrooms that are currently located. Reforms that will make you get the home of your dreams.    Nor, you will have to worry about the electrical installation, because it has connection to the mains and well that will supply you with the water you need.    The house has a large independent kitchen with office, which will offer you the option to meet for lunch, coffee or even for the children to do their homework while you cook. A rustic style kitchen, very practical and spacious with great storage.     It is built on a plot of 1,116 m2, which will allow you to customize your own outdoor space. You will be able to enjoy its olive trees and different trees or grow your own vegetable garden. Undoubtedly, it will provide you with endless possibilities when it comes to having your ideal garden and there is even enough space to create a swimming pool.    In addition to not having the need to leave your vehicles outside the property, because it contains a private driveway and enough space to park two vehicles.    Don't miss the opportunity to reform this house to your taste and turn it into the home you have always wanted. Call 971888018 and ask us or fill out the contact form.

description: Santa Ponsa is, according to its residents, the best place to live if you are a sun and beach lover. Thanks to the good weather in the southwest of Mallorca you can take advantage of the outdoor activities, both by land by sea, that the area offers.    The property located in an exclusive residential area in front of Golf II and III of Santa Ponsa, you will enjoy the tranquility, security and great location of the complex. Since you will have the town center of Santa Ponsa just a few minutes away.    This apartment will offer you a superior quality of life, due to its finishes and marble floors. Transmitting elegance and design in all its rooms.    It has 3 spacious bedrooms with en suite bathroom in each of them. In this way, you will enjoy greater privacy without the need to share the bathroom with anyone.    The independent kitchen with office and window to the dining room will allow you to chat with your guests while you prepare a snack or cook while you keep an eye on the children when they play.    Through its terrace you can enjoy sunsets overlooking one of the wonderful golf courses. Without a doubt, it will invite you to sit and enjoy a good read under the natural light of the day, meditate or simply relax from the comfort of your home.    The complex has a large communal pool and common areas so you can cool off on hot days. It is an ideal place to enjoy with friends or family.    Currently, the residential area is very revalued, due to the proximity of luxurious leisure areas such as Port Adriano and Santa Ponsa golf courses, where you will find a wide range of restaurants, stores and sports areas.     If you want to make this luxury apartment your new home, call 971888018 and ask us or fill in the contact form.

The large flat has a surface area of 229 m2 plus a large terrace of 38 m2 that becomes an ideal outdoor living area where you can enjoy the peace and quiet, with a natural backdrop marked by the gardens and the blue touch of the swimming pool. It has five bedrooms, three of them with en-suite bathrooms and the master bedroom with a large dressing room area and access to the terrace. The main living area is composed of a living room with fireplace, dining room and modern kitchen completely open to all this space from where you can also access the outside terrace through large windows that let in all the natural light. A further bathroom and a laundry room complete this excellent flat of large dimensions where you can live in a green environment with the maximum wellbeing, perfect for those who like the city and being close to everything but want peace and quiet when they get home. The property also includes underground garage for three cars and a storage room. description: This exceptional property is located in the quiet and privileged residential area of La Bonanova.  At just a short distance from the city center and the Paseo Marítimo, it is within easy reach of some of the best international schools on the island. The beautiful beaches of Cala Mayor and San Agustín are minutes away making this location an enviable and excellent choice.  This magnificent project of 6 unique homes shares a contemporary design with abundant natural light and a seamless flow from the modern interiors to the magnificent outdoors.  This modern residential building offers 3 different types of properties: 2 penthouses with rooftop terrace and private pool, 2 apartments with terraces and 2 ground floors with private garden, all carried out with the very best quality materials. You will find traditional elements such as natural stone and wood creating a warm interior and which blend perfectly with the modern glass facades that offer unique viewpoints of the exterior.  This excellent ground floor apartment is spread out over 115m2 and boasts a generous 57m2 of terrace as well 30m2 of magnificent private garden. It makes for the ideal place to enjoy outdoor living all year-round thanks to the wonderful climate the island has to offer. There are 2 double bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, one of them en suite. The main living space consists of lounge, dining area and a modern open plan kitchen complete with Miele appliances. This whole area opens onto the terrace and garden. This exclusive property is an urban oasis. The communal outdoor spaces and the beautiful surroundings with swimming pools, rooftop terraces, and garden areas are unique spaces to enjoy the very best of Mallorca living. This fabulous ground floor apartment includes a parking space and a storage room. "Relax in your own private garden and enjoy the contemporary living spaces that offer luxury and comfort in the wonderful city of Palma" Completion date: 2021 features: -Air conditioning hot/cold, underfloor heating, solar panels, Solar controlled windows, natural stone pavement, pre-installation for home automation system, elevator. -Open plan kitchen equipped with Miele appliances. -Private terrace, private garden, communal pool, communal gardens, parking space, storage room. location: -Close to beaches, restaurants, international schools, shops, and shopping center, 5 minutes from the center of Palma. The fantastic ground floor includes for the total comfort of owners parking space and storage room. "Spacious private spaces both indoors and outdoors to enjoy all the comfort on the outskirts of the city." -End date. 2021 characteristics: -Air conditioning hot / cold, underfloor heating and solar, windows with solar control, natural stone pavement, pre-installation for home automation system, elevator. -Open kitchen equipped with Miele appliances. -Private terrace, private garden, communal pool, communal gardens, garage, storage room. location: -Sea views, unobstructed views, close to beaches, close to restaurants, close to international schools, close to shops and shopping center, 5 minutes from the center of Palma.

description: Torrenova - Palmanova - Mallorca. Spectacular flat in first sea line. Spacious and luminous ground floor flat in the urbanisation of Torrrenova - Palmanova, belonging to the municipality of Calvia, in the municipality of Torrenova - Palmanova. This marvellous flat enjoys a privileged position with direct access to the sea from the flat itself and only 15 minutes by car from Palma. It has all the services around, it is like a small village with everything you may need.. . It is close to good beaches, very nice, with charm and very picturesque corners. It is also surrounded by bars, restaurants, shops, accommodation and other tourist services, as well as golf courses and tennis courts and the beach of Palmanova, connected by its magnificent coastal promenade with other nearby beaches such as Son Matias, Es Carregador, Porto novo and Magaluf. The town also has a marina for pleasure boats. It is neighbouring the area of Son Caliu which has magnificent sports facilities for football, rugby and tennis. This property consists of 120,87m2 of living space plus a terrace-porch of about 20m2. It is distributed in a living-dining room of 45m2 on two levels with impressive views to the sea and exit to the terrace-porch, independent kitchen of 15m2 with the magnificent views, 3 double bedrooms of 11,25 m2, 12,81 m2 and 15,56 m2 respectively and 2 bathrooms, one of them en-suite. This beautiful flat borders on one side with a communal area with access to the parking and to the sea, and on the other side with access to a private terrace of approximately 100m2 with space for table and chairs of great size, as well as barbecue, solarium, etc. It also has a laundry area and its own exit to the sea. Other features: Parking space included in the price, 100% exterior, storage room of 10m2, fireplace, armoured door, updated electricity, shower in the access area to the sea, three storey building without lift with 12 neighbours with possibility/project of private lift to access the property. For this price you are assured of unique views for the rest of your life! description: We present this beautiful 114m2 flat, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, covered porch with 2 private gardens totalling 90 m2 with barbecue, 1200 m2 community swimming pool and private carport in Llucmajor just 400m from the sea. Son Verí Nou, Llucmajor This beautiful flat, from its two large private gardens, offers magnificent views of the countryside with direct access to the community swimming pool.  It is located in a private residential complex in Son Verí Nou, famous for its tranquillity and security in the south-east of the beautiful island of Majorca, just a 5-minute walk from the beautiful Cala Blava beach with crystal-clear water. The flat has a built area of approximately 114 m2 distributed as follows: a spacious living room with access to the porch with wonderful views of the green and private garden, a modern fully equipped American kitchen, 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and, 2 bathrooms (1 en suite). Another marvellous garden on the opposite side of the house with a brick barbecue makes it possible to have lunches and dinners with many friends. The enchanting private residential condominium offers the owners a fantastic community swimming pool in a park of over 1200 m2 to fully enjoy the magical Mediterranean atmosphere of the island.  Features of this flat include:  - Air conditioning hot/cold,  - Double-glazed windows - Wooden floors - Descaling system and water purifier for the whole house.  - Community expenses 138€ per month - IBI 370€ - BASURA (rubbish) 230€ per year This is a very convenient location, only 3 minutes' drive from the s'Arenal nautical club and the beautiful Paseo Maritimo where you will find boutiques, bars and excellent restaurants, as well as wonderful beaches with clear waters of s'Arenal. The Maioris Golf Course and the Son Antem Golf Academy are only a 5-minute drive away. The airport can be reached in only 6 km. The city of Palma is only 12 km away by car. At your disposal is 1 covered parking space, which is included in the price. The flat is located in an elegant, well-maintained residential complex consisting of 3 blocks of 2 floors each, all with private gardens and direct access to the communal pool. The dream of living on the most beautiful island in the world can become reality. Contact us by leaving your whatsapp number to have direct contact with our commercial agents Dr. Matteo Belotti King Mallorca Real Estate.

description: This spacious penthouse with a large pool and roof terraces combines the advantages of a chalet with those of an apartment. The house is immaculate. In 2018 the pool and a large part of the facilities were renovated. In front of and above the living area there are huge terraces (249m² in total) with views of the cathedral, Castell Bellver and the Tramuntana. The icing on the cake is the large rooftop pool (7x3m), where you can really swim. Included in the price: 2 parking spaces, 1 large storage room (39m²). Floor layout (approx. 261m²): upstairs living room, dining room, toilet, kitchen, laundry room, office (or additional bedroom); downstairs master suite with dressing room and bathroom en suite, 3 other bedrooms, 2 bathrooms en suite, 3 balconies (14m²). description: Airy, bright and modern apartment with two balconies facing the sea in a quiet much sought after "gated community" with 24 hour "doorman / guard service". The entire apartment is renovated including electricity and plumbing. All equipment in the kitchen is from the renovation in 2018.  There are wooden floors throughout the home, marble in the bathrooms, one bathroom has a large steam shower, all bathroom fittings are from Villeroy Boch except the bathtub which is from Porcelanosa. The large wardrobes in the bedrooms are from Dara. Both balconies have sea views and both are about 6 square meters, of which the one outside of what is today the master bedroom is the most square and where you best have room to have dinner. If you move the large, loose wardrobes, this bedroom can become a living room instead. The entire property has AC heating / cooling, plenty of storage and it's pre installed for alarm connection. The property has a lift and something as unusual in Spain as rubbish collection on each floor.  This apartment is on floor 1, but it feels higher up as the property is partly built on a sloap. The community has a large lovely garden with abundant vegetation in the form of lawns, flowers, palm trees and other trees and plants. There is direct access to the sea via a bathing ladder and to two smaller beaches, one on each side of the community. One is hidden and only those who live in the area know that it exists and use it. If you want to sunbath by the pool and listen to the waves of the sea, there is always room as the pool is large and there is good number of sunbeds. It's plenty of parking spaces both under cover and without and even if you do not have a dedicated space, there are always parking opportunities here. The location is close to all services such as a small center with grocery stores and restaurants, of which the harbor restaurant in Cala Nova 5 min walk away is a fantastic social meeting place that also has good food and a wonderful location by the sea. A little further up the hill after Cala Nova you will find Palma Bread, a Swedish bakery where you buy your fresh breakfast bread and all the Swedish pastries you could wish for, almost unnecessarily good and tasty. If you want to see something more than your "slice of paradise", bus no. 4 takes you to the beaches of Illeta's in one direction and to Placa España in central Palma in the other direction. The bus passes via restaurant-dense and trendy Santa Catalina and there is a bus every 10 minutes around the clock.  Nearest bus stop is a 5-minute walk from the property. For the golfer, Bendinat Golf is 5 min away by car, Son Vida golf 10m min away and there are a further number of golf courses within 20 minutes drive. Porto Pi shopping center at the entrance to Palma is 4 km away and it takes about 15 minutes to get there by bus, 10 minutes by car and you can also walk in 25 minutes. From the airport you will reach your home in the sun in 20 minutes.
