description: Uniquely situated detached family home, directly at the Ciudad Jardin (Palma) beach. The Villa has got 2 car-drives with approx 4-6 private parking possibilities. The main entrance can be accessed through a 2-step staircase as also trough a disabled ramp. The Villa is surrounded by terraces and balconies on the ground floor, 1st floor and rooftop terrace with fantastic views all around over the sea, Palma and the Tramuntana mountains. The outdoor offers a big swimming pool and jacuzzi surrounded by a subtropical garden, which, together with the terrace, provides an inviting chill- and BBQ-area in private atmosphere. A glass enclosed staircase separates the downstairs' loft area from the upper floors. These floors can also be accessed through an elevator. On the 1st floor are 2 apartments, one with a large kitchen with cooking island, dining room and sofa corner; the other with living-dining room, separate guest toilet, large sleeping room with office area and a large bathroom with shower. The 2nd floor has 2 other apartments with each a living-dining area, bedroom with bathroom and washing machine, and an additional bedroom with bathroom en-suite. The rooftop terrace offers some breathtaking all around views. Other Features: The Villa has a holiday rental licence for 10 persons and has been legalised by Palma's town hall and is in possession of a Cedula de habitabilidad 2022.

description: This beautiful country estate for sale with a plot of about 30.760 sq mts, is situated in an elevated location in Bunyola with spectacular views overlooking the countryside to Palma and the sea beyond. The property is of recent construction and was finished in 2018. The house has a rustic exterior with natural stone walls, and modern interior with open spaces and high ceilings. The property consists of 4 bedrooms all with fitted wardrobes and all with en suite bathrooms and a lounge-dining room with the open kitchen. The master bedroom suite is all on the first floor to make the most of the fantastic views. Outside there is a large terrace and swimming pool plus a separate area with a summer kitchen. There is also a garage and parking space for various cars. Locality and places of interest The municipality of Bunyola in the north-western area of Majorca is characterised by its division into a flat southern part and the mountainous area of the Serra de Tramuntana, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, in the northern part. It can be reached both by road and by a charming train of more than 100 years of age, running between Palma and Sóller. The Moorish gardens Jardins d’Alfàbia, probably the most beautiful gardens of the island, are only a few minutes away by car. Characteristics.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Bunyola
suggestedTexts.title: Country house

description: Spectacular apartment for sale in a recently renovated building on the seafront on the Paseo Maritimo in Palma. The apartment is distributed in 4 large double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, 3 bathrooms, 2 of them en suite, a bright living-dining room with access to a large terrace with views, an independent kitchen fully furnished and equipped with the highest quality appliances and a laundry room.  With 2 parking spaces included.  Among the qualities we can mention marble floors, air conditioning and central heating, double glazed windows, etc. Locality and places of interest The Paseo Marítimo is a privileged zone where one can enjoy the sea breezes and the comings and goings of all types of vessels. It also has the advantage of being only minutes away from the centre of the city of Palma de Majorca, being a very popular zone with all the services at hand, such as shops, restaurants and leisure places. For golf lovers, there is the possibility to play in different locations such as Club de Golf Son Vida. The best and nearest locations for water sports are Puerto Portals, the Club Náutico de Palma and Portixol. Characteristics.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Bonanova - Porto Pi, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This fabulous ground floor apartment in El Toro, was completely renovated, has a beautiful garden and is located in a chalet, just a few minutes walk from Puerto Adriano and the beach, in the southwest of the beautiful island of Mallorca. The attractive property has a constructed area of approx. 100 m2 distributed as follows: a bright living/dining room with access to the terrace, a fitted and equipped American kitchen, 2 nice bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, as well as a utility room. The outdoor area with a large garden invites you to fully enjoy the beautiful days and nights on the island. The equipment features of this apartment in El Toro include: air conditioning, double glazed windows and tiled floors. It is a noble and quiet area. The famous Puerto Adriano with its beautiful beach, bars and international restaurants invite you to enjoy delicious meals on the seafront. The Santa Ponsa golf course is just a few minutes away by car.

description: SALE OR RENT WITH OPTION TO BUY Flat with 3 bedrooms and terrace with views to the golf course in luxury residential complex with private garage, pool and garden at walking distance to the beach in Santa Ponsa. Approximately 174 sqm of living space distributed in large entrance hall, 3 double bedrooms with bathrooms en suite, kitchen with utility room and spacious living room with direct access to a wonderful terrace of about 29 sqm ideal to enjoy all the charm and tranquillity of one of the most demanded, luxurious and select areas of Majorca and sun all day long in any time of the year thanks to its excellent solar orientation to the south. In good condition, heating, air conditioning and parking space of 19 sqm and storage room of 8 sqm included in the price. High standing community in Nova Santa Ponsa, with lift, large garden areas and 4 community swimming pools away from all noise and stress and only a few minutes away from Palma and the best beaches of the island. Possibility of renting with option to buy with a maximum period of 6 months. More real estate offers on agentsbrokersmallorca. com.

description: This finca is located in a privileged location near Alaró, Mallorca. The 567 m² of living space is presented in a timelessly elegant and modern design. The property is distributed over three floors and has a total of 6 bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms, the master bedroom on the upper floor with a dressing room and a large bathroom with mountain views. On the ground floor there is a modern fitted kitchen with access to the terrace overlooking the pool. There is another chill-out terrace outside the cozy and bright living room. Other features: Panoramic mountain views, underfloor heating, large state-of-the-art ISO windows from floor to ceiling, smart-house system, sound system, air conditioning, private well, water softener, tennis court, barbecue area. outdoor fitness, pre-installation for an outdoor sauna, children's adventure playground, heated saltwater pool, barbecue area and relaxation areas, land for viticulture (13,000 m²), active ventilation and deaeration, glass terrace areas and sun protection, garden shed. Contact us for more information or to arrange a visit. All information without guarantee. Kensington reference: KPP067836.

description: NEGOTIABLE PRICE Rustic Finca for sale a few minutes from Palma. The extension of the farm is 142.435m2 about 20 squares. With five buildings and annexes. Building 1: 385m2 of housing and 218m2 of annexes on three floors. Basement / Pantry with vaulted roof, ground floor, hall, staircase to the first floor, fitted kitchen, dining room with fireplace and exit to terrace with vine porch, bedroom and bathroom, storage room and garage. First floor, four bedrooms, toilet and terrace with unobstructed views and where to enjoy the land. Building 2: garages for vehicles / machinery and Palomar, also a garden. Building 3: 180m2 house and 115m2 of porches and stable, house on two floors with five bedrooms, kitchen, living room, terraces. Building 4: 56m2 and 203m2 built and covered surface uncovered, destined to pigsty, hayloft, terrace, dairy farm. The farm has two large capacity ponds, three own vein water wells, cisterns, electricity from the network, a wood oven, totally surrounded by stone and sand walls, dry land with various trees, such as almond trees, carob trees, and irrigated part. Finca with many possibilities and close to Palma. Negotiable price.

description: "Location, location, location, " as the saying goes. And this modern villa with pool has an unbeatable location just 15km from Palma de Mallorca. It is situated on a hill and offers panoramic views of all of Palma, the sea and the Tramuntana. Other advantages: south orientation, total privacy, shops and a golf course within walking distance. The villa was finished in 2018 and is like new. It is located on a 30,540m² plot, has windows as well as a room with double-height ceilings and a gallery. Various bedrooms, all terraces (290m² in total) and the infinity pool (10x6m) offer unforgettable panoramic views. House layout (approx. 373m²): downstairs 3 double bedrooms with bathrooms en suite (2 with dressing rooms), family room, garage for 2 cars, technical room, pool house with bathroom and summer kitchen; upstairs living room, kitchen, master bedroom with bathroom and dressing room, toilet, utility room. Equipment: kitchen with Miele appliances and wine cellar, natural stone floors, fitted wardrobes, Schüko double glazing, underfloor heating, a. to. hot/cold, bathtub + showers, water softener, home automation, alarm pre-installation, outdoor shower. Contact us for more information (we have plans) or for a visit. We will not assume any responsibility for the information provided in this description.

description: This property is located in Genova, a peaceful town with stunning mountain views, yet within a short distance to Palma centre. The 322 m2 house is distributed over 3 levels offering an open plan living/dining room, a well equipped fitted kitchen, 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms - 3 being en suite. From the living area there is access to a spacious terrace with spectacular views. The exterior part of the house offers a garden with a swimming pool, a garage and storage room. Additional features: air conditioning, SAT-TV, marble floors, double glazed windows, fireplace, storage room, fitted wardrobes, garage.

description: Beautiful new luxury villa for sale in Cala Vinyes, a quiet and sought-after area on the southwest coast of Mallorca. This south-east facing property is built on large 1818m2 plot with a constructed area of 585m2 distributed over 2 levels and is only 100m from the beach. The ground floor offers a spacious hallway, a large open living room, a dining room, well equipped kitchen, a wine cellar, spa, 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, 1 en-suite. Up to the first floor you will find the master bedroom with a walk-in-wardrobe and its own private terrace, 2 further bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. From the living area there is access to a 64m2 terrace, swimming pool and garden. Additionally there is a garage with space for one car and an outside parking space. The villa is currently under construction and is due to be complete in August 2023. Further features: wooden beams, modern design, roof-top terrace.

description: The villa is in a quiet location in the residential area of Cala Blava and has direct access to the sea. The chalet is spread over three floors and has a total of 5 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, the master suite comes with a dressing room, private terrace and a large bathroom with a bathtub and hydro-massage shower. The spacious living room has wonderful views and access to a terrace. In addition to the four terraces on different levels, there is also a rooftop solarium of about 50 m2 with excellent views of the sea. The pool in the garden also enjoys sea views. description: Large fully renovated apartment for sale in Cala Nova (San Agustin), sought-after coastal district of the island's capital Palma, just a few meters from the Cala Nova marina and the various beaches of the area. The beautiful 140 m2 property has a bright and very spacious living area, a separate all-equipped kitchen with adjacent laundry room, 4 bedrooms (which is unique in Cala Nova) with built-in wardrobes, 2 bathrooms (one en-suite) and a 24 m2 glazed terrace. It is located in a well-maintained community with garden and pool and direct access to the Cala Nova park and is sold with a 5 m2 storage room and a parking space in the community garage with lift. Other Features: Convertible -hot/cold- air-conditioning, double glazing, parquet flooring.

The property has a constructed area of 230 m2 with 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a fully fitted kitchen, a large terrace, a private pool and jacuzzi. It is very luminous throughout. Other Features: Possibility of 2 parking spaces and storage room sold separately. Community fee 50 euros/month.

description: In the urbanization of "Son Ferrer" just ten minutes from the coast of the Bay of Palma, Santa Ponsa, and Port Adriano or Puerto Portals among other points of interest, this large detached house is located.  It has very easy access by motorway that connects with Palma, about 18km away.  It is located in a very quiet area of the urbanization and has open and clear views. It is a house built on two floors, where the ground floor of more than two hundred meters is dedicated to a high-rise garage, with ventilation and sunlight, equipped with a fully equipped kitchen and a complete bathroom. From its main entrance, the house is accessed by a majestic external staircase and is divided into an entrance hall, very spacious, a huge kitchen fully equipped with high-end furniture and appliances, a dining area and access to a pleasant outdoor porch; five double bedrooms, with fitted wardrobes and some of them with access to one of the numerous terraces that the house has; two complete bathrooms, one with a shower and the other with a bathtub, and a beautiful living-dining room with a fireplace, furnished with high-quality furniture, including in the price some valuable items due to their age. It also has a laundry room, a large solarium terrace at the top of the house, a beautiful garden with fruit trees, plants and flowers of different types, a cistern with drinking water, etc. It has air conditioning with a cold air pump in a large part of the house and has central heating. The property is completely fenced and is in perfect condition. From Amperiza real estate we consider that this property has a very good value for money and we invite you to contact us to give you all the details.  Calvià retains much of its traditional charm. Easy access to many of the most popular tourist centers and some of the largest expat residential areas means that international education is never far away. There is also a wide variety of international businesses in the local area. The narrow spur of the land means that many of the country houses enjoy stunning views of the surrounding countryside and often the Mediterranean Sea. Property prices reflect the strong international interest in the area, making it a safer bet for future prices. Surroundings near Calvià With everything from the buzz of Palma Nova and Magaluf to the laid-back class of Andratx within easy reach, this municipality really does have something for everyone. Puerto Portals is a popular port with high-end clients looking for a place to shop or just have a coffee in beautiful surroundings. There is also a selection of golf courses within the municipality of Calvià, as well as many more within a short distance.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Ferrer, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: This beautiful semi-detached house in Palma, located a few steps from the wonderful Bellver Castle and its magical forest, is located in the Sa Teulera urbanization, a quiet family urbanization with private access, shared by only 32 neighbors. The sunny south facing property consists of 2 floors and a spacious constructed area of approx. 140 m2. The charming ground floor, with access to the fantastic private garden with the possibility of building a refreshing pool, has a nice living/dining room, a magnificent renovated modern kitchen, utility room and a guest toilet. The upper floor offers 3 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a full bathroom to share. Both levels have large sunny terraces to enjoy the pleasant Mediterranean climate throughout the year. Other features: Climalit windows, parquet flooring, city gas central heating with radiators in each room, air conditioning and garage for one vehicle. In addition, the splendid garden, with fruit trees, offers a summer kitchen with barbecue to enjoy pleasant meals with all the family and friends. This beautiful semi-detached house in Palma has 2 entrances, one from the private street and the other from the garden on the back street. Sa Teulera is one of the most coveted and highly valued exclusive residential areas in Palma.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Teulera, Palma de Mallorca

description: This very nice mansion is located on the outskirts of Palma de Mallorca and has magnificent views to the sea and the whole of Mallorca. This house is not only large, but also has two further houses and can be a very successful investment. It is distributed over 3 plots with a total area of 9000 m² and was completely renovated in 2017. The main house has three levels. The entrance leads to a hall from which you enter the dining room with a large modern kitchen, a large office on two levels with stairs and a gym. Stairs and lift lead to the first floor with four double bedrooms, three bathrooms, two of which are en suite. To the first floor with a spacious living room and two bedrooms. In the well-kept garden there is a swimming pool and very old olive trees. The covered terrace with dining table for ten people. Underground flat for at least 10 cars.  The property has underfloor heating, four entrances with electric gates, hot water through solar energy and a private well with drinking water quality. All included in the purchase price.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Roca - Son Ximelis - Son Anglada, Palma de Mallorca

description: Stunning 180 m² duplex on two floors (9th and 10th floor) with views of the Tramuntana mountains to the west and the sea to the east.  4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, covered garage, 2 private terraces, 9th floor with lift. It is located in the residential area of SON ARMADAMS, a few steps from the Paseo Marítimo and 5 minutes from the centre of Palma, in a very quiet street with little traffic. On the ground floor, spacious living-dining room with access to a wonderful 30 m2 terrace with mountain views. The independent, fully equipped kitchen is very bright and has a small terrace with sea views.  It communicates with a room used as a pantry and laundry room with a private bathroom. The entrance leads to the first floor via a beautiful internal wooden staircase that is very well lit.  On the first floor is a large bedroom with en-suite shower room, a very spacious walk-in wardrobe and a wonderful private living room with access to the second terrace with mountain views.  Also on the same floor are two double bedrooms and a full bathroom. The garage is very large, you can park 1 car and 1 or 2 motorbikes and there is direct access to the floor by lift. Agent  Paola King Mallorca Real Estate.

description: This Villa with pool, garage and a well-kept garden is located in Sa Cabaneta, Mallorca. It is a very quiet and familiar place. Palma is only about 12 km away. Two international schools, several shopping centers and the Puntiró and Son Gual golf courses are nearby. The pool is south facing and surrounded by a well-kept garden. The rooms on the 2 levels are very bright and have several windows and terraces. There is a barbecue area and a shaded summer dining area just off the kitchen. The distribution of the house: Main floor: Entrance hall, living room and dining room with access to the covered terrace and barbecue area, garden and pool, separate kitchen, 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms (2 ensuite), utility room and access to the garage. Second floor: master bedroom, bathroom and access to a large terrace with panoramic views. Equipment: Underfloor heating, marble floors, fitted wardrobes, double glazed windows, fireplace, alarm system, outdoor shower, garage. Contact us for more information or for a visit. description: Beautiful large finca type estate with 750 m2 of constructed area on a 30,000 m2 plot of land. The façade of the villa is finished with an exclusive natural hand chipped stone and high quality stonework has also been used in the interior of the house. It offers 4 en-suite bedrooms, large living areas, fully fitted kitchen equipped with state of the art appliances, and 2 separate staff or guest apartments. The charming living area is open to the vast outside covered and uncovered terraces with gardens and salt water pool heated by solar panels and fitted with led lights and massage jets. The pool is also equipped with an automated security cover. Other Features: Garage for six vehicles, private water well, basement with storage, underfloor heating powered by gasoil heat pump and solar panels, fireplace, stone flooring, reversible air conditioning system (Daikin-Viessmann), advanced automated lighting and sound system which can be controlled by Iphone/Ipad, double glazed windows with woodwork in sand blasted teak, alarm system, wireless Internet throughout the house, sat. TV, water softener, automated irrigation system. Pitch and putt golf course. The property is located a 2-minute walk from the Son Julia Country House & Spa and owners can use all facilities such as spa, gym, restaurants with a special discount. 2 staff/guest apartments.

The distribution of the 160 m² living space is as follows: open living room and dining room, separate kitchen, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (1 en suite), entrance hall and a storage room. On the ground floor of the property there is a 71 m² closed car park, third bathroom, shower and laundry, additional 78 m² storage rooms (can be converted) and a water tank. The features of this property include: tiled floor, aluminum shutters, wooden windows, barbecue, 58m² terrace, 35m² pool, garden with different trees and flowers, automatic irrigation system. description: This new build luxury villa is located in Palmanyola with panoramic views of the Tramontana mountains, built on a large 1300m2 plot with a 868m2 constructed area, fitted with top quality materials. The villa is distributed over 3 levels. The ground floor offers a spacious open plan living-dining room, a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast island, and access to the main terrace. On the first floor there are 3 double bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms and access to a large partially covered terrace, as well as a large master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and a large dressing room. In the basement there is a utility room, maintenance room and a large garage with space for 4 cars. The outdoor space offers a large covered terrace, a landscaped garden with a 39m2 swimming pool, a BBQ area and plenty of relaxation areas where you can enjoy the mountain views from.

description: This ground-floor apartment is located in the heart of Santa Catalina, one of the most trendy neighbourhoods in Palma de Mallorca.   This stunning 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment boasts 82 m2 of living area, featuring a spacious living room, an open kitchen, two bedrooms and hot/cold air conditioning throughout. The open-plan layout allows for natural light to flow throughout the apartment, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The highlight of this property is the interior patio of 42 m2 yet to be constructed, that is included in the sale and it's perfect for enjoying the Mediterranean weather all year round. Additionally, the community offers a communal roof terrace with stunning views. The apartment has been recently renovated. The location is unbeatable, right in the heart of Santa Catalina, with plenty of shops, restaurants, cafes and bars in the neighbourhood. This is a rare opportunity to own a piece of Santa Catalina, don't miss out, contact us for more information and to schedule a viewing.

description: This modern newly built villa in Costa d'en Blanes is located in a privileged and quiet residential area, just a few minutes drive from the beach, in the southwest of the wonderful island of Mallorca. The exclusive, south-facing property is being built with the best quality materials and has a constructed area of approx. 650 m2 distributed as follows: a large living/dining room with large windows and access to the terrace, an ultra-modern American kitchen, 5 beautiful bedrooms, 5 en-suite bathrooms, a dressing room, a security room, as well as a storage room. The beautiful outdoor area with a fantastic pool invites you to fully enjoy the hot summer days on the beautiful island Mallorca. The equipment features of this new villa in Costa d´en Blanes include: air conditioning, underfloor heating, double glazed windows and stone floors. There is a garage with space for 2 vehicles. The villa offers a very attractive location, just a few minutes drive from the famous Puerto Portals, with its luxurious boutiques, excellent restaurants and beautiful beaches with crystal clear waters. The center of Palma is 10, the international airport 20 minutes by car. The completion of the work is scheduled for 2023.

This apartment has been totally renovated to a high standard, high ceilings with double glazed floor-to-ceiling windows leading on to 2 Parisian balconies allowing lots of light to shine through most of the day and throughout the apartment. The bright open plan living and kitchen space, fully equipped with high-end appliances and a wine cooler to be installed as well as the original wooden beams with a great design throughout, containing 2 double bedrooms both with built-in wardrobes and en suite bathrooms. Located in a unique area on the door step of the Santa Catalina market with all the amenities nearby. Also containing an interior terrace with a small utility area.

description: Not far from Plaça Pere Garau, in a side street, is this 2-bedroom apartment of just over 50 m² on the top floor of a well-kept residential building built in 2004. Directly above is a roof terrace of about the same size, which the owner of the apartment has exclusive use of. The apartment is divided into a living-dining room with balcony, an open kitchen, a spacious double bedroom, a small single bedroom, a bathroom and another balcony, which is partially closed and used as a utility room. The apartment is equipped with two air conditioners in mint condition, one in the living room and the other in the master bedroom, various built-in wardrobes as well as a fitted kitchen with electrical appliances and a washing machine. Due to its size, the apartment is suitable for 1-2 people and possibly a child, who would like to live close to the center, but quietly. The spacious roof terrace can be used at will and equipped according to your own wishes, so you can spend many evenings a year in the city and yet outdoors. Roof terrace: approx. 50 m².

description: Penthouse of 60sqm for sale plus a 50sq m private roof terrace. It is a fourth floor with lift in the area of Can Capes, Reis Catòlics. The flat is located in a building from 2005, and it is in perfect conditions. The flat is located in a very quiet and familiar building, where there are two neighbours per floor. It is a very luminous and sunny flat due to the level and the great glass in the façade. In the front façade we have direct sun in the morning, and in the bedroom and the office (formerly a bedroom), located in the back façade, the sun shines in the afternoon. The flat is distributed in living-dining room, bedroom, office, laundry room (on the balcony), balconies on both facades and a 50 sqm terrace on the roof.  The living-dining room is in an 'open' space. From it there is access to the glazed balcony and on the balcony we find the laundry room. The flat also has a complete bathroom with bathtub. The bedroom also has access to a small balcony at the back and has a built-in wardrobe. The top terrace is accessed from the communal stairs with a private door, and is for exclusive and private use. It has an immense space of 50 sqm ideal to enjoy the sunny days. Currently on the terrace there is a wooden storage for storing barbecue tools, terrace furniture, or even tools. It can be sold with or without furniture, depending on your preference. It is a flat located in a building built in 2005. Therefore there is a guarantee of being years without reforms and without any extra expenses. The water counter is individual. And the community expenses are 70€ per month which includes the stairs electricity, lift, cleaning and administration.  In the area of Can Capes, we find all the services for a comfortable and practical life. Public transport services are within walking distance. It is close to Aragon street.  If you wish to arrange a visit or receive more information, you can send us an email or contact us by our whattsapp.

description: This fabulous villa in Sa Coma/Bunyola, with pool and mountain views, offers a lot of privacy and tranquility. The modern south-facing property with a constructed area of approximately 250 m2, is distributed over 2 levels. There is an elegant living room with dining area and floor to ceiling windows, an elegant open plan kitchen with a cooking island, 4 large bedrooms, 2 of which have en-suite bathrooms, and another bathroom, a laundry room, as well as a storage room. Independent. The charming outdoor area, with a fantastic swimming pool, a chill-out area and a summer kitchen, will invite you to enjoy the wonderful days and nights with a Mediterranean atmosphere. Features of this villa include: air conditioning, underfloor heating, double glazed PVC windows and ceramic tile flooring. There are 2 parking spaces available. The attractive location allows you to reach various romantic bays, such as Cala Deià, the towns of the Tramuntana or the lively capital of the island, with its cinemas, exquisite restaurants and noble boutiques, in a short driving time. Palma is only 16 kilometers away and the international airport is only 20 kilometers away.

description: Anyone who lives in Mallorca recognizes Sa Cabaneta as a special place, a town where you can still breathe the most traditional flavor of Mallorca, and even more so in a house like this one, full of light, nature and good feelings. It is very easy to imagine living in such a house; work, share and enjoy open spaces. If we had to list the charms of this house, we wouldn't know where to start because it has everything: views of the sea and the Bay of Palma, a garden with a pool that acts like a magnet as soon as you enter the house, the covered porch, the upper terrace with panoramic views and the best and most unique, an independent two-bedroom apartment with its own entrance and direct access to the pool. And it is that the whole house turns to the outside, bright and cozy, and with enormous possibilities. So many, that we have proposed some redistribution ideas to get the most out of it, through renders prepared by a studio of architects. The RENDERS are not real photos, it is a digital simulation of how the renovated house would look, designed by architects. The main house has a living room, kitchen with island, courtesy toilet, laundry room and garage for 2 cars. The living room and kitchen have direct access to a large porch or covered terrace, overlooking the pool and garden. On the upper floor you can enjoy incredible panoramic views of the bay of Palma thanks to a spectacular terrace and it is where the 3 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes are located; The master bedroom has a full en-suite bathroom, closet area and a small terrace. In addition, this area has another full bathroom. All exterior. And perhaps the great advantage of this property is that it has an independent apartment with two bedrooms, kitchen, bathroom and living room. You arrive home, leave the car in the garage and enter directly into the apartment with complete privacy. Ideal as a guest house or "coliving" with parents or children, as an office or work area or the use you need at any time. We invite you to discover this house together, it will be a pleasure).

description: Only 500 m from the spectacular Mirador de Pedrafort, we present this beautiful newly built villa in Bahía Grande. The fantastic modern property, which is only for sale with us and scheduled for completion in July 2023, is situated on a sunny 615 m2 plot with a 26 m2 private pool and surrounded by a magnificent garden. The beautiful 2-storey villa offers a constructed area of approx. 240 m2 divided as follows: The spacious ground floor has a large open plan living room, dining room, a wonderful fully equipped kitchen leading to a large terrace and the garden with pool, 2 bedrooms, one of them with a dressing room and bathroom en suite, as well as another additional bathroom. The 2nd level has a wonderful huge master bedroom with private bathroom and balcony and a large living room also with a balcony. Both bedrooms have access to a large terrace with a jacuzzi. Other features: central air conditioning, central heating and double glazed windows. It is an excellent location in Majorca, close to several dreamy coves with crystal clear water and the well-known Maioris golf course. Bahía Grande is only 10 minutes from the airport and 20 minutes from the capital Palma de Mallorca.

description: EXCLUSIVE OPPORTUNITY IN THE FIRST LINE OF PLAYA DE PALMA BEACH In first line, with privileged views to the sea and the Bay of Palma, we find this old construction consisting of first floor and second floor with free roof. Currently, it is distributed as follows: - The first floor is currently enabled as premises with supermarket business. It could be restored as a house or as a business space. (For privacy reasons, there are no photos of the place since it is a business open to the public) - The second floor has all the charm of the Majorcan buildings of yesteryear: hydraulic floors, high ceilings, moldings, original interior carpentry.. . With terrace and privileged views to the sea and the Bay of Palma. The possibilities are multiple. Both floors could be reconnected from the inside, allowing to convert it into a single-family house as it was initially, or, being two independent registered properties, they could be fitted out as 2 totally independent houses. Another option is to leave the first floor as premises as it is nowadays, and only refurbish the first floor, with the possibility of creating a solarium terrace or building another floor. The back of the building is located in a private passage, where there is a garage.

description: Are you looking for a beautiful apartment, ready to move into, in one of the best areas in the center of Palma? We present it to you! Distributed in a living-dining room connected to the fully furnished and equipped kitchen, an exterior double main room with fitted wardrobes and fully dressed and 1 bathroom with shower. It has wooden floors to give warmth and all its rooms have natural light. It is also ideal as an investment! The Downtown District is the urban nucleus of Palma, which is home to a promenade and the Cathedral of Santa María, in the Gothic style and decorated with modernist wrought iron details, the work of Gaudí. The Royal Palace of La Almudaina, which is located next door, dates from the 13th century and exhibits tapestries and paintings between Moorish arches and gardens. In the narrow cobbled streets of the old town there are craft shops with typical Mallorcan colored glass and busy taverns serving rice soup with island wines. Our objective is yours, to sell at the best price in the shortest possible time.

description: This modern and elegant townhouse in Palma is located in a quiet residential area in the up and coming and popular neighborhood of El Terreno. It has been extensively renovated with great attention to detail and the final works on the house will be completed in January 2023. This beautiful property is presented with a modern design, combined with warm colors and fine materials. The highlight of this town house is its private pool, the beautiful garden and the terrace, which invite you to relax and spend time outdoors. Here you can enjoy tranquility and Mediterranean atmosphere and, at the same time, you will be a short distance from the city center. Palma offers a huge cultural offer, an excellent gastronomic variety and numerous shops and boutiques. On a constructed area of approx. 210 m2 there are: 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 2 of them en-suite, an open living/dining room, a fully equipped open plan kitchen, a laundry room, a storage room and a guest toilet. Other features: fully furnished and of high quality, air conditioning h/c, underfloor heating, garage, fitted wardrobes, modern infotainment system and much more. An oasis in the middle of one of the most popular and vibrant cities in Europe and with a cosmopolitan touch, located near the Mediterranean Sea.

description: This beautiful newly built villa in Son Gual with pool and mountain views has an exclusive location in the south of the island of Mallorca. The attractive property has a plot of approx. 2035 m2 and will offer a constructed area of approx. 418.60 m2. It will be distributed over two floors as follows: A spacious and beautiful living room with access to the outside, a modern fully equipped kitchen with a dining room, 4 bedrooms (2 on each floor), 3 bathrooms (en suite), 1 toilet and a laundry room. In the outdoor area of this fantastic villa there will be a beautiful swimming pool, a chill out area and a garden, a fabulous environment to enjoy with tranquility and peace on the hot days that the island of Mallorca offers. The modern property will be equipped with: aerothermal air conditioning, aluminum windows, electric blinds, alarm, home automation control with measurement of energy consumption, temperature, humidity and lighting, fitted wardrobes, natural stone and wood floors and two parking spaces. This luxurious newly built villa in Son Gual is located in an area surrounded by nature that is just a few minutes from the Son Gual Golf Club and about 20 minutes from the center of Palma. To take into account is that modifications can be made and also an extension of land.

description: This wonderful, luxurious villa in Cas Catalá has impressive sea views and is located on the seafront, in a beautiful, quiet town near Palma, in the southwest of the beautiful island Mallorca. The completely renovated property has direct access to the sea and has a constructed area of approx. 532 m2 distributed over 2 floors as follows: the ground floor offers 4 beautiful bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms - 3 of them with a dressing room. The first floor has an elegant living / dining room and a designer American kitchen with an island. There is also a space that can be used as a gym or games room. In the outdoor area there is a magnificent terrace with a fantastic pool that invites you to enjoy the wonderful views of the sea and the magical Mediterranean atmosphere on the island. The equipment features of this luxurious villa in Cas Catalá include: air conditioning, underfloor heating, double-glazed windows and an elevator. At your disposal you have 2 outdoor parking spaces. There is a possibility to build a guest house with pool on the adjacent plot. It is a very attractive front line location with good access to various beautiful coves and beaches with crystal clear waters. The next golf course is only a few minutes away by car.

From the first floor you can see a bit of the sea. The charming outdoor area with a beautiful garden with a barbecue and a fantastic pool invite you to relax and fully enjoy the wonderful Mediterranean atmosphere on the island. The equipment features of this attractive villa in Sa Torre include: air conditioning, central heating, tiled floors and alarm system. There is a large garage. It is a very attractive situation, in a quiet area, near the sea. The next beautiful beach with turquoise water is only 10, the international airport 20 minutes by car.

description: SPECTACULAR RENOVATED PENTHOUSE IN AVENIDA ARGENTINA, one of the most sought after and desired areas to live. The property has 136 meters built, of which 106m2 are for housing and 30 for terraces. From the house we highlight a spacious living-dining room that is very bright thanks to the fact that practically the entire exterior wall is made up of a window with panoramic views. This same window extends through the façade beyond the living room and also occupies the entire wall of the main room, giving us impressive views of the Tramuntana as soon as we wake up, when we open the curtains. This same room has direct access to a 30m2 outdoor terrace. The other two bedrooms are both doubles with fitted wardrobes and access to outdoor spaces. The kitchen is fully equipped and renovated. Initially, the kitchen is integrated with the dining room and is a single room, but it has a folding glass door to close the kitchen if desired, we also find a space for the utility room. We also highlight that all the rooms are equipped with a hot-cold pump since the system is integrated, and city gas water heater. Perfect situation, with all services, schools and institutes. Supermarkets a few meters away. In the middle of Avenida Argentina next to Santa Catalina and Jaime III and Paseo Marítimo, a 10-minute walk away.

description: This fantastic project of a wonderful villa next to the Son Gual golf course with pool and garden, is located in a green and quiet area in the south of the island of Mallorca.The beautiful property has a plot of approx.2005 m2 and will have a constructed area of approx.255 m2 with the possibility of expansion.The attractive villa will include two floors distributed as follows: A bright and elegant living room with access to a fantastic terrace with a beautiful pool and chill out area, a modern kitchen with a dining room, 4 elegant bedrooms, 3 en-suite bathrooms, a toilet and a laundry.Outside we will also find a large garden and above all magnificent views of the beautiful mountains that the island offers us.The extras that the wonderful villa will have are: aerothermal air conditioning, aluminum windows, electric blinds, alarm, home automation control with measurement of energy consumption, temperature, humidity and lighting, fitted wardrobes, natural stone and wood floors and two seats. of parking.Another point in favor is that the project can be adjusted according to the taste and wishes of the client.Apart from the tranquility in the surroundings, the villa is located just 5 minutes from the Son Gual Golf Club by car and 15 minutes from Palma de Mallorca International Airport.

description: Son Espanyolet is a neighborhood in the city of Palma de Mallorca. It is delimited by the neighborhoods of Son Armadams, Son Dureta, Santa Catalina, Son Dameto and Campo de Serralta. If you are looking for a house with a free roof in one of the best areas of Palma, this is your opportunity. Distributed in approximately 80 m2 built, it has a living-dining room, fully furnished and equipped kitchen, 3 bedrooms (2 doubles and one single) and a complete bathroom. In addition, it has a magnificent solarium terrace ideal for spending free time with the family or as a couple. The house has been renovated with good qualities and has air conditioning, hot and cold pump, city gas and a backyard. High ceilings and Majorcan style windows make this property your ideal home. Contact us for more information. Our objective is yours, to sell at the best price in the shortest possible time.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Espanyolet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Miquel Porcel

description: This beautiful Mediterranean villa in Costa d'en Blanes has a holiday rental license for 12 people, offers beautiful unobstructed views of the forest and the sea and is located in a noble residential area, a few minutes drive from the beach with turquoise waters.in the southwest of the beautiful island Majorca.The bright property has a constructed area of approx.660 m2 distributed over 2 floors as follows: the ground floor consists of a living/dining room with a fireplace and access to the terrace, a kitchen, 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom.On this floor there is also a separate apartment with a double bedroom, office, bathroom and dressing room.In the 1.On the ground floor there are 3 double bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, as well as a dressing room.In the basement there is a cellar.The charming outdoor area with a magnificent pool, outdoor kitchen and barbecue invites you to fully enjoy the beautiful views in a magical Mediterranean atmosphere on the island.The equipment features of this incredible villa in Costa d´en Blanes include: air conditioning, heating, fireplace, double glazed windows and marble floors.This is a very attractive location, just a few minutes drive from the famous Puerto Portals marina with its exclusive boutiques, excellent restaurants and beautiful beaches with crystal clear waters.The Bendinat golf course is only 5 minutes away by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Costa d'En Blanes, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de G.M. Jovellanos

description: This impressive newly built luxury estate in Santa Maria de Cami with unobstructed views and a fantastic saltwater pool, is located on a spectacular plot of about 50,000 m2 surrounded by nature and olive trees, offering a lot of tranquility.The fabulous property, completely home automation, has a constructed area of approx.940 m2 of which 530 m2 belong to the house on the ground floor and about 410 m2 to the basement.The ground floor is distributed in a large living-dining room with large windows that offer plenty of natural light and that lead to a magnificent covered porch and the refreshing pool of approx.56 m2, as well as a wonderful kitchen with high-quality appliances, 6 bedrooms and 5 en-suite bathrooms and a guest toilet.The master bedroom stands out for a beautiful living room and a large dressing room, as well as 2 showers and 2 sinks in its bathroom.In the basement is the machine room, cistern, garage for 3 cars, 2 large storage rooms and a toilet.Extras: Guest apartment, natural stone floors, air conditioning by aerothermal energy and ducts, underfloor heating even in the showers, lighting throughout the house, water softener, solar panels with a complete assembly for self-supply, own well, triple the photovoltaic installation, utility room and pantry, fitted wardrobes, automatic entrance doors with remote control and much more.Santa Maria del Camí is a traditional village with authentic cafes and restaurants in the center of Mallorca.

Recently renovated and updated the entire electrical system, pipes, before nas and soundproof. It consists of 80m2 with a large balcony. The side views are of the sea, it has a large living room with access to the fully glazed terrace. Climalit throughout the house. The independent kitchen with large storage capacity renovated and with induction hobs. It has two double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a hot and cold air pump in all rooms. The bathroom is complete with a large shower tray. It is a very calm and quiet gated community with garden areas. It has a private garage space in the community area. Do not miss the opportunity, get in touch and make a visit.

description: This beautiful villa in Cala Gamba has wonderful views of the sea and is located on the seafront, just a few steps from the beach with crystal clear waters, in the neighborhood of Palma de Mallorca - Es Coll d´en Rabassa.The attractive property is in need of some renovation and has a constructed area of approx.330 m2 distributed on one floor as follows: a spacious living/dining room, a large furnished and equipped kitchen, a dining room, 6 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, 2 bathrooms, a storage room and a utility room.The house also has a beautiful roof terrace of about 80 m2 and a beautiful private pool that invite you to enjoy the hot summer days on the beautiful island of Mallorca.The equipment features of this beautiful villa in Cala Gamba include: air conditioning, a fireplace, electric radiators, double glazed windows and ceramic and stoneware floors.At your disposal you have a large garage with space for 3 cars and 2 parking spaces.It is a very attractive situation facing the sea and close to the beach with turquoise waters, as well as only 10 minutes by car from the capital Palma and the international airport.It is a perfect property for lovers of the sun and the wonderful Mediterranean atmosphere!

It is delimited by the neighborhoods of Son Dureta, Son Peretó, Son Flor, Son Serra-La Vileta, Los Almendros-Son Pacs, Son Vida, Son Cotoner and Son Dameto. Close to all kinds of amenities such as several schools, pharmacies, parks, etc.. . We find this wonderful spacious 100 m2 apartment distributed in a spacious living-dining room with access to a balcony, a fully furnished and equipped kitchen together with a utility room, 4 bedrooms ( 2 doubles and 2 singles), 1 complete bathroom with shower. The house stands out for the great natural light it has, the good distribution and the built-in wardrobes in several rooms. It is a second floor in a very quiet building WITHOUT ELEVATOR, but where you can have everything at your fingertips. Our objective is yours, to sell at the best price in the shortest possible time.

description: This spacious renovated apartment, close to the famous Mercat de l'Olivar and the Plaza Mayor, is located in an old monastery of the sixteenth century that has been renovated preserving the original details of its time. The property stands out for its 4 meter high ceilings and the perfect mix of historical and modern elements. The total renovation was launched in 2008 by a Swedish designer, with the characteristic Scandinavian style.   Going up stairs to the first floor (there is no elevator) upon entering, a spacious and bright living room opens up that gives access to the spacious and fully equipped kitchen, as well as two bedrooms and two bathrooms. One of the bedrooms has its own en-suite bathroom with bathtub. The natural stone column adds a touch of character to the apartment and a patio, a balcony, a French balcony, parquet floor, double-glazed windows and an air conditioning system complete the offer. This is a perfect location for those looking for a stylish property right in the centre of the Old Town. Possibility of renting a garage space very close.  .

The bright apartment has a constructed area of approx. 56 m2 distributed as follows: a living/dining room with access to the terrace with unobstructed views, an equipped American kitchen, a spacious bedroom with a built-in wardrobe, a utility room, as well as a bathroom with a shower. The equipment features of this beautiful apartment in Cala Major include: hot/cold air conditioning, double-glazed windows and parquet floors. It is an attractive residential area, a few minutes walk from the main beach and a few minutes drive from several beautiful coves and beaches with turquoise waters. Also all the services that one needs in daily life, such as supermarkets, pharmacies or public transport are just a few minutes walk away.

The large 1,322m2 plot offers large lawns with old cypress trees and a private pool with a garden house with an open summer kitchen. The house has a total construction area of 308m2, all distributed on one level. You enter a large living room with fireplace and access to the terrace, separated by a few steps there is a dining room with fully equipped kitchen and access to the patio. Further on, there is access to the night area with a small library, bathroom, bedroom and one more bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. Through the patio there is access to the master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and access to the terrace and pool. A covered parking space completes this very interesting offer of a villa for sale in Palmanova.

description: This beautiful apartment in Illetas offers partial sea views and is located in a well-kept building with elevator, at 2.sea line, just a few steps walk from the beach, in the southwest of the wonderful island Mallorca.The bright, south-facing apartment has a constructed area of approx.44 m2 distributed as follows: a nice living/dining room with access to the terrace with views over the green surroundings and the sea, a furnished and equipped American kitchen, a bedroom with a built-in wardrobe, as well as a bathroom with a shower.The beautiful community offers owners a fantastic community pool to fully enjoy the hot summer days on the island.The equipment features of this attractive apartment in Illetas include: air conditioning, double glazed windows, Sat TV and parquet flooring.It is a perfect situation, in a green and quiet residential area and just a few minutes walk from several beautiful coves and beaches with turquoise waters.All the services that one needs in daily life, as well as public transport are just a few steps away on foot.The international airport is 20 minutes away by car.

Suitable for weddings and communions.

description: This authentic country house in S'Esgleieta, an old stone construction approx. 150 years old, it was completely rehabilitated with the strict regulations of the municipality of Esporles in 2005 and completely renovated with quality materials in 2010. The beautiful property, situated on a plot of approx. 460 m2 with southwest orientation and the possibility of building a refreshing pool, it is part of the Pedania de S'Esgleieta, a fantastic nucleus of rustic houses. The sunny 2-storey property has a living space of approx. 170 m2 divided into a large open kitchen, a large living-/dining room with fireplace and access to the wonderful porch and the summer dining room. The pleasant upper floor houses the 3 double bedrooms and a bathroom with a shower. Other features: Roof with thermal insulation, aluminum windows with double glazing, hydraulic floor, storage room and outdoor parking for two cars and/or motorcycles. Its location allows quick access to the city of Palma, the Serra de Tramuntana mountains and other wonderful towns such as Esporles, Banyalbufar, Valldemossa, Deià, Bunyola and Sóller. It is only 2 minutes drive from Golf Son Termes, as well as Sa Font Seca and several excellent restaurants with authentic Mallorcan cuisine.

Stone house. Reformed Balinese style.

description: This beautiful villa in Santa Ponsa is located a short distance from the beach and the well-known Santa Ponsa golf course.The sunny property, in need of modernisation, is located on an attractive plot of approx.860 m2 with Mediterranean gardens and a refreshing pool with outdoor shower and has a constructed area of approx.270 m2.The beautiful 2-storey house offers a completely independent apartment on the ground floor with 2 bedrooms, a full bathroom, a living-/dining room and a beautiful terrace surrounded by the garden.The main floor offers a cozy living-/dining room with a fireplace, as well as 2 other bright bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms.The fantastic exterior has many plants, fruit trees, a summer kitchen, barbecue and a wonderful refreshing pool with plenty of privacy to relax and enjoy the pleasant climate and sun throughout the day.This wonderful villa in Santa Ponsa is equipped with air conditioning, 2 fireplaces, a dressing room, fitted wardrobes, double-glazed windows, wooden shutters, tiled and parquet floors and automatic irrigation.A garage for 2 vehicles completes this great real estate offer.The situation is quiet and only a few minutes walk from the main beach and the center of the town with a variety of great restaurants, shops and supermarkets.The golf of Santa Ponsa is only 5 minutes away by car.

description: This magnificent manor house in Valldemossa with vacation license for 11 people, swimming pool and tennis court is located on a, typical area, climbing plot of approx. 3,494 m2 offering unique panoramic views over the town of Valldemossa and its beautiful valley. The fantastic property, in need of renovation and a constructed area of approx. 476 m2, is distributed over 2 levels as follows: A large living-/dining room with fireplace and access to a huge terrace with spectacular views of the Sierra de Tramuntana, a kitchen, 2 additional cozy living rooms, 10 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms and 3 guest toilets. The main bedroom has an en-suite bathroom. In addition, there are several service areas, as well as 2 external dependencies, an observatory and a playhouse in the garden. This wonderful manor house is the ideal place to relax in the Mediterranean garden and enjoy the magical landscape offered by the northeast coast of Mallorca. The picturesque town of Valldemossa, an idyllic and famous place at the foot of the Sierra de Tramuntana, protected by UNESCO, offers many places to visit and discover.

description: his bright apartment in Portals Nous is only a 3-minute walk from the wonderful beach and the luxurious port of Puerto Portals with its famous bars, restaurants, boutiques and beautiful yachts. The beautiful apartment, located on the 5th floor of a well-kept building with elevator, community pool and garden, is oriented to the south, so you can enjoy the sun from early in the morning. The apartment is fully furnished and offers a living space of approx. 57 m2 that is divided into a bright living room with an open American kitchen and access to a beautiful terrace of approx. 5 m2 with views of the pool, a bedroom with a built-in wardrobe and a modern bathroom with an easily accessible shower. Other features: Double glazed windows, air conditioning and a private parking space. The building is inhabited by a very kind and friendly international public. 3 times a week a professional maintenance offers its service that is totally included in the common expenses. This wonderful property is ideal as a vacation apartment or to live long periods of time. Its location is unbeatable, as there are several international schools around it, excellent golf courses, tennis courts and wonderful beaches with crystal clear water.

description: Are you looking to get away from the noise and just 10 minutes from Palma? This is your chance! This magnificent rustic finca is located between Son Ferriol and Palma, in the Son Moneder urbanization, with good access and close to all kinds of services. Located on a 2075 m2 plot, it has a 185 m2 built house currently renovated. It is distributed in a spacious living-dining room with access to a terrace, a fully furnished and equipped kitchen, a gallery, 4 double bedrooms and 2 complete bathrooms. The farm has SAFRAIG, 12 solar panels with batteries, softener, air conditioning, wood stove and stamped concrete with a path to the house. Barbecue area and a fantastic porch ideal for spending time with the family. Our objective is yours, to sell at the best price in the shortest possible time.

description: Spacious ground floor 150 metres from the beach of Cala Vinyes. Property of 99 m2 constructed and terrace of 45 m2 approximately, distributed in lounge dining room with exit to the exterior, open plan kitchen, 3 double bedrooms (one of them with bathroom en suite) with built-in wardrobes and a spacious toilet. Features to take into account: Air conditioning by conduit in all the housing cold/heat, barbecue in exterior area, 4 built-in wardrobes, butane gas boiler, induction cooker, parking and storage room optional in the same building, lift, green areas and beach of Cala Vinyes at 150 metres. Cala Vinyes, is a small and very beautiful beach situated in Calvià, 2 min. walking distance directly from the property. Surrounded by a spectacular natural landscape of special beauty, pure nature to enjoy every day of the year and very close to Cala Falcó, Portals Vells and places like Sol de Mallorca, Golf de Calviá and Golf de Santa Ponsa, la Porrassa, Son Ferrer. Idyllic place to enjoy beaches, pine forests and tranquillity. The real luxury of living in Mallorca. suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle del Sol

description: Historic Majorquinian property from the 19th century with sea views in a privileged location. This unique 700m2 property was restored in 1990. The plot has a total extension of 34000 m2 surrounded by greenery and views of the entire Estellencs valley. Located in the middle of nature, it is located a few minutes from the center of the characteristic towns of Estellencs and Banyalbufar. The location is perfect to enjoy the majestic Sierra de Tramuntana. The property, with a multitude of rooms, has a historic and mallorquinin's tradition air, with all the characteristics of a manor house of a unique size in its surroundings. The property is distributed in two large L-shaped naves that converge in a large central courtyard with large natural stone slabs. From here we access the central porch, which is ideal for celebrations enjoying a beautiful sunset. Inside it is possible to appreciate the historical value of its materials in the wide exposed stone walls or in the natural stone pavements in the common areas of the main floor. In the rooms and bathrooms we find beautiful decorative tiles made of hydraulic tile. This large house is completed with a beautiful "safreig" with privileged views and spring water that can be converted into a swimming pool and with another singular element: an oil mill, a perfectly maintained single piece that can be put into operation. A great opportunity to invest in a piece of the history of Mallorca and the Sierra de Tramuntana.  AG Asociados: the most complete team for the best real estate management. Welcome home.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Estellencs
suggestedTexts.title: Masía in Calle Alemany

description: Mallorcan villa on the Bonanova hill. This charming villa is located in the privileged area of Bonanova, just a few minutes drive from the center of Palma. When you enter your new property, you will experience a typical Mallorcan villa. The first floor is at street level. Here you will find a spacious living room with direct access to your terrace, from where you can observe the virgin nature. The floor also has two cozy bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a bathroom. For the more connoisseurs, there is a separate wooden kitchen, from which there is access to another outdoor area with an outdoor kitchen. A special advantage is the ample parking space, including your own garage. Your new home also has a separate laundry room and storage room. From here you access the 100 m² sunny roof terrace, from where you can enjoy a magnificent view of the sea. On the ground floor there is a second living room, another bedroom and a bathroom. The apartment is perfect for a guest apartment where you can accommodate your friends and family. From here there is access to the large garden area with several fruit trees: 1 lemon tree, 2 orange trees and a mandarin tree. In addition, a second access to your property facilitates loading and unloading. It has other rooms for garden tools. The building is in good condition according to the year of construction, but it would need reforms in some areas. The unique location makes its value. Do not miss out on this unique opportunity and make an appointment to visit with us.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Bonanova - Porto Pi, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: House

description: Luxury design loft in the center of Palma. This industrial loft as a townhouse is located in Son Armadams, the sought-after neighborhood next to Santa Catalina in the heart of Palma, and is only a few minutes' walk from the famous port of Palma. The best materials, the best design and unique living comfort in the center of the island's capital, Palma. Let yourself be carried away by the spell of this exclusive and unique living space. To the facts: The building consists of 5 individual semi-detached houses developed in high quality loft style. The first floor of the house has a bright living room with high ceilings and an elegant fireplace. The large front window provides an open environment. The kitchen is made of high quality wood and has all high quality appliances. From here there is direct access to the terrace, which invites you to relax in the middle of the metropolis of Palma. In the common area of the complex there is a well-maintained swimming pool where you can find refreshment even on hot days. The 2nd floor of the house consists of a master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, a dressing room, a large balcony and a noble bathroom. On the 3rd floor, an open room that can be used as an office or library invites you to linger. Here you will also find two other bedrooms with elegant bathrooms. The garage in the basement offers enough space for 2 cars, a jewel in the center of the lively city of Palma. There is also a laundry room, a large storage room and an additional closet. The house is fully equipped with high-tech air conditioning and double glazed windows. Hardwood floors, high quality wall coverings and lots of gas and metal in an industrial design make this loft one of a kind. All furnishings are part of the purchase negotiation and can largely be taken over by separate agreement. We look forward to your visit.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Armadams, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: House

description: Beautiful apartment with sea views in Cala Vinyes. This recently renovated 90 m2 apartment has two bedrooms both with fitted wardrobes, one single and the other double with sea views. Fully equipped kitchen open to the dining room creating a totally open space. Bathroom with shower tray and adapted laundry space. The house has a spacious and quiet balcony with sea views. The urbanization has a club to access the community pool and tennis court. AG asociados: the best team for the best real estate management. Welcome home.

description: Superior villa near the beach with pool and garden. The villa is located on the second line of the sea in the quiet urbanization Sa Torre, in the south of the beautiful island. The house has a generous area of 250 m2 divided into 2 floors. On the ground floor there is an impressive entrance area, as well as the open plan living room with direct access to the garden. The pool invites you to cool off in summer and the sauna provides cozy warmth in winter. The fireplace in the living room also adds warmth in the cooler months. In addition, on the ground floor you will find a large independent kitchen, which could easily be integrated into the living area. 2 large bedrooms with their respective dressing rooms offer enough space for family and friends, who can also each enjoy the benefit of an en-suite bathroom. A separate storage room offers additional storage space. The upper floor impresses with the extremely beautiful gallery and the elegant round windows. They guarantee a particularly bright incidence of light. Here are another 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, 1 of which is en-suite. A walk-in closet offers enough storage space for your wardrobe. From the roof terrace you can enjoy wonderful views of the sea and the bay of Palma. At night, be enchanted by the city lights while enjoying a glass of wine. The villa is equipped with double glazed windows and air conditioning. The floors are partly tiled and partly laminated. In front of the windows there are aluminum shutters. You can park your vehicles safely in the covered parking space. With this villa, built in the year 2000, you can fulfill your dream of living in Mallorca. The building is connected to municipal electricity and water services. Make an appointment now and enjoy the Majorcan sun soon.

description: Bright 136 m2 designer apartment in the old town. The house has designer radiators in all rooms as well as an air system through hot / cold conduit throughout the house. The floor is made of treated natural wood. Upon entering the house, we find a spacious and bright living room with views of the Church of San Francisco, a fully furnished American kitchen, paneled with integrated appliances. It has 3 bedrooms, all of them with built-in wardrobes, the master bedroom has a dressing room and an en-suite bathroom with marble finishes. It also has another bathroom with large-format porcelain tiles. Both full bathrooms with shower tray. The building has a communal terrace from which we enjoy views of the Cathedral of Palma and the old part of the city. Elevator project pending. AG Asociados: the best team for the best real estate management. Welcome home.

description: Semi-detached house with 4 bedrooms, pool and patio in Sa Torre. In the quiet coastal village of San Torre (municipality of Llucmajor), 50 m from its viewpoint, in an environment of low houses and cliffs with magnificent sea views and hidden coves to discover, is this functional townhouse. It consists of two floors, with 4 bedrooms, swimming pool, a large patio and garage. • Semi-detached house in Sa Torre • 130 m² living space • 4 double bedrooms and 1 single bedroom • 1 bathroom and 1 toilet • 300 m² plot • Swimming pool • Parking spaces (2) • Extras: construction of 25 m² to renovate as a country kitchen and toilet or independent studio Upon entering your new home, you will find a patio and a terrace, which together measure about 25 m². On the first floor you will find the living-dining room connected to an independent and equipped kitchen, with storage room and direct access to the pool and garden. On the second floor there is a bedroom with double bed overlooking the pool and a shower room. From the living room, a carob staircase leads to the second floor of the house. On this floor there are two double bedrooms with fitted closets and another single bedroom. The complete bathroom with bathtub is located in the hallway of the second floor. All rooms are accessible from the outside. One of the double bedrooms has a small balcony with views. In the backyard we find the 3x8m² swimming pool with a side patio with barbecue for your enjoyment in the summer season. Next to this patio there is a room of 25m² to reform, ideal to create a country kitchen and toilet or an independent studio. In the side yard is the covered garage with space for two cars and another garage. Built in 2001, this house offers many possibilities to transform its exterior. The municipality of Sa Torre is very well connected with the road network and is only 20 minutes from Palma and 10 minutes from the airport. It offers a wide range of services such as shopping center, supermarkets, schools, sports centers, the Majoris Golf Club and the tranquility of a family environment away from urban noise. If you want to know more information about this villa located in Sa Torre, please contact us.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sa Torre, Llucmajor

address: Calle Gran Via Puig Sant Salvador
description: Detached villa with pool and unobstructed views in Santa Ponça. This detached villa located in the tourist town of Santa Ponça in the municipality of Calvià, presents an architectural design inspired by the Mediterranean tradition of the island. Recreating itself in the use of stone it has a large plot for you to enjoy your privacy. It has the following characteristics:  • Santa Ponça, Calvià • 288 m2 usable area • 4 double rooms and 1 single room • 3 bathrooms and 1 toilet • Plot 1.336 m2 • Swimming pool • Parking (4) • Distance to the beach: 300 m •Extras: air conditioning, fitted closets, barbecue, fireplace, double glazed exterior, fitted kitchen. Located in a quiet street only used by the few neighbors in the area, this villa will bring you a greater welfare in your day to day. The privacy will be absolute and the proximity to the beach as well as multiple services and leisure areas such as golf, too. The villa has a total of 288 m2 distributed in 3 floors in unevenness. Its rustic stone facade gives way to a renovated interior, but still maintains its rustic essence, thanks in part to the exposed beams. When you return home after a day of work or leisure in the city, a large parking with room for 4 vehicles will facilitate your arrival. Upon entering the house, you will find a hall where you can place your coats and other basic belongings. A few meters away you will see the fully equipped kitchen with large storage capacity and a living-dining room. As we advance in the tour of the home, in a lower level is located the large main living room, with fireplace and direct access to a stunning terrace overlooking the garden and the Bay of Santa Ponsa. A terrace from where you can enjoy the tranquility of the day and take a break from household chores. On the middle floor, there are 3 double bedrooms, one of them with bathroom en suite, and another single room or study. These rooms are exterior and overlook the balcony or the main gallery of the middle floor. We also find on this level 2 bathrooms and a sauna with a toilet. As extra space for cleaning tasks, you will also find a fully equipped laundry room. Finally a large living room with various functionalities (games room, cinema, gym, meeting room) with a bar and views of the garden will allow you to have another place for meetings with friends or family.  Its exteriors, consisting of a patio of 80 m2 and a garden of 160 m2 with swimming pool, also have an office with separate kitchen to serve the entire garden area. Ideal for the summer months not having to go in and out of the main house. If you want to know more details about this original villa in Santa Ponça, contact us as soon as possible.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Gran Via Puig Sant Salvador

description: Between Santa Catalina, Son Espanyolet and Son Armadams, we find this house with spacious spaces with unobstructed views of the Bellver castle and Na Burgesa. It has 3 double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and 2 bathrooms, one of them en suite. The fully glazed living room on the facade enjoys views from any point, in addition to the exit to the covered balcony that communicates with all the rooms. All the rooms except the bathrooms have natural light, with openings directly to the west-facing façade. The exterior carpentry is made of aluminum and the glass is double glazed. The interior joinery, including the cabinets, are made of solid wood. The house is equipped with radiator heating throughout the house and also with hot / cold air conditioning in the main rooms. The house includes a storage room in the basement of the building. It does not include parking, although the community has underground parking. If you want to live in a quiet location, but at the same time close to everything and with unobstructed views, stop looking and come see this property. AG Asociados: the most complete team for the best real estate management. Welcome home!

suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle d'Avinyó

description: TOP location with direct view of Playa de Palma. The popular Playa de Palma is currently in transition to one of Europe's hot spots. Many restaurants and shops are located here. In addition, the beautiful capital of the island is only a few minutes away by car. The lovingly renovated apartment is located on the first floor of a very well-kept apartment building and is just a few meters from the beach. Upon entering the dream apartment, the first thing you find is the bright living-dining room, perfectly illuminated by the large front window. Bright and friendly white dominates here and gives the apartment its modern character. From here you can also access the large balcony with side views of the sea. In the long corridor at the back of the flat there are 2 modern bathrooms, one with a shower, bath and bidet, the second with a shower and WC. Opposite are two separate bedrooms with their own patio balcony. Behind them is the spacious kitchen area with a bright fitted kitchen and another seating area. In addition, at the rear of the apartment are the two main bedrooms with practical built-in wardrobes. All three bedrooms have direct access to the rear balcony of the house. The flat also boasts a large communal roof terrace with sweeping sea views, a modern air conditioning system, underfloor heating and satellite TV connection. Let yourself be convinced by this unique apartment and make an appointment to see it with us.
