suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Designer villa directly in the heart of Calvia This unique dream villa was completed in 2012 and is built exclusively to the highest quality. State-of-the-art technology in combination with the highest quality materials make this offer something very special, which will impress those around you. The entrance to your new home is through the Mediterranean garden area or even directly through the garage, which offers enough space for 4 cars and much more. Via the quality elevator of the renowned OTIS company you reach the 1st floor. A wide hallway leads you directly to the two bedrooms of the villa. On the right hand side, there is a bedroom with its own exit and a luxurious en-suite bathroom that includes a rain shower. The spacious bathroom with a built-in marble bathtub and two sinks provides a relaxing atmosphere of well-being. A large walk-in closet is perfect for storing all your clothes, and the utility room behind offers short walking distances. The master bedroom is located on the same floor and, in addition to the spacious bathroom, also has direct access to the natural stone covered pool terrace. The carefully planted terrace invites you to relax, or you can treat yourself to a few refreshing moments in the pool, which can of course be heated in the transition season. On the second floor, there is access to the bright and open living room with an interior fireplace, which guarantees warm and cozy evenings. The large modern kitchen is also located here, which is included in the purchase price. Top brand appliances, short distances and plenty of space are the dream of a good cook, found here. Enjoy the typical delicacies of Mallorca with family and friends. Large double glazed windows throughout the living area provide plenty of light and an open feel.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Costa de la Calma, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: House

description: Impressive luxury villa with direct access to the beach and not far from the center of Palma. This unique villa close to the city is located in the middle of the noble residences in an exclusive neighborhood of Son Veri Nou and directly on the sea. Access through a private road is used exclusively by the villas. As soon as you enter the villa, the view through the impressive entrance hall will captivate you and give you a first impression of what to expect: Luxury and generosity are in every detail here. Heavy crystal chandeliers, fine rugs, and expensive furnishings in some 9,000 square feet of living space, plus extensive ancillary areas. 5 bedrooms with "en suite" bathrooms, 3 living rooms, a fully equipped kitchen with utility room, a dining room, the library, terraces and balconies on all floors, as well as a passenger elevator are just the facts of this dream property. The cinema itself and the games room are other rooms that will give a special quality to your life. All the furniture remains in the house and represents a true added value. The rooms, finished with a high level of craftsmanship and quality, have special air conditioning, countless luxury details and outstanding technology. Marble floors of the highest quality and wooden doors make this house a true jewel. The pool offers refreshments in case you don't want to go to the sea and countless sunbathing areas create retreats depending on the position of the sun. A real highlight is the roof terrace, where you could soon spend idyllic evenings with your family and friends in the Mediterranean heat. In each room, cameras and the highest security standards ensure your well-being. Feel the lavish luxury and security of this incredible building and experience the loving details during your visit.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Verí, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: House

description: Imposing dream villa with a rental license for 8 people in a quiet area of Marratxi. This beautiful and bright 3-storey urban villa from 2006 can be accessed through a wide driveway with ample parking space. On the ground floor are the open-plan living areas, an office, a bathroom and a bedroom, which are accessed from different entrances in the outdoor area. The kitchen also includes a storage room and a laundry room. The upper floor offers 3 cozy bedrooms, one of them en-suite with bathroom, dressing room and 2 roof terraces. From them you have a fantastic view of the garden and over the roofs of Marratxi. There is also another bathroom. All bathrooms are bright and modern. All bedrooms have fitted wardrobes. In the basement there is the HWR, the garage and 3 more rooms. One of them is used as a storage room for rentals. Another living space could be created on this level. The light-flooded rooms with their many beautiful details, such as the noble staircase or the wooden elements, inspire from the first second. There is hot/cold air conditioning in all rooms and pre-installed central heating. The well-kept garden of about 4,000 m2 offers plenty of space for all kinds of activities. From the fruit trees to the pool area with covered sunbathing areas to your own outdoor kitchen with separate toilet, the property offers everything your heart desires. A private well guarantees the water supply and municipal electricity and water services are also available. This tranquil oasis is complete with beautiful palm trees and pure sun all day until sunset, where you can end the day on the cozy terraces with a glass of wine, depending on your mood... "Live life". Make an appointment with your personal advisor today.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sa Cabaneta, Marratxi
suggestedTexts.title: House

description: Live near the city in an idyllic setting. Not far from Palma is this quaint and typical Majorcan townhouse with a double garage, wood stove and cozy conservatory. Enjoy peace and quiet in your own garden not far from the metropolis of Palma. The house is in good condition and meets current modern requirements with minor modifications. On the ground floor there is a living room with a fireplace, a typical Mallorcan kitchen, a separate dining room and a modernized bathroom. On the upper floor there are 4 large bedrooms, one of them with an en-suite bathroom. In addition, there is another large bathroom on the ground floor. Each of the bedrooms has its own built-in wardrobe. The highlight is the spacious roof terrace, from which you can enjoy a good view. The beautifully landscaped garden with fireplace and fountain offers sun all day and invites you to meet, barbecue and relax. There is also enough space in the garden for a private pool. Our construction professionals will be happy to advise you. Another plus point is the highly efficient drinking water tank with a volume of more than 40,000l, which provides you with fresh water to irrigate your garden all year round or, in combination with an optional osmosis system, also drinking water. The windows are made of high quality aluminum with a wood look. All windows are insulated with tilt-and-turn hardware. The 2-storey semi-detached house can be extended with one more floor if necessary; our construction professionals will also help you in this regard. Contact us to make an appointment. We are looking forward to meeting you. Your home4you team.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Pont d'Inca, Marratxi
suggestedTexts.title: House

description: Ground floor flat in the heart of Santa Catalina, next to the market, with a constructed area of 69 sqm in an elegant building. The apartment is distributed in living-dining room, kitchen integrated to the living room, utility room, 2 bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and 1 bathroom. The apartment is located in the heart of the Santa Catalina neighbourhood. One of the liveliest and most cosmopolitan neighbourhoods of Palma. Less than 5 minutes walking you can reach, the Tennis club, the Santa Catalina market, the Paseo Marítimo of Palma, and a lot of international restaurants and a wide range of leisure activities. The house has 144 built interior meters that are distributed, on the first floor we find a garage with capacity for a car, toilet, living-dining room with integrated kitchen and access to a terrace of 26 meters with south orientation. On the first floor we find 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and one of them en suite in the master bedroom, all rooms have fitted wardrobes. The extras of the property are porcelain floor tiles, AC in all the rooms with independent control, bathrooms with shower tray, bathroom furniture and Hansgrohe taps. neighborhood: Son Roca - Son Ximelis - Son Anglada
description: Located in Palma, this villa can become your definitive home. A house where you will make new memories with your family, you will rest and you will feel comfortable from the first day. With a garden- a dream terrace, this property will allow you to have great privacy and intimacy when you get home. The general characteristics of this villa are the following: • Location Son Anglada - Son Rapinya • Useful m² 542 • 7 double rooms • 5 bathrooms • Pool • Parking spaces (2) • Extras: underfloor heating, basement with laundry room and two rooms that currently They are used as an office. This functional and magnificent villa located in Son Rapinya consists of 542 useful m² of interior. When you enter the house for the first time, you will find a cozy-discreet entrance hall that will make it easier for you to leave your belongings to move more easily. A large hall will lead you to an elegant and bright living-dining room. A very spacious and warm space thanks to the large windows that allow the passage of natural light, and that will allow you direct access to the garden. A great room with a differentiated dining room space, and a relaxation area, with a large sofa to meet with friends or enjoy with your family. Open to the living room, you will find its spectacular fully equipped American kitchen (with top quality appliances). A very bright room with a large storage capacity that will make you forget about space problems. With direct access to the garden-terrace it will facilitate ventilation and communication with the rest of the rooms.

description: Ground floor located in a quiet street of Santa Catalina, with garage with direct access to the property and with great potential for revaluation of the property after the integral reform. The property has many possibilities and can be transformed into a house with 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, one of them en suite in the master bedroom with dressing room and access to the terrace, a spacious living-dining room with integrated kitchen and exit to the terrace of 74 meters that connects the interior with the exterior in a fluid way. It is possible to build a swimming pool, although it has to be consulted to the town hall. The ceilings of the house are high, 3 metres, which brings a lot of light and character to the whole house. The community where the property is located is small and with few neighbours. The property is located in the neighbourhood of Santa Catalina. One of the liveliest neighbourhoods of Palma with a cosmopolitan atmosphere. Less than 5 minutes walking distance from the flat, we find the Tennis club, the Santa Catalina market, art galleries, supermarkets, a wide range of international and national restaurants, and the Paseo Marítimo of Palma which after the renovation will become the most modern boulevard in Europe. What are you waiting for to arrange a visit? We can recommend renowned architects and construction companies for the refurbishment!

description: Newly built flat constructed with high quality materials and design. It has a constructed area of 116 metres plus 44 metres of terrace overlooking the Paseo Marítimo, the property has a spacious living-dining room with integrated kitchen with an island in a space of more than 50 metres, 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, one of them en suite in the master bedroom which has an exit to the terrace. The features of the property are: underfloor heating, ducted AC, double glazing, electric blinds, wooden and natural stone floors, fully fitted kitchens with high quality appliances and an island for family or friends gatherings. The project combines the luxury of its interior design with the best views of the city. Located in front of the marina, the project has been designed to maximise the exterior panoramic views by obtaining natural lighting and direct views of the sea and the cathedral. The Paseo Marítimo of Palma is one of the most exclusive areas of the city due to its strategic location, with the marina in front of it for yachting lovers, a varied offer of restaurants of international and national gastronomy, cafés and the lively neighbourhood of Santa Catalina next to it. The refurbishment of the Paseo Marítimo by the Palma Town Hall and the Club de Mar will turn it into a boulevard with less car traffic, more space for walking and sports and a wide range of quality leisure activities. Property values will increase significantly. Contact us to arrange a viewing!

Garage and storage room included in the sale price. The area of Pere Garau is a consolidated area where you can find supermarkets, cafés, pharmacies, Pere Garau market to buy fresh fish and vegetables and the beach of Can Pere Antoni and the promenade of Palma is 1,5 kilometres away. description: This spectacular apartment, recently refurbished to the highest standards of quality, luxury and comfort enjoys absolutely breathtaking views over the entire city of Palma, the Cathedral up to the Bellver Castle and the mountains, its bay and the sea. Situated only a few minutes walk from the historic centre and the Paseo Maritimo, and with all amenities such as restaurants, supermarkets, shops and boutiques in close proximity. It has a total built area of 124 sqm with a big living-dining room with open plan kitchen with breakfast area, two bedrooms one of them with bathroom en suite, laundry room, etc. plus a big terrace of 18 sqm with barbecue. Furthermore, there is a garage space in the building itself from where it is reached with the lift. In short, this is a unique opportunity to live in an apartment of the highest quality with the most privileged views of Palma. CHARACTERISTICS: -Air conditioning hot/cold, parquet floors, fireplace, built-in wardrobes. -Integrated, equipped kitchen. -Terrace -Garage space -Designer furniture -Home automation LOCATION: -Centre of Palma, clear views, all exterior, next to restaurants, next to shops and all services. Close to old town, close to yacht club.

description: Incredible opportunity to acquire a large house, with Mediterranean gardens and a community pool in one of the most sought-after areas of Palma; They are Armadams. It is a very quiet area and at the same time it is close to everything. It is a semi-detached house consisting of a ground floor plus two floors and a basement/garage with direct access to the house. The house is distributed as follows: On the ground floor, there is a hall, a toilet, the kitchen, a living room with a fireplace of about 50 m2, with access to a beautiful terrace with a pergola and a garden. All very pleasant due to its privacy and good orientation. Very bright and sunny. On the first floor, we find the main room with an en-suite bathroom, a beautiful and spacious dressing room, another large bedroom (which used to be two and this could easily be reversed), and finally another bathroom. On the second floor, we have the attic, beautiful, with access to its private terrace, it also consists of a storage room that can be used as a dressing room, a bathroom with a shower and a large storage room. In the basement there are two parking spaces with practical direct access to the house. There is also a large storage room in which there is a water softener, and we also have a separate woodshed. Before the entrance to the parking lot, also in the basement, we have a spacious laundry room, with a sink and storage cabinets.

description: Tel. (0034) 971670440 Elegant penthouse in the center of Palma. This luxurious penthouse was completely renovated in 2018 with the highest quality materials and gives a whole new meaning to the lightness of being.  Approx. 140m2 of living/usable space offer a more than generous room layout with a living/dining room with open-plan kitchen, two bedrooms, a bathroom, and a guest toilet. The kitchen is equipped with Miele and Gaggenau appliances. Underfloor heating and air conditioning provide the room climate you desire all year round. One of the bedrooms has been converted into a dressing room and there is also the possibility of a third bedroom. The covered terrace captivates with a panoramic view over the roofs of Palma and lets you relax and enjoy a dreamlike sunset. You can park your car in the underground garage, which you can reach directly by lift. For further information and/or to arrange a viewing appointment, please leave your telephone number in the enquiry.

description: Semi-detached house for sale in Llucmajor, Badia Blava area, of 137 m2 of constructed surface in a plot of 300 m2. It has an exterior terrace of 180 m2 distributed in the front and back part of the house. The property was built in 2001 and is distributed in two floors. On the ground floor we have a double bedroom, spacious and bright living room, complete bathroom and independent kitchen with pantry, storage room and laundry room with direct access to the outside. In the front terrace there are different fruit trees and a porch. At the back, there is a large garden with land for cultivation or even the possibility of building a swimming pool. On the first floor there are the three remaining bedrooms and a complete bathroom.  Upper terrace of approximately 30m2 with splendid views over the bay of Palma and the Serra de Tramuntana. Important details to know: Wooden interior carpentry, northwest/southeast orientation, porcelain stoneware floors, aluminium/climalit exterior carpentry. All bedrooms have built-in wardrobes and 3 of the 4 bedrooms have direct access to terraces. Heating by radiators in the whole property, with gasoil boiler.  Very quiet and pleasant urbanisation. Close to different services and shopping centres. Close to schools, children's playgrounds and parks. And located in a privileged place with direct access to the rocks of the coast of Bahia Azul. Do not hesitate to contact us to see this exclusive property.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Magnificent ground floor apartment with private garden, terrace and direct access to the swimming pool. Located in the quiet area of Son Ferrer we find this excellent ground floor apartment with three bedrooms, one single, one double and a third en suite. All of them with direct access to the side garden that surrounds the whole property, each one of these bedrooms has built-in wardrobes. A very luminous corridor distributes the spaces, in addition to the suite with its en-suite bathroom with excellent marble finishes, there is a second bathroom that is located just in front of the two bedrooms. A large living -dining room with plenty of natural light welcomes you as you enter the property from where you can also enter a very bright kitchen. Both rooms allow direct access to the terrace which has a very nice barbecue area, a small but cosy private garden and a direct and private entrance door to the large communal swimming pool. The property has a private parking area which is included in the sale. The community has few neighbours. This property is highly recommended for a family, as in addition to having magnificent spaces, it is a very well connected area, surrounded by schools, public transport and a wide variety of services. It is also very close to the beaches of Santa Ponsa, Puerto Adriano and El Toro.  It is also highly recommended for investors, as it is a sector with a high demand for rentals and few offers on the market. You can see our images and if you have any questions do not hesitate to contact us or ask for a visit.

description: Impressive 961m2 2-storey villa in Santa Ponsa on a beautiful 2,661m2 plot very close to the beach and port of Santa Ponsa. The location is unbeatable in a very quiet urbanization with a beautiful garden with trees and fruit trees perfectly adapted to the Mediterranean climate and a large swimming pool with a solarium. It has a vacation license. First floor: Entrance hall where there is also a large staircase that takes us to the first floor, an office that could be another room, a living room with a fireplace, a large fully equipped kitchen, a pantry, a laundry room, a guest bathroom, 3 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and wardrobe, there is a wardrobe for 2 of the rooms that communicate by stairs below the rooms. First floor: The master bedroom with a living room, bathroom en suite and a wardrobe, fully equipped with wood and a balcony. Another room with bathroom en suite and built-in wardrobe. The two rooms have access to a large terrace overlooking the garden. There are several beautiful terraces to enjoy the Mallorcan climate throughout the year. On one of the terraces there is also a barbecue area with an outdoor kitchen. And there is a garage for two cars. By the pool area there is also a machinery room and a shower for the pool. Characteristics of the house: natural stone facades, large wooden windows and very bright double glazing with wooden shutters, high ceilings with wooden beams, wooden doors, marble floors, natural stone and marble bathrooms. The house and garden is made with the best qualities and very good taste. It is close to supermarkets, beaches, ports, pharmacies and schools and 10 minutes from Palma and 20 minutes from the airport. If you are looking for a house to live or invest in, this property is what you are looking for. Do not hesitate to contact us.

description: Detached villa about 200 meters from the sea. The site has about 1,000 square meters with facades of about 30 meters. It consists of two floors that are distributed in a total of about 250 square meters built that include 70 meters of parking or garage, 2 bedrooms, a utility room and 179 meters of housing. The house on the first floor has a large terrace which surrounds the living room. It has air conditioning in several rooms. The house is of origin, so it needs a reform. The urban regulations of the plot allow the construction of 2 semi-detached houses or two single-family homes. It also allows to raise 2 floors. You can make a pool without any problem. The property is very well located, in an area of renowned residential prestige due to its proximity to the sea.

description: Villa in Costa d'en Blanes to reform on a 1,440m2 plot with a 263m2 construction. The location of the house is unbeatable since it is only 10 minutes walk from the beach, port and town of Portals Nous. One of the best areas of Mallorca for leisure where you can find good restaurants, luxury cafeterias and shops, and only 10 minutes from Palma by car. This Villa to reform from the year 1985 consists of 3 floors. Ground floor: It consists of a small apartment with kitchen and bathroom with access to the garden and a garage with room for 3 cars. First floor: It consists of an entrance hall, a living room with a fireplace and access to a large terrace, a dining room with another exit to a smaller terrace, 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, a kitchen with access to the garden and a laundry room. First floor: 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a large attic terrace. The house is surrounded by a beautiful garden, with palm trees, large trees and shrubs native to the Majorcan climate. There is also a large swimming pool with a solarium to enjoy and relax in this paradise. If you want to invest and build the house of your dreams in an ideal location, do not hesitate to contact us.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Santa Lavinia

description: THIS DETACHED HOUSE, BUILT IN 2019/2020, IS LOCATED IN A QUIET COMMUNITY WITH THREE OTHER HOUSES IN PORTOL, BETWEEN SA CABANETA AND SANTA MARIA DEL CAMI. The single floor layout is modern, comfortable and compact at the same time. The focus of the house lies in the inside-out living concept, from the living area and the kitchen with a view of the pool and garden and through the floor-to-ceiling sliding windows, the living area can be amplyfied so that the living area and the terrace form one unit. The spacious terrace offers plenty of space for fun pool days and BBQ evenings with friends and family. There are three bedrooms in total, all of which have access to the terrace and the garden. The master bedroom has a bathroom with shower en-suite and walk-in closet. The two children's bedrooms share a bathroom with a bathtub. The house is very luminous due to many windows. The kitchen has a cooking island and is fully equipped with Bosch electrical appliances. There is another BBQ area behind the house. There are two parking spaces in front of the house. There is also a community area behind the house outside the property, which can be used in different ways, e. g. for growing your own fruit and vegetables, play area for children, etc. Portol is located about 20 minutes from Palma and 20 minutes from the airport and belongs to the municipality of Marratxi. The quiet village with 2700 inhabitants is known for its traditional pottery craft. A market is held every Thursday in the Plaza de Can Flor, offering products ranging from fruit, vegetables, cheese, etc. to clothing and decoration. In Portol itself and in the neighboring town there are some good authentic restaurants such as Local No 2 and Son Caulelles. The nearest golf course is 10 minutes away. There are smaller shops in town and larger shopping centers are only 10 minutes away by car. Features terrace, private pool, air conditioning h/c, underfloor heating, floor-to-ceiling windows, sliding windows in the living area, wine fridge, Bosch kitchen appliances, built-in wardrobes, BBQ area, garden, double parking space, gray floor tiles, utility room, climalit windows.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Pòrtol, Marratxi
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: The house, of about 125m2, is located in Puig de Ros, in a magnificent residential area close to all the necessary services (transport, supermarkets, shops, restaurants, parks, sports areas, golf club,. ) and very close to the sea. It has 3 large bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, 2 full bathrooms, both with shower trays, a living-dining room with plenty of sunlight and access to a terrace, a fitted and equipped kitchen, utility room, pre-installation of air conditioning, a radiator heating boiler, osmosis for achieve better water quality. It also has two parking spaces included in the price. It is located in a quiet residential complex that has swimming pools and garden areas, in a quiet family environment. Housing in very good condition. Do not hesitate to request a visit or more information without obligation.

description: This seafront apartment in Santa Ponsa, in need of renovation, has a community pool and garden and is located in the immediate vicinity of the Yacht Club, several bathing bays, beautiful beaches with crystal clear water, as well as the well-known golf courses from Santa Ponsa. The bright property is located on the 1st floor of a neat residential building and offers beautiful sea and mountain views as well as a generous living space of approx. 132 m2, which is distributed as follows: A bright entrance hall, a sunny living room with a dining area, a wood-burning fireplace and access to the beautiful terrace with views of the sea and the mountains, a nice kitchen equipped with a utility room, the master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and sea views, as well as 3 more bedrooms, one of them also with en-suite bathroom and an additional bathroom. The perfectly maintained community area offers a wonderful and refreshing swimming pool, a Mediterranean garden, as well as a community underground garage. Other features of this property are: fitted wardrobes, tiled floors, as well as a storage room and a private parking space in the underground garage. It is a great location.

description: This excellent furnished apartment in Palma is located in the privileged neighborhood of Son Xigala, a quiet and familiar place just a few minutes from the center of the city of Palma and very close to the area of schools and the golf courses of Son Vida, Son Quint and Son Muntaner. The bright house has a constructed area of approx. 90 m2 and consists of a cozy living-/dining room with access to a nice balcony of approx. 8 m2, a beautiful fully equipped American kitchen, 2 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a bathroom. The magnificent apartment, located on the 1st floor in a pleasant building with an elevator, was completely renovated with personalized details and superior qualities. Other features: Marble floor, double glazed windows, hot/cold air conditioning, gas central heating and Majorcan aluminum shutters. This sunny apartment near Palma is being sold fully furnished. Son Xigala is one of the areas most sought after by families, surrounded by wonderful parks, schools and exclusive golf courses.

description: This wonderful newly built duplex apartment in Arenal is located on the first floor of a small modern building with elevator just 5 minutes walk from the beach. The bright property has a constructed area of approx. 118 m2 that is divided as follows: The main floor consists of a spacious living-/dining room with large sliding windows that offer plenty of natural light and give access to a cozy balcony, as well as an open kitchen and a toilet. Through a safe staircase you reach the upper floor where we find 2 spacious bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and en-suite bathrooms. This fabulous apartment comes fully furnished and offers extras such as hot/cold air conditioning, double glazed windows and a utility room with washing machine included. The apartment is of high quality and tastefully furnished. In the Arenal area you can enjoy beautiful beaches, the marina, several international restaurants and cafes. Here you can also find various shopping opportunities and public transport with excellent connections.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: S'Arenal, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida Europa

description: Located a few steps from the sea and a few minutes drive from Platja del Portitxolet, we present this fantastic semi-detached house in Molinar.The sunny property stands out for its excellent location, a large private garden, a wonderful spacious roof terrace with sea views and a garage, which makes it easy to arrive at your new home.The beautiful house, with availability to make 2 houses with independent entrances, offers a southeast orientation and a constructed area of approx.210 m2 currently divided as follows: The bright and spacious ground floor consists of a large living-/dining room of about 100 m2 and with access to the beautiful garden with a large terrace and storage room, an American kitchen, a bedroom and a bathroom.The 1st floor has another spacious living / dining room with a pellet stove, a beautiful kitchen, 2 bedrooms, one of them with an en-suite bathroom and a toilet.In addition, there is a magnificent roof terrace of approx.89 m2 with sea views, the ideal place to create a wonderful chill-out area.Other features: Storage room, automated blinds, double-glazed windows, polished cement flooring on the ground floor and laminate flooring on the upper floor, as well as pre-installation of ducted air conditioning on the 1st floor, utility room and fitted wardrobes.El Molinar is a bohemian area that occupies an old fishing district.It is a fantastic situation, close to the beach and the port, where you can take beautiful walks, play sports and enjoy delicious meals in the bars and restaurants located on the seafront.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Portixol-Molinar, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house in Calle de Mateu de Malferit

description: Located in the heart of the old town of Palma, we present this impressive luxury apartment. The fabulous property is located on the 1st floor of an emblematic *Art Nouveau* building recently renovated. The spectacular apartment, ideal for an elegant and modern lifestyle, has a constructed area of approx. 227 m2 divided as follows: A large living-/dining room with high ceilings and two sets of glass doors and a huge window that provides plenty of natural light, a bright open kitchen, 3 to 4 bedrooms, a patio full of plants. The master bedroom opens to the patio oasis, with sink and walk-in closet. The second bedroom also has an en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet and opens onto a patio, while the third en-suite bedroom offers an extra room and an original 1904 bathtub with authentic tiles. In addition, there is a TV room next to the living room that connects to a bathroom, its use can be ideal for an office or 4th bedroom. Other features: Old tiles, double glazed windows and utility room. It is in a very good location, in the heart of the historic center of Palma, offering traditional bars and excellent restaurants. To the international airport it will take only 10 minutes by car. We also have other apartments in the same building for sale.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cort, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de la Bosseria

description: Located in one of the most demanded neighborhoods in Palma, we present this authentic town house in El Molinar. The cozy 2-storey property with a rustic character, is located just 2 minutes walk from the beach and 150 m from the beautiful Paseo del Portixol. The property, facing north, has a constructed area of approx. 250 m2 and a nice plot of approx. 270 m2 with garden, fruit trees and the possibility of building a refreshing pool. Through a small path with Mediterranean plants and fruit trees you reach the independent entrance of the house. Its beautiful interior offers on the ground floor a large living room with fireplace, a semi-open kitchen, 2 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a large bathroom. On the 1st floor there are 3 double bedrooms, one of them with access to a wonderful terrace of about 40 m2, another living room with a fireplace and a complete bathroom with a hydromassage. In addition, there is the possibility of a horizontal division on the first floor with a separate entrance. Other features: 2 fireplaces and stoneware floor. Molinar is a popular and quiet neighborhood in the capital Palma de Mallorca, known for its charming Mediterranean atmosphere and a variety of international bars and restaurants located by the sea.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Portixol-Molinar, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de Son Orpí

description: This beautiful villa in Palmanova with swimming pool and tourist rental license for 8 people, is located just 850 m from the wonderful beach. The attractive property offers a plot of approx. 1,057 m2 and a constructed area of approx. 317 m2 that is divided into 2 spacious floors as follows: A bright living room with access to a fantastic large terrace overlooking the pool and garden area, a magnificent independent kitchen, 4 spacious bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. The main bedroom has an en-suite bathroom and built-in wardrobe. Extras: Climalit tilt-and-turn aluminum glass windows, marble, granite and imitation parquet flooring, pre-installation of radiators and heat and cold pump through ducts. Palmanova is a perfect beach area for families in the southwest of the island. Located in the municipality of Calvià, it is a seaside resort that has a wide bay and three beautiful beaches: Son Maties, Na Nadala and Es Carregador, as well as the small Son Caliu marina.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Palmanova, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Àligues

description: This attractive town house in Valldemossa is in need of renovation, has beautiful views of the town and the mountains and is located in the center of the famous town, in the wonderful area of Serra de Tramuntana.The property has a constructed area of approx.136 m2 distributed over 2 floors as follows: the first floor consists of a living/dining room with a fireplace, a fitted kitchen, a bedroom, a bathroom, as well as a storage room.On the second floor there are 2 bedrooms, a small storage room and a bathroom.From the second floor you can enjoy views of the beautiful surroundings.This attractive town house in Valldemossa is equipped with a fireplace and tiled floors.All rooms are decorated with visible wooden beams on the ceiling.It is a wonderful situation in the mountains, in the village with stone houses, known for its rich historical past, where in 1838 the famous composer Frederic Chopin spent the winter.The house is located a few minutes by car from other beautiful towns such as Fornalutx or Deia with its wonderful cove with crystal clear waters and impressive views of the mountains.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Valldemossa
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Rei Sanxo

description: Great opportunity to acquire a sunny villa in Santa Ponsa with a lot of potential.This beautiful single-storey villa with an approved project to build another floor and a refreshing private pool is located on the second line of the sea in Santa Ponsa.The current south facing property with partial sea views from the garden offers a constructed area of approximately 283 m2 on a plot of approximately 1,093 m2.The traditional villa has 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, a toilet, as well as a guest house (1 bedroom and 1 bathroom), a garage and outside parking spaces.Extras: hot/cold air conditioning, fireplace, pantry. Santa Ponsa is an ideal starting point.The international atmosphere of Santa Ponsa is characterized by a large selection of international restaurants, cozy cafes, bars and exclusive shops.You can reach the city of Palma and the airport in less than 30 minutes by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Via Cornisa

description: This bright apartment with a lot of potential in Bendinat is an ideal property for golf lovers. The sunny south-west facing property is located in a fantastic immaculate community with a communal pool next to the famous Real Golf de Bendinat course. The apartment has a constructed area of approx. 62 m2 divided into a cozy living room with access to a small balcony, a kitchenette, 2 bedrooms and a bathroom with an easily accessible shower. The master bedroom leads to a fantastic terrace of approx. 12 m2 with partial views of the golf course. It is a very exclusive community with an unbeatable location. Bendinat is one of the most sought after residential areas in Mallorca. It is very close to Puerto Portals and Palma, as well as to different beaches in the southwest of Mallorca.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cas Catala, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle José Espronceda

description: Great opportunity to acquire a sunny villa in Santa Ponsa with a lot of potential.This beautiful single-storey villa with an approved project to build another floor and a refreshing private pool is located on the second line of the sea in Santa Ponsa.The current south facing property with partial sea views from the garden offers a constructed area of approximately 283 m2 on a plot of approximately 1,093 m2.The traditional villa has 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, a toilet, as well as a guest house (1 bedroom and 1 bathroom), a garage and outside parking spaces.Extras: hot/cold air conditioning, fireplace, pantry. Santa Ponsa is an ideal starting point.The international atmosphere of Santa Ponsa is characterized by a large selection of international restaurants, cozy cafes, bars and exclusive shops.You can reach the city of Palma and the airport in less than 30 minutes by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Via Cornisa

address: Calle de Joan Ripoll i Trobat
district: Es Forti - Son Cotoner - Son Dameto
description: This beautiful apartment in Palma de Mallorca is located in a well-kept building with an elevator, in a privileged residential area of the island's capital. The beautiful apartment has a constructed area of approx. 96 m2 that are distributed as follows: a spacious living room with access to a balcony, an independent kitchen, 2 large bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, 2 bathrooms (one of them en-suite), as well as a utility room. The beautiful community offers owners a fantastic community pool and garden areas to fully enjoy the Mediterranean atmosphere on the island. The equipment features of this elegant apartment in Palma include: hot/cold air conditioning, gas central heating, double glazed windows and marble floors. It is a perfect location, with good access to the highway, just 5 minutes by car from the next beach with turquoise waters and 10 minutes from the international airport.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Dameto, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Joan Ripoll i Trobat

description: This beautiful house in Son Espanyolet, a charming and growing neighborhood of Palma, where it can be said to be an extension of the popular Santa Catalina offers a generous built area of approx. 380 m2 divided into 2 floors + basement, several terraces and a refreshing 6x4m pool. The ground floor has a living room, dining room, a large bright kitchen, a bedroom/office and a bathroom. The first floor consists of 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, one en suite. The bedrooms are on a split level and accessible by teak stairs. There is a mezzanine with a glass floor, which can be used as an office or chill-out area. The spacious basement of approx. 150 m2 is divided into 4 rooms and a laundry room. This fantastic house in Palma has extras such as: Binissalem stones, Teka wood doors, windows and cabinets and a garage for 2 cars, city gas radiators. Son Espanyolet is a listed area of Palma with low-rise buildings with patios and gardens. Santa Catalina, the center of Palma and the Paseo Marítimo are just a few minutes' walk away. It is a quiet area that is also convenient for families, as there are several schools nearby.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Espanyolet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de Contestí

description: This attractive country house in Galilea has beautiful views of the Sierra de Tramuntana and is located in a quiet area 4 km from Puigpunyent and 11 km from the town of Calviá. The cozy property is situated on a plot of approx. 2068 m2 and has a constructed area of approx. 235 m2 distributed as follows: a spacious living / dining room with a fireplace, decorated with visible wooden beams, a kitchen, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, as well as a storage room. The house has a large terrace, from which you can enjoy the unobstructed views of the mountains and the Mediterranean atmosphere of the island. At your disposal you have a garage and 2 parking spaces outside. This attractive country house is equipped with oil central heating, aluminum shutters, Climalit windows and a water softener. The house can be extended and there is a possibility to build a swimming pool. A separate plot of approx. 551 m2. To the center of Palma it will take about 25, to the international airport 30 minutes by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Puigpunyent
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Camino Comellar de ses Olibes

description: This beautiful apartment in Santa Catalina is located in the heart of the most modern neighborhood of Palma and a few steps from the famous Paseo Martino and the well-known Avenida de Jaime III, which has a wide variety of exclusive shops and restaurants. The sunny property was recently renovated and has a constructed area of approx. 36 m2 divided into a spacious living / dining room with a kitchenette, an elegant bedroom with a built-in wardrobe and a complete bathroom. The magnificent apartment in Palma is equipped with air conditioning, underfloor heating, double glazed windows and hydraulic tile floors. The fantastic home is located in a quiet area with very little traffic, since it is located in one of the 12 restricted circulation areas - ACIRE - of Palma, which is why only authorized vehicles are allowed to circulate and that, for Therefore, they have the corresponding ACIRE card. This said card can be ordered without problems. This beautiful apartment in Santa Catalina is offered unfurnished, but we also have an apartment already furnished. Do not hesitate to contact us for more information. Santa Catalina is a modern neighborhood in Palma and one of the most charming and lively corners of Mallorca.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle dels Gambins

description: Located in the sought-after municipality of Calvià, in the southwest of Mallorca, we present this sunny, partly renovated villa in Son Ferrer. The attractive property, surrounded by well-kept gardens, is situated on a plot of approx. 645 m2 with pool a few meters from the town center, in a quiet and familiar area. The beautiful and recently renovated living area offers a wonderful living-/dining room with fireplace and access to the outside, a separate kitchen, 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 2 bathrooms, one of them en-suite. On the lower floor there is a garage, utility room, storage room and a fully furnished guest apartment with kitchen, bedroom and living room. This plant would need a reform. Other features: Parquet floors, double glazed windows, gas central heating and air conditioning. There are also 13 solar panels on the roof. Son Ferrer is located just 15 minutes by car from the center of Palma and a few minutes from Port Adriano, several golf courses in Santa Ponsa, as well as wonderful beaches.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Ferrer, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de l'Àliga

description: This Mediterranean villa in Maioris has partial sea views from the first floor and is located in a quiet residential area near the sea, in the south of the wonderful island of Mallorca. The attractive property has a constructed area of approx. 500 m2 distributed over 3 floors as follows: the ground floor offers a nice living room, a kitchen, a dining room with a fireplace, a bedroom and a bathroom. The first floor consists of 3 spacious bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. In the basement there is an apartment of approx. 100 m2 with separate entrance consisting of a living room, dining room, an American kitchen and a bathroom. The beautiful outdoor area with a beautiful garden, a fantastic pool and barbecue area invites you to fully enjoy the magical Mediterranean atmosphere on the island. This beautiful villa in Maioris is equipped with air conditioning, heating, automatic irrigation system in the garden and stoneware and marble floors. There is a spacious garage for 2 cars. The next beautiful beach with crystal clear waters as well as the golf course are only a few minutes away by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Maioris-Puig de Ros, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Racó de la Torre

description: This attractive villa in Marratxi has a holiday rental license for 8 people, offers beautiful unobstructed views towards the mountains and is located in a quiet residential area, about 15 minutes by car from the capital of the island - Palma de Mallorca.The sunny property has a constructed area of approx.430 m2 that are distributed as follows: the ground floor offers a bright living room with a fireplace, a furnished and equipped kitchen, 2 large bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a bathroom.The first floor consists of 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (one of them en-suite).In the basement there is a garage for 3 cars and a gym room, here you can build an independent apartment.The magnificent outdoor area with a beautiful pool and garden with a barbecue and fruit trees invite you to enjoy the beautiful days and nights on the wonderful island of Mallorca.This attractive villa in Marratxi is equipped with hot/cold air conditioning, gas radiators, double glazed windows, alarm system and stoneware floors.It is a very attractive situation, about 15 minutes by car from the center of Palma and the next beautiful beach with crystal clear waters.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Es Garrovers, Marratxi
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Avenida des Garrovers

description: This fantastic apartment in Palma is for sale exclusively and only with us and is located in the Forners neighborhood, a short distance from the Can Pere Antoni beach and Portixol. The spacious property, with side sea views from the balcony, offers a living space of approx. 90 m2 divided as follows: A beautiful very cozy living-/ dining room with pre-installation for a fireplace and access to the balcony and a large private terrace on 2 levels of approx. 40 m2, a kitchen and a summer kitchen, utility room, 3 large bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The magnificent apartment is located on the 1st floor of a well-kept building with a lift and a wonderful communal roof terrace of about 300 m2 with spectacular views of the bay of Palma, the cathedral and Bellver castle. Extras: Double glazed windows, air conditioning and porcelain stoneware floors. Furniture is included. It is an unbeatable location, just 5 minutes from the beach, the center of Palma and the most important shopping streets in Palma.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Foners, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Josep Rover Motta

description: Apartments for sale in a historic building in the old town of Palma. In July 2019 these beautiful apartments with a fully equipped kitchen were finished. First qualities. Garage space, elevator. The houses range between 144 and 226 m2. At the moment there are 5 homes available. House 1: 144.15 m2 Price: 1,235. € 000 House 2: 168.68 m2 Price: 1,260. € 000 House 4: 214.51 m2 Price: 1,840. € 000 House 5: 212.48 m2 Price: 1,775. € 000 House 6: 226.17 m2 Price: 1,955. € 000 They have a stately entrance with a large staircase. Opportunity to live in the old town of Palma.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Monti-Sión, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de la Portella

description: This large and beautiful villa in Santa Ponsa was completely renovated in January 2020. Located on a hill, in a quiet residential area between Santa Ponsa and Costa de la Calma, it has wonderful views of the mountains. The property is on a plot of approx. 855 m2 and has a constructed area of approx. 340 m2 distributed over 2 levels, with 2 large living rooms, one with a wood-burning fireplace, a high-quality modern kitchen with a cooking island and Bosch brand appliances, a total of 6 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a games room, various storage rooms and a laundry room. In the outdoor area there is a beautiful Mediterranean garden with orange and lemon trees, a large floodlit swimming pool and a children's playground. The characteristics of the equipment are: air conditioning, underfloor heating, stoneware floors, satellite TV and automatic irrigation of the garden. There are also 2 car parks available. It is a beautiful and quiet area with several sandy beaches and coves, near the exclusive Santa Ponsa golf course. This fantastic property is for sale only and exclusively with us!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Gran Via Puig des Castellet

description: This is a unique property set in the beautiful area of Costa de La Calma. At present the property sits as a 5-bedroom villa with a separate 2-bedroom guest house set over 330 m2 on a plot of around 870 m2. The property has stunning views and direct access down to the sea. The property needs a complete renovation to bring it up to date with modern living and to make the most of the spectacular setting. Another option is to completely demolish the existing property and treat it as a new build. Either way this is a must see property with lots of potential.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Costa de la Calma, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: This very well established Bistro restaurant with apartment and pool is located on the main road in El Toro. Just a few minutes walk from the popular Port Adriano with all its shops, restaurants, bars and beach. The restaurant has been open since 2007 and is very popular with residents. Next to the restaurant there is a parking area. The cozy restaurant is on the ground floor and has a maximum occupancy of 80 pax (indoor and outdoor). There are large terraces at the front and next to the restaurant that can be closed during the winter months. There is a fully equipped kitchen with plenty of storage space and bathrooms. From the back of the restaurant you access the pool area with a beautiful barbecue area and dining area. Perfect for relaxing after a long day at work! An external staircase leads to the apartment with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen, living room with fireplace and a closed terrace. In addition, there is a large roof terrace with a storage room. Sold fully furnished and equipped.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Toro, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Gran Via

description: This beautiful 4 bedroom finca in Calviá was built to high standards, with typical thick natural stone walls that keep the house cool in summer and warm in winter. Everything is fenced and welcomes you with a garden and a large covered terrace of ca. 40 m2From here you enter the house through the typical wooden doors and lead into the large living / dining room with fireplace and high wooden beamed ceilings. On the ground floor there are 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom. The kitchen is at the rear which also leads to a large room that can be used as a bedroom, living room or games room. Then you will find a large laundry room that accesses the backyard with pool, chill out area and garden. The second floor offers 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, one en suite, plus a balcony. In the basement there is a huge garage where you can park 4 cars or make a gym / storage room. This beautiful finca in Calviá is equipped with air conditioning, heating and double glazed windows. It is an excellent location just 4 minutes walk from town, where you have all the amenities, bars, restaurants and shops.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Calvià pueblo, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Travesía Serral

description: This wonderful Majorcan-style finca in Santa Eugenia, with a renewed vacation rental license for 9 people, stands out for its large plot of approx.38,560 m2 and an impressive olive plantation.The sunny 2-storey property offers a living space of approx.420 m2 divided into a magnificent large living-/dining room with fireplace, a fantastic kitchen of about 50 m2 with another fireplace, as well as 5 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 3 bathrooms.The kitchen offers access to a splendid porch at the back that delights us with the splendid terrain, a beautiful pine forest and with access to the pool with spectacular unobstructed views of the Sierra Tramuntana.The farm has 450 olive trees, around 80 orange trees and many other fruit trees.Other features: Aluminum windows with double glazing, electric heating, ample parking space, 2 large terraces with beautiful views of nature and a large barbecue next to the pool, to enjoy the outdoors to the fullest.This excellent farm has the best amenities to have a quiet stay surrounded by wonderful nature.Santa Eugenia is a quiet town that is located 22 km from the capital, Palma de Mallorca, between the towns of Santa María and Algaida.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Eugenia
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Polígono 3, Parcela 186

description: This magnificent Mediterranean villa in Santa Ponsa has beautiful views of the forest and the mountains and is located in a quiet residential area, just a few minutes from the main beach, in the beautiful southwest of the island Mallorca. The attractive property has a constructed area of approx. 447 m2 distributed as follows: the ground floor consists of a living/dining room, an equipped kitchen, a utility room and a bathroom. In the basement there is a guest apartment with a living room, an American kitchen, 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and a storage room. On the first floor there are 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The beautiful outdoor area with various terraces and a fantastic pool with views of the forest invites you to relax and enjoy the beautiful Mediterranean atmosphere on the beautiful island Mallorca. This beautiful villa in Santa Ponsa is equipped with air conditioning, central heating, double-glazed windows and parquet floors. At your disposal you have a garage with space for 2 vehicles. It is a very attractive situation, 20 minutes walking or 5 minutes by car from the beach with crystal clear waters and from the center of the town with all the services one needs in daily life. The golf course is a few minutes away by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de Guillem de Montcada

description: This wonderful traditional villa in Costa d'en Blanes, with fantastic panoramic sea views from the roof terrace, is located in one of the most prestigious areas in the southwest of Mallorca. The sunny south-east facing property has a constructed area of approx. 260 m2 divided as follows: on the ground floor there are 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a terrace, one of them with an en-suite bathroom, a wine cellar and an office/gym. On the first floor there is a large living room, dining room, a separate kitchen, a utility room and a guest toilet. The pool area has a seating area. The magnificent property was designed for a special request, which is to have access from all orientations of the house. Due to this, this beautiful villa offers a special flow of fresh air and sunlight throughout the day. Extras: gas central heating, wooden and ceramic floors, air conditioning, dressing room, storage room, garage and parking. The plot, of about 1000 m2, includes a refreshing pool and a bucolic place at the top, where there is currently a pond with views of the tower of the port of Puerto Portals. In addition, a spectacular roof terrace of approx. 60 m2 with stunning sea views, invites you to celebrate family dinners or enjoy the views of the sea and Puerto Portals. This spectacular villa is for sale only with us.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Costa d'En Blanes, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Sant Andreu

address: Calle de la Creu del Sud
description: This pleasant semi-detached house in Bahía Blava with fantastic sea views from the roof terrace is located in a quiet residential street a few kilometers from the sea and the well-known Maioris golf course.The sunny property, with a lot of potential, has a plot of approx.300 m2 and a constructed area of approx.145 m2.The 2-storey house is divided into a spacious living-/dining room with fireplace and access to a wonderful terrace to enjoy good meals outdoors, as well as a nice kitchen, 4 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, 2 bathrooms with showers and a magnificent roof terrace. with beautiful views of the sea.The friendly exterior offers wonderful fruit trees to the front and a barbecue area to the rear of the house.Other features include: Climalit windows, aluminum shutters, tiled floor, oil heating, hot/cold air conditioning, storage room and a parking space.Bahia Blava is a popular urbanization with a good infrastructure.In addition to restaurants, bars, cafes and shops, you can access several bathing areas formed by s'Arc de Sant Martí, Roca des Milans and Racó de s'Almadrava.Palma airport can be reached in about 15 minutes by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Llucmajor Interior, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de la Creu del Sud

description: This charming villa in Tolleric is being built in a quiet residential area, just a few steps from the sea, in the south of Mallorca. The beautiful property has sea views and has a constructed area of approx. 231 m2 distributed as follows: A spacious living / dining room, an independent kitchen, 4 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, as well as 3 bathrooms. The outdoor area offers a terrace with a wonderful private pool and garden that invites you to relax and enjoy the sunny days on the island. This attractive property in Tolleric is equipped with air conditioning, underfloor heating and double glazed windows. At your disposal you have parking outside. At such times the client can still influence the design and finishes of the house. The situation of the chalet is very quiet, in a cul-de-sac that ensures little traffic. The beautiful Mediterranean Sea with crystal clear waters is just a few steps away. The international airport is 20 minutes away by car. The completion of the work is scheduled for 2022.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Llucmajor Interior, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de l´Escorpora

description: Located on the rugged south coast of Mallorca, we present this beautiful villa in Bahía Grande. The well-maintained house offers plenty of space and is located in a popular urbanisation. The property has a plot of approximately 450 m2 and a constructed area of approximately 370 m2, which is divided as follows: a kitchen with access to the covered terrace, 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 2 storage rooms, 1 laundry room, a garage with space for 2 vehicles and a separate guest area with 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom. The large outdoor area with Jacuzzi and barbecue invites you to relax. Here you can spend cozy evenings with friends and family. There is the possibility of adding a swimming pool. The house is well insulated and equipped with oil heating. Bahía Grande is only 5 minutes from different beaches, 10 minutes from the airport and 20 minutes from the capital, Palma.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Badia Blava-Badia Gran-Tolleric, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle del Bot

description: This sunny town house in Portol, a beautiful town that belongs to the municipality of Marratxí, is situated on a large plot of approx. 2,100 m2 with a fantastic saltwater pool surrounded by natural grass. The house has a constructed area of approx. 620 m2 that is divided into 2 very spacious floors as follows: The ground floor is completely renovated and totally independent from the upper floor. There we find a bright living-/ dining room with direct access to the pool and garden, a beautiful kitchen, 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 2 bathrooms with the possibility of a third. The 1st floor of approx. 190 m2, in need of reform, it has a living-/dining room, kitchen, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a large terrace. In addition, there is the possibility of connecting both floors. The magnificent exterior offers a garage for 4 cars, storage room and 2 porches, one of them with barbecue and fireplace. The property is divided into 3 deeds, since there are 2 lots together, for which another single-family house or a semi-detached house can be built on 2. solar. Extras: 2 cisterns, water softening and a lot of potential. Pórtol is a beautiful town 2 km from Marratxí. It is a quiet and cozy place that is also famous for its traditional pottery, especially the Siurells. Son Sanjoan airport is 17 km away and the center of Palma is 15 km away.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Pòrtol, Marratxi
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de sa Torre

description: Luxurious villa of 350 m2 built with very spacious living room, dining room, large kitchen and several terraces both under the roof and in the open air on the main floor. On the second floor there is a very large master bedroom with its dressing room, bathroom with a hydro-massage bathtub and a shower tray. The other two bedrooms are also doubles with bathrooms with shower trays and a built-in wardrobe in one bedroom and the dressing room in the other. All rooms have en-suite bathrooms and have access to the terrace with spectacular views. Oil heating and hot / cold air conditioners are installed throughout the house. In the basement there is a 50 m2 garage, a sauna and a storage room. The front of the house has several landscaped rest areas that consist in total with 20 fruit trees, 5 palm trees and more than 20.000 varieties of flowers. The terrace area has a swimming pool with 4x7 measures and a barbecue area. The house is sold fully furnished and equipped, ready to move into.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Peguera, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: This wonderful villa in Marratxi with approximately 625 m2 of land and about 450 m2 built was recently renovated.The fantastic property has a very well-kept exterior, a beautiful refreshing pool, a magnificent porch with a barbecue and plenty of space for the whole family.The house has a very wide distribution.The bright ground floor has a large living-/dining room, kitchen, a toilet, a bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and a separate room, which can be an office or another bedroom.The spacious 1st floor offers 3 bedrooms, each with an en-suite bathroom and a wonderful waterfall feature.In the basement we find a complete kitchen with barbecue and a dining room, as well as the garage, toilet and the machine room.The excellent exterior is ideal to enjoy the pleasant climate of Mallorca.Other characteristics: Marble floor, diesel boiler, street water and cistern, air conditioning by hot/cold pump and diesel radiators.It is an idyllic situation that offers a lot of tranquility, the next beautiful beach with crystal clear waters and the international airport are only 15 minutes away by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Ramonell - Es Figueral, Marratxi
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Professora Caterina Vives

description: This beautiful penthouse in El Terreno is located in a quiet street close to the port, the Paseo Marítimo and the fashionable neighborhood of Santa Catalina. A total of 8 new and exclusive Scandinavian designed flats are being built here. Completion is scheduled for late spring 2023. The clear lines, the structures and the bright rooms promise a pleasant atmosphere and a high level of living comfort. All floors will have high quality parquet, tiles, built-in air conditioning, heating and underfloor heating in the bathrooms. The penthouse has a living space of approximately 103 m2, which is divided as follows: an open living/dining room, an open kitchen, 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The highlight is the huge roof terrace of approximately 75 m2 with a beautiful view of the sea and the port. All residential units have an underground parking space and a practical storage room. El Terreno is one of the most up-and-coming neighborhoods in Palma and is within walking distance of the bustling center of the island's capital. Palma offers a huge cultural offer, an excellent gastronomic variety and numerous shops and boutiques. This penthouse in Palma-El Terreno is an oasis in the middle of one of the most popular and vibrant cities in Europe, with a cosmopolitan touch and a direct location on the Mediterranean Sea.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Terreno, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de Georges Bernanos

description: This beautiful town house in Consell with a pool and rustic elements such as wooden beamed ceilings, is located only 150 m from a public parking lot. The fantastic property has a plot of approx. 440 m2 and a constructed area of about 200 m2. The bright 2-storey house is divided as follows: on the main floor there is a nice living-/dining room, a nice open kitchen with access to the outside, a small bedroom and a bathroom. The upper floor offers another cozy living room, 4 spacious bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, a bathroom and a mezzanine of about 8 m2. The remarkable exterior is highlighted by a wonderful refreshing pool and barbecue terrace to be enjoyed with friends and family throughout the year. There we also find 2 more rooms, a storage room and the utility room. Other features: city and cistern water, butane gas thermos, stoneware and/or marble floors, air conditioning and fireplace (wood stove). The municipality of Consell is located in the interior of the island, next to the municipalities of Binissalem and Santa María del Camí. Consell has a large cultivation area dedicated to the vineyard with several renowned wine cellars.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Consell
suggestedTexts.title: Semi-detached house in Calle del Roser

description: This large finca in Esporlas with a pool offers a lot of tranquility and magnificent views of the mountains. It stands on a large plot of approx. 9350 m2, only about 20 km from the beautiful Cala Banyalbufar. This attractive property has been completely renovated and has a constructed area of approx. 526 m2 with a total of 6 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms (2 of them en-suite), 2 living/dining rooms, 2 kitchens and 2 separate guest toilets. The arrangement of the rooms offers the possibility of renting part of the house. The fabulous outdoor area, with large terraces, a fantastic pool and a large garden with fruit trees, invites you to enjoy the beautiful views and the magical Mediterranean atmosphere of the island. From the sunny and spacious roof terrace you benefit from beautiful views to the surrounding mountains. Features of this attractive finca in Esporlas include: Air conditioning, electric water heater, fireplace, double-glazed windows with shutters, beautiful wooden doors, fitted wardrobes, an automatic irrigation system, own cistern, well, municipal water supply and electricity, automatic entrance gate and parking for 4 cars. A perfect property for those who want to live in absolute tranquility surrounded by nature and yet want to be close to the city. The center of Palma de Mallorca is a 15-minute drive away.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Esporles
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de sa Tanca

district: Son Oliva - Plaza Toros - Camp Redó
description: This wonderful ground floor apartment in Palma is located in the Amanecer district, a quiet family area just a few minutes from the city center.It is a top quality and recently renovated apartment.The attractive house consists of a large constructed area of approx.180 m2 distributed in a bright open living-/dining room combined with a wonderful modern kitchen with island, 4 bedrooms, although the 4th room is listed as a garage, which can be reopened and used as which, and a bathroom.The magnificent inner courtyard of approx.60 m2, an excellent space to spend a pleasant afternoon with friends and family, it offers another additional bathroom and a rear room.Other features: Alarm, climalit windows with roller shutters, stoneware and imitation parquet floors and utility room.Amanecer is one of the quietest residential neighborhoods in Palma with easy access to Vía Cintura, belonging to the North district of the city of Palma de Mallorca.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Fra Antoni Llinàs

description: This semi-detached house in Puig de Ros is located on the 2nd line of the sea very close to the Golf Maioris. The attractive south / west facing villa was built in 2006 and is in very good condition. The property has a constructed area of approx. 276 m2 that is divided into 2 large levels. The sunny property offers an elegant living / dining room with access to the outside area, a fully equipped kitchen with Bosch appliances, as well as 4 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, 2 bathrooms and 1 toilet. The master bedroom with bathroom en suite has a large dressing room and has direct access to a terrace with partial views of the sea. This beautiful semi-detached house in Puig de Ros is equipped with double glazed windows, parquet floors in the bedrooms, hot and cold air conditioning system, storage room, laundry room and a private garage for two cars. The exterior of the house offers a garden with a swimming pool and a barbecue area. A short distance from the property there is a public access to the sea. Puig de Ros is located on the beautiful south coast of Mallorca. It is a quiet residential town in high demand and very close to Palma. The well-known Maioris golf course is about 2 km.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Maioris-Puig de Ros, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: Semi-detached house in Calle de la Milana

description: This is an amazing Front line apartment with direct sea access in the beautiful area of Torrenova. The apartment spread over 100 m2 offers 2 good sized double bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The fully fitted kitchen looks out over the impressive living area which is spacious and well finished. From the living area and the master bedroom you will find some of the best views on this Island of the stunning Mediterranean. The spectacular views continue outside the property on the huge terrace. Here there is plenty of space for relaxation and outside entertaining. The outside space doesn’t end there with a further 2 platforms leading down to the sea right outside your door. This is a quiet area where you could soak up the sun before taking a dip in the ocean. A great opportunity not to be missed in a lovely peaceful area with some of the best views around. Local shops and restaurants are only a short walk away and Palma and the airport itself is only a 20 minute drive. Other Features: Sea views, air conditioning, street gas, video intercom… This apartment comes fully furnished.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Magaluf, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This bright ground floor in Ciudad Jardín with private parking and storage room is located a few meters from the famous Ciudad Jardín beach, a beautiful sandy beach located in the Bay of Palma de Mallorca, only 5 km from the center. The fantastic property is completely renovated and has a large constructed area of approx. 96 m2 that is divided as follows: A wonderful living-/dining room with access to a wonderful large terrace, an elegant fully equipped modern kitchen, 2 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 2 bathrooms, one of them en-suite. The lovely terrace offers a nice chill out area to relax and a barbecue to enjoy with the whole family. Other features: Storage room of about 11 m2, laminate flooring and air conditioning. Ciudad Jardín is an exclusive and residential area near Palma. Around it we find a wide selection of international restaurants on the beachfront.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Can Fonoll

description: This modern furnished villa between Sa Cabaneta and Son Marsal with a refreshing pool and partial sea views enchants with a dreamy covered terrace, a generous and open living area layout with panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows, as well as a spectacular exterior that leaves nothing to be desired.The exclusive property has a sunny plot of approx.850 m2 with southeast orientation and a constructed area of approx.392 m2, which is divided as follows: The bright ground floor houses a large living room on an elevated level, a charming dining room with dream views of the pool, an Italian kitchen from the Scaboline brand, a bedroom and a bathroom.The 1st floor has another 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 2 bathrooms, one of them en suite.The attractive basement area offers a second living room, shower, utility room, the machine room and as a special highlight a wonderful fitness and sauna area.Relax in the well-kept outdoor area with a refreshing dip in the impressive pool or sunbathing under the Mediterranean palm trees.Other features: Parking for two vehicles, aerothermal water tank, photovoltaic energy, aerothermal radiators, storage room and ducted air conditioning.The idyllic location offers a lot of tranquility, the nearest beautiful beach with crystal clear water and the international airport are only 15 minutes away by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sa Cabaneta, Marratxi
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Andreu Juan Batle

description: Just 1 km from the town we present this beautiful Majorcan house in Santa Maria del Cami. The sunny property, with unobstructed views and south orientation, offers a lot of tranquility, a refreshing saltwater pool surrounded by natural grass and a tennis court, for the more active. The house, built in the year 1910, was completely renovated and offers a constructed area of approx. 400 m2. The ground floor consists of a very cozy living-/dining room with fireplace and access to the outside, a large kitchen with access to the pool area, 2 bedrooms, a bathroom and a toilet. In the 1st there are 2 bedrooms and a bathroom with Jacuzzi and the mezzanine has a bedroom/library with a large terrace and incredible mountain views. The wonderful flat plot of approx. 5,500 m2 offers a wonderful swimming pool, orchard, Mediterranean trees and palms, 4 rooms with beamed ceilings, barbecue and fireplace, shower room and dressing room, a tennis court and a garage for 2 cars with direct access to the kitchen. This beautiful house is equipped with: Air conditioning, utility room, fitted wardrobes and storage room. Santa Maria del Camí is a traditional town with authentic cafes and restaurants in the center of Mallorca.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Maria del Cami
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Camino del Raiguer

description: This wonderful newly built duplex apartment in Arenal is located on the first floor of a small modern building with elevator just 5 minutes walk from the beach. The bright property has a constructed area of approx. 118 m2 that is divided as follows: The main floor consists of a spacious living-/dining room with large sliding windows that offer plenty of natural light and give access to a cozy balcony, as well as an open kitchen and a toilet. Through a safe staircase you reach the upper floor where we find 2 spacious bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and en-suite bathrooms. This fabulous apartment comes fully furnished and offers extras such as hot/cold air conditioning, double glazed windows and a utility room with washing machine included. The apartment is of high quality and tastefully furnished. In the Arenal area you can enjoy beautiful beaches, the marina, several international restaurants and cafes. Here you can also find various shopping opportunities and public transport with excellent connections.
