suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida Europa

neighborhood: Son Roca - Son Ximelis - Son Anglada
description: This fantastic semi-renovated finca in Son Anglada, a neighborhood of Palma de Mallorca, just 5 minutes from the city center, offers a lot of tranquility and several guest apartments. The main house offers a living space of approx. 125 m2 that is divided as follows: The ground floor offers a living-dining room with a fireplace, an area to set up a kitchenette, a master bedroom with an all-marble bathroom, shower and bathtub, and a small mezzanine designed for an office. On the 1st floor there are 2 spacious rooms, both with a balcony and a complete bathroom. From there a small staircase leads to the roof terrace with unobstructed views of the bay of Palma and the city. Extras: Marble floors, heating and air conditioning in all rooms, double-glazed windows in some parts of the house. In addition, on the large plot there are 3 independent apartments, which can be used for guests or used as rental income. There are 2 access gates with a large park and space for 6 cars. At the back there is a large terrace with the option to make a barbecue area and pool. The property extends into an area of lush trees and has a lot of potential.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Roca - Son Ximelis - Son Anglada, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de l'Hospitalet

description: Located in a quiet residential area a few kilometers from the sea and the well-known Maioros Golf course, we present this Mallorcan villa in Bahía Blava. The sunny villa, in need of reform, is situated on an attractive plot of approx. 745 m2 near Cala de Maioris and with the possibility of building a refreshing pool. The traditional 2-storey building has a constructed area of approx. 164 m2 distributed as follows: The spacious ground floor offers a cozy living-/dining room with access to the outside, a separate kitchen with utility room, 3 bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, one of them with an en-suite bathroom. A second bathroom In addition, there is a 2nd bathroom, shared by the other 2 rooms. The beautiful upper floor has a leisure room and access to a wonderful terrace. The entertainment room offers a lot of potential and could be converted into a 4th bedroom, an office or something similar. Other features include: electric radiators in the bedrooms, double glazed windows with aluminum shutters and tiled floors in the kitchen. The beautiful exterior, with barbecue and Mediterranean palm trees, has a carport for one car, which can be expanded to accommodate two or three cars. It is a very attractive location near the sea, with good infrastructure such as a supermarket, restaurants and cafes.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de Júpiter

description: This beautiful villa in Bunyola is very close to this picturesque town and about 30 minutes by car from Palma. The house in good condition is situated on a plot of approx. 2,095 m2 in an elevated position and in a quiet and natural environment with beautiful far-reaching views of the Tramontana mountains. The attractive villa is distributed over 3 levels with a large terrace and pool area. The generous living space of approx. 210 m2 is distributed on the main level in a wonderful entrance area with lots of natural light (thanks to a glass dome), a bright living room with a wood-burning fireplace and access to the sunny terrace with a refreshing saltwater pool, a dining room and a fully fitted kitchen with separate utility room. In addition, there is a nice bedroom on this level, as well as a bathroom with a shower. The upper floor houses the master bedroom with a dressing room and spectacular en-suite bathroom with marble tiles, Jacuzzi bathtub and access to a terrace with sea views, as well as 3 other bedrooms and a bathroom. In the basement is the garage for 2 vehicles and the machine room. Extras: marble floors, precious wood doors, oil central heating, water softening system and solar panels. Bunyola is one of the most charming places in the mountainous region of Mallorca.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Bunyola
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle des Garrover

description: This beautiful chalet in Andratx offers a lot of tranquility, is surrounded by nature, has beautiful views of the mountains and is located in a town just 6 minutes from the port, in the southwest of the beautiful island of Mallorca. The attractive property has a constructed area of approx. 385 m2 distributed over 2 floors as follows: on the ground floor there is a beautiful living room decorated with visible wooden beams, a fitted and equipped kitchen, 2 bedrooms, a dressing room and a bathroom with Jacuzzi. The first floor has 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes with views of the mountains, a bathroom with shower and another living room. All bedrooms have pre-installation for heating. The outdoor area with a barbecue and the land with fruit trees invite you to enjoy the beautiful days and nights on the wonderful island of Mallorca. There is a garage and parking spaces for 6 cars. This beautiful chalet in Andratx is equipped with air conditioning, barbecue, and ceramic floors. It is a very quiet area, but at the same time only 5 minutes by car from the luxurious Puerto Andratx with its excellent restaurants and boutiques, as well as several beautiful coves with crystal clear waters.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Pere Seriol

description: This beautiful villa in Costa d'en Blanes, with a fantastic panoramic view of the sea, is located in an exclusive and guarded residential area and was built in 1983 on a plot of approximately 960 m2.It represents the dignified Mediterranean style of its time with preserved charm and quality.The sunny southwest-facing property has a constructed area of approximately 306 m2, which is divided as follows: a living room with a fireplace, a kitchen, a dining room, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (1 en suite), a guest toilet independent guest room, a laundry room and a storage room.The spacious property, nestled in a dreamlike Mediterranean landscape, has many covered and open terraces with wonderful views of the Mediterranean Sea and a private driveway with 3 parking spaces.Extras: double glazed windows with shutters, air conditioning, SAT TV, fitted wardrobes and alarm system.This beautiful villa in Costa d'en Blanes is located in a first-class residential area and offers 24-hour security.It is a privileged area near the famous "Puerto Portals", with an excellent selection of restaurants and luxury shops.You can reach the center of Palma de Mallorca in less than 15 minutes by car and the international airport in about 20 minutes.

description: Do you want to live 2 minutes walk from the beach? Here's your chance! We find this beautiful 3rd floor WITH ELEVATOR, located in a 1999 farm very well cared for by the neighbors. The house is distributed in a huge living-dining room with access to a balcony and partial views of the sea, a wonderful kitchen with a bar in the middle for family breakfasts, 3 bedrooms (2 doubles and 1 single) and 2 full bathrooms, one with a cabin whirlpool. All rooms have fitted wardrobes and also in the hall, parquet floors, aluminum-climalit exterior carpentry and northern interior. Es Coll den Rabassa is a neighborhood in Palma de Mallorca. It is delimited by the neighborhoods of Son Malferit, El Molinar, Son Riera, Can Pastilla, Aeroport and Son Ferriol and is located about 6 km from the center. The neighborhood has bars, restaurants, mainly seafood, although there are also very good grilled meat places and others where you can eat daily menus at affordable prices. It has three schools. DO NOT HESITATE TO CALL US AND COME AND MEET HER! YOU WILL FALL IN LOVE! Our objective is yours, to sell at the best price in the shortest possible time. Find more at.

description: This beautiful rustic villa in Bunyola is surrounded by nature, has beautiful mountain views and is located south of the Tramuntana mountains, in the northwest of the island of Mallorca.The property has a vacation rental license for 10 people and has a constructed area of approx.320 m2 that are distributed as follows: on the ground floor there is a nice living room, a dining room, 2 bedrooms with bathrooms en suite, a storage room and a utility room.The first floor consists of 2 bedrooms with 2 bathrooms (one of them en suite).In the basement there is another living room and a bedroom.The beautiful outdoor area with a wonderful pool, garden, and kitchen with a barbecue invite you to relax and enjoy the magical Mediterranean atmosphere on the island.This villa in Bunyola is equipped with air conditioning, a fireplace, Climalit double glazing windows, an alarm system and stoneware floors.It is a very quiet area, the next golf course is 5 minutes away, the beautiful beaches with crystal clear waters are 15 minutes away by car.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle s'Alzina

description: This beautiful villa in Arenal has a nice private pool and is located just a few minutes walk from the beautiful beach with crystal clear waters, in the south of the wonderful island Mallorca.The sunny property has a constructed area of approx.350 m2 distributed over 2 floors as follows: On the ground floor there is an elegant living/dining room, an equipped and furnished kitchen, a glazed gallery, a bedroom and a toilet.The first floor offers 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 2 bathrooms (one of them is en-suite).The beautiful outdoor area with a magnificent saltwater pool invites you to fully enjoy the wonderful Mediterranean atmosphere on the island.In addition, there is also a spacious garage for 3 cars, a gym and a small cellar.The equipment features of this attractive villa in Arenal include: air conditioning, central heating, fireplace, double glazed windows and marble floors.It is a very attractive location, just a few steps from the beautiful sandy beach and the center of the town with various shops, restaurants and all the services one needs in everyday life.The international airport is only 10 minutes away by car.

description: This one-storey house in Costa de la Calma with a private pool and beautiful gardens is the ideal property for lovers of nature, golf and the beach. The wonderful property, with the possibility of building an additional floor, stands out for its excellent location, since it is located in a very privileged residential area in the sought after southwest of Mallorca, a few kilometers from beaches with fine sand, wonderful coves and well-known golf courses. Golf. The cozy property has a flat plot of approx. 972 m2 and a constructed area of approx. 206 m2 that is divided into a spacious living-/ dining room with access to the garden, a fully equipped kitchen with access to the pool area, 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 2 bathrooms. Extras: Dressing room, climalit windows, air conditioning, ceramic and parquet flooring, storage room and a guest house. In addition, there is the possibility of building a garage. This fantastic house in Costa de la Calma is located in a quiet area, a few minutes from Santa Ponsa and Paguera.

district: Es Forti - Son Cotoner - Son Dameto
description: El Fortín is a neighborhood in the city of Palma de Mallorca. It is delimited by the neighborhoods of Plaza de los Patines, Son Cotoner, Son Dameto, Campo de Serralta and Buenos Aires. This fantastic penthouse has a spacious living-dining room with access to a wonderful 40 m2 terrace where you can enjoy summer days, a fully furnished and equipped kitchen, 3 bedrooms (2 doubles and 1 single) and a complete bathroom with shower. It has air conditioning with 2 splits, large closets in all rooms, laminate floors, 2 electric radiators and city gas. Do not miss this magnificent opportunity. Get in touch with us, we will be happy to help you. Our objective is yours, to sell at the best price in the shortest possible time.

description: This beautiful town house in Portól was renovated in 2018 in a modern and rustic style with top quality materials and is located in a quiet town, about 20 minutes by car from the capital of the island Palma de Mallorca. The property has a constructed area of approx. 221 m2 distributed over 2 floors as follows: on the ground floor there is a spacious living/dining room with access to the terrace, an American kitchen, a bedroom, as well as a bathroom. The first floor offers 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The beautiful outdoor area with a magnificent saltwater pool and garden invite you to fully enjoy the wonderful Mediterranean atmosphere on the island. The equipment features of this beautiful town house in Portól include: air conditioning, gas central heating, double glazed windows and stone and tile floors. It is a quiet situation, about 20 minutes by car from the center of Palma and from the next beautiful sandy beach with turquoise waters.

description: This spacious apartment in Palma - Ciudad Jardín, is located a few meters from the beach and offers plenty of space. The apartment to be partially reformed has a constructed area of approx. 130 m2 that is divided as follows: 3 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, 2 bathrooms (1 en suite), a spacious living-dining room with access to a terrace from where you can see the famous Ciudad Jardín beach and a fully equipped kitchen. All rooms have fitted wardrobes and radiators. This apartment in Palma - Ciudad Jardín is equipped with air conditioning, heating, double-glazed windows and laminated parquet flooring. Ciudad Jardín is a popular neighborhood of Palma and a quiet residential area with a wide selection of international restaurants just a few meters from the beach and a few minutes drive from the center of Palma.

description: Located a few steps from the center of Palma, we present this attractive apartment in the Campo de Serralta neighborhood. The bright, northeast-facing property is located on the 1st floor of a well-kept building and offers a large constructed area of approx. 155 m2, which is divided as follows: A bright living room with a fireplace and large windows that promise plenty of natural light, a dining room, a fantastic modern kitchen with a cooking island, 4 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 3 bathrooms. After a little modernization of the bathrooms, this apartment would make a wonderful home close to the heart of the capital. Extras: Air conditioning, double glazed windows, parquet and tile flooring and electric radiators. The neighborhood of Campo de Serralta, is a residential area a few steps from Paseo del Borne, Avenida Jaime III and the famous and most modern neighborhood of Santa Catalina. The Son Muntaner golf course and Can Pere Antoni beach are about 4 kilometers away.

description: This attractive apartment in Palma stands out for its excellent location located in the historic center of Palma de Mallorca. The house is located in a well-kept building and has a living area of approx. 100 m2 that is divided into a bright living-dining room with a modern open and equipped kitchen, 3 large double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, a dressing room in the master bedroom and a spectacular full bathroom. The apartment is in perfect condition and is equipped with hot / cold air conditioning, gas heating, double-glazed windows and a laundry room. The property will be sold fully furnished and there is also the possibility of buying a parking space in the same building. The picturesque historic center of Palma, also known as the old town, has the main tourist attractions such as the majestic cathedral of La Seu and the Royal Palace of Almudaina.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Diseminado 8430- Son Ferriol

description: This cozy Majorcan finca in Puerto Andratx, surrounded by a beautiful garden and with impressive views of the mountains, is located just a few minutes from the port.The property offers absolute privacy to enjoy the Mediterranean sun all year round by the pool with its barbecue and on the beautiful terrace.The charming living-dining room with exposed beams welcomes you with its typical Majorcan fireplace.The spacious kitchen has an additional glass door to access the garden and pool.On the upper level there are 3 large double bedrooms and the master bedroom with a dressing room.There is a utility room off the kitchen and another room for a gym or office, both areas need finishing. The parking space is quite big and can accommodate at least 5 cars.Puerto de Andratx with its international restaurants, cafes and boutiques, is located in a picturesque setting, only about 5 km from the city of Andratx.Many consider it the most beautiful port in the Mediterranean.An idyllic port with a well-equipped yacht club, which has more than 450 berths.The center of Palma de Mallorca is about 20 minutes away by car.

description: This spectacular villa in Sa Coma de Bunyola with impressive views of the Sierra de Tramuntana and a beautiful infinity salt pool, is situated on a large plot of 2,150 m2 offering a generous constructed area of approx. 600 m2. The property stands out for its unique, modern, open-style architecture. The 1st floor has a wide entrance hall, a very spacious living-/dining room with a fireplace surrounded by a fantastic terrace with impressive mountain views, a magnificent kitchen with a cooking island, a library, a bedroom with a dressing room and an en-suite bathroom and a guest toilet. The lower floor has 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and an exclusive indoor heated pool. This wonderful southeast-facing villa in Sa Coma de Bunyola is offered semi-furnished and has extras such as: BBQ area, basketball/paddle court, underfloor heating, double glazed windows, visible wooden beams, ceramic flooring, storage room, automatic irrigation and a garage for 2 vehicles. Sa Coma de Bunyola stands out for its tranquility, its pretty narrow streets, and the architecture of its old stone houses, as well as its proximity and easy access to Palma. The town has good restaurants and cafes and is about 25 minutes from Palma.

description: 4-bedroom villa in a dream location of El Toro, desired area of the southwest coast of Mallorca. The property has a living area of 200 m2 and is set on a 540 m2 plot of garden with fruit trees, sunny terraces and swimming pool. The house has 4 double bedrooms, 2 brand new bathrooms, a fully fitted independent kitchen, brand new shutters, etc. Other Features: Just 200 m from the beautiful sea coast, close to all amenities, high quality fitting and features, southwest orientation, porche, large garage for 2 or more cars, store room, basement, fitted wardrobes, air conditioning, bbq, video intercom, alarm, double glazed windows, reinforced doors, glazed terrace, pantry, fireplace….

district: Son Oliva - Plaza Toros - Camp Redó
description: We present you this fantastic 160 m2 apartment in one of the most demanded today, with all the necessities that may be needed, 10 minutes from the center on foot and with quick access to the highway. This wonderful 3rd floor is located in a stately building with elevator. It is distributed in a huge and bright living-dining room, a kitchen together with a utility room, 4 exterior rooms (3 doubles and 1 single) and 3 complete bathrooms, 2 with a shower and one en-suite with a bathtub, as well as 2 good-sized balconies. The property also has PARKING INCLUDED IN THE PRICE. It has city GAS, aluminum windows, 1 hot-cold air conditioning split in the living room. DON'T MISS THE OPPORTUNITY TO LIVE IN AN EXQUISITE AREA! CALL US AND COME TO MEET IT.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Plaça de Toros, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida Gaspar de Bennazar

description: This beautiful villa in Magaluf offers a lot of tranquility, has beautiful views of the sea and is located just a 10-minute walk from the beach, in the southwest of the beautiful island of Mallorca. The property also has a separate apartment with a separate entrance. The constructed area of approx. 345 m2 is distributed as follows: the villa has a nice living room, a completely renovated and equipped kitchen, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (one of them en suite) and a toilet. The apartment consists of a spacious living room, dining room, 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and an office. The outdoor area with a fantastic terrace with a beautiful pool and Mediterranean plants invites you to fully enjoy the wonderful atmosphere of the island. This beautiful villa in Magaluf is equipped with Climalit double glazed windows, air conditioning, gas central heating, automatic irrigation in the garden and ceramic floors. There is a garage and parking spaces. It is a very attractive area, near the sea and the beach with crystal clear waters. The next golf course is 5 minutes away by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Magaluf, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Torrenova

description: This beautiful apartment in Santa Catalina is located in the heart of the most modern neighborhood of Palma and a few steps from the famous Paseo Martino and the well-known Avenida de Jaime III, which has a wide variety of exclusive shops and restaurants. The sunny property was recently renovated and has a constructed area of approx. 36 m2 divided into a spacious living / dining room with a kitchenette, an elegant bedroom with a built-in wardrobe and a complete bathroom. The magnificent apartment in Palma is equipped with air conditioning, underfloor heating, double glazed windows and hydraulic tile floors. The fantastic home is located in a quiet area with very little traffic, since it is located in one of the 12 restricted circulation areas - ACIRE - of Palma, which is why only authorized vehicles are allowed to circulate and that, for Therefore, they have the corresponding ACIRE card. This said card can be ordered without problems. This beautiful apartment in Santa Catalina is offered unfurnished, but we also have an apartment already furnished. Do not hesitate to contact us for more information. Santa Catalina is a modern neighborhood in Palma and one of the most charming and lively corners of Mallorca.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle dels Gambins

description: This attractive apartment in the old town of Palma with views of the Cathedral - Basilica de Santa María - stands out above all for its excellent location very close to Can Pere Antoni beach and the center of the capital. The house was recently renovated and is located on 3. plant of a small well-kept building with a communal roof terrace. The apartment offers a constructed area of approx. 116 m2 distributed on one floor as follows: A modern fully equipped kitchen with island, a spacious living room of approx. 23 m2, 3 bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and 2 complete bathrooms. This beautiful apartment in Palma is equipped with double glazed windows, parquet flooring, ducted air conditioning and electric heating. With an average of 300 sunny days a year, Palma de Mallorca or also called The Pearl of the Mediterranean is always a perfect place to live.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sindicat, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Plaza de Sant Francesc

description: Spacious and bright apartment located in the sought after area of Puerto Portals, on the southwest coast of Mallorca some 100 m from the famous marina. The property offers a 90 m2 living area including a living/dining area opening onto a large covered terrace (also accessed from the master bedroom), an all-equipped kitchen, 2 double bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The apartment enjoys partial sea views and is found in a well-maintained residential community with lift, swimming pool and tennis court. The property is sold with a private parking space included in the price. Additional Features: reversible air conditioning, double glazing, fitted wardrobes, parquet floors.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Portals Nous - Bendinat, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This new high-quality duplex apartment in the old town of Palma is located in a renovated 15th century listed building, with elements of the Majorcan Renaissance style. On a constructed living area of approx. 170 m2 combine modernity and tradition on 2 levels. On the main floor are the living-dining room with an open kitchen with cooking island, marble tiles and Miele appliances, an adjoining laundry room, 2 bedrooms with dressing rooms and en-suite bathrooms, a guest bathroom, as well as the cozy covered terrace of approx. 11 m2 in size with wooden and bamboo elements. In the gallery, which is accessed by a staircase, there is another double bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. A storage room completes the property. Features include triple-glazed windows, stone and wooden floors, marble bathrooms, use of Iroko wood also in the blinds, Runta brand radiators, Schlüter brand underfloor heating, etc. This charming luxury property is located in the heart of the old town of Palma, between the contemporary art museum "Es Baluard" and the "Paseo de Borne".
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Jaume, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Duplex in Calle de la Protectora

description: This sunny town house in Portol, a beautiful town that belongs to the municipality of Marratxí, is situated on a large plot of approx. 2,100 m2 with a fantastic saltwater pool surrounded by natural grass. The house has a constructed area of approx. 620 m2 that is divided into 2 very spacious floors as follows: The ground floor is completely renovated and totally independent from the upper floor. There we find a bright living-/ dining room with direct access to the pool and garden, a beautiful kitchen, 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 2 bathrooms with the possibility of a third. The 1st floor of approx. 190 m2, in need of reform, it has a living-/dining room, kitchen, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a large terrace. In addition, there is the possibility of connecting both floors. The magnificent exterior offers a garage for 4 cars, storage room and 2 porches, one of them with barbecue and fireplace. The property is divided into 3 deeds, since there are 2 lots together, for which another single-family house or a semi-detached house can be built on 2. solar. Extras: 2 cisterns, water softening and a lot of potential. Pórtol is a beautiful town 2 km from Marratxí. It is a quiet and cozy place that is also famous for its traditional pottery, especially the Siurells. Son Sanjoan airport is 17 km away and the center of Palma is 15 km away.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Pòrtol, Marratxi
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de sa Torre

description: This seafront apartment in Santa Ponsa, in need of renovation, has a community pool and garden and is located in the immediate vicinity of the Yacht Club, several bathing bays, beautiful beaches with crystal clear water, as well as the well-known golf courses from Santa Ponsa. The bright property is located on the 1st floor of a neat residential building and offers beautiful sea and mountain views as well as a generous living space of approx. 132 m2, which is distributed as follows: A bright entrance hall, a sunny living room with a dining area, a wood-burning fireplace and access to the beautiful terrace with views of the sea and the mountains, a nice kitchen equipped with a utility room, the master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and sea views, as well as 3 more bedrooms, one of them also with en-suite bathroom and an additional bathroom. The perfectly maintained community area offers a wonderful and refreshing swimming pool, a Mediterranean garden, as well as a community underground garage. Other features of this property are: fitted wardrobes, tiled floors, as well as a storage room and a private parking space in the underground garage. It is a great location.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Gran Via de la Creu

description: This is an amazing Front line apartment with direct sea access in the beautiful area of Torrenova. The apartment spread over 100 m2 offers 2 good sized double bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The fully fitted kitchen looks out over the impressive living area which is spacious and well finished. From the living area and the master bedroom you will find some of the best views on this Island of the stunning Mediterranean. The spectacular views continue outside the property on the huge terrace. Here there is plenty of space for relaxation and outside entertaining. The outside space doesn’t end there with a further 2 platforms leading down to the sea right outside your door. This is a quiet area where you could soak up the sun before taking a dip in the ocean. A great opportunity not to be missed in a lovely peaceful area with some of the best views around. Local shops and restaurants are only a short walk away and Palma and the airport itself is only a 20 minute drive. Other Features: Sea views, air conditioning, street gas, video intercom… This apartment comes fully furnished.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Magaluf, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This beautiful apartment is located on the very first line of the sea in El Arenal. The house is recently renovated and is located in a well-kept building with a communal pool, elevator and video surveillance. The living space of approx. 159 m2 is divided into a spacious living-dining room with large windows and access to a beautiful terrace with direct views of the sea, as well as a modern kitchen with utility room, 4 bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, 2 bathrooms, one of them en suite, and a dressing room in the main room. This bright apartment in El Arenal has air conditioning, heating, double glazed windows and tiled floors. Its location is excellent, since it is with all the services around such as: supermarkets, restaurants, shops, hairdressers, pharmacies and leisure centers for all ages. The old town of Palma is 15 minutes and the airport 10 minutes.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Ses Cadenes-Arenal, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Cartago

description: This beautiful villa in Torrenova is located 500 m walk from the wonderful beach of Son Matias and its charming international shops and restaurants. The sunny property offers a plot of approx. 889 m2 with a large constructed area of approx. 396 m2. The villa welcomes you into an open plan living-dining room and a generous office, all with large glass doors leading out to the pool and lovely garden. Through the modern and well-sized kitchen there is access to the garage-patio area for 4 cars. On this same floor there is a double room and a bathroom. On the upper floor is the master bedroom with its dressing room and bathroom en suite, 2 more double bedrooms and an additional bathroom. Being a German prefabricated house, the air conditioning and underfloor heating are optimized to ensure a pleasant indoor environment throughout the year. The irrigation and lighting system keeps the garden in excellent condition during all seasons. Torrenova, a part of Palmanova, is a very popular tourist destination located in the municipality of Calvià, on the west coast of Mallorca.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Magaluf, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Goleta

description: This one-storey house in Costa de la Calma with a private pool and beautiful gardens is the ideal property for lovers of nature, golf and the beach. The wonderful property, with the possibility of building an additional floor, stands out for its excellent location, since it is located in a very privileged residential area in the sought after southwest of Mallorca, a few kilometers from beaches with fine sand, wonderful coves and well-known golf courses. Golf. The cozy property has a flat plot of approx. 972 m2 and a constructed area of approx. 206 m2 that is divided into a spacious living-/ dining room with access to the garden, a fully equipped kitchen with access to the pool area, 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 2 bathrooms. Extras: Dressing room, climalit windows, air conditioning, ceramic and parquet flooring, storage room and a guest house. In addition, there is the possibility of building a garage. This fantastic house in Costa de la Calma is located in a quiet area, a few minutes from Santa Ponsa and Paguera.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Costa de la Calma, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle del Garballó

description: This bright ground floor in Ciudad Jardín with private parking and storage room is located a few meters from the famous Ciudad Jardín beach, a beautiful sandy beach located in the Bay of Palma de Mallorca, only 5 km from the center. The fantastic property is completely renovated and has a large constructed area of approx. 96 m2 that is divided as follows: A wonderful living-/dining room with access to a wonderful large terrace, an elegant fully equipped modern kitchen, 2 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 2 bathrooms, one of them en-suite. The lovely terrace offers a nice chill out area to relax and a barbecue to enjoy with the whole family. Other features: Storage room of about 11 m2, laminate flooring and air conditioning. Ciudad Jardín is an exclusive and residential area near Palma. Around it we find a wide selection of international restaurants on the beachfront.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Coll d'En Rabassa, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Can Fonoll

description: This beautiful semi-detached house in Playa de Palma is located in a well-maintained residential complex with a communal pool and just a few steps from the beach and the popular promenade. The sunny south facing property has approx. 210 m2 of constructed area distributed over 3 floors as follows: On the ground floor there is the living / dining room with the fitted and fully equipped kitchen with island and utility room, as well as a toilet. This floor has access to the terrace and the private garden of approx. 25 m2. The garden gate facilitates access to the community pool and the large garden area. The upper floor offers 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, 2 bathrooms (1 en-suite) and a terrace. The highlight is the large and sunny roof terrace of about 65 m2. The basement is suitable for conversion into a guest studio with access to the garage with 3 parking spaces. This excellent semi-detached house in Playa de Palma is in perfect condition and is equipped with double-glazed windows with aluminum shutters, stone floors and air conditioning. It is a perfect property for those who want to experience the sun, the beautiful beaches and the wonderful Mediterranean atmosphere every day. You can reach the center of the capital Palma in about 15 minutes.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Les Maravelles, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house in Calle d'Acaia

description: Located in the sought-after municipality of Calvià, in the southwest of Mallorca, we present this sunny, partly renovated villa in Son Ferrer. The attractive property, surrounded by well-kept gardens, is situated on a plot of approx. 645 m2 with pool a few meters from the town center, in a quiet and familiar area. The beautiful and recently renovated living area offers a wonderful living-/dining room with fireplace and access to the outside, a separate kitchen, 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 2 bathrooms, one of them en-suite. On the lower floor there is a garage, utility room, storage room and a fully furnished guest apartment with kitchen, bedroom and living room. This plant would need a reform. Other features: Parquet floors, double glazed windows, gas central heating and air conditioning. There are also 13 solar panels on the roof. Son Ferrer is located just 15 minutes by car from the center of Palma and a few minutes from Port Adriano, several golf courses in Santa Ponsa, as well as wonderful beaches.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Ferrer, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de l'Àliga

description: This cozy duplex apartment in Santa María del Camí has beautiful unobstructed views towards the mountains and is located in a quiet residential area, just 15 minutes by car from the capital of the island - Palma de Mallorca. The bright property has a constructed area of approx. 216 m2 distributed over 2 floors as follows: the ground floor has an elegant living room with a fireplace and access to the patio, a furnished and equipped kitchen, a toilet, as well as a utility room. On the first floor there are 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 2 bathrooms (one of them is en-suite). The equipment features of this duplex apartment in Santa María del Camí include: pre-installation for air conditioning, double-glazed windows and stoneware floors. At your disposal you have a garage with space for one car. There is a possibility to build a pool. It is a good location in the center of the island Mallorca, only 15 minutes from the city Palma, as well as from the next beautiful beach with crystal clear waters.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Maria del Cami
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Josep Capó Historiador

description: This cozy Majorcan finca in Puerto Andratx, surrounded by a beautiful garden and with impressive views of the mountains, is located just a few minutes from the port.The property offers absolute privacy to enjoy the Mediterranean sun all year round by the pool with its barbecue and on the beautiful terrace.The charming living-dining room with exposed beams welcomes you with its typical Majorcan fireplace.The spacious kitchen has an additional glass door to access the garden and pool.On the upper level there are 3 large double bedrooms and the master bedroom with a dressing room.There is a utility room off the kitchen and another room for a gym or office, both areas need finishing. The parking space is quite big and can accommodate at least 5 cars.Puerto de Andratx with its international restaurants, cafes and boutiques, is located in a picturesque setting, only about 5 km from the city of Andratx.Many consider it the most beautiful port in the Mediterranean.An idyllic port with a well-equipped yacht club, which has more than 450 berths.The center of Palma de Mallorca is about 20 minutes away by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Andratx Pueblo, Andratx
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Camino sa Font des Bosc

description: This beautiful Mallorcan house near Marratxi is located in the village of Portol, a short distance from Palma. Portol is one of the preferred residential areas, as it is quiet and rural in character, surrounded by Mediterranean nature and yet close to the capital of the island. The charming property with a beautiful garden and pool is located on a plot of approximately 1880 m2 and has a constructed area of approximately 330 m2, which is divided as follows: on the ground floor there is a spacious entrance area, a lounge/ open dining room with fireplace and access to the huge terrace and pool, a fully equipped kitchen, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a guest toilet. The upper floor has a large room with a beautiful view, which can be freely designed. The house has a basement and offers the possibility of structurally expanding an apartment of approximately 75 m2. Features include: double glazed windows with shutters, underfloor heating, fireplace, various fitted wardrobes, utility room and a storage room. A garage offers space for one vehicle. The house is supplied with electricity via a solar system and the water supply comes from city water and its own rainwater storage tank. A pre-installation for a heat pump completes this attractive property.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Pòrtol, Marratxi
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de ca ses Monges

description: We present this charming partially renovated duplex apartment, located in a wonderful well-kept community with community pool and garage, in Costa de la Calma. The sunny property is south-east facing and offers beautiful views of the pool and the Mediterranean landscape. The large constructed area of approx. 164 m2 is divided as follows: the upper level with the spacious living room with fireplace and access to a covered terrace of approx. 16 m2, the kitchen with dining room, a bedroom and a bathroom. On the lower level, there are 2 bedrooms and 2 en-suite bathrooms, a laundry room and a storage room. The bedrooms have fitted wardrobes and the apartment has pre-installation for underfloor heating. Furthermore, a terrace on the ground floor leads to a refreshing communal swimming pool surrounded by a pretty garden and with space to relax. Other features: electric radiators, double glazed windows and an underground parking space. Costa de la Calma is a small residential area in the southwest of Mallorca. It is located between Santa Ponsa and Paguera, 20 minutes from Palma de Mallorca.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Calvià pueblo, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Camino Puig de Basset

description: This very well established Bistro restaurant with apartment and pool is located on the main road in El Toro. Just a few minutes walk from the popular Port Adriano with all its shops, restaurants, bars and beach. The restaurant has been open since 2007 and is very popular with residents. Next to the restaurant there is a parking area. The cozy restaurant is on the ground floor and has a maximum occupancy of 80 pax (indoor and outdoor). There are large terraces at the front and next to the restaurant that can be closed during the winter months. There is a fully equipped kitchen with plenty of storage space and bathrooms. From the back of the restaurant you access the pool area with a beautiful barbecue area and dining area. Perfect for relaxing after a long day at work! An external staircase leads to the apartment with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen, living room with fireplace and a closed terrace. In addition, there is a large roof terrace with a storage room. Sold fully furnished and equipped.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Toro, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Gran Via

description: This splendid finca in Son Sardina with large land and swimming pool, offers an excellent location near the center of Palma de Mallorca. The beautiful property stands out for its great distribution of space and has a plot of approx. 8.000 m2 with a constructed area of approx. 291 m2 divided into two floors as follows: A nice hall, spacious and modern living room with fireplace, a fully equipped kitchen, 4 bedrooms (3 of them with fitted wardrobes) and 3 bathrooms. On the outside of the excellent estate we find a large refreshing pool and a covered area with an outdoor kitchen and barbecue that invites us to fully enjoy the Mediterranean atmosphere of the island of Mallorca. In addition, it has a captive entrance with a fountain, orange and lemon trees that extends generously through the garden and transmits peace and happiness. The property includes different extras such as air conditioning, electric heating with radiators, double-glazed windows, parquet and tile floors, as well as a garage with an adjoining apartment that can be used for guests. This fantastic finca in Son Sardina with large land and swimming pool, is located 10 minutes from two famous golf courses: Golf Son Quint and Golf Son Termes. The center of Palma is 6 km away and Palma de Mallorca Airport is 15 km away.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Establiments - Son Sardina, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Mossèn Jaume Pons

description: This attractive, completely renovated villa in Paguera is located just a few steps from the magnificent beach with turquoise waters, in the southwest of the beautiful island Mallorca. The property was furnished in 2022 with beautiful new furnishings and an outdoor area with a bar and lounge was added. The constructed area of about 190 m2 is distributed as follows: 2 large living rooms, 2 dining rooms, a furnished and equipped kitchen, 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 3 bathrooms. In the outdoor area there is a huge jacuzzi that invites you to relax and enjoy. The equipment features of this beautiful villa in Paguera include: air conditioning, underfloor heating, double glazed windows, a fireplace, Sat TV, alarm system and tiled floors. There is a garage and 2 parking spaces available. The property offers a very attractive location, just a few meters from the beautiful beach with crystal clear waters and about 10 minutes by car from the nearest golf course in Santa Ponsa.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Peguera, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Dofí

description: Located in a quiet residential area a few kilometers from the sea and the well-known Maioros Golf course, we present this Mallorcan villa in Bahía Blava. The sunny villa, in need of reform, is situated on an attractive plot of approx. 745 m2 near Cala de Maioris and with the possibility of building a refreshing pool. The traditional 2-storey building has a constructed area of approx. 164 m2 distributed as follows: The spacious ground floor offers a cozy living-/dining room with access to the outside, a separate kitchen with utility room, 3 bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, one of them with an en-suite bathroom. A second bathroom In addition, there is a 2nd bathroom, shared by the other 2 rooms. The beautiful upper floor has a leisure room and access to a wonderful terrace. The entertainment room offers a lot of potential and could be converted into a 4th bedroom, an office or something similar. Other features include: electric radiators in the bedrooms, double glazed windows with aluminum shutters and tiled floors in the kitchen. The beautiful exterior, with barbecue and Mediterranean palm trees, has a carport for one car, which can be expanded to accommodate two or three cars. It is a very attractive location near the sea, with good infrastructure such as a supermarket, restaurants and cafes.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Badia Blava-Badia Gran-Tolleric, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de Júpiter

description: This modern furnished villa between Sa Cabaneta and Son Marsal with a refreshing pool and partial sea views enchants with a dreamy covered terrace, a generous and open living area layout with panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows, as well as a spectacular exterior that leaves nothing to be desired.The exclusive property has a sunny plot of approx.850 m2 with southeast orientation and a constructed area of approx.392 m2, which is divided as follows: The bright ground floor houses a large living room on an elevated level, a charming dining room with dream views of the pool, an Italian kitchen from the Scaboline brand, a bedroom and a bathroom.The 1st floor has another 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 2 bathrooms, one of them en suite.The attractive basement area offers a second living room, shower, utility room, the machine room and as a special highlight a wonderful fitness and sauna area.Relax in the well-kept outdoor area with a refreshing dip in the impressive pool or sunbathing under the Mediterranean palm trees.Other features: Parking for two vehicles, aerothermal water tank, photovoltaic energy, aerothermal radiators, storage room and ducted air conditioning.The idyllic location offers a lot of tranquility, the nearest beautiful beach with crystal clear water and the international airport are only 15 minutes away by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sa Cabaneta, Marratxi
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Andreu Juan Batle

description: This attractive semi-detached rustic finca in Santa Maria del Cami offers a beautiful garden with lemon and orange trees and is located in a very quiet area in the center of the island, with a good connection to Palma. The property needs renovation and has a constructed area of about 350 m2, which is distributed over 2 floors as follows: on the ground floor there is a spacious living room and a kitchen with dining area and fireplace. The first floor offers 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. In the outdoor area there are open and covered terraces, a beautiful porch, a chapel, a garden with fruit trees and a fantastic swimming pool, which invite you to enjoy the beautiful days and nights on the beautiful island of Mallorca. This rustic property in Santa Maria del Camí is equipped with stoneware floors, its own well and 3 fireplaces. It is an idyllic place that offers a lot of tranquility. The nearest golf course, Puntiró, is about 10, the beautiful beach with crystal clear waters about 20 minutes by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Maria del Cami
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Diseminado Poligono 6

description: Located in a well-known urbanization of Badia Blava in the south of Mallorca, we present this attractive semi-detached house. The sunny property with partial sea views from the 1st floor offers a constructed area of approx. 225 m2 built on a plot of about 300 m2. A small garden with palm trees welcomes you to this well-kept house. The spacious ground floor consists of a bright living/dining room, a nice kitchen with access to the pool, a bedroom and a toilet. The 1st floor offers the master bedroom with bathroom en suite, a double bedroom, a bathroom and a room with access to a double bedroom with a staircase that gives access to the attic space (currently an office). The basement floor with a 35 m3 cistern and a two-car garage with direct access to the interior of the house. The wonderful exterior promises a lot of privacy and tranquility. The refreshing swimming pool and a nice barbecue area invite you to relax and spend a lot of time with family and friends. Extras: Storage room, ducted heat pump air conditioning, pre-installation of home automation, climalit windows, pre-installation for a fireplace, walls with acoustic insulation, as well as stoneware and parquet floors. Badia Blava is 15 kilometers from Llucmajor and includes a bathing area made up of s'Arc de Sant Martí, Roca des Milans and Racó de s'Almadrava.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Badia Blava-Badia Gran-Tolleric, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: Semi-detached house in Calle del Cigne

description: This impressive penthouse in San Agustin has wonderful views of the sea and is located on 9. floor of a well-kept building with elevator, in the picturesque neighborhood of Palma de Mallorca. The beautiful, south-facing property has a constructed area of approx. 220 m2 that are distributed as follows: a bright living/dining room with access to the terrace with spectacular sea views, a fitted and equipped kitchen, 4 beautiful bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a dressing room, as well as a storage room. In addition, the apartment also has a fantastic roof terrace of approx. 200 m2. The well-kept community offers owners a beautiful community pool to fully enjoy the magical Mediterranean atmosphere on the island. The equipment features of this beautiful penthouse in San Agustin include: air conditioning, heating, double glazed windows and marble floors. At your disposal you have a parking space in the garage. It is a very attractive location, just a few steps away from several beautiful beaches and coves with crystal clear waters. The international airport is only 10 minutes away by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Agustí, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle Margaluz

description: Located in the heart of the old town of Palma, we present this impressive luxury apartment. The fabulous property is located on the 1st floor of an emblematic *Art Nouveau* building recently renovated. The spectacular apartment, ideal for an elegant and modern lifestyle, has a constructed area of approx. 227 m2 divided as follows: A large living-/dining room with high ceilings and two sets of glass doors and a huge window that provides plenty of natural light, a bright open kitchen, 3 to 4 bedrooms, a patio full of plants. The master bedroom opens to the patio oasis, with sink and walk-in closet. The second bedroom also has an en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet and opens onto a patio, while the third en-suite bedroom offers an extra room and an original 1904 bathtub with authentic tiles. In addition, there is a TV room next to the living room that connects to a bathroom, its use can be ideal for an office or 4th bedroom. Other features: Old tiles, double glazed windows and utility room. It is in a very good location, in the heart of the historic center of Palma, offering traditional bars and excellent restaurants. To the international airport it will take only 10 minutes by car. We also have other apartments in the same building for sale.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cort, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de la Bosseria

district: Es Forti - Son Cotoner - Son Dameto
description: Are you looking for a house in the school area? We present this fantastic duplex townhouse! Distributed over 2 floors, we find: - On the lower floor: entrance hall, large living-dining room, fully furnished and equipped kitchen together with laundry and 1 toilet. - On the upper floor: 3 bedrooms (2 doubles and 1 single) and 1 bathroom with a bathtub. Close to all kinds of amenities such as: various schools and hospitals, pharmacies, restaurants, parks, etc. *In addition, they have good qualities such as: -Windows with double glazing and teak wood. - Aacc (hot/cold). - Community garden. - PARKING and STORAGE ROOM INCLUDED IN THE PRICE You can also enjoy the common areas and have a good time. Get in contact with us! Our objective is yours, to sell at the best price in the shortest possible time.

description: This bright villa in Costa den Blanes with pool, beautiful views of the sea and green area, is located in the south west of the island of Mallorca. The property has a plot of approx. 1000 m2 and a living space of approx. 170 m2 divided into two floors as follows: A spacious living room with fireplace that leads to the dining room and an open kitchen, 4 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, 3 bathrooms (one of them en-suite, equipped with a Jacuzzi, bathtub or shower) and utility roomIn the outdoor area we find a bright terrace surrounded by trees, a private pool and a chill out area that offers complete tranquility and comfort. In addition, the villa includes extras such as air conditioning, aluminum windows with double glazing, parquet and tile floors. It should be noted that the attractive property has a guest house with its own bathroom. This beautiful villa in Costa den Blanes is located in a quiet area, 15 minutes from the center of Palma and only 5 minutes from the beach by car. It is a privileged area near the famous Portals Nous with exquisite restaurants and luxury shops.

description: This beautiful duplex penthouse in the heart of the old town of Palma is located in a restored art deco building from 1904. The fabulous property is being renovated with great elegance, comfort and style. Every detail is well thought out to lead a comfortable and luxurious life. Due to its historical importance, architectural and decorative elements have been preserved. Blending these unique details with modern conveniences has created a history-infused ensemble outfitted for contemporary living. The exclusive 2-storey property has a constructed area of approx. 243 m2 plus an impressive roof terrace with beautiful views. The main floor offers a living room with balconies overlooking the street. At the rear, there are 2 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and windows facing the central patio, as well as built-in wardrobes, Mallorcan tiled floors. The upper level, an open concept houses the kitchen, dining room and living room wrapping around two sides of the central patio. Full-height windows facing the courtyard and a rear light well bathe this space in natural light. From here, some stairs lead to a sunny roof terrace of about 76 m2 with extensive views of the church of Santa Eulalia, the Cathedral and the Bellver Castle. It is a very attractive situation in the heart of the magical old town of Palma.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Nicolau, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de la Bosseria

district: Es Forti - Son Cotoner - Son Dameto
description: The Paseo Mallorca is a wide promenade located in the center of the city of Palma de Mallorca. It runs parallel to the final stretch of the Riera torrent. It was built after the diversion of the torrent outside the city walls, therefore, it follows the contour of the old city walls. Distributed in an entrance hall, living-dining room with an open kitchen fully furnished and equipped with high-end appliances, a laundry room with an integrated washer and dryer, 3 bedrooms (2 doubles and 1 single), 2 full bathrooms with showers and a covered balcony. This magnificent house of 130 m2 built is completely renovated with the best high-end qualities: - Appliances (NEF oven and microwave). - Ceramic hob with integrated hood from the Bora brand. - Adjustable light system - Automatic blinds - Reinforced door - Hydromassage cabin plus sauna. - 3-chamber double-glazed PVC windows. - Osmosis - Electric underfloor heating In addition, the farm has an ELEVATOR, access for people with reduced mobility and STORAGE ROOM. If you are looking for one of the best areas of Palma, this is your opportunity. Get in contact with us! In the most privileged and sunny enclave of Paseo Mallorca, the tree-lined promenade facing the stream located in the heart of the city, Next to the best restaurants, luxury shops and all kinds of amenities. Our objective is yours, to sell at the best price in the shortest possible time.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Paseo de Mallorca

description: This beautiful town house in Portól was renovated in 2018 in a modern and rustic style with top quality materials and is located in a quiet town, about 20 minutes by car from the capital of the island Palma de Mallorca. The property has a constructed area of approx. 221 m2 distributed over 2 floors as follows: on the ground floor there is a spacious living/dining room with access to the terrace, an American kitchen, a bedroom, as well as a bathroom. The first floor offers 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The beautiful outdoor area with a magnificent saltwater pool and garden invite you to fully enjoy the wonderful Mediterranean atmosphere on the island. The equipment features of this beautiful town house in Portól include: air conditioning, gas central heating, double glazed windows and stone and tile floors. It is a quiet situation, about 20 minutes by car from the center of Palma and from the next beautiful sandy beach with turquoise waters.

The beautiful apartment has a constructed area of approx. 96 m2 that are distributed as follows: a spacious living room with access to a balcony, an independent kitchen, 2 large bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, 2 bathrooms (one of them en-suite), as well as a utility room. The beautiful community offers owners a fantastic community pool and garden areas to fully enjoy the Mediterranean atmosphere on the island. The equipment features of this elegant apartment in Palma include: hot/cold air conditioning, gas central heating, double glazed windows and marble floors. It is a perfect location, with good access to the highway, just 5 minutes by car from the next beach with turquoise waters and 10 minutes from the international airport.

description: This beautiful Mallorcan-style villa in Palma de Mallorca offers beautiful views of the forest and is located near the golf course, in a green and quiet area, in the Son Rapinya neighborhood.The attractive property has a constructed area of approx.462 m2 distributed as follows: the main house has an elegant living room with a fireplace, a dining room, a furnished and equipped kitchen, 6 spacious bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 4 bathrooms.There is also an independent house with a living room, 2 bedrooms, a bathroom and a cellar.The beautiful outdoor area with a magnificent pool invites you to relax and enjoy the beautiful views of the forest, as well as the magical Mediterranean atmosphere on the island.The equipment features of this attractive villa in Palma de Mallorca include: wooden windows, heating and ceramic floors.There is a garage with space for 2 vehicles.It is a very attractive situation, on the outskirts of Palma, in a quiet area just a few steps from the golf course.The international airport is approx.15 minutes by car.

description: This attractive semi-detached house in Bahía Blava, a quiet and popular urbanization near the dream cliffs of Llucmajor, in the south of the island, has a plot of approx. 330 m2 and a constructed area of 220 m2. This beautiful property with 2 floors, an own construction with top quality materials lined with stone, is divided as follows: the bright ground floor with a spacious living-/dining room with fireplace, a beautiful furnished and equipped kitchen with access to the terrace with porch, utility room and guest toilet. The spacious upper floor offers 3 double bedrooms, one of them with an en-suite bathroom with a shower and access to a fantastic terrace, and another complete bathroom with a bathtub. Other features: climalit windows, hot/cold air conditioning, solar panels, electric radiators, fitted wardrobes, parking and much more. It is possible to build a pool. For that, you need the pool construction license, which was approved ten years ago, which must be renewed. Bahía Blava is a very quiet area, 15 minutes from the airport and 5 minutes from the sea - Cala Delta.

description: Located in a quiet cul-de-sac, near the center of Palma, Son Espases and with good connection to all public transport, we present this town house in Son Sardina. The property, with 2 floors and facing south, is situated on a large plot of approx. 1,121 m2 and has a constructed area of approx. 539 m2 divided as follows: The spacious ground floor offers a sunny living-/dining room with a wood-burning fireplace and access to a wonderful terrace, the garden and the raised pool area, a beautiful fully fitted kitchen, a bedroom and a full bathroom. The spacious upper floor has 4 large bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, a full bathroom and another large living room. The fantastic exterior with an orchard, fruit trees, a refreshing pool, barbecue area and a bathroom with a shower leaves nothing to be desired. In addition, there are 2 annexes, which could be used as a separate apartment. Other features: 5 filtration septic tanks, well water, solar panels, diesel radiators, air conditioning, double-glazed windows, parquet and stoneware floors, utility room, parking and a garage for 2 vehicles. The last reform was in 2008. Son Sardina is a town and settlement in the city of Palma de Mallorca.

The spacious property, with side sea views from the balcony, offers a living space of approx. 90 m2 divided as follows: A beautiful very cozy living-/ dining room with pre-installation for a fireplace and access to the balcony and a large private terrace on 2 levels of approx. 40 m2, a kitchen and a summer kitchen, utility room, 3 large bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The magnificent apartment is located on the 1st floor of a well-kept building with a lift and a wonderful communal roof terrace of about 300 m2 with spectacular views of the bay of Palma, the cathedral and Bellver castle. Extras: Double glazed windows, air conditioning and porcelain stoneware floors. Furniture is included. It is an unbeatable location, just 5 minutes from the beach, the center of Palma and the most important shopping streets in Palma.

description: On the 3rd line of the sea and facing southeast we present this fabulous newly built villa in El Toro. The sunny single-family house was built in 2021 with high-quality materials and offers a refreshing pool to relax and enjoy the Mediterranean atmosphere. The fantastic 2-storey property offers several terraces with unobstructed views of the mountains and the landscape and a spacious constructed area of approx. 228 m2 that is divided as follows: A bright living room with large windows and access to the outside, a spectacular modern kitchen with dining room, 3 spacious bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. The master bedroom stands out for a wonderful elegant en-suite bathroom with a bathtub. The land of approx. 583 m2 offers the possibility of creating a magnificent oasis with palm trees and natural grass. Extras: Air conditioning, underfloor heating, double glazed windows, marble floors, utility room and a covered parking space. El Toro is in a very good location in the southwest of the island, just a few steps from the luxurious Puerto Adriano with its exclusive boutiques, bars and international restaurants and only a few minutes walk from the beach. The Santa Ponsa II golf course is just a few minutes away by car.

description: This charming Mediterranean villa in Costa d´en Blanes benefits from stunning sea views and is located in a noble residential area, just a few minutes drive from the beautiful beach with crystal clear waters, in the southwest of the beautiful island Mallorca The attractive property It has a built area of approx.469 m2 that are distributed as follows: the main floor consists of a beautiful living room with fireplace, dining room, kitchen, 2 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms.The lower level offers 2 independent apartments with a kitchen, 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms.In addition, the villa also has a large roof terrace with a tower that is currently used as an office.The charming outdoor area with a magnificent pool invites you to enjoy the beautiful views of the sea and the enchanting Mediterranean atmosphere.The equipment features of this beautiful villa in Costa d´en Blanes include: air conditioning, electric heating, double glazed windows and stoneware floors.There is a garage with space for one car and an outdoor parking space.The location is very attractive, just a few minutes drive from the next golf course in Bendinat and the well-known marina Puerto Portals with its excellent restaurants and boutiques, as well as the fabulous beaches with crystal clear waters.

description: This large finca in Esporlas with a pool offers a lot of tranquility and magnificent views of the mountains. It stands on a large plot of approx. 9350 m2, only about 20 km from the beautiful Cala Banyalbufar. This attractive property has been completely renovated and has a constructed area of approx. 526 m2 with a total of 6 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms (2 of them en-suite), 2 living/dining rooms, 2 kitchens and 2 separate guest toilets. The arrangement of the rooms offers the possibility of renting part of the house. The fabulous outdoor area, with large terraces, a fantastic pool and a large garden with fruit trees, invites you to enjoy the beautiful views and the magical Mediterranean atmosphere of the island. From the sunny and spacious roof terrace you benefit from beautiful views to the surrounding mountains. Features of this attractive finca in Esporlas include: Air conditioning, electric water heater, fireplace, double-glazed windows with shutters, beautiful wooden doors, fitted wardrobes, an automatic irrigation system, own cistern, well, municipal water supply and electricity, automatic entrance gate and parking for 4 cars. A perfect property for those who want to live in absolute tranquility surrounded by nature and yet want to be close to the city. The center of Palma de Mallorca is a 15-minute drive away.

description: This sunny villa in Marratxi impresses with its typical Majorcan style and an attractive and generous layout.The perfectly maintained, south-east facing property stands on a nice plot of approx.626 m2 and offers a constructed area of approx.344 m2 (living space approx.247 m2), which is distributed over 2 bright floors as follows: A pleasant entrance hall, a cozy living-dining room with fireplace and access to the inviting outdoor area with a refreshing pool, beautiful terrace areas and Mediterranean palm trees, a spacious independent kitchen, 5 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 3 bathrooms, 1 of them en suite.The bedrooms on the upper floor enjoy beautiful terraces with panoramic views up to the Sierra de Tramontana mountains.The charming outdoor area with barbecue corner and high hedges, which serve wonderfully as privacy protection, invites you to relax and unwind.Other features: Photovoltaic system, oil central heating installed in 2022, double glazed windows, tiled floor, air conditioning, aluminum shutters, a storage room and a large garage.It is an idyllic place that offers a lot of tranquility, while being well connected to the motorway.The nearest beautiful beach with crystal clear waters, as well as the international airport, are only 15 minutes away by car.

description: This beautiful penthouse in El Terreno is located in a quiet street close to the port, the Paseo Marítimo and the fashionable neighborhood of Santa Catalina. A total of 8 new and exclusive Scandinavian designed flats are being built here. Completion is scheduled for late spring 2023. The clear lines, the structures and the bright rooms promise a pleasant atmosphere and a high level of living comfort. All floors will have high quality parquet, tiles, built-in air conditioning, heating and underfloor heating in the bathrooms. The penthouse has a living space of approximately 103 m2, which is divided as follows: an open living/dining room, an open kitchen, 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The highlight is the huge roof terrace of approximately 75 m2 with a beautiful view of the sea and the port. All residential units have an underground parking space and a practical storage room. El Terreno is one of the most up-and-coming neighborhoods in Palma and is within walking distance of the bustling center of the island's capital. Palma offers a huge cultural offer, an excellent gastronomic variety and numerous shops and boutiques. This penthouse in Palma-El Terreno is an oasis in the middle of one of the most popular and vibrant cities in Europe, with a cosmopolitan touch and a direct location on the Mediterranean Sea.

description: This beautiful chalet in Andratx offers a lot of tranquility, is surrounded by nature, has beautiful views of the mountains and is located in a town just 6 minutes from the port, in the southwest of the beautiful island of Mallorca. The attractive property has a constructed area of approx. 385 m2 distributed over 2 floors as follows: on the ground floor there is a beautiful living room decorated with visible wooden beams, a fitted and equipped kitchen, 2 bedrooms, a dressing room and a bathroom with Jacuzzi. The first floor has 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes with views of the mountains, a bathroom with shower and another living room. All bedrooms have pre-installation for heating. The outdoor area with a barbecue and the land with fruit trees invite you to enjoy the beautiful days and nights on the wonderful island of Mallorca. There is a garage and parking spaces for 6 cars. This beautiful chalet in Andratx is equipped with air conditioning, barbecue, and ceramic floors. It is a very quiet area, but at the same time only 5 minutes by car from the luxurious Puerto Andratx with its excellent restaurants and boutiques, as well as several beautiful coves with crystal clear waters.

The main house has a spacious living/dining room with fireplace, a kitchen, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a guest toilet. The large interior patio and several large roof terraces with views of the mountains and even Puerto Andratx offer enough space to enjoy the Mediterranean climate and pleasant barbecue evenings with friends and family. The property is located in the center of this typical Mallorcan town that offers a traditional market and a very welcoming atmosphere every Wednesday. description: This authentic Mallorcan villa is located in the quiet area of Can Carbonell, in Pont d'Inca offering maximum privacy.The spacious corner house with a plot of approx. 800 m2 with a private pool and various sunny terraces offers a constructed area of approx.557 m2 (approx.100 m2 on terraces).The attractive property could use a little modernisation, although it is in excellent condition.The spacious and bright house is distributed over 2 floors plus a basement that can easily be transformed into part of the house.Currently, it consists of a large living room, dining room, a large fully equipped kitchen, 8 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 4 bathrooms, one of them en-suite.The property offers several exits to 2 porches and access to a wonderful terrace with views of protected green areas, from the 2nd floor.The fabulous exterior stands out for a large refreshing pool and a garden with automatic irrigation.This villa in the municipality of Marratxi is very well preserved and has good qualities, stoneware floors, climalit windows, wood-colored aluminum Majorcan shutters, hot/cold air conditioning.It is located near the train station and is very well connected with access to the highway, schools, tennis courts and children's areas.

description: This attractive town house in Valldemossa is in need of renovation, has beautiful views of the town and the mountains and is located in the center of the famous town, in the wonderful area of Serra de Tramuntana.The property has a constructed area of approx.136 m2 distributed over 2 floors as follows: the first floor consists of a living/dining room with a fireplace, a fitted kitchen, a bedroom, a bathroom, as well as a storage room.On the second floor there are 2 bedrooms, a small storage room and a bathroom.From the second floor you can enjoy views of the beautiful surroundings.This attractive town house in Valldemossa is equipped with a fireplace and tiled floors.All rooms are decorated with visible wooden beams on the ceiling.It is a wonderful situation in the mountains, in the village with stone houses, known for its rich historical past, where in 1838 the famous composer Frederic Chopin spent the winter.The house is located a few minutes by car from other beautiful towns such as Fornalutx or Deia with its wonderful cove with crystal clear waters and impressive views of the mountains.

description: This front line property offers some of the most breathtaking views around. The apartment itself has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (1 of which is ensuite), fitted kitchen, large living dining area and 2 very good sized balconies. As you can see from our photos the unbelievable views can be taken in from most of the rooms and the property has lots of light and space. Both balconies set either side of the living area provide plenty of space for entertaining or simply just relaxing outside. They also have access from 2 of the bedrooms. Another amazing feature is down just one floor to the community pool and direct sea access. This really does make this property unique and a perfect place for either a holiday apartment or permanent residence. The community Itself is in a great location in Santa Ponsa with all amenities literally on your doorstep. It also has a gated parking area with no designated bays. Access can only be gained from residents and each apartment has their own intercoms to let guests inside when needed. The apartment has been lived in on a permanent basis and would need your own personal touches to bring up to date, nevertheless it is a must see property in a wonderful location. Additional Features: Air conditioning, lift.

description: This large and beautiful villa in Santa Ponsa was completely renovated in January 2020. Located on a hill, in a quiet residential area between Santa Ponsa and Costa de la Calma, it has wonderful views of the mountains. The property is on a plot of approx. 855 m2 and has a constructed area of approx. 340 m2 distributed over 2 levels, with 2 large living rooms, one with a wood-burning fireplace, a high-quality modern kitchen with a cooking island and Bosch brand appliances, a total of 6 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a games room, various storage rooms and a laundry room. In the outdoor area there is a beautiful Mediterranean garden with orange and lemon trees, a large floodlit swimming pool and a children's playground. The characteristics of the equipment are: air conditioning, underfloor heating, stoneware floors, satellite TV and automatic irrigation of the garden. There are also 2 car parks available. It is a beautiful and quiet area with several sandy beaches and coves, near the exclusive Santa Ponsa golf course. This fantastic property is for sale only and exclusively with us!

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Gran Via Puig des Castellet

description: This beautiful Mallorcan house near Marratxi is located in the village of Portol, a short distance from Palma. Portol is one of the preferred residential areas, as it is quiet and rural in character, surrounded by Mediterranean nature and yet close to the capital of the island. The charming property with a beautiful garden and pool is located on a plot of approximately 1880 m2 and has a constructed area of approximately 330 m2, which is divided as follows: on the ground floor there is a spacious entrance area, a lounge/ open dining room with fireplace and access to the huge terrace and pool, a fully equipped kitchen, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a guest toilet. The upper floor has a large room with a beautiful view, which can be freely designed. The house has a basement and offers the possibility of structurally expanding an apartment of approximately 75 m2. Features include: double glazed windows with shutters, underfloor heating, fireplace, various fitted wardrobes, utility room and a storage room. A garage offers space for one vehicle. The house is supplied with electricity via a solar system and the water supply comes from city water and its own rainwater storage tank. A pre-installation for a heat pump completes this attractive property.

description: This impressive duplex penthouse in the heart of Palma's old town with a private pool and fascinating views from the spectacular roof terrace is located in a restored art deco building from 1904. The luxurious home is being renovated with great elegance, comfort, style and with every detail well thought out for total high-end living. Due to its historical importance, architectural and decorative elements have been preserved. Combining these unique details with modern conveniences has created an infused blend of storied history with contemporary living. The fabulous penthouse has a constructed area of approx. 248 m2 divided as follows: The lower level is bright with an open concept living room, dining room and kitchen with a guest bathroom. On the next level there are 3 bedrooms with high ceilings and wooden beams. The master bedroom stands out for its patio windows, dressing room and an excellent private bathroom. The wonderful private terraces are divided into two levels, one to cool off and bathe in the fantastic private pool and the other upper to enjoy the panoramic views of the sea, the mountains and the cathedral of Mallorca.
