description: This charming house in Esporlas with pool offers a lot of tranquility, a magnificent view of the mountains and stands on a large plot of approx. 2,900 m2, only approx. 20 km from the beautiful Cala Banyalbufar. The property, which is in need of renovation, has a constructed area of approx. 380m2, with a total of 8 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, 1 living room with conservatory, 1 dining room, 1 kitchen, a utility room and a storage room. In addition, there are 2 separate guest houses. With its large terraces, small pool and its charming Mediterranean garden with a pond and fruit trees, the fabulous outdoor area creates a magical atmosphere and invites you to relax. Features include: air conditioning, heating, fireplace, double glazed Climalit windows with shutters, wooden floors, fitted wardrobes and parking for 4 cars. A perfect property for those who want to live in absolute tranquility, surrounded by nature but prefer to be close to the city. Palma, the capital city of Majorca, is about 15 minutes away by car.

description: This beautiful renovated penthouse in Palma, located in the Foners neighborhood, stands out for its excellent location and a huge terrace with wonderful views of the sea. The luxurious property, located on the 7th floor of a well-kept building with elevator, just a few steps from the beach and the magnificent capital Palma, will surprise you in many ways. The entire house impresses with its elegant style and plenty of light, thanks to its large windows. The generous living space of approx. 107 m2 is divided into a fantastic living / dining room that leads to the magnificent terrace of about 90 m2 with spectacular side views of the sea, the Paseo Marítimo and the mountains, a beautiful fully equipped modern kitchen, 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 2 bathrooms. with amazing style. Other features: Fireplace, central heating, air conditioning, double glazed windows, dressing room, utility room, aluminum shutters and many marble details. In addition, there is the possibility of acquiring a parking space in the same building. The Foners neighborhood is one of the largest neighborhoods in Palma. To the south it borders the sea, to the east with Can Pere Antoni and Polígono de Llevant.

description: This cozy Majorcan finca in Puerto Andratx, surrounded by a beautiful garden and with impressive views of the mountains, is located just a few minutes from the port.The property offers absolute privacy to enjoy the Mediterranean sun all year round by the pool with its barbecue and on the beautiful terrace.The charming living-dining room with exposed beams welcomes you with its typical Majorcan fireplace.The spacious kitchen has an additional glass door to access the garden and pool.On the upper level there are 3 large double bedrooms and the master bedroom with a dressing room.There is a utility room off the kitchen and another room for a gym or office, both areas need finishing. The parking space is quite big and can accommodate at least 5 cars.Puerto de Andratx with its international restaurants, cafes and boutiques, is located in a picturesque setting, only about 5 km from the city of Andratx.Many consider it the most beautiful port in the Mediterranean.An idyllic port with a well-equipped yacht club, which has more than 450 berths.The center of Palma de Mallorca is about 20 minutes away by car.

description: This beautiful duplex penthouse in the heart of the old town of Palma is located in a restored art deco building from 1904. The exclusive 2-storey property has a constructed area of approx. 243 m2 plus an impressive roof terrace with beautiful views. description: This new high-quality duplex apartment in the old town of Palma is located in a renovated 15th century listed building, with elements of the Majorcan Renaissance style. On a constructed living area of approx. 170 m2 combine modernity and tradition on 2 levels. On the main floor are the living-dining room with an open kitchen with cooking island, marble tiles and Miele appliances, an adjoining laundry room, 2 bedrooms with dressing rooms and en-suite bathrooms, a guest bathroom, as well as the cozy covered terrace of approx. 11 m2 in size with wooden and bamboo elements. In the gallery, which is accessed by a staircase, there is another double bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. A storage room completes the property. Features include triple-glazed windows, stone and wooden floors, marble bathrooms, use of Iroko wood also in the blinds, Runta brand radiators, Schlüter brand underfloor heating, etc. This charming luxury property is located in the heart of the old town of Palma, between the contemporary art museum "Es Baluard" and the "Paseo de Borne".

On the upper floor is the master bedroom with its dressing room and bathroom en suite, 2 more double bedrooms and an additional bathroom. The fantastic home is located in a quiet area with very little traffic, since it is located in one of the 12 restricted circulation areas - ACIRE - of Palma, which is why only authorized vehicles are allowed to circulate and that, for Therefore, they have the corresponding ACIRE card. This said card can be ordered without problems. This beautiful apartment in Santa Catalina is offered unfurnished, but we also have an apartment already furnished. description: Modern townhouse with a great roof terrace The Terreno Twins have recently been built in a very central yet quiet residential area in Palma's up-and-coming district of El Terreno. Two stylish modern townhouses, each consisting of 2 living levels plus basement and roof terrace. Both houses have the same size and features. On the ground floor there is a spacious double bedroom and a children's room or office and a bathroom. The master bedroom with en suite bathroom is located on the 1st floor, as well as a guest toilet and the bright living and dining area in Scandinavian style with a modern open kitchen with NEFF appliances and BORA induction hob with integrated extractor. In addition, the spacious private roof terrace with luxurious Jacuzzi, outdoor shower and beautiful views of the Bellver Castle invites you to relax and to enjoy the Mallorcan sun and the warm summer evenings, all in the heart of the island's capital, Palma, within walking distance of the popular Santa Catalina district and Palma´s harbour. Further features of the property include underfloor heating, air conditioning, fitted wardrobes, oak parquet flooring in living and bedrooms, modern bathrooms with Zarci natural stone, utility room as well as a garage for one car and several large storage rooms. In the basement there is the possibility to set up another air-conditioned bedroom or a hobby room.

description: Refurbished designer apartment with high qualities in Paseo Marítimo, Palma. This apartment has been completely refurbished creating an exclusive designer apartment with high quality finishes. It is located in the sought after area of Paseo Marítimo in Palma, and its general characteristics are as follows: • Paseo Marítimo, Palma • 175 m2 living space • 2 double bedrooms  • 2 bathrooms • 2nd floor with elevator  • Communal swimming pool •Terrace • Parking (1) • Extras: 24h security, barbecue, fitted closets, jacuzzi With dream views of the coast, this completely renovated designer apartment in Paseo Marítimo is an opportunity to live in a privileged place. When you arrive at your new home and when you enter for the first time, you will be amazed to see its beautiful architecture and decoration. Its interior has 175 m2 useful where it has been chosen to create a joint space between the living room and the kitchen to favor the entry of natural light. Thus, this first space that you will see when you get home, is spacious and diaphanous and will be bathed by sunlight.  If you like to cook, you will love to innovate new recipes in your designer kitchen. You will have multiple storage space, as well as many facilities when cooking thanks to its spaciousness and good distribution. In addition, as it is an open kitchen, you will be able to find out everything that happens in the living room while you are cooking. It has two double bedrooms, both with large windows that will allow you to enjoy the views and thus enjoy absolute warmth in your bedroom. It also has 2 complete bathrooms. From its terrace, you will be able to enjoy placid breakfasts with sea views. The dimensions are more than enough for you to put a table and chairs, or even a small sofa to create a chill out area, for example. If you want to enjoy your new home as soon as possible, do not hesitate to call or fill out the contact form.

description: Dublex penthouse with nice views over Palma This centrally located dublex penthouse has been completely renovated with quality materials. The beautiful roof terrace offers a breathtaking view of the harbor and the city of Palma. The central location in the heart of the well-known Santa Catalina district is an inspiration for anyone looking for an active life in the city of Palma. The property extends over three floors and the first floor has an open kitchen to the dining room, living room with balcony, bedroom and bathroom; on the second floor is the main bedroom with bathroom and balcony and on the third floor there is a wonderful terrace overlooking the cathedral and the sea. The whole property is air conditioned with air conditioning h/c, wooden flooring, soundproofing triple glazed, SMEG appliances, sanitary facilities of Duravit and Zuchettic, fireplace in the living room, security door. Palma is affectionately called “Little Barcelona” and is widely regarded as one of the most elegant capital cities in the Mediterranean and offers a sophisticated year round lifestyle which is difficult to beat. The Paseo Maritimo are borders the city and the sea with spectacular views across Palma Cathedral, marinas, The Royal Yacht Club and Palma Bay. Exclusive nightclubs, bars, restaurants and hotels are located along this famous boulevard and within easy walking distance to other areas of the city. Here apartments and penthouses are much in demand with a cosmopolitan market converting it into one of Palma’s hotspots. Just off the Paseo Maritimo is the lively Santa Catalina district which has grown up around its local fresh produce market. This international area is increasingly popular with all nationalities and has a “hip” bohemian feel packed with cafes, bars, restaurants where you will hear many languages spoken.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Duplex

description: For sale beautiful rustic property in Santa Maria del Cami. Come and enjoy the tranquility of the town, a few minutes from Palma de Mallorca, with incredible views of the Serra de Tramuntana. The house has several rooms, all of them well equipped, with heating and centralized air. LOW LEVEL Spacious living room, connected to a separate kitchen and with direct access to the pool and barbecue area. Ideal to enjoy with family and friends. It also has 2 bedrooms, one double and one studio type, with their corresponding bathrooms (one of them en suite). FIRST FLOOR It has 2 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 2 full bathrooms (one of them en suite) SECOND FLOOR It has another room with access to a terrace on the ground floor, with panoramic views of the Serra de Tramuntana and the entire plot. COMMON ZONES -Swimming pool (11x5) in a natural grass area -Barbecue area -Storage rooms -Leisure area -Tennis court -Growing zone -Orange area Do not hesitate to contact us to receive more information and come to see it.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Maria del Cami
suggestedTexts.title: Estate

description: Would you like a brand new ground floor duplex with independent access in a historic building in the Sant Jaume neighbourhood? With this property, you have that opportunity. With natural light from the main and rear façade and from the building's courtyard, the result of a new distribution will undoubtedly give rise to a spectacular result. It is distributed in 2 floors, the upper one with an approximate surface of 85 m2 and the lower one of about 55 m2.  The location will not leave you indifferent, next to Sant Jaume street and a few steps away from the junction of Jaime III and Paseo del Borne. Contact us for more information and to know the options to restore this magnificent property. AG asociados Welcome Home!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Jaume, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This modern built villa in the exclusive residential area of Son Vida is the epitome of elegance and functionality. Not visible from the main road and completely fenced-in this exquisite villa of 701m2 with beautiful views set in a sizable plot of 2.727m2 is hiding from the indiscreet eye. With its easy access and at only a few minutes away from Palma city center, the property offers all the commodities at a close reach, maintaining its undiscussed private oasis feeling. The light flooded ground floor is composed of a double height hall, on the left a guest toilet and on the right the rock carved wine cellar. We proceed and find the splendid saloon framed by floor to ceiling double glazed windows. On the left wing we have the modern kitchen and two separate pantries, the saloon hosts the dining area and further on the corner the sizable sitting room. On the right wing we have a totally independent double bedroom with an ensuite bathroom and a gym (which could be transformed into a further bedroom if necessary) with a bathroom and separate sauna. By the large and imposing stairs we reach the first floor, where we have five double bedrooms with 4 of them en suite. The master bedroom has a spacious dressing room and a wide terrace looking over the garden. On the outside we find a double garage and on the back of the plot the stunning infinity swimming pool with its huge terraced area, partly covered, for those beautiful family gatherings or friends' parties! This accomplished property is the perfect hideaway, is elegant, comfortable, welcoming and easy to maintain thanks to the best quality materials used at the start. Due to its location, the villa itself can enlarged in volume! Further to its sizable parcel, the estate can be sold with an extra plot of 2.250m2 in the front of the property that brings extra privacy OR the possibility to build a supplementary annex. The price of the plot is € 900.000.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Vida, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Situated in Sa Teulera, the excellent area located in the green lung of Palma, surrounded by the nature that surrounds the Bellver Castle and only a few minutes away from the city centre and the best national and international schools, we find this beautiful semi-detached house of 139 m2 on a plot of 310 m2 with an open and luminous interior thanks to its excellent south orientation and from where you have access to some fantastic private terraces and gardens, ready to enjoy the good weather that Mallorca offers us all year round.   The villa is developed on two floors with five bedrooms and two bathrooms plus a guest toilet. On the main entrance level there is a living-dining room with fireplace which occupies a space bathed by a large entrance of natural light and open to the terraces and garden. The large kitchen is independent, fully equipped, with pantry and laundry room. A bedroom with en suite bathroom and a guest toilet also form part of this level. The upper floor is completely occupied by the sleeping area, with four bedrooms and a complete bathroom. It should be noted that on this level you can also enjoy access to a sunny terrace with unobstructed views.   An excellent house to have a comfortable family life in a unique natural environment within the city.    FEATURES:    -Ducted hot/cold air conditioning, heating by radiators, parquet flooring, fitted wardrobes.  -Independent equipped kitchen, pantry, laundry.  -Private terraces, private garden, rainwater well.    LOCATION: -South facing -Green surroundings, close to schools, close to restaurants, close to shops and commercial centres, 10 min. from Palma city centre, easy access to the road network.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Teulera, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Semi-detached house

description: Amelia Inmobiliaria offers a rustic property that is very close to Palma, at the foot of the Sierra de Tramontana. The environment convinces by its absolute privacy, surrounded by nature and with a magnificent view of the mountains. Located in the surroundings of Palma with a land area of 3260 m2 and which has a large number of fruit trees such as lemon, orange, mandarin, fig, tomato, olive and more. The house has 293 m2 of constructed area, distributed over two floors. The ground floor has about 160m2 and is distributed in two large dining rooms with wood stoves, a furnished, equipped and very spacious kitchen with space for a table and chairs, from which you access the upper floor of 74 m2 where we will find two rooms. doubles and a complete bathroom. On the ground floor we also have another double room with an en-suite bathroom. On the outside we have a large garage with capacity for four cars, plus a laundry area and space to cook and enjoy. It is a special house with many possibilities, very bright and spacious, in a cul-de-sac and very quiet. Live isolated in the middle of nature, but only 10 minutes from Palma.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sa Indiotería - Son Castelló, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Penthouse with breathtaking views in Bendinat This penthouse with sea and golf views is located in Olinto, one of the most exclusive and sought after areas in Bendinat Golf. The property has three bedrooms, all with en suite bathrooms and access to the 90m2 terrace, a bright living-dining room and a spacious kitchen with views to the mountain and the Bellver castle. The Mediterranean style community is built with top quality materials and is perfectly oriented to the south and very well maintained. The second terrace / solarium of approximately 260m2, for the exclusive use of this flat, is worth mentioning. Due to its size and privacy, it is ideal for parties or events or to enjoy the sun and tranquillity. It also has 5 underground parking spaces and two storage rooms. It has hot and cold air conditioning, marble floors, 24-hour security, indoor and outdoor swimming pool, from which you can enjoy beautiful sea views. This is undoubtedly a very special property, both for its location and its views. The Bendinat area has earned a reputation for providing a premium lifestyle with easy access into Palma which is only 15 minutes drive away. Not surprisingly it has developed into one of the most sought-after locations in Mallorca offering close proximity to the city with all the inherent benefits of an exclusive and peaceful residential area. In the southwest Bendinat stands out as an ideal location to access international schools, golf courses and shopping facilities. In the northern part of Bendinat the residential areas are adjacent to the Royal Bendinat Golf course and away from the greens there is magnificent coastline with stunning sea views across the bays and beaches. Nearby, the neighboring village at Portals Nous provides quality shopping, boutiques and restaurants plus the most established Puerto Portals super yacht marina where the Spanish Royal Family and a host of celebrities can be seen every summer.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cas Catala, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Beautiful rustic stone farm with 6,371 m² a few kilometers from Santa Eugenia. It has a legal building of approximately 62 m². This is an ideal home to disconnect and enjoy nature and get away from overcrowded areas. This house has the following general characteristics: • Simple • 55 useful m2 • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 6,371 m2 of plot • 1 kitchen-dining room • Parking spaces. • Rainwater well. • Possibility of requesting electricity from the city or putting solar panels. • Unobstructed views and views of the mountains. • Accessible by main road. • No road noise. • Services nearby. • Privacy. A part of the property is intended for housing. In the other part of the house we will find the tool shed, which you can use as both a storage room and a garage. The property has a rainwater cistern and pre-installation of water pipes. Bathroom with sink, toilet and shower tray. Rooftop water tank. Porch with stone columns and wooden beams. Majorcan tile roof in perfect condition. The land that the property preserves has approximately 50 olive trees, 10 orange trees, 2 lemon trees, a vineyard and different fruit trees. The plot is closed with a dry wall on 2 sides (half the back and one side), a masonry wall on the front (neighborhood), a grill on the other side and a row of cypresses on the other half at the back. The entrance to the house is through a 30-meter paved road directly from the Ctra. de Sineu. It has the possibility of a small tractor and various tools for working the land. Its exterior spaces, which you can access through numerous exits from inside the estate, will provide you with new If you want more information about this beautiful rustic stone farm in Sencelles, contact us.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sencelles
suggestedTexts.title: Estate

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Exceptional first line property for sale in Cala Vinyes, sought-after area of the southwest coast of Mallorca. It is found in one of the kind location offering panoramic sea views and direct sea access. This property represents a great investment opportunity, offering a variety of possibilities and the chance to acquire one of the largest first line villas of the south-west of Mallorca. It is spread across 5 floors, with an area of 1,228 m2 on a plot of 1,430 m2. The 9 bedrooms are all en-suite and most of them with jacuzzi bathtubs. All floors have spacious living areas and large covered and non-covered terraces. The house also has an unbelievable 239 m2 rooftop terrace with jacuzzi and shower, an independent guest apartment on the ground-floor and a separate floor also with its own entrance. One of the floors has a locker area with shower which could be converted into a gym with spa area. The no-less stunning outdoor offers a rich Mediterranean garden with palm trees and various plant species and a large salt-water pool also enjoying breathtaking views and where from one can walk down to the cove and sea’s crystal water. Other Features: Double garage, exterior walls made of Mallorquín high quality and sea resistance stone, air conditioning, central heating, marble floors, all windows are double glazed.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cala Vinyes, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Detached house in Bahía Grande -Llucmajor   COMFORT AND THE LUXURY OF VIEWS WITHIN YOUR REACH.   Bahía Grande, belonging to the municipality of Llucmajor, is a residential urbanization situated about 20 minutes from Palma. Nearby there is a shopping centre, where you can find all kinds of shops of basic necessities. You will have several schools within your reach, such as the CEIP BADIES school 2 minutes away by car, the URBANITZACIONS DE LLUCMAJOR school, 4 minutes away, the Maioris golf course, as well as a primary care medical centre, private hospital, leisure and social centres for young and old people, chemists, vets and banks among others... The area is ideal for families with children, as it is in a very quiet environment, as well as being close to the city.   The property to be presented is located on a plot of 655 m2 according to the land registry. It is built on sloping land, which will give it better views as you go up steps, as it is located on a natural viewpoint. It has 375 m2 constructed according to the land registry, distributed in a wide corridor that gives us a good sensation of comfort, a cosy living room of 30m2 approx. with chimney, 3 double bedrooms in floor, one of them with a spacious dressing room, 2 complete bathrooms in floor, one of them en suite, a luminous equipped and furnished kitchen of 15 m2 approx. with unbeatable views, which gives access to a porch terrace of 20m2 approx, where you will enjoy a pleasant moment observing a formidable landscape and that will captivate your 5 senses. You will be able to access through the interior stairs covered in marble to the upper floor of the property, where you will find a large roof terrace of 53m2 approx, and imagine the rest... The house also has a very ventilated basement floor, fully equipped to have more rooms, games room, living room, or even a large gym for your leisure time or wellness. Externally it is surrounded by terraces and garden area, and there you will find your space for relaxation and fun for others next to the swimming pool of 32m2 approx. Other features to highlight are: central heating, gasoil heating, laundry/utility room/storage room/parking included, marble floors, stoneware floors, underfloor heating and terrazzo floors. Storage room, aluminium windows, double glazing, sea and mountain views. Do not miss it... Come and see the house of your dreams! Ref: C592 ___________ * Furniture not included in the price. * Expenses of the sale and purchase not included in the price, to be paid by the buyer in accordance with the law, except for the capital gain, to be paid by the seller.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Badia Blava-Badia Gran-Tolleric, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: With great attention to detail and spectacular qualities, the integral remodelling of an iconic 5-storey building in the purest Art Nouveau style dating from 1904 has been planned. With a new body in the existing architecture, the reform of the building fits naturally into the privileged environment in which it is located, within the beautiful historic centre of the city of Palma, surrounded by culture, history, restaurants, shops and a stone's throw from the promenade and beach areas.  The project consists of 7 homes where the modern style and the comfort of its interiors are combined with good architecture with excellent materials that enrich the whole design and elements such as hydraulic floors, exposed beams and French doors with access to charming balconies that give it a noble Mallorcan character.   This exceptional duplex penthouse forms part of the top floor of the building occupying the 4th and 5th floors connected by a private lift. With a surface area of 222 m2, the elegant property is distributed over an entrance level where a generous living room, entrance hall and a large continuous dining room and kitchen area with plenty of natural light have been arranged. A laundry area and a guest toilet complete this level. The sleeping area occupies the entire first floor, with the master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and dressing room, two complete bathrooms, a further bedroom and another room that can also be converted into a bedroom.  But the magical corner of this home is the dazzling 72m2 solarium that culminates it with private terrace where you can sunbathe, dining area, storage room and an additional guest bedroom with bathroom and access to another terrace with private pool; a privileged space overlooking the city with dazzling views that reach the sea and the green of the mountains to enjoy a holiday without leaving home.    At Balearhouse we will be delighted to assist you and give you all the information and details about this or any other of the properties that form part of this magnificent building.      FEATURES:    -Air conditioning hot/cold, underfloor heating, double glazing, fitted wardrobes, natural stone, marble, parquet.  -Integrated kitchen equipped with Gaggenau appliances.  -Balconies, terraces, solarium, private swimming pool, separate flat.    LOCATION:    -Clear views, views over the city, sea views, old town, central area, walking distance to yacht club and promenade, walking distance to beaches.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Nicolau, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Located within the beautiful historic centre of Palma, in one of the most charming and lively streets that make up a genuinely Mallorcan pedestrian area and surroundings whose atmosphere invites you to stroll through its traditional shops alongside the most avant-garde ones or to enjoy a terrace in the sun, we find this fantastic penthouse that forms part of a completely restored building where tradition and modernity are present in every detail of the construction and design.    The property is marked by a large entrance of natural light that floods the rooms with high ceilings dressed with beautiful wooden beams. It has 164 m2 of living space built to the highest quality standards, with air conditioning, underfloor heating and noble, natural materials, resulting in comfortable spaces with an elegant modern design while maintaining the aristocratic spirit with which the project was conceived. It has been distributed over 2 levels with a large private terrace of 40 m2 with personalised natural stone flooring, and developed in 2 double bedrooms, with built-in wardrobes and a TV room as well as 2 complete bathrooms. A single piece houses the living room with fireplace, dining room and modern kitchen integrated as an open space with an aesthetic code in perfect union with the rest of the room.    The building offers us an excellent outdoor area with garden and swimming pool next to corners where relaxation is guaranteed. It also has a guest flat that can be used for friends and family of the homeowners.    FEATURES:    -Air conditioning hot/cold, underfloor heating, fitted wardrobes, fireplace, parquet floor, stone floor.  -Open plan fitted kitchen.  -Community swimming pool, community garden, private terrace, storage room, lift, solarium.    LOCATION:    -Centre area, old town, next to restaurants, next to shops, 10 min. promenade, 15 min. to beaches.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Llotja, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Located in the exclusive and luxurious residential area of Sol de Mallorca, in the southwest of the island, with a relaxed atmosphere within the municipality of Calviá and next to the transparent and calm waters of the Mago beach protected by an extensive pine forest, the construction of a detached villa has been projected on a plot of 1.287 m2, which will occupy 450 m2 with a spectacular contemporary design that combines sea views, space, distribution, style and functionality carried out with authentic materials that provide it with a unique Mediterranean personality.    The fantastic project is developed in 5 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and complete bathroom. The common areas are large and diaphanous, open to the exterior thanks to the absence of walls on the façade covered by large windows that give access to the garden areas, terraces and fantastic swimming pool, outdoor places where you can enjoy the fabulous Balearic climate to the maximum. The kitchen is fully equipped and has a large garage with electronic door.     The qualities and finishes are also first class with underfloor heating, air conditioning with aerothermics, alarm system and porcelain floors.    The project is fully licensed. Balearhouse will be pleased to inform you of all the details of this new construction project.      FEATURES:    - Licensed  -Air conditioning with aerothermics, underfloor heating, porcelanic flooring, aluminium exterior carpentry, alarm system.  -Equipped kitchen.  -Terraces, garden, solarium, swimming pool, garage with automatic door.    LOCATION:    Coast, close to restaurants, close to shops and commercial premises, 15 min. from Palma.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cala Vinyes, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: New build penthouse with breathtaking sea views In Cala Major, on the outskirts of Majorca's vibrant island capital Palma, the new development Ever One is currently under construction and consists of a total of 37 modern, high quality apartments divided into two buildings - Sky and Oasis - and a beautifully designed infinity community pool and sunny terrace with spectacular sea views. Furthermore, a gym and a sauna are available to all residents. The walking distance to numerous cafés, restaurants and shops as well as to sandy beaches (Cala Major beach only 200 meters away) and the proximity to the city center and to the airport (approx. 15 minutes by car) make Ever One the ideal vacation home. The authentic marina of Cala Nova, the golf course of Bendinat and the chic marina of Puerto Portals are also only a stone's throw away. The penthouses consist of 3 double bedrooms and a spacious living and dining area with an open plan kitchen and access to a partly covered terrace and with breathtaking sea views from the living area as well as from the private roof terrace with its own pool. The high-quality equipment includes a modern open kitchen with Siemens built-in appliances, built-in closets, underfloor heating, air conditioning, oak multi-layer parquet in the bedrooms and natural stone floors in the rest of the apartment. A parking space in the underground garage is included in the purchase price of each apartment.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cala Major, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Large detached house with pool Located in Bunyola, this chalet can become your definitive home. A house where you will make new memories with your family, you will rest and you will feel comfortable from the first day. With a large garden and large dream terraces, this property will allow you to have great privacy and intimacy when you get home. The general characteristics of this chalet are the following: • Location in the municipality of Bunyola • 517 useful m² •8 double rooms • 6 full bathrooms, all en suite • 3241m² plot • South-facing pool and chillout area with hammocks. • 2 parking spaces, and 4 more on the interior terrace • Extras: Alarm with video cameras, Italian stoneware tiles imitation clay, mosquito nets on all windows, osmosis, water softener, double partition walls with thermal insulation, internet network, piped music, 2 cisterns of 85,000 liters, water storage tank 500 liters, Santanyí stone interior decorative arches, games room, fenced basketball and fronton court, circuit for walking and running around the interior of the plot, registrable plumbing, indoor and outdoor water fountain, wood oven cast iron, 44 orange trees, 3 fig trees, 1 grapefruit, 2 plum trees, 1 walnut, 5 olive trees, 1 almond tree, 1 holm oak, 2 carob trees, 1 blueberry, 1 pomegranate, 1 apricot tree, 2 laurels, 3 wayabo, palm trees, 3 lemon trees, 1 persimmon, 3 trees of Love, 1 Angel's Wing, wine cellar, chicken coop with chickens, rabbit hutches, aviary with birds, garden with broad beans, lettuce, snow peas, chickpeas, artichokes, natural compost deposits with Californian worms, doghouse. This magnificent villa located in Bunyola consists of 517 useful m² of interior. When you enter the house for the first time, you will find an impressive and welcoming hall that will make it easier for you to leave your belongings to move more easily. A large hall will lead you to an elegant and bright living-dining room. A very spacious and warm space thanks to the large windows that allow the passage of natural light, and that will allow you direct access to the garden. A large room with a differentiated dining room space, and a relaxation area, with a large sofa to meet up with friends or enjoy with your family. The kitchen, you will find it fully equipped with top quality appliances. As you can see, it has a large storage capacity and spaciousness so you don't have space problems. Its elegant and functional design will surely encourage you to innovate new recipes. In the interior barbecue, you will have a direct exit to the garden. It has a total of 8 double bedrooms. The main room, which has a fantastic en-suite bathroom, will allow you to enjoy an optimal rest. In addition, its large dimensions will allow you to organize all your belongings without worrying about space. In fact, you will have a large dressing room in the same room so that you can arrange all your clothes well organized. Its terrace and outdoor garden with pool and chill out area will encourage you to disconnect from household chores and enjoy nature and the outdoors. In addition to the elegance and freshness that this area with trees and unobstructed views brings to the house. If you want to know more information about this chalet, contact us.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Bunyola
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Under an excellent reform respecting the architectural richness that marks the historic building dating back to 1917 in which it is located, this large penthouse has all the characteristics that make it unique; a bright property with connected spaces full of irreplaceable decorative elements in perfect combination with all the comforts of modern day living, within a modern design that makes it the ideal property for those who wish to live in one of the most privileged areas of Palma, enjoying all that the city has to offer.    It is located in the beautiful historic centre of Palma, with all the charm of history, gastronomy, boutiques, traditional shops and streets full of life that this part of the city has to offer, but without renouncing the tranquillity that this penthouse enjoys.    Located on the fourth floor of the historic building, from the flat we can enjoy incredible views of the entire city, which are even more spectacular from its privileged 50 m2 terrace. The penthouse has 257 m2 perfectly distributed, with 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, two of them en suite. The living room, dining room and kitchen area are spacious, independent but connected, modern, cosy and luminous in equal parts. The restoration has been carried out using the island's own noble materials, which give the house a great personality, leaving the stone walls and the wood on the beamed ceilings visible, creating an atmosphere of wellbeing and warmth. An extraordinary property to enjoy all year round in a privileged location.    The property also has two closed parking spaces at street level for the total comfort of those who live in it.    CHARACTERISTICS:  -Air conditioning, heating by radiators, parquet floors, wooden ceilings, natural stone.  -Equipped kitchen  -Terrace, building with lift, private garage.    LOCATION:  -Centre area, old town, next to shops, next to restaurants, next to cafes and all services.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Missio - Mercat, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Penthouse with breathtaking views in Bendinat This penthouse with sea and golf views is located in Olinto, one of the most exclusive and sought after areas in Bendinat Golf. The property has three bedrooms, all with en suite bathrooms and access to the 90m2 terrace, a bright living-dining room and a spacious kitchen with views to the mountain and the Bellver castle. The Mediterranean style community is built with top quality materials and is perfectly oriented to the south and very well maintained. The second terrace / solarium of approximately 260m2, for the exclusive use of this flat, is worth mentioning. Due to its size and privacy, it is ideal for parties or events or to enjoy the sun and tranquillity. It also has 5 underground parking spaces and two storage rooms. It has hot and cold air conditioning, marble floors, 24-hour security, indoor and outdoor swimming pool, from which you can enjoy beautiful sea views. This is undoubtedly a very special property, both for its location and its views. The Bendinat area has earned a reputation for providing a premium lifestyle with easy access into Palma which is only 15 minutes drive away. Not surprisingly it has developed into one of the most sought-after locations in Mallorca offering close proximity to the city with all the inherent benefits of an exclusive and peaceful residential area. In the southwest Bendinat stands out as an ideal location to access international schools, golf courses and shopping facilities. In the northern part of Bendinat the residential areas are adjacent to the Royal Bendinat Golf course and away from the greens there is magnificent coastline with stunning sea views across the bays and beaches. Nearby, the neighboring village at Portals Nous provides quality shopping, boutiques and restaurants plus the most established Puerto Portals super yacht marina where the Spanish Royal Family and a host of celebrities can be seen every summer.

They belong to a fantastic community of very few neighbours with a lift and a wonderful swimming pool accompanied by a large solarium area, with a good number of sunbeds and Balinese beds as sunny corners where to enjoy relaxation and calm in the most absolute privacy.    There are two brand new penthouses available with interiors made with warm and pleasant materials that are perfectly integrated in the design creating spaces where you can breathe comfort. Both properties have a terrace-solarium and are distributed in an open space of living-dining room and integrated kitchen with high-end appliances, all with access to another terrace. They have two bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and are equipped with hot/cold air conditioning. description: With every luxury detail in front of Palma's beautiful Paseo Marítimo and spectacular views across the bay to the cathedral, a unique project has been carried out, the last one in this privileged space, of ten exclusive new homes marked by an impeccable and luxurious modern design combined with maximum comfort in all spaces and noble natural materials that are in line with the project are in the front line of quality.    Right in the centre of this unique environment where you can stroll around admiring the fantastic yachts, play sports or enjoy a pleasant meal in front of the sea with the old town and the most emblematic buildings of the city within walking distance, the modern building has been developed on 5 levels with two flats in each of them, all with pleasant terraces and light-filled interiors that shine in unique details and finishes. A natural colour palette has been used to create elegant and modern atmospheres and exceptional qualities with underfloor heating, domotics, built-in sound system and adjustable hot/cold air conditioning integrated by ducts. In addition, maximum energy efficiency has been taken into account throughout the project.    The flats range in size from 113 to 160 m2 and have 2 or 3 bedrooms, all with built-in wardrobes, as well as 2 or 3 bathrooms, some of them en suite. The living room, dining room and integrated kitchen are bright, modern and cosy spaces with direct access to the beautiful terrace. description: Fantastic three-room apartment in the center of Palma de Mallorca. The apartment is located just 2 minutes walk from Plaza de España, on Margalida Caimari street. The spacious bathroom combines a large shower and a huge bathtub, has a window and ventilation system.The large and glazed terrace includes two enclosed spaces where a washing machine, gas installations and other utilities are hidden. The apartment is equipped with gas heating (radiators are located in all rooms), gas water heater, air conditioning, municipal water and electricity.Construction works were completed in 2021.A complete replacement of the electrical wiring, plumbing and gas pipes was carried out.The walls were insulated with heat and moisture resistant materials.New climalit windows with the best heat, moisture and sound insulation were installed.The apartment has modern energy-saving lighting and high quality laminate flooring.All furniture, kitchen, household appliances and plumbing are completely new! The apartment has an armored entrance door with triple lock. There is a video surveillance and alarm system with a sensor for breaking the front door. This luxury apartment is fully equipped and prepared for the comfort of living. The apartment will be sold with all furniture and decor. PRICE: EURO 485,000.

description: This property with sea views is located in a quiet street in San Agustin and is a rare find in the sought after area. It’s a spacious house with its 375m2 and you have several terraces to enjoy the stunning view from. The property has got great potential and you can purchase the plot next to to expand the garden.  From the spacious entrance you’ll enter a large living room with an open fire, a dining area connected to the outside terrace from where you can enjoy meals as well while enjoying the sea view. There is a fully equipped kitchen separate spacious enough for a dining table. On this first floor you have a guest bedroom with bathroom as well.  On the upper floor you have four bedrooms with two bathroom, and the master bedroom with an en suite bathroom. Here you also have a large terrace with sea views and there is also access to the roof terrace with stunning views of the sea.  The house was built in 2000 in a Mallorquin style and the adjacent plot can separately be purchased and could be used for eg. a pool area or garden area.  Other features include parking, double glazed ISO windows, aluminum shutters, ceramic floors, oil central heating, air conditioning, a 300 m3 cistern.  This is a great opportunity to acquire a large house in San Agustin.  San Agustín is a very cosy area with an interesting mix of restaurants, bars and close to water activities in the well known port Cala Nova. San Agustín is an area that is active all year round but has a tranquil feel to it with its closure to the sea. A wonderful place to live if you want closure to the city Palma but still a calm lifestyle with closure to the sea. ____  We are Demiaz, with the vision of bringing new light to the real estate industry in Mallorca through the combined eyes of a real estate agent and an interior designer. On a mission to relabel what a real estate agency has to offer by adding an interior design approach that will allow you to visualize and understand the big picture of how your next property will take shape. It is of great importance to us to connect you to the right place and with our personalised "Property Search" service, we will find you the right property with your lifestyle, ideas, and wishes in mind. We will help you from the first interest to complete the procedures and make this personal investment as simple and safe as possible. Get connected and find out more about what we do on our website demiaz. com.

description: If you want to start the day with a dip in the sea and have two beaches to choose from, then this is the location for you! In addition, this is an area that is undergoing major changes approved by the municipality to raise the level of the area's visitors and tidy up the entire area. Slowly, but surely, the changes are going through and in a few years it will give the homes here a higher value. If you do not want to live here yourself during the change period, you can buy now, rent out for at least 1 month at a time (= legal) as the home stands now, and in a few years when you feel that you want the home for yourself, refurbish it and move into a by renting a part-paid home. The apartment, which is located on the 14th floor, at the top of the property, has an elevator and a living area of 91 sqm which is well distributed. You enter a separate hallway from where you go further into the separate kitchen to the right and living room where the living and dining area is straight in with a view directly to the sea. From the living room area, there is access to a terrace of 9 sqm and in the middle of the kitchen and living room area, there is a fireplace for cozy winter evenings with a view! There are two bedrooms with good space for a double bed and both have en-suite bathrooms. The larger bedroom also has access to the second terrace of 9 sqm. The entire floor has ceramic tiles on the floors which provide coolness that is needed for a larger part of the year. Here is also air conditioning for both cooling and heating. Parking space can be purchased for €15,000 for an open garage space, but you also have a closed garage space incl. storage room of approx. 30 m2 in the same garage for €35,000. A well-stocked Aldi grocery store is located in the immediate area and in addition, there are pharmacies, lots of simple cafes, bars, restaurants, and small shops that sell everything between heaven and earth. The association is well maintained and located in Torrenova, a small headland on the border between Magaluf and Palmanova, overlooking both the Magaluf and Palmanova beaches which are long and wide. The small island of Sa Porrassa can also be seen from one of the terraces and in addition to Calvia's coastline where you see the sunrise and follow it for days, you also see the Tramuntana mountains where the sun sets in the evening. The municipality of Calvia, of which the area is a part, is the island's most economically well-off municipality. It is a municipality that in recent years has constantly developed and improved the municipality's service to make it even more attractive for families and tourists seeking a higher quality. As an example, it can be mentioned that it is the municipality on the island where you will get through a building permit application in about 6 months something that takes up to years in other municipalities. We have two almost identical penthouses with fantastic panoramic views for sale. The two apartments are neighbors on the top floor and the biggest difference is that the floor presented above has an open kitchen while the other has a closed kitchen. Square meters and pretty much everything else is the same, the exact view is slightly varied. Both homes are in a condition to be moved into immediately if you appreciate the style. Visits are given on Saturday mornings. Palma's historic center with its beautiful sandstone cathedral is less than a 20-minute drive away, and there are also motorway buses. It takes about 30 minutes to drive to the airport.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Magaluf, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Today we present you a beautiful property in one of the most charming population areas of the Island of Mallorca, a corner without a doubt totally idyllic. This is located in the heart of "Serra de Tramuntana", in the town of Galilea, at 400 meters of altitude, a nucleus that is part of the municipality of Puigpunyent; so it has idyllic views of the mountains, in addition its area full of nature is one of the most visited tourist attractions on the island and the main mountain range of the Balearic Islands, which for its fortune and that of those who can enjoy it, was declared a World Heritage Site by UNESCO in the category of Cultural Landscape, due to the richness of its natural systems and cultural elements, so if you are visiting Mallorca you cannot stop walking around it, as it offers multiple activities and routes adapted to all audiences and tastes, and if you also fall in love with the house that we show you here, your visit to Galilea will have changed your life. The house is located just 30 minutes by car from the capital of the island, Palma de Mallorca and 40 from the airport. And then we describe it: The first thing you can enjoy when you get there is its large southeast-facing terrace with splendid views of the mountains that surround it, since it is located on a high area of the land. The house has two floors, with 211 m2 built and a plot of 2,621 m2 of land. It enjoys high ceilings and exposed beams, with a character that is both characteristic of Mallorca and of a mountain house, giving its rooms good sensations of spaciousness. On the main floor we find its spacious living room with fireplace that we will access from the terrace, and the independent kitchen to which we will also have access from the same terrace and from the porch as well as from inside the living room.This floor also has a large bedroom with a built-in wardrobe, a large bathroom with a bathtub and direct access to your garage. On the upper floor there are two double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, a full bathroom with a bathtub and a room that could be used as a fourth room, which is currently used as a study space and/or an open gym. The house enjoys oil central heating, water softener, double glazed windows, tiled floors and a storage room. We invite you to see this beautiful property carefully in the virtual tour. And we await your call! This property has been certified by ABSI (Balearic Association of Real Estate Services) which means that the marketing agency has supervised the necessary documentation for the sale and that the property is part of the ABSI multi-exclusive property exchange.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Puigpunyent
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Major de Galilea

description: This pleasant apartment is sure to adapt to the needs of your family. By location, close to schools, highway, parks, swimming pool, community playground, due to its spaciousness, large living room, dining room, balcony, kitchen with pantry and gallery. 3 large bedrooms, 1 with bathroom en suite, 1 full bathroom, hall with closet. and the possibilities of improvement that you want to give it. The farm, built in 1990, is in very good condition. with good neighbors. The communal areas are clean and well maintained. The pool and patio area is spacious and clear. The parking space is next to the storage room. heating, a/c. The farm has a community softener and the house with a private one. If you want to visit this apartment, do not hesitate to contact our agency. Fincas Molina offers it to you Exclusively.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Modern, newly built house with generous living area, 140m2 divided over two levels, with additional 70m2 basement and 135m2 outdoor terrace with 30m2 private saltwater swimming pool.    The property is located on a quiet street in the residential area of Son Espanyolet, close to the vibrant and highly popular Santa Catalina area with the food market, tennis club restaurants and bars - one of the most sought-after postcodes in Palma de Mallorca.    The highlight of this house is the ground floor as the open plan living space offers a beautiful flow into the large outdoor terrace and the 30m2 swimming pool with an outdoor shower and a cosy sunbathing area surrounded by plants designed to offer a private and natural feeling. The kitchen will be of high quality with a luxury island, perfect for socialising.  Additionally, on the ground floor, we will find a guest bathroom and a garage with direct access to the house.  All 3 bedrooms will be located on the upper level, the master bedroom en-suite with a large walk-in wardrobe and windows overlooking the terrace and pool area. The other two large double bedrooms are equipped with fitted wardrobes, a shared bathroom is also located on this floor.  The basement will consist of a Media room, Gym and laundry room, an additional bathroom and a large storage room.    All rooms will be equipped with A/C, light grey marble floors throughout the property and underfloor heating.    This exceptional townhouse will be delivered in April 2023, and it will be ready to move in.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Espanyolet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house in Calle Barrera

description: Recently, completely renovated, bright and airy apartment with walking distance to Palma Sport & Tennis Club, to Pins padel, 5 schools and the trendy area of Santa Catalina with lots of bars and restaurants. The apartment is located on the top floor of the property and consists of 3 bedrooms, a bathroom, a guest toilet, kitchen and living room with terrace outside. On top of the home is the common roof terrace which has a fantastic view and is not used by any resident. 2 gates away, a neighbor who lives on the 2nd floor (of 3) with the permission from the community have made part of the terrace on top of that building into a lounge area and an outdoor gym. This can be done here too, BUT you do not own the terrace. The home is open, well-planned with white walls and floor surfaces of gray microcement. The apartment is continuous, which means that you can have cross-sections and get in fresh air. When you enter the apartment you will find a hall and directly to the right of the front door, separated from the rest of the home a bedroom that can also be an excellent guest room or home office. The hall turns directly into a dining room / open kitchen. This is the apartment's hub. The kitchen / dining room is airy and has plenty of space for a dining table. The apartment has three bedrooms where two of the bedrooms share a large bathroom opposite the bedrooms. The bathroom, which is in a modern style and with a sober natural color scheme, has a large bath, wall-hung toilet, heated towel rail and a large sink. Next to the bathroom there is a guest toilet where the installations for a washing machine is prepared. The living room which is spacious and airy is located opposite the kitchen. Here, if you remove a wall, you can get open between the kitchen and living room and get a very large, open social area that ends with the terrace of 10 sqm running along the living room and one of the bedrooms. On the terrace you can enjoy a glass of wine in the sun overlooking the cathedral. The home is completely renovated, everything is brand new and the home is empty since the renovation and waiting for its new owner! The property is located, on a quiet street between Pins Padel and Palma Sport & Tennis Club and close to 5 schools. You walk to Santa Catalina in less than 10 minutes. With walking distance to "everything" the apartment is a perfect holiday home and also works well for rent, minimum 1 month rental is completely legal. From an ROI point of view, it is currently a somewhat "unknown" location that makes the home measured by Palma dimensions, cheap. The city is growing. The French school, Lycée Français de Palma, has just moved to the family area, which is a little further up the road next to the highway. The school has a good reputation and will attract more families to move to the area. A closed hospital about 2 blocks from this home is being rebuilt into a nicer nursing home / hospice where a large park will also be built. Mercadona = large grocery chain has recently rebuilt and renovated the store located in the immediate area. About 3 blocks further away, a Scandinavian construction company is building 3 properties with luxury apartments, most of which have already been sold, even though it is more than 1 year until the first move-in. All this together increases the value and interest in the area.

description: This property with incomparable sea views is located in the center of the picturesque town of Banyalbufar, Mallorca. The flat is located on the fourth floor (without elevator) of a multi-family house, which consists of a total of 4 floors and 4 residential units. The distribution of the living space of approximately 112 m² is as follows: Living room and dining room with fireplace, separate kitchen, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms. The impressive west-facing terraces, from which you can enjoy fantastic sunsets, complete the offer. Other features: Stone floor, fireplace, double glazed windows with PVC frames, balcony with utility room. Please contact us for more information or a visit. All information is without guarantee.

description: Finca 4.700m2 near Palma. 4 bedrooms, apartment annex, gym, sauna, pelota, warehouse. Barbecue with fireplace, pantry, bathroom and kitchen. Fruit Trees.

description: A home for an artist, photographer, musician, eccentric or for those who want a lot of space and a personal home. Here is plenty of space to live, work and have a great social life! This home has endless possibilities and it can definitely be moved into as it is! Just over 300 m2 studio in an industrial style à la New York where today it is a fantastic residence combined with an artist and music studio. A different and inspiring creative environment with a ceiling height of just over 4 meters and a huge open area! Today there is a fully equipped, modern open kitchen, an airy bedroom with curtains as walls and a separate, modern closed bathroom. The entire one long wall is from floor to ceiling a single long section of glass and part of the opposite wall also has a large window area from floor to ceiling. All the walls are creme white, the ceiling is painted in two shades of black and the studio is flooded with natural light. The studio is on the first floor, i. e. one step up and has complete privacy. From the public stairwell, there is a separate entrance that leads into a private entrance hall and a wide, stylish staircase with floor-to-ceiling windows when you enter up to the living floor. On the floor plan you also see the smaller neighboring apartment of 150 m2, it is the larger part of the drawing that is this residence. It is possible to buy 1 or 2 parking spaces at €28,000/piece in the property's garage and/or to rent 1 space in the same garage. Adjacent to this property is a run down and closed padel court with associated pool area. The community have received information that it is now a new owner who is waiting for planning permission for renovation. When the renovation is completed, it will increase the value of this community too. The location is directly above Can Barbara, the small bay that enters from the sea just before the Porto Pi shopping center to which it takes about 7-8 minutes to walk and where, in addition to the island's largest Carrefour grocery store, there is all imaginable shopping, restaurants, cafes, cinema etc.  To Santa Catalina with its wide range of restaurants and bars it is a 15 minute walk and to the cathedral and the luxurious shopping streets it is another 10 minutes walk. Palma's beautiful harbor is 5 minutes, straight down, and the airport is about 20 minutes drive away.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Terreno, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Luxury Majorquin finca style near Palma and Puntiró golf-course with its own olive farm, which includes over 500 olive trees.  The property is situated in a calm and peaceful part of the island and offers an olive farm which has been running for several years now and can be develop into a very prolific business. The property also offer the possibility of turning it into a rustic hotel.  540 m2 of constructed area on a 71,000 m2 of land, with 5 bedrooms and 5 bathrooms.  Additional Features:  This property includes all features a luxury property can offer, such as: guest apartment, fitted kitchen, Mediterranean garden, swimming pool, terraces, garage and parking, storage room, fireplace, panoramic mountain view, air conditioning, wooden beams, etc..

description: This cozy apartment has already been partially renovated and is located in the romantic district of Genova. The apartment enjoys a dreamy view of the sea and Bellver Castle. A large living-dining room with an integrated open kitchen and access to a terrace with incredible, unobstructed views. The ceilings are very high and all rooms are flooded with light. The apartment is distributed in 2 bedrooms, a bathroom, a small garden and several outdoor terraces that can be reformed at will. Genova is very quiet and has a perfect connection to the motorway, the beaches and the center of Palma.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: We welcome you to this spectacular opportunity to live in a large residential estate, located in one of the most beautiful areas on the slope of the "Serra de la Tramuntana! With 451 m2 of construction. This property offers you four spacious and comfortable bedrooms, two full bathrooms, a spacious kitchen with an office area, an office that gives direct access to the exterior that leads to the building that houses the Barbecue.It also has a utility room, and three fantastic areas differentiated between two living rooms and a dining room, with a fireplace included and beautiful views of the valley, as well as a closed garage where you can protect your vehicles from the elements. The distribution of the entire house is ideal for a pleasant and comfortable life. Its hall will welcome you to the first space dedicated to the living room, this is the one where the fireplace is located and has direct access to the terrace with truly impressive views.From this room you will access the space for dining room with a large window and the third space that is currently used as an office area and boasts a spectacular viewpoint.From the hall you can also directly enter the utility room and the kitchen with office to be able to download your purchases directly.Your kitchen is a space brimming with light, since it not only has exterior windows but also has an interior patio brimming with plants, making it a place that is perfect for preparing delicious dishes, immersed in sensations of nature and peace.And lastly, this hall also gives you access to the different levels of the property that house the toilet and night rooms. Externally, the farm remains charming and cosy, thanks to its covered outdoor kitchen area with barbecue, thanks to another area where you can use your garden, and thanks to a pool that will make your dreams come true on an island where for 9 months of the year you can give yourself incredible warm baths. Do not miss the opportunity to live in a privileged area such as Ses Rotgetes in the municipality of Esporles, close to all services and transport in the town, and with spectacular views of the entire valley. Call us and we will invite you to come visit it and discover for yourself that you are going to fall in love with what will be your next home! This property has been certified by ABSI (Balearic Association of Real Estate Services) which means that the marketing agency has supervised the necessary documentation for the sale and that the property is part of the ABSI multi-exclusive property exchange.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Esporles
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Vial 1

description: In the heart of Palma's historic center, modern design apartment totally refurbished using the highest quality brands and materials. 116 m2 of living area, with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, one of the bedroom being en suite and equipped with walk-in wardrobe. Further features: - Domotised Mitsubishi duct air conditioning and city gas heating - Irsap design radiators - Kitchen fitted with Italian Doimo cucine furnitures, Carrara marble and Bosch appliances - Natural wood parquet flooring - Thermic and acoustic isolating facades and walls - Flos lighting brand - Kyria, Tres and Laufen washbasins/lavabos, taps and sanitaries.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This immaculate villa for sale is in an elevated position in Bonanova-Palma with excellent sea views and faces south. The house is built over 3 floors on a plot of about 526m2 with terraces that surround the villa. In the basement is a very spacious garage of about 79 sq mts for 2 or 3 cars, a laundry room and a storeroom. The basement has an interior staircase which communicates with the house. On the main floor there is an entrance hallway, a lounge-dining room with large sliding glass windows which give access to an extensive terrace, a spacious furnished and equipped kitchen, a bedroom with fitted wardrobes which is currently being used as an office, and a bathroom. On the first floor there are 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (1 en suite), 2 of the bedrooms have fitted wardrobes and the master suite has a dressing room with fitted wardrobes. The villa has been very well maintained and enjoys lots of sun and natural light all day. It has central heating, hot/cold air-conditioning, double glazing with anti-mosquito screens, parquet floors, 2 water deposits, 1 to collect rainwater of about 30m3 and the other for mains water of about 17m3. Locality and places of interest La Bonanova is a quiet, much sought-after residential area, very close to the centre of Palma de Majorca. The area is well-known for its various prestigious international schools and its proximity to the Porto Pi shopping centre and the forest of Bellver. Characteristics.

description: Penthouse in the old town of Palma in a quiet area just a step away from the bars and shops. The city center is a 5-minute walk from the property. The 170 m2 living area is distributed as follows, there is a large living room with open kitchen, then there are 3 bedrooms in total with 2 en-suite bathrooms and one for guests near the entrance. Other extras are: parquet floors, air conditioning hot / cold, open plan living room, private terrace, central location, internet and TV, recently renovated. Please contact us for more information or to arrange a viewing. The information in this exposé has been provided by the owner, so we cannot be held responsible for the accuracy of this data.

description: *Exclusive Marketing - Kensington Properties Only* Newly renovated apartment with a communal terrace in the old town of Palma de Mallorca. It has an ideal location on a fairly wide street (so a lot of light enters the apartment) and without car traffic, a few steps from an important market in an area where it is easy to rent a parking space. The building is in good condition. It has a sunny community roof terrace (about 55 m²) with free access. The apartment is on the corner and has windows on two sides. It has just been comprehensively reformed and with great taste (new among others: distribution, floors, windows, kitchen, bathroom, air conditioning, pipes, electrical installation). Conclusion: an apartment with a good location, with a successful distribution and very stylish... at a reasonable price. Distribution of the house (approx. 67.68 m²): living-dining room with American kitchen, 2 bedrooms (1 currently an office), 1 bathroom, storage room. Equipment: kitchen with all electrical appliances (incl. dishwasher), parquet floors, fitted wardrobes, hot/cold air conditioning. Contact us for more information (we have plans) or for a visit. We will not assume any responsibility for the information provided in this description.

description: Unique 3-storey property on a quiet street around the corner from Santa Catalina's renown market hall. Completely renovated with elegance and preserved charm, light and airy. The apartment, which is located on the second/top floor, has high ceilings with beautiful beams in their natural color and the style is classic chic meets bohemian chic/Ibiza. You enter into a nice hall way with good storage on the left towards a separate bathroom which also serves as a guest toilet. To the right is a spacious bedroom with room for a double bed. Directly in from the hall is a very large social area consisting of a living room and a dining area on either side of the well-equipped open kitchen with a bar counter and space for guests to sit. Next to the dining area on the left is the master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and outside the dining area is the spacious covered balcony of 10 sqm so with enough room to enjoy meals here as well. There is a glass wall between the balcony and the dining area. At the opposite end of this large room, off the living area, there are two French balconies which allows air and light to flow into the room. From the living room, behind the kitchen, is the stairs up to the private roof terrace of 30 m2 with a view over roof tops and towards the sea. A perfect place to cool off in the warm Mediterranean nights and it's perfect for long dinners. The home has air conditioning units in all rooms, the windows are double glazed and have shutters, under the stair to the terrace is a storage room. The entire floor has been renovated with craftsmanship and high quality. This property is located in the heart of Santa Catalina with its plethora of lively bars and restaurants and yet you can enjoy peace and quiet not only inside your home, but also on both the balcony and terrace.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca

description: We present you a house located in a house with a Majorcan character, also with double height interior and free ceiling, so it has no neighbors above. It is excellently located, it is close to the exclusive area of the "Pueblo Español" and the Paseo Marítimo, (the neighborhood of Santa Catalina) a very sought-after and quiet area of the island's capital, Palma. It should be said that in the area of this property there are several of the best schools in the capital. What could be your next home, consists of 174 m2 and is distributed over two floors, also including a beautiful terrace on the ground floor and with enough privacy to have your own paradise within the city with its own lemon tree. In it, enjoying moments of calm with family and friends will be easy for you since it has an upper terrace in a solarium on the second floor. This wonderful property includes no less than 6 bedrooms, two of them on the ground floor, something that undoubtedly represents many many advantages for any family, there are not always bedrooms on the lower floor, where there is also a hall followed by a spacious living/dining room integrated into the kitchen with a useful pantry. Next to the stairs there is 1 courtesy toilet, and on the upper floor you will find a bright living room or ideal office area and a large full bathroom. The remaining 4 bedrooms are on this second floor, all of them are doubles and one is currently being used as a dressing room. It has all kinds of services nearby, supermarkets, schools, pharmacy, banks, sports areas and you can enjoy the bars and restaurants of Santa Catalina a few meters away!. You will also have excellent connections with public transport. If you already like your photographs, we are waiting for you to show them to you because you will like them much more during the visit! This property has been certified by ABSI -Balearic Association of Real Estate Services- which means that the marketing agency has supervised the necessary documentation for the sale and that the property is part of the ABSI multi-exclusive property exchange.

description: If you want to start the day with a dip in the sea and have two beaches to choose from, then this is the location for you! In addition, this is an area that is undergoing major changes approved by the municipality to raise the level of the area's visitors and tidy up the entire area. Slowly, but surely, the changes are going through and in a few years it will give the homes here a higher value. If you do not want to live here yourself during the change period, you can buy now, rent out for at least 1 month at a time (= legal) as the home stands now, and in a few years when you feel that you want the home for yourself, refurbish it and move into a by renting a part-paid home. The apartment, which is located on the 14th floor, at the top of the property, has an elevator and a living area of 91 sqm which is well distributed. You enter a separate hallway from where you go further into the separate kitchen to the right and living room where the living and dining area is straight in with a view directly to the sea. From the living room area, there is access to a terrace of 9 sqm and in the middle of the kitchen and living room area, there is a fireplace for cozy winter evenings with a view! There are two bedrooms with good space for a double bed and both have en-suite bathrooms. The larger bedroom also has access to the second terrace of 9 sqm. The entire floor has ceramic tiles on the floors which provide coolness that is needed for a larger part of the year. Here is also air conditioning for both cooling and heating. Parking space can be purchased for €15,000 for an open garage space, but you also have a closed garage space incl. storage room of approx. 30 m2 in the same garage for €35,000. A well-stocked Aldi grocery store is located in the immediate area and in addition, there are pharmacies, lots of simple cafes, bars, restaurants, and small shops that sell everything between heaven and earth. The association is well maintained and located in Torrenova, a small headland on the border between Magaluf and Palmanova, overlooking both the Magaluf and Palmanova beaches which are long and wide. The small island of Sa Porrassa can also be seen from one of the terraces and in addition to Calvia's coastline where you see the sunrise and follow it for days, you also see the Tramuntana mountains where the sun sets in the evening. The municipality of Calvia, of which the area is a part, is the island's most economically well-off municipality. It is a municipality that in recent years has constantly developed and improved the municipality's service to make it even more attractive for families and tourists seeking a higher quality. As an example, it can be mentioned that it is the municipality on the island where you will get through a building permit application in about 6 months something that takes up to years in other municipalities. We have two almost identical penthouses with fantastic panoramic views for sale. The two apartments are neighbors on the top floor and the biggest difference is that the floor presented above has an open kitchen while the other has a closed kitchen. Square meters and pretty much everything else is the same, the exact view is slightly varied. Both homes are in a condition to be moved into immediately if you appreciate the style. Visits are given on Saturday mornings. Palma's historic center with its beautiful sandstone cathedral is less than a 20-minute drive away, and there are also motorway buses. It takes about 30 minutes to drive to the airport.

And the last access from the hall, will give way to the rest of your new corner on this island. The kitchen has an office area and direct access to its utility room, which is glazed. Next you will find one of its two complete bathrooms in the corridor, also next to it there is a small room in which it is worth noting that you have the possibility of recovering a toilet, since the toilets are currently uninstalled because it is used as a storage closet. Another double room follows in the corridor and finally there is the large Master room with bathroom en suite and with the same views as the entire living room. The very good south orientation that this property offers you, its wooden flooring, the comfort of its air conditioning, and the fact of being in a building with two elevators and a doorman, plus a garage space on the same building with direct access from the elevator, will make this property complete. A dream just 10 minutes by car from the Paseo Marítimo and the center of Palma. Let's go to see her? If you decide yes, come with your suitcase, because I don't think you want to leave it.

Externally, the farm remains charming and cosy, thanks to its covered outdoor kitchen area with barbecue, thanks to another area where you can use your garden, and thanks to a pool that will make your dreams come true on an island where for 9 months of the year you can give yourself incredible warm baths. Do not miss the opportunity to live in a privileged area such as Ses Rotgetes in the municipality of Esporles, close to all services and transport in the town, and with spectacular views of the entire valley. Call us and we will invite you to come visit it and discover for yourself that you are going to fall in love with what will be your next home!
