description: La Calatrava is currently the most popular neighborhood in the Old Town of Palma. In its quiet streets and behind its magnificent gates, the traces of our Majorcan culture are hidden. Roots that are still present in this neighborhood that welcomed Jews, Christians and Muslims. It is precisely this admiration for the Majorcan culture and its history that led the current owner of this duplex to undertake a challenging renovation project that allowed the discovery and preservation of important archaeological elements. Thus, the ground floor and the first floor were unified in a duplex of open spaces with a relaxing and comfortable atmosphere. A discreet glass door at street level leads to the hall of the apartment. We advance and soon the space opens up and is flooded with light that passes through the glass structures present on the ceiling, floor and walls. The historical marés arches, carefully illuminated, frame a room that combines luxury with the calm of its natural materials. It is in this space that the Gaggenau designer kitchen is integrated into a bright dining room flanked by two charming patios. The dining room preserves the remains of an old Muslim leather tannery. Next to the kitchen we find an impressive wine cellar which is actually an old Arab water tank. On this floor we also find a complete bathroom, the laundry and the machine room that houses a sophisticated aerothermal system that provides heating, underfloor heating, air conditioning and hot water that allows savings of up to 60% on electricity bills without polluting the environment since it does not require fuel. Carefully designed stairs lead us to the first floor where light is once again the protagonist. First of all we find the living room with two rooms and access to a sunny terrace. A stone fireplace, which has been preserved intact, contributes to the well-being that this room offers. On this floor we also find a double bedroom with access to the terrace, a full bathroom and the master bedroom with a dressing room and a magnificent bathroom that invites you to take long baths. It is undoubtedly a jewel that is the result of appreciation for our culture, the efficiency and precision of its restorers. A home where the traditional and the contemporary come together and that offers comfort and well-being while respecting the environment.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Calatrava, Palma de Mallorca

description: Ladies and gentlemen we present this wonderful sea view villa with pool at Sol de Mallorca in the municipality of Calvià with international schools and golf courses just a few minutes drive away. This wonderful villa has been finished with the personal taste of the owners who have combined with class and style materials that perfectly complement the colors that this wonderful island gives all year round. You enter the property by car, which has 2 large parking spaces. You can reach the villa by a short and very elegant staircase or by the private glass and steel elevator, which is a real touch of style. Upon entering you are enveloped by the light and colors of the whole house which with a very sugestivo and pleasant entrance. On the second floor as you enter the entrance on the stairs, we have two bedrooms with en suite bathrooms, one really large and cozy double with fitted closets and the other single both with access to a large sea view terrace with crystal so as not to limit the view of the bay and the hills. Going down the large staircase, created to be a real piece of furniture and lit by large windows, we descend to the heart of the house, the great room with a porch on the pool with waterfall. With a large opening on the hall, we find a refined modern-style kitchen with all kinds of technological solutions with large windows to illuminate all the rooms that are part of the level on the pool. Next to the hall, this property offers another wonderful bedroom overlooking the pool with an en suite bathroom that is a true work of art for the senses. The porch is very sheltered overlooking the pool and, like the entire property, enjoys much privacy. You can access the pool directly from the lounge and experience the wonder of the world's most beautiful island together with friends all year round. The pool is modern in style with cascading water and sea views and the materials accompany the entire property in a triumph of truly unique class and style. Agent KING MALLORCA  Dr Matteo Belotti.

Despite its secluded location, it is well connected to the public transport network thanks to its proximity to the airport and Palma de Mallorca. The surrounding beaches, marinas and golf courses can be found in the immediate vicinity. The villa is stylishly furnished to a high standard and has an elevator. On the upper entrance level you will find a spacious living/dining room with access to a large partially covered terrace with Jacuzzi and stunning sea and panoramic views. In addition, there is a kitchen with dining area, a bedroom with private bathroom, a guest toilet and a utility and storage room. The pool level offers three more bedrooms, each with its own bathroom and various dressing rooms, as well as a spacious master suite and a separate guest area with living/dining room, open kitchen and two more bedrooms, each with its own bathroom. On the lower level is an underground garage with space for up to eight vehicles, as well as technical and storage rooms. The spacious terrace areas with barbecue area, the breathtaking pool landscape and the incomparable views make this property a unique luxury home that meets the highest standards.

description: High-quality new build apartment in Son Dameto In a quiet and urban residential location in Palma's Son Dameto district, only a few minutes' drive from the city centre, the modern new construction project Son Piza II is currently being built with a total of 17 apartments with 3-4 bedrooms and 2-4 bathrooms. The two very spacious 4-bedroom garden apartments not only offer plenty of space for the whole family indoors, but also in the extensive private garden. The three penthouses include great roof terraces with private pools. In addition, all apartments have spacious covered terraces. Further features of the units include: Modern kitchens by Porcelanosa with Bosch built-in appliances, hot/cold air conditioning, underfloor heating, electric shutters in the bedrooms, numerous built-in wardrobes, laminate flooring and bathrooms by Porcelanosa. One underground parking space and one storage room per unit are also included in the purchase price (2 garage parking spaces for the penthouses). From the garage and the entrance area, each apartment can be reached comfortably by an elevator. Due to the very central yet quiet location, this project is particularly suitable for year-round living on the island. Not only is the centre of the vibrant island capital very close, but schools, sports facilities and health centres can also be found in the immediate vicinity. Furthermore, two large supermarkets are virtually right on the doorstep.

description: Refurbished 19th century manor house in old town of Palma. If you are looking for an exclusive new home in the center of Palma, you should read on. With an unbeatable location, this house built in 1900 and completely renovated can be your future home. Its general characteristics are as follows: • Palma • 890 m2 usable area • 8 double bedrooms • 8 bathrooms • Private indoor swimming pool • Upper terrace with sea and old town views • Gymnasium • Direct elevator  • Parking included • Condition: refurbished Living in an exclusive apartment in the center of Palma is an absolute privilege. With an area of 890 m2, it has been distributed in 4 floors. This house will not only bring you to live in the center of Palma, but will allow you to disconnect and enjoy your hobbies at home. When you enter through the front door and see the spectacular stairs, you will realize the amount of details that make this house unique. Today, in addition to a spectacular and sophisticated main living room, this house has up to 3 living rooms for you to enjoy your free time watching TV. The main living room is a room with lots of natural light. That lighting, the beautiful decoration and its first qualities will make this room one of your favorites. Although you will also have two more living rooms to take advantage of. While you can still use them as auxiliary rooms, you can also set up a cinema room or office, for example. It also has multiple spaces where you can meet with friends and family and enjoy long evenings. Thanks to the different tables and rooms, your house will be the favorite place for your friends and family to meet. The kitchen and bathrooms have the same design: white tones and little decoration. Some of the bathrooms have the nice peculiarity of keeping the beams on the ceilings. This detail is preserved in other rooms of the house and gives a distinctive touch to the house. The kitchen has been designed to make cooking as easy as possible. It has the best appliances and the best qualities in all its furniture. In the kitchen you will also have a television to continue watching your favorite series even when it is time to cook. If you want this house to be your new home, call 971888018 and ask us or fill out the contact form.

description: Semi-detached villa in the quiet community of Ses Rotes Velles - Santa Ponsa.  Santa Ponça offers a wide variety of offers and according to the residents, it also enjoys the best climate in Mallorca. Undoubtedly this semi-detached house will allow its new owners to live in one of the most demanded areas due to its great boom in the 70s. Its general characteristics are the following: • Ses Rotes Velles, Santa Ponsa • 102 m² usable area • 3 double bedrooms • 1 bathroom (1st floor) and 1 toilet (first floor) • 2 gardens: front (20m²) and back (35m²) • Covered parking of 26m². • Extras: air conditioning, fitted closets, barbecue, laundry room Located just 15 minutes from Palma, Santa Ponça, this semi-detached house has a beautiful family beach of more than half a kilometer long, as well as small coves in the immediate vicinity. This semi-detached house with a total of 102 m², has distributed its rooms in two heights. As you access by a small staircase to your new home, on the first floor you will find a spacious and bright living room. A warm space thanks to the large windows that allow the passage of natural light. A large room with the dining space differentiated, and the relaxation area, with a large sofa to meet with friends or enjoy your family. From the living room you can access a nice outdoor porch. From the living room you will be in contact with the dining area, which is located in the same room but is a little differentiated. Its large windows with unobstructed views make this dining room a very special place to eat with privileged views and a great luminosity. On this first floor you will also find the kitchen, which is independent and you will find it fully equipped. As you can see, it has a large storage capacity and spaciousness so you will not have space problems. Its functional design will surely encourage you to innovate new recipes. In the kitchen you will also have access to the laundry room, an ideal space for cleaning and hanging clothes. On the upper floor there are 3 bedrooms and 1 full bathroom. With a living area of 46.28 m². From here you will also have access to a beautiful and elegant private garden of 35 m². All bedrooms have built-in closets and great natural lighting thanks to its east orientation and large windows. Its outdoor gardens will encourage you to disconnect from household chores and enjoy nature and the outdoors. In addition to the elegance and freshness that gives the house these areas. The central garden has 20 m² and the back garden 35 m². Santa Ponsa will provide you with multiple options of restaurants, sports facilities, leisure facilities, stores, professional tennis courts, picturesque beaches and marine reserves such as El Toro and Illes Malgrats and a long etcetera that you can only discover and enjoy here. If you want to know more information about this semi-detached house located in Ses Rotes Velles, call 971888018 and ask us or fill out the contact form.

description: This newly built, modern luxury villa is located in Nova Santa Ponsa and offers plenty of privacy, indoor and outdoor space. Close to golf courses, marinas, beaches as well as the city of Palma and the airport which is only 20 minutes by car. The villa offers a total of five spacious bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms and built -in wardrobes.  Once entering the double garage you can access the impressive entrance hall with open gallery, here you'll find a spacious living/dining area with a luxury, open plan, fitted kitchen, also on this level there is a bedroom with a bathroom ensuite as well as an office and a guest toilet. On the first floor, accessed by lift or stairs, is the spacious primary bedroom with en-suite bathroom, dressing room and terrace. There are also three guest bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms, wardrobes, all that have access to terraces. The outdoor area offers a 25m swimming pool with a jacuzzi, as well as a flat lawn and several covered and open terraces, which offer plenty of space for sunbathing or relaxing in the shade. description: Here you wake up listening to the gente sound of waves while you can see from far away how the busy life in Palma starts. Right where the quiet part of Mallorca starts, in sea frontline, is this luxury villa located which was build in 2002. In just 15 minutes you reach the airport, the Yacht Club of Arenal is 10 minutes away and to several beaches and bays you arrive in less than 5 minutes. The villa stands out for its qualities and its impressive interior especially in regards to the sea views, materials, spacious rooms and ceiling heights. On the ground floor there is a grand entrance that leads to a large living room with library, dining room and a spacious porch, a bedroom with bath, large kitchen with laundry and pantry. On the first floor there are 4 bedrooms each with en suite, another large living room with office and veranda overlooking the sea with access to the large roof terrace with BBQ and unobstructed views of the breathtaking sea. The basement has a games room, a movie theater, a large lounge with TV and garage for 5 cars and engine room. A lift connects the basement to the ground floor and first floor. The garden includes a sunbathing area next to the pool (salt water), a shower, automatic irrigation system and has a direct access to the sea walk, from where you can walk or bike in both directions always at the sea! Features: individual heating in every room, gas boiler for hot water, elevator, large garage, pool, irrigation system, alarm system, security gates, intercom, air conditioning.

description: Amelia Inmobiliaria offers a Mallorcan house renovated a few years ago, with high ceilings and wooden beams.  A truly different home located in a prestigious area such as Son Armadams-Santa Catalina and just one minute from Paseo Marítimo.  The house consists of 175 m2 and is divided into a ground floor that has a bedroom, which is currently used as a office, living room, toilet, large bathroom, fully equipped kitchen and a beautiful covered patio with a variety of plants.  The first floor is very special, flirtatious, which has about 70 m2 giving the possibility of being able to live upstairs independent of the ground floor, since it has its own kitchen.  It has a small covered terrace, a large loft-style bedroom with a semi-integrated bathroom, hydromassage, a large dressing room and a small area with sofas and television to enjoy the moment.  In the reform, both the original old pine carpentry and stone walls and exposed beams have been preserved. All the windows facing the outside have a double window.  Stoneware and parquet flooring, double glazing, air conditioning, ceiling fans and installation of radiator heating.

description: Unique opportunity in Palma de Mallorca    In the old city of Palma we find within the Es Temple Towers this magnificent house of more than 3000m2.     It dates back to 1886. It is possible to reform what is already built and to add parking spaces.     It is in a privileged area. You will not find anything like it in Mallorca.  This property is for a person with a very strong personality or to invest in high standing offices or a museum.    On the plot there are 5 storerooms plus one which used to be a laundry room.    The house consists of a kitchen with fireplace, three bedrooms, two doubles, one single, a bathroom and a toilet, two living rooms, all exterior, the windows overlook the wall and the garden, solarium terrace.      The history: The wall protected the city in the sector of the Camp gate, since then the place was known as the castle of the Temple. The name was given because James I gave the castle to the Templars for their participation in the conquest of Majorca.

description: This exclusive 4-bedroom apartment is located in the exclusive and sought-after and peaceful area of Bendinat, close to an attractive golf course, pretty beaches, shopping, cafés and restaurants. The 286m2 apartment is ideal for families that require ample lateral space to enjoy together or with friends. This impressive property has the following distribution: Before entering the apartment, you have your own private gated entrance area to allocate any excess outerwear and shoes. From here entry into a reception hall with two double floor-to-ceiling cupboards, offering plenty of storage space. An enormous open living room with a bright open kitchen awaits you. The living room offers great views to the beautiful huge terrace as well as the gardens and direct sea view, which invites you to dine with family and friends, while watching the sea and mountains. Such stunning and direct views are rarely available in Mallorca. Furthermore, the apartment holds 4 bedrooms with each their bathroom ensuite, as well as a fifth toilet and sink for guests. The master bedroom has both a walk-in closet and another triple closet in the distribution area, with a built-in safe and private access to the big terrace. Every room has a beautiful view, either being a full sea view or mountain view with partial sea view. Quality features of this top-quality apartment include: built-in hot & cold Daikin mini chiller air-conditioning system, a newly installed kitchen with top notch German appliances, high quality sanitary fittings and faucets, quality local stone floors throughout, guest toilet, double glazing, plus generous wardrobe space. There is a lift from the garage level to all floors, and the lift travels directly down to the heated indoor pool. There is a night watchman at the property offering 7-days a week security. The community is very well taken care of and includes a huge pool area with a marvellous sea view, many green areas as well as the beautiful common entry areas, an underground heated pool, sauna, and parking area, where this apartment holds 3 parking spaces and a storage room. Area: The fashionable marina of Puerto Portals and several international schools are just a short drive away. The city of Palma and its 3 km seafront, its port and yachting marinas are a maximum of 10 minutes by car. There is also a very regular bus service.

It has a large living room with fireplace and dining room with direct access to the private pool, where there is a terrace and a nice garden overlooking the nature and the sea, where you can enjoy with family and friends.  The kitchen is fully equipped and overlooks the garden.    The house is surrounded by large windows and beautiful gardens, so it has light and sun all day.  The house has 3 garages.    It is located in Santa Ponsa, one of the most important places in Mallorca. Quiet place, close to the yacht club, golf and beach.    Do not miss this opportunity, you will love it.  Contact us for a visit.

description: House for sale, totally renovated in 1995, in the area of Andratx - Sa Coma, of 173 m2 built area in two levels, plot of 287 m2 and about 138.00 m2 in terraces and garden, with own swimming pool.    It is distributed in a ground floor with an elegant hall, a cosy living room, a single room with a cast iron fireplace, laundry room and toilet with shower.  We go up the stairs and on the upper floor we have a spacious rustic style kitchen-dining room, exit to the terraces, complete bathroom, a hall-distributor and 2 double bedrooms.    As extras: Swedish central heating, with individual radiators in all the rooms, air conditioning, water tank for reserve and rain water, high ceilings, hydraulic floors, views to the countryside and the mountains.    Andratx is a beautiful village in the southwest of Mallorca, in the region of the Sierra de Tramuntana, with beautiful rural areas and 5 main centres of population, the village of Andratx, where we have the Castle of Son Mas, seat of the town hall; the Port of Andratx, famous for its fishing port, its sailing club and luxury areas such as La Mola, Cala Llamp and Monport; the bohemian village of S'Arracó, a cradle of artists; Sant Elm, a beautiful coastal town where time stands still, facing the island of Dragonera and Camp de Mar, where we find the Golf de Andratx and one of the most beautiful coves on the island.    If you want to live in a village, in a Majorcan house with character, enjoying the comforts of a villa, call us to arrange your visit.    We are a real estate agency specialised in rentals and property sales.  We speak Spanish, Catalan, English and German.  CLOSER TO YOUR DREAMS.

description: This elegantly-designed, luxury villa in a quiet residential neighbourhood of Nova Santa Ponsa is very good value for money. The property with a total of five bedrooms with their own bathrooms ensuite and terraces, combines modern design with Mediterranean style features. On the first floor you'll find all the bedrooms and a staircase to access the spacious roof terrace where you have a beautiful sea view and mountain view.  On the ground floor there's the living room, a dining room, a TV room and a luxurious, open plan, fully equipped fitted kitchen. Large sliding doors open to the outside terrace with large swimming pool and a manicured, sub-tropical garden.  The underground garage can easily park four cars, on this level you'll also find the technical room. Both the ground floor and the first floor are connected by an elevator. Further features of this villa include: air conditioning hot / cold, underfloor heating, aluminum windows, double glazing, natural stone floors, fireplace, storage room, domotic system.

description: Bright residential villa located in the heart of the southwest coast of Mallorca, minutes from the beach of Santa Ponsa.     It is built on a plot of 1.492m2 surrounded by a large garden, swimming pool and wooden solarium to enjoy the long summer days with the family.     The house of 295m2 has an open layout, offering natural light in every corner of the house. Thanks to its large panoramic windows located in its spacious living-dining room, you can enjoy the magical sunsets.     The American style kitchen with built-in cooking island has direct access to the outdoor dining area, where you will be able to share great evenings with your family and friends without the need to cook alone.     It is composed of 4 en-suite bedrooms and 2 guest bathrooms, providing enough space for all your visits.     The house is fully air-conditioned to have an optimal environment and temperature during all seasons, thanks to the equipment of air conditioning system, heating, underfloor heating with heat pump and Technal metal carpentry that will avoid both the cold in winter and the greenhouse effect of the summer heat.     Currently, the residential area is very revalued, due to the proximity of luxurious leisure areas such as Port Adriano and Santa Ponsa golf courses, where you will find a wide range of restaurants, stores and sports areas.     If you want to make this villa your home, call 971888018 and ask us or fill in the contact form.

description: Opportunity to renovate a house and bar in Amanecer area, Palma.    You are looking at an incredible opportunity to acquire a large house together with a bar. Located in the Amanecer area, in Palma, it will allow you to live in the capital without being in the center. The main features are as follows:     • Amanecer, Palma  • Dimensions of the bar: 180 m2  • Dimensions of the house: 180 m2  • 3 double bedrooms and 2 bathrooms  • Terraces of 50 m2 and 100 m2 respectively  • Basement with private pool  • Bar or house not for sale separately  • Condition: to renovate      This great property that is sold together the house and the bar, is a great opportunity for you. The house, your future home, has a total of 180 m2 usable. With a large bright living room, you can relax on the couch and enjoy your favorite movies with your friends or family.    After a long day of work, either in your own bar or in your other business, you will have all the comforts covered in the same space. The large kitchen of your future home will encourage you to innovate new and delicious recipes. Who knows if you will be able to apply them in your bar.    With 3 large double bedrooms, the master bedroom has an en suite bathroom. The rest of the bedrooms, also very bright and spacious, have fitted closets. As the property has to be reformed, you will decide if you want to keep this number of rooms, or, on the contrary, add or remove some.    You will be able to adapt some space as a dressing room, reading room or office to work from home. It will be one of the many things that you will be able to modify with the reform. The bar could also be reformed.    If you slide all the photos you will see the large dimensions of this bar. It also consists of 180m2 useful. You have the opportunity to take advantage of this great space and continue your line of business. A unique opportunity, which would allow you to be next to your work to have everything under control.    Another of the strengths of this great property are its two large terraces. One of them, of 50 m2 and the other, of 100 m2. With a reform could be an ideal chill out space in which to enjoy long evenings with friends.    As well as its private indoor pool, which after a reform would be one of the favorite places of your family and also yours, of course.    If you do not want to miss this unique opportunity to reform this great property with house and bar in Palma, call now to 971 88 80 18 or fill out the contact form.

description: Spectacular villa with pool and chillout in Calviá. This villa with pool located in the exclusive area of Cas Catalá, represents an incredible opportunity to finally get the home you have been looking for so long. The main features of this property are the following: • Sol de Mallorca, Calviá • 439 m2  • 4 double bedrooms • 5 bathrooms • 2 living rooms • Garden 1.266 m2  • Swimming pool • Parking (3) • Extras: air conditioning, barbecue, fireplace, cellar, backside With a total of 439 m2 useful, this villa has divided its rooms on 2 floors. On the first floor you will find the living room, the open kitchen and 2 bathrooms. On the upper floor, the rest of the rooms: 4 double bedrooms and the rest of the bathrooms. As you enter through the door of your new home, a large and very bright living-dining room will be the first thing you see. With large windows with direct access to the garden, this space will be one of your favorite places to relax and spend time with your family. In addition to this living-dining room, you will have another living room where you can organize your family movie sessions. The open kitchen, which you can access through the living room, will allow you to be attentive to everything that happens in the living room. A dream space if you like to cook, since its distribution is very practical. It has a central island where you can organize all the ingredients of your dishes and an L-shaped table that can also serve as a storage room when cooking.  Through the kitchen you can also access your large and beautiful garden. A very special area with different differentiated spaces. To begin with, a nice terrace with porch decorated with great taste represents the chillout area. A few meters away, a table for 8 people will be available for when you meet with friends.  To the most spectacular area you will access through a beautiful arch of flowers. With an exquisite and varied floral decoration, the swimming pool represents a dream place. It has it all: a natural landscape surrounding it, an area with 2 sun loungers, another with a porch with curtains that imitate Balinese beds, and a secluded table with an umbrella where you can enjoy breakfasts movie. Undoubtedly, this outdoor space will be for you a place of peace, tranquility, intimacy and reflection where you can spend long hours connecting with yourself.  On the second floor you will find the 4 double bedrooms and the 3 remaining bathrooms. As you can see in the pictures, 2 of the bedrooms have a private terrace with unobstructed views. In fact, you will see how in one of these terraces the trees are part of the decoration.  If you want to invest in quality of life and live in this villa located in Calvià, do not hesitate to call 971888018 or fill out the form.

description: With absolute privacy and an architecture that perfectly combines Mallorcan tradition with the most contemporary spirit, this magnificent house stands on a plot of 1.271 m2 in the quiet residential area of Sol de Mallorca, belonging to the municipality of Calvia, ideal for those who wish to live close to the sea with easy access to beautiful beaches such as Belladona or Portals Vells, located just a few minutes' walk away. Palma is only 20 minutes away.    The excellent property occupies 410 m2 and is surrounded by magnificent exteriors with a natural Mediterranean garden whose aromas envelop everything, porches and terraces from where to contemplate this green scenery between pleasant get-togethers. A refreshing swimming pool is the ideal place to spend the day relaxing on one of the sun loungers in the sun or shade.     With 4 spacious bedrooms, all with en suite bathrooms, the house has been distributed over two floors with all the functional needs that a modern house requires and all the comforts of today. On the entrance floor, we find a large room where the living, dining and kitchen areas have been arranged open to the whole room configuring a modern connected space. This ground floor opens onto a large porch with outdoor living and dining area leading to the swimming pool. A guest toilet and laundry area complete this level. The upper floor is occupied by the 4 bedrooms and another comfortable living room with fireplace from where you have access to another terrace.     The fantastic property is topped off by a solarium area with beautiful views down to the sea and offers two parking spaces.    "A relaxing natural atmosphere in an elegant house 5 min. from beautiful coves".    FEATURES:    -Air conditioning hot/cold, central heating, alarm system.  -Open plan fitted kitchen, laundry room.  -Porches, terraces, solarium, garden, swimming pool, two parking spaces. description: The villa is located in Cala Vinyas, close to beautiful coves such as Cala Falco. Only a few minutes from Santa Ponsa, several golf courses like Poniente and 20 minutes from Palma. This elegant property is ideal for a family looking for a house with a comfortable garden for children and a swimming pool to enjoy the summers. The main floor is distributed in a large hall, living/dining room with exit to the porch and garden, guest toilet, spacious modern style kitchen fully equipped. The upper floor consists of 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms en suite and enjoys sea and forest views, double garage for two large cars.    Features:   -air conditioning hot/cold, swimming pool, garden, double garage, parquet floors.  -A few minutes from the beach and golf courses.

Completely renovated. This apartment is located on Paseo Marítimo where we find a large pedestrian promenade by the sea. Zone with all services.

description: In one of the oldest parts of Palma this renovated duplex apartment is located on the square with cafés, local life and a beautiful church. 2 bedrooms 2 bathrooms with showers Living area 116m2 Patio 26m2 PRICE € 830.000 This home is like a small boutique hotel. It is restored and renovated with the traditional architectural Mallorquin stone walls and wooden beams. The apartment has its entrance from the ground floor and is a gem with architectural furniture and designs. The mixture between the modern design and the original old, the ceiling of 5 meters, an atrium glass door including an outside patio is unique. An iconic patio open air with plants and trees as a lounge area and a sun deck gives an extra dimension and light to the apartment. All materials, colors, style and design has been chosen by the owners/ designers. The spacious living room, dining area and kitchen is on the ground floor. The wooden staircase leads you to the second floor with a library and connection the bedroom section and bathroom. The small property hosts only 3 other units/ apartments situated on one of the charming squares of Palma city.

description: Cozy DHH located in the heart of the family urbanization Bahia Grande, on the south coast of Mallorca. Built in 2002, the house has 2 floors plus attic, which are divided as follows. On the first floor there is a kitchen, storage room, living room, bathroom and a guest room. From the kitchen you have direct access to the lovingly landscaped Mediterranean garden with pool and BBQ area. On the second floor there are another 3 bedrooms and a separate bathroom. The master bedroom has its own bathroom en suite. From the 3 bedroom you reach the attic with sea view via a spiral staircase integrated in the room. A garage with direct access to the living room completes the house.

Main house with porch: approx. 140 m2 constructed area, large living/dinind room with fireplace, wooden beams, wooden rustic kitchen, 2 double bedrooms, 1 bathroom, hunting room. Guest apartment: approx. 60 m2, double bedroom with bathroom en suite, living/dining room on the ground floor.  Swimming pool with solarium, summer kitchen with barbecue, other spaces, water well, cistern, amazing panoramic views. Paradisiacal location.

suggestedTexts.title: Estate

description: This completely renovated studio in Palmanova offers partial sea views and is located on the 4. floor of a well-kept building with elevator, just a few steps from the beach, in the southwest of the island of Mallorca. The bright property has a constructed area of approx. 40 m2 distributed as follows: a spacious living room with a sofa bed and access to a sunny terrace with views of the surroundings and partial sea views, a modern American kitchen with a washing machine and a bathroom with a shower. This attractive apartment in Palmanova is equipped with air conditioning, underfloor heating in the bathroom and tiled floors. At your disposal you have a nice community pool. It is an excellent location, just a few minutes walk from a beautiful sandy beach with turquoise waters, in the southwest of Mallorca. It is a perfect apartment for lovers of the sun and the magical Mediterranean atmosphere. The center of the capital Palma is only 15 minutes away by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Palmanova, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Mare Nostrum

description: This grand and unique villa, brimming with personality is a unique investment opportunity. It is located in one of the emerging areas of Palma city centre and has all amenities close by. You are just minutes away from all the places of interest such as the beautiful historic centre, the leisurely Paseo Maritimo, the city marinas, shops and restaurants, as well as being within very easy reach of the many beautiful beaches and spectacular coves that can be found around the bay of Palma.  The splendid 1050 m2 property, whose architectural inspiration is steeped in the elegant Mallorcan style, is built to the highest standard with quality and noble materials used both inside and out. The plot itself is 1537m2 and has unobstructed views of the city with the sea in the background. The property offers full privacy and is a tranquil haven within a lively city. Outdoors you will find large sun drenched and covered terraces, barbecue area and garden of beautiful green Mediterranean vegetation. In addition, it has its own private tennis court (that of course could be converted or adapted to the sport of your choice). This exceptional house has 9 bedrooms all with en suite bathroom plus a guest toilet. The master bedroom also has a jacuzzi and sauna with whirlpool. The fantastic living area is spread out over two floors and also has an incredible 215m2 basement that currently houses a minibar area with cellar.  The are 3 living rooms all open out to the outdoors. The extensive kitchen comes fully equipped and has plenty of space, storage and natural light. The property offers parking for two cars and ample storage space. It is a unique property and an excellent and rare opportunity to own an extensive stately home within a city centre location. It offers great potential to the future buyer who may wish to renovate and personalize this magnificent property.   Features: -Potential for renovation -Air conditioning hot / cold, fireplace, marble floors, fittedwardrobes, jacuzzi, sauna, whirlpool, games room, cellar, basement. -Fully equipped kitchen  -Terraces both sunny and shaded, gardens, tennis court, barbecue area. -Parking, storage room. Location: -Unobstructed views of the city and partial sea views, next to schools, restaurants, shops and all other amenities, 10 minutes from the historic centre, excellent access to the island’s entire road network, on urban transport route.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Dureta, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

Ground floor (216 m²) - 3 bedrooms with bathrooms en suite, garage, utility room, incl. 28 m² covered terrace All bedrooms have access to the terraces. Roof level (172 m²)- 1 room 23 m², solarium 149 m². description: Sol de Mallorca is just next to the beautiful cove of Portals Vells. It is a peaceful residential area in the municipality of Calviá and the perfect spot for those who want to live near the sea and have easy access to some of the islands most beautiful beaches such as Caló dels Reis and Playa del Mago in addition to Cala Falcó with its popular al fresco seafood restaurant and cocktails bar with the sound of the waves as background music. Whilst you may seem a world away from the hustle and bustle of city life, Palma is just 20 minutes away.  It is in this privileged enclave that you will find this beautiful 213m2 Mediterranean villa built on 1224m2 plot where the views reach the sea. It boasts a sizeable 213 m2 of open space of which 149 m2 terraces. The swimming pool and garden offer a tranquil and relaxing outdoor living space where you can enjoy the year round temperatures that make Mallorca a fantastic location. The ground floor offers open plan living with a large lounge and fully fitted and equipped kitchen. There is abundant natural light thanks to the floor to sliding doors, looking out onto the fruit and palm trees, garden area, terrace and pool. You will also find a bedroom with ensuite bathroom and access to the outside space as well as a guest bathroom on this floor. Upstairs there are two bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms. From one of the bedrooms you have access to a sun drenched private terrace perfect for relaxation.  This charming villa also has a large 300m2 approx basement which could house several cars. You may also choose to convert it into a gym. Features: -Air conditioning hot / cold ducts, wooden parquet floor, heating via oil radiators, fitted wardrobes. -Open plan fully equipped kitchen. -Terraces both sun and covered, private garden and pool. -Parking for several cars. -Basement. Location: -Partial sea views, unobstructed views, coastal living, near restaurants, near shops, 20 mins from Palma.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sol de Mallorca, Calvià

description: LOCATION Duplex flat located in Palmanova, 1 min walk from the beach! Palmanova is a very pleasant seaside resort offering a wide range of services: restaurants, bars, taxi, bus,.. . You are only 15 min away from Palma and 20 min from the international airport. Ideal as a second home to enjoy the beautiful crystal clear water and the surrounding beaches. DESCRIPTION Duplex of 76m2, on the 2nd floor with lift, tastefully decorated. The property is sold turnkey, and furnished. It consists of a large living room bathed in light, dining room with open plan fitted and equipped kitchen. It has 2 en-suite bedrooms, one of which is a very nice size. The property has two 6m2 balconies with stunning sea views! OTHER FEATURES Presence of a cellar. The flat is equipped with electric heating and reversible air conditioning. South/east facing. The floors are marble and the windows are PVC double glazed.

description: In the municipality of Calviá in the quiet area of Costa d'en Blanes. Modern villa with an infinity pool is built.  This luxurious property stands on a plot of 1350m2 with an area of 677 with the soltane and is characterized by modern lines. It has 4 bedrooms each has its bathroom en suite, with access to its own terrace, a guest toilet. Large bright dining room with kitchenette. Open and also connected to the outside area. Just in front of the living room is the infinity pool. Air conditioner. Wide view on the horizon. Garage for 2 cars, elevator. Heating, fireplace, heated swimming pool, large terrace, porch, solarium. A only 20 minutes from Palma, near the beach! A dream house!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Costa d'En Blanes, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: In the municipality of Llucmajor and just 30 km from the capital, there is one of the most interesting enclaves in all of Mallorca, Cap Blanc, a magical place where the island meets the Mediterranean with its emblematic lighthouse presiding over fascinating cliffs. At a short distance and located in a residential area surrounded by nature, golf and white sand beaches with endless water activities and commercial premises very close, is this large house of marked Mediterranean identity, comfortable and overflowing with personality that also has license to rent it on vacation.    On a magnificent plot of 1,825 m2 just 100 meters from the sea with incredible exteriors of a large pool of 60 m2 with barbecue, extensive gardens, porches with rest areas and outdoor dining rooms in addition to terraces that give us splendid views of the sea and magical sunsets , the house rises with 583 m2 developed on 2 levels with spacious and bright spaces but full of warm notes. In addition, an independent house has been created as a private corner by the pool.    Arranged with 5 large bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 5 bathrooms, four of them en suite, the house welcomes us with a large hall that distributes the house in a large shared space by living room, living room with fireplace and dining room where the light It flows in and with direct access to the magnificent exteriors where, under the intensity of the sun, share time, joy and conversation. The kitchen has been conceived as a large independent space but connected to the living-dining area thanks to the sliding door that opens completely. It comes fully equipped, equipped with a central island and with large storage space as well as a daily eating area. A generous laundry area, a double bedroom and a bathroom complete this floor.    The upper level is dedicated to the rest area, with the remaining 4 bedrooms, the main one of which is provided with dressing room and exit to an upper terrace as a fantastic outdoor sea viewpoint.    The house also offers us a double garage.    “A paradise of calm where you can admire a beautiful sea landscape surrounded by all the comforts”.    FEATURES:    -Air conditioning cold / heat ducts, fireplace, fitted wardrobes, whirlpool, dressing room, laundry.  -An independent kitchen furnished and equipped.  -Terraces, porches, garden, pool, barbecue, automatic irrigation.  -HAS A LICENSE FOR VACATION RENTAL.    LOCATION:    -Views to the sea, 100mts from the beach, near restaurants, close to commercial premises, next to golf, 20 min from Palma, 15 min. From the airport.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sa Torre, Llucmajor

description: Being able to live in a haven of peace in the heart of the Sierra de Tramuntana and appreciate the fantastic unobstructed views of the entire mountain to the sea with the beautiful town of Bunyola at the foot, is a privilege that will be enjoyed by those who reside in this traditional estate, a house to enjoy it with family and friends where a restoration work has been carried out keeping great respect for the original structure but adapting its charm to the life we want today, investing in facilities and comfort. It rises within a field of 12.000 m2, where you can enjoy the 300 m2 of terraces with a large pool surrounded by a large area of hammocks for sunbathing and gardens where you can breathe in all that natural atmosphere that is enjoyed outside. The house occupies 160 m2 with a fantastic south orientation that floods it with all the Mediterranean light. With an aesthetic linked to traditional Mallorcan architecture using solid natural materials that are perfectly integrated into the environment such as stone and wood as well as typical construction elements of these houses, exposed beams, arches, sloping ceilings.. . the house is distributed over 2 floors and has 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. On the entrance level, a large double-height living-dining room dominated by a large stone fireplace as a source of heat and a meeting point in the living room welcomes us. The fully equipped kitchen is separate, spacious and bright and is adjacent to the dining area. A bedroom and a 1 bathroom complete this floor. On the upper level is the rest area, with the remaining 3 bedrooms equipped with built-in wardrobes, the main one having access to a private terrace from where the views are more impressive. On this level there are also 2 bathrooms and an open space that has been used as a work and study room. The property has parking and laundry area. Also note that it also has a vacation rental license. "The perfect refuge when what you want is to disconnect" CHARACTERISTICS: -Air conditioning hot / cold, fireplace, fitted wardrobes, laundry. -Independent equipped kitchen -Terraces, porches, gardens, swimming pool, parking. -License for vacation rental LOCATION: -Unobstructed views, mountain views, partial sea views, close to restaurants, close to shops, 20 km from Palma.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Bunyola
suggestedTexts.title: Estate

description: Situated in an exclusive and quiet residential area of Santa Ponsa, only a few minutes' drive from several beaches, restaurants, supermarkets and all amenities. The golf courses of the area as well as the marinas of Port Adriano and Puerto Portals are also within easy reach. The city of Palma can be reached in only 20 minutes. This villa captivates with a very special design. It disposes of a spacious living/dining room with open kitchen and 5 double bedrooms with bathrooms en suite. The interior is tastefully furnished with restored antique barber chairs and other collector's items which give the villa a special touch. The chill-out area on the terrace can be extended by sliding the windows and joins the 152 m2 living room. In the 6m x 9m swimming pool there are Balinese beds, perfect for enjoying summer days with family and friends, with a large and spectacular glass jacuzzi and water cascade. There is also a large gym and sauna. Extras such as Sonos sound system throughout the house, air conditioning hot/cold, underfloor heating, unique lighting, garage for four vehicles, etc. guarantee the highest quality of life, luxury and comfort in this stunning villa perfect for holidays or year-round residence. FEATURES: -Air conditioning hot/cold, underfloor heating, Sonos sound system. -Open plan fitted kitchen. -Terraces, garden, swimming pool, barbecue, jacuzzi, garage for 4 cars, parking for 2 cars. -Fitness room LOCATION: -Views to green landscape, close to restaurants, close to shops, close to golf, 5 min. to Port Adriano, 10 min. to Puerto Portals, 20 min. to Palma.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: The Mediterranean takes over the entire landscape surrounding this sensational newly built villa situated on the seafront of a privileged location on the southwest coast of Mallorca, Puerto Adriano, one of the most modern and luxurious marinas where you can find exclusive gastronomic proposals, boutiques with the best brands and unique settings for the practice of nautical sports, all of this next to the coastal town of Santa Ponsa and only 20 minutes away from Palma.    On a plot of 1.006 m2, the excellent property is built with a perfect avant-garde and technological architecture. In its 606 m2 of new construction with first class qualities and the most modern finishes, the "art of living well" is pursued, where the most important thing is comfort and a purely Mediterranean lifestyle, concepts that are reinforced by the magnificent exteriors with swimming pool and garden areas that offer relaxation and spectacular views of the sea.    This exclusive property has been designed on two floors connected by lift, with 5 spacious bedrooms and 6 complete bathrooms, most of them en suite and all of them full of design, views and light. The master bedroom is an elegant space with fireplace, large dressing area and absolute privacy only invaded by the spectacular sea and harbour views. The large open-plan living-dining room with integrated kitchen has different porches and terraces to which it opens up through large windows that allow the beautiful sea landscape to enter the interior, making it one of the great attractions of the house.    It is worth mentioning that the house has a garage with capacity to comfortably house 2 cars and has a patio, gymnasium, sauna and guest flat.    FEATURES:    -Air conditioning hot/cold, underfloor heating, lift.  -Integrated fitted kitchen, laundry room.  -Terraces, porches, garden, swimming pool, garage, gym, sauna, patio, guest flat.    LOCATION:    -First sea line, sea views, next to marina, next to beach, shops, restaurants, sports and leisure activities, 5 min. from Santa Ponsa, 20 min. from Palma.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Rustic property on a plot of 30,000m2 approx. with views of the Mountains. This farm is located on the mountain of Puigpunyent and has a house of about 70m2 built, with a living room of about 30m2, fitted kitchen of 8m2, 2 double bedrooms, full bathroom, stoneware floors, views of the mountains. It is located in a very quiet area surrounded by nature. It has wonderful views of the mountains. unique environment. It is about 20 minutes from Palma.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Puigpunyent
suggestedTexts.title: Estate

description: This Majorcan style property is situated between Son Rapinya, Son Quint and Son Vida, next to a green zone, only a five minutes' drive from the centre of Palma, several golf courses, numerous international schools and all amenities.    The main house consists of several living rooms, kitchen, 1 master bedroom, 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, office etc. ; there is also a guest flat with separate entrance with living room, 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, wine cellar etc. And finally a separate casita with a large office and bathroom.    The property enjoys beautiful views of the surrounding countryside, has a large salt water swimming pool, beautiful gardens, open and covered terraces and parking for several vehicles.    There is also the possibility to purchase the adjacent plot of 3636m2 (currently a beautiful pine forest) for 1,200, 000€.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: As soon as you enter the house, you will be delighted by a double-height entrance with designer lighting. It opens directly onto a covered terrace with a large outdoor kitchen, Mediterranean garden and an approx. 55 m2 salt water pool. The transparency is supported by large window elements and the glazed staircase. The spacious living area with two covered terraces has floor-to-ceiling windows with panoramic views of the mountains and the bay of Santa Ponsa. The designer kitchen by the well-known brand Leicht-Cocinas combines floor-to-ceiling fronts and high-quality appliances. The villa with sophisticated interior design has 4 bedrooms with 4 bathrooms en suite as well as 3 guest WCs. On the basement level there is parking space for three cars, a spacious wellness area, sauna, utility room as well as storage and technical rooms. The entire house is equipped with high-quality electric shutters, which can be adjusted horizontally and vertically. All materials are of the highest quality and offers natural stone floors and solid wood carpentry.

The main house consists of several living rooms, kitchen, 1 master bedroom, 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, office etc. ; there is also a guest flat with separate entrance with living room, 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, wine cellar etc. And finally a separate casita with a large office and bathroom.    The property enjoys beautiful views of the surrounding countryside, has a large salt water swimming pool, beautiful gardens, open and covered terraces and parking for several vehicles.    There is also the possibility to purchase the adjacent plot of 3636m2 (currently a beautiful pine forest) for 1,200, 000€.

description: The Mediterranean takes over the entire landscape surrounding this sensational newly built villa situated on the seafront of a privileged location on the southwest coast of Mallorca, Puerto Adriano, one of the most modern and luxurious marinas where you can find exclusive gastronomic proposals, boutiques with the best brands and unique settings for the practice of nautical sports, all of this next to the coastal town of Santa Ponsa and only 20 minutes away from Palma.    On a plot of 1.006 m2, the excellent property is built with a perfect avant-garde and technological architecture. In its 606 m2 of new construction with first class qualities and the most modern finishes, the "art of living well" is pursued, where the most important thing is comfort and a purely Mediterranean lifestyle, concepts that are reinforced by the magnificent exteriors with swimming pool and garden areas that offer relaxation and spectacular views of the sea.    This exclusive property has been designed on two floors connected by lift, with 5 spacious bedrooms and 6 complete bathrooms, most of them en suite and all of them full of design, views and light. The master bedroom is an elegant space with fireplace, large dressing area and absolute privacy only invaded by the spectacular sea and harbour views. The large open-plan living-dining room with integrated kitchen has different porches and terraces to which it opens up through large windows that allow the beautiful sea landscape to enter the interior, making it one of the great attractions of the house.    It is worth mentioning that the house has a garage with capacity to comfortably house 2 cars and has a patio, gymnasium, sauna and guest flat.    FEATURES:    -Air conditioning hot/cold, underfloor heating, lift.  -Integrated fitted kitchen, laundry room.  -Terraces, porches, garden, swimming pool, garage, gym, sauna, patio, guest flat.    LOCATION:    -First sea line, sea views, next to marina, next to beach, shops, restaurants, sports and leisure activities, 5 min. from Santa Ponsa, 20 min. from Palma.

description: A 5-minute walk from well kown Palma Tennis Club, which is not only an exclusive training facility, but also a very social meeting place for the island's international population, is this possible two-storey home. At present, floors 2 and 3 are two completely separate and almost identical apartments. The biggest difference is that the 2nd floor has a balcony of about 4 sqm with morning sun while the 3rd floor instead has two terraces.  The larger terrace is about 29 sqm with sun basically from it goes up until it sets. The second terrace is located at the other end of the house and is about 9 sqm with afternoon / evening sun. Both floors have very large kitchens in delimitation to what is today a living room, however, with a non-load-bearing wall in between. Floor 2 has 4 bedrooms, one of which is smaller while floor 3 has 3 bedrooms. Both floors today have a bathroom and a guest toilet.  There is a developed project to install an elevator in the property and it would in that case take the place of what is today the guest toilet on both floors. All inner walls can be removed, ie they are not load-bearing, however, there are a number of load-bearing columns that must remain or be replaced by load-bearing beams. These two apartments are sold together and then also get the private access to the roof terrace of 84 sqm. The roof terrace is renovated and has an open view over Son Espanyolet and towards Bellverparken.  It will not be possible to build anything that will limit the view according to the current city plan. The apartments need a proper update and would aesthetically and solar benefit from completely changing the distribution and have the private part / bedroom area on the 2nd floor and the social part on the 3rd floor with kitchen / living room open to the larger terrace. Around the corner there is a service shop, delicatessen, fruit shop, café and several smaller local restaurants. Palma's largest private hospital, Clinica Juaneda, is about 5 minutes walk away and it is as mentioned just as close to Palma Sport & Tennis Club and in another 2 minutes you are in trendy and restaurant-dense Santa Catalina. Palma's beautiful harbor promenade is a 10-minute walk away. It is walking distance to "everything" and in addition it is less than 5 minutes drive to the detour that goes around Palma and from where there are exits to the various highways on the island and down to other parts of Palma. It is a 15-minute drive to the airport and equally close to the beaches of Illetas on one side of Palma and Ciudad Jardin on the other. The beach in Cala Major is less than a 10-minute drive away.

description: 5 minutes walk from the well knownen Palma Tennis Club which is not only an exclusive training facility but also a very social meeting place for the island's international population is this penthouse with fantastic terraces and great potential. The room distribution is currently distributed over a spacious living room which is located directly to the left of the entrance. Here is access to a 9 sqm large terrace where you can enjoy dinner and watch the sun go down. Opposite the entrance is the very spacious kitchen that can be opened up to the living room as there is no load-bearing wall here. After the kitchen comes in a row 3 bedrooms and on the other side of the hallway first a guest toilet and then a bathroom. At the end of the hallway is a terrace of 29 sqm that follows the short side of the property. The sun shines here almost from dusk to dawn. Hence, the floor would benefit from having the social part with kitchen / living room towards this side of the property and the bedrooms at the opposite end. None of the inner walls facing the street are load-bearing. Above the home with access via the stairway is a large, renovated roof terrace of 84 sqm with private use of the top residential floor. The roof terrace has an open view over Son Espanyolet and towards the Bellver park. It will not be possible to build anything that is limiting the views according to the current city plan. Even if you appreciate the existing distribution, the home regardless needs an update. The property is located in a very quiet area, centrally located in Son Espanyolet. Around the corner there is a service shop, delicatessen, fruit shop, café and several smaller local restaurants. Palma's largest private hospital, Clinica Juaneda, is about 5 minutes walk away and it is as mentioned just as close to Palma Sport & Tennis Club and in another 2 minutes you are in trendy and restaurant-dense Santa Catalina. Palma's beautiful harbor promenade is a 10-minute walk away. It is walking distance to "everything" and in addition it is less than 5 minutes drive to the detour that goes around Palma and from where there are exits to the various highways on the island and down to other parts of Palma. It is a 15-minute drive to the airport and equally close to the beaches of Illetas on one side of Palma and Ciudad Jardin on the other. Cala Major Beach is less than a 10-minute drive away.

description: Santa Ponsa Nova - Calviá, in the exclusive and highly demanded urbanization "Ses Penyes Rotges Golf" of the year 2008, JD Residences offers this magnificent Ground Floor for sale, in a perfect state of maintenance. The urbanization famous for its amenities has 3 swimming pools, two outdoor and one heated indoor of 20 meters to enjoy it and swim all year round. Large gardens, porter service and security at night are another of the special features of this luxurious urbanization. In 2021 a complete renovation of all the facades has been carried out, currently this urbanization looks like new! . In this case we offer a ground floor apartment, with 158 meters built distributed in: 3 bedrooms, 2 with bathroom en suite. Bathroom and toilet. Separate kitchen, very spacious living room with access to the covered terrace and garden. Air conditioning and central heating, marble floors, double glazed aluminum windows.   Private garden of approximately 50 square meters, with direct access to the largest outdoor communal pool. In the underground you have a VERY large garage space and a storage room, all with elevator access. TOTAL COMFORT and exclusivity, the flats and houses in this urbanization are also a great investment with great demand. Request your face-to-face or virtual visit with JD Residences and we will gladly assist you in Spanish, English, German, Swedish, French and Russian. The center of town Santa Ponsa with shops, bars and restaurants is just a couple of minutes’ walk. The main living level offers a bright living room with open plan kitchen with cooking island and bar, a double bedroom with bathroom en suite, a further double bedroom and a separate bathroom. The upper living level features of another living room with 3,90m high ceilings with wooden beams and access to a covered terrace and an open terrace with electrical awning, open plan kitchen, two double bedrooms each with bathroom en suite and balcony. Beautiful garden with lawns and pool, as well as the possibility for a garage and open parking space are completing this offer.

The house has three bedrooms, a suite and large fitted wardrobes, it has a large living room with a fireplace  from which through its large windows we can see the garden and the Bay of Palma. What to say about its kitchen, with a generous office space connected to the outdoor terrace to be able to have breakfast and lunch with fantastic views and dinner with a sunset.  There is the possibility of making a small independent apartment in the lower area of the house.  This property is reformed and updated the interior of the house, the exteriors need updating and maintenance.    *Fees and taxes NOT included*9850  “This property has been certified by ABSI (Balearic Association of Real Estate Services) which means that the marketing agency has supervised the necessary documentation for the sale and that the property is part of the ABSI multi-exclusive property pool.

description: This flat is located in a quiet and residential area of Calvià, with communal swimming pool and green areas, which offers a great opportunity to enjoy leisure time in a quiet and familiar atmosphere. It is a first floor and has three bedrooms, two of them double, with built-in wardrobes. One of the two bathrooms is en suite.  It also has a toilet, ideal for guests or for greater comfort in your day to day life.  It has a laundry area, which makes it easy to wash clothes and keep them in perfect condition. The living-dining room is one of the strong points of the property, as it is very spacious and bright. From it you can access one of the two individual terraces that the flat has.  In addition, it has private, covered and individual parking, which provides greater security and comfort to the owner. It is worth mentioning that a year ago all the exterior carpentry of the flat was refurbished. If you would like more information about the property, please do not hesitate to contact us.

description: This idyllic semi-detached house is located on the edge of Palma's city center and impresses with its location in an up-and-coming neighborhood, its good state of repair and its high potential for expansion. The building, built in 1970, has an area of 300 square meters. On 3 floors you have plenty of space for your creative development. It is entirely up to you whether you want to further increase the market value through additional modernization or whether you want to keep the historic and well-preserved architectural style. Throughout the house there are typical features of the country, such as high ceilings, well-preserved tiles and traditional solid wood doors. Some of the current furniture, such as real wood, can be taken up as an option. A feature of the property that is rare in Mallorca and therefore worth mentioning is the gas connection. The ground floor also includes a large garage. Here you can store your car or create more living space. In the basement there is also a bedroom with a dressing room and a patio that needs a creative design. On the first floor there is a cozy and bright living room with an adjoining dining room, 4 bedrooms and a beautiful and spacious bathroom. This apartment offers more than enough space to welcome family, friends and acquaintances. In addition, the kitchen is flooded with light and offers an incomparable view of the flourishing green of the garden while cooking. The highlight of the building are the cozy terraces, which invite you to relax under the Majorcan sun. Spend unforgettable moments under the open sky with your loved ones and/or withdraw from everyday life. Here you can immerse yourself in the varied, but also welcoming, lifestyle of Mallorca. Facing the large terrace, on the second floor, there is also a particularly spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom.

description: This ground floor living is located in a in a building on quiet street around the corner from Santa Catalina's renowned market hall. The property has previously been both a residence and a shop, most recently it has been used for storage/warehouse and as a changing room for the employees of a company. Here is electricity and water and some rooms have stucco on the ceiling and the ceiling's are high, regardless the whole living and outdoor area needs a complete renovation. The 130 square meters offers many possibilities and the current owner has paid a well-known interior design company to make two project proposals that can be shared with a serious buyer. Inside the ground floor there is a larger backyard of 40 square meters, which also contains possibilities for a garden, a smaller "plounge pool", outdoor kitchen, recreation area etc. The whole building have 2 more floors above and it's one apartment on each of these floors. The other floors currently doesn't have access to the back yard.  This is an investment opportunity regardless of if it is for a private buyer who wants to make his dream home here or for an investor who will do the renovation and resale. The property is in the heart of Santa Catalina with its lively bars and restaurants and yet you can enjoy the peace and quiet inside your own home, but also out on the terrace it is quiet and secluded.

description: This 3-story corner property has a garage, large basement, entrance floor with an uninhabited apartment where a renovation has begun, this floor has an interior patio. Floor 1 and 2 are inhabited and both have their own balcony and a smaller laundry / interior patio and they are equal in size and have the same distribution. The third floor is slightly smaller, but in addition has two terraces, one on each side of the property. Above the third floor there is a large, renovated roof terrace of 84 sqm which is currently used by the resident on the 3rd floor, but since it has access via the stairwell, it can be used by all residents.  From the roof terrace there is an open view over the rooftops, towards Castel Bellver and you can glimpse the sea in the horizon. The four apartments are distributed as follows: Entrance floor, 78 sqm, 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom. First floor, 113 sqm, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms. Second floor, 113 sqm, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms. Third floor, 84 sqm, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 terraces of 29 sqm and 9 sqm A project to install an elevator in the property has been developed. On the entrance level with entrance from the outside there is a garage with currently a parking space and a staircase down to a basement. In the garage there is the possibility to install a car lift and make about 4 parking spaces in the basement. The property is located in a very quiet area, centrally located in Son Espanyolet. Around the corner there is a service shop, deli, fruit shop, café and several smaller local restaurants. Palma's largest private hospital, Clinica Juaneda, is about 5 minutes walk away and it is just as close to the exclusive Sports Club, Palma Sport & Tennis Club and in another 2 minutes you are in trendy and restaurant-dense Santa Catalina. Palma's beautiful harbor promenade is a 10-minute walk away.  It is walking distance to "everything" and in addition it is less than 5 minutes drive to the ring road that goes around Palma and from where there are exits to highways out of Palma. It is a 15-minute drive to the airport and just as close to the beaches of Cala Major and Illetas on one side of Palma and Ciudad Jardin on the other.

description: Spectacular villa of 305 m2 built, on a plot of 800m2, this wonderful villa is located in a very distinguished and quiet urbanization, a very familiar area 10 minutes from Palma. This property stands out for its beauty and good taste, all the rooms are very bright and spacious, made with top quality materials and very functional, it is designed so that it can be enjoyed both in summer and winter, since we have a large terrace with a pool to enjoy summer lunches and dinners, and in winter we have a large living room with a fireplace overlooking the garden, to enjoy the cold winter days. The house is divided into 2 floors: on the ground floor we have a large hall with a built-in wardrobe, 1 double bedroom, 1 complete bathroom with a bathtub, a dining room, a living room with a fireplace, both with access to the terrace, a fully equipped independent kitchen with Exit to the terrace, pantry and laundry. On the first floor we have: an impressive staircase that leads to the 3 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, all with access to the terrace and views of the mountains, 2 bathrooms. The house is surrounded by terraces and a garden, we have a back porch, swimming pool, barbecue area, garage for two cars and automatic barriers, all very well maintained, ready to move into. House qualities: high ceilings, large aluminum windows with double glazing, hardwood doors and wardrobes, stoneware floors, rear porch with exposed wooden beams, central heating, fireplace. This property can be the house of your dreams. Do not hesitate to call us for a visit.

All surrounded by a terrace with large garden, porch, barbecue, wine cellar, garage and sea views from the balcony of the main bedroom.  In good condition with marked stately style of the year 1990, of origin, alarm and video surveillance cameras, away from all noise and stress, a step away from all the services, transports and shops, a few minutes from the centre of Palma and in front of the best beaches of the island.

description: Spectacular Mallorcan farm with a 38,560m2 plot with a 567m2 house built in a dream environment, the house is surrounded by olive trees (450 olive trees in production), carob and fruit trees, with impressive views of the mountains. The house is divided into two floors: on the ground floor we have a hall, a large living room with a fireplace, very spacious and bright, we also have a large kitchen-dining room with a fireplace, fully equipped, very spacious and bright with access to a large terrace, garden and pool, on this same floor we have a bedroom with a very spacious and bright built-in wardrobe, bathroom and storage room. On the first floor we have: 4 very spacious bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, all with views of the mountains and 3 bathrooms. Outside the house we have: a large 48 m2 barbecue, we have a front porch, a back porch, swimming pool, garden, several open terraces, the farm is fully enclosed with a stone wall and grill, there are two entrances to the farm one by road and the other by a dirt road. The house is made with top quality materials, hardwood doors, aluminum windows, climalit windows, the house is lined with natural stone, high ceilings, stoneware floors, there is endesa light, a vein water well. The farm has a VACATION LICENSE FOR 9 PLACES, has a certificate of habitability and is fully legalized. Ideal to be the house of your dreams. Do not hesitate to call us for a visit.

suggestedTexts.title: Estate

description: Spectacular villa in Marratxí, 620 m2 built on a 2912 m2 plot in Marratxí, with a swimming pool and a spectacular garden. The chalet is distributed over 2 floors, ground floor: entrance hall, dining room, living room with access to the terrace, 2 bedrooms (one single, the other double), 1 bathroom, equipped independent kitchen, pantry, utility room. First floor: we go up a staircase with an impressive window where we find 5 bedrooms (two of them with en-suite bathrooms), 1 bathroom, all of them with views of the mountains. Exteriors of the house: there is an impressive porch to enjoy lunch and dinner with the family, a large pool with a bathroom and an outdoor shower surrounded by grass and a beautiful and well-kept garden, the whole house is surrounded by plants and trees, throughout the garden there is automatic irrigation, we have a fountain and an adjoining land with fruit trees such as: pear, apple, orange, lemon, plum, fig trees; All the trees have automatic irrigation, we also have a vein well, electricity, central heating throughout the house, a cistern, a garage with an automatic door for 4 cars, the house has 3 independent entrances. The house is made with top quality materials, Portuguese marble floors, north wooden doors, aluminum windows, double glazing, Santanyí stone façade, the whole house is very spacious and very bright. This house is ideal to live with the family, or as a second home to come on vacation with family or friends. Do not hesitate to call us for a visit. with swimming pool and a spectacle.

description: Are you looking for a perfect town house to move into? With a terrace and beautiful unobstructed views of the Serra de Tramuntana? Take a look at this wonderful house that dates back to 1850, but it has been completely renovated with good qualities. 172 m2 built distributed over 2 floors, it has a spacious living-dining room, fully furnished kitchen, 3 exterior double rooms and 3 complete bathrooms. In addition, it has a magnificent solarium terrace ideal to enjoy with the family. With all kinds of amenities such as: air conditioning, fitted wardrobes and STORAGE ROOM, SOLD WITHOUT FURNITURE* Ask us for a visit, you will fall in love! Santa Eugenia is a Spanish town and municipality located in the central part of Mallorca. It borders the municipalities of Palma de Mallorca, Santa María del Camino, Consell, Sancellas and Algaida Our objective is yours, to sell at the best price in the shortest possible time.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Rustic property WITH HOLIDAY LICENSE FOR 8 PLACES in Son Sardina. This farm is located in a very quiet area on a dead end road, near the charming neighborhood of Son Sardina. It consists of 2 floors, ground floor: hall, spacious living room with fireplace, spacious and bright fully equipped kitchen with adjoining dining room, 1 double bedroom, bathroom, utility room. First floor: 3 double bedrooms (one with bathroom en suite), a wardrobe, terrace with views of the mountains. The farm has a beautiful garden with shrubs and plants of Mediterranean origin, a large pool. There is also a fence with fruit trees; orange, lemon, fig, pomegranate, medlar etc. We also have an unfinished part of the house with 2 floors of 40 m2 each floor, the upper floor has a fireplace, where an apartment could be made, in the back there is another construction that is currently used as a workshop, it could be converted in winter porch, room or other use. This farm is undoubtedly for someone who wants to build the house of their dreams, or to invest since there is a vacation license and many possibilities. The location is excellent, it is 10 minutes from Palma. House qualities: wooden shutters, climalit windows, stoneware floors, vein water well, gesa light. Do not hesitate to call us for a visit.

description: Villa of 275 m2 built, on a plot of 850 m2, in the charming urbanization of Son Ferrer. This beautiful and cozy chalet has a lot of charm, it is divided into 2 floors: on the ground floor we have an entrance hall, 1 bedroom, an independent kitchen with access to a rear terrace, a living-dining room with access to a front terrace, a living room, 1 bathroom, 1 storage room. All the rooms in the house are very spacious and bright. On the first floor we have 4 very spacious bedrooms, all with access to a balcony overlooking the garden. The whole house is surrounded by beautiful terraces, a garden and a swimming pool, ideal for enjoying summer lunches and dinners and enjoying the Majorcan climate all year round. Qualities: natural stone façade, Majorcan shutters, climalit windows, stoneware floors, equipped kitchen, very spacious bathrooms, central heating throughout the house, air conditioning hot / cold pump and garage for 2 cars. This property is ideal for a family or as a second home for vacations. The location is perfect close to all the service areas you may need, schools, doctors, supermarkets and a pharmacy. There are restaurants, cafeterias, and it is a very familiar urbanization. It is 5 minutes from the beach of El Toro and Port Adriano. And 15 minutes from Palma. This could be the house of your dreams. Do not hesitate to call us for a visit.
