description: Impressive Majorcan house in the town of Santa Eugenia, the property of 298 m2 built, from the year 1800, completely renovated, very spacious and bright spaces, high ceilings, large windows.The house is distributed over 2 floors. Ground floor: typical Mallorcan entrance hall with natural stone walls, a bathroom, fully equipped kitchen, pantry, utility room, cellar, large living room with fireplace with access to the garden and pool area, the garden that invites us to enjoy our free time with family or friends, garage for 2 cars. First floor: we have 4 spacious and very bright double bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (one en suite), dressing room.From the first floor we can admire the impressive views of the mountains and town. This house is full of charming corners, it is made with top quality materials, natural stone facade, wooden beams, typical Majorcan wooden doors and windows, ceramic and stoneware floors, oil central heating throughout the house, chiminea, air conditioning hot / cold air pump, fitted wardrobes, mains electricity, running water from the town, there is a cistern for collecting rainwater. It has a certificate of occupancy, an energy certificate, and the location is unbeatable, 20 minutes from Palma, 25 minutes from the airport and 30 minutes from the nearest beach, Santa Eugenia is a very charming town. This house is ideal for family living, as a permanent home or as a second home to enjoy your holidays in Mallorca. Feel free to call us for a visit.

description: Bright penthouse with sea views, 3 bedrooms, covered winter garden, very large roof terrace with hydromassage, in a building with swimming pool and garage in San Agustí. Second and last floor in a building with lift. It measures approximately 189 sqm built, living area of approximately 152 sqm, and a roof terrace of approximately 130 sqm. It consists of a bright living-dining room with access to a covered winter garden of approximately 30 sqm with sea views, 3 balconies, 3 double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, 2 bathrooms, the master bedroom en suite with dressing room and modern kitchen with laundry room. It has centralised air conditioning with hot and cold pump, double glazed windows, in perfect condition ready to move in. Going up one floor, we will find a large roof terrace of approximately 130 m2 with jacuzzi, a covered dining area and summer kitchen with excellent views to the sea and the city. Ideal to enjoy all year round thanks to its south-west orientation. Also on the upper floor there is a small storage room of approximately 6 m2.  The building is in excellent condition, built in 2001, and is located in one of the quietest and most private areas of San Agustí. It has a very fine communal swimming pool and 2 private parking spaces in underground garage. Easy access to the port of San Agusti, shops, restaurants, and very well communicated with Palma and the airport.

The ground floor has one large suite with 2 bedrooms, kitchen, patio and living room. On the second floor you have 3 large suites with, bathrooms and private terraces.  On the top floor you have one master suite with access to the grand rooftop terrace.  There is an elevator from the ground floor all the way up to the top floor.  Centrally situated, a stones throw from Paseo Maritimo and the harbour, this hotel offer access and proximity to Palma that is unmatched! description: Semi-detached house with 3 floors, 4 bedrooms, 3 terraces with unobstructed sea views, garden and garage in Nueva Santa Ponsa. This large house measures approx. 317m2 on a plot of approx. 1845m2 and is divided into 3 floors. The house has 4 bedrooms (3 suites) and 4 bathrooms. On the main floor there is a large open plan living room with fireplace with access to a large terrace with unobstructed sea views, a nice independent fully equipped kitchen with sea views, a double bedroom, a complete bathroom with shower and a large suite.  From the entrance hall we go upstairs to another larger suite with large windows and a very spacious terrace with panoramic sea views. From the main floor we can go down to a third suite with its own kitchen, laundry room and solarium with unobstructed views. The house has a beautiful green garden on both sides. It is equipped with ducted air conditioning with hot and cold pump. It is in very good condition and ready to move in with your family. This large villa is situated in a quiet area, has a large garage and storage room. Well communicated with the public areas and only a few minutes away from the centre of Palma, within walking distance to all the services, transports, shops and very close to the best beaches of the island.

Regarding the distribution of the house, it is divided into 2 floors: - On the lower floor: Large kitchen, laundry room, living-dining room with fireplace, 3 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 1 bathroom. - On the upper floor: spacious living room with fireplace and through a spiral staircase 1 double bedroom with built-in wardrobe and bathroom with hydromassage, as well as a wonderful 80 m2 terrace. As for qualities, it has new oil boiler heating, AACC, double glazed windows, exposed wooden beams, custom-made furniture made of northern wood and windows protected with wrought iron security metal bars. An absolutely incredible flat with unique characteristics in a luxury building with few neighbours. Air conditioning and heating, 2 private garage spots in the building with space for some storage as well. Located adjacent to the Las Ramblas and the harbour this flat enjoys an unbeatable location in the lovely Palma Old Town, La Lonja. Close proximity to all shops, the best restaurants the island has to offer and the harbour a stones throw away! Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity! description: Completely renovated beautiful penthouse with high ceilings and preserved charm such as visible wooden ceiling beams and imitations of the old doors in modern, high quality that contribute to the character of the floor. From the home's entrance you enter directly into the 30 square meter open and spacious social area with a fantastic ceiling height and the visible renovated ceiling beams. The fully equipped kitchen is open towards the living room and is very bright thanks to 4 French balconies.  At the far end of the living room is a modern and stylish gas stove which in addition to being nice to look at actually also heats. After the living room is a bedroom from where you can enjoy the same warming and cozy stove, but from the other direction. The three bedrooms are located one after the other horizontally to the social area and all have en-suite bathrooms. The innermost bedroom also has a smaller terrace with morning sun, perfect for morning yoga followed by morning coffee. The entire home has underfloor heating and built-in air conditioning giving both cooling and heating. The floor's color scheme is a warm beige including a renovated and preserved original wall in the living room where the beautiful Mallorcan Marès stone (the same type of stone that Palma's beautiful cathedral is built from) is fully visible. Everything is sober and elegant with the original charm well preserved in the modern. Upstairs with private access is the home's private roof terrace with a magical view of the beautiful rooftops of the old town, which here between Placa Cort and Placa Mercat have almost all of them being renovated. Everything looks very romantic and neat. The terrace of 28 square meters is rectangular with about 1/3 of the surface being under a shady roof where it is prepared for an outdoor kitchen with water and electricity.  Despite the fact that the properties here are close to each other and the terrace being fairly large, it´s almost complete privacy. The same applies to the entire home, which is definitely totally private. The entire building is completely renovated, it´s a small community with only 4 neighbors, one on each floor and there is a new modern elevator. A very spacious private garage of 30 square meters which is next to the entrance to the property is included in the price. The house is located in the heart of the old town on a quiet and cozy side street with a few minutes' walk to all the conveniences and services you could possibly need, including lots of good restaurants.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sindicat, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: STUNNING NEW VILLA WITH SEA VIEWS UNDER CONSTRUCTION Stunning new contemporary villa with sea views in the exclusive residential area of Costa d'en Blanes. The property with its striking minimalist design is currently under construction and will be completed in March 2023. The villa is situated on a plot of approx. 862 m² and offers a generous living area of approx. 480 m² distributed over 3 floors. The villa occupies an unbeatable hillside location and the main entrance is situated on the first floor of the property. This leads to a bright and spacious living-dining area and a luxurious open-plan kitchen. On this floor there is also an elegant double bedroom with bathroom en suite and dressing room. There is direct access to the fabulous terrace and swimming pool from all of these rooms. Fantastic views to the sea can be enjoyed from the first floor. The sunny terrace area allows you to make the most of the wonderful climate of Mallorca. The ground floor of the villa features the large main bedroom with its en suite bathroom, dressing room and private terrace. There are 2 additional double bedrooms, both with en suite bathrooms on the ground floor. The property benefits from a superb underground double garage, as well as storage and laundry rooms. Top quality building materials and modern technology are being used in the construction of this contemporary villa. Further special features include underfloor heating, air conditioning (hot / cold) and a lift which provides access to all 3 floors.   Costa d'en Blanes is a very popular residential area located in the hills above Puerto Portals with security at the entrance to the urbanisation. Some beautiful properties with magnificent sea views are located in this residential estate which is within close proximity to the marina at Puerto Portals. The Bendinat Golf Course is a short drive away and several sandy beaches are close by. Excellent motorway connections to Palma and the whole southwest coast. This is a very popular location for all year round living and is ideal for families with children thanks to the variety of good international schools in the local area.

description: Fantastic villa with 5 bedrooms and panoramic sea views near the beach in Costa d'en Blanes. Wonderful plot of 1812 sqm we find this splendid villa of approximately 630 sqm built and distributed in 3 floors, all of them with sea views. Large entrance hall, followed by a large triple living-dining room with 2 fireplaces, one of which could be a perfect office with sea views, and a spacious independent and equipped kitchen, all with direct access to a wonderful terrace with porch, barbecue, chill out and private infinity pool that merges with the sea.  Upstairs we find a large hallway that leads to the 5 double bedrooms, all with fitted wardrobes, all with en suite bathrooms, and the master bedroom with private terrace and dressing room. We can also access with private lift to the roof terrace and enjoy a perfect solarium with chill out area and sound system, apart from a large garden and jacuzzi, all with unbeatable views and magnificent solar orientation to enjoy the sunrise and the best sunsets of the island. In the basement we can find a beautiful wine cellar with controlled temperature and large closed garage with capacity for at least 4 cars. In very good condition, air conditioning and central heating, security door, and indoor and outdoor WIFI with fibre optic. All this surrounded by peace and tranquillity, away from all noise and stress, at the end of a residential cul-de-sac, in the most luxurious, exclusive and sought after location in the Balearic Islands, just a few minutes away from all services, the centre of Palma and right in front of the best beaches of the Mediterranean.

description: If you have a dream of having a romantic bed & breakfast in the country side in a romantic setting, then this may be the answer to your dreams! This spacious property is located on a hillside above Esporles and offers a fantastic panoramic view of the village and the mountains. Esporles charming cobbled streets with nice restaurants and a market in the square on Saturdays is within walking distance and Palma is only 15-20 minutes away by car. The house, which was built in the mid 80's is in need of an update. It has 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, an office room, a large, airy living and dining room as well as a large, separate kitchen. Around the house are several terraces, a green, mature garden with both trees and lower vegetation. The large pool is located on a hill from which you can enjoy the view of the valley and watch the sun go down behind the mountains. The property has its own well which is sufficient for all irrigation. The property's tourist license is for 8 people. Esporles is a charming mountain village at the foot of the Sierra de Traumuntana mountain range.  The village is located in a valley and has a small river that runs straight through the community, which gives that it´s often foggy in the mornings, especially in the autumn when the days are still warm while the nights start to get cool. The whole village is then embedded in a romantic fog reproduced in lots of photos and paintings. To add to the romantic feeling, the majority of the houses are large, beautiful old stone houses in the narrow alleys. The village is divided into the old town, Vilavella and the new town, Vilanova and is especially popular with nature lovers and the island's resident population due to not being a typical tourist route. The most famous attraction in the area is Sa Granja, an impressive historic mansion with museums dating back to Roman times and the island's feudal past. Above all, Esporles year-round is an ideal place to practice outdoor sports such as hiking, cycling and climbing. There is a packed local event calendar with smaller events and festivities, the most famous of which is the annual pastry festival held in October. Over the years, Esporles has attracted a large number of international residents, partly due to the quiet location and proximity to Palma, but also many families since the local school is renown. It's approx 15-20 minutes drive to Palma and 20-25 minutes to the airport.

description: Villa with 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, pool, garden, terrace, basement and garage close to the beach in Santa Ponsa On a plot of 1.336 sqm, the house has two floors, which as a whole, has an approximate surface of 461 sqm distributed in 5 double bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, spacious living room, gas kitchen, garage, terrace, garden, swimming pool, basement and garage. It is bounded by the neighborhoods of Son Peretó, Son Flor, Son Roca, Son Anglada, Son Rapinya, Los Almendros and Son Xigala. Fantastic single-family house of 4 heights, distributed in: - Basement: Living room with fireplace, kitchen, 1 triple room that stands out for its size and 1 bathroom with shower. Parking with capacity for 2 cars, storage room, utility room and pantry. - Ground floor: Hall, large fully furnished open kitchen with access to the wonderful terrace where you can find the barbecue area, ideal for summer days. There is the possibility of building a pool. - 1st Floor: We find 2 APARTMENTS: Both have 1 living room, fitted kitchen, 1 double bedroom and 1 complete bathroom with hydromassage. - 2nd Floor: It has 2 double bedrooms, 1 full bathroom and a wonderful terrace. A unique home, spectacular for its size and the various independent rooms. Do not miss the opportunity to live in a magnificent area, close to all kinds of amenities and gastronomy. description: Large finca built in the 19th century in Alaró village at the front and out in the country at the back. 12,700 sqm plot, stable with 8 places, large guest property with two separate apartments, orchard and herb garden, large pool area with pool house with bathroom with shower, garage, here is everything! It is possible to build homes with 2 floors and a total of 1,100 sqm of living space + garage on the part of the plot of 300 sqm that runs along the village street after the main building. This property / project must be seen to understand its full potential. The main building has 3 floors and about 450 sqm of living space with a terrace of about 25 sqm on the second floor with mountain views. On the entrance floor outside the upper living room, facing the pool, there is also a larger ground terrace. The entrance level has a huge and very beautiful hall, two living rooms, a dining room, a giant kitchen with a separate entrance, a guest room with an attached bathroom and a beautiful staircase up to the next floor. Below the entrance level there is a cellar floor that is not used and is not completely excavated, here there are excellent opportunities to make a large wine cellar. The second floor has a large hall, 2 large bedrooms, one with an ensuite bathroom and a large terrace outside, a walk-in closet that has windows and is so large that it can also be used as a bedroom. There is also another bathroom. On the third and top floor, there are 3 more bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a large hall. The property is inhabited and in good condition, but needs to be updated. The property is heated with electricity. The adjoining garage has space for 3 cars and is about 45 sqm. The guest property has two separate apartments. One apartment has a kitchen, dining room, bathroom and an office / possible bedroom on the ground floor and 2 living rooms, 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom on the second floor. The second apartment has a large kitchen with access to a nice terrace, living room and a bathroom on the ground floor. Upstairs there are 2 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and another 1 bedroom. The guest property is electrically heated, has air conditioning is inhabited and is in good condition. The huge plot is not completely maintained, there is for example an old tennis court and here there has also previously been a training court for trotting horses, it says a lot about how big it is here and what opportunities there are.

description: With stunning views of the luxurious Port Adriano marina, this ultra-modern luxury villa was completed in 2022. In the basement there are 3 parking spaces, a large fitness/wellness area and a spacious guest floor. From here, you can access the upper floors by stairs or by elevator. On the ground floor is the imposing main entrance, through which you enter a bright main living room. It has a spacious living-dining room and a high-quality American kitchen. Furthermore, on this level there is a guest toilet. From the ground floor there is access to the large garden terrace with pool area. The infinity pool is 22 meters long. Upstairs are the bedrooms with a spacious master bedroom with walk-in closet and fireplace and en-suite bathroom. Three more bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms, adjoining. One floor up is the fantastic roof terrace, equipped with a hot tub, summer kitchen and a huge lounge. From all rooms you can enjoy a fantastic view of the sea.

description: Bright and high-quality renovated penthouse with a roof terrace of about 100 sqm and a balcony of about 8 sqm running along living room and master bedroom. The whole property is nestled in greenery, it is less than 5 minutes walk down to Cala Major's main street Avenida Joan Miró and about 2-3 minutes by car from the garage and out on the highway which is close by, but neither heard nor seen from the home. You enter directly into a hall way followed by an open kitchen on the right and a bathroom on the left. The kitchen is fully equipped with fridge, freezer, dishwasher, oven and microwave from NEFF and stove from Bora with built-in fan, all brand new and included.  Adjacent the kitchen is a laundry room with space for both washing machine, dryer and storage. The kitchen is cream-coloured with black stone on all countertops and is open to the spacious living room. Here is good space for a dinner table and sofas in front of the cozy fireplace. The home has 2 bedrooms, one on each side of the living room, both have both fitted wardrobes and plenty of space for a double bed of 180cm. Master bedroom has access to the long balcony outside and has en-suit bathroom with a separate toilet. All rooms have new AC units for cooling / heating and the entire floor has underfloor heating. All windows have sun shields. The entire home, including the roof terrace, has light natural stone tiles on the floors. The stairs up to the large terrace is from one corner of the balcony. The terrace is prepared for an outdoor shower and an outdoor kitchen with electricity and water along the wall towards the sea so you can cook in the balmy Mediterranean evening while watching the sea in the horizon! The community is well maintained, have 2 elevators and a guy working full time with Maintanance of the property including the pool area with large pool, sun loungers and a toilet. It is a good mix of different nationalities in the property. About half of the homes are inhabited all year round and half are holiday homes. The home is sold including a parking space in the common garage under the property and there is also an associated storage. 5 minutes away, along the main street Avenida Joan Miró there are round-the-clock service shops, bakery and many cafés and restaurants. Bus No. 4, which runs every 10 minutes between Placa España (central Palma) and Illetas, also stops there. The same bus takes you to Porto Pi shopping center to which you can also walk or cycle. Bus no. 4 also has a stop below the Swedish School in El Terreno and BIC Brittish International School. It´s about 15 minutes drive to the airport.

According to the official delimitation of the city council, it limits to the north with the neighborhoods of Sa Indiotería and Secar de la Real; to the east with s'Olivera and to the west, with the neighborhoods of Cas Capiscol and Campo Redondo. Modern and urban loft with excellent decoration and framed by refined details of the latest design. Enjoy excellent natural light provided by large windows that makes it a different and minimalist environment. Distributed in a spacious living-dining room with access to a balcony, a fully furnished kitchen equipped with all kinds of appliances. 1 very bright and exterior room and a full bathroom. suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Completely renovated beautiful penthouse with high ceilings and preserved charm such as visible wooden ceiling beams and imitations of the old doors in modern, high quality that contribute to the character of the floor. From the home's entrance you enter directly into the 30 square meter open and spacious social area with a fantastic ceiling height and the visible renovated ceiling beams. The fully equipped kitchen is open towards the living room and is very bright thanks to 4 French balconies.  At the far end of the living room is a modern and stylish gas stove which in addition to being nice to look at actually also heats. After the living room is a bedroom from where you can enjoy the same warming and cozy stove, but from the other direction. The three bedrooms are located one after the other horizontally to the social area and all have en-suite bathrooms. The innermost bedroom also has a smaller terrace with morning sun, perfect for morning yoga followed by morning coffee. The entire home has underfloor heating and built-in air conditioning giving both cooling and heating. The floor's color scheme is a warm beige including a renovated and preserved original wall in the living room where the beautiful Mallorcan Marès stone (the same type of stone that Palma's beautiful cathedral is built from) is fully visible. Everything is sober and elegant with the original charm well preserved in the modern. Upstairs with private access is the home's private roof terrace with a magical view of the beautiful rooftops of the old town, which here between Placa Cort and Placa Mercat have almost all of them being renovated. Everything looks very romantic and neat. The terrace of 28 square meters is rectangular with about 1/3 of the surface being under a shady roof where it is prepared for an outdoor kitchen with water and electricity.  Despite the fact that the properties here are close to each other and the terrace being fairly large, it´s almost complete privacy. The same applies to the entire home, which is definitely totally private. The entire building is completely renovated, it´s a small community with only 4 neighbors, one on each floor and there is a new modern elevator. A very spacious private garage of 30 square meters which is next to the entrance to the property is included in the price. The house is located in the heart of the old town on a quiet and cozy side street with a few minutes' walk to all the conveniences and services you could possibly need, including lots of good restaurants.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sindicat, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: This spacious classy apartment of almost 250 sqm is located in a renovated family palace with an incredibly airy and beautiful staircase, beautiful facade, and two well-kept courtyards, one of which is in the form of a green garden. The property is completely separated from the small street outside as you must first walk through another property's courtyard to get to this property. By car, you come from the other direction and via the garage up to the courtyard. The street outside is a small cobbled street and mainly a pedestrian street where only goods transport may drive. This historic family palace was rebuilt in the early 1990s into a multi-family property with 6 neighbors. The property then also had an elevator installed. From the entrance of the house, you have a classic work kitchen directly to the right with the majority of the equipment from Gaggenau. The kitchen is well planned and there is plenty of space to have breakfast. Inside the kitchen is a small room with a washing machine, dryer, water heater, and cleaning cabinet. There are windows with good light that are shared with the kitchen. Straight ahead from the entrance is the very generously sized dining room which also serves as both a music room, here is a classical piano and entertainment room as there is also a full-size pool table and it is still a spacious room. Between this room and the beautiful lounge facing the garden is ornate wooden vaults. Aesthetically, you would just as well be in an upper-class apartment in Paris, London or New York, here rests an aura of classic elegance and old money. Inside the dining room are two spacious bedrooms, the larger of which also houses two walk-in closets, one for the husband and one for the wife, an en-suite bathroom, and an office area in addition to additional wardrobes. The smaller, but still very spacious bedroom has a long, full wardrobe wall, this room is located towards the garden and its bathroom also serves as a guest toilet. The whole floor has many high windows and bathes in light.  The view is towards other beautiful properties and towards the garden and here is completely quiet. No cars are heard, only birds chirping. This is despite the fact that just a few steps away are the luxurious shopping street Paseig des Borne which ends in front of the beautiful sandstone cathedral. The equally famous shopping street Calle Jaime III is just as close. There are 2 parking spaces included in the garage under the property opposite this one. The property has a full-time porter who takes care of the property, inside and out, including the two courtyards, and is also helpful for minor problems in the individual homes. Across the small cobbled street, outside is the famous Taste Club where luxurious varieties of tapas are served to classical Sinatra music in beautiful surroundings. Within a 5-minute walk, you can probably reach the 50s better restaurants and boutiques in Palma, but inside the courtyard and upstairs, peace reigns.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Jaume, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Studio apartment

description: STUNNING NEW VILLA WITH SEA VIEWS UNDER CONSTRUCTION Stunning new contemporary villa with sea views in the exclusive residential area of Costa d'en Blanes. The property with its striking minimalist design is currently under construction and will be completed in March 2023. The villa is situated on a plot of approx. 862 m² and offers a generous living area of approx. 480 m² distributed over 3 floors. The villa occupies an unbeatable hillside location and the main entrance is situated on the first floor of the property. This leads to a bright and spacious living-dining area and a luxurious open-plan kitchen. On this floor there is also an elegant double bedroom with bathroom en suite and dressing room. There is direct access to the fabulous terrace and swimming pool from all of these rooms. Fantastic views to the sea can be enjoyed from the first floor. The sunny terrace area allows you to make the most of the wonderful climate of Mallorca. The ground floor of the villa features the large main bedroom with its en suite bathroom, dressing room and private terrace. There are 2 additional double bedrooms, both with en suite bathrooms on the ground floor. The property benefits from a superb underground double garage, as well as storage and laundry rooms. Top quality building materials and modern technology are being used in the construction of this contemporary villa. Further special features include underfloor heating, air conditioning (hot / cold) and a lift which provides access to all 3 floors.   Costa d'en Blanes is a very popular residential area located in the hills above Puerto Portals with security at the entrance to the urbanisation. Some beautiful properties with magnificent sea views are located in this residential estate which is within close proximity to the marina at Puerto Portals. The Bendinat Golf Course is a short drive away and several sandy beaches are close by. Excellent motorway connections to Palma and the whole southwest coast. This is a very popular location for all year round living and is ideal for families with children thanks to the variety of good international schools in the local area.

It has 2 double bedrooms, 1 large bathroom, large living room, 2 terraces, one with direct access to the community pool. Windows with double glazing (Climalit) and aluminum shutters Air conditioning (hot and cold) in living room and main room. DISTRIBUTION OF THE PROPERTY: - Dining room of 25 square meters with access to the terrace and views of the pool. - 2 double bedrooms, with fitted wardrobes. - Fully furnished independent kitchen with a laundry area of 12 square meters. - 1 complete bathroom with shower, with adapted access. - Butane gas thermos. - Parking space of 14 square meters. - Storage room The URBANIZACION SA TORRE, in the municipality of LLUCMAJOR, is a very quiet residential area, located on the south coast of Mallorca, with good connections, near El Arenal, Llucmajor and Palma and 20 minutes from the best beaches: Es Trenc, Ses Covetes and Sa Rápita. Nearby are all services: public transport, shops, supermarkets, restaurants and cafes, schools, hairdressers, medical center, gym, etc. Nice areas to walk and close to nature and the sea. It is located 15 minutes from Palma and 10 minutes from the airport. If you want more information or make a visit to the property, contact us and we will assist you without obligation. HOMEING MALLORCA REAL ESTATE.

In addition to the community pool, there is a small children's pool, ample sunbathing areas and an outdoor shower. The property is located in a quiet area, but you will find many restaurants, bars, supermarkets and shops a stone’s throw away.  The romantic bay 'Cala Blanca' with the popular 'Chringuito' and the beautiful sandy beaches of Santa Ponsa a short walk and the fabulous beach in Peguera is only a few minutes’ drive away. The apartment is sold fully furnished and equipped!

In a very quiet corner we find this property in absolute need of restoration, that could turn into the most beautiful home, naturally flooded with light and with a small private patio. A sure investment that maintained the original character in its architecture: wooden beams, floor tiles, balconies, windows and doors are there to be brought back to life and enhance the splendor of once. description: Located on the seafront and with impressive panoramic views, we present this bright apartment in Santa Ponsa in need of reform. The community, equipped with solar panels and lifts, is very well maintained and offers a large community pool and a spacious private car park with the possibility of renting a space. As soon as you leave, you can walk to the beach and the center of Santa Ponsa by the edge of the sea, with a wide variety of restaurants along the way. The Apartment has a constructed area of approx. 135 m2 that is divided as follows: a living-/ dining room with a terrace of approx. 24 m2 and floor to ceiling windows, which allow fantastic views of the Mediterranean Sea, a functional kitchen, 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Other features: parquet flooring and ceiling fans. Due to its unbeatable orientation, it allows you to enjoy the sunrise and the impressive sunsets. The house needs some reform to bring it up to date, but you can live in it as it is. At the end of this year, the building's façade will be renovated. Santa Ponsa is an attractive residential area, highly sought after by international residents, in the southwest of Mallorca. The city of Palma and the airport are about 20 minutes away by car.

This magnificent penthouse has three double bedrooms, one with en-suite bathroom and dressing room, an additional bathroom, underfloor heating in bathrooms and kitchen, air-conditioning, central heating, storage room and garage. The designer villa offers three spacious bedrooms, all with bathrooms en-suite, from which each room gets to appreciate magnificent views of the sea.  As you enter the luxurious home, you enter a spacious, open living-dining area with large floor to ceiling glass frontage. A private elevator or staircase can take you to each floor including a 100 meters squared roof terrace with panoramic views out to the sea and bay and an underfloor double garage for two cars. The entire property is equipped with underfloor heating, air conditioning hot / cold, storage room and electric blinds. Other features and equipment of this property are: Tiled and marble floors, ISO windows, electric central heating and Majorcan aluminum shutters. In addition, there is a laundry room of 6 m2. The location of this magnificent property is unbeatable, with local bars, restaurants, bakeries, supermarkets, the church and the temporary Frédéric Chopin and George Sand Museum within a minute of the property. Valldemossa is a traditional and picturesque town at the foot of the Serra de Tramuntana.

The beautiful apartment has a constructed area of approx. 118 m2 distributed as follows: a spacious living / dining room with access to a sunny terrace with views of the surroundings, a furnished and equipped American kitchen, 2 elegant bedrooms, as well as 2 bathrooms. This attractive apartment in Palma is equipped with air conditioning, underfloor heating, double glazed windows, parquet floors and Sat TV. At your disposal you have a parking space in the garage. It is the perfect apartment for those, who like to be in the busy area and enjoy delicious meals in the excellent restaurants and the unique atmosphere of the capital of the beautiful island Mallorca. To the international airport it will take only about 10 minutes by car. In the building there are other apartments available from 700.000 to 1.075. 000 Eur. Do not hesitate to contact us for more information.

description: This beautiful apartment is located in San Agustín, in the southwest of the island Mallorca. The property has 3 bedrooms with built-in wardrobes (2 doubles and 1 single), 2 bathrooms (one with hydromassage and one with jacuzzi), a kitchen with utility room and a living / dining room. The living room has access to a terrace of approx. 15 m2 that offers views over the green surroundings and the sea to Cabrera Island. The area is very quiet, close to the beaches of Illetas, Cala Mayor and Cala Nova. Easy access to the Porto Pi shopping center. The center of the capital Palma is just a few minutes away by car.

description: This large spacious villa, built in 2007, would be the perfect home for families and those preferring great privacy. It stands on an approx. 1.271 sqm plot in a prime location in Sol de Mallorca and offers absolute tranquillity and a romantic ambience. Its living space is spread over 2 levels, and the large window frontages flood the living and sleeping areas with natural sunlight. Distributed over the ground floor is the spacious open living/dining area with direct access to a covered terrace, ideal to relax and enjoy warm summer evenings outside, a very modern fully-equipped kitchen with cooking island, a laundry room and a guest WC. On the first floor are the 4 bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, and a further living area with fireplace and access to a sun terrace. An absolute highlight is the external area with pool and with a wonderful, well-maintained garden full of charm and tranquillity. Further features of this exceptional property include central heating, hot/cold air conditioning, double glazing and a garage. The property is located close to prestigious marina and numerous restaurants, golf courses and sandy beaches.

The attractive property has a constructed area of approx. 106 m2 that are distributed as follows: a spacious living room with access to the terrace with fantastic views towards the sea, a modern kitchen with Bosch appliances, 3 nice bedrooms, as well as 2 bathrooms. The equipment features of this beautiful apartment in Arenal include: air conditioning, central heating, double glazed windows and wooden floors. The apartment has a very attractive location in the south of Mallorca, just a few steps from the port, the beach and the promenade that invites you to take beautiful walks, play sports and enjoy a variety of international bars and restaurants located on the First sea line. The international airport is only 10 minutes away by car. It is a perfect apartment for lovers of the sun, the beach and the Mediterranean atmosphere!

The magnificent property has 2 floors, a constructed area of approx. 85 m2 and a double entrance, one through the building and the other directly from the street. The exclusive apartment with luxury finishes and top quality finishes consists of a hall, living-/dining room, a beautiful equipped and furnished kitchen with access to an interior patio of about 8 m2, utility room, 2 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a bathroom with a shower. easy access. Currently, it is in the reform phase, completing all the details with top quality materials. Equipment: marble floors, air conditioning, security glazing and video intercom. Furniture is not included in the price. The neighborhood of Santa Catalina today is the trendiest in Palma de Mallorca. Its streets spread between the busy Paseo Marítimo and the interesting Es Baluard museum offer the most cosmopolitan experience of the capital.

description: This town house stands on a 1,700 m² plot and was completely renovated and extended in 2015. It is located at the end of a cul-de-sac with a beautiful view of the countryside in the center of Calvia, in the southwest of Mallorca, within walking distance of several cafes, restaurants, sports facilities, an indoor pool and supermarkets. The house is accessed via through a small and idyllic inner courtyard. It offers 245m² of built area on the ground floor, a bright living-dining room with open kitchen and access to the pool terrace, 1 toilet, 2 bedrooms, each with bathroom en suite. The rooms can also be accessed through the patio. On the 1st floor there are 2 more bedrooms, each with an en-suite bathroom. The equipment includes microcement floors, split air conditioning in all rooms h/c, infrared radiators and aluminum windows with double glazing on the ground floor. On the 1st floor it has single-glazed wooden windows with shutters. Outside there is a 4x8m swimming pool with sunbathing terraces and a covered relaxation area, as well as a barbecue area and a carport with space for 2 cars. A grassy area of approximately 70 m² would make the ideal playground for children or for dogs to run around. All the information in this exposé is based on the information that has been transmitted from the seller. Therefore, Finest Properties Mallorca S. L. assume no responsibility for the completeness, correctness and timeliness of this information. The declared prices do not include the costs borne by the buyer, such as taxes, notary, property registration and expenses of gestures. One possible subject to prior sale.

description: Spectacular penthouse in Santa Ponsa for sale. Santa Ponsa is located in the southwest of the popular holiday island of Mallorca. Only 25 km from the capital Palma and 30 km from the airport. The flat measures about 77m2 of which 40m2 is a spacious terrace with magnificent views to the sea and the beach of Santa Ponsa. 37m2 of the flat are distributed between a living-dining room with an open plan kitchen of about 20m2, a double bedroom and a bathroom with shower. The flat is refurbished. The orientation is southwest which makes this flat very warm and cosy, having the sun all day long. The area where the penthouse is located is very quiet. Thanks to the crystal clear water and the beautiful sandy beaches, Santa Ponsa is one of the most popular places in Majorca. Therefore, every year it attracts tourists from England, Germany, Holland and many other countries. With its almost 11.000 inhabitants, Santa Ponsa is in the middle category of Mallorca's resorts in terms of size. Santa Ponsa is known for its family atmosphere. Despite this, Santa Ponsa also offers discotheques and other options for the younger ones. Translated with (free version).

We also find international schools, public transport, pharmacies and international medical centers, as well as hospitals nearby. The house consists of 360 sqm living space, distributed in a main house with 4 double rooms, including the 20m2 master suite with bathroom and dressing room, and a guest apartment with three bedrooms, two doubles with bathroom en suite and one single.  The property was completely reformed in 2006/7 including the electrical installations, the plumbing and the roof. If you want more information, do not hesitate to contact us.

description: The residential complex Belavent in Nova Santa Ponsa is located in the southwest of Mallorca, in the immediate vicinity of the well-known marina Port Adriano with its sandy beach next to it. Located directly on the front line of the Santa Ponsa III golf course, the Belavent complex was built between 2003 and 2005 and has a night watchman, underground parking in all buildings with storage rooms and a lift, beautiful garden areas and 3 community pools. This bright, southeast-facing apartment is located on the second floor of a very quiet block away from the noise of summer. The constructed area of 178m2 offers a spacious entrance hall, living-dining room with pre-installation for a fireplace, modern kitchen with utility room and breakfast bar with access to the dining room, three magnificent en-suite bedrooms, each with a covered terrace overlooking the golf course. The underground parking and storage room are easily accessible from the apartment by elevator. Additional features include double glazed windows, air conditioning hot/cold, fitted wardrobes, marble floors, satellite television, fiber optics, osmosis water treatment. Santa Ponsa offers a multitude of shops, international restaurants and cafes, as well as proximity to international schools, which makes this region an ideal place for both vacations and primary residence. The center of Palma is about 15 minutes away by car, while the international airport is about 25 minutes away.

description: Set in an absolutely idyllic location in the south west of Mallorca, between Port d’Andratx and the Port Adriano marina, this ultra-luxurious property with direct beach access is situated next to the Camp de Mar golf course and a sandy beach. The spectacular views over the coastline and the sea, the beautiful beach and golf course, to the hills of the Sierra de Tramuntana, are enjoyed from each room in the house as well as the exterior terraces.  The property has a total surface area of 780m2 including the separate guest house and it designed in a modern, minimalist style. The main house has four bedrooms and five bathrooms, a spacious and bright living room with fireplace, a modern, open and fully-fitted kitchen, dining room and two large terraces with fantastic views over the bay. The home has a spacious terrace off the living area with outdoor dining and lounging area. There are also several terraces off the bedrooms.  The guest house has a surface area of 290m2 with three bedrooms and bathrooms, a living room and a small American kitchen. A separate entrance leads to an extra staff apartment, with two small bedrooms. Amenities include air conditioning, international satellite TV and Wi-Fi. This luxury villa in Mallorca has a total of 415m2 of terraces, both open and covered, a private garage for three vehicles, and an elevator in the main house. There are, two swimming pools, one exterior infinity pool with sea views and one indoor pool. In addition, there is an outside hot tub and sauna.

description: Tranquillity, serenity and light are found in this wonderful Mediterranean house, located in the popular and exclusive area of Calvia. The property is situated in the peaceful neighbourhood of Portals Nous with the wonderful beaches and many day-to-day amenities just a short walk away. With a generous plot size, this stylish house proudly sits, south facing the tiered landscaped private garden. Overlooking the pool with fruit trees which benefits from sun all day. This unique and welcoming villa offers 4 bright bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, with the master suite benefiting from a separate dressing room or office space.  The large kitchen feels warm and inviting as it flows onto a stunning covered terrace overlooking the outdoor pool. The spacious lounge area boasts three sets of doors, making the room sun lit and inviting.  The double height entrance hall leads down to the indoor pool with jacuzzi, personal sauna and fitness room. Adjacent to the indoor pool there is a double garage along with additional parking space for several cars which is located at the back of the property. There are a number of schools within walking distance, along with the famous harbour of Porto Portals, offering many shops, bars and restaurants. The island’s capital, Palma is just a 10-minute drive away. We strongly advise viewing on this well constructed and wonderful home. description: Finca in the area of Santa Maria / Santa Eugenia, on a beautiful rustic land ANEI of 38,000 square meters we offer for sale this magnificent Finca with Mallorcan stone house of little antiquity. The house of 360 meters built has on the ground floor two living rooms, a bedroom and a bathroom, very large kitchen and a storage room. On the first floor, 4 bedrooms and a bathroom. On the outside we have another bathroom, the pool area, and a summer kitchen closed barbecue and everything is fully legalized. It is possible to build 140 meters more and also a tennis court. The farm has two driveways through different streets (you can fragment the land and make two independent houses) Oil heating. Own Water, Luz de Gesa. Hundreds of olive and orange trees. Holiday license for 9 guests! Great opportunity.

description: This modern design apartment offers spectacular views of the Mediterranean and the perfect Mallorcan lifestyle. This property enjoys spectacular views of the marina. Located on the second floor, it is in the heart of the famous and impressive Paseo Marítimo. With its southeast orientation and unobstructed views of the Mediterranean and moored yachts, you can enjoy the Mediterranean lifestyle. Created by an experienced team of architects, all the materials for the interior and exterior finishes of the apartment are natural, selected, with high quality, which gives this house its true Majorcan feel. It boasts high ceilings, with a large living/dining room, state-of-the-art kitchen and a large terrace perfect for dining under the stars. If we add to this the spacious bedrooms and en-suite bathrooms, we have the ideal space for a family or to receive guests. The apartment has 151m2 of living space and an additional 19m2 of terrace.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Paseo Marítimo, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This modern villa offers relaxation and calmness pure with its interior design, light flooded rooms and its very well maintained garden and pool area. The beautifully planted and landscaped outdoor area ensures that you will never lose the feeling of vacation within your own home. Furthermore, you are only in short walking distance to the Port of Portals Vells and the beach. On the spacious ground floor you will find the open kitchen, dining and living area as well as a separate guest bedroom with bath en-suite as well as a guest bathroom right next to the entrance. Enjoy the beautiful outdoor views through the ample windows facing the garden and pool area. To assure that you can enjoy the outdoor area all year long, it comes with a heated pool and partly covered terraces. You will find further bedrooms on the first floor. While the master bedroom features its own walk-in wardrobe and en suite bathroom, the other two bedrooms are having also access to the large terrace of the first floor. Enjoy peaceful views from here with a glass of wine and a book. Also, the first floor gives you access to the generous rooftop terrace with wide views over the green zone area and a peak of sea views. Feel free to reach out to us to get more information about the stylish and peaceful villa in Sol de Mallorca!

description: DUPLEX PENTHOUSE IN ONE OF THE BEST AREAS OF PALMA! House on two floors with 180 m2 of living space + separate terraces located in the area of Son Armadams, Palma. On the main floor we have a spacious 50 m2 living-dining room, a furnished and equipped kitchen with a dining area, 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom. On the upper floor we have 3 bedrooms (the main one with a dressing room and living room) and 2 bathrooms (the master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom). DAIKIN brand air conditioning with heat pump throughout the house. Includes a parking space in the same building.

description: The Toro Avenida del Mar, beautiful villa on the seafront on a cliff, overlooking the sea, the Malgrats Islands and Port Adriano. The house is built on a plot of 507 square meters, and the constructed area is 207 real meters. Pool not in plans but legal for being old built. Certificate of no urban violations.   Year of construction 1986, with several renovations and upgrades to keep the house in a very good condition.    Ibi taxes and rubbish 1,000 euros per year. House with front garden, two floors and back terrace with pool. Ground floor, entrance hall, two living rooms with fireplace, very spacious kitchen furnished and equipped, laundry, a double bedroom, bathroom and toilet. First floor, two double bedrooms with ensuite bathroom, large terraces. Parking for two cars.    .

description: When a project goes beyond architecture and design, it becomes a work of art.Located in the residential area of Bonanova, above Palma, this development of two buildings comes to life to create a new lifestyle. Sustainability, design and high qualities are combined with an experienced team.The two EAST and WEST buildings offer diversity and privacy.Both the EAST and the WEST have 6 apartments.While almost every apartment has its own pool, both buildings offer a community gym for their residents. Apartment sizes vary from 105m2-227m2, while prices for available units range from €760,000 for a garden apartment to €2,775.€000 for a 5-bedroom penthouse with views of the sea and the Palma skyline. Unit 5 in the WEST building is a duplex penthouse with its own pool overlooking the sea and enjoying sun all day.On a constructed area of 106m2 there are 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a 43m2 roof terrace including its own swimming pool.A garage space and a storage room are included.The building offers a community gym.

description: 5924D PALMA OLD TOWN - SPECTACULAR APARTMENT WITH STUNNING VIEWS Ref. 5924D This property for sale is a totally unique opportunity to own an historical part of the old town. Located In the heart of Palma city and composed of 83 sqm built plus 16 sqm of private terrace. The apartment faces an antique and established garden and has the most beautiful open views over trees and plants, giving a feeling of openness. Totally flooded with light and professionally refurbished, this property has, at the moment, one spacious double bedroom, one bathroom, a sizable living room and a fully furnished kitchen, on the side of the entrance we also find a good size utility room. There is the possibility to add a second bedroom, the plans are attached below. Set in a totally refurbished XIV century “Palacete”, enjoys the outstanding and original features carefully restored and the modern facilities.  Features: Gas central heating Air Conditioning throughout  Private Terrace Lift Double glazed windows Refurbished.

description: New work spectacular design project on the first line of the Port of Palma de Mallorca - Nuevo Club de Mar. This new exclusive development - Harbor Lofts combines exceptional design, fantastic views and quality of life. Harbor Lofts offers 15 luxury apartments with spacious common areas with plenty of terraces, a stylish outdoor pool, a spa with fitness center, sauna, and indoor pool. As there are only 12 apartments and 3 duplex penthouses in the complex and all balconies are specially designed, there is a very intimate and private atmosphere. In addition, the complex offers a large underground car park spread over 3 levels with several parking spaces. Through the large windows all apartments enjoy plenty of natural light. Each apartment has its own spacious terrace. The apartments have excellent sea/harbour views as well as a romantic view of Palma and the famous cathedral. There are currently 7 apartmentsavailable with prices from 1,995, 000 to 5,100, 000 for a penthouse Duplex. Request your site visit with JD residences +34 606824162 Daniel Cano.

description: Mallorca Sweet Home presents: In the Palmesano neighborhood of "Es vivero", a quiet, familiar neighborhood with an excellent location, this 3 bedrooms flat. It has numerous services within easy reach, such as a pharmacy, medical center, a popular supermarket 2 minutes from home, parks, etc. Thanks to its proximity to Calle Aragón, it offers easy and comfortable mobility, with bus stops within a 1-minute walk and exit to the Via de Cintura within 5 minutes by car. The house has 81 m2 distributed in: receiver/distributor 3 bedrooms, one of them double. Balcony in one of the rooms 1 full bathroom with bathtub small utility room for a washing machine. kitchen new furniture to install. Brand new plumbing and electricity, tiling and extractor hood already installed. 20 m2 dining room with windows. All windows are aluminum and double glazed windows. All gates are brand new. Community fees of €60/month, including water, cleaning and a fund for contingencies. The staircase of the building is very comfortable. Be the first to visit it! Mallorca Sweet Home, your trusted agency.

description: Sant Jordi, a small charming town very close to the airport of Palma de Mallorca, JD residences offers you this magnificent House of The Mallorcan period of the year 1945, in original condition and an excellent state of conservation.    The plot of 337 meters houses this classic style house of 405 meters built on two floors plus mezzanine and a small basement (formerly a cupboard to keep food fresh). -   In the quality of its finishes, the beauty of the floors and the carpentry work it is seen that in its time this house was the project of a great architect and an excellent execution.   The house needs to adapt to modern times, electricity, heating, windows.    It has 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, kitchen, two living rooms and a large loft that is used as a storage room. The house has both front and rear patios and gardens. The views from the upper floor and terrace is magnificent.   The proximity of the airport to the village of Sant Jordi is not much noticeable in aircraft noise. Good opportunity to acquire a house with a lot of charm.    .
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Jordi, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: House in Calle Bauzà

description: EXCLUSIVITY LIVING BLUE MALLORCA! For sale is this elegant, peacefully situated villa with fantastic views of the idyllic village of Alaró and the mountains. The property is near to the village and you can reach the market place in only five minutes by foot. The villa of around 447 m2, perfectly oriented to the south-west, consists of two floors and includes five bedrooms and three bathrooms.  On the ground floor, there is a fabulous open-plan living and dining room with fireplace and integrated kitchen, as well as direct access to the terrace via a huge, fully retractable patio door. This merges the indoor and outdoor areas and creates an inviting living area flooded with light. The exclusive kitchen is equipped with the best electrical appliances (Siemens, Miele). You will also be delighted by the above-average room height and the unobstructed view with perfect privacy. Furthermore, there is a separable library, a guest toilet, a laundry room and a large storage room.  Upstairs are five spacious, bright bedrooms and the elegant bathrooms with hand-crafted river stone floors. Generous built-in wardrobes in all bedrooms, a freestanding designer bathtub and the high ceilings with exposed roof trusses provide luxurious living comfort. Two bedrooms also offer access to a balcony with fantastic views of the countryside. Outside, there is a large, partially covered terrace with seating and lounging areas and access to a private saltwater infinity pool with separate mechanical room. Below is a green garden with fruit trees and a pretty old stone cottage that could be used as a guest house, workshop or hobby room.  The technical equipment in particular is impressive and, in addition to energy-efficient operation (A+! ), also allows you to conveniently control the house via mobile apps. This means that the property can be easily operated and monitored even during longer absences. Among other things, the villa is equipped with a solar system, photovoltaic system, Daikin heating and cooling system, heat pump, osmosis system, water softening system, fibre optic internet, alarm system and video surveillance, an automatic irrigation system for the garden and much more.  This is a unique, high-level property with lots of style and extremely high quality construction. It has been freshly renovated and furnished. The furniture can be remo.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Alaró
suggestedTexts.title: House

description: Fantastic front line sea view apartment Entering this special front line apartment, you will be immediately captivated by its idyllic sea views. The open views to the sea and the bay with the famous Malgrats Island leave nothing to be desired. The spacious terraces truly invite you to enjoy every minute in the fresh sea air, to relax in the Mediterranean Sea breeze. Because of the amazing exterior terraces spaces, one has the opportunity to enjoy many hours in the sun in a very private and quiet atmosphere over 300 days of the year. The Mediterranean frontline community offers a beautiful and spacious community pool as well as direct sea access with a romantic sandy beach. This lovely apartment offers three bedrooms and two bathrooms; the master bedroom is en suite and opens wide to the covered seafront terrace. The living room with Ibiza-style wood burning fireplace flows into the dining area and modern open kitchen. The apartment also offers two additional spaces, one of which could potentially be converted into a guest apartment and an unbuilt space of 66 m2 which could be envisioned as a wine bodega or entertainment room! The property also benefits from marble heating units, ceiling fans in the bedrooms, a utility room and a parking place within the community. This rare offering will not last! Santa Ponsa has become one of the most sought-after residential areas in southwest Mallorca. The perfect infrastructure in terms of the nearby cultural city of Palma and the international airport, the breathtaking landscape and exclusive neighborhoods make Santa Ponsa a unique place. The impressive cliffs with the unparalleled view of the three Malgrats islands, the rich offering of golf courses and the location near the new, exclusive yacht marina of Port Adriano provide a unique Mediterranean lifestyle on Mallorca.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This exclusive villa in Santa Ponsa is being renovated to a house that captivates the typical Mediterranean lifestyle. It will be ready in the spring of 2024. Santa Ponsa has an amazing backdrop of the Tramuntana mountains and a seafront with impressive cliffs and beautiful beaches.  There are also several golf courses in the area and not far from Santa Ponsa town lies the famous marina Port Adriano designed by Philippe Starck with its superyachts.   The modern villa has a generous living area of 283 m2 that is divided over 2 levels. On the entrance level we find a large open area consisting of the living room and kitchen. There is also a bedroom with en-suite bathroom, a laundry room and a complete, separate bathroom. From the living room you have access to the covered and uncovered terrace connected to the pool area and garden. Via a stairway you reach the next level where the remaining 4 large bedrooms with bathroom en-suite are located. Two of the bedrooms have access to the terrace on the same level overlooking the garden and pool area.   Additional information: air conditioning, double glazing windows, garden, pool and garage.

description: This house has been extensively renovated, nestled in a cul-de-sac with its private off-road parking. The house is a traditional style filled with lots of light. With a nice distribution, the house is entered from its center. Immediately to your front you have a cozy living room separated by a nice glass door. To your right, there is a spacious and fully equipped kitchen with separate dining. Also on this floor is the fourth bedroom (office) and adjacent guest bathroom. Consisting of 4x bedrooms and 3x bathrooms in total the house is split over two floors. On the upper floor there are 3x more bedrooms with 2x bathrooms, one of which is en-suite. The master bedroom offers a private and spacious roof terrace with nice views to the sea and surrounding area. The gardens are well taken care of, and the swimming pool is a perfect sun trap for those sun worshipers. The house is equipped with full hot and cold AC, there is a double garage.

description: This house is a little like a diamond in the rough, or a hidden jewel, simply put a beautiful home that cannot be appreciated until you enter it and start to take in its grandeur. Covering around 900m2 build size and as much as 200m2 of terraces, the house if spacious but with a great interior design to make it feel warm and homely. Large bedrooms and master suites with nice views, lush gardens, a guest apartment, and an enormous parking garage, this truly is a home to view. The location is private and protected but has access to the sea and water's edge.

description: Elegant penthouse with stunning views Immerse yourself in the Mediterranean lifestyle with this spacious penthouse in Nova Santa Ponsa. This unique and beautifully maintained property is located in a Mediterranean complex on the Santa Ponsa II golf course, offering breathtaking views of the hills and a partial sea view from the rooftop terrace. The south-facing orientation and covered terraces make it possible to enjoy the sun all day long. This penthouse offers 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, with two of them en suite ensuring maximum privacy. The bright and homely dining and living area with fireplace and access to the main terrace is the perfect place to relax and enjoy the view of the stunning landscape. A garage, storage room, and elevator are also available to make your daily life easier. The quiet community complex offers resort-style living with two outdoor pools and an indoor swimming pool. The residential complex is located in close proximity to the Santa Ponsa II and III golf courses, making it the perfect place for golf enthusiasts. Families and those seeking for peace and quietness will also find their heaven here. Whether as a holiday home or year-round residence, this property is a dream waiting to be discovered by you! Don't miss out the chance to make this unique property your own home. Santa Ponsa has become one of the most sought-after residential areas in southwest Mallorca. The perfect infrastructure in terms of the nearby cultural city of Palma and the international airport, the breathtaking landscape and exclusive neighborhoods make Santa Ponsa a unique place. The impressive cliffs with the unparalleled view of the three Malgrats islands, the rich offering of golf courses and the location near the new, exclusive yacht marina of Port Adriano provide a unique Mediterranean lifestyle on Mallorca.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: This bright partially furnished apartment is located just a few minutes from the beautiful Playa de Palma, The apartment offers a total of 83 m2 and has a small fully equipped kitchen, a sunny living room and separate dining room with partial sea views, as well as 3 bedrooms and a bathroom. The location offers a variety of restaurants and bars, The proximity of the center of Palma de Mallorca and the airport make this the ideal place for those who want to live here all year round or for those looking for a second home.

description: Wonderful luxury Villa of 700 m2 with several terraces and LARGE TERRACE ON THE ROOF, with SPECTACULAR SEA VIEWS, on a plot of 1378 m2, with large POOL AND PRIVATE GARDEN located in Santa Ponsa, a few minutes from the beach and golf. This INCREDIBLE BRAND NEW LUXURY VILLA, built in 2021, is ready to move into and brand new. It has 3 levels and a roof terrace, all connected by a lift and stairs. The fully open ground floor is divided into 3 large rooms, a large American kitchen (it will be ready in a couple of weeks), a dining area, a large living room divided into 2 rooms with a beautiful fireplace in the middle.On this same level there is a guest toilet.Outside there is a large terrace, a beautiful garden and a spectacular private pool. On the upper level, 5 double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and all of them with en-suite bathroom with shower.The master bedroom has a dressing area and a bathroom with a bathtub and shower, as well as a private terrace.All bedrooms are exterior with access to several terraces with BEAUTIFUL VIEWS TO THE SEA AND THE POOL. On the roof, a large solarium terrace with IMPRESSIVE VIEWS TO THE SEA AND THE VEGETATION, THE GARDEN AND THE SWIMMING POOL. In the basement, an incredible private garage with capacity for 5 vehicles, storage room, utility room, and a bathroom with shower. This incredible luxury villa is perfectly equipped with integrated h/c air conditioning, underfloor central heating, large pvc windows with double glazing, ceramic floors, fireplace, west facing, fitted wardrobes, security cameras and alarm system, home automation system. VERY GOOD LOCATION.Located in the southwest of Mallorca, Santa Ponsa has two sandy beaches: a large beach 560 meters long and a slightly smaller cove called Caló d'en Pallisser.It houses all kinds of natural and historical attractions, as well as some of the most luxurious properties in Mallorca.The city center has stunning views of the mountains and forests, while in the surroundings you will find a golf course and various houses and estates of yacht owners from nearby Port Adriano.Santa Ponsa has a cosmopolitan and international community.It has numerous residential areas and all kinds of services such as banks, schools and supermarkets.Santa Ponsa attracts families, resident foreigners and lovers of golf and sailing.The area is quite quiet during the low season, but it still has services available throughout the year and it also has easy access to Palma and Calviá.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: This ground floor of a completely renovated two bedroom, one bathroom flat with sea views in Port Adriano El Toro. Upon entering the flat, you come into an open concept space which includes the kitchen and living room. The living room is bright and spacious, with large windows overlooking the sea and the terrace, perfect for relaxing and enjoying the atmosphere. The flat has two bedrooms, both with fitted wardrobes and windows with sea views. Both of the bedrooms are double beds. The bathroom is modern and has a shower, a toilet. The flat also has air conditioning in all rooms and double glazed, double glazed windows to keep the temperature and noise at bay. The jewel in the crown is the spacious terrace, which offers stunning views of the sea and Port Adriano El Toro. You can imagine that there is a table and chairs for al fresco dining and sun loungers for sunbathing. It is the perfect place to enjoy the Mediterranean climate and relax while admiring the view. In short, this completely renovated two bedroom, one bathroom flat with sea views in Port Adriano El Toro has an open plan kitchen, living room, air conditioning, climat windows and a stunning terrace which makes it ideal for an unforgettable holiday.

The open plan lounge diner has an attractive feature fireplace with gas coal affect heater. There is double glazed doors leading out onto a good size terrace with views over to the mountains and catches the afternoon/evening sun even in winter. The total property is fully air-conditioned hot/cold.

description: When the love for noble materials meets good taste, the result is guaranteed. We are in a house that like few others offers: generous light, wide spaces, exquisite care of the covering materials and the proximity to the long-awaited sea. This villa is distributed in a living-dining room open to the pool, a kitchen, a bedroom and a bathroom on the first floor. We access the first floor by a beautiful staircase and we are surprised by three splendid suites, perfectly equipped to ensure rest and comfort. It surrounds us with a 1020m2 plot, and the 129m2 garage not only provides space for vehicles, it gives us multiple possibilities, (you could create them to your liking) from a wine cellar, games room, gym etc. Come visit it and start your imagination, would you live in this house?

Peace and quiet are guaranteed here. The main house of approx. 391m2 offers a large living/dining room, an open high quality fitted kitchen, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and an office - surrounded by several covered terraces. The finca offers oil central heating and with a new solar system it is completely self-sufficient. The separate guest house is arranged in studio style with living/bedroom, bathroom and open kitchen. Beautiful outdoor areas offer sun all day long with views of the beautiful countryside, here you live pure nature. To arrange a viewing, please leave your phone number in your enquiry.

description: This recently renovated villa near the beach is situated on a flat plot of approx. 850m² in a neighborhood of villas in Costa de la Calma and offers fantastic panoramic views of the mountains. The constructed area is approximately 340m² + 4 terraces (in all directions), which are spread over two floors. The beautiful garden with fruit trees and Mediterranean plants is watered automatically and is very easy to maintain. In addition, the outdoor area offers a swimming pool with sun terrace, a wooden terrace with a thatched roof in Balinese style and a barbecue. The property has 6 bedrooms, one with a dressing room and the other with a dressing room and bathroom en suite. In addition there are 2 individual rooms (passage rooms). These rooms are currently used as a TV room and a games room for children. On the upper floor there is a new high quality fitted kitchen of approx. 14m² with cooking island and Bosch appliances. From the kitchen you reach the large living room of about 45m² with a new stone fireplace. There are a total of 3 bathrooms (an en suite bathroom with a small Jacuzzi bathtub and a mini sauna). For the construction of another bathroom, there would still be enough space in the house. The equipment includes an alarm system, double glazed thermal windows, infrared heating, underfloor heating (upper floor), air conditioning h / c, high speed fiber optic internet and satellite system. 2 parking spaces in the own courtyard are also part of the property.

description: Well kept family villa with sea views This pretty and well mantained villa is situated in a quiet area on a plot of approx. 755 m² with sea views. On the first floor we find the beautiful and an elegant entrance, a guest-toilet, living and dining area with breakfast terrace, generous kitchen, bedroom with bathroom en suite and a laundry area which can be converted into a separate small apartment/bedroom. From this level there is access to the beautiful pool and private pool area. On the first floor there is the master bedroom with bathroom en suite and walk-in closet, and a terrace with a beautiful view over the sea to Cabrera as well as a bedroom with bathroom en suite. The villa is a comfortably equipped with Terracotta- and Santanyi stone floors, wooden beams, AC h/c, double glazed windows and a double garage.

description: Tel(0034)971670440 Completely renovated, centrally located, townhouse in Andratx. In the centre of the picturesque village of Andratx, we offer this completely renovated village house with a living/usable area of approx. 130 m2, which was completely renovated in 2019/20. The house has two living levels. On the ground floor there is an open plan living/dining room with an open fully equipped kitchen, a utility room and guest toilet with shower. Via the patio you reach a separate room which is currently used as an office. On the first floor there are two beautiful bedrooms, a designer bathroom and a dressing room, as well as a terrace with outdoor shower and laundry room. Furthermore, the house has a roof terrace with views of the picturesque village, the valley and the old staircase settlement from the 12th century. Features: fully furnished, double glazed windows and doors, air conditioning hot/cold. To arrange a viewing, please leave your telephone number in the enquiry.

Features: Air conditioning hot/cold, underfloor heating, double glazed windows and doors, marble flooring, fireplaces, Jacuzzi, osmosis system, etc. The exceptional construction quality of this property is outstanding. To arrange a viewing please leave your telephone number in the enquiry form.

description: The small and picturesque town of Deia, located between the Tramuntana mountains and with a unique luminosity, appreciated by famous painters, also enjoys excellent views of the sea. In this paradisiacal environment we can locate the property that we present to you, spacious house between party walls located in the old town, lined with stone. It has 240m2 distributed on several levels and with a construction and design of traditional Mediterranean architecture, it has large rooms and fantastic views of the sea and mountains.  You want to visit it and be able to check what feeling of well-being this property produces.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Deya
suggestedTexts.title: Village house

description: Tel. (0034) 971670440 This villa, built in 2013 on a plot of aprox 1224 m2, offers a living space of 364 sqm which is divided as follows: a bright, open living room with adjoining open and fully equipped kitchen, three bedrooms, three bathrooms, utility room. Furthermore, several terraces, a beautifully landscaped garden and pool offer enough space for you and your loved ones. Equipment: central heating via heat pump / solar, air conditioning, parquet flooring, fitted wardrobes. In the lower area there is a 300sqm basement that can be completely expanded. There is also space for up to four cars. From some rooms, the front and roof terrace you can enjoy partial sea views. To arrange a viewing, please leave your phone number in the contact form.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: We offer you a spacious Duplex on Paseo Maritimo in Palma. The location of the property is unbeatable, just a short walk from the Porto Pi shopping center, it also has an exit from the Paseo Maritimo in front of the Yacht Club and immediate access to the ring road. This duplex located on the second floor of the stately building with a doorman, community pool, internal parking for bicycles. The 125 meters that the property offers are divided into a spacious living room, kitchen, closed terrace on the first floor and two double bedrooms with two bathrooms, one of them en suite and another glazed terrace. The house provides us with the possibility of carrying out some type of work. Do not hesitate to ask us for a visit.
