suggestedTexts.title: Duplex

description: Tel. (0034) 971670440 Ultra-modern new built villa in 1st sea line in Cala Vinyas. This dreamlike villa is situated on a plot of approx. 1150m2, which is located on the rocky coast and thus offers spectacular sea views and access. 655m2 of living space are distributed over three floors and offer an entrance hall, a living/dining room with open kitchen, guest toilet, four bedrooms with en-suite bathroom and dressing room and fireplace in the master suite, a separate guest flat, a fitness room with bathroom, a laundry room and a garage. The terrace area offers a summer kitchen with bar and Jacuzzi and swimming pool.  Features: Underfloor heating, Air conditioning hot & cold, domotics system (light, underfloor heating, air conditioner), Automatic Venetian blinds in the interior, Summer kitchen on the terrace, Jacuzzi, Pool, First sea line with sea view, garage, 2 fireplaces, lift, fitted kitchen, sauna, alarm security system with video surveillance, sound system with Bluetooth, etc. To arrange a viewing, please leave your telephone number in the enquiry form.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cala Vinyes, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Tel. (0034) 971670440 Fantastic endless views - Luxury villa in Nova Santa Ponsa.  This villa offers spectacular views over the bay of Santa Ponsa, the Tramuntana mountains and the bay of Palma. Completely refurbished in 2020 this Villa offers on a plot of 868m2 and with 384m2 constructed area the following distribution: on the ground floor there is a garage for two cars - from here you go up with the lift or by stairs to the first floor with its entrance/hall, three bedrooms and three bathrooms. Here each room has access to its own terrace and the swimming pool. The upper floor, surrounded by terraces, has a bright and spacious living/dining room with an open kitchen, laundry room, guest toilet and the master suite with bathroom and dressing room. From the living/dining room there is access to the roof terrace which offers as all the rooms wonderful views over the bay of Santa Ponsa up to the bay of Palma. Features of this villa are air conditioning hot/ cold, underfloor heating, lift, fireplace, fully fitted kitchen with Miele appliances, aluminium windows and doors with double glazing, computer controlled BUS home system, central lighting system, automatic curtains, alarm system, etc. Sold fully furnished and equipped. The extraordinary quality of this Villa stands out. For more information and/or to arrange a viewing please leave your telephone number in the enquiry form.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Tel. (0034) 971670440 Newly renovated flat with sea and mountain views, 150 meters from the beach in Ciudad Jardin. This completely renovated flat is located on the third floor of an apartment building with a total of 15 units and a lift, in a quiet street only 150m from the beach. Through the entrance area of the flat you enter the spacious hallway, from here you have access to all rooms: an approx. 40m2 living-dining room with access to a sun terrace of approx. 20m2 and a fantastic view to the sea and the Sierra Tramuntana, two bedrooms of approx. 15m2 each, the master bedroom with bathroom en suite and a third room of approx. 10m2, which is currently intended as a dressing room, as well as a bathroom. The spacious kitchen-cum-living-room is furnished with high-quality materials and well-known electrical appliances, the washing machine and osmosis system for water decalcification are in the adjoining laundry room. To arrange a viewing appointment, please leave your telephone number in your enquiry.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Coll d'En Rabassa, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Beautiful villa in 2nd sea line in Torrenova overlooking the bay of Palmanova. This villa was built in 1964 on a plot of about 880 m2 and completely renovated in 2017. 360 m2 of living/usable space is divided as follows: on the first floor there is a spacious living/dining room, a fully equipped kitchen, a winter garden, a guest toilet and an office room. On the same floor there is also an independent apartment with a living room, American kitchen, a bedroom and a bathroom. On the upper floor there is the master bedroom with en suite bathroom, three more bedrooms and another bathroom. Terraces on different levels offer plenty of privacy. Of course, this property is equipped with air conditioning hot / cold, double glazing, fitted wardrobes and pre-installation of gas central heating. A swimming pool, a garage and several parking spaces complete the picture of an ideal home. To arrange a viewing appointment, please leave your phone number in your request.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Magaluf, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: This property is located in Génova, in a quiet area with beautiful panoramic views of the mountains and a few minutes from the center of Palma. The approximately 220 m2 house is spread over 3 levels and offers an open living/dining room, a fitted and equipped kitchen, 3 bedrooms and 2 en-suite bathrooms, as well as a guest toilet. From the living room there is access to a large terrace with spectacular views. In the basement there is a study of approx. 84 m2, (currently completely empty), where an additional living room with kitchen or 2 additional bedrooms with a bathroom could be created. The exterior of the house offers a small garden and a swimming pool, several terraces, as well as a double garage. Additional equipment: air conditioning h/c, fireplace, SAT-TV, marble floors, double-glazed windows, storage room, fitted wardrobes.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Genova, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: House

description: Impressive luxury villa with direct sea access in Camp de Mar. We offer you this extraordinary villa, approx. 696 m2 living / usable area plus approx. 617 m2 terraces for sale. This also includes a guest villa (next to the main villa) which has approx. 287 m2 of living / usable space and approx. 322 m2 of terraces. The main villa has the following distribution: On the ground floor there is a living / dining room with a hanging fireplace, a spacious kitchen with "Gaggenau" appliances, a storage room and a bathroom. Panoramic doors take you to one of the many covered terraces. The first floor consists entirely of a master bedroom with its two bathrooms and its dressing room. The second floor offers three bedrooms, each with its own bathroom en suite and dressing room. Each room offers a wonderful view of the sea and the beach of Camp de Mar. All levels of the villa have large and partially covered terraces. In the basement there is the wellness area with heated pool, sauna, shower and toilets. This unique villa offers air conditioning, heating, elevator, whirlpool on one of the terraces and the infinity pool (79 m2 mirror) which seems to float above the sea with its large sun terrace. This villa is full of first-class details - and of course there is no need to talk about quality here. The guest villa offers a spacious and bright living room, three bedrooms with their own bathroom and - separately with their own entrance - a staff apartment with kitchen, living room and two bedrooms with bathroom. To make an appointment, please leave your full name and telephone number in the request.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Es Camp de Mar, Andratx
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Promotion of 10 homes for sale in front of the Bellver Park in Palma de Mallorca. There are 10 townhouses with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. In addition to a private terrace, they are luxury townhouses, all with a parking space and storage room included in the price. They range from 147m2 to 199m2 built. First quality with underfloor heating throughout the house, hot-cold air conditioning with independent thermostats in each room, air renewal in the house through ceiling ducts, fully furnished kitchens include all FRANKIE brand appliances. They have installation of 4 crystals in windows and front doors that prevent noise from entering and insulate from both cold and heat. Wardrobes in each bedroom already lined and distributed, bathrooms with mirror furniture and screens included. Both the white lacquered doors, electric shutters in the bedrooms, pre-installation of conduits to the parking space to recharge an electric car. All homes come with LED lights and have a balcony facing the street. Housing with energy certificate B. Located in the immediate vicinity of the park, this modern urban complex is in an unbeatable setting, sharing the comfort of the connections offered by the city center with the great views available and the proximity to the largest forest in Palma. you need will find it at your fingertips. Visit us!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Terreno, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Duplex

description: Español- Deutsch- English Tel. (0034) 971670440 A dream Mansion and 122.868m2 of land in Mallorca! This wellness mansion is located between Bunyola and Orient on a plot of 122.868m2 which is largely flat and therefore promises the highest possible profit. Let yourself be enchanted by this manor house built about 20 years ago and two independent guest houses with a total built area of approx 1.000m2 and immerse yourself in an environment that promises pure luxury in Mallorca. An imposing two-level entrance, a generously designed living room, a large Gaggenau kitchen, 6 bedrooms in the main house, 4 bedrooms in the guest houses and 2 service rooms, nine bathrooms in total provide immense living space. High-quality equipment, eg. AND. stucco, indirect lighting, underfloor heating, marble floors, fireplaces, fine and noble carpentry, fitted wardrobes and walk-in closets, double glazing, elevator shaft and much more, leaves nothing to be desired. A 12x6m saltwater pool, the beautiful garden, the terraces, the porticoed enclosure or the garage for 4 cars complete this dream. This mansion is one of the few jewels of Mallorca! To arrange a visit please leave us your phone number on the request. Tel. (0034) 971670440.

suggestedTexts.title: Masía

description: The well-kept apartment of 120m² has 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a kitchen and a spacious balcony with a spectacular sea view. S'Arenal is a neighbourhood on the Playa de Palma. It has a good infrastructure and everything is within walking distance. The long beach invites you to sunbathe as well as to go for a walk. The capital Palma is reached in only 10 minutes by car and the airport in only 5 minutes. Special features include a fully equipped kitchen, a spacious terrace with sea view and air conditioning cold/hot.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: In the heart of Palma we find this stately apartment with views of the sea, the cathedral, Na Burguesa and the Bisbe Berenguer Palou square (square of the skates). This magnificent apartment is located on the sixth floor with an elevator and is very bright. The house is of origin, but it offers many possibilities due to its large dimensions (180m2 useful) and with a good reform it could become your new home or a good opportunity for investors. The location is magnificent for those who wish to enjoy the comforts of living in the center of Palma and enjoy the Mediterranean lifestyle of the city. The building does not have a garage, although a few meters from the entrance there is a public parking lot where you can possibly buy a space. Would you like to visit it? Call us!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Missio - Mercat, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This unique property offers a lot of space to live. Built just 10 years ago in a Mediterranean style, with the vision of hosting family and friends in one place. Offering a lot of warmth and privacy. The main house has a large kitchen, a bright living room with views of the garden and a large suite as a bedroom with a dressing room and a large bathroom. Furthermore, it connects to the roof terrace with a private pool and panoramic views over Andratx and the mountains. It also offers several studios and 4 apartments with independent entrances, which have a kitchen-dining room, bedroom and bathroom and private terraces. They share a swimming pool and have access to the Mediterranean garden. All rooms have underfloor heating and hot/cold air conditioning. The 600m2 basement is ideal as a garage, storage room and with enough space to set up a gallery, cinema or SPA. Another idea as an investment could be marketed as a hotel or vacation home with different units, with prior acquisition of the corresponding licence. Located in the quiet area of Andratx town, Sa Coma and close to all kinds of services, it has the sea 10 minutes by car and the airport 30 minutes. MY BLUE MALLORCA - ATTENTION & CONFIDENCE - MEDITERRANEAN REAL ESTATE.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Andratx Pueblo, Andratx
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: STYLISH PENTHOUSE IN SOUGHT-AFTER RESIDENTIAL COMPLEX IN BENDINAT This attractive penthouse apartment is situated in the sought-after residential development of Las Lomas in Bendinat, just minutes from the Mediterranean sea and the famous Bendinat Golf Club. The property has been stylishly renovated and offers a living area of approx. 133 m². It comprises a spacious living-dining room with wood burning stove and access to a covered terrace of approx. 12 m², modern fitted kitchen, separate laundry room, 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and 2 bathrooms (one en suite). Additional features include DAIKIN hot/cold air conditioning, gas central heating (radiators), double glazing, heated towel rails in the bathrooms, ceiling fan in the kitchen, water filter, alarm system and elegant parquet floors throughout. There is a small sauna on the covered terrace.   The penthouse boasts a fantastic roof terrace of approx. 93 m² with a BBQ area and panoramic views to the sea and mountains. The property also benefits from a parking space and storage room in the underground garage and a lift in the building.   Las Lomas is a peaceful residential community in an excellent location, featuring two superb swimming pools and lush Mediterranean gardens. Close to the Bendinat golf course, a sports club with tennis courts and the prestigious marina of Puerto Portals. There are several excellent international schools in the local area. With its good motorway connections the city of Palma is just 15 minutes away. The sandy beaches of Illetas, Portals are easily accessible.    .
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Portals Nous - Bendinat, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Luxury villa overlooking the golf course and partial sea views. The living space is divided into the main house and the guest house. Main house Ground floor: living/dining room with fireplace, fully equipped open kitchen, one en-suite bedroom, office/library, utility room, guest toilet, terrace, patio, cellar. First floor: master bedroom with built-in wardrobe, own terrace and en-suite bathroom, third bedroom with en-suite bathroom. Basement: garage and store. Guest house: bedroom, kitchenette, bathroom. The house is equipped with a central heating system throughout the house and underfloor heating in the master bedroom and bathroom, air conditioning, parquet and stone floors, elevator (connecting 3 floors). It has several terraces, a garden, a swimming pool, a garage in the basement and an independent garage. BENDINAT: Bendinat is a well-known residential area located in a wonderful coastal area, located a few minutes from the famous Puerto Portals marina and the town of Portals Nous. There are several international schools in the area, as well as a large number of shops, restaurants and medical services of all kinds. Here is the prestigious Bendinat Golf Club. The closest beaches are those of Illetas, Bendinat and Portals. The highway that leads to the city of Palma is also very close. The airport is a 10-15 minute drive away. Do not hesitate to contact us for a visit.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sol de Mallorca, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Beach house style bungalow This beautiful and completely refurbished bungalow is situated in a quiet community of Mediterranean style bungalows, Ibicenco or Menorcan style. It is distributed in one floor and has an entrance hall, 3 bedrooms, two bathrooms, one of them en suite, fully fitted kitchen and semi open to the living-dining room. From the living room and from one of the bedrooms there is access to the outside area, with the swimming pool and a covered area to rest from the sun. This outdoor area enjoys good privacy and long hours of sunshine. The house has air conditioning hot/cold in all rooms and underfloor heating in the bathrooms. An outdoor parking space is included in the price. Sol de Mallorca is an oasis of tranquility located south west of the island with its own micro climate offering maximum sunshine and little rainfall throughout the year. It has excellent connections to Palma and the international airport and is within a short drive of top golf courses, marinas, restaurants and shops. The area has a stunning coastline and features three wonderful beaches at Portals Vells; Sa Caleta, Platja del Mago and Platja del Rei. These beaches are popular with the locals and visitors alike because of their natural beauty and crystal clear waters. The beach at Portals Vells also has an excellent sea side beach restaurant and small marina. Sol de Mallorca is the ideal place to enjoy beach life away from the busy tourist resorts. It is also popular with hikers in the winter months and a great spot for golfers with the “T Golf & Country Club Poniente” course close by.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sol de Mallorca, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Modern flat in central location The light-flooded flat is located on the 1st floor of a new building complex and has a large, partly covered and sunny terrace with a view into the beautiful pool landscape. It offers a total of two bedrooms and two bathrooms, one of them en suite, an open kitchen, a bright and spacious living and dining area. Other extras include air conditioning w/c, underfloor heating (gas), double glazed aluminium windows, security entrance door, lift, fully equipped kitchen, utility room, communal pool, car parking space within the complex. The newly built residential complex with 81 modern flats is located in a good and central residential area in the heart of Santa Ponsa. Due to the quiet and yet very central location, within walking distance to a beautiful sandy beach, to several golf courses as well as to the centre of Santa Ponsa with numerous restaurants and shops, this flat is equally suitable as a holiday property as well as for year-round living in Mallorca. The complex offers a spacious pool area and well-maintained communal gardens as well as a fully equipped fitness room. Due to the optimal infrastructure to the nearby cultural city of Palma and the international airport, the breathtaking landscape and the exclusive residential area, Santa Ponsa has developed into one of the most popular residential areas in the southwest of Mallorca. In addition to the impressive cliffs with the incomparable view of the three Malgrats Islands, the residential area of Nova Santa Ponsa with its three golf courses also offers a wide range of facilities for the most diverse demands of passionate golfers and is considered the meeting place of the island's upscale society. Combined with the sandy beaches and close proximity to the new exclusive and lively marina of Port Adriano with its restaurants and boutiques, Santa Ponsa offers a unique Mediterranean lifestyle in Mallorca.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This bright and renovated apartment of 49 m2 consists one bedroom, one (renovated) bathroom, a fitted and equipped kitchen and nice living-dining room with access to the terrace. The apartment is located in a residential area with community parking, has excellent access, very close to all services, schools, supermarkets, boutiques, shopping centers, international restaurants and medical centers. All recently renovated (also electricity/piping), it is not only interesting as a place to live or where you can spent your holidays. As an investment it is very interesting as well! It is only 1 walking minute to the lovely sandy beach. When sipping your wine in the sun on your private terrace/balcony, you can see on your left side the well-know NIKKI BEACH. Magaluf is only fifteen minutes from the capital Palma. It has a wide sandy beach, offers an important variety of restaurants and places of leisure.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Magaluf, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida Notari Alemany, 14

description: In the residential area of Son Veri Vell, surrounded by pine trees and just 5 minutes walk from the Club Náutico del Arenal, is located this wonderful house with various heights and large outbuildings. It is a house distributed on two floors on a plot of 1,000 m2. In it you can enjoy its large pool, garden, large terraces and porches. The ground floor, in addition to a large kitchen, has a bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, a large dining room and a spectacular living room with a fireplace at different heights. Through a large marble staircase, you access from the hall to the second floor where there are 3 double bedrooms, two of them with bathroom en suite and access to the existing terraces. On the ground floor and at a different height is the garden and closed parking. Do not hesitate to visit the virtual tour of the property that appears in the ad and contact us if you want more information or make a face-to-face visit.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: S'Arenal, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: This recently renovated 51m2 apartment gives you the ultimate feeling of freedom and luxury. With its amazing views, this apartment has it all. Located one the 8th floor, accessible by several elevators, a 24h portier service,  you will have the feeling of entering a very luxurious hotelsuite. The apartment is renovated using the best materials, like sound isolated walls, huge double glazed sliding doors etc. and very tasteful decorated with outstanding furniture. When entering the apartment you will find the double sized bedroom with light features, an ensuite bathroom which has a separate shower and a laundry room. Further-on the open fully furnished luxury kitchen with bar (which can be moved on the rails and turned into a dining table for 4 people easily) and living room all looking over the super yachts moored in front of the apartment with its breathtaking sea views. This apartment is a rare find and is being sold furnished.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Paseo Marítimo, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida de Gabriel Roca, 35

description: Opportunity! 1 bedroom flat with sea views in refurbished building at 20 mts from the beach of Santa Ponsa. Approximately 47 m2 distributed in 1 double bedroom with built-in wardrobe, bathroom with shower and integrated kitchen in living room with integrated terrace. It is of origin and needs a little updating. In building, refurbished and 20 mts from the beach of Santa Ponsa, promenade, shops, bars and leisure areas. More properties at agentsbrokersmallorca. com.

description: Cozy ground floor for rent in the Tolleric urbanization in Llucmajor. The apartment has a living/dining room with access to a small terrace, a bedroom with a large built-in wardrobe, a bathroom with a shower and a kitchen with appliances. Laundry room with access to another small rear terrace, perfect for hanging clothes. The apartment is rented semi-furnished. It has an outdoor parking space included. Tolleric is a quiet urbanization with supermarkets, schools, hotels, etc. close. Only 20 minutes from the airport. Bus to Palma. Community expenses included. Electricity, Gas, Water and the garbage fee is paid by the tenant.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat

district: Es Forti - Son Cotoner - Son Dameto
description: Nice duplex located in one of the most demanded areas of Palma. A third WITHOUT elevator bright and distributed over two floors. On the ground floor we find the spacious living room, separate kitchen and toilet. The upper floor consists of 2 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes (one of them with access to a balcony), 1 single bedroom and a bathroom. You can also enjoy the common areas and have a nice time at the barbecue. The price includes a parking space and storage room. *Rates and taxes not included.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Dameto, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Duplex

description: La Lonja is one of the most attractive neighborhoods in the old town of Palma de Mallorca. This gracious residence is situated on the front row and offers stunning views of the harbour. The historic building is undergoing an extensive renovation to create four luxurious apartments with views of the Paseo Marítimo, the avenue that runs along the sea. The 3,000-square-foot duplex has two to three bedrooms, three bathrooms, a kitchen, living room, and dining room, as well as a private garage with plenty of storage space. The wide hallway on the upper floor leads to the two double bedrooms - the main one with an en-suite bathroom, a second independent bathroom and a utility room. The front row location offers views over the palm trees to the fishing boats in the harbor. The open plan kitchen, dining room and living room feature a simple, minimalist design with base cabinets that blend in with the surrounding décor. Large windows and floor-to-ceiling glass doors let in plenty of natural light. It has been built with high-quality materials, such as light herringbone flooring in the living areas, Gris Zarci marble and Dornbracht taps in the bathrooms, and high-quality Gaggenau appliances in the kitchen. This sophisticated and elegant house is equipped with underfloor heating and air conditioning, making it suitable for year-round living.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Llotja, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: House

description: Lovely house, located on the first line of a golf course is for sale in Nova Santa Ponsa. On the first floor there is a bathroom, lounge/dining room, kitchen and a guest toilet. There are a further 2 en-suite bedrooms upstairs, including a larger master bedroom. Apart from the private pool, there are several community pools, one of which is a heated indoor pool. Great location to enjoy the tranquility and lovely scenery.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: You wont be disappointed when you visit this house. Charming from the off set, offering delightful views to the surrounding area. The house and garden offer all day sunshine from its elevated position. A modern feel internally with its marble floor. The house is open plan. There are 4x bedrooms as well as a huge garage parking with utility room. Various terraces, lush gardens and a modest swimming pool.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Es Capdellà, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: This two-bedroom, two-and-a-half-bath second-floor condo is an ideal urban retreat for a couple or young family. Original colorful tiles and rich walnut wood add warmth, while quality fixtures, high-end appliances, separate guest toilet and utility room ensure high functionality. The bright lounge situated at the front of the property features wood framed French doors giving access to a Juliet balcony, white ceilings with crown molding and restored Majorcan tiles on the floors. French doors lead into kitchen with cooking island/breakfast bar and stone sink built into walnut cabinet. In the master bedroom, antique tile and wood paneling create a cozy haven, and windows that open to the patio below let in natural light. The adjoining bathroom has fitted wardrobes, a walk-in shower, a marble vanity unit and a separate WC. In the second bedroom, which also features antique tiles and wood paneling, floor-to-ceiling glass surrounds the smaller patio providing natural light into the sitting area on one side and into the private bathroom with double sinks and glass panel shower on the other.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Nicolau, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Wonderful and stylish townhouse Spacious and stylish townhouse with a living area of 200 m² distributed on two levels. The ground floor is loft style with a spacious living room, an open plan kitchen, 1 bathroom and a nice garden of approx. 97 m² from which a small studio/workshop can be accessed. The first floor has 2 double bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a living-dining room with pellet fireplace and a fitted kitchen. Furthermore, it has a large roof terrace of approx. 88 m² with views to the Tramuntana and the church of Molinar, a garage and air conditioning warm/cold.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Portixol-Molinar, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: House

description: Located in a street with the most prestigious villas in Nova Santa Ponsa, this luxury villa is inspired by a modern, minimalist design that combines clean, contemporary architecture with Mediterranean elegance. This exceptional villa is equipped with the latest technology and has been thoughtfully designed for a premium lifestyle of leisure and comfort. The lower level features an open plan living/dining room connected to the terrace and pool area by floor to ceiling sliding doors, leading to the fully equipped kitchen with Miele appliances. The terrace is the perfect place to lounge during the day or entertain guests on long summer evenings. The large saltwater infinity pool provides a refreshing cool down and the built-in barbecue area and chillout lounge with fire pit is also included. On the first floor there are 2 bedrooms with their en suite bathrooms, as well as a service kitchen and a guest toilet. On the second floor there are 2 more bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, a second living room with fireplace and bar and the primary suite with walk-in closet and a spacious bathroom with bathtub. From this floor you have access to the roof terrace with partial ocean views. The house also has a large basement with a laundry room and an air-conditioned room that could be used as a gym, movie theater or bodega. Special features: floor to ceiling retractable glass doors, elevator, outdoor chillout with fireplace, roof terrace, garage for 3 cars, underfloor heating and a domotics system.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: PALMA - BEAUTIFUL FINCA WITH ESTABLISHED GARDENS-ORCHARDS AT ONLY A FEW MINUTES FROM THE CITY'S CENTER  Ref. 5923D At only a few minutes away from the City’s center we find this beautiful country house. With very easy access, the property has the advantage of its own private water well and for this reason a very well established garden with many vegetables and fruit trees of many kinds.  The large plot develops over 18.780mq and surrounds the house which, with its 245mq built, hosts five double bedrooms, two full and spacious bathrooms, a laundry, separate kitchen, comfortable sitting room with fireplace and a closed garage, which could be transformed in a further bedroom/studio if needed. Set in a very quiet location, the estate relishes privacy and stunning views over the Tramuntana mountain range. Built in 1992, the property could benefit from an update which will enhance its real value.

description: This Mediterranean villa in Puig de Ros boasts partial sea views and is located in a residential area near the sea. The attractive property has a constructed area of approx 383 m2 that are distributed over 2 floors as follows: The ground floor offers a large living room, a dining room, a large fully equipped kitchen, a bedroom and a bathroom. The first floor consists of 4 spacious bedrooms one with bathroom a suite and another bathroom. The outdoor area with garden and pool to enjoy the Mediterranean atmosphere on the island. In addition the house has a basement and parking space.

description: Nice house with sea views in the quiet coastal urbanization Badia Gran / Bahia Grande. The house has three double bedrooms and a bathroom on the ground floor. The first floor consists of a large living room with a beautiful terrace with excellent views of the sea and the bay.Next is the fully equipped kitchen. In the house there is a covered area with a rustic-style summer kitchen Bahía Grande is located at a distance of 15 km from the airport, there are bars, restaurants, supermarket, medical center and a few km away two golf courses are Antem and Golf Maioris.Our phone is 0034 610776616 Anna we speak German, Spanish, English You can also contact us by WhatsApp.

description: In the immediate vicinity of the Maioris golf course there are several popular residential areas with mostly single-family homes. This house stands on a 400m² plot, it was built in 1991 and renovated in 2007. The living space of approx. 170 m² is spread over 2 floors. On the ground floor there are 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom with a shower. On the 1st floor there is a small Gallery (desk), living room with access to a 20m² terrace with great views of the sea, kitchen and bathroom with bathtub. The furniture includes stoneware and parquet floors, wooden windows with double glazing, oil central heating and air conditioning splits. A garage space and a parking space are available. A covered terrace on the ground floor and a second kitchen with independent access complete the offer. All the information in this exposé is based on the information that has been transmitted from the seller. Therefore, Finest Properties Mallorca S. L. assume no responsibility for the completeness, correctness and timeliness of this information. The declared prices do not include the costs borne by the buyer, such as taxes, notary, property registration and expenses of gestures. One possible subject to prior sale.

description: This spacious apartment is located in Cala Vinyas, in a very well-kept residential complex on the first line with direct access to the sea. The spacious terrace offers a dreamlike panoramic view over the well-kept community gardens, the large community pool and the sea. The modernized 5-bedroom flat was created by joining two original flats. The spacious living space of almost 240m2 offers plenty of space for families and guests. Two of the bedrooms have their own bathroom, a very spacious third bathroom is shared by the other remaining bedrooms. The spacious living-dining room with direct access to the large terrace is modern and furnished with luxurious real estate and offers enough space to spend pleasant evenings both in summer and winter. The apartment includes an underground parking space for one car.

address: Sa Cabana - Can Carbonell - Ses Cases Noves
district: Sa Cabana - Can Carbonell - Ses Cases Noves
description: For sale this fantastic detached house in the quiet urbanization of Can Carbonell. This 557 m2 house divided into three floors and built on a 870 m2 plot. It is on the corner and has a privileged orientation since it has completely unobstructed views, which makes it a unique property to enjoy the garden, barbecue and pool. It has a total of 8 double rooms with fitted wardrobes, 4 bathrooms, 2 kitchens and a large garage with capacity for 6 cars. It has a large terrace, patio and garden where the pool is located to enjoy and relax. This exclusive villa is located in a very quiet urbanization, one step away from everything you need, supermarkets, schools, hospitals, parks, public transport and Palma. Do not miss this great opportunity and come see it!

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: This unique triplex apartment offers an abundance of well-designed spaces spread over three floors, as well as an exceptional roof terrace with a private pool. The lower level is a bright and open living area with a spacious lounge on the street side, a bright dining room with windows to the terraces on both sides in the middle and a fitted kitchen with a large center island to the rear. The kitchen, fitted with Gaggenau appliances, features exposed wooden beams and Volakas marble floors and worktops, while other rooms on this level have restored Majorcan tiles and crown molding. A laundry room and a guest bathroom complete this floor. On the next level are the three bedrooms, all with exposed wooden beams: the master bedroom has windows to the central courtyard and an adjoining bathroom and dressing room, finished in marble and walnut; a second bedroom has marble floors and wood paneling on the walls, and a third bedroom, accessed via its own bathroom, is at the front of the building and has a sloping ceiling and tiled floors. The finishing touch of this magnificent apartment is the private terrace of 72 m2, which extends over two floors. The lower level has a bathroom with a shower and plenty of space to sit, eat and lounge, while the upper terrace offers 360 degree views over the city, the sea in one direction and the mountains in the other, as well as its own pool in the rooftop.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Nicolau, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Impressive detached house just a few metres from the sea Impressive detached house only a few metres from the sea, with a living area of approximately 240 m² distributed into 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms (three of them en suite). Furthermore, it has a spacious and bright living-dining room with fireplace, a fitted kitchen, utility room, storage room, several terraces, swimming pool and a large garage of approx. 250 m². The property has gas central heating and air conditioning warm/cold.

description: The entire apartment is furnished with Caliza Gris Zarci Stone Floors, water based floor heating, centralized air conditioning and electric window shutters. The open kitchen is designed by Cocinart and are equipped with Miele kitchen appliances. The property comprises of 2 bedrooms with ensuite bathroom and 1 bedroom with a communal bathroom. The bedrooms is fitted built - in closets with white painted oak detailing and white painted oak doors. There is an atrium situated in the middle of the apartment which brings natural light indoors and a garage space included. The property also features a glass atrium offering additional sunlight to the living areas.

The villa extends over two levels and offers a living / dining room with fireplace, a separate kitchen, five bedrooms and five bathrooms. The spacious and well-kept garden has a swimming pool and a nice barbecue area. Ample parking is also available. Its renewal is recommended.

description: This is an excellent opportunity to realise the home you have always dreamed of, in an area of the island only 5 minutes from the city and 15 from the airport, where you can live safely, with clean air, in a very elegant neighbourhood of luxury villas, in total privacy. The area is well served with restaurants nearby, schools and the hospital only 2 km away.  In just 13 minutes by car you can reach the port of portal Nous or in 10 minutes the paseo Marittimo and this allows you to live outside the hustle and bustle but still be in the best part of Palma de Mallorca. This villa is very large and was built in the 1970s with the adjacent land, which is BUILDABLE, always kept as forest and garden. Now the owner offers the possibility to enjoy this piece of paradise to anyone who wishes, and to be able to build a large villa or even two, with swimming pool and garden. If you are looking for land to build your dream home on the most beautiful island in the world, this is a good opportunity. Agent  King Mallorca Real Estate Dr. Matteo Belotti.

description: This charming penthouse apartment with 2 balconies is located on the vibrant pedestrian street Blanquerna in the Bonaire district, Palma, with all the amenities close by. The living area of 85 m2 has 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, modern newly renovated kitchen with an island and an adjacent separate laundry room, dining room and living room with access to both balconies. One of the balconies has morning sun and the other evening sun to be enjoyed. There is air conditioning w/c installed in 2019. One storage room at the communal roof terrace is included.

suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle Blanquerna

description: Would you like to live in a privileged place a step away from Palma? Then Sa Font Seca is the place for you.Within a short drive you can reach golf courses, restaurants, shops and international schools.That is why Sa Font Seca is ideal for families in particular. This modern luxury villa has an impressive panoramic view of the mountains to the bay of Palma.It combines functionality with modern design and high-quality equipment. The living area of 261.18m2 is distributed over two floors.On the upper level, next to the garage (25.60m2) and the main entrance, there is the spacious master bedroom with bathroom en suite, as well as two large sun terraces.An elegant staircase leads to the lower area.Here you will find a large, high-quality fitted kitchen (Miele appliances) with cooking island, as well as the representative living room and a reading corner.There are also three more bedrooms, two full bathrooms and a guest toilet. The property benefits from large windows with solar control glazing connecting the interior and exterior areas and letting in plenty of natural light.The house will also have underfloor heating by means of an air source heat pump, hot/cold air conditioning and several built-in wardrobes. Another highlight is the outdoor area with an infinity pool and interconnected terrace areas on different levels.There is also a nice breakfast nook off the kitchen and a summer kitchen set up with a BBQ. The property is already under construction and its completion is scheduled for early 2023.There is construction insurance that protects the property against serious damage even 10 years after its completion.A large independent engineering company (Edilicia) has been commissioned to supervise the construction project. For more details please contact us.All information is without guarantee.Image rights are held by the seller.

suggestedTexts.title: House

description: Newly built villa with a constructed area of 480 m², distributed in 4 bedrooms with bathroom en suite, swimming pool, roof terrace with barbecue area and unobstructed views over the green area to the sea in Costa d'en Blanes. A driveway leads through the garden of approx. 400 m2 to the ground floor, which has an area of 180 m2 and offers enough space for your vehicles, a utility room and a technical room. The elevator or the stairs will take you directly to the first or second floor of the house. On the first floor there are three bedrooms, all with bathroom en suite, one of them also with dressing room and sun terrace. On the second floor of the house is the living-dining room with an open kitchen, the master bedroom with a dressing room and an en-suite bathroom. From all the rooms on this floor there is direct access to the sunny terrace of approx. 60 m2 facing south and the pool area. This modern property impresses with its quiet location and its brightness throughout the interior.

The apartment with about 93 m² is a few steps from the beach, upon arrival we find a hall, kitchen, living room with access to its terrace. Two bedrooms and two bathrooms, one of them en suite. The house impresses with its spacious rooms and thanks to the central heating, it can be lived in all year round or used only as a holiday home. description: House designed by award-winning architect on large plot with additional building area.   This architecturally well thought-out property is located in the urbanisation Bahia Azul near the coast. The 226 sqm house is situated on a plot of 754 sqm. The property was designed by the award-winning architect Miquel Vicens Coll, who is known for his Pabellón building in Palma. The house has an international architectural style with well thought-out room layout and with various roof windows that illuminate the rooms with plenty of daylight. The house has an open and bright living-dining area, 5 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a kitchen and a utility room. The outside area has a terrace with BBQ area and a landscaped garden which leads into the second plot of 685 sqm, on which there are a storage room and a parking space. On the second plot of land can be built up to two more residential properties.   The purchase price of the property includes both plots.

description: This modern-Mediterranean, spacious villa is located in a quiet residential area in the neighborhood of the so-called Three Finger Bay, only a 15-minute drive from Palma. The villa, which is equipped to a high standard, was designed in a U-shape on a flat garden plot of 1,670 m² with an infinity pool.On the ground floor of this magnificent property, there is a light-filled entrance hall with double-height ceilings. There, the façade and interior walls have been clad with imported square natural stones.A spacious living room with fireplace and access to the pool terrace as well as a luxury kitchen with large dining area, a utility room and a guest WC are available there. On the opposite side of the villa is a separate guest area with two bedrooms with bathrooms, a guest toilet and a double garage.On the upper floor there are two bedrooms, a bathroom, an office room and a magnificent sun terrace.There is also a roof terrace with sea and panoramic views. On the lower level there are various storage and technical rooms and further possibilities.

description: Modern elements and furnishings are combined with a Mediterranean lifestyle combine to create this villa in an exclusive location in Santa Ponsa. The entire villa was completely renovated in 2020 and is now state of the art and sophisticated. Each level has spacious terraces, oriented in different directions, so you can always find a place in the sun or shade. The flat garden with salt water pool offers privacy and additional space for a gym is also available. In total, the villa, situated in a quiet cul-de-sac, has 5 bedrooms with 5 bathrooms, 4 en-suite bathrooms and 2 guest WCs. The open and high-quality kitchen by Leicht-Cocinas is ideally integrated into the spacious living-dining area. From the spacious roof terrace with BBQ area you have a beautiful 360 degree view of the Tramuntana mountains as well as the bay of Santa Ponsa.

description: Modern and cosy apartment in Palma Mallorquan flair, combined with modern elements and bright colours - this apartment in Palma's popular Santa Catalina district has recently been completely renovated, while maintaining the original charm and characteristic ceiling beams. Just a few steps from the harbour promenade, the market hall and numerous restaurants and cafés, the property offers all the advantages of a city apartment and is also an ideal retreat and resting place. The almost 75 square meters of living space are divided into a living and dining area with an open kitchen, two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and a guest toilet. Underfloor heating, air conditioning hot / cold and double glazing ensure maximum comfort. Floor-to-ceiling glass doors allow a beautiful view from the living area onto the heart of the apartment, the private patio. The cosy courtyard is the perfect place to start the day with a cappuccino and a fresh croissant from the bakery next door or to end warm summer days with a cool glass of wine.

description: Loft with caracter and views in St. Catalina This beautiful loft is located in an old building with only 3 units in the emblematic and picturesque neighborhood of Santa Catalina. It offers a large open space with living-dining room and kitchen, two bedrooms, and two full bathrooms. The high ceilings, oak floors and beams add a lot of character and charm to the property. From the roof terrace, there are beautiful views of Palma Cathedral, the harbor and the sea. The property has an alarm system, air conditioning (hot/cold) and underfloor heating in the bathrooms. There is the possibility to rent a parking space.

description: This magnificent new single-family house project is located in the heart of Palma's green lung, in the peaceful area of Sa Teulera, surrounded by the Bellver forest and a large number of green areas, close to the best schools and excellent sports clubs such as the Tennis Club, as well as having easy access to the entire road network, which gives this house an unbeatable quality of life. On a south-facing plot of 685 m2, the authors of this splendid project have designed a modern 476 m2 house characterised by pure white lines that are complemented by the traditional colours of the materials used, such as oak wood, resulting in ultra-comfortable, warm and functional spaces. It has been developed on two main floors, a roof floor and a large basement floor, all connected by lift. It has 4 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms as well as a guest bathroom. With 45 m2 of porches and terraces, a 39 m2 swimming pool with sunbeds area and garden, the outdoor spaces become relaxing places where to enjoy the environment, the light and the fantastic Mediterranean climate. The ground floor features a spacious open-space with equipped kitchen, dining room and living room with fireplace, as well as a guest bathroom and a double bedroom en-suite. This floor opens onto a large porch with outdoor dining area that overlooks the garden and swimming pool and allows you to enjoy the closeness of nature. The first floor has 3 double bedrooms all with en-suite bathrooms and all with a natural and elegant style at the same time. Two of them have access to large terraces and the third one has access to another interior terrace. The house is crowned by an incredible solarium space with dining room, summer lounge, kitchen, storage area and jacuzzi and where there is no lack of green plants and natural vegetation that surrounds the landscape with the sea in the background. To highlight the high qualities with which both the interiors and exteriors of this fantastic project will have, which also has 3 comfortable garage spaces. CHARACTERISTICS: -Air conditioning hot/cold by ducts, underfloor heating, stone and oak floors, alarm system, aluminium carpentry, acoustic and thermal insulation, fireplace, built-in wardrobes. -Fitted kitchen, wine cellar -Terraces, porches, garden, swimming pool, lift, solarium, jacuzzi, dining room and summer kitchen, garage for 3 cars, parking. LOCATION: -South facing, unobstructed views, mountain views, close to schools, close to shops and restaurants, close to sports club, close to all urban transport, excellent access to all road network.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Las Maravillas is a neighbourhood on the Playa de Palma. It has a good infrastructure and everything is within walking distance. The long beach invites you to sunbathe as well as to go for a walk. The capital Palma is reached in only 10 minutes by car and the airport in only 5 minutes. This unique house is located on a plot of almost 400 sqm, with approximately 230 sqm of living area and is distributed over two floors with high ceilings; a reformed basement; and a spacious patio with terraces where the new owner could develop beautiful garden areas, a barbecue zone and a private pool. The property has 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, 3 recently bathrooms, a bright livingroom, a fully equipped kitchen with top of the range appliances and two spacious terraces. Extras such as a large basement equipped with a bedroom and a bathroom with shower; a storage room with extra space for storing; a covered garage; central heating; air conditioning hot/cold in all rooms of the house; furniture included; and marble floors, among other things, make this property even more attractive. Undoubtedly, an excellent property to own in Mallorca.

description: This bright penthouse apartment with a living area of approx. 146m² is located in the south-west of the capital of Palma, which is characterized by its tranquility and its easy and quick access to the center. The proximity to various shopping, services and the beach is another plus that makes it very pleasant to live here.  In the entrance area of the apartment is the hallway, a large kitchen, three bedrooms and two bathrooms, one of them en suite. Two of the three bedrooms have access to a covered terrace. A living-dining room that leads to another 90 m² terrace with BBQ area, from which a staircase leads upstairs to the upper terrace where you can enjoy the sea and panoramic views. The special thing about this apartment is that you can enjoy the sun’s rays absolutely undisturbed and with a lot of privacy on the terraces. Further features are: the central air conditioning, central heating, 2 underground parking spaces with a cellar etc. If you would like more information or would like to make an appointment, we invite you to contact us.

The property features two good-sized bedrooms with built-in wardrobes sharing a large bathroom. description: Sa Torre, in luxury urbanization "CAPRI" of the year 2001, JD Residences offers you this magnificent apartment for sale in an excellent state of conservation and maintenance, the apartment is like new. It has approximately 215 meters built with the following distribution:   Living house 185 square meters with 3 large bedrooms, 3 bathrooms (one in master suite) Two living rooms (one with fireplace) Very large kitchen, laundry and hall. It also has a terrace of 30 square meters. On the underground floor it has a garage space of 18 square meters and a storage room of 11 meters.    The apartment has air conditioning and central heating, marble floors, equipped kitchen and good finishes. The apartment is sold unfurnished. The urbanization has only 12 neighbors, communal gardens and a communal pool.   Community fees are approximately 150 euros per month.   Make your virtual or face-to-face appointment with JD Residences and we will be happy to assist you in Spanish, English, German, Swedish and Russian, Official Property Agent API: Daniel Cano    buy only with true registered professionals!

description: Beautiful garden apartment in Sa Vinya This very well maintained garden apartment is located in one of the most popular residential complexes in the southwest of Mallorca - Sa Vinya - within walking distance to the picturesque beaches and bays of Illetas, only a few minutes from the golf course and only about 5 minutes from the popular port of Portals Nous. The apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, one of them en suite, a living-dining area and a fully equipped kitchen. From the spacious, north-facing garden with a very nice terrace, you have direct access to one of the 3 communal pools of the complex. The apartment has a real wood fireplace, a new air condition w/c, SMART Home and a garage parking space.

description: Penthouse in first Sea line in Costa de la Calma EXCLUSIVE WITH E&V - This bright penthouse in Costa de la Calma, situated just abouve the sea, presents itself with a huge and impressive panoramic sea view. The flat and the fantastic terrace are located on the same floor, which has a surface of more than 300 m2. A wide and comfortable space to enjoy hours of relaxation in the Sun all year round, as well as fascinating sunsets while dining in good company. Each of the three bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom and direct access to the terrace, offering simultaneously breathtaking Mediterranean views. The living-dining room is located right next to the separate kitchen. The terraces are also easily accessible from the communal areas. In the process of a potential modernization and renovation of the property, an elegant solution would be the integration/opening of the kitchen into the spacious living/dining room. Moreover, for cooling off you can either choose between the pool or the sea, as the complex has direct access to the sea and a communal pool available. Besides this, within a few minutes' walk you will find a small sandy bay as well as restaurants, cafés and shops. Other features are: Fireplace, guest toilet, lift and a spacious closed garage inside the complex. Santa Ponsa offers a combination of beautiful landscape and coastline, sophisticated infrastructure, sports facilities and excellent road connections. Its close proximity to Palma and the International Airport makes Santa Ponsa one of the most sought after locations in Mallorca’s south west region. Furthermore, it provides services and infrastructure in a relaxing and exclusive environment for those people who want to enjoy the island year round. Golfers will love the choice of no less than three golf courses at Nova Santa Ponsa, plus the area’s popular Port Adriano. This is Mallorca’s super yacht harbour and rounds up with its designer boutiques and great choice of bars and restaurants the exclusive Mediterranean lifestyle of this area.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Finca with pool, tourist license and guest house in Porreres. This rustic finca for sale nestled in the nature of Porreres has a tourist license and a wonderful attached guest house. In addition, it is located in Porreres, a discreet village in the interior of Mallorca that will guarantee you great privacy and intimacy. Its main characteristics are the following: • Porreres • 500 m2 usable area • 5 double bedrooms  • 4 bathrooms (3 en suite) • Plot 5.000 m2 • Swimming pool 6x5 m2 • Parking space  • Tourist license  • Extras: air conditioning, barbecue, heating, fireplace, laundry, double glazed windows, porcelain stoneware With a total of 500 m2 distributed in 2 floors, this rustic finca with its traditional stone walls was built a few years ago and is in perfect condition. As you discover all the rooms, you will see the rustic character of the whole property. With a predominance of stone walls and imposing exposed beams throughout the house, on the other hand, its decoration is more modern. On the first floor, you will find not one, but two spacious and bright living rooms. Equipped with a fireplace and direct access to the garden and terrace, it is very bright. The kitchen, independent and fully equipped, has a large storage capacity, with an island in its center and a great lighting, partly thanks to the LED lights, this space will allow you to enjoy the moments of cooking. Of the 5 double bedrooms, four of them have a dressing room included and 3 of them have an en suite bathroom. Each one is more special, all the bedrooms are spacious, warm and represent the ideal space for your relaxation and comfort. In the center of Mallorca enjoying the greatest privacy and intimacy, this property with swimming pool will allow you to fully enjoy your days in Mallorca. From its spectacular interior you will be able to access its large garden areas from where you will be able to do physical activity, chat with your friends while you refresh yourself in the swimming pool, disconnect reading a book and many other things. In addition, you will also have a guest house so that when you receive the visit of your friends or family, they can stay a few days with you. An ideal way to spend time together but keeping each one your personal space. If you want to enjoy this rustic finca with swimming pool and tourist license in Porreres, call 971888018 or fill in the form.

suggestedTexts.title: Estate

description: Modern townhouse in quiet area Corner townhouse in a community of only 5 units with community pool in a residential area in the centre of Palma. The property has a modern, industrial loft style and is distributed over 3 floors + basement: On the lower floor there is a spacious private garage for two cars, as well as a large storage room and the utility room. Through an interior staircase we access to the main floor where we have the entrance hall, the living room with fireplace that heats the whole house, the dining room, the kitchen, a guest toilet and the main terrace of about 30 m2 from which you can access the communal pool. On the first level we have the master bedroom with a large en suite bathroom, dressing room and a balcony. On the first floor, there are 2 double bedrooms, a bathroom and an open space that can be used as an office or games room and a terrace. If you are looking for a modern style home, in a gated and secure community, in a quiet area and only a few minutes from the city centre, maybe this is the right property for you. For any questions or viewings please do not hesitate to contact us.

suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house

description: Penthouse with unbeatable charm in trendy Son Espanyolet. At the top of a two-story building, we find this gem that has been carefully renovated without renouncing the house's original charm. There are two spacious bedrooms and two bathrooms, one of which is en-suite. The bathrooms as well as parts of property have underfloor heating and for warmer days there is also air conditioning. The home has undergone several renovations and the entire roof was renovated and insulated in 2016. In the same year, the kitchen and floor were changed and one of the bathrooms was renovated. In 2019, the second bathroom was done and the windows were renovated.  The spacious terrace of 34 m2 is accessed from the kitchen and has a fantastic south-east position and has sun most of the day. This is a unique residence with a lot of charm and at the same time modernized which guarantees a comfortable living. Additional information: Air conditioning, heating, double glazing, private terrace.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Espanyolet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Amelia Inmobiliaria offers a first-line apartment on the Paseo Marítimo with ocean views. The area is currently being remodeled, where you can enjoy more vegetation, landscaped areas, wider sidewalks, reduced vehicle lanes, leaving everything new. Great investment opportunity! Privileged place in Palma, where we find all kinds of services: restaurants, shops, supermarkets, etc. It is a second floor with an elevator that consists of 42 useful m2, which has been completely renovated. It has a spacious living room with an integrated kitchen, fully equipped and finished with great taste. Of the same a balcony-terrace of about 10 m2 is sold in which there is space to put a table and chairs and to be able to enjoy the sea and excellent views. Then we have a spacious laundry room and full bathroom. The bedroom is double, has a built-in wardrobe and from which you can also go out to the terrace. It has two air conditioners, parquet flooring and it is a very bright apartment.

description: The classical beauty of this exceptional penthouse gives it that traditional and very cosy character that forms part of the architecture and atmosphere of this part of the city of Palma where it is located, the historic quarter, one of the most beautiful in Spain, full of monuments and civil and religious buildings between streets that house emblematic shops, charming cafés and restaurants, museums, modern art galleries and all the services necessary for day to day life.    In one of the centenary stately buildings within this fabulous setting and with views over the historic area, we find this beautiful home where traditional elements of Mallorcan constructions have been preserved, such as wooden beams in attic ceilings that are perfectly adapted to the more modern ones, resulting in a spectacular functional, comfortable and light-filled penthouse that maintains its stately essence.    The building opens onto a charming Mallorcan courtyard, a place where history is already evident and from where the property is accessed. In the courtyard we also find the space to comfortably house a garage space. Inside the house, a hall full of charm distributes the attic in a wing occupied by the large living room with fireplace and large dining area as well as a guest toilet. On the opposite side is the kitchen with a dining area and another fireplace, a space where, taking advantage of the height, a study area has been created above it. In this part there is also the sleeping area, with 3 bright bedrooms and two complete bathrooms. The master bedroom has a private terrace, an intimate outdoor area that overlooks the courtyard of the building and brings all the light inside.    Above the bedrooms, there is an upper level with a large space that is currently used as an office but can be used for entertainment, relaxation or whatever you wish.    "An excellent and bright updated stately home enjoying space and privacy in a distinguished location in the historic centre of Palma. "    FEATURES:    -Air conditioning hot/cold, central heating, ceramic/gres floors, two fireplaces, fitted wardrobes.  -Separate fitted kitchen, laundry room.  -Terrace, communal inner courtyard, parking space.    LOCATION:    -Centre area, within the historic centre, next to restaurants, next to cafes, next to shops, next to museums, next to yacht club.

suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Palma Old Town - Beautiful investment in need of renovation. Amazing opportunity to own a piece of history, a blank canvas and a great investment all in one property. This incredible apartment of a sizable 250m2 is only a few meters away from the “Ramblas” in the heart of Palma old town. In a very quiet corner we find this property in absolute need of restoration, that could turn into the most beautiful home, naturally flooded with light and with a small private patio. A sure investment that maintained the original character in its architecture: wooden beams, floor tiles, balconies, windows and doors are there to be brought back to life and enhance the splendor of once. Set in an incredible building with only three neighbors, this property has a private entrance and the possibility to acquire a separate parking.

The right wing has a separate entrance and welcomes guests.

description: Beautiful triplex penthouse with harbor views This modern triplex penthouse is situated in one of the best residential complexes with swimming pool at the Paseo Marítimo of Palma. The property is distributed over three floors with the following layout: on the entrance level we find a guest toilet, a large living-dining room with access to a covered terrace of about 8 m2 and an open-plan completely renovated kitchen. On the lower floor we find 4 double bedrooms and two bathrooms. The top floor offers the spacious master bedroom with a stunning bathroom en suite, and a large terrace of approx. 34 m2 which invites you to celebrate long evenings with friends and family in complete privacy. From this terrace you can enjoy the beautiful views on the well-kept communal garden with swimming pool surrounded by tall palm trees and views to the harbor. The property is sold with 3 adjacent parking spaces included in the price. Further features are air conditioning hot and cold, marble and parquet flooring, music system.

description: Modern home in exclusive community This special property in one of Nova Santa Ponsa's newest and most desirable communities is a gem! Offering a bright and airy open floor plan, incredible light in all rooms, views to the golf course, quality fittings and appliances, this home is a peaceful, wonderful retreat! The gardens with mature landscaping invite you to linger in the sun or shade. Spacious terraces allow for outdoor dining and entertaining. Heating is provided in the cooler months by underfloor heating in bathrooms, and air conditioning warm/cold. The community boasts an incredible pool with facilities, immaculate grounds and gardens, and secure gated access. This property offers incredible value for the area! Santa Ponsa has become one of the most sought-after residential areas in southwest Mallorca. The perfect infrastructure in terms of the nearby cultural city of Palma and the international airport, the breathtaking landscape and exclusive neighborhoods make Santa Ponsa a unique place. The impressive cliffs with the unparalleled view of the three Malgrats islands, the rich offering of golf courses and the location near the new, exclusive yacht marina of Port Adriano provide a unique Mediterranean lifestyle on Mallorca.

description: This exceptional villa in Port Adriano is located in the first sea line in one of the most sought-after locations directly at the marina of Port Adriano. The special combination of breathtaking sea views, excellent construction quality and the unique location make this modern villa a distinctive and real gem. Light-flooded rooms paired with modern architectural design, implemented with high-quality materials and amenities such as a lift, a private fitness area, a guest flat and lots of glass create a pleasant and friendly living concept.  The outdoor area invites you to relax and sunbathe with a beautifully landscaped pool and spacious sun terraces, but also the spacious master suite and three additional bedrooms with associated bathrooms leave nothing to be desired.

It has approximately 215 meters built with the following distribution:   Living house 185 square meters with 3 large bedrooms, 3 bathrooms (one in master suite) Two living rooms (one with fireplace) Very large kitchen, laundry and hall. It also has a terrace of 30 square meters. On the underground floor it has a garage space of 18 square meters and a storage room of 11 meters.    The apartment has air conditioning and central heating, marble floors, equipped kitchen and good finishes. The apartment is sold unfurnished. The urbanization has only 12 neighbors, communal gardens and a communal pool.   Community fees are approximately 150 euros per month.   Make your virtual or face-to-face appointment with JD Residences and we will be happy to assist you in Spanish, English, German, Swedish and Russian, Official Property Agent API: Daniel Cano    buy only with true registered professionals!

description: Rustic finca with large plot of land in Establiments. You have an incredible opportunity before you to live in an exclusive urbanization where this rustic finca is located. A quiet environment, with unobstructed views and close to Palma, this property has the following main features: • Establiments • 371 m2 • 2 double bedrooms and 1 single bedroom • 1 bathroom • Plot of 7.140 m2 • Artificial swimming pool This 371 m2 home has been distributed on two floors. One part of the house is ready to move into, and the other needs a complete renovation, as the house dates back to 1930. Having two floors, the second floor will always be a more intimate and private space, especially when you have visitors at home. In its large and bright living room, you will spend long evenings with friends, but also with your family enjoying your favorite activities. You will spend endless moments all together, and always with unobstructed views and a quiet and exclusive atmosphere. The kitchen is a very luminous space and distributed along its length. It has no doors, so you will be able to see everything that happens in the dining room, and also, its great luminosity gives more amplitude to the space. You will notice in the images the spectacularity of its rooms, all equally bright as the rest of the property. In addition to the fact that both have beautiful beams on their ceilings that give, along with other elements of the house, that traditional rustic touch so sought after.  Currently the house only has one bathroom, but with the necessary reform in a part of the house, you may be interested in building another one. As you can see, the current bathroom is an ideal space, with dreamy bright white tiles. It is ideal not only for its perfect condition and taste in decoration, but also for the unobstructed views of the countryside that you will have when you get out of the shower. The property is located in an exclusive urbanization, but is considered a rustic property due to its large house and land. It has water and a large cistern. Undoubtedly, this finca is the perfect opportunity for those who want to live close to Palma without having to live the chaos of the city. It is located just 20 minutes by car, in this time you will be in any leisure, gastronomic or cultural area you want. Of course, as you will have a large plot of more than 7,000 m2, you will surely spend a lot of time enjoying and exploring every corner of your plot. You will be able to enjoy a quiet day observing nature, exercise outdoors, have a vegetable garden, fruit trees and a long etcetera. If you have imagined yourself living in this rustic property located in Establiments, call 971888018 or fill in the contact form.

suggestedTexts.title: Estate

description: Penthouse in the heart of Santa Catalina This is a very bright, open and also rare penthouse in Palma's city centre and this could be the home of your dreams. It is located in one of the most sought-after areas of the city - Santa Catalina. The property with the 360º panoramic view extends over the entire top floor of a building. It is ready for immediate occupancy, but also offers a very large potential for the realisation of your personal living dreams due to its very open design. This fantastic and spacious penthouse with its 4 terraces of approx. 120 m² offers its new owner a multitude of possibilities. The penthouse has 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a very spacious living-dining area, a large kitchen and a central entrance area. Other features include air conditioning (hot/cold), double glazed windows, an outdoor summer shower, micro-cement floors and a lift. There is also a bodega, a library with custom-made shelves and a large walk-in wardrobe in the master bedroom. Please feel very welcome to contact us for more information and viewings for this unique penthouse in the heart of Santa Catalina. Palma with around 300 days of sunshine per year is the perfect city for lovers of good weather. In recent years the districts around Santa Catalina, the port area and the Paseo Marítimo have been transformed, offering a truly cosmopolitan atmosphere. Santa Catalina developed into the in-quarter of the Balearic capital. Its great variety of artistic cafés, pop-up shops and modern restaurants transmit a totally international atmosphere. Thanks to the inclined shape of the neighborhood presents a variety of apartments and both the second and third line also enjoy views of the port of Palma. In the southeast of the city, directly in the port is the Paseo Marítimo, one of the city's best-known leisure areas and the adjoining Cala Mayor and San Agustin. Apart from exclusive discotheques and restaurants, the Paseo Marítimo stands out for its marvelous views of the port and the Cathedral, which are only a few minutes' walk away.

description: Townhouse with character in Santa Catalina Very well located two-storey townhouse on a quiet but very central street, within walking distance of Santa Catalina's market square and just a few steps from the seafront. On the lower floor there is a bedroom (currently an office), a living room, a full bathroom and a separate kitchen with access to the patio. The entire upper floor consists of the loft-style master suite, open plan with integrated shower room. High ceilings with exposed beams, exposed natural stone walls and a beautiful landscaped courtyard. It has central heating and air conditioning (hot/cold). Due to its layout, this house is more suitable for a couple without children than with children.

description: This beautiful house inspired by traditional Mallorcan constructions has privileged views of the Tramuntana mountain range and the city of Palma with the sea in the background.     It is situated in an elevated position within one of the urban centres of the municipality of Bunyola, a natural paradise in full contact with Nature close to restaurants, shops, paddle tennis centres, and only 5 minutes away from the Son Termes Golf Club, one of the most ecological in Mallorca. Palma is only 10 minutes away.    The excellent house is characterised by a Mediterranean design full of naturalness, simplicity and natural light; a place to live all year round with all the comforts and where to lower revolutions.     It has been developed on two floors with sloping ceilings and beautiful exposed beams and has 5 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, one of them en suite. It consists of a living room area that extends to the dining room and that opens completely to an exterior bathed in sunlight where you can breathe nature one hundred percent, with porch, garden and large swimming pool with unique panoramic views both day and night. The luminous kitchen with central island completely furnished, is connected to the dining room and the living room, resulting in pleasant and cosy independent but at the same time united spaces, perfect to enjoy them.     The property has a large garage space, and an outdoor play area with basketball court.      FEATURES:    -Air conditioning, heating oil radiators, parquet flooring, double glazing, fitted wardrobes.  -Independent equipped kitchen.  -Terraces, porch, garden, swimming pool, garage.    LOCATION:    -Clear views, city views, mountain views, sea views, green surroundings, close to restaurants, close to supermarkets, close to golf, 109 min. from Palma.

description: Amelia Inmobiliaria offers this fully renovated apartment on the second floor without elevator, located in a 1994 building. Located in the Foners area, one of the fastest growing neighborhoods in Palma de Mallorca, being very close to the historic center and Plaza España, 300 meters from the sea, less than 100 meters from avenues and close to schools, bus stops, banks and supermarkets. This recently completely renovated apartment has a large living room with an open kitchen fully equipped with brand new quality furniture and appliances, a sliding door that leads to a 4 m2 balcony, a fully renovated bathroom with a shower and a spacious bedroom. abroad. Floor with lots of light. It has hot and cold air conditioning and fitted wardrobes.
