description: This magnificent new single-family house project is located in the heart of Palma's green lung, in the peaceful area of Sa Teulera, surrounded by the Bellver forest and a large number of green areas, close to the best schools and excellent sports clubs such as the Tennis Club, as well as having easy access to the entire road network, which gives this house an unbeatable quality of life. On a south-facing plot of 685 m2, the authors of this splendid project have designed a modern 476 m2 house characterised by pure white lines that are complemented by the traditional colours of the materials used, such as oak wood, resulting in ultra-comfortable, warm and functional spaces. It has been developed on two main floors, a roof floor and a large basement floor, all connected by lift. It has 4 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms as well as a guest bathroom. With 45 m2 of porches and terraces, a 39 m2 swimming pool with sunbeds area and garden, the outdoor spaces become relaxing places where to enjoy the environment, the light and the fantastic Mediterranean climate. The ground floor features a spacious open-space with equipped kitchen, dining room and living room with fireplace, as well as a guest bathroom and a double bedroom en-suite. This floor opens onto a large porch with outdoor dining area that overlooks the garden and swimming pool and allows you to enjoy the closeness of nature. The first floor has 3 double bedrooms all with en-suite bathrooms and all with a natural and elegant style at the same time. Two of them have access to large terraces and the third one has access to another interior terrace. The house is crowned by an incredible solarium space with dining room, summer lounge, kitchen, storage area and jacuzzi and where there is no lack of green plants and natural vegetation that surrounds the landscape with the sea in the background. To highlight the high qualities with which both the interiors and exteriors of this fantastic project will have, which also has 3 comfortable garage spaces. CHARACTERISTICS: -Air conditioning hot/cold by ducts, underfloor heating, stone and oak floors, alarm system, aluminium carpentry, acoustic and thermal insulation, fireplace, built-in wardrobes. -Fitted kitchen, wine cellar -Terraces, porches, garden, swimming pool, lift, solarium, jacuzzi, dining room and summer kitchen, garage for 3 cars, parking. LOCATION: -South facing, unobstructed views, mountain views, close to schools, close to shops and restaurants, close to sports club, close to all urban transport, excellent access to all road network.

description: Las Maravillas is a neighbourhood on the Playa de Palma. It has a good infrastructure and everything is within walking distance. The long beach invites you to sunbathe as well as to go for a walk. The capital Palma is reached in only 10 minutes by car and the airport in only 5 minutes. This unique house is located on a plot of almost 400 sqm, with approximately 230 sqm of living area and is distributed over two floors with high ceilings; a reformed basement; and a spacious patio with terraces where the new owner could develop beautiful garden areas, a barbecue zone and a private pool. The property has 3 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, 3 recently bathrooms, a bright livingroom, a fully equipped kitchen with top of the range appliances and two spacious terraces. Extras such as a large basement equipped with a bedroom and a bathroom with shower; a storage room with extra space for storing; a covered garage; central heating; air conditioning hot/cold in all rooms of the house; furniture included; and marble floors, among other things, make this property even more attractive. Undoubtedly, an excellent property to own in Mallorca.

The main house has 2 double bedrooms, a very large bathroom, a large living room (with the possibility of building a third bedroom) and large furnished and equipped kitchen. All exterior. description: Detached villa of a typical Majorcan architecture located in Costa de la Calma, which will allow you to enjoy unobstructed views where you can disconnect from the digital world, turn off your cell phone and relax with a cup of coffee in your hand.     It consists of 252 m2 built on a single main floor for greater security, easy access and better communication throughout the home. In this way, you get more natural lighting in every corner, providing a greater sense of well-being and comfort.    The property has three large bedrooms with unobstructed views, which will allow you to enjoy beautiful sunrises and sunsets from the comfort.     At the back of the house you can enjoy an outdoor terrace that invites you to live unique moments, such as a good read under the natural light of the day, meditate or just relax.    At the main entrance you will find a large garden area with swimming pool, where you can invite your loved ones to share unforgettable summer days.    You won't have any difficulty when it comes to storing your vehicle, since you will have a large garage with capacity for three vehicles and enough space to store your belongings.    Costa de la Calma is a very quiet and renowned residential area in Mallorca, close to beaches such as Cala Blanca among other small coves of singular beauty. In addition to a great proximity to the marinas of Portals Nous, Puerto Portals, Portal Vells and Port Adriano. They offer services related to sailing.     If you want to make this villa your home, call 971888018 and ask us or fill out the contact form.

description: Cozy apartment with partial sea views This apartment is located next to the Porti Pi, one of the main shopping centre of Palma and just a few minutes away from the very well know Paseo Maritimo. From the nice balcony just in front of the bright living/dining room you will enjoy a partial sea view while having lunch or dinner. The property features two good-sized bedrooms with built-in wardrobes sharing a large bathroom. The fully fitted kitchen could eventually be changed to an open space one in case you want to integrate it to the living/dining room. The apartment features 87 m2 built area, central gas heating as well an elevator.

description: This bright penthouse apartment with a living area of approx. 146m² is located in the south-west of the capital of Palma, which is characterized by its tranquility and its easy and quick access to the center. The proximity to various shopping, services and the beach is another plus that makes it very pleasant to live here.  In the entrance area of the apartment is the hallway, a large kitchen, three bedrooms and two bathrooms, one of them en suite. Two of the three bedrooms have access to a covered terrace. A living-dining room that leads to another 90 m² terrace with BBQ area, from which a staircase leads upstairs to the upper terrace where you can enjoy the sea and panoramic views. The special thing about this apartment is that you can enjoy the sun’s rays absolutely undisturbed and with a lot of privacy on the terraces. Further features are: the central air conditioning, central heating, 2 underground parking spaces with a cellar etc. If you would like more information or would like to make an appointment, we invite you to contact us.

district: Es Forti - Son Cotoner - Son Dameto
description: The apartment has a living area of 90 m². It has a living-dining area with access to a balcony, 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, one of them en suite and a fully equipped kitchen with a utility room. It also has an underground parking space in the same building and a storage room. Son Cotoner is a neighborhood in Palma. Within walking distance you will find all the necessities such as stores, bars, restaurants, doctors, pharmacies, schools, etc. Central heating, underground parking, storage room, air conditioning cold/warm.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Cotoner, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: 3 bedroom penthouse with terrace on two levels with spectacular sea views in a building with few neighbours, lift and 2 parking spaces only a few minutes from the beach in San Agustin. Approximately 181 sqm distributed in 3 double bedrooms, exterior, with built-in wardrobes, exit to terrace and the main one with bathroom en suite and dressing room. Another bathroom apart, large fully fitted kitchen with pantry and laundry room and spacious living room with fireplace and direct access to a wonderful terrace ideal to enjoy all the charm and tranquillity of one of the best areas of Majorca, sun all day long all year round thanks to its excellent south orientation and spectacular views to the sea, the whole bay of Palma and Cabrera and perfect for meetings and barbecues with family and friends due to its large size. In good condition, air conditioning, heating and lift with private access in a very quiet building, with very few neighbours, 2 parking spaces included in the price, away from all noise and stress, in front of the beaches of Cala Mayor and San Agustin, a few minutes from the centre of Palma, shopping centre and yacht club of Cala Nova and all the services, transports and shops at your disposal. More real estate offers at agentsbrokersmallorca. com.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Agustí, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Penthouse in first Sea line in Costa de la Calma EXCLUSIVE WITH E&V - This bright penthouse in Costa de la Calma, situated just abouve the sea, presents itself with a huge and impressive panoramic sea view. The flat and the fantastic terrace are located on the same floor, which has a surface of more than 300 m2. A wide and comfortable space to enjoy hours of relaxation in the Sun all year round, as well as fascinating sunsets while dining in good company. Each of the three bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom and direct access to the terrace, offering simultaneously breathtaking Mediterranean views. The living-dining room is located right next to the separate kitchen. The terraces are also easily accessible from the communal areas. In the process of a potential modernization and renovation of the property, an elegant solution would be the integration/opening of the kitchen into the spacious living/dining room. Moreover, for cooling off you can either choose between the pool or the sea, as the complex has direct access to the sea and a communal pool available. Besides this, within a few minutes' walk you will find a small sandy bay as well as restaurants, cafés and shops. Other features are: Fireplace, guest toilet, lift and a spacious closed garage inside the complex. Santa Ponsa offers a combination of beautiful landscape and coastline, sophisticated infrastructure, sports facilities and excellent road connections. Its close proximity to Palma and the International Airport makes Santa Ponsa one of the most sought after locations in Mallorca’s south west region. Furthermore, it provides services and infrastructure in a relaxing and exclusive environment for those people who want to enjoy the island year round. Golfers will love the choice of no less than three golf courses at Nova Santa Ponsa, plus the area’s popular Port Adriano. This is Mallorca’s super yacht harbour and rounds up with its designer boutiques and great choice of bars and restaurants the exclusive Mediterranean lifestyle of this area.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Sunny family villa with sea view This villa is located in the south area of Costa d'en Blanes, in the exclusive Southwest of Mallorca. The property offers a very spacious rooftop terrace with nice sea views, which can also be used as a car park. Some steps lead into the bright and cozy interior of the villa. On the first floor there is a fully equipped kitchen, and a living room with direct access to the terrace and a guest toilet. From here you can enjoy wonderful sea views and enjoy the sun due to the southwest orientation. On the lower level, there is a master bedroom with a walk-in closet, and further three bedrooms with one bathroom. From this level you can access the pool area which offers a lot of privacy. Other features are: two parking spaces, storages, laundry room and central electric air conditioning w/c. The Bendinat area has earned a reputation for providing a premium lifestyle with easy access into Palma which is only 15 minutes drive away. Not surprisingly it has developed into one of the most sought-after locations in Mallorca offering close proximity to the city with all the inherent benefits of an exclusive and peaceful residential area. In the southwest Bendinat stands out as an ideal location to access international schools, golf courses and shopping facilities. In the northern part of Bendinat the residential areas are adjacent to the Royal Bendinat Golf course and away from the greens there is magnificent coastline with stunning sea views across the bays and beaches. Nearby, the neighboring village at Portals Nous provides quality shopping, boutiques and restaurants plus the most established Puerto Portals super yacht marina where the Spanish Royal Family and a host of celebrities can be seen every summer.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Costa d'En Blanes, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Just a few minutes away from the centre of Palma and within an ideal environment for city lovers who want peace and quiet when they get home, this excellent brand new penthouse is located in a recently built residential complex that offers a large swimming pool and garden area to enjoy the sun and the good weather in a large communal outdoor space with a well-kept design. It also has a wide range of leisure and services around, with restaurants, supermarkets, sports centres and prestigious schools. The property is located on the third floor and has a surface area of 81 m2 made with excellent materials and qualities that will make your day to day life much more comfortable; parquet floors, air conditioning, central heating, electric blinds and double glazing among others. All the rooms have a great entrance of natural light thanks to its south orientation and a modern and comfortable design.  It is distributed in two bedrooms and two bathrooms, one of them en suite. The living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen form a single space with access to a terrace from which you can access the large private solarium area that the penthouse offers us, a large space of 62 m2 with beautiful unobstructed views that has a swimming pool, dining area and summer lounge; a space of its own in the city outdoors and with views that more and more people are looking for. To highlight that the property has three underground parking spaces that are included in the price, a great advantage and convenience for the owners. FEATURES: -Air conditioning hot/cold by ducts, natural gas heating, parquet floors, double glazing, aluminium, electric blinds, built-in wardrobes. -Open plan fitted kitchen. -Private terrace, solarium and swimming pool, communal pool and gardens. -3 underground parking spaces. LOCATION: -Clear views, next to restaurants, next to shops, next to schools, next to sports centres, excellent access to all road and transport network.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Zona Colegios - Son Moix, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: With a privileged location within the historic centre of Palma, an extraordinary place full of streets, squares, corners with a special charm and formed by the most emblematic monuments of the city, this excellent duplex flat is situated within a listed building from the 17th century full of history. The elegant house overlooks all these beautiful surroundings with 473 m2 of light-filled surface area and composed of rooms that have been reformed under a modern and avant-garde design, but respecting the essence of the traditional construction with traditional elements that have been maintained, such as the marés arch that opens one of its walls. The perfect preservation of the Mallorcan patio with which the historic building welcomes us is another symbol of the exclusive character that this property offers us.  With exceptional materials and qualities, the house is distributed over two floors with its own lift and a magnificent private outdoor area occupying 80 m2 of terrace with swimming pool and garden, ideal to enjoy in summer or during the sunny days of winter, which makes this property, together with its location, design and history, a unique property. On the upper floor and with a large entrance of natural light we find the large open plan living room with fireplace surrounded by 5 large windows with balcony, as well as the fully equipped designer kitchen and dining room, all connected and with access to a charming terrace where to improvise, for example, an aperitif outdoors. From this floor, which also has a guest bathroom, you can access the large terrace with swimming pool via a convenient staircase. The lower level is occupied by the 3 bedrooms, two of them with en suite bathrooms and the large master bedroom with a spacious dressing area. In addition there is another room which has been used as an office but can be converted into a fourth bedroom. From the bedrooms there is a direct access to the terrace with swimming pool, which adds to the relaxation and calmness of the property. To highlight that this exceptional property includes two parking spaces, a great added value that makes this property unbeatable. FEATURES: -Ducted hot/cold air conditioning, underfloor heating, home automation system, private lift, parquet flooring, fireplace, fitted wardrobes. -Open plan fitted kitchen, laundry room. -Balconies, terrace, swimming pool, two parking spaces. LOCATION: -Listed building, in historic centre, next to restaurants, next to cafes, next to shops, near yacht club, near sea.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Nicolau, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Duplex

description: Villa in quiet area in Bonanova This beautiful villa is located in Bonanova, a quiet village on the outskirts of Palma, and has been partially renovated with high quality materials. From the living/dining room with wooden beams you access the large covered terrace with direct access to the garden and the pool. From the fully equipped kitchen with central cooking island, one has access to the rear patio and the spacious utility room, barbecue area and wine cellar. The house has three bedrooms, three bathrooms and a round room upstairs currently used as an office and has a large terrace with sea views. Pre-installation for air conditioning and central heating, double glazing, electric shutters and garage complete the offer.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Bonanova - Porto Pi, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: This villa is situated in a privileged seafront position in the residential area of Torrenova, only 5 minutes away from the beaches of Palmanova, the marina of Portals, several golf courses and only 10 minutes away from Palma.    The house enjoys spectacular views to the sea and the bay of Palma, and has a beautiful garden in front of the villa with a comfortable direct access to the sea with bathing area.     Built in 2000 and partially renovated in 2020, it comprises on the ground floor a spacious living/dining room with open kitchen, a utility room, a bedroom with bathroom en suite, a guest toilet and a garage. On the upper floor there is the master bedroom with bathroom en suite and dressing room, two further bedrooms (one of them with bathroom en suite), another bathroom, a storeroom and a large terrace. In addition, there is a separate guest flat with a bedroom/living room with bathroom and kitchen.    Outside there are numerous open and covered terraces, a beautiful, easy to maintain garden and a spectacular swimming pool.    Extras such as underfloor heating throughout the house, air conditioning hot/cold, kitchen with Miele appliances, alarm system, etc. complete this exclusive property.    FEATURES:  -Direct access to the sea  -Air conditioning hot/cold and underfloor heating  -Integrated kitchen equipped with Miele electrical appliances  -Covered and uncovered terraces  -Garage   -Swimming pool  -Guest flat    LOCATION:  -Front line to the sea, unobstructed views, sea views, 5 min. beach, close to golf courses, close to restaurants, close to shops, 10 min. to Palma.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Magaluf, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: High quality apartment in Bendinat Luxurious apartment in the exclusive community Es Pinar: very well-kept gated community with 24-hour security service, just a few minutes walk from the beach, shopping facilities, golf and Puerto Portals. It is located in a quiet area, surrounded by pine trees and has beautiful garden areas and a community saltwater pool. Regarding the distribution; the apartment has a comfortable and bright separate kitchen, which is fully equipped and with access to the utility room; a spacious living-dining room with unobstructed views and access to the large covered terrace, of approx. 30 m2 facing west. The 2 double bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and fitted wardrobes, one of the bedrooms has access to the terrace. There is also a guest toilet. The flat is very bright, receiving direct morning sun in the kitchen and one of the bedrooms; and afternoon sun in the other bedroom, the terrace and the living room. Daikin aerothermal machine is used for the underfloor heating, air conditioning hot/cold and hot water. An indoor parking space, an outdoor space and a storage room are included in the price. In summary, it is a very pleasant apartment to enjoy at any time of the year, either as a primary residence or as a holiday home. Do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions or if you would like to visit it. The Bendinat area has earned a reputation for providing a premium lifestyle with easy access into Palma which is only 15 minutes drive away. Not surprisingly it has developed into one of the most sought-after locations in Mallorca offering close proximity to the city with all the inherent benefits of an exclusive and peaceful residential area. In the southwest Bendinat stands out as an ideal location to access international schools, golf courses and shopping facilities. In the northern part of Bendinat the residential areas are adjacent to the Royal Bendinat Golf course and away from the greens there is magnificent coastline with stunning sea views across the bays and beaches. Nearby, the neighboring village at Portals Nous provides quality shopping, boutiques and restaurants plus the most established Puerto Portals super yacht marina where the Spanish Royal Family and a host of celebrities can be seen every summer.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Portals Nous - Bendinat, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This spacious and bright flat is located in the heart of Palma's Paseo Mallorca, a unique location with the most innovative gastronomic offer of the city and next to Jaime III, one of the most important avenues of the city with first class shops. Santa Catalina is also within walking distance as well as the Paseo del Borne and the beautiful old town of Palma. The large flat offers fabulous unobstructed views over the city with the cathedral and the sea in the background. It has 180 m2 of surface full of light and perfectly distributed in 5 bedrooms with built-in wardrobes as well as dressing room and 3 bathrooms. A spacious living-dining room with fireplace has direct access to the 20 m2 terrace from where you can admire the beautiful wooded area surrounding the Sa Riera stream. The kitchen is independently arranged and has a laundry area as well as another terrace in the back area. Excellent flat of large dimensions in an exceptional location. LOCATION: -Paseo Mallorca, clear views, all exterior, next to restaurants, next to shops and all services. Close to old town, close to yacht club.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Jaume, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Sea View Apartment in popular community This lovely renovated apartment is located in one of the most sought-after communities in Costa de la Calma. Surrounded by nature, accented with bougainvillea and colorful Mediterranean gardens and tilework, this complex has a unique water landscape with four pools, one jacuzzi and a restaurant nestled in the large terraces and lush gardens. The complex enjoys direct sea access from where you can begin your morning with a dip in the sea. The apartment has 2 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms, a partially open modern kitchen, and a bright living and dining area with a beautiful Ibiza style fireplace, opening to the lovely terrace with sea views. The terrace is partly covered and offers nice privacy. The special Mallorquin styling of this beloved community and the many advantages of this peaceful home makes for an excellent opportunity to own in a community which rarely has homes available for sale. The next beach bar is reached within a 5 minute walk and by car you can easily reach the shops and restaurants of Santa Ponsa, several popular golf courses, and the harbour of Port Adriano. Extra amenities include air conditioning h/c and a community parking area. This lovely renovated apartment is located in one of the most sought-after communities in Costa de la Calma. Surrounded by nature, accented with bougainvillea and colorful Mediterranean gardens and tilework, this complex has a unique water landscape with four pools, one jacuzzi and a restaurant nestled in the large terraces and lush gardens. The complex enjoys direct sea access from where you can begin your morning with a dip in the sea. The apartment has 2 bedroom and 2 full bathrooms, a partially open modern kitchen, and a bright living and dining area with a beautiful Ibiza style fireplace, opening to the lovely terrace with sea views. The terrace is partly covered and offers nice privacy. The special Mallorquin styling of this beloved community and the many advantages of this peaceful home makes for an excellent opportunity to own in a community which rarely has homes available for sale. The next beach bar is reached within a 5 minute walk and by car you can easily reach the shops and restaurants of Santa Ponsa, several popular golf courses, and the harbour of Port Adriano. Extra amenities include air conditioning h/c and a parking space.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Costa de la Calma, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Located in the coveted neighborhood of Santa Catalina, with a reputation for its national and international restaurants, charming streets, and prized gourmet food market, you will find this beautiful property. It is a completely renovated 84m2 ground floor property with modern and cozy interiors in neutral tones that offer bright contemporary living spaces for you to enjoy. The careful selection of high-grade materials such as glass to enhance the natural light, wooden floors to bring a touch of warmth and traditional wooden beams in the ceilings create a wonderful homely feel in a luxurious setting. The large 31m2 terrace offers a privileged and enviable outdoor space in the middle of the city. The ground floor property has a double bedroom with fitted wardrobes and a single bedroom plus a bathroom. The spacious main living room comprises of lounge, dining area, and open plan kitchen with a central island and modern white furniture creating a seamless connection to the outside terrace.  This outdoor space is the perfect place to entertain in the warm sun or under the shade thanks to an awning. "A fantastic modern property bathed in natural light in one of the most sought after living places in Palma" Features: -Renovated. -Air conditioning hot/cold, parquet flooring, fitted wardrobes. -Terrace. location: -Palma city center, next to restaurants, cafes, shops, traditional market, near the promenade, historic center, and next to all amenities.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sta Catalina - El Jonquet, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Bright apartment in central location This bright and renovated apartment is centrally located, just a few minutes' walk from Santa Catalina and Palma Tennis. The patio with lemon tree invites you to stay and relax with friends. The property counts with an open and fully equipped kitchen, a guest toilet, 2 bedrooms and a bathroom with shower. Other features: Underfloor heating, air conditioning w/c, a parking space can be rented nearby. Palma with around 300 days of sunshine per year is the perfect city for lovers of good weather. In recent years the districts around Santa Catalina, the port area and the Paseo Marítimo have been transformed, offering a truly cosmopolitan atmosphere. Santa Catalina developed into the in-quarter of the Balearic capital. Its great variety of artistic cafés, pop-up shops and modern restaurants transmit a totally international atmosphere. Thanks to the inclined shape of the neighborhood presents a variety of apartments and both the second and third line also enjoy views of the port of Palma. In the southeast of the city, directly in the port is the Paseo Marítimo, one of the city's best-known leisure areas and the adjoining Cala Mayor and San Agustin. Apart from exclusive discotheques and restaurants, the Paseo Marítimo stands out for its marvelous views of the port and the Cathedral, which are only a few minutes' walk away.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Armadams, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This elegant villa would make a great family home and/or holiday home and is ready to move in, situated in an idyllic setting on a cul-de-sac surrounded by open fields and vineyards with countryside views.  Entering the property you are met with a grand reception hall boasting double height ceilings leading up to the top floor. The ground floor consists of a spacious light living room with direct access to a covered large L shaped terrace overlooking the pool and outside kitchen, spacious dining room with direct access to a fully equipped kitchen. On the lower level of the property there is direct access to a garage which can fit up to 4 to 5 cars or could be used as an additional space for gymnasium. There are also 3 large storage rooms. Has a tennis court which could easily be converted into a basketball court or padel tennis court. The garden is an easy to maintain mature mediterranean garden. Features include: central heating throughout, outside covered kitchen overlooking swimming pool, 10x5 swimming pool, tennis court, large garage, double glazing throughout, hot/ cold AC and automatic irrigation system.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Establiments - Son Sardina, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Estate in Camino De Sarria no number

description: Modern, recently refurbished spaces full of natural light, open spaces with the warm touch of wood and unobstructed views over the rooftops of the city and part of its architecture is what this penthouse offers us, located in the centre of Palma, just a short distance from the historic centre, in an area full of social and commercial life, with numerous shops, cafés, terraces and all the necessary services for day to day life around it.     The excellent property has a surface area of 97 m2 and offers us a magnificent terrace-solarium of 27 m2 with barbecue to enjoy the sun and the unbeatable climate of the island to the maximum. With all the comforts and the latest advances in domotic technology, the penthouse is distributed in 2 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes made to measure and two bathrooms, one of them in the master suite and the other a hammam, a type of steam bath with enormous benefits for the body thanks to the combination of humid heat and water vapour. The living-dining room space with fireplace and perfectly integrated and custom-made kitchen opens completely onto the large terrace, which ends up becoming an extension of the living room especially in the summer months when the windows remain open.    The building of which this property forms part has a lift and a communal terrace where the storage room of the penthouse is located. The price includes a parking space within walking distance.     "Undoubtedly an excellent penthouse to enjoy the day to day with all the comforts both inside and outside the house".    CHARACTERISTICS:    -Air conditioning hot/cold, fireplace, underfloor heating.  -Built-in wardrobes, Turkish bath, movement sensors in lights, voice-controlled audio system.  -Integrated kitchen in living room.  -Terrace with outdoor shower, barbecue, storage room.  -Parking space included.    LOCATION:    -Clear views, central area, next to restaurants, next to shops, next to all services.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Missio - Mercat, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Seafront apartment in Santa Ponsa This apartment is situated in a small complex with only a few neighbours in a privileged location in the first line of the sea in Santa Ponsa. If you love the maritime life, this is the place for you: the residents of the complex have direct access to the sea, some of which often apply for a buoy for their small yachts or boats during the summer months - the small marina with its sports installations such as sailing and diving school as well as restaurants and cafes are within walking distance. The apartement itself has great potential and captivates with its omnipresent sea view. It has a very good room distribution with three bedrooms and two bathrooms, a spacious living room as well as kitchen and storage room. In the basement area of the complex there is an additional storage room, which belongs to the property. A parking space completes this great offer. Santa Ponsa offers a combination of beautiful landscape and coastline, sophisticated infrastructure, sports facilities and excellent road connections. Its close proximity to Palma and the International Airport makes Santa Ponsa one of the most sought after locations in Mallorca’s south west region. Furthermore, it provides services and infrastructure in a relaxing and exclusive environment for those people who want to enjoy the island year round. Golfers will love the choice of no less than three golf courses at Nova Santa Ponsa, plus the area’s popular Port Adriano. This is Mallorca’s super yacht harbour and rounds up with its designer boutiques and great choice of bars and restaurants the exclusive Mediterranean lifestyle of this area.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Large spaces bathed in natural light and fantastic views overlooking the heart of the noblest part of Palma, come together in this excellent penthouse situated on the same avenue of Jaime III with the Paseo del Borne, the nerve centre of the city with its arcades that shelter the most exclusive shops, restaurants and terraces where you can enjoy the lively atmosphere of the capital of the island.    The large flat occupies the top floor of a historic building with a lift and entrance from two streets. All exterior, it has 227 m2 of constructed area and is distributed in 5 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, the main one with a dressing room area. The living-dining room has large windows that offer magnificent views and is also equipped with a fireplace. The ample kitchen is independent and also has great natural light thanks to the large windows it has.     The building is crowned by a large roof terrace where we find the storage space of the property as well as offering incredible views that reach all the way to the sea and the historic centre of Palma.    This stupendous penthouse, after a refurbishment, will undoubtedly become one of the best properties in the city of Palma.  It is worth mentioning that it has 3 underground parking spaces which are sold separately and are located at the back of the building.      FEATURES:    -Parquet floors, fireplace, dressing room.  -Historic building with lift.  -Storage room.  Option to purchase 3 parking spaces.      LOCATION:    -Clear views, town centre, next to shops, next to restaurants and cafes, close to historic centre, close to yacht club, close to schools and all amenities.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Jaume, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

address: subdistrict Son Roca - Son Ximelis - Son Anglada
neighborhood: Son Roca - Son Ximelis - Son Anglada
description: Located next to the exclusive residential area of Son Vida, surrounded by green areas and close to the best schools and three of the most prestigious golf courses of the island, this excellent detached house is full of light and with private outdoor spaces of porches, terraces and swimming pool where you can enjoy relaxing moments in the sun or in the shade without leaving the house and only 5 minutes away from the centre of Palma. It is surrounded by all kinds of services for your day-to-day comfort, including sports facilities. The property occupies 411 m2 within a plot of 578 m2 and is organised on two levels plus basement with 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms.  On the entrance level is the living-dining room which occupies an elegant, warm and cosy space, with access to the charming porch with summer lounge which, together with the garden area and south facing swimming pool, is an invitation to enjoy the fresh air and the good weather. On this floor there is also the fully fitted kitchen, with a large entrance of natural light and exit to the outside, a guest bedroom and a guest bathroom. The upper floor is occupied by the master bedroom, with en-suite bathroom and large dressing room as well as two further bedrooms and bathroom. From each of them there is access to the upper terrace, another place to receive the first rays of sunshine as soon as you wake up. In addition to the garage, the basement floor has a large storage space, as well as the machine and laundry room. FEATURES: -Air conditioning, central heating, double glazing. -Fully equipped kitchen, laundry room. -Terraces, swimming pool, garden, garage. LOCATION: -Green areas, close to golf courses, close to shops, close to restaurants, close to schools, 5 min. from Palma centre, excellent connection to all road network.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Roca - Son Ximelis - Son Anglada, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: This charming Mediterranean style villa located in Son Vida has been fully renovated to create a contemporary, fresh and bright home, a perfect combination for outdoor and indoor living. Son Vida is a luxury residential area on the outskirts of Palma home to a total of 3 golf courses and 2 five star hotels. Central Palma is reached within few minutes by car.   This lovely villa is set on one extensive floor with a total living area of 465 m2, with a spacious open living and dining area as well as a stunning designer kitchen. All five double bedrooms and five bathrooms are spread across this floor as well as a storage room, utility room, and double garage space. Through the wonderful floor to ceiling windows, this entire floor grants access to the superb swimming pool area, garden, and exterior BBQ and dining area. Set first line to the golf course in the peaceful area of Son Vida, this home truly offers quiet relaxing living in utmost privacy. Furthermore for those seeking a vacation home for only some months of the year, this fantastic property has a tourist rental licence for year-round use. Additional information: underfloor heating, air conditioning h/c, stone flooring, natural stone details, fireplace, exterior bbq area, utility room, irrigation system.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Vida, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: House

description: Located in one of the most popular areas on the southwest coast of the island, in Sol de Mallorca, a town that is only 15 min. from Palma and where you can enjoy a relaxed atmosphere next to beaches with crystal clear waters and extensive golf courses, is this contemporary villa completely renovated whose spacious interiors convey modernity, with high ceilings, wooden floors, white walls and large windows to the outside that they flood the rooms with light.    The land occupies 1,632 m2 with large outdoor spaces made up of terraced corners, a large swimming pool with a solarium area and an extensive garden where any time of the year is perfect to enjoy it.    The house has 370 m2 of surface area developed on 2 floors with 4 double bedrooms equipped with fitted wardrobes and 4 bathrooms, three of them arranged en suite. On the main level a large entrance gives us access to the spacious living room with dining room and modern open kitchen, all perfectly integrated surrounded by glass doors from which to go directly to the entire outdoor area. On this floor we also find a room and a bathroom. The upper level is occupied by the rest of the rooms, with the large master suite where an area for bathing and relaxing and another for dressing room has been integrated into the same surface, as well as having an exclusive terrace.    The house also offers us a comfortable parking area.    CHARACTERISTICS:    -Air conditioning hot / cold through ducts, central heating, parquet flooring, fitted wardrobes, Jacuzzi.  -Open kitchen equipped.  -Terraces, garden, swimming pool, parking.    LOCATION:    -Natural environment, clear views, near beaches, near restaurants, near shops, 15 min. Palm.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Calvià pueblo, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Stunning sea view apartment above the golf This spacious sea view apartment is situated above the Royal Bendinat Golf Course, in the well-kept luxury community "Olinto". Enoying full afternoon sun till the end of the day, the apartment offers lots of light and breathtaking views to the Bendinat Castle, golf course and sea. The apartment offers a large open plan kitchen, living and dining room, all flowing out to the generous terrace, perfect for relaxing and sharing meals with family and friends. The master bedroom has a walk in wardrobe and large en suite bathroom and there are 3 further bedrooms suites. The master bedroom and one further guest suite also access to the terrace. A guest toilet and a laundry room complete the apartment. The property comes with 3 underground parking spaces (2 open and 1 closed with a garage door) and 2 storage rooms. The complex has a sunny outdoor pool area as well as an indoor pool with spa area and access to the Bendinat Royal Golf Club. The Bendinat area has earned a reputation for providing a premium lifestyle with easy access into Palma which is only 15 minutes drive away. Not surprisingly it has developed into one of the most sought-after locations in Mallorca offering close proximity to the city with all the inherent benefits of an exclusive and peaceful residential area. In the southwest Bendinat stands out as an ideal location to access international schools, golf courses and shopping facilities. In the northern part of Bendinat the residential areas are adjacent to the Royal Bendinat Golf course and away from the greens there is magnificent coastline with stunning sea views across the bays and beaches. Nearby, the neighboring village at Portals Nous provides quality shopping, boutiques and restaurants plus the most established Puerto Portals super yacht marina where the Spanish Royal Family and a host of celebrities can be seen every summer.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cas Catala, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: House with character and beautiful exterior spaces in El Terreno In one of the most charming streets of El Terreno, we find this detached house with a lot of character and personality, distributed over two floors and a solarium. On the ground floor we find a living-dining room with an open kitchen and a guest toilet with shower. The first floor is divided in the sleeping area with four bedrooms, three of them with access to a terrace, and another kitchen with living-dining room. The master bedroom has an en suite bathroom. From this terrace, a staircase leads to the solarium, where you can enjoy the tranquility and charm of the Terreno neighbourhood. On this first floor there is another complete bathroom. It also has a parking space for up to two cars, air conditioning (hot/cold) and electric radiators. The ceilings of around five meters high on the ground floor, where the kitchen and the living room are located, make this house a very special and unique property. The house is located in the Poniente district of Palma, near the Paseo Marítimo, and has been home to illustrious personalities and artists of various kinds. Nowadays it is known for being a district of contrasts, where in its bohemian and picturesque streets the art and modernist style of the houses from the beginning of the 20th century are perfectly intermingled with the sophistication and modernity of the new luxury residential projects.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Terreno, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house

description: Located within the beautiful historic centre of Palma, in one of the most charming and lively streets that make up a genuinely Mallorcan pedestrian area and surroundings whose atmosphere invites you to stroll through its traditional shops alongside the most avant-garde ones or to enjoy a terrace in the sun, we find this fantastic penthouse that forms part of a completely restored building where tradition and modernity are present in every detail of the construction and design.    The property is marked by a large entrance of natural light that floods the rooms with high ceilings dressed with beautiful wooden beams. It has 210 m2 of living space built to the highest quality standards, with air conditioning, underfloor heating and noble, natural materials, resulting in comfortable spaces with an elegant modern design while maintaining the aristocratic spirit with which the project was conceived. It has been distributed over 2 levels with a large private terrace of 58 m2 with personalised natural stone flooring, and developed in 3 double bedrooms, with built-in wardrobes and a TV room as well as 3 complete bathrooms. A single piece houses the living room with fireplace, dining room and modern kitchen integrated as an open space with an aesthetic code in perfect union with the rest of the room.    The building offers us an excellent outdoor area with garden and swimming pool next to corners where relaxation is guaranteed. It also has a guest flat that can be used for friends and family of the homeowners.    A two bedroom penthouse in the same building is available for 2,300, 000€: reference nº 2106017.    FEATURES:    -Air conditioning hot/cold, underfloor heating, fitted wardrobes, fireplace, parquet floor, stone floor.  -Open plan fitted kitchen.  -Community swimming pool, community garden, private terrace, storage room, lift, solarium.    LOCATION:    -Centre area, old town, next to restaurants, next to shops, 10 min. promenade, 15 min. to beaches.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Nicolau, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Stunning front line sea view apartment This unique and spacious apartment with stunning views of the sea is located in the well-kept residential complex of Imperial Gardens situated front line in Cala Vinyas. Within just a few minutes by car you can reach the golf courses of Bendinat and T-Golf & Country Club Poniente, international schools, the famous marinas Puerto Portals and Port Adriano with classy boutiques, bars and restaurants, as well as Palma, the capital of the island. The fully renovated apartment has been created by joining two apartments together and offers an ample living/dining room, fully equipped open plan kitchen, five bedrooms and three bathrooms, two of them en-suite. The large and sunny terrace which boasts fantastic sea views is perfect for dining and relaxing with friends. Facilities include air conditioning h/c, underfloor heating, fiber optic internet, two parking spaces in the garage and two storages rooms, a community pool and gardens, as well as direct sea access for those who love to swim in the sea. In addition there is also a sandy beach within a few minutes walk and the well known Cap Falcò beach club. This is the perfect apartment for family holidays.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cala Vinyes, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Beautiful newly built villa in great location This amazing newly built modern-Mediterranean villa has been finished very recently. It is located in Sol de Mallorca, one of the most sought after residential and tranquil areas of the Southwest in Mallorca. Beautiful beaches such as the Three Finger Bay, Cala Bella Donna or Cala Cap Falco are located only a few minutes away from the villa. The property offers a very nice U form layout on a flat plot. On the right hand side of the villa we find the light flooded entrance hall followed by a modern and fully equipped kitchen with Miele appliances and access to the pool area. On the upper floor there is a foyer, two bedrooms which share one bathroom, and access to a nice terrace. From here there is access to the rooftop terrace which offers great panoramic and sea views. The basement has a machinery room and a room prepared to be converted into an additional bedroom suitable for staff members. The middle part of the villa offers a spacious living area with a gas chimney and view to the pool area and the beautiful Mediterranean garden which surrounds the whole property. Finally, the left side of the villa offers a separate guest apartment with its own access which has two bedrooms and two bathrooms en-suite. This property offers as well absolute privacy making it the perfect property for the whole year round or for those who seek to enjoy their holiday in a great residential area. Other extras are: underfloor heating through heating pump, A/C warm and cold, garage for two cars, photovoltaic system, and a salt water pool.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sol de Mallorca, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: "Waking up every morning facing the blue sea is one of the reasons why this house, located on the Mediterranean, is so captivating".    It is located on the seafront next to Port Adriano, one of the most modern and best equipped marinas in the Mediterranean located in the southwest of Mallorca, within the municipality of Calvia.    The villa, of new construction, stands on a plot of 1.371 m2 with an excellent south orientation and occupies an area of 483 m2, where it has been sought to maximise the impressive sea views. Its modern and high quality design is in perfect harmony with the comfort and light that all the rooms enjoy, where the Mediterranean, bright and crystalline, seeps into them.     The outdoor terraces and infinity pool are fascinating spaces that get closer to the sea, with breathtaking views that will become the most desired places in the whole house where to make a lot of life thanks to the excellent climate that the island enjoys.    The house is developed on 3 levels connected by lift and has 4 bedrooms and 5 bathrooms. A large living-dining room with an integrated kitchen with a large central island is cosy and warm in winter thanks to its materials and large fireplace, and cool and open-plan the rest of the year, as its distribution allows the light to circulate freely and the landscape and the sea to be the absolute protagonists.    It is worth mentioning that the exclusive property has its own gym and spa area with jacuzzi, sauna and indoor pool as well as a garage and all the extras that make it a dream home in Mallorca.    FEATURES:    -Air conditioning hot/cold, underfloor heating, double glazing, natural stone flooring, lift, fireplace, alarm system.  -Birgit Muller fitted integrated kitchen.  -Terraces, porches, outdoor infinity pool, gym, sauna, jacuzzi, indoor pool, parking.    LOCATION:    -South facing  -First sea line, sea views, next to restaurants, next to shops, 5 min. to Santa Ponsa.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Toro, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Rustic property for sale with tourist rental authorization Rustic farm of 39 for sale. 000m2 with a house + 350m2 pool. The land is closed with wall and fence. The house has 5 double bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a 50m2 kitchen, a spacious 70m2 living room, an outdoor kitchen with a wood oven and barbecue. Garage and storage room. The house has gas-oil heating and air conditioning. Well of vein, light of Endesa. 700 varied fruit trees in production. Tourist rental license. More information 686280485.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Eugenia
suggestedTexts.title: House

description: Located literally on the sea in front of dreamlike views, this modern flat is the ideal place to disconnect and renew energies. From its privileged location you also have direct access to two beautiful beaches with crystal clear waters to make the most of all the sunny days and the fantastic climate that Mallorca enjoys.  It is situated very close to Palma, in a building with very few neighbours in the residential area of Cas Catalá, within the municipality of Calviá. It has all the necessary services around it to have a comfortable life; supermarkets, restaurants, terraces, as well as prestigious schools only a few minutes away by car. The flat has been completely refurbished using the best qualities and a careful selection of noble natural materials, resulting in 155 m2 of living space open to the light and the impressive views. With a modern design of modern spaces and provided with all the comforts, the property is distributed in 4 bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and 3 bathrooms, one of them in the master bedroom.  The living room with dining area opens onto the splendid landscape through large windows from where you can access the privileged terrace, an exceptional place with spectacular sea views where you will have the sensation of living in an eternal summer on the Mediterranean. The kitchen, with a modern and contemporary design, is independent and is offered fully equipped, it has a great entrance of natural light as well as a large storage capacity. It should be noted that the property includes two convenient parking spaces and is equipped with central heating and ducted air conditioning in all rooms. FEATURES: -Ducted air conditioning, central heating, wooden floors, fitted wardrobes. -Independent equipped kitchen, laundry area. -Terrace, two parking spaces. LOCATION: -Views to the sea, first sea line, direct access to beaches. -Close to restaurants and shops. Excellent access to the whole road network, 5 min. from Palma.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cas Catala, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Large spaces flooded with light, open spaces and beautiful views of the historic centre of Palma is what this fabulous flat offers us, located next to the famous Mercado del Olivar and calle San Miguel in Palma, an area in the heart of the city full of life and surrounded by 14th century buildings between streets that make up the centre of Palma's cultural and commercial life.     This very spacious flat has 176 m2 that will make it the ideal home for those who wish to enjoy city life and the comforts of the centre, living in a flat with an unbeatable location and impressive lighting.    It has a project outlined to carry out a reform that would result in a 3 or 4 bedroom home with a large living room, dining room and open plan kitchen space making the most of the light and views.    LOCATION:    -Central area of Palma, historic centre, next to shops, next to market, next to restaurants and cafes, next to all services.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Missio - Mercat, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Low: Botiga House of 90 m2 on 2 levels ideal to reform and achieve good profitability just steps from the Rambla.  You can have a beautiful loft with upstairs bedrooms and double height living room mixing old and modern touches.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Jaume, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: First line newly refurbished apartment This outstanding fully refurbished apartment with an easy direct access to the sea and to two small beaches offers breathless views from every angle. The owners selected carefully only the best materials and the small community is conveniently located in Cas Catala just a few meters away from supermarkets, restaurants and international schools. The apartment features 4 bedrooms one of which is en-suite and all with built in wardrobes, an open light flooded living/dining room with access through a large window to the 13 m2 front line terrace where one can enjoy the spectacular sea views. The modern designer kitchen with its independent laundry area is fully equipped and also allows beautiful views over the Mediterranean Sea. The flat comes with central heating, ducted air conditioning hot/cold as well as 2 garage parking spaces. Cas Català and Bendinat are two manageable, rather quiet places in the south-west of Mallorca, which thanks to their exclusive properties and a privileged location by the sea have long been some of the most coveted residential areas of the Mediterranean island. Good connections to the capital of Palma and to the international airport also add to the popular housing location. Cas Catalá and Bendinat offer numerous sports and leisure activities, from various water sports, to beautiful cycling tours, to varied golf courses. In Bendinat, for example is where the famous golf course "Golf Bendinat"is located, which is particularly popular because of its idyllic location in the midst of a nature reserve and its challenging courses for golfers. The particularly prestigious area called Alt Bendinat is located in the immediate vicinity of the village center and directly by the sea. The exclusive villas and golf apartments offer breathtaking views over the blue sea that invites to dream. In the immediate vicinity of Cas Catalá and Bendinat lie beautiful beaches, the village of Portals Nous, which offers shopping opportunities for daily needs, as well as numerous international schools. Additionally, the luxury yacht harbor of Puerto Portals is just minutes away and invites you to enjoy the sensational view of the countless luxury yachts in one of the numerous cafes and restaurants of the extra class.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cas Catala, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Between the Sierra de Tramuntana and the Sierra de Na Burguesa, in the southwest part of Mallorca, we find the municipality of Calviá, only 10 minutes away from all the beaches that this privileged area of the coast of the island has to offer.     Within this location and in a plot of 470 m2 is located this beautiful house, with wide spaces full of light and magnificent exteriors where you can spend the day relaxing in the garden, in the swimming pool and enjoy both day and night in the barbecue area.    The house has 170 m2 developed in 2 floors. On the ground floor there is a laundry room, a gym room and a spa area with an indoor hydro-massage pool and sauna. On the upper level there are 4 bedrooms, all of them with built-in wardrobes, 3 bathrooms and the living-dining room area connected to the large independent kitchen, fully equipped. The property also has a garage for the total comfort of its owners and has a holiday rental licence.    FEATURES:    -Air conditioning, fitted wardrobes.  -Fully fitted kitchen.   Terrace, garden, private swimming pool, sauna, hydro-massage pool, barbecue.  -Parking    LOCATION:    -Clear views, mountain views, 10 min. from beaches, 20 min. from Palma, next to restaurants, next to shops.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Calvià pueblo, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Recently refurbished flat in the best area of Paseo Mallorca, in the heart of Palma. Numerous restaurants, shops, supermarkets and all amenities are only a few minutes' walk away. Emblematic streets such as Avenida Jaime Tercero, Paseo del Borne and the Old Town of Palma can be reached within 5 minutes.    With beautiful and unobstructed views over this part of the city, this magnificent flat totally refurbished to the highest standards forms part of a building with a lift and boasts 180 m2 of spacious, bright and contemporary interiors that make it the ideal property to live in all year round.    It has a spacious living-dining room with access to a terrace, a large fully equipped kitchen, a master suite with bathroom and dressing room, a double bedroom with bathroom and another single bedroom also with en-suite bathroom. There is also a guest toilet.    FEATURES:    -Parquet floors, fitted wardrobes, air conditioning hot/cold, gas heating, lift.  -Independent kitchen, laundry.  -Terrace    LOCATION:    -Centre area, next to restaurants, next to shops, 5 min. from the old town, close to beaches.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Jaume, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Modern, recently refurbished spaces full of natural light, open spaces with the warm touch of wood and unobstructed views over the rooftops of the city and part of its architecture is what this penthouse offers us, located in the centre of Palma, just a short distance from the historic centre, in an area full of social and commercial life, with numerous shops, cafés, terraces and all the necessary services for day to day life around it.     The excellent property has a surface area of 97 m2 and offers us a magnificent terrace-solarium of 27 m2 with barbecue to enjoy the sun and the unbeatable climate of the island to the maximum. With all the comforts and the latest advances in domotic technology, the penthouse is distributed in 2 bedrooms with fitted wardrobes made to measure and two bathrooms, one of them in the master suite and the other a hammam, a type of steam bath with enormous benefits for the body thanks to the combination of humid heat and water vapour. The living-dining room space with fireplace and perfectly integrated and custom-made kitchen opens completely onto the large terrace, which ends up becoming an extension of the living room especially in the summer months when the windows remain open.    The building of which this property forms part has a lift and a communal terrace where the storage room of the penthouse is located. The price includes a parking space within walking distance.     "Undoubtedly an excellent penthouse to enjoy the day to day with all the comforts both inside and outside the house".    CHARACTERISTICS:    -Air conditioning hot/cold, fireplace, underfloor heating.  -Built-in wardrobes, Turkish bath, movement sensors in lights, voice-controlled audio system.  -Integrated kitchen in living room.  -Terrace with outdoor shower, barbecue, storage room.  -Parking space included.    LOCATION:    -Clear views, central area, next to restaurants, next to shops, next to all services.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Missio - Mercat, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Large spaces bathed in natural light and fantastic views overlooking the heart of the noblest part of Palma, come together in this excellent penthouse situated on the same avenue of Jaime III with the Paseo del Borne, the nerve centre of the city with its arcades that shelter the most exclusive shops, restaurants and terraces where you can enjoy the lively atmosphere of the capital of the island.    The large flat occupies the top floor of a historic building with a lift and entrance from two streets. All exterior, it has 227 m2 of constructed area and is distributed in 5 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, the main one with a dressing room area. The living-dining room has large windows that offer magnificent views and is also equipped with a fireplace. The ample kitchen is independent and also has great natural light thanks to the large windows it has.     The building is crowned by a large roof terrace where we find the storage space of the property as well as offering incredible views that reach all the way to the sea and the historic centre of Palma.    This stupendous penthouse, after a refurbishment, will undoubtedly become one of the best properties in the city of Palma.  It is worth mentioning that it has 3 underground parking spaces which are sold separately and are located at the back of the building.      FEATURES:    -Parquet floors, fireplace, dressing room.  -Historic building with lift.  -Storage room.  Option to purchase 3 parking spaces.      LOCATION:    -Clear views, town centre, next to shops, next to restaurants and cafes, close to historic centre, close to yacht club, close to schools and all amenities.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Jaume, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: "The view of the sea conditions everything in this house located on the front line of a prodigious landscape, a private place to enjoy the majestic scenery at your feet".    The avant-garde, the comfortable and the beautiful come together in this exceptional newly built villa that occupies 617 m2 on a plot of 1,290 m2 from where you can directly access the sea and enjoy a bath in the most absolute privacy.    The house has been planned with a modern design where the high qualities and the materials used make the difference: high-end, durable and timeless coatings to create a contemporary aesthetic that together with the latest technology provide the house with maximum comfort. The unique architecture of the house blends in perfectly with its surroundings, creating continuous and personal spaces for comfortable living while contemplating the imposing seascape that opens up before you.    It is developed on three levels connected by lift and open to natural light and splendid sea views. One level is entirely occupied by the large open plan living space, with living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen, laundry area and guest toilet. The upper level is entirely dedicated to the sleeping area, with 4 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and access to a large terrace. The lower level has been distributed into guest bedroom with en suite bathroom and rooms with gym, sauna and bathroom, all with access and direct contact to the spacious terraces with outdoor dining and lounge areas next to the magnificent swimming pool, an outdoor setting where the sound of the sea will be the soundtrack for summer evenings.    -Ready end 2021    FEATURES:    -Air conditioning hot/cold, underfloor heating, double glazing, lift, fireplace, fitted wardrobes, natural stone floors, domotic system.  -Open plan fitted kitchen, laundry room.  -Terraces, porches, swimming pool, solarium, garden, barbecue, gym, sauna, two garage spaces, storage room.    LOCATION:    -Clear views, sea views, first sea line, direct sea access, 10 min. Puerto Adriano and Puerto Portals, 20 min. Palma.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cala Vinyes, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Just a few minutes away from the centre of Palma and within an ideal environment for city lovers who want peace and quiet when they get home, this excellent brand new penthouse is located in a recently built residential complex that offers a large swimming pool and garden area to enjoy the sun and the good weather in a large communal outdoor space with a well-kept design. It also has a wide range of leisure and services around, with restaurants, supermarkets, sports centres and prestigious schools. The property is located on the third floor and has a surface area of 81 m2 made with excellent materials and qualities that will make your day to day life much more comfortable; parquet floors, air conditioning, central heating, electric blinds and double glazing among others. All the rooms have a great entrance of natural light thanks to its south orientation and a modern and comfortable design.  It is distributed in two bedrooms and two bathrooms, one of them en suite. The living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen form a single space with access to a terrace from which you can access the large private solarium area that the penthouse offers us, a large space of 62 m2 with beautiful unobstructed views that has a swimming pool, dining area and summer lounge; a space of its own in the city outdoors and with views that more and more people are looking for. To highlight that the property has three underground parking spaces that are included in the price, a great advantage and convenience for the owners. FEATURES: -Air conditioning hot/cold by ducts, natural gas heating, parquet floors, double glazing, aluminium, electric blinds, built-in wardrobes. -Open plan fitted kitchen. -Private terrace, solarium and swimming pool, communal pool and gardens. -3 underground parking spaces. LOCATION: -Clear views, next to restaurants, next to shops, next to schools, next to sports centres, excellent access to all road and transport network.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Zona Colegios - Son Moix, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Located in front of the sea, the light and blue of the Mediterranean fill the interiors of this fantastic recently refurbished penthouse with an elegant and modern design in equal parts. From its terrace, the spectacular sea views are even more impressive and are present throughout the day in every room of the house.    It is located on the front line of the beautiful enclave of Cala Estancia in Palma, surrounded by beaches, yacht clubs, open air cafés and restaurants in front of the sea, all within 10 minutes from the centre of Palma and the airport.    The penthouse has 103 m2 of surface with parquet floors and high qualities. It has 2 spacious bedrooms, modern, luminous and with sea views, from where you have direct access to the terrace. The master bedroom also has a comfortable en-suite bathroom. The living room, dining room and equipped kitchen occupy a single open-plan space with access to the terrace and with unbeatable sea views.     "Excellent opportunity to live in an eternal summer with all the services around but 10 min. from everything the centre of Palma has to offer".    CHARACTERISTICS:    -Air conditioning hot/cold by conducts, parquet floor, aluminium-climalit, lift.  -Integrated equipped kitchen  -Terrace  LOCATION:    -First sea line, sea views from all rooms, next to restaurants, next to shops, next to yacht club, 10 min. from Palma centre, 5 min. from airport.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Can Pastilla, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Located in one of the most popular areas on the southwest coast of the island, in Sol de Mallorca, a town that is only 15 min. from Palma and where you can enjoy a relaxed atmosphere next to beaches with crystal clear waters and extensive golf courses, is this contemporary villa completely renovated whose spacious interiors convey modernity, with high ceilings, wooden floors, white walls and large windows to the outside that they flood the rooms with light.    The land occupies 1,632 m2 with large outdoor spaces made up of terraced corners, a large swimming pool with a solarium area and an extensive garden where any time of the year is perfect to enjoy it.    The house has 370 m2 of surface area developed on 2 floors with 4 double bedrooms equipped with fitted wardrobes and 4 bathrooms, three of them arranged en suite. On the main level a large entrance gives us access to the spacious living room with dining room and modern open kitchen, all perfectly integrated surrounded by glass doors from which to go directly to the entire outdoor area. On this floor we also find a room and a bathroom. The upper level is occupied by the rest of the rooms, with the large master suite where an area for bathing and relaxing and another for dressing room has been integrated into the same surface, as well as having an exclusive terrace.    The house also offers us a comfortable parking area.    CHARACTERISTICS:    -Air conditioning hot / cold through ducts, central heating, parquet flooring, fitted wardrobes, Jacuzzi.  -Open kitchen equipped.  -Terraces, garden, swimming pool, parking.    LOCATION:    -Natural environment, clear views, near beaches, near restaurants, near shops, 15 min. Palm.

description: Modern family home close to beach This modern family villa is situated in a quiet residential area of Mallorca´s Southwest – in Costa de la Calma, on a south oriented plot of approximately 900 m2 which lies only 150 meters away from the sea and beach. The center of Santa Ponsa with its lively shops, bars and restaurants is just a short walk away. The home offers two full living levels. The main level enjoys a bright living room opening to the patio and yard, a fully equipped open plan kitchen with bar, a spacious double bedroom with bathroom en suite, a further double bedroom and a separate bathroom. The upper living level features a fantastic open space for play and work, with peaked 3,90m high ceilings, wooden beams and access to two terraces. We also find two double bedrooms, each with bathroom en suite and a private balcony. The beautiful garden with grassy lawns and large pool make this a perfect home for a large family or for hosting your guests, with incredible privacy and serenity. Features: fireplaces, air conditioning hot/cold, underfloor heating (oil), washing machine, dryer, tiled floors, open and covered terraces, garden with automatic irrigation, storeroom, built-in wardrobes, basement, double glazed aluminum windows, electrical blinds, awnings, 10 x 5m heated swimming pool, jacuzzi in master bathroom, utility area, parking for 3 autos. Due to the perfect infrastructural location you can reach the center of Santa Ponsa within a few minutes. As well as the luxury harbour of Port Adriano where you can taste culinary delicacies in some of the most exclusive restaurants. Or even have a walk down the exclusive boulevard passing the super yachts and boutiques. Indulge yourself in a game of golf on any of the three coveted golf courses of Santa Ponsa (Golf I, II, III).
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Costa de la Calma, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Privacy and SPECTACULAR views, surrounded by 150,000sqm of olive groves and nature to experience. Sea views. The authentic Mallorca. traditional stone FINCA 3 floors plus separate guest house  8km from the Mediterranean, 20 MINUTES from PALMA,the main city   A huge terrace, with many possibilities, ground floor of 260m, on the first floor of 200m with a terrace of 50 meters and second floor of 200... with two very large rooms.  As well as a guest house separated from the main building of 95 meters  A large covered porch as a garage located in the mountains, on the outskirts of the town Water rights according to public deed of a source, that is located on adjoining land, It has 2 cisterns, one with a capacity of 160 cubic meters located about 30 meters from the house and another one in the house with a water well.  The first and second photos show the property from the top of the mountain, where you can see the beauty of the area.    The roof was renovated in 2000 with exposed wooden beams. as well as stone tiling of the terrace on the ground floor and the balustrade is from the same reform    IDEAL AS AN INVESTMENT... in the picture number 7 you can apreciate observe from the village where is located the mansion...  A true haven of peace between mountains 10 minutes from the town and 20 minutes from the sea, port of Valldemosa and 25 minutes from Palma, the capital of Mallorca... with a great cultural offer... close to international schools, nautical ports and golf courses. Golf. In addition to the climate, 300 days of sunshine per year... also security... as well as private health resources of the highest quality and wide range of cultural resources   Property that offers a unique and exclusive situation In the enclave of Valldemosa, one of the most charming towns in Mallorca. A very cultural, musical and artistic town, famous not only for the musician Chopin but for the number of painters and writers and creatives who have chosen this place to spend their vacations or stay to live, highlighting the Archduke Luis Salvador of Austria, one of the most illustrious visitors as a figure who knew how to appreciate and preserve the rustic farms of the Tramuntana... a pioneer of the ecological way of living  House surrounded by terraces of ancient olive trees, carob trees and oaks. that give it a character of authenticity, of living nature and where sometimes time stands still... and you connect with this calm and serenity that only mountains and trees inspire human beings... to be more aware of nature. great beauty that can not only be admired, but also feel a special energy, I would even say magical... it is a sensation of well-being, relaxation... fullness... you have it all, pure poetry  at the moment there are herds of native sheep to keep the farm in good condition. we speak english.

description: This elegant villa would make a great family home and/or holiday home and is ready to move in, situated in an idyllic setting on a cul-de-sac surrounded by open fields and vineyards with countryside views.  Entering the property you are met with a grand reception hall boasting double height ceilings leading up to the top floor. The ground floor consists of a spacious light living room with direct access to a covered large L shaped terrace overlooking the pool and outside kitchen, spacious dining room with direct access to a fully equipped kitchen. On the lower level of the property there is direct access to a garage which can fit up to 4 to 5 cars or could be used as an additional space for gymnasium. There are also 3 large storage rooms. Has a tennis court which could easily be converted into a basketball court or padel tennis court. The garden is an easy to maintain mature mediterranean garden. Features include: central heating throughout, outside covered kitchen overlooking swimming pool, 10x5 swimming pool, tennis court, large garage, double glazing throughout, hot/ cold AC and automatic irrigation system.
