description: This villa is situated in a privileged seafront position in the residential area of Torrenova, only 5 minutes away from the beaches of Palmanova, the marina of Portals, several golf courses and only 10 minutes away from Palma.    The house enjoys spectacular views to the sea and the bay of Palma, and has a beautiful garden in front of the villa with a comfortable direct access to the sea with bathing area.     Built in 2000 and partially renovated in 2020, it comprises on the ground floor a spacious living/dining room with open kitchen, a utility room, a bedroom with bathroom en suite, a guest toilet and a garage. On the upper floor there is the master bedroom with bathroom en suite and dressing room, two further bedrooms (one of them with bathroom en suite), another bathroom, a storeroom and a large terrace. In addition, there is a separate guest flat with a bedroom/living room with bathroom and kitchen.    Outside there are numerous open and covered terraces, a beautiful, easy to maintain garden and a spectacular swimming pool.    Extras such as underfloor heating throughout the house, air conditioning hot/cold, kitchen with Miele appliances, alarm system, etc. complete this exclusive property.    FEATURES:  -Direct access to the sea  -Air conditioning hot/cold and underfloor heating  -Integrated kitchen equipped with Miele electrical appliances  -Covered and uncovered terraces  -Garage   -Swimming pool  -Guest flat    LOCATION:  -Front line to the sea, unobstructed views, sea views, 5 min. beach, close to golf courses, close to restaurants, close to shops, 10 min. to Palma.

description: Apartment with 130m constructed area near C/Jaime III, Ramblas and Paseo del Borne. The property is located in an over 200 years old building, has three double and a small single bedroom, one bathroom and kitchen with oven and hob. Carpentry of original wood, doors with Mallorcan small ironwork and large windows. Two large storage rooms belong to the property. A few years ago the owner has changed the electrical installations and has renovated the bathroom and kitchen. The entrance to the building is a lovely Mallorcan courtyard, the apartment is situated on the first floor (without elevator). There is also an access to a roof terrace overlooking the oldtown. Unbeatable location if you look for a quiet place in the oldtown, close to the best shopping areas of Palma and the harbor promenade.

description: Flooded with light and warmth thanks to its excellent south orientation, this fantastic penthouse is perfect for making the most of the spectacular views over the Mediterranean. Its large and bright spaces are in perfect harmony with the place where it is located, the coastal area on the outskirts of Palma de San Agustín, a place where you can live all year round in a summer atmosphere. The large house has a surface area of 210 m2 and offers us a solarium area on the upper level where the 210 m2 it also occupies have been made the most of by organising the space into a complete living area and another dining area; an open-air place with beautiful views where life can be enjoyed in summer. The interiors, carried out with high qualities, have been distributed in 4 spacious bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and 4 complete bathrooms. From all of them we can have the beautiful view of the blue sea when waking up and one of them has its own terrace. Thanks to its good orientation and the large windows, the living-dining room is perfectly illuminated with natural light as well as allowing the beautiful views to come inside. It has access to a terrace on the ground floor, which makes it possible to gain ground and to go outside from here. From this space there is access to the bright kitchen with great sea views, fully equipped and equipped with a daily dining area. To highlight that this magnificent property is part of a community that offers us communal swimming pool with large area for sunbathing and also includes parking space and storage room. FEATURES: -Air conditioning hot/cold, fitted wardrobes. -Independent equipped kitchen. -Private terraces and large sunbathing area, communal swimming pool, parking, storage room. LOCATION: -Clear views, sea views, next to restaurants, next to shops, close to beaches, 5 min. from Palma centre.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Agustí, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Spacious apartment next to Cala Nova port This spacious apartment is located in a privileged area of the port of Cala Nova, beaches, shops and cafes, just 10 min away from Palma centre and only 5 mins from Puerto Portals. The apartment offers 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (1 en-suite), living / dining room, fully equipped kitchen, utility room, a covered-closed-in terrace of 24 m2. Further features air conditioning h / c, laminate flooring, double glazed windows, fitted wardrobes, one parking space in the garage and a storage room. The community has direct access to a public park, a communal pool and nice garden area.

description: The dazzling sea views take over the view from every corner of this villa, which opens out onto the exceptional landscape of the coast of Santa Ponsa, a town in the southwest of the island that offers beautiful beaches, coves, golf courses and a wide range of leisure activities and restaurants, all just 15 minutes from Palma, the capital. It is also located in one of the most prestigious marinas in the Mediterranean, Port Adriano.    As luminous as Mallorca and with a refined architecture that reflects the spirit of the island, the villa stands on a plot of 800 m2, with 350 m2 of living space made up of uncluttered and modern interiors open to the light through large windows facing the sea, paying tribute to the impressive landscape.     The outdoor spaces of this unique villa feature covered terraces and generous solarium areas around a large infinity pool with a sheet of water that seems to extend to the surface of the sea.    Developed on 3 levels with updated Mediterranean architectural elements, the house has a total of 4 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms plus a guest bathroom. Two of the bedrooms are located on the upper level, the master bedroom with a privileged location facing the Mediterranean, equipped with a large en-suite bathroom and sheltered by a semi-circular wall with large glass arches that frame the beautiful landscape, allowing the sea to look out from each of them. The other large bedroom, also with magnificent sea views, has a bathroom, a sitting room and its own terrace which can also be accessed from the master bedroom. The garage space for two cars is also on this level. On a lower main level we find the living room, dining room and the modern fully equipped kitchen, independent but open and connected to all this ample space where the freshness of the materials and colours join the exceptional views and from where you can access a terrace and the outside swimming pool. A bedroom with its own bathroom and a guest toilet complete this level.    The house offers on the ground floor a perfect guest flat with kitchen and bathroom.    "An excellent private villa where, to all the comforts of today, is added the magic of dazzling sea views".    FEATURES:    -Air conditioning hot/cold, underfloor heating, double glazing, central sound system.  -Separate open plan fitted kitchen  -Terraces, private swimming pool, two car garage, guest flat.    LOCATION:    -Sea views, first sea line, next to marina, next to beaches, close to restaurants and cafes, close to shops, close to golf, 15 min. from Palma.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Bright apartment in central location This bright and renovated apartment is centrally located, just a few minutes' walk from Santa Catalina and Palma Tennis. The patio with lemon tree invites you to stay and relax with friends. The property counts with an open and fully equipped kitchen, a guest toilet, 2 bedrooms and a bathroom with shower. Other features: Underfloor heating, air conditioning w/c, a parking space can be rented nearby. Palma with around 300 days of sunshine per year is the perfect city for lovers of good weather. In recent years the districts around Santa Catalina, the port area and the Paseo Marítimo have been transformed, offering a truly cosmopolitan atmosphere. Santa Catalina developed into the in-quarter of the Balearic capital. Its great variety of artistic cafés, pop-up shops and modern restaurants transmit a totally international atmosphere. Thanks to the inclined shape of the neighborhood presents a variety of apartments and both the second and third line also enjoy views of the port of Palma. In the southeast of the city, directly in the port is the Paseo Marítimo, one of the city's best-known leisure areas and the adjoining Cala Mayor and San Agustin. Apart from exclusive discotheques and restaurants, the Paseo Marítimo stands out for its marvelous views of the port and the Cathedral, which are only a few minutes' walk away.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Armadams, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Spacious high quality villa in Sol de Mallorca This quality villa was built in 2007 and it sits on a flat and very private plot with manicured garden in the quiet residential neighbourhood of Sol de Mallorca. The property has two levels with a practical distribution and very generously sized rooms. The ground floor has a spacious, open plan living-dining room with a modern, fully equipped kitchen. There is also a garage for one car, a laundry room and guest toilet on this floor. On the first floor are four double bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms. Additionally the first floor features a second living area with a fireplace which leads to another large sunny terrace. This is a perfect family home for both holidays and permanent living, just a few minutes walk from the beach and 20 minutes from Palma. Sol de Mallorca is an oasis of tranquility located south west of the island with its own micro climate offering maximum sunshine and little rainfall throughout the year. It has excellent connections to Palma and the international airport and is within a short drive of top golf courses, marinas, restaurants and shops. The area has a stunning coastline and features three wonderful beaches at Portals Vells; Sa Caleta, Platja del Mago and Platja del Rei. These beaches are popular with the locals and visitors alike because of their natural beauty and crystal clear waters. The beach at Portals Vells also has an excellent sea side beach restaurant and small marina. Sol de Mallorca is the ideal place to enjoy beach life away from the busy tourist resorts. It is also popular with hikers in the winter months and a great spot for golfers with the “T Golf & Country Club Poniente” course close by.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sol de Mallorca, Calvià

description: With a privileged location within the historic centre of Palma, an extraordinary place full of streets, squares, corners with a special charm and formed by the most emblematic monuments of the city, this excellent duplex flat is situated within a listed building from the 17th century full of history. The elegant house overlooks all these beautiful surroundings with 473 m2 of light-filled surface area and composed of rooms that have been reformed under a modern and avant-garde design, but respecting the essence of the traditional construction with traditional elements that have been maintained, such as the marés arch that opens one of its walls. The perfect preservation of the Mallorcan patio with which the historic building welcomes us is another symbol of the exclusive character that this property offers us.  With exceptional materials and qualities, the house is distributed over two floors with its own lift and a magnificent private outdoor area occupying 80 m2 of terrace with swimming pool and garden, ideal to enjoy in summer or during the sunny days of winter, which makes this property, together with its location, design and history, a unique property. On the upper floor and with a large entrance of natural light we find the large open plan living room with fireplace surrounded by 5 large windows with balcony, as well as the fully equipped designer kitchen and dining room, all connected and with access to a charming terrace where to improvise, for example, an aperitif outdoors. From this floor, which also has a guest bathroom, you can access the large terrace with swimming pool via a convenient staircase. The lower level is occupied by the 3 bedrooms, two of them with en suite bathrooms and the large master bedroom with a spacious dressing area. In addition there is another room which has been used as an office but can be converted into a fourth bedroom. From the bedrooms there is a direct access to the terrace with swimming pool, which adds to the relaxation and calmness of the property. To highlight that this exceptional property includes two parking spaces, a great added value that makes this property unbeatable. FEATURES: -Ducted hot/cold air conditioning, underfloor heating, home automation system, private lift, parquet flooring, fireplace, fitted wardrobes. -Open plan fitted kitchen, laundry room. -Balconies, terrace, swimming pool, two parking spaces. LOCATION: -Listed building, in historic centre, next to restaurants, next to cafes, next to shops, near yacht club, near sea.

suggestedTexts.title: Duplex

description: Stunning front line sea view apartment This unique and spacious apartment with stunning views of the sea is located in the well-kept residential complex of Imperial Gardens situated front line in Cala Vinyas. Within just a few minutes by car you can reach the golf courses of Bendinat and T-Golf & Country Club Poniente, international schools, the famous marinas Puerto Portals and Port Adriano with classy boutiques, bars and restaurants, as well as Palma, the capital of the island. The fully renovated apartment has been created by joining two apartments together and offers an ample living/dining room, fully equipped open plan kitchen, five bedrooms and three bathrooms, two of them en-suite. The large and sunny terrace which boasts fantastic sea views is perfect for dining and relaxing with friends. Facilities include air conditioning h/c, underfloor heating, fiber optic internet, two parking spaces in the garage and two storages rooms, a community pool and gardens, as well as direct sea access for those who love to swim in the sea. In addition there is also a sandy beach within a few minutes walk and the well known Cap Falcò beach club. This is the perfect apartment for family holidays.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: First line newly refurbished apartment This outstanding fully refurbished apartment with an easy direct access to the sea and to two small beaches offers breathless views from every angle. The owners selected carefully only the best materials and the small community is conveniently located in Cas Catala just a few meters away from supermarkets, restaurants and international schools. The apartment features 4 bedrooms one of which is en-suite and all with built in wardrobes, an open light flooded living/dining room with access through a large window to the 13 m2 front line terrace where one can enjoy the spectacular sea views. The modern designer kitchen with its independent laundry area is fully equipped and also allows beautiful views over the Mediterranean Sea. The flat comes with central heating, ducted air conditioning hot/cold as well as 2 garage parking spaces. Cas Català and Bendinat are two manageable, rather quiet places in the south-west of Mallorca, which thanks to their exclusive properties and a privileged location by the sea have long been some of the most coveted residential areas of the Mediterranean island. Good connections to the capital of Palma and to the international airport also add to the popular housing location. Cas Catalá and Bendinat offer numerous sports and leisure activities, from various water sports, to beautiful cycling tours, to varied golf courses. In Bendinat, for example is where the famous golf course "Golf Bendinat"is located, which is particularly popular because of its idyllic location in the midst of a nature reserve and its challenging courses for golfers. The particularly prestigious area called Alt Bendinat is located in the immediate vicinity of the village center and directly by the sea. The exclusive villas and golf apartments offer breathtaking views over the blue sea that invites to dream. In the immediate vicinity of Cas Catalá and Bendinat lie beautiful beaches, the village of Portals Nous, which offers shopping opportunities for daily needs, as well as numerous international schools. Additionally, the luxury yacht harbor of Puerto Portals is just minutes away and invites you to enjoy the sensational view of the countless luxury yachts in one of the numerous cafes and restaurants of the extra class.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat

The panoramic views of the sea in a southerly direction cover part of the bay of Palma, it has sun all day.      Very economical community expenses. It does NOT have a parking space. It does not have heating, it has air conditioning in the living room.   Request your face-to-face or virtual visit with JD Residences, we will be happy to assist you in Spanish, English, German, French, Swedish and Russian.     Agente oficial de la propiedad AP Daniel Cano   .

description: This spacious villa in a quiet area of Nova Santa Ponsa offers all the luxury you could wish for. The villa is built on three floors and offers a beautiful garden with a large swimming pool with sunny terraces, an outdoor dining area and various chill-out areas. The villa also has large open and covered terraces, as well as a roof terrace with panoramic views over the mountains to the sea. The 7 double bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms, make this an ideal property for large families. On the 3rd floor there is the possibility of a separate apartment. Within walking distance there are many services such as the Santa Ponsa marina, a beach with crystal clear waters, bars and restaurants, a Jungle Park. Port Adriano with its beach, exclusive shops and excellent restaurants is only a few minutes drive from the property. The city of Palma with its shops open all year round, art galleries, museums, famous cathedral and marina is only 20 minutes away.

description: Elegant newly built villa, in the center of La Bonanova, with incredible views of the sea. With a minimalist style and high-end qualities, it is a luxury unreachable for anyone. The house is made up of two heights and is accessed through a spacious hall with high ceilings. On the ground floor, a large entrance with a large hall, with direct access to the garage. On the same floor there is a studio, gym, utility room, laundry room and two bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms. On the upper floor, there is a spacious master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom, another bedroom with an ensuite bathroom, a guests toilet and a living-dining room area with an open kitchen, all with beautiful views of the sea and the terrace and garden area with the pool to the forehead. All the furniture is from Terraza Balear, and artworks are not included. Ideal for a family looking to live in a privileged area, with an international school just around the corner, new and exclusive sports areas, and 10 minutes from the center of Palma. If you want a viewing or more information, do not hesitate to contact us.

description: Majorcan flat with 5 bedrooms and terrace with views to the Cathedral and partial sea views in Paseo Mallorca. If you like to live in the centre of the city, this flat will undoubtedly captivate you with its extraordinary location. It is located in one of the most sought-after areas of Palma de Mallorca, in the heart of the city, in Paseo Mallorca.  This large flat of approximately 184 sqm is characterised by its light and its unbeatable views both to the emblematic cathedral and to the Tramuntana mountain range due to its altitude. The flat is in great part of origin so it needs to be updated. It is totally exterior and is distributed in 5 spacious bedrooms, one of them currently converted into a large dressing room. The main bedrooms have views to the cathedral, which makes it even more unique. It has 2 completely refurbished bathrooms, one of them en suite and a toilet. The independent kitchen is in its original state and perfectly preserved. Finally we find an immense living-dining room with built-in fireplace and access to a terrace with unique views to the Paseo Mallorca and the Tramuntana mountain range, these last areas will undoubtedly become one of the most cosy areas of the house. The house preserves the Majorcan character in its shutters as well as in the floor. Surrounded by the best restaurants in Palma, all of them offering an unbeatable and varied gastronomic quality, which makes it even more attractive for those who love urban life. Not forgetting its proximity to the Avenida Jaime III where you will find the best and exclusive shops, the large Corte Inglés shopping centre and various museums including the famous Es Baluard museum. Only 5 minutes away from the Paseo Marítimo which will allow sport and pet lovers to enjoy the Mediterranean climate. Do not hesitate any longer and contact us.

The complex has a direct entrance to the harbour of Puerto Portals, where you can enjoy the best restaurants, bars and luxury shops. Call us today to arrange a viewing. description: Palma Old Town - Spectacular apartment with lots of grandeur and private terrace. Effortlessly combining contemporary features with the traditional and the timeless elegance of this 3-bedroom apartment, typifies the best of traditional Mallorquin architecture. Situated in the heart of La Llonja in the Old Town of Palma, this spacious apartment comprises a constructed area of 233m2. 3 double bedrooms, two large bathrooms, one of which is ensuite, a very large combined living/dining room, kitchen/breakfast room and two storage rooms. Entering via a grand staircase into a large hallway with internal courtyard, the opulence of this home is immediately apparent. The large living room, with Marés stone feature wall, has direct access to the 35m2 private terrace and also  leads to the kitchen/breakfast room. Finished to the highest possible standard with marble work surfaces, the kitchen also benefits from direct access to the private terrace. With high ceilings throughout, the apartment boasts a wealth of period features including elegant ceiling roses and ornamental cornicing, tastefully combined with polished concrete floors. The apartment also has large windows and is flooded with natural light. To complete the package, the property has full central heating with city gas, ensuring a cosy atmosphere all year round.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Llotja, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Sant Feliu

description: Completely refurbished flat with a surface area of approximately 50 sqm distributed in a room with kitchen, living room and a covered terrace, 1 double bedroom and bathroom with bathtub. Equipped with air conditioning and underfloor heating. Excellent condition, without lift, but with very easy accessibility. Located in the hills of Portals Nous, it is situated in a very quiet street, walking distance to the port, restaurants, shops, public transport and all the services you may need.  Don't miss this great opportunity! Last flat for sale in this building. We speak English, Swedish, German, Italian, Spanish and many more languages, so please do not hesitate to contact us. To see more properties go to puroestate. com.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Portals Nous - Bendinat, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This exclusive dream house will especially appeal to lovers of modern architecture and exceptional design. The villa has three large bedrooms, each with its own access to the luxurious upper terrace. The master suite leaves nothing to be desired: it offers a dressing room, a modern bathroom and, as an absolute highlight, an outdoor wellness oasis with a bathtub. In the modern living room with adjoining kitchen, you can enjoy the impressive views of the Bay of Palma. The open layout with clean lines allows the indoor and outdoor areas to flow smoothly into one another. The spacious covered terrace on the lower level, created by the extraordinary architecture, is on the one hand an expressive design element, but on the other offers a practical luxury: partly covered infinity pool with exclusive seating area and outdoor kitchen. This tastefully designed outdoor area invites you to entertain and relax. It is the ideal place to end the day with friends and family in the evening, enjoying the sunset and the views of the bay of Palma. Car lovers will also get their money's worth with this villa: the underground garage with elevator offers space for about 4 cars. It can also be used as a leisure room or gym. Despite its quiet location, the property is very well connected to Palma. Restaurants, golf courses and shopping facilities, as well as the university hospital, are within walking distance. If you want more information, please contact us. All information without guarantee. Image rights belong to the seller.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Bunyola
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Fabulous luxury villa in the Torrenova area, nestled in an idyllic setting and just 500 meters from the wonderful Son Matias beach is this fantastic property with a plot of 915 m2 and a constructed area of 396 m2, totally independent and very private. The house welcomes us with a spacious living room with large windows that lead us to the pool and garden area, in this same area we can find a large office, a double bedroom, a bathroom and a spacious and modern kitchen fully equipped and connected to the spacious and dining room. All these spaces are completely surrounded by large windows, which means that, in addition to the pleasant views, light is a dominant aspect in this property. On this floor, a majestic staircase allows us to access the second level that continues to maintain light and spacious spaces and is where two double bedrooms are located, an elegant and spacious bathroom and of course the suite that also has a large dressing area. and the bathroom with the same characteristics. In this part of the house and following the design, all the rooms have large windows that allow light to enter at all times of the year, making this one of the most attractive aspects of the villa. To continue the tour we go to the garden area that we have already mentioned, a garage for four cars and the very good-sized pool located in the sunniest area of the house. This villa, built by a German company, has a high quality in all its materials and structures, it also has a central heating system through underfloor heating and an air conditioning system that keeps temperatures adequate according to the requirements of each time of the year. The irrigation and lighting system keeps the garden in excellent condition all year round.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Magaluf, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: House

district: Es Forti - Son Cotoner - Son Dameto
description: Cozy apartment in a quiet residential area of Palma, located close to shops. schools and hospitals.  The 65m2 apartment has 2 bedrooms one with bathroom en- suite, a fully equipped kitchen with a utility room, a bright living room with access to the balcony. Laminate throughout the apartment except in the kitchen and dining room which have high quality tiles. Other features of the apartment: 2 AC one in the living room and another in one of the bedrooms, climalit throughout the apartment, butane gas, but has pre-installation for natural gas. The property is sold with some kitchen appliances, oven, fridge, washing machine and dishwasher. The apartment is perfect for a family with one or two children. The price of the property is 245000 Euro which allows you to participate in the government's program of preferential housing loans for residents in the Balearic Islands.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Son Cotoner, Palma de Mallorca
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This Mediterranean villa was renovated in 2018 and is located on a plot of approx. 1.100sqm. It has several covered and uncovered terraces. The exterior part consists of a barbecue area, a large garden with a small pond, a well and 3 parking spaces. The living area of the house is approx. 190m² and is distributed over 2 levels. On the ground floor there is a living-dining room with a fireplace, an equipped kitchen, a utility room, a guest toilet and a bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. On the upper floor there are 3 more bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, one of them en suite, and an open terrace.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Santa Ponça, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: House

description: The bright two-storey villa is situated in a quiet residential area on a 1450m² plot facing south. It offers a wonderful infinity pool, several covered and open terraces with panoramic views, a garage and more parking possibilities. The villa has a living area of 500m². The spacious living-dining room with fireplace and access to the pool and terrace, an open and fully equipped modern kitchen, 4 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and a separate guest apartment with private bathroom.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Cas Catala, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: House

description: This exceptional 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom penthouse apartment is located in a very exclusive community in the quiet town of Illetas, just 10 minutes from Palma. The complex is situated in a beautiful private park right by the sea with a large well-maintained community pool and access to the sea. This stunning and bright 11th floor flat offers amazing sea views and has been completely renovated in 2019 using only the best materials. Special features of the flat include air conditioning/geothermal heating, underfloor heating in the bathroom, Japanese shower room, double glazed windows including electric shutters, custom fitted wardrobes and high quality painted fitted kitchen with state of the art appliances. All floor coverings are of a very high quality and the flat is furnished with new designer furniture of a very high quality. In addition, there is a large private parking space in the adjacent building. The complex also offers a porterage and laundry service. In the pool area there is a bar and a large restaurant directly on the sea only for this complex. This apartment does not have a terrace as it has been converted into a living area.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Illetes, Calvià
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This impressive villa is situated in a good location to the golf course in Son Vida and offers everything your heart desires on a large plot of approx.1941m2 and a constructed area of approx.931m2.There is room for the whole family and there are 6 bedrooms and bathrooms.The house is in very good condition.Above all, the spaciousness of all the rooms, the large, light-flooded windows, which can be fully opened onto the pool, as well as the large pool area (saltwater, heated) itself are convincing.

suggestedTexts.title: House

description: This apartment with sea views is located a few steps from the beach of Palmanova. The spacious apartment is made up of 2 floors in one and can be divided into two again. The apartment consists of a spacious living room, a 30m2 independent kitchen, 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Both from the living room and from one of the bedrooms there is access to a covered terrace from which you can enjoy the sea views. The property also comes with two underground parking spaces and two storage rooms. The elevator takes you directly from the underground car park to the flat.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Palmanova, Calvià

description: Fantastic property in the most central and exclusive area of Palma with large rooms with 5 bedrooms, several terraces, parking and a commercial area on the ground floor. Approximately 745 m2 is divided into 3 floors. This house was built in 1936 and is distributed as follows: On the first floor we find a big 'Hall', living room with fireplace, dining room, a double bedroom with bathroom en suite and living room, toilet and spacious patios. On the second floor, hall with fireplace, four bedrooms with bathrooms en suite and roof terrace. And on the ground floor a shop and spacious terraces and parking areas. It is a unique opportunity for an investor or a large family to get their hands on one of the largest and most incredible properties in Palma. The possibilities are endless. For more details and to book a viewing please do not hesitate to contact Puro Agents.  More properties in Mallorca available at puroagents. com.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: This beautiful semi-detached house in minimalist style is located in the quiet town of Bahia Grande. The house has 145 m² of living space divided over two floors. The first floor has a modern living-dining area with an open kitchen and a utility room. From the living room you can access the covered veranda and the garden with private pool. The upper floor has 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, one of them en suite. There is also a roof terrace with an unobstructed view.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Badia Blava-Badia Gran-Tolleric, Llucmajor
suggestedTexts.title: Semi-detached house

description: This Mediterranean design villa is situated on an elevated plot of 1224 m2 which offers a lot of privacy. The villa has four bedrooms, three bathrooms, a spacious living room with a fireplace, a modern kitchen and a bright dining room. Furthermore, there is a large garage with adjoining basement area. The entire villa is equipped with air conditioning and heating, The garden is very well maintained and has spectacular vegetation, there is a pond, a magnificent old olive tree and an orchard with various fruit trees (lemon, apricot, plum). In addition, there is a covered outdoor kitchen with covered dining area, pizza oven and barbecue and a 20 square meter pool with outside shower. In addition, there is another bathroom and plenty of storage space in the outside area.
